[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/'dul ba tha bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D6}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bi na ya k+Shu dra ka bstu/_bod skad du/_'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po dang po/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phran 
[\[1b.2\]]tshegs kyi gzhi'i sdom ni/_so phag chan pa chos gos dang /_/shing tshad dang ni gnas brtan lus/_/rgyus pa 'gyod pa dbyung ba nyid/_/phran tshegs gzhir ni yang dag bshad/_/
[\[1b.3\]]bsdus pa'i sdom ni/_so phag sen mo bcos pa dang /_/lhung bzed yan lag me long skyes/_/lam phran chu tshags mon sran sde'u/_/rkang pa bkru dang gos mdud do/_/sdom ni/_
[\[1b.4\]]so phag dang ni sa dkar dang /_/nya phyis dri yi lag ris dang /_/ka ba dang ni skud pa gnyis/_/lag rgyan dang ni sor gdub rgya/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na 
[\[1b.5\]]spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/_/drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/_lhung bzed thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]dang /_yangs pa can gyi bar dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa'i bar gyi bar skabs de na yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyi skyed mos tshal me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa/_bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa dga' 
[\[2a.2\]]ba'i tshal dang 'dra ba de dag na de dag gi rtse ba dang /_gar dang /_glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra'i cha byad sna tshogs dag dang /_khrus kyi yo byad sna tshogs dag kyang bzhag pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bo/_yangs pa can 
[\[2a.3\]]gyi lits+tsha bI 'di dag dang /_skyed mos tshal gyi dga' ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi dper mdzad na/_re zhig de dag gi skyed mos tshal ci 'dra ba blta'o zhes de rnams glod nas de dag gi skyed mos tshal du zhugs so/_/
[\[2a.4\]]de dag gis de na brtsal ba'i yo byad mda' bo che dang /_drang ba dang /_'phang rdo sna tshogs dang /_gar dang /_glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra'i cha byad sna tshogs dang /_pi bang dang /_gling bu dang /_rdza rnga dang /_khar rnga dang /_skad snyan la sogs pa sna tshogs dang /_
[\[2a.5\]]khrus kyi yo byad so phag dang /_bkru ba'i phye ma dang /_mgo bkru ba skyu ru ra sna tshogs mthong ba dang /_de rnams kyis phan tshun smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bo yo byad phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa du ma 'di dag yod na/_ci re zhig rtsal bya'am/_'on 
[\[2a.6\]]te gar bya'am/_glu blang ngam/_rol mo'i sgra bya'am/_khrus bya/_kha cig gis smras pa/_bdag cag bkrus nas ring zhig lon gyis/_je khrus bya'o zhes de dag glod nas so phag dag gis drud cing drud nas khrus bya bar brtsams pa dang /_bzo'i gnas 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]dang /_las kyi gnas de dag la mkhas pas khrus la zhugs pa de rnams kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba 'di lta ste/_sil snyan yan lag lnga pa skyes bu mkhas pas legs par dkrol ba'i lta bu byung ngo /_/skye bo'i tshogs phal po che lam de nas 'gro bas sgra de thos pa dang /_de 
[\[2b.2\]]rnams rna byo ste/_yud tsam bsdad nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyi skyed mos tshal na gar mkhan rnams gar byed pa ltar 'dong ngam/_de ltar bya'o zhes ltad mo la yid 'dun pa de dag myur bar chas te skyed mos tshal du dong nas de dag nang du 
[\[2b.3\]]zhugs pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyang phyir byung ngo /_/de dag gis de rnams la smras pa/_'phags pa dag phyogs gang na gar mkhan rnams gar bgyid/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_bkren pa khyod kyis bye brag mi phyed de/_gar mkhan gar byed pa la sgra 'di lta bu 
[\[2b.4\]]'byung ngam/_'phags pa dag 'o na 'di su'i sgra lags/_shes ldan dag kho bo cag lus drud nas khrus byas pa yin no/_/'phags pa dag ci dge sbyong khyed 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir tam/_bkren pa khyed kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan la dge sbyong kho bo cag 'dod 
[\[2b.5\]]pa'i yon tan gyis gzir to/_/khyed kho bo cag gi rjes su ston pa yin nam ci/_ma smra bar deng /_khyed la gnod pa byas sa re zhes de rnams kyis de dag bsdigs pa dang /_spa gong nas dong ste/_yangs pa can du zhugs nas lam po che dang /_srang dang /_bzhi mdo 
[\[2b.6\]]dang /_sum mdo dag tu 'phya bar brtsams so/_/dge slong rnams kyis skabs de thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams so phag dag gis lus drud de khrus byed pa 
[\[2b.7\]]las gyur gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis so phag gis lus drud de khrus mi bya'o/_/'drud na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so phag gis lus drud de khrus mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag rkang pa ser ga 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]byung zhing dri ma dang bcas bzhin bsod snyoms la 'jug pa de dag bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed zhabs ser ga byung zhing dri ma dang bcas na/_ci ste dri ma sbyang bar mi bgyi/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_
[\[3a.2\]]bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/ci 'phags pa khyed dri ma'i 'dam bcangs pas dag par 'gyur ram/_de rnams cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/_bsod snyoms la brgyus nas gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang /_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom 
[\[3a.3\]]ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de ltar na snga ma ni bcas pa'o/_/'di ni gnang ba yin te/_de lta bas na dge slong gis rkang pa so phag gis drud par gnang ngo /_/lus gzhan ni ma yin te/_'drud na 'gal 
[\[3a.4\]]tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/_/dge slong rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/_lhung bzed thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /_de rnams 
[\[3a.5\]]kyis bram ze zhig sa dkar gyis sor ris gsum byugs nas slong mo la rgyu zhing de'i bslangs pa yang mang du rnyed par mthong ngo /_/drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/_bdag cag kyang de ltar bya'o zhes de rnams phyi de nyin sa 
[\[3a.6\]]dkar gyis sor ris gsum byugs nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa ma dad pa rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya zhing gus par smra'o/_/gus par smra'o zhes smras pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/_bkren pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang /_phyag 
[\[3a.7\]]bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/_de dag gis smras pa/_'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/_bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/_dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin na/_de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra ba byed 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]kyi phyag ma yin/_'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi dge slong du ni ma lags so/_/de lta lags pas bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis bzod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang /_de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/skabs de dge slong rnams 
[\[3b.2\]]kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams sor ris gsum 'dri ba las gyur gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis sor ris gsum bri bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong sor 
[\[3b.3\]]ris gsum 'dri na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sor ris gsum mi byug go zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag sman pas bsgo yang lus sas mi skud pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/
[\[3b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de ltar na snga ma ni bcas pa'o/_/'di ni gnang ba yin te/_de lta bas na sman pas bsgo ba ni ma gtogs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun 
[\[3b.5\]]dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/_lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/_de rnams kyis bram ze gi'u wang gi thig le byas pa zhig skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis bskor zhing ston mo'i 
[\[3b.6\]]bsngags pa brjod pa mthong ba dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/_bdag cag kyang 'di ltar bya'o/_/legs kyis de ltar bya'o zhes de rnams phyi de nyin gi'u wang gi thig le dag gis bdag nyid brgyan pa byas nas bsod 
[\[3b.7\]]snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas 'phya zhing gus par smra'o gus par smra'o zhes smras pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/_bkren pa khyod kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang /_phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]mi shes sam/_de dag gis smras pa/_'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/_bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/_dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin na/_de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra ba byed kyi phyag ma yin/_
[\[4a.2\]]'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi dge slong du ni ma lags so/_/de'i slad du bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis/_bzod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang /_de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[4a.3\]]la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong dag gi'u wang gi thig le dag gis bdag nyid brgyan pa las gyur gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis gi'u wang gi thig le dag gis brgyan par mi bya'o/_/brgyan 
[\[4a.4\]]na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gi'u wang gi thig le dag gis bdag nyid brgyan par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong zhig 'phral bar rma byung ba de sman pa'i drung du song nas bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag la sman ston cig_/
[\[4a.5\]]'phags pa rma'i than kor gi'u wang gis skus shig dang khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[4a.6\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong dag sman pas bsgo ba ni ma gtogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so phag gis lus drud par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams nya phyis kyis 'drud 
[\[4a.7\]]par byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nya phyis kyis drud par mi bya'o/_/'drud na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde rnams 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]dris byugs te gzhon nu rnams kyi nang du dong nas smras pa/_gzhon nu dag nged kyi dri ji lta snoms shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_gnas brtan ci khyed dris byugs sam/_byugs so/_/gnas brtan khyed dris byug tu rung ngam/_rung yang rung mi rung yang rung ste/_nged 
[\[4b.2\]]kyis ni byugs so/_/de dag 'phya smod kha zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dris nyug pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis dris byug par 
[\[4b.3\]]mi bya'o/_/nyug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dris byug par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong nad pa zhig sman pa'i drung du song ste/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag la sman ston cig_/des smras pa/_'phags 
[\[4b.4\]]pa dris byugs na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci kho bo 'dod pa spyod dam/_'phags pa khyod kyi sman ni 'di yin te/_gzhan gyis ni 'tsho bar mi nus so/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[4b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis sman pa'i lung gis dri bcang bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag dris byugs nas dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dug cing bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos ston par byed/_bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su 
[\[4b.6\]]yang 'gro bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas dge slong dri 'chang ba'i kun du spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong dri 'chang bas dris byugs nas dge 'dun gyi nang du 
[\[4b.7\]]'dug par mi bya/_bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par mi bya/_bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su 'gro bar mi bya'i/_nam sos par gyur pa de'i tshe khrus byas nas dri med par gyur pa dang dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dug par 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]bya/_bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par bya/_bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya'o/_/dge slong dri 'chang bas kun du spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te mi 'dug na 
[\[5a.2\]]'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la dri 'bul ba na/_dge slong rnams 'gyod nas mi len pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bar ma gyur 
[\[5a.3\]]pa de'i tshe ni mu stegs can rnams yon gnas lags/_da ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bas da ltar khyed yon gnas lags na/_gal te khyed kyis ma bzhes na ci bdag cag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du dge ba'i lam rgyags ma mchis par mchi'am/_
[\[5a.4\]]bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blang bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[5a.5\]]blangs nas de dag nyid kyi mdun du bor ba dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag cag gis rin thang bzhin du nyo nyo na khyed kyis blangs te dor ram/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[5a.6\]]blangs nas dor bar mi bya'i/_'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la dri'i lag ris byug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis blangs nas dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dag la dri'i lag ris nyug go/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa 
[\[5a.7\]]dag ci bdag cag gis mchod rten ma mthong ngam/_bdag cag gis ni khyed kho na la phul te/_dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dag la ni sngar phul lags so/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]blangs nas gnas khang la byug par bya'o/_/de rnams kyis gnas khang gi sgo la byugs pa dang /_de dag dri gtsang khang yin no snyam nas phyag 'tshal bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[5b.2\]]pa/_nang du byug par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis drang thad du byugs pa dang /_nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sngas dang nye ba 'am rkang pa dang nye bar byug par bya zhing dri zhim po thams cad mig la phan pas dus dus su bsnam 
[\[5b.3\]]par bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs 'jigs lta'i tshal [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so/_/ji tsam na rgyal bu gzhon nu rtogs byed kyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pad ma ris byed du bcug nas bcom 
[\[5b.4\]]ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod la spyan drangs te/_bcom ldan 'das khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pad ma'i ris su dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/nye dga' bo zan za ba'i tshe lag pas ka ba la bsnun pa dang /_
[\[5b.5\]]khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pad ma ris g.yos par gyur to/_/'dri mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa rgyal bu rtogs byed kyis khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pad ma ris tshon brgya rtsa gcig gis bkra bar byas pa khyed kyis gzhig gam ci/_nye dga' bos smras pa/_bkren pa rtogs 
[\[5b.6\]]byed 'di la lhag par chags pas dus byas nas gar skye gtol med do/_/khyed kyang 'di la lhag par chags pas dus byas nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lba ba can rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag kha zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[5b.7\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag ka ba la lag pas bsnun pa las gyur gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis lag pas ka ba la bsnun par mi bya'o/_/bsnun na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]'das kyis dge slong gis ka ba la lag pas bsnun par mi bya zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams khu tshur dang gru mo dang /_phrag pa dang /_mgo dang /_rtsib logs dang /_rgyab dang /_rked pa dang /_brla dang /_pus mo dang /_byin pa dang /_
[\[6a.2\]]rkang pa dang /_dbyug pa dang /_bong ba dang /_gzhan gyis snun par byed pas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gis kyang bsnun par mi bya'o/_/drug sde rnams rtsig pa dang sa dang /_gzhan la snun par byed pa dang /_
[\[6a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhan la yang gang gis kyang bsnun par mi bya'o/_/bsnun na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/
[\[6a.4\]]drug sde rnams snga dro mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /_de rnams kyis bram ze zhig tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs te slong mo la rgyu zhing des bza' ba dang bca' ba yang mang du rnyed pa mthong nas drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni 
[\[6a.5\]]bzang po zhig ste/_bdag cag kyang de lta bu bya'o zhes de dag phyi de nyin tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs te/_bsod snyoms la zhugs pa ma dad pa rnams kyis mthong nas/_'phya zhing gus par smra'o/_/gus par smra'o zhes smras pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/_bkren 
[\[6a.6\]]pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang /_phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/_de dag gis smras pa/_'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/_bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/_dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin 
[\[6a.7\]]na/_de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra bar byed kyi phyag ma yin/_'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi dge slong du ni ma lags so/_/de lta lags pas bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis bzod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang /_
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs pa las gyur gyis/_de lta bas 
[\[6b.2\]]na dge slong gis tshangs pa'i skud pa gdags par mi bya'o/_/'dogs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde rnams snga dro sham 
[\[6b.3\]]thabs dang chos gos bgos/_lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/_de dag gis bram ze dri dang me tog gis brgyan pa tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcings pa zhig dus ston zos nas dbang po tshim ste/_khyim nas byung ba mthong 
[\[6b.4\]]ba dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/_bdag cag kyang 'di bzhin bya'o zhes de dag phyi de nyin tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcings nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa/_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong 
[\[6b.5\]]nas 'phya zhing gus par smra'o/_/gus par smra'o zhes smras pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/_bkren pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang /_phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/_de dag gis smras pa/_'di la ci zhig 
[\[6b.6\]]'tshal bar bgyi/_bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra bar byed kyi phyag ma yin/_'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi/_
[\[6b.7\]]dge slong du ni ma lags so/_/de lta lags pas bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis bzod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang /_de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa 'ching ba las gyur gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcing bar mi bya'o/_/'ching na 'gal tshabs can du 
[\[7a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcing bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong nad pa gzhan zhig sman pa'i drung du song ste/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo la nad 'di lta bu byung na sman ston cig ces byas pa dang /_des smras 
[\[7a.3\]]pa/_'phags pa skud pa la gsang sngags dag gis bzlas brjod byas te/_lag pa la bcings na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 
[\[7a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis sman pa'i lung gis skud pa bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i lung gis skud pa bcang bar bya'o zhes 
[\[7a.5\]]bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams lag pa g.yas pa'i rtse mo la 'ching ste/_nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag lag pa g.yas pa'i rtse mo la bcing bar mi bya'o/_/de rnams lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung pa 
[\[7a.6\]]la 'ching ste/_nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung pa la bcing bar mi bya'o/_/de rnams lag pa g.yon pa'i rtse mo la 'ching ste/_nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[7a.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_lag pa g.yon pa'i rtse mo la bcing bar mi bya'i/_'on kyang lag pa g.yon pa'i dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams nad sos par gyur nas skud pa bab bab tu 'dor bas mi ma yin pa rnams 'phya ste/_'phags pa dag nged kyis sos 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]par byas na da ma gus par byed pa lta/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bab bab tu dor bar mi bya ste/_gal te nad ma byang na chos gos kyi mtha'a'am/_rgya cang la bcing bar 
[\[7b.2\]]bya'o/_/'on te thams cad kyi thams cad du sos par gyur na ka ba'i ser ga'am/_rtsig pa'i gseb tu gzhug par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug 
[\[7b.3\]]sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/_lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis rgyan slo ma'i nang du bzhag pa drug sde rnams kyis rkang rgyan dang lag rgyan dag thogs nas smras pa/_dga' 
[\[7b.4\]]bo nye dga' bo ji lta mdzes sam/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa khyed mgo ni byi/_mchan khung ni spun na 'di la lus mdzes pa ci zhig yod gdon mi za bar dge sbyong khyed 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gzir bar gyur to zhes byas pa dang /_de 
[\[7b.5\]]rnams cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams lag rgyan dang rkang rgyan dag gis bdag nyid brgyan pa las gyur gyis/_
[\[7b.6\]]de lta bas na dge slong gis lag rgyan dang rkang rgyan gyis bdag nyid brgyan par mi bya'o/_/brgyan na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gtsug 
[\[7b.7\]]lag khang du ma byin par len pa rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi mdzod dang /_gang zag gi gnas khang dag nas brkus so/_/dge slong gzhan dag gcig gi yang stor na/_bdag cag gi stor nas ji tsam lon pa ma tshor ro/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis rgya bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang shel las byas 
[\[8a.2\]]pa dang /_sor gdub rgya rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag bcangs so/_/de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas lag pa brgyang ste smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nad med cig nad med cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa 'di ci lags/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[8a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya gnang ngo de dag 'phya smod kha zer zhing dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams kyis dge sbyong gi tshul nyams shing tshangs pa'i tshul nyams te/_'di na da ltar rgya la tha snyad 'dogs shing rgyan rnams kyis bdag nyid brgyan par byed do/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos 
[\[8a.4\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel las byas pa'i rgya bcang bar mi bya/_sor gdub rgya yang bcang bar mi bya'i 'on kyang rgya lnga po ra gan dang /_zangs 
[\[8a.5\]]las byas pa dang /_khar ba las byas pa dang /_ba so las byas pa dang /_rwa las byas pa bcang bar bya'o/_/drug sde rnams kyis rgya la skyes pa dang /_bud med nyal po byed pa bris pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa ci dge sbyong khyod 
[\[8a.6\]]'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gzir tam/_gnas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgya ni gnyis te/_dge 'dun gyi dang gang zag gi'o/_/de la dge 'dun gyi ni dbus su 'khor lo bris la/_
[\[8a.7\]]glo gnyis su [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'og tu gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i ming bri bar bya'o/_/gang zag gi ni rus pa'i keng rus sam/_mgo'i thod pa bri bar bya'o//_//sdom ni/_sen mo 'breg dang byi dor dang /_/a mra dang ni skyu ru ra/_/lhung bzed brgyad po bkag pa dang /_/
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]rjes su gnang ba gnyis yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[8b.2\]]phul ba de'i tshe/_des 'breg mkhan gyi mi la smras pa/_kye skyes bu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song la 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spu bregs shig_/de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_drug sde rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis rgyal 
[\[8b.3\]]bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stong pa yin te/_tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na 'chag cing 'dug pa des de rgyang ring po nas mthong nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_/khyod zla ba lta bur gnas na ring mo zhig lon 
[\[8b.4\]]te/_gang nas 'ongs/_des smras pa/_'phags pa khyim bdag gis 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spu breg pa'i slad du 'dir btang ngo /_/des smras pa/_sen mo legs par 'breg shes sam/_'phags pa 'di nyid bdag gi bzo lags so/_/bltas tshur de 
[\[8b.5\]]nye bar 'ongs pa dang /_nye dga' bos lag pa brkyang ngo /_/'breg mkhan gyis smras pa/_'phags pa ci 'dra bar breg_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'bru'i rtse mo ltar bregs shig_/des 'bru'i rtse mo ltar bregs pa dang /_des smras pa/_da ni ra ba'i cog lta bu dang /_spu gri'i so 
[\[8b.6\]]dang /_ste'u ka dang /_zla ba tshes pa ltar gyis shig_/des de ji lta/_ji ltar sgo ba de lta bur byas pa dang /_mjug tu smras pa/_bkren pa khyod ko cung zad kyang mi shes pa zhig_/'di kho na ltar mnyam par gyis la song shig ces des de nyi ma nub kyi bar du ma btang ngo /_/de nyi 
[\[8b.7\]]ma nub nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du song ba dang /_mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/_kye skyes bu khyod kyis 'phags pa mang po ji snyed cig gi mgo dang kha spu bregs/_bdag gis 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spu ga la bregs/_dge sbyong gzu lums can 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]nye dga' bos bdag bsgor nas/_sen mo 'bru'i rtse mo dang /_ra ba'i cog dang /_spu gri'i so dang /_ste'u ka dang /_zla ba tshes pa lta bur gyis shig ces pa'i rnam pa thams cad bdag gis bgyis pa dang /_de nas 'di skad ces/_bkren pa khyod ko cung zad 
[\[9a.2\]]kyang mi shes pa zhig_/'di kho na ltar mnyam par gyis la song shig ces mchi nas da gzod kho na shor na ci zhig bgyi/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba rnams la nye bar zhi ba med pa lta zhes 'phya ba la zhugs so/_/skabs 
[\[9a.3\]]de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams sen mo 'breg pa las gyur gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis sen mo breg par mi bya'o/_/'breg na 'gal tshabs 
[\[9a.4\]]can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sen mo breg par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams sen mo ring po ring por 'dug pa bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gis mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa dag ci ste sen mo ring po ring por 'jog_/bzhin 
[\[9a.5\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/'phags pa ci khyod sen mo bcangs pas 'dag par 'gyur ram/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_snga ma ni bcas pa'o/_/'di ni gnang 
[\[9a.6\]]ba yin te de lta bas na gnang gis sen mo rnam pa gnyis po spu gri'i so dang /_ste'u ka lta bur breg par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 
[\[9a.7\]]sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhes bya ba thams cad de kho na bzhin no/_/khyod sen mo 'chos shes sam/_'phags pa ji lta bur bgyi/_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyis shig ces pa'i rnam pa thams cad bdag 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]gis bgyis pa dang /_de nas 'di skad ces bkren pa khyed ko cung zad kyang mi shes pa zhig_/'di kho na ltar mnyam par gyis la song shig ces mchi nas da gzod kho na shor na ci zhig bgyi/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 
[\[9b.2\]]byung ba rnams la nye bar zhi ba med pa lta zhes 'phya ba la zhugs so/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams sen mo dag byi dor byed pa las 
[\[9b.3\]]gyur gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis sen mo dag byi dor mi bya'o/_/byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sen mo dag byi dor mi bya'o/_/zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong tshon rtsi'i las dang /_lhung bzed kyi las byed 
[\[9b.4\]]pa rnams kyi sen mo dri ma chags la mdog mi sdug par gyur cing /_de rnams sen mo de 'dra ba kho nar bsod snyoms la 'jug go/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed ci'i phyir sen mo de lta bur dri ma chags shing mdog mi sdug_/
[\[9b.5\]]de dag gis bsnyad pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa ci'i phyir dri ma mi dbyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/'phags pa khyed ci dri ma'i 'dam bcangs pas 'dag par 'gyur ram/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[9b.6\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dri ma dbyi ba'i phyir sen mo bzhar bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i kun du spyod pa ni dus kyi 
[\[9b.7\]]gsar thog 'bru sar pa'am 'bras bu sar pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag dang por dge 'dun la 'bul lo/_/de'i 'og tu bdag nyid za'o/_/de'i blon po rnams kyis a mra'i shing thog dag phul ba dang /_des smras pa/_song la 'phags pa rnams la phul cig_/de 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]dag gis bgad pa dang /_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci la dgod/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha ci khyod da ni 'phags pa rnams la dang por 'bul snyam dgongs kyi/_bdag cag gis ches sngar 'phags pa rnams la phul bar ni ma lags sam/_
[\[10a.2\]]des smras pa/_gal te de lta na ngas 'phags pa rnams la stong gi kun dga' ra ba nyid phul lo/_/lha legs te rjes su yi rang ngo /_/des phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir stong gi kun dga' ra ba phul nas der dus ston kyang btsugs so/_/de ji ltar 
[\[10a.3\]]yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dus ston la lta bar 'ongs pa a mra'i shing thog smin pa rnams kyis tshim par gyur pa de ltar shing thog rgyas par gyur to/_/de dge 'dun la phul zhes dge slong rnams kyis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du zos so/_/ji tsam na 
[\[10a.4\]]mtshams kyi rgyal po zhig la a mra dag dgos par gyur nas/_des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la pho nya btang ste/_grogs po bdag la a mra dag dgos kyis bskur ba'i rigs so zhes byas pa dang /_des pho nya de la smras pa/_kye skyes bu ngas stong gi kun dga' ra ba de 
[\[10a.5\]]'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phul gyis song la 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams la slongs shig_/de 'od ma'i tshal du song ba dang /_drug sde rnams kyis kun tu spyod pa ni rtag tu kun dga' ra ba'i sgo mi stong par byed pa yin/_tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo 'od ma'i tshal gyi sgo na 
[\[10a.6\]]'chag cing 'dug go/_/de de'i drung du song nas phyag 'tshal te des smras pa/_rgyal po che ge mo zhig gis a mra'i ched du khyed kyi thad du btang na de'i slad du a mra dag stsal ba'i rigs so/_/des smras pa/_kye skyes bu song la a mra ji tsam dgos pa de tsam long shig_/de song nas 
[\[10a.7\]]a mra'i shing rnams kyi drung du bltas na mi snang ste/_de slar log nas smras pa/_'phags pa ma mchis so/_/nye dga' bos de khrid nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs te/_kun dga'i ra ba thams cad bskor nas smras pa/_kye skyes bu shing 'di la 'dzegs shig_/des 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]'dzegs nas ma mthong ba dang /_nye dga' bos smras pa/_kye skyes bu dag shar gyi yal gar song lho dang nub kyi yal gar song /_de thams cad du song nas skyo bar gyur te babs nas smras pa/_'phags pa ci kun dga'i ra ba 'di lo 'di la 'bras bu ma chags sam/_bzhin 
[\[10b.2\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ji ltar lo re zhing lo re zhing shing thog yod pa de ltar 'di 'bras bu chags so/_/'phags pa ci rlung dang char pas blags sam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rlung dang char pas ma blags kyi/_'on kyang kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so/_/de slar 
[\[10b.3\]]log nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol pa/_lha 'phags pa rnams kyi zhal nas kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so zhes gsung ngo /_/des smras pa/_legs te nga la longs spyad pa nyid dgos so zhes byas pa dang /_mi de slar song 
[\[10b.4\]]ngo /_/ji tsam na dus ston la bab pa'i tshe yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dus nas/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag ci stong gi kun dga' ra ba 'di lo 'di la 'bras bu ma chags sam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag ji ltar lo re lo re zhing shing thog yod pa 
[\[10b.5\]]de ltar 'di 'bras bu chags mod kyi/_'on kyang kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so/_/'phags pa dag gang yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad a mra smin pa dag gis tshim par 'gyur ba de khyed kyis 'bras bu ma smin pa kho nar 'chos 
[\[10b.6\]]te/_gang kho bo cag la gnod pa byas pa ni ma legs pa zhig byas so/_/des smras pa/_'di rgyal pos yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la byin pa ma yin gyi/_'on kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul te/_de lta bas na kho bo cag gis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 
[\[10b.7\]]zos so/_/khyed ci gtogs zhes byas pa dang /_de dag 'phya smod kha zer bar byed do/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams a mra dag 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]za ba las gyur gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis a mra dag bza' bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong a mra dag za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis a mra dag bza' bar mi bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_bram ze 
[\[11a.2\]]dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la shing sa ha ka ra'i shing tog dag 'bul ba na/_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bar 
[\[11a.3\]]ma gyur pa zhes bya ba nas/_'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro'am/_bzhes shig ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang 
[\[11a.4\]]gis mtshan nyid grub pa yin no zhes byas nas bza' bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/de la mtshan nyid grub pa ni 'di dag yin te/_tshig gu chags pa rnams so/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can gzhan dag cig_/dge slong rnams la a mra'i shing thog smin 
[\[11a.5\]]pa dag 'bul ba na zhes bya ba nas/_de bzhin du 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mchi'am/_bzhes shig ces bya ba'i bar thams cad snga ma bzhin no/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[11a.6\]]de lta bas na gnang gis mtshan nyid bye brag phyed do zhes byas te bza' bar bya'o/_/de la mtshan nyid bye brag phyed pa ni 'di dag yin te/_sha zhugs pa rnams so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba 
[\[11a.7\]]na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na dge slong nad pa zhig sman pa'i drung du song ste/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs na sman ston cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa je mar 'thung la snum par gyis shig dang bkru sman sbyin no/_/des mar 'thungs 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]pa dang /_skom pas gnod par gyur to/_/sman pa 'ongs te dris pa/_'phags pa bde bar 'dug gam/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag skom pas gnod do/_/skyu ru ra chongs shig ces byas pa dang /_des lag tu blangs te 'dug go/_/yang sman pas dris 
[\[11b.2\]]pa/_'phags pa skom pa dang bral lam/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma bral lo/_/sman pas smras pa/_'phags pa de'i tshe skyu ru ra ma bcangs sam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yod de 'di yin no/_/'phags pa khar chongs shing /_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 
[\[11b.3\]]'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/skabs de zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khar bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/des khar bcug nas 'dug go/_/yang sman 
[\[11b.4\]]pa de 'ongs nas dris pa/_'phags pa skom pa dang bral lam/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]da rung ma bral lo/_/sman pas smras pa/_'phags pa de'i tshe skyu ru ra khar ma bcangs sam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcangs te 'dug pa 'di yin no/_/des smras pa/_
[\[11b.5\]]'phags pa mur cig_/gzhan du na skom pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[11b.6\]]la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mur bar bya'o/_/mur mur nas bor gyi ma mid pa dang /_skom pas je gnod par gyur to/_/yang sman pa 'ongs nas dris pa/_'phags pa skom pa dang bral lam/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]shin 
[\[11b.7\]]tu gnod do/_/'phags pa de'i tshe skyu ru ra ma mur ram/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mur nas bor ro/_/'phags pa ci'i phyir ma mid/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ma yin pa'i zas bkag go/_/'phags pa khyod ni nad pa yin la/_khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong dag gnang gis 'bras bu lnga dus su yang rung /_dus ma yin par yang rung /_
[\[12a.2\]]nad pa yang rung /_mi na bas kyang rung bza' bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu lnga dus su yang rung /_dus ma yin par yang rung /_nad pa yang rung /_mi na bas kyang rung ste/_bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge 
[\[12a.3\]]slong rnams kyis 'bras bu lnga gang dag yin pa mi shes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyu ru ra dang /_a ru ra dang /_ba ru ra dang /_pi pi ling dang /_na le sham mo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da 
[\[12a.4\]]ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod chen po zhig gnas pa de gcer bu pa rnams la rab tu dad do/_/des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed 
[\[12a.5\]]dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos mnabs lhung bzed bsnams te rgyal po'i 
[\[12a.6\]]khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs nas rgyal po'i khab na bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i khyim ga la ba de logs su gshegs pa dang /_khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das rgyang ma nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang chung ma khrid nas bcom ldan 
[\[12a.7\]]'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mchis 'brang 'di sems can zhugs par gyur na ci zhig tu btsa' bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing /_rigs 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]gsal bar byed par 'gyur/_lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/_/des bcom ldan 'das la bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung 
[\[12b.2\]]bzed bkang ste phul ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis nad med cig ces gsungs nas bsod snyoms bzhes te gshegs so/_/de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na gcer bu pa zhig 'dug pa des bsams pa/_gang bdag cag la bslang ba'i khyim gcig pu zhig yod pa de yang dge 
[\[12b.3\]]sbyong gau ta mas kha drangs kyis song la dge sbyong gau ta mas ci lung bstan pa blta'o snyam mo/_/de der song ste smras pa/_khyim bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma 'ongs par gyur tam/_byon to/_/des ci zhig lung bstan/_'phags pa bdag gis de la chung ma bstan te/_ci zhig tu 
[\[12b.4\]]btsa' bar 'gyur zhes bgyis pa dang /_de bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing /_rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur/_lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du 
[\[12b.5\]]byed par 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo /_/gcer bu pa de rtsis mkhas pa zhig ste/_rdo rgyus kha dog dkar po blangs nas brtsis pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du lung bstan pa de thams cad de kho na bzhin du mthong nas/_des bsams pa/_gal te rjes su bsngags na 
[\[12b.6\]]ni khyim bdag 'di dge sbyong gau ta ma la je dad par 'ong bas de bas na 'dir cung zad cig ni bsngags par bya/_cung zad cig ni smad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_lag pa kyog bzhin bsgyur ba dang /_khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos smras pa/_'phags pa ci ste lag pa kyog bzhin 
[\[12b.7\]]bsgyur/_des smras pa/_khyim bdag 'di la cung zad cig ni bden/_cung zad cig ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]no/_/'phags pa gang ni bden gang ni [{]brdzun[,]rdzun[}]/_khyim bdag bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni bden no/_/rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]gang yin pa de ni bden na/_gsal ba ni me'i ming yin pas sems can skal ba chung ngu de btsas ma thag kho nar khyim mes tshig par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]te/_khyim bdag 
[\[13a.2\]]khyod kyis mir gyur pa la lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar gyur pa 'ga' yod pa lta mthong ngam/_nga'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo zhes zer ba de bden te/_gang gi tshe 'di bza' ba yang med/_bgo ba yang med pa de'i tshe gdon mi za bar dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thad du rab tu 
[\[13a.3\]]byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]te/_re zhig dge sbyong gau ta ma la yang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i dgra bcom pa nyid med na/_de'i nyan thos la lta smos kyang 
[\[13a.4\]]ci dgos/_khyim bdag shin tu bzang po mi dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/_'phags pa 'di la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_gcer bu pas smras pa/_khyim bdag bdag cag ni rab tu byung ba ste/_bslab pa blangs pa yin pas khyod nyid shes so zhes smras nas song ngo /_/
[\[13a.5\]]shin tu bzang pos bsams pa 'di yang dor ro snyam nas sman ma yin pa sbyin par brtsams pa dang /_sems can de srid pa tha ma pa zhig pas sman ma yin pa de yang de la sman du gyur to/_/des de'i dku g.yon pa mnye bar brtsams pa dang /_mngal na 'dug pa de dku g.yas 
[\[13a.6\]]par song ngo /_/shin tu bzang pos dku g.yas pa mnye bar brtsams pa dang /_de dku g.yon par song ste/_srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can zag pa zad pa ma thob kyi bar du bar ma dor rgyun chad cing dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do/_/khyim 
[\[13a.7\]]bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma de dku mnyes pas ngu bar brtsams pa dang /_khyim tshes dag gis thos nas rings pa rings par song ste dris pa/_shes ldan khyim bdag gi chung ma 'di ci ste ngu /_shin tu bzang pos smras pa/_gdon mi za bar 'di bu btsa' ba'i dus la bab po 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]zhes byas pa dang /_de de dag dong ngo /_/shin tu bzang pos bsams pa/_bdag gis 'di 'dir gsad mi nus kyis/_dgon par bkri'o snyam nas/_des de dgon par khrid nas ci nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar brtsal nas des de sbas te khyim du khyer nas 
[\[13b.2\]]mdza' bo dang /_nye du dang /_phu nu dang /_khyim tshes rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bo'i chung ma shi'o/_/de dag gis ngu bar brtsams nas de dag ngu zhing de gos sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams kyis khyogs brgyan nas bsil ba tshal 
[\[13b.3\]]gyi dur khrod du khyer ro/_/gcer bu pa dag gis thos nas de dag dga' mgu rangs nas gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag bsgreng ste rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi lam po che dang /_srang dang bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dag tu rgyu zhing smras pa/_shes ldan dag nyon cig_/
[\[13b.4\]]dge sbyong gau ta mas khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing /_rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur/_lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du 
[\[13b.5\]]byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de ni shi nas bsil ba tshal gyi dur khrod du khyer ro/_/re zhig shing gang la rtsa ba nyid kyang med pa de la yal ga dang 'dab ma dang /_lo ma 'byung bar lta ga la 'gyur/_skabs 'di lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi mkhyen pa 'am/_
[\[13b.6\]]mi gzigs pa 'am/_mi rig pa 'am/_rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po 'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pu/_gcig tu dpa' ba/_zla med pa gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas 
[\[13b.7\]]dang lhag mthong gis gnas pa/_bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil la legs par gnas pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]nas goms par mdzad pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi snyengs pa/_yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_drug la rtag tu gnas pa/_byang 
[\[14a.2\]]chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' ba/_grags pas phyogs bcur khyab pa/_stong la dbang sgyur ba bas khyad par du 
[\[14a.3\]]'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs shing su ni nyams/_su ni dar/_su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni skobs su chud par gyur/_su ni gnod par gyur/_su ni nyam nga ba dang /_skobs 
[\[14a.4\]]su chud pa dang /_gnod par gyur/_su ni ngan song la gzhol/_su ni ngan song la bab/_su ni ngan song la 'bab/_gang ni ngan song las drangs nas mtho ris dang /_thar pa dang /_'bras bu la dgod/_gang zhig gis dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya/_gang 
[\[14a.5\]]zhig gis bskyed pa ni yongs su smin par bya/_gang zhig smin pa ni grol bar bya zhes ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/yang smras pa/_chu srin gnas kyi rgya mtsho ni/_/dus rlabs 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las 
[\[14a.6\]]mi 'da'o/_/ji ltar ma ni sdug pa'i bu gcig la/_/lta zhing de yi srog kyang srung ba ltar/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdul ba'i skye bo la/_/de bzhin gzigs shing de yi rgyud kyang srung /_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu la gnas pa yi/_/thugs rje'i ba drus ba gshin be'u stor 
[\[14a.7\]]bzhin/_/srid pa bgrod dkar 'khyams par gyur pa yi/_/gdul ba'i sras rnams skyo mi mkhyen par tshol//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po gnyis pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dag byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro/_kha cig ni steng du 'gro ste/_gang dag 'og tu 'gro ba de dag ni dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag 
[\[14b.2\]]dang /_bsdus gzhom dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol ba dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer ba dang /_a cu zer ba dang /_ut+pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar 
[\[14b.3\]]gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song ste/_tsha ba'i dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur nas 'bab/_grang ba'i dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur nas 'bab po/_/des sems can de rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rgyun bcad pa dang /_
[\[14b.4\]]de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_shes ldan dag ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/_'on te gzhan du skyes zhes zer ro/_/de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa gtong ste/_de dag gis sprul pa de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems shing shes ldan dag 
[\[14b.5\]]bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin gyi/_'on kyang sems can 'di sngon ma mthong ba zhig ste/_'di'i mthus bdag cag sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rgyun chad do zhes zer ro/_/de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dang bas dmyal ba 
[\[14b.6\]]myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas gang du sems can rnams snod du gyur pa lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba 'dzin to/_/gang dag steng du 'gro ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan 
[\[14b.7\]]dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]bsod nams 'phel dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa zhes bya 
[\[15a.2\]]ba yang sgrogs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang sgrogs te/_brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/_/sangs rgyas bstan la 'bad par bya/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/_/chos 'dul 'di la gang zhig ni/_/bag 
[\[15a.3\]]dang bcas par spyod byed pa/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal gyi ni mthar byed 'gyur/_/de nas 'od zer de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro ste/_de gal 
[\[15a.4\]]te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun du nub par 'gyur ro/_/dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[15a.5\]]dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni long bur nub par 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mor nub par 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal 
[\[15a.6\]]srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon gyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar nub par 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub lung 
[\[15a.7\]]ston par bzhed na ni zhal du nub par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni mdzod spur nub par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du nub po/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_rnam pa sna tshogs tshon ni stong dag 
[\[15b.2\]]gis/_/bkra ba'i tshogs dag zhal gyi nang nas byung /_/nyi ma shar bar gyur pa ji lta bar/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis/_/tshigs su bcad de yang gsol pa/_sangs rgyas rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs/_/rgyal ba dgra thul 'gro mchog rgyur 
[\[15b.3\]]gyur pa/_/rgyu ma mchis par pad ma'i rtsa lag dang /_/dung ltar dkar ba'i 'dzum pa ston mi mdzad/_/de ltas nyid kyi brtan blos dus mkhyen nas/_/rgyal dbang nyan po nyan par 'tshal rnams kyi/_/the tshom skyes pa thub pa skyes mchog gi/_/gsung mchog bzang 
[\[15b.4\]]zhing brtan pas bsal du gsol/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab ltar brtan pa/_/zung thub rnams ni glo bur 'dzum mi ston/_/mgon po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa de/_/skye bo'i tshogs 'di nyan par yang dag 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/
[\[15b.5\]]kun dga' bo de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dur khrod du rgyu zhing 
[\[15b.6\]]gshegs par bzhed kyis khyed las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig dur khrod du rgyu zhing 'gro bar spro ba de chos gos dag so so nas long shig ces bsgo shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_
[\[15b.7\]]dge slong dag gang na ba der song ste phyin nas dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dur khrod du rgyu zhing gshegs par bzhed kyis/_khyed las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig dur khrod du rgyu zhing 'gro bar spro ba de chos gos dag so so nas long shig 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]ces bsgo ba dang /_dge slong thams cad 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba zhi ba 'khor zhi ba grol ba 'khor grol ba/_dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/_rnam par dul ba 'khor 
[\[16a.2\]]rnam par dul ba/_dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/_mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/_khyu mchog ba glang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_glang po che glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_seng ge mche ba 
[\[16a.3\]]can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_bram ze bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_sman pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_dpa' bo dmag mi'i 
[\[16a.4\]]tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_sa mkhan 'gron pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_tshong dpon 'khor gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_khams kyi rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_'khor los sgyur ba bu stong 
[\[16a.5\]]gis bskor ba lta bu/_zla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/_yul 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor 
[\[16a.6\]]ba lta bu/_rnam thos sras gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_thags zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_tshangs pa tshangs ris pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/_rgya mtsho mi 
[\[16a.7\]]g.yo ba lta bu/_sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/_glang po che'i rgyal po dregs pa med pa lta bu/_dbang po shin tu dul bas spyod lam mi nyams par gshegs pa/_sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]byas pa/_sku 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_'od nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/_rin po che'i ri 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang ba/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_nyan 
[\[16b.2\]]thos chen po kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_rta thul dang /_rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_bzang po dang /_shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu dang /_'od srung dang /_grags pa dang /_gang po la sogs pa dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po gzhan dang /_srog chags brgya 
[\[16b.3\]]stong phal mo ches bskor nas bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du gshegs so/_/sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yod de/[ {]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad gang zhe na/_me'i 'jigs pa med/_chu'i 'jigs pa med/_seng ge'i 'jigs pa med/_stag gi 'jigs pa 
[\[16b.4\]]med/_gzig gi 'jigs pa med/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa med/_rkun po'i 'jigs pa med/_la gcan pa'i 'jigs pa med/_gru btsas kyi 'jigs pa med/_sho gam gyi 'jigs pa med/_bsel rngan gyi 'jigs pa med/_mi'i 'jigs 
[\[16b.5\]]pa med/_mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa med/_dus dus su gzugs bzang po dag mthong bar 'gyur/_sgra snyan pa dag thos par 'gyur/_'od chen po dag mthong bar 'gyur/_kun shes pa lung ston pa dag thos par 'gyur/_chos kyi longs spyod dang /_zang zing gi 
[\[16b.6\]]longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas gshegs pa ni gnod pa chung ba yin pas lha dang /_mi brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du phyi bzhin 'brang ngo /_/bsil ba'i tshal logs nas rlung dag kyang langs so/_/rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig 
[\[16b.7\]]dang /_bram ze'i khye'u byis pa gnyis shig rgyal po'i khab nas phyi rol du byung ste rtse zhing 'khod do/_/de gnyis las rgyal rigs kyi khye'u ni dad pa dang ldan pa yin/_bram ze'i khye'u ni de lta ma yin no/_/bram ze'i khye'u des rgyal rigs kyi khye'u la smras pa/_grogs po 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma'i bu khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/_rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar 'gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa 
[\[17a.2\]]nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de ni 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du khyer na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du ma gyur grang /_rgyal rigs kyi khye'u des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_zla ba skar ma'i 
[\[17a.3\]]tshogs bcas sa la lhung yang srid/_/sa 'di ri dang nags bcas mkha' la 'gro yang srid/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni skam par 'gyur srid kyi/_/drang srong chen po [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gsung 'gyur ba srid pa min/_/bram ze'i khye'u des grogs po de ltar na bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod lta 
[\[17a.4\]]zhing 'dong ngo zhes smras nas de gnyis dong ba dang bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/rgyal rigs kyi khye'us bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas yang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_thub pa the tshom bral zhing rgod pa mi mnga' ba/_/ri 
[\[17a.5\]]dgas rgyal po lta bu'i sgra skad mchog sgrogs shing /_/the tshom med par pha rol smra bas mi rdzi ba/_/'di ltar skye bo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing gshegs/_/bsil tshal phyogs su kha ba'i tshogs lta bu'i/_/bsil ba'i ngad can rlung ni langs par gyur pa ni/_/
[\[17a.6\]]shAkya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul brtag pa'i don gyi phyir/_/lha tshogs mang po gnas nas 'ongs pa nyid du nges/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma'i bu khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/_rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing lha dang 
[\[17a.7\]]mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan na de ni 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du phyung zhing /_bcom ldan 'das kyang nyan 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du gshegs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das ni don med par bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du mi gshegs pas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i 
[\[17b.2\]]chung ma la brten te gdul ba'i don chen po zhig mdzad par 'gyur gor ma chag gis ltar 'gro'o snyam nas de btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_pho brang 'khor ba dang /_ljongs kyi mis yongs su bskor nas rgyal po'i khab nas song ba dang /_rgyal rigs kyi khye'u des 
[\[17b.3\]]rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas yang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_ma ga d+hA yi mnga' bdag rgyal po'i gtso bo 'di/_/'di ltar 'khor bcas rgyal po'i khab nas byung ba las/_/skye bo'i tshogs kyi 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par ni/_/
[\[17b.4\]]bdag gi snying la nges pa'i blo dag skyes par gyur/_/skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas gshegs shul phye ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad cing skye bo rnams kyi gung la bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pa gcer bu pa 
[\[17b.5\]]dag gis mthong nas bsams pa/_'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma bzhin 'dzum pa byed cing skye bo mang po'i gung la 'dug pa las na sems can 'di ma shi bar nges so snyam nas/_des khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la smras pa/_khyim bdag sems can skal ba chung ngu 'di ni ma 
[\[17b.6\]]shi'o/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa de ltar gyur na skabs 'di la da ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_des smras pa/_khyim bdag kho bo ni bslab pa'i gzhi yang dag par blangs pa yin gyis/_khyod nyid shes par gyis shig_/des bud shing bcer te chung ma'i ro me'i phung 
[\[17b.7\]]po'i nang du bcug ste bsregs pa dang /_de'i lus thams cad tshig na lto'i nyen kor de bzhin du 'dug go/_/de nas lto'i nyen kor de rdol nas pad ma byung ste/_pad ma de'i snying po las gzhon nu gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa zhig byung ngo /_/de srog 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]chags brgya stong dag gis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar chen po skyes par gyur pa dang gcer bu pa dag gi rgyags pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_khengs pa dag nyams so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la bka' stsal pa/_khyim 
[\[18a.2\]]bdag gzhon nu long shig_/des gcer bu pa'i gdong du bltas pa dang /_des smras pa/_khyim bdag me phung rab tu 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na thams cad kyi thams cad du tshig par mi 'gyur ram/_de skad smras pas des ma blangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[18a.3\]]'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos la bka' stsal pa/_'tsho byed gzhon nu long shig_/des bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas ma yin skabs ma yin par bdag mi bskos kyis blang ngo snyam nas de the tshom med par me phung gi nang du zhugs te blangs so/_/rgyal ba'i 
[\[18a.4\]]bka' yis me yi phung por zhugs gyur te/_/de yis gzhon nu me yi nang nas blangs pa na/_/rgyal ba'i mthu yis me ni zhi ba nyid gyur cing /_/kha ba'i tshogs ltar bsil ba'ang skad cig de la byung /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed gzhon nu la bka' stsal pa/_'tsho 
[\[18a.5\]]byed khyod nyams pa'am/_gnod pa dag tu ma gyur tam/_des gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag rgyal po'i pho brang du btsas zhing rgyal po'i pho brang du skyes par gyur kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zhugs kyi phung po tsan dan sa mchog lta bur bsil bar gyur pa 
[\[18a.6\]]'di lta bu ni sngon chad ma myong lags so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gzhon nu 'di long shig_/de log par blta ba la phyogs pas re zhig len par mi byed cing /_gcer bu pa de nyid kyi gdong du lta bar 
[\[18a.7\]]byed do/_/des smras pa/_khyim bdag mang du smra ci dgos/_mes ni thams cad 'tshig pa yin na/_gzhon nu shin tu skal ba chung ba 'di ma tshig pa las na/_'di khyod kyi khyim du khyer na khyod kyi khyim yang tshig cing khyod kyi srog gi bar chad du yang 'gyur bar nges so/_/des 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]bdag las gces pa med do snyam nas de ma blangs pa dang /_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po gzhon nu long shig_/des gus par bsgrims pa dang bcas pas lag pa brkyang ste/_de 
[\[18b.2\]]blangs nas kun du brtags te gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khye'u 'di 'di ltar me'i nang nas skyes pas de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming me skyes zhes bya bar gdags so/_/de nas 
[\[18b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de dag gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas ci nas kyang sems can brgya phrag mang po de dag gis thos nas khyad par rnyed par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos bstan pa mdzad pas kha 
[\[18b.4\]]cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/_kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas 
[\[18b.5\]]par gyur to/_/kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_kha cig gis ni rtse mo dang /_kha cig gis ni bzod pa chung ngu dang 'bring bskyed par gyur to/_/kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig 
[\[18b.6\]]gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed par gyur to/_/kha cig gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag yang dag par blangs te 'khor de dag las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /_chos la 'bab pa dang /_dge 
[\[18b.7\]]'dun la bab par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos khye'u me skyes ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do/_/de ma ma 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi snying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed skyed par byed cing /_rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do/_/de'i 
[\[19a.2\]]zhang po zong thogs te yul gzhan du song ba des ji ltar bdag gi sring mo la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/_rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing /_lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas/_nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon 
[\[19a.3\]]mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa thos nas des zong bsgyur te rin blangs nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ba dang /_des 'di ltar bdag gi sring mo de 'chi ba'i dus la bab po zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang 
[\[19a.4\]]bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bu khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/_rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing /_lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/_/zhes 
[\[19a.5\]]lung bstan na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du ma gyur tam snyam nas des khyim tshes dag la dris pa/_bdag gi sring mo la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'ur 'gyur te/_rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing /_lha dang mi'i 
[\[19a.6\]]dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan par thos so/_/thos nas bdag kun tu dga' ba las de yang 'chi ba'i dus la bab po zhes thos 
[\[19a.7\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du ma gyur tam/_de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_zla ba skar ma'i tshogs bcas sa la lhung yang srid/_/sa 'di ri dang nags bcas mkha' la 'gro yang srid/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni skam par 'gyur 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]srid kyi/_/drang srong chen po [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gsung 'gyur ba srid pa min/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du mi 'gyur te 'di ltar khyim thab des de ji lta ji ltar 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byas pas 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas de'i khye'u dbang thang chen po can 
[\[19b.2\]]mer bsregs kyang ma tshig pa mthu bo che zhig da ltar rgyal po'i pho brang na gso zhing 'dug go zhes smras pa dang /_de khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i gan du song ste smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis mi rigs pa zhig byas so/_/ci zhig byas/_gcer bu pas bslus 
[\[19b.3\]]nas khyod kyis nga'i sring mo la sems can zhugs pa ji lta ji ltar 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byas pas 'chi ba'i dus la bab par byas so/_/des khye'u dbang thang can mer bsregs kyang ma tshig pa mthu bo che zhig da ltar rgyal po'i pho brang na gso zhing 'dug pa de la ni 
[\[19b.4\]]re zhig ci byar yang med de/_'di ltar da yang gal te gzhon nu de blangs na de lta na legs/_'on te mi len na ngas khyod gnyen du yang mi brtsi/_rabs yig kyang dor zhing lam po che dang /_srang dang lam gyi sum mdo dang /_bzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim bdag shin 
[\[19b.5\]]tu bzang pos bdag gi sring mo bsad de/_chung ma gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing rgyal po'i gnod pa yang byed du gzhug go zhes smras pa dang /_des de thos nas skrag ste/_de skad smras pa dang sbyar na bdag la de ltar byed 
[\[19b.6\]]par nges so snyam nas/_de rgyal po'i gan du song ste rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/_lha bdag gi nye du po'i mchid nas da yang gal te gzhon nu de blangs na de lta na legs/_'on te mi len na ngas khyod gnyen du yang mi brtsi/_rabs yig kyang dor zhing /_
[\[19b.7\]]lam po che dang /_srang dang lam gyi sum mdo dang /_bzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos bdag gi sring mo bsad de chung ma gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing rgyal po'i gnod pa yang byed du gzhug go zhes mchi bas/_
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]de'i slad du lhas gzhon nu me skyes bdag la stsal ba'i rigs so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyim bdag gzhon nu me skyes ngas khyod la blangs pa ma yin gyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis nga la gtad pa yin pas khyod la gal te gzhon nu dgos na gzhon nu'i ched du 
[\[20a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la sngar zhus shig_/de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi nye du po'i mchid nas da yang gal te gzhon nu de blangs na de lta na legs/_'on te mi len na ngas khyod 
[\[20a.3\]]gnyen du yang mi brtsi/_rabs yig kyang dor zhing /_lam po che dang /_srang dang /_lam gyi sum mdo dang /_bzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos bdag gi sring mo bsad de/_chung ma gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing /_
[\[20a.4\]]rgyal po'i gnod pa yang byed du gzhug go zhes mchi bas/_de'i slad du gzhon nu me skyes bdag la stsal ba'i rigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gal te khyim bdag shin tu bzang po gzhon nu me skyes ma thob na khrag tsha ba skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas 
[\[20a.5\]]skabs de lta bu yod par gzigs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la rgyal po gzugs can snying po la nga'i bkas a rog gya zhes byos la 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la gzhon nu me skyes byin cig_/gal te khyim 
[\[20a.6\]]bdag shin tu bzang po gzhon nu me skyes ma thob na khrag tsha ba skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro zhes kyang bsgo shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan nas 
[\[20a.7\]]rgyal po gzugs can snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod la rgyal po chen po a rog gya zhes bka' stsal te/_rgyal po chen po khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la gzhon nu me skyes 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]byin cig_/gal te khyim bdag shin tu bzang po gzhon nu me skyes ma thob na khrag tsha ba skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro zhes kyang bka' stsal to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 
[\[20b.2\]]'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin 'tshal lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po chen po a rog gya zhes smras te song ngo /_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyim bdag gzhon nu 'di ngas bskyed de yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa yin pas dam tshig bcas la sbyin par bya ste/_nyi ma re re la yang dus gsum 
[\[20b.3\]]gsum du nga blta ba'i phyir gtong na sbyin par bya'o/_/des smras pa/_lha khyod kyi spyan sngar mi gtang na gzhan su'i thad du gtang bar bgyi/_gtang bar 'tshal lo/_/rgyal pos de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te glang po che la bskyon nas btang ngo /_/'di ltar 'jig rten pa rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni ji skad 
[\[20b.4\]]du pha gson pa de srid du bu'i ming mi sgrogs so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag shin tu bzang po 'chi ba'i dus byas nas gzhon nu me skyes pha'i khyim na gnas par gyur te/_de sangs rgyas la mngon par dad/_chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad/_sangs rgyas la skyabs su song /_chos 
[\[20b.5\]]dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo /_/des khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos phyogs gang du bdag gi ma bsad pa'i phyogs der gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug nas yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par sbyar te phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul nas 'di ltar gnas brtan dag gis kyang mdo sde dag la 
[\[20b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dku mnyed pa'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes nye bar sbyar to/_/khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i mi zho shas 'tsho ba yul gzhan du dong ba dag gis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po ni 'chi ba'i dus la bab po/_/gzhon nu me skyes ni rang gi khyim na gnas te/_de sangs rgyas la 
[\[20b.7\]]mngon par dad/_chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad/_sangs rgyas la skyabs su song /_chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang de dag gis tsan dan sa mchog pa'i lhung bzed cig rin po che dag gis bkang ste khyim bdag me skyes la skyes su bskur ro/_/
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]des kyang de shing ring po'i rtse mo la btags te bzhag nas/_'di skad ces 'di sus kyang skas dang /_ya gad dang /_kyo ba tang dag gis blang bar mi bya'i/_'di ltar dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang dag rdzu 'phrul che ba'am/_mthu che ba/_de dag las 'ga' zhig gis len na des 
[\[21a.2\]]ni 'di ci bder khyer la rag go zhes dril bsgrags pa yang byas so/_/gzhan mu stegs can rnams nang par sngar langs nas chu ngogs dag tu nye reg byed du 'dong ba de dag gis mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang khyim bdag me skyes la smras pa/_khyim bdag 'di ci yin/_des de dag la rgyas par bsnyad 
[\[21a.3\]]pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_/khyim bdag khyod shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams la mngon par dad pas de dag nyid len par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas dong ngo /_/ji tsam na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de dag gis de mthong nas de dag gis 
[\[21a.4\]]kyang khyim bdag me skyes la smras pa/_khyim bdag 'di ci yin/_des de dag la de kho na bzhin du rgyas par bsnyad pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis yon tan ni bcab par bya/_skyon ni bsgrag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/_ji lhung 
[\[21a.5\]]bzed tsam gyi ched du bdag nyid bstan par bya'am zhes smras nas dong ngo /_/ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu pa de phyogs der 'ongs te/_khyim bdag la smras pa/_khyim bdag 'di ci yin/_des ji lta bu yin pa smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu pas bsams pa/_
[\[21a.6\]]bdag gis thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rnams spangs shing bor la bsal cing sbyang ba byas na khyim bdag gis bdag mu stegs can dang rdzu 'phrul 'gran par chad kyis de'i phyir 'di'i yid mgu bar bya'o snyam nas/_des lag pa glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyang ste lhung bzed 
[\[21a.7\]]de blangs nas des de khyer te gtsug lag khang du song ngo /_/de la dge slong dag gis smras pa/_gnas brtan khyod kyi tsan dan sa mchog pa'i lhung bzed 'di ga las mchis/_des ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang /_dge slong dag gis smras pa/_gnas brtan khyod lhung bzed tsam gyi ched du khyim pa'i mdun 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]du rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan du rung ngam/_de tshe dang ldan pa dag rung yang bla mi rung yang bla ste byas zin pas da ci byar yang med do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis khyim pa'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul 
[\[21b.2\]]rnam par bstan par mi bya'o/_/rnam par ston na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang lhung bzed rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang /_dngul las byas pa dang /_bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang /_shel las byas pa dang /_gzhan yang lhung bzed rnam pa bzhi po ra gan dang /_
[\[21b.3\]]zangs dang /_khar ba dang /_shing las byas pa dag las 'di ltar lhung bzed snga ma bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni ma blangs pa yang blang bar mi bya la/_blangs pa yang gtang bar bya'o/_/lhung bzed phyi ma bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni ma blangs pa ni blang bar mi bya zhing blangs pa na sman phor du longs 
[\[21b.4\]]spyad pas spyad par bya ba yin no/_/'di ltar lcags dang /_sa'i lhung bzed gnyis ni byin gyis brlab tu rung ba dag yin no/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag me skyes lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas/_rgyal po'i khab dang tsam pa dag gi bar na sho gam gyi gnas shig yod pa de'i 
[\[21b.5\]]sho gam pa 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas de gnod sbyin gdug pa zhig tu skyes pa dang /_des bu'i rmi lam du 'di skad ces bu khyod kyis gnas 'dir gnod sbyin gyi rten 'dzugs su chug la der dril yang gyis la thogs shig dang /_gang gi tshe der su dag zong las sho gam mi 'jal bar 'gro bar byed pa 
[\[21b.6\]]de'i tshe dril de sgra 'byin par byed cing /_de dag phyir ldog pa las sho gam chod par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to/_/des gnyen bshes dang /_nye du dang /_rtsa lag dag la rmi lam de bzlas nas nyi ma dang /_tshes grangs dang /_yud tsam dang /_gza' dang /_rgyu skar dang /_dus shis pa 
[\[21b.7\]]la bab pa'i tshe gnas der gnod sbyin gyi rten 'dzugs su bcug nas der dril yang byas te btags so/_/grong khyer tsam pa na bram ze zhig gis rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs pa dang /_bram ze mo des bsams pa/_bdag bram zes thabs de dang de dag gis bsgrubs pa'i nor dag spyod 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]cing las ci yang mi byed par 'dug pa ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas/_de tshong dus su song ste ras bal nyos nas sel gyis zhag par byas shing bkal te tha ga pa mkhas pa la kAr ShA pa Na stong ri ba'i ras zung gcig 'thag tu bcug go/_/de nas des 
[\[22a.2\]]bram ze la smras pa/_ras zung 'di kAr ShA pa Na stong ri ba lags kyis/_tshong dus su bzhud la gang dag kAr ShA pa Na stong gis 'jal ba la ni stsol cig_/gal te des mi 'jal na tshong 'dus ma yin no zhes bsgrags nas gzhan du bzhud par mdzod cig_/des de khyer te tshong 'dus su song 
[\[22a.3\]]ba na kAr ShA pa Na stong gis nyo ba su yang med nas/_des tshong 'dus ma yin no zhes bsgrags te/_ras zung de gdugs kyi rtsa ba'i nang du bcug ste 'gron pa dag dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo /_/ji tsam na rim gyis sho gam gyi gnas su phyin pa dang /_sho gam pas 'gron pa de dag la sho gam 
[\[22a.4\]]bcad pa na de dag gis sho gam phul nas dong ngo /_/de na dril sgra 'byin par byed nas sho gam pa dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag dril 'di ltar sgra 'byin pa las na 'gron pa dag gis sho gam legs par ma phul gor ma chag gis/_yang sho gam gcad do zhes de dag gis 'gron pa dag yang phyir 
[\[22a.5\]]bkug ste btsal na sho gam ma phul ba 'ga' yang med do/_/de dag dong ba dang yang dril sgra 'byin pa nyid du byed nas/_de dag gis 'gron pa dag yang phyir bkug ste btsal na sho gam ma phul ba 'ga' yang med par gyur nas/_'gron pa dag deng la khyed cag chom po byed par sems sam/_ci na yang dang 
[\[22a.6\]]yang du phyir 'gugs par byed ces smod par byed do/_/de dag gis 'gron pa de dag tshoms gnyis su byas te bkye ba dang /_tshoms gang gi nang na bram ze de med pa dag ni de bzhin dong ngo /_/tshoms cig shos 'dong ba na dril de de bzhin du sgra 'byin par byed nas de dag gis de dag kyang de bzhin du tshoms gnyis 
[\[22a.7\]]su byas shing byas shing bkye ba dang /_tha mar bram ze de gcig pu nyi tshe lus par gyur nas de de dag gis bzung ngo /_/des bdag la cung zad kyang med kyis tshol cig ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis btsal na ci yang med nas btang ba na yang dril de sgra 'byin pa nyid du byed do/_/de dag gis bram ze de yang phyir 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]bkug nas smras pa/_kye bram ze lha'i byin gyi rlabs ni de ltar gyur na khyod bden par smros shig dang /_kho bo cag khyod la sho gam mi len to/_/des smras pa/_bden pa mi len tam/_de dag gis smras pa/_mi len to/_/des gdugs kyi rtsa ba'i nang nas ras zung de phyung ste bstan to/_/de dag kye ma
