[\[22b.2\]]lha'i byin gyi rlabs ni 'di 'dra'o zhes ngo mtshar chen po skyes par gyur nas/_de dag gis de'i ras ya gcig phye ste lha la bstan to/_/bram zes smras pa/_kye khyed cag na re sho gam mi len to zhes zer na da thams cad 'phrog gam/_de dag gis smras pa/_bram ze nged cag len par mi byed de/_lha'i byin 
[\[22b.3\]]gyi rlabs de lta bu mdzad pas nged kyis lha la bstan par zad kyis long la song shig_/des de blangs nas yang gdugs kyi rtsa ba'i nang du bcug ste song nas khad kyi rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to/_/des tshong 'dus su ras zung de bkram pa na der yang de kAr ShA pa Na stong gis nyo ba su yang med nas des rgyal po'i 
[\[22b.4\]]khab kyi tshong 'dus kyang tshong 'dus ma yin no zhes bsgrags so/_/de na gzhon nu me skyes glang po che la zhon te rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyir byung ste/_tshong 'dus kyi nang nas rang gi khyim du 'gro bas de thos pa dang /_des shes ldan dag bram ze de ci'i phyir tshong 'dus ma yin no zhes sgrogs par byed pa dri bar 
[\[22b.5\]]byas bos shig_/de dag gis bos nas me skyes kyis smras pa/_bram ze khyod ci'i phyir tshong 'dus 'di tshong 'dus ma yin no zhes sgrogs par byed/_des smras pa/_khyim bdag ras zung 'di lta bu kAr ShA pa Na stong gis nyo ba su yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/des smras pa/_bltas khyer te shog_/
[\[22b.6\]]des de nye bar bstan to/_/me skyes kyis smras pa/_bram ze de tsam ni ri mod kyi 'on kyang ras gcig ni spyad zin pa zhig_/gcig ni ma spyad pa zhig pas ma spyad pa gang yin pa 'di ni kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya ri/_gang spyad pa 'di ni nyis brgya lnga bcu ri'o/_/bram zes smras pa/_ci 'di de lta bur 'gyur 
[\[22b.7\]]ram/_me skyes kyis smras pa/_bram ze khyod kyi mngon sum du bstan gyis ltos shig ces des ma spyad pa de steng gi nam mkha' la bor ba dang /_de brkyang zhing 'dug go/_/spyad pa bor ba na de ma thag tu phyir lhung ngo /_/bram ze ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba zhig go/_/
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]me skyes kyis yang ltos shig ces smras nas/_des ma spyad pa gang yin pa de tsher ma'i steng du bor na ma thogs par song ngo /_/cig shos de bor na tsher ma la thogs nas bram ze de ngo mtshar chen po des mngon par dad par gyur nas smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba 
[\[23a.2\]]zhig pas khyod rin ji tsam gyis bzhed pa de tsam gyis snoms shig_/des smras pa/_bram ze khyod 'gron yin gyis khyod nyid la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir kAr ShA pa Na stong nyid sbyin par bya'o/_/zhes des de la kAr ShA pa Na stong byin pa dang /_bram zes de blangs nas song ngo /_/me skyes kyis de dag las 
[\[23a.3\]]gang spyad pa ni khye'u zhig la byin/_ma spyad pa ni khrus ras su byas so/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gzugs can snying po steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]thog na blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing 'dug pa'i tshe me skyes kyi khrus ras khang pa'i steng du skam du bcug pa rlung gis nam mkha' la 
[\[23a.4\]]khyer nas/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i steng du lhung ba dang rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po la 'os pa'i gos 'di lta bu ga las 'ongs/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha rgyal po nga las nu byung ba'i tshe ni dgung bdun du rin po che'i char bab po zhes thos na lha la yang na bza'i char bab 
[\[23a.5\]]pa las na ring po mi thogs par rin po che'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag me skyes lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes lung bstan la/_'di yang lha'i gos nam mkha' las 'ongs pa zhig na de 'ongs dang sbyin par 
[\[23a.6\]]byas zhog shig ces bsgo'o/_/de dag de skad smra ba'i tshe nyid na me skyes 'ongs pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan la/_nga la yang lha'i gos nam mkha' las lhung ba 'di lta bu yod kyis de khyod khyer 
[\[23a.7\]]cig_/des lag pa brkyang ste smras pa/_lha g.yar snga brim gyis tshur stsal zhes brtags na ji tsam na bdag gi khrus ras yin par mthong nas cung zad bgad de smras pa/_lha 'di bdag gi khrus ras bser mas 'tshal nas 'dir mchis pa lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gzhon 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]nu da khyod kyis lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur tam/_lha myong bar gyur to/_/gzhon nu gal te de lta na ci'i phyir nga spyan 'dren par mi byed/_lha spyan 'dren to/_/song la yo lang gi zhal ta dag shoms shig_/lha gang gis lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur pa la zhal ta bgyi 
[\[23b.2\]]ci 'tshal mod kyi/_'on kyang bdag zhal ta bgyid du mchi'o/_/rgyal po me skyes kyi khyim du song nas bud med kyi 'khor phyi pa dag mthong ba dang dbang po dag phyir glon par byed do/_/me skyes kyis smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du dbang po dag slar glon par mdzad/_des smras pa/_gzhon 
[\[23b.3\]]nu mna' ma yin pas de ltar byas so/_/lha snam zungs ma lags te/_'di ltar bud med kyi 'khor phyi pa dag lags so/_/de ngo mtshar chen po skyes nas yang bud med kyi 'khor bar ma dag mthong ba dang /_dbang po dag phyir ldon par byed do/_/me skyes kyis de bzhin du dris pa 
[\[23b.4\]]dang rgyal pos kyang de bzhin smras so/_/me skyes kyis smras pa/_lha 'di dag kyang snam zungs ni ma lags te/_'di ltar bud med kyi 'khor bar ma dag lags so/_/de ngo mtshar chen po lhag par skyes so/_/rgyal pos de'i bar sgo'i phyogs rin po che'i rang bzhin las gyur 
[\[23b.5\]]pa rdzing chus gang ba lta bu de na nya dag rgyu ba 'dra ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ba byas pa dag mthong ste/_nang du 'gro bar 'dod nas lham dag 'bud par brtsams pa dang /_me skyes kyis smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du chags dag bsil bar mdzad/_des smras pa/_gzhon nu 
[\[23b.6\]]chu la 'bog par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/me skyes kyis smras pa/_lha 'di chab ma lags te/_chab lta bur gda' ba ni rin po che'i sa gzhi lags so/_/des smras pa/_gzhon nu nya rgyu ba dag 'di ltar snang ngo /_/lha 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ba las de dag rgyu bar gda'o/_/
[\[23b.7\]]rgyal po yid ma ches pa dang /_des sor gdub rgya 'phangs pa na sgra k+r+wa la la zer te rin po che'i sa gzhi'i steng du 'jol bar gyur nas/_de ngo mtshar skyes te nang du song nas seng ge'i khri la 'dug go/_/mna' ma dag rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du lhags pa de dag mchi ma byung nas rgyal pos 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]smras pa/_gzhon nu ci'i phyir mna' ma 'di dag ngu /_des smras pa/_lha 'di dag ngu ba ma lags te/_'di ltar lha'i na bza' la shing gi dud pa'i dri gda' bas des 'di dag mchi ma byung bar gyur to/_/rgyal po lha dang mi'i dpal de dag la nye bar spyod cing phyir mi ldog pa na/_rgyal 
[\[24a.2\]]po'i bya ba dang rgyal po'i byed pa dag yongs su nyams par gyur nas gzhon nu ma skyes dgra la blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_gzhon nu lha ni me skyes kyi khyim du gshegs nas bag ma mchis par gyur gyis bzhud la sbron cig_/de song nas smras pa/_lha khyod 'dir gshegs te bzhugs par mdzad 
[\[24a.3\]]dam ci/_blon po rnams kyi mchid nas rgyal po'i bya ba dang byed pa dag yongs su nyams par gyur to zhes mchi'o/_/des smras pa/_gzhon nu ci khyod kyis zhag gcig tsam rgyal srid byed du 'jug kyang mi nus sam/_des smras pa/_lha bdag gis ni lhas dgung bdun lags par 'tshal na/_lhas 
[\[24a.4\]]ni dgung gcig lags par mkhyen pa lta/_rgyal pos me skyes kyi gdong du brtags te smras pa/_gzhon nu bden nam/_lha mad de dgung bdun kho na lags so/_/'o na nyin mtshan ji ltar shes/_lha me tog dag kha 'bye zhing 'dzums pa dang /_nor bu dag gi 'od 'bar ram mi 'bar ba dang /_
[\[24a.5\]]bya dag skad 'byin tam mi 'byin pa'i tshul las gda'o/_/me tog gang dgung la kha 'bye zhing gdugs la zhum par 'gyur ba yang mchis/_gang dag gdugs la kha 'bye zhing dgung la zhum par 'gyur ba yang mchis/_nor bu gang dag dgung la 'bar zhing gdugs la mi 'bar ba yang mchis/_gang 
[\[24a.6\]]dag gdugs la 'bar zhing dgung la mi 'bar ba yang mchis/_bya gang dag dgung la skad 'byin cing gdugs la mi 'byin pa yang mchis/_gang dag gdugs la skad 'byin cing dgung la skad mi 'byin pa yang mchis so/_/rgyal po ngo mtshar skyes nas smras pa/_gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das 
[\[24a.7\]]ni phyin ci ma log par gsung ba ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod ji ltar lung bstan pa kho na las gzhan du ma gyur to/_/de skad smras nas rgyal po de me skyes kyi khyim nas phyir byung ste song ngo /_/gzhon nu ma skyes dgras me skyes kyi nor bu gcig brkus te khye'u zhig gi lag tu gtad pa dang /_des gang 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]nas blangs pa de nyid du phyir song ste 'dug go/_/ma skyes dgras smras pa/_khye'u nor bu de bltas khyer shog_/des chang pa phye ste smras pa/_gzhon nu gar mchis ma 'tshal to/_/des de brdeg par brtsams pa dang me skyes kyis smras pa/_gzhon nu 'di la ci'i phyir rdeg par byed/_khyim bdag 
[\[24b.2\]]kho bo yang rkun ma yin na 'di ni rkun chen zhig ste/_bdag gis khyod kyi nor bu brkus pa de yang 'dis brkus so/_/des smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod kyis kyang ma brkus/_'dis kyang ma brkus te/_'di ltar khyod kyis gang nas blangs pa de nyid du phyir song ste 'dug go/_/de lta mod kyi gzhon nu khyod 
[\[24b.3\]]nyid kyi khyim yin gyis nor bu ji snyed dgos pa dang /_gzhan yang nor rdzas ci dgos pa de dag ci bder long shig_/de skyengs nas bsams pa/_nam zhig na bdag gi pha 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas bdag rgyal po byed pa de'i tshe blang ngo snyam mo/_/ji tsam na ma skyes dgra lha sbyin gyis bslus nas pha chos kyi 
[\[24b.4\]]rgyal po chos dang ldan pa srog dang phral nas rang gis cod pan bcings te rgyal por zhugs nas de'i tshe des me skyes bos te/_khyim bdag khyod dang nga spun yin pas khyim dag bgo bar bya'o/_/des bsams pa/_'di ni pha chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa de lta bu bsad de bdag nyid kyis cod 
[\[24b.5\]]pan bcings nas rgyal por zhugs pa yin pas 'dis gal te na bdag kyang bsad par 'gyur ro/_/'di bdag gi khyim dbrog par sems yang dag gis sbyin par bya'o/_/snyam du bsams nas smras pa/_lha 'di khyod mnga' na bgo ci 'tshal/_khyod kyi khab tu ni bdag mchi'o/_/bdag gi 
[\[24b.6\]]sdum par ni khyed gshegs su gsol/_ma skyes dgras smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin bya'o zhes de de'i khyim du 'phos shing me skyes ni ma skyes dgra'i khyim du 'phos pa dang /_dpal dang ldan pa'i khyim de mi snang bar gyur cing me skyes ga la ba de nyid du byung ngo /_/de ltar lan bdun gyi bar 
[\[24b.7\]]du mi snang bar gyur cing byung ba dang ma skyes dgras bsams pa/_'di ltar me skyes kyi nor bu dag bdag gis dbrog par ma nus kyis thabs gzhan zhig bya'o snyam nas/_des chom rkun pa dag bskos te/_deng la me skyes kyi khyim nas nor bu dag rkus shig ces bsgo nas/_de dag gis skas dang /_
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]ya gad dang /_kyo ba tang dag gis 'dzeg par brtsams pa dang /_steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir gtogs pa na chung ma'i 'khor 'khod pas de dag mthong nas de dag gis rkun po byung ngo /_/rkun po byung ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ngo /_/me skyes kyis de thos nas chom rkun pa dag 'dug 
[\[25a.2\]]par gyur cig ces yid la yang bsams tshig tu yang brjod pa dang de dag gang nas ji ltar 'dzegs pa de nyid na de bzhin 'khod par gyur to/_/ji tsam na mtshan mo 'das te nam nangs pa dang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po sdig can 
[\[25a.3\]]'dis pha chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa srog dang phral nas nga yang khyim 'joms par byed pa de ci'i phyir bdag cag gis dang du blang bar bya/_ma skyes dgras me skyes kyi gan du pho nya btang ste/_nga la skyon du 'gyur bas de dag thong shig ces byas pa dang /_me skyes kyis chom rkun pa 'di dag 
[\[25a.4\]]'dong bar gyur cig ces yid la yang bsams tshig tu yang brjod nas de dag dong ngo /_/me skyes kyis bsams pa/_gang gis 'di ltar pha chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa srog dang phral ba des bdag bsad par 'gyur gor ma chag gis/_bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nga'i bstan pa la rab 
[\[25a.5\]]tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa yin pas rnam pa thams cad du der song la rab tu byung ngo snyam nas/_des nor gyi rnam pa thams cad phongs pa dag dang /_mgon med pa dag dang /_dbul po dag dang /_
[\[25a.6\]]nad pa dag la byin te/_nor med pa rnams nor dang ldan par byas te bzhag go/_/de nas khyim bdag me skyes mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag dang /_nye du dang /_phu nu dag gi ngo bltas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 
[\[25a.7\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag me skyes kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'tshal lo/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal ma thag kho nar skra byi zhing snam sbyar bgos nas/_lag pa lhung bzed 
[\[25b.2\]]dang /_bya ma bum dang ldan pa dang /_skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur cing /_dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/_/skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing /_
[\[25b.3\]]mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas 'gyur te/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la lung phog nas des brtsal ba dang /_'bad pa dang /_bsgrim pa byas pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang /_mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/_'du 
[\[25b.4\]]byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis bcom nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong pa dang 
[\[25b.5\]]gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil ltar sems mnyam pa/_ste'u dang tsan dan du mnyam pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang /_'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la 
[\[25b.6\]]rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa me 
[\[25b.7\]]skyes 'dis las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas ma dang lhan cig zhugs kyi phung por bsregs shing lha dang mi'i dpal myong nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la yang rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis par gyur/_bcom 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu me skyes nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/_me skyes nyid kyis las byas shing bsags 
[\[26a.2\]]pa dag_/gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang /_
[\[26a.3\]]mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag 
[\[26a.4\]]sngon byung ba bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston 
[\[26a.5\]]pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_dge slong drug khri nyis stong gi 'khor dang thabs cig tu ljongs rgyur gshegs pa na rgyal po'i pho brang rtsa lag can du byon nas rtsa lag can gyi tshal na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang rtsa lag can na rgyal po gnyen 
[\[26a.6\]]ldan zhes bya ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pas rgyal srid 'byor pa/_rgyas pa/_bde ba/_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba/_thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_phyi dgra dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad rab tu zhi ba/_'bru 
[\[26a.7\]]dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba glang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug go/_/de na khyim bdag nyes med ces bya ba/_phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung ba/_yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig 'dug 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]pa des bsams pa/_bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs lan du ma zhig khyim du spyan drangs te gdugs tshod gsol mod kyi/_zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs pa ni nam yang ma byas pas da bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 
[\[26b.2\]]gzigs la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs so snyam nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug 
[\[26b.3\]]go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs khyim bdag nyes med la/_chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' 
[\[26b.4\]]bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas khyim bdag nyes med stan las langs te/_
[\[26b.5\]]bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas 
[\[26b.6\]]pa la bdag dgung zla gsum du na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gnas mal dang /_snyun gyi rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad rnams 'bul bar ci gnang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis khyim bdag nyes med la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas 
[\[26b.7\]]khyim bdag nyes med kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs nas song ngo /_/rgyal po gnyen ldan gyis yang dag 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dge slong drug khri nyis stong gi 'khor dang thabs cig tu ljongs rgyur gshegs pa na rgyal po'i pho brang rtsa lag can du byon nas rtsa lag can gyi tshal na bzhugs so/_/zhes thos so thos nas kyang des bsams pa/_bdag gis yang dag par 
[\[27a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs lan du ma zhig pho brang du spyan drangs te gdugs tshod gsol mod kyi/_zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs pa ni nam yang ma byas pas da bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis 
[\[27a.3\]]bstabs so snyam nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[27a.4\]]rgyas rnam par gzigs rgyal po gnyen ldan la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par 
[\[27a.5\]]bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po gsum pa/_de nas rgyal po gnyen ldan stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig 
[\[27a.6\]]tu gzar nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bdag dgung zla gsum du na bza' dang /_
[\[27a.7\]]zhal zas dang /_gnas mal dang /_snyun gyi rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad rnams 'bul bar ci gnang /_rgyal po chen po khyim bdag nyes med kyis dang po kho nar spyan drangs zin to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang na ji ltar gnang ba de ltar bdag gis khyim bdag nyes med 'drang bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po gal te khyim bdag nyes med 'drang na ngas de bzhin gnang bar bya'o/_/rgyal po gnyen ldan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas stan las langs te rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_rgyal 
[\[27b.2\]]po gnyen ldan gyis khyim bdag nyes med pho nyas bkug nas smras pa/_khyim bdag shes par byos shig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang po nas ngas gdugs tshod gsol bar de'i 'og tu khyod kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs 
[\[27b.3\]]gdugs tshod gsol na khyod la gnod pa med dam/_des smras pa/_lha yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang po kho nar bdag gis spyan drangs lags pas bdag gis gdugs tshod gsol bar 'tshal lo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyim bdag gal te de lta 
[\[27b.4\]]mod kyi/_'on kyang khyod nga'i yul na gnas pas dang po kho nar ngas gdugs tshod gsol bar 'os so/_/lha 'di ltar bdag khyod kyi yul na mchis mod kyi/_'on kyang gang gis sngar spyan drangs pa de nyid kyis gdugs tshod gsol ba 'di la lhas gnod par bgyi ba mi rigs so/_/
[\[27b.5\]]khyim bdag khyod 'dod rgyal du mi gtang gis gdugs tshod gang bzang bas spyan drang bar bya ste/_gang gi gdugs tshod bzang bas sngar gsol bar bya zhing /_gang gis ma thub pa des phyis gdugs tshod gsol bar bya'o/_/khyim bdag nyes med kyis de bzhin bgyi'o zhes mnyan nas/_
[\[27b.6\]]de nyid kyi nub mo khyim bdag nyes med kyis bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag sbyar te/_nang par sngar langs nas gdan thabs mang po bshams shing chu ra dag nye bar bzhag nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la gdugs tshod kyi dus su spyan 'dren 
[\[27b.7\]]gyis bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod g.yar dgongs 'tshal lags te/_btsun pas da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes gsol pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs snga dro sham thabs gsol/_lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/_dge 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]slong gi dge 'dun gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te khyim bdag nyes med kyi bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas khyim bdag nyes med kyis sangs rgyas la 
[\[28a.2\]]sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/_bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/_lan grangs du mar bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas pa dang /_
[\[28a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 
[\[28a.4\]]gzigs khyim bdag nyes med la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag 
[\[28a.5\]]par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas slar gshegs so/_/rgyal po gnyen ldan gyis kyang gzhung gong ma ji lta ba de bzhin du gdugs tshod gsol ba rgya cher rig par bya'o/_/rgyal po dang khyim bdag gnyi 
[\[28a.6\]]ga'i gdugs tshod bzang bar 'dra ste/_gang yang pham rgyal med nas rgyal po gnyen ldan rkom tshugs bcas te sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang /_blon po dag gis smras pa/_lha khyod ci'i slad du rkom tshugs bcas te sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/_des smras pa/_shes ldan 
[\[28a.7\]]dag ngas nga'i yul na gnas pa'i grong mi gang yin pa de yang gdugs tshod lhag par bzang pos pham par ma nus na/_nga ji ltar rkom tshugs bcas te sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug tu rung /_de dag gis smras pa/_lha zhugs shing 'tshong ba rnams bkag pa dang /_khyim bdag de'i zhugs shing 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang dag nga'i yul na gnas pa de dag gis shing btsong bar mi bya'o/_/gang dag shing 'tshong ba de dag ni nga'i yul na ma 'dug shig ces dril sgrogs shig de ltar byas pa dang /_khyim bdag nyes med kyis spos kyi shing dag gis gdugs tshod 
[\[28b.2\]]g.yos shing /_'bru mar dri zhim pos brlan pa'i ras kyis bag chos dag btso bar brtsams pa dang /_gnyen ldan gyi grong khyer thams cad dri zhim po dag gis khyab par gyur to/_/rgyal po gnyen ldan gyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di lta bu'i dri zhim po gang nas byung /_de dag gis rgya cher brjod pa dang /_
[\[28b.3\]]des smras pa/_ci nga la yo byad dag med dam ngas kyang de lta bu bya'o/_/blon po dag gis smras pa/_lha de ltar mdzad du mi rung ste/_khyim bdag 'di ni bu ma mchis pas ring po mi thogs par 'gum pa'i dus la bab nas nor thams cad khyod nyid mnga' bar 'gyur gyis/_lha zhugs shing 'tshong du gnang bar 
[\[28b.4\]]mdzod cig_/de nas des shing dag 'tshong du gnang ngo /_/khyim bdag nyes med kyis rgyal pos shing dag 'tshong du ma gnang ngo zhes thos nas sems 'khrugs te/_kho bo la shing dag gis rgyal po gnyen ldan de ma dang lhan cig me'i phung por sreg kyang chog pa tsam yod do zhes tshig brlang po dag brjod do/_/
[\[28b.5\]]rgyal po rkom tshugs bcas te sems khong du chud cing 'dug nas/_blon po dag gis smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du rkom tshugs bcas te sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/_des rgyas par brjod pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_lha mi dgyes par ma mdzad cig dang /_bdag cag gis ji ltar lhas khyim 
[\[28b.6\]]bdag nyes med thub par 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o zhes byas nas/_de dag gis phyi de nyin par rgyal po gnyen ldan gyi grong khyer gyi rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo dag bsal ba byas nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab ste/_dri rab tu zhim pos gang ba'i pog snod dag bzhag cing /_dar gyi chun po 
[\[28b.7\]]dag dpyangs rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag kyang bsgreng /_me tog sna tshogs dag kyang bkram ste/_dga' ba'i tshal dang 'dra bar 'khor gyi khyams legs par brgyan pa de dang bsgrun du rung ba byas nas/_de rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i gdan thabs rin po che dang /_gding ba dang /_gos phun 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]sum tshogs pas mdzes par byas pa bshams nas bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa mang po rgya che la dri rab tu zhim pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs skyu ru mas dang bcas pa lha'i zhal zas dang 'dra bar yid du 'ong ba/_'jig rten gsum gyi bla ma dang rjes su mthun pa'i zhal zas dag bshams 
[\[29a.2\]]nas rgyal po gnyen ldan la smras pa/_lha'i grong khyer 'di 'dra ba dang /_zhal zas dang /_yo lang 'di 'dra ba dag bshams kyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol rgyal po gnyen ldan gyis bltas nas ngo mtshar chen po skyes te/_ngo mtshar dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 
[\[29a.3\]]gzigs la gdugs tshod kyi dus su spyan 'dren gyis bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod kyi g.yar dgongs 'tshal lags te/_btsun pas da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes gsol pa dang /_de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs snga dro sham thabs gsol/_lhung 
[\[29a.4\]]bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_rgyal po gnyen ldan gyi bkad sa ga la bar gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 
[\[29a.5\]]gzigs kyi dbu'i steng du rgyal po gnyen ldan nyid dbang bskur ba'i bkra shis la gtogs pa'i glang po che'i gtso bo rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs 'dzin du bcug go/_/dge slong rnams kyi steng du yang glang po che gzhan dag gdugs gzhan dag 'dzin du bcug go/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[29a.6\]]rnam par gzigs la rgyal po gnyen ldan gyi btsun mo dam pa bsil yab gser dang nor bu las byas pa'i yu ba can gyis g.yob tu bcug go/_/dge slong rnams la yang btsun mo'i tshogs gzhan dag bsil yab dag gis g.yob tu bcug go/_/khyim bdag nyes med kyis rtog chen gyi mi zhig bskos te/_
[\[29a.7\]]kwa'e nang rje song la bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal po gnyen ldan gyis gdugs tshod ji lta bu zhig gsol pa rtogs shig ces bsgo'o/_/de song ste brtags na 'byor pa de lta bu dag mthong nas ngo mtshar chen po skyes te/_ngo mtshar dang ldan pa'i yid kyis de nyid du 'dug go/_/de bzhin du 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]gnyis pa dang gsum pa dag btang na de dag kyang song zhing de nyid du 'dug go/_/de nas khyim bdag nyes med rang nyid der song ste brtags na 'byor pa de dag mthong nas ngo mtshar chen po skyes te des bsams pa/_gzhan ni bdag gis kyang 'byor pa nus na/_glang po che dang /_btsun mo'i tshogs bdag gis 
[\[29b.2\]]ga la 'byor snyam du rig nas khyim du song ste mi sgo ba bos nas smras pa/_kwa'e sgo ba mi slong mo pa gang dag lhags na de dag ci 'dod pa dag byin la nang du ma btang shig ces bsgo nas/_de mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs te rkom tshugs bcas nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[29b.3\]]gyi shes pa dang /_mthong ba ni 'og gi phyogs su 'jug pa yin pas des bsams pa/_'jig rten na mchod gnas gang dag yin pa de dag gi nang na ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs mchog yin la/_sbyin bdag gang dag yin pa dag gi nang na ni khyim bdag nyes med 
[\[29b.4\]]mchog yin pas de'i grogs bya'o snyam nas bdag nyid kau shi ka'i rigs kyi bram ze zhig tu sprul nas khyim bdag nyes med kyi khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas mi sgo ba bos te smras pa/_kye sgo ba song la khyim bdag nyes med la kau shi ka'i rigs kyi bram ze zhig sgor 'ongs te khyod mthong bar 
[\[29b.5\]]'dod do zhes gyis shig_/des smras pa/_bram ze khyim bdag gis bdag la mi slong mo pa gang dag lhags na/_de dag ci 'dod pa dag byin la nang du ma btang shig ces bsgos/_khyim bdag gis khyod la ci bya/_khyod ci dgos pa de dag khyer la song shig_/des smras pa/_kye 
[\[29b.6\]]sgo ba kho bo la dgos pa gzhan ci yang med de/_kho bo ni khyim bdag nyid mthong bar 'dod kyis song shig_/de khyim bdag nyes med kyi gan du song ste smras pa/_jo bo kau shi ka'i rigs kyi bram ze zhig chab sgor mchis te jo bo mthong bar 'tshal zhes mchi'o/_/des smras pa/_kwa'e sgo ba ngas khyod 
[\[29b.7\]]la sngar mi slong mo pa gang dag lhags na/_de dag ci 'dod pa dag byin la nang du ma btang shig ces ma bsgo'am/_de nang du 'ongs pas ci bya/_ci 'dod pa dag byin la thong shig jo bo bdag gis de skad bgyis na/_de'i mchid nas kho bo la dgos pa gzhan ci yang med de/_kho bo ni khyim bdag nyid 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]mthong bar 'dod do zhes mchi'o/_/des smras pa/_kwa'e sgo ba song la de nang du thong shig_/des de btang ba dang /_des smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod ci'i phyir mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs te rkom tshugs bcas nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/khyim bdag gis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_
[\[30a.2\]]gang gis mya ngan sel bar mi nus pa/_/de la mya ngan brjod par mi bya ste/_/gang gis mya ngan sel bar byed nus pa/_/de la mya ngan brjod par bya ba yin/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyi mya ngan gang yin pa smros dang /_kho bos khyod kyi mya ngan bsal bar bya'o/_/des rgya cher brjod pa dang /_
[\[30a.3\]]de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kau shi ka'i rigs kyi bram ze'i gzugs mi snang bar byas te rang bzhin du 'dug nas smras pa/_khyim bdag kho bos lha'i bu las thams cad pa khyod kyi grogs byed du gzhug go zhes byas nas song ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du 
[\[30a.4\]]song ste/_lha'i bu las thams cad pa bos nas smras pa/_lha'i bu las thams cad pa song la/_khyim bdag nyes med kyi grogs gyis shig_/des smras pa/_kau shi ka rab tu legs so zhes lha'i bu las thams cad pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi tshig mnyan nas des de bas ches mdzes shing khyad par du 
[\[30a.5\]]'phags pa'i grong khyer dag mngon par sprul cing /_lha'i 'khor gyi khyams dang /_lha'i gdan dag kyang bshams/_lha'i zhal zas dag kyang g.yos nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dbu'i steng du ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi skyed mos tshal du spyad pa'i glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung 
[\[30a.6\]]gi bu rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs 'dzin du bcug go/_/dge slong rnams kyi steng du yang lha'i glang po che gzhan dag gdugs gzhan dag 'dzin du bcug go/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi btsun mo dam pa lha mo bde sogs lha'i bsil yab 
[\[30a.7\]]gser dang nor bu las byas pa'i yu ba can gyis g.yob tu bcug go/_/dge slong rnams la yang lha'i btsun mo'i tshogs gzhan dag bsil yab gzhan dag gis g.yob tu bcug go/_/rgyal po gnyen ldan gyis rtog chen gyi mi zhig bskos te/_kwa'e nang rje song la bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa dge 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]slong gi dge 'dun la khyim bdag nyes med kyis gdugs tshod ji lta bu zhig gsol ba rtogs shig ces bsgo'o/_/des brtags na 'byor pa de lta bu dag mthong nas ngo mtshar chen po skyes te/_ngo mtshar dang ldan pa'i yid kyis de nyid du 'dug go/_/des blon po dag btang ba dang de dag kyang song 
[\[30b.2\]]zhing de nyid du 'dug go/_/gzhon nu btang na de yang song zhing de nyid du 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po gnyen ldan rang nyid der song ste sgor bsdad pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis rgyal po gnyen ldan bden pa mthong 
[\[30b.3\]]bar gyur pa la tshig brlang po smras pa/_de sgo 'di na 'dug gis song la bzod par gsol cig_/des de'i gan du song ste bzod par gsol nas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po nang du gshegs la nyid kyi phyag nas brim pa dag mdzad du gsol/_de nang du song ste bltas na lha'i 'byor pa dag mthong 
[\[30b.4\]]nas ngo mtshar chen po skyes nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun ni khyim bdag khyod gcig pus gdugs tshod gsol ba'i rigs kyi kho bos ni ma yin no zhes smras so/_/khyim bdag nyes med kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la de lta bu'i 'byor 
[\[30b.5\]]pas zhal zas dag gis tshim par byas nas/_zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces ji ltar bdag gis yon gnas 'di lta bu la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing /_lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar 
[\[30b.6\]]'gyur ba dang /_chos kyi tshul 'di lta bu thob pa dang /_'di lta bu'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing mi mnyes par mi byed par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag nyes med gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag me skyes 'di yin te/_rigs kyi bu des rgyal po 
[\[30b.7\]]gnyen ldan bden pa mthong ba la tshig brlang po smras pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas ni tshe rabs lnga brgyar ma dang lhan cig me'i phung por bsregs shing da ltar 'dir yang me'i phung por bsregs par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs gang yin pa la bsnyen bkur byas shing smon lam 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]btab pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas ni phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur cing /_nga'i bstan pa la yang rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing /_yang 
[\[31a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang shugs mnyam pa dang /_stobs mnyam pa dang /_brtson 'grus mnyam pas kun du mnyam par gyur pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing mi mnyes par ma byas so/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam 
[\[31a.3\]]par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni rnam par smin pa yang dkar ba yin las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs te/_las gcig tu dkar 
[\[31a.4\]]ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//sdom la/_lhung bzed glan dang spyad rnams dang /_/gri'u dang khab dang khab ral dang /_/
[\[31a.5\]]gtan pa dang ni mang po dag_/drang srong chen pos rjes su gnang /_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/mnyan yod na dge slong gcig cig gi lhung bzed rdol nas des de mgar ba'i gan du khyer te song nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo'i lhung bzed rdol ba 'di glon la byin cig_/des bsams 
[\[31a.6\]]pa/_'di dag ni khas las byed du 'jug pa yin gyi/_gla rngan ni mi ster bas ci nas kyang yun ring du bsgyangs te bzhag na 'di rang gi blos phyir len par 'gyur snyam nas smras pa/_'phags pa bzhud la sang ngam gnangs spyon cig_/snga dro 'am/_gung tshigs sam/_phyi dro spyon cig ces bsgyang 
[\[31a.7\]]bar brtsams so/_/dge slong de nyin gcig bzhin der 'gro ba na skyo ba skyes pa dang /_de'i mdza' bo zhig gis mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa khyod nyin gcig bzhin der 'gro na/_ci de khyod kyi nye du'i khyim mam sbyin bdag gi khyim yin/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di kho bo'i nye du'i khyim yang 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]ma yin/_sbyin bdag gi khyim yang ma yin te/_'di ltar kho bo'i lhung bzed rdol nas de glon du bcug pa na 'di sgyong bar byed pas de'i phyir 'dir 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis lag bzo bden par smra ba dkon no zhes bya ba ma thos sam/_kho bo yang bzo shes mod kyi bcom 
[\[31b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong dag gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong bzo bo dag yod na/_des dben pa'i phyogs su lhung bzed glan par rjes su gnang ngo /_/de dge 
[\[31b.3\]]slong de'i gan du song ste smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang gis lhung bzed 'di glon cig_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di lag pa 'ba' zhig gis glan du mi rung gi mgar spyad dag kyang dgos so zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 
[\[31b.4\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi ched du mgar spyad nye bar gzhag par rjes su gnang ngo /_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/dge slong dag gi chos gos dra dgos par gyur pa de dag lag pa dag gis 'dral nas ma legs par gyur nas/_
[\[31b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag pas dral bar mi bya bar gri'us dra bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gri'us dra bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong zhig gi chos gos dra dgos nas des khyim bdag las gri brnyas te dras nas/_des de khyim bdag de la slar byin 
[\[31b.6\]]pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod nyid kyi lags so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis gri'u bcang bar rjes 
[\[31b.7\]]su gnang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gri'u bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde dag gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel las byas pa'i gri yu ba bsrub pas sbyangs pa dag 'chang nas/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag 'di ci 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]lags/_de dag gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gri rjes su gnang ba'o/_/'phags pa dag dge sbyong khyed cag ni 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gzir to zhes byas pa dang /_de dag spobs pa med par gyur nas cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[32a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel las byas pa'i gri yu ba khra bo dang /_bkra ba bcang bar mi bya bar lcags kyi gri'u bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lcags kyi gri'u bcang 
[\[32a.3\]]bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag gri ha cang chen po dag 'chang nas/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag 'di ci lags/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gri'u yin no/_/'phags pa dag gri lags kyi gri'u ni ma lags so zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[32a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gri ha cang chen po dag bcang bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis gri ha cang chung ngu 'chang bar byed pa na des bya ba ci yang mi nus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gri'u chen po dang /_'bring dang /_chung ngu rnam pa 
[\[32a.5\]]gsum bcang bar bya ste/_de la chen po ni sor drug go/_/chung ngu ni sor bzhi'o/_/de dag gi bar ma ni 'bring ngo /_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/dge slong rnams kyi chos gos dag drub dgos par gyur pa na dge slong dag gis smyug ma'i tshal pa dang /_bya gag gi gshog shing gis 'drub pa na/_
[\[32a.6\]]de dag ral nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khab bcang bar bya'o/_/dge slong zhig gi chos gos drub dgos nas/_des khyim bdag las khab brnyas te drubs nas des de khyim bdag de la phyir byin pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod nyid kyi lags so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[32a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis khab bcang bar rjes su gnang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis khab bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]pa dang /_drug sde dag gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel las byas pa'i khab dag 'chang nas/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag 'di ci lags/_de dag gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khab rjes su gnang ba'o/_/'phags 
[\[32b.2\]]pa dag dge sbyong khyed cag ni 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gzir ba'o zhes byas pa dang /_de dag spobs pa med par gyur nas cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis gser 
[\[32b.3\]]dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel las byas pa'i khab bcang bar mi bya bar khab rnam pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_ra gan dang /_zangs dang /_khar ba dang /_lcags las byas pa dag bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis khab rnam pa bzhi po dag bcang bar bya'o 
[\[32b.4\]]zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bab bab tu bzhag ste/_de dag btsa' zhugs par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khab ral bcang bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis khab ral ci 'dra bar bcang bar bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[32b.5\]]stsal pa/_khab ral ni rnam pa gnyis te/_sbu gu can dang /_chang ba lta bu'o/_/dge slong dag gis chang ba lta bu'i khab ral du gri'u bcug nas de ral bar gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gri'u ni rnam pa gnyis su bya ste/_bya rog gi mchu dang /_bya gag gi gshog pa 
[\[32b.6\]]lta bur bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis chos gos snam sbyar dag bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams sa la brkyang ste 'dra bar byed pa na rdul dag gis dri ma can du gyur cing /_sril dag gis kyang ma rung bar byas nas/_bcom 
[\[32b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sa la bting ste dra bar mi bya bar gtan pa dag bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis gtan pa ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gtan pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/_shing dang smyug ma las gru bzhir byas pa dag go/_/dge slong dag 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]gis phur bur brgyangs pa dang ral nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu gu byas la sgro gzungs kyis brgyang bar bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos rnam pa gsum po chen po dang /_'bring dang /_chung ngu'o zhes bka' stsal pas chos 
[\[33a.2\]]gos chen po brgyang pa'i gtan pa gang yin pa de la 'bring po dang chung ngu brgyang du mi rung nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gtan pa mang po dag bya'o//_//sdom la/_me long dang ni chu dag dang /_/de bzhin so [{]mangs [,]mang [}]smyug shad gnyis/_/gtsug phud dang ni skra [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_/bsro gang 
[\[33a.3\]]lid tsha chen po'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/drug sde dag snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_de dag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis byi dor gyi yo byad gos kyi sprog ma'i steng du bzhag pa mthong nas/_drug 
[\[33a.4\]]sde dag gis de dag gi me long blangs te bzhin bltas nas smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bo ji lta bdag cag bzang ngam/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed mgo ni bregs la mchan khung ni ral bu can du 'dug na khyed kyi gdong mdzes par ga la 'gyur/_dge 
[\[33a.5\]]sbyong 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gzir bar nges so zhes byas pa dang /_de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis me long la bzhin brtag par 
[\[33a.6\]]mi bya'o/_/rtog par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis me long la bzhin brtag par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag gis chu dag la bzhin brtag par brtsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chu la yang bzhin brtag par mi 
[\[33a.7\]]bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis chu la yang bzhin brtag par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag chu la rtog par byed pa na bzhin mthong nas de dag 'gyod par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chu brtag pa dang /_rma dang /_gnyer ma dang /_rgas pa dang /_
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]lus kyi gnas skabs snga phyir brtag pa'i phyir bltas pa la ltung ba med do/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/drug sde dag snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_de dag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis byi dor gyi yo byad gos kyi 
[\[33b.2\]]sprog ma'i steng du bzhag pa mthong nas/_drug sde dag gis de dag gi so [{]mangs [,]mang [}]blangs te skra bshad nas smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bo ji lta bdag cag bzang ngam/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed mgo ni bregs la mchan khung ni ral bu can du 'dug na khyed kyi 
[\[33b.3\]]skra mdzes par ga la 'gyur/_dge sbyong 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gzir bar nges so zhes byas pa dang /_de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na 
[\[33b.4\]]dge slong gis so [{]mangs kyis [,]mang gis [}]skra bshad par mi bya'o/_/bshad par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so [{]mangs kyis [,]mang gis [}]skra bshad par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde dag gis smyug shad kyis bshad 
[\[33b.5\]]par brtsams pa na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smyug shad kyis kyang bshad par mi bya'o/_/bshad par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis smyug shad kyis skra bshad par mi bya'o zhes bka' 
[\[33b.6\]]stsal pa dang /_de dag gis phyogs gcig ni so [{]mangs su [,]mang du [}]byas la/_phyogs gcig ni smyug shad du byas pas skra bshad par byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_so [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang /_smyug shad gnyi gas kyang skra bshad par mi bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/
[\[33b.7\]]gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal byed kyi tshal phul ba de'i tshe des 'dreg mkhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma ji lta ba bzhin no/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gtsug pud 'jog shes sam/_'phags pa de ni bdag 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]gi sug las lags so/_/bltas zhog shig_/'phags pa ji ltar gzhag par bgyi/_chen por ro/_/des gtsug pud chen por bzhag pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_phyogs gcig bregs shig_/des phyogs gcig bregs pa dang /_des smras pa/_gnyis pa dang /_
[\[34a.2\]]gsum pa zhes bya ba nas phyogs bdun pa'i bar bregs shig ces zer nas/_des phyogs bdun pa'i bar du bregs pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bkren pa khyod ko ci yang mi shes pa zhig gis snga ma kho na bzhin du byos te song shig ces bya ba la sogs pa snga ma ji lta ba bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[34a.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis gtsug pud gzhag par mi bya'o/_/'jog par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa ba lang gnas kau shAm bI na ri chus bskor la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyi skyed mos tshal gyi phag mo'i phug na 
[\[34a.4\]]'dug go/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na/_gang gi tshe dpyid kyi dus la bab pa de'i tshe shing ljon pa dag me tog rgyas shing ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug dang /_shang shang te'u dag tshal gyi nang na sgra 'byin par byed pa na/_bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed 
[\[34a.5\]]kyis skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mi bos te/_smras pa/_kwa'i mi khyod tshur shog_/nga skyed mos tshal du 'gros/_ri chus bskor gyi nyen kor gyi rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo thams cad sol la/_chu ra dag kyang zhog ste/_tshal rtogs la/_la gcan pa dag kyang skos shig_/skyed 
[\[34a.6\]]mos tshal srung ba'i mis lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyi tshig mnyan nas/_ri chus bskor gyi nyen kor gyi rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo thams cad bsal nas/_chu ra dag kyang bzhag ste/_tshal brtags shing la gcan pa dag kyang bskos nas bad sa'i rgyal po 
[\[34a.7\]]'char byed ga la ba der song ste/_phyin nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha 'di ltar mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_/ri chus bskor gyi gor ma dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo thams cad bsal cing chu ra dag kyang bzhag ste/_tshal kyang brtags/_la gcan pa 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]dag kyang bskos lags na/_lha da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed btsun mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas skyed mos tshal du song ste/_des der dga' ba dang /_rtse ba dang /_dga' mgur spyod pa nyams su myong bar byas nas 
[\[34b.2\]]de gnyid log par gyur to/_/bud med rnams kyi rang bzhin ni me tog dang 'bras bu la dga' ba yin pas/_de'i btsun mo'i 'khor rnams skyed mos tshal der ci dgar rgyu zhing 'khyam du dong ba dang /_de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa ba lang gnas skra dang kha spu ring zhing chos gos rnying pa dang /_sham thabs 
[\[34b.3\]]hrul po bgos nas shing ljon pa zhig gi drung na rten cing 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa ba lang gnas skra dang kha spu ring zhing /_chos gos rnying pa dang /_sham thabs hrul po bgos nas 'dug pa btsun mo'i 'khor de dag gis mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bsngangs te/_a tsi lha cig 'di na 
[\[34b.4\]]'dre zhig gda'o/_/a tsi lha cig 'di na 'dre zhig gda'o zhes bred skad phyung ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ba lang gnas de nas langs te rings pa rings par phag mo'i phug tu song ngo /_/sgra des rgyal po sad nas ral gri shubs nas phyung ste/_brgyugs nas bud med dag 'dre ga la 'dug ces 
[\[34b.5\]]smras pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_lha cig phag mo'i phug tu mchis so/_/de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed mtshon thogs te phag mo'i phug sgor bsdad nas smras pa/_kwa'e 'byung po khyod su zhig_/des smras pa/_lha dge sbyong lags so/_/khyod gang gi dge sbyong yin/_shAkya'i 
[\[34b.6\]]sras kyi dge sbyong lags so/_/ci khyod dgra bcom mam/_lha ma lags so/_/'o na khyod phyir mi 'ong ba'am/_lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa zhig yin nam/_lha ma lags so/_/'o na ci khyod bsam gtan bzhi pa thob pa yin nam lha ma lags so/_/'o na khyod bsam gtan 
[\[34b.7\]]gsum pa'am/_gnyis pa'am/_dang po thob pa zhig yin nam/_lha ma lags so zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor la phrag dog za bas phyir lhag par khros te/_blon po rnams la smras pa/_kwa'e shes ldan dag dge sbyong so so'i skye bo 'dis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor rnams 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]ma rung bar byas kyis rnga mo'i grog ma chen po dag 'dir myur du lhogs shig dang /_de dag gis phug 'di khyab par bkang ste dge sbyong 'di gsad par bya'o/_/de nas phag mo'i phug na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha zhig 'dug pa des bsams pa/_rgyal po gtum po 'dis bdag la skyabs 
[\[35a.2\]]su 'ongs pa'i dge sbyong nyes pa med pa skyon med pa bsad par gyur na mi rung gis/_bdag gis 'di thar bar bya ba'i thabs shig la brtson par bya'o snyam nas de bdag nyid phag mo chen mo'i gzugs su mngon par sprul te/_phug nas sgor byung ngo /_/rgyal po de lings la dga' bas mi zhig la smras pa/_
[\[35a.3\]]kwa'e mi 'di song la nga'i rta dang mda' gzhu dag khyer te shog shig_/des rgyal po'i rta dang mda' gzhu dag phul lo/_/de nas phag mo de skyed mos tshal gyi nang nas phyir byung ste 'bros par brtsams pa dang /_rgyal po de de'i phyi bzhin snyegs su 'gro ba na des thag ring du khrid de song ngo /_/de nas btsun mo'i 
[\[35a.4\]]'khor gyi tshogs kyis tshe dang ldan pa ba lang gnas la smras pa/_'phags pa rgyal po 'di ni gtum pa lags pas khyod bkrongs par gyur na ma legs kyis khyod da myur du bzhud cig_/tshe dang ldan pa ba lang gnas kyis myur ba myur bar lhung bzed dang /_chos gos blangs te/_skyed mos tshal de nas phyir 
[\[35a.5\]]byung nas mnyan yod du song ngo /_/de khad kyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /_dge slong dag gis mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so/_/khyod yun ring po ring po nas zla ba bzhin du rgyu zhing ga las 'ongs/_kau shAm bI nas so/_/ji lta tshe dang ldan pas bde bar brgyus 
[\[35a.6\]]sam/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ltar bde bar brgyus/_bdag bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis had por de'u bsad do/_/ci'i phyir/_des rgyas par smras pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong zhig la bka' stsal pa dge slong tshur 
[\[35a.7\]]shog_/khyod dge slong ba lang gnas ga la der song la ba lang gnas la 'di skad ces ston pas bka' stsal pa/_khyod spyan sngar mchi shig ces byung ngo zhes sgo shig_/dge slong des btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan nas/_tshe dang ldan pa ba lang gnas ga la ba der song ste 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa ba lang gnas la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ston pas bka' stsal pa/_khyod spyan sngar mchi shig ces byung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa ba lang gnas kyis tshe dang ldan pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de'i tshig mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[35b.2\]]zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ba lang gnas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong khyod bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis ci'i phyir de'u bsad/_des bcom ldan 'das la skabs de rgyas 
[\[35b.3\]]par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di ltar mi gti mug can khyod phug de la lhag par chags pas des na khyod shin tu sdug bsngal bar gnas par gyur to/_/de cang mi smra bar 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la nyes dmigs cung zad gang byung ba de ni skra ring 
[\[35b.4\]]por 'jog pa las gyur par mkhyen nas/_bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis skra ring por gzhag par mi bya'o/_/'jog na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis skra ring por gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dgon pa pa dag gis 
[\[35b.5\]]'dreg mkhan ma rnyed nas de dag gis dgon pa'i gnas mal spangs nas grong mtha'i gnas mal dag tu 'khod do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/_kun dga' bo ci'i phyir 
[\[35b.6\]]dge slong dgon pa pa dag gis dgon pa'i gnas mal spangs nas grong mtha'i gnas mal dag tu 'khod par gyur/_des bcom ldan 'das la skabs de rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong dgon pa pas ni skra sor gnyis kyi tshad du 
[\[35b.7\]]gzhag par rjes su gnang ngo /_/grong mtha' bas ni de bas thung ngur bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/mnyan yod na dge slong nad pa zhig 'dug pa de sman pa'i gan du song nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag la sman ston cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa bsro gang sten cig dang 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]khyod sos par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci kho bos 'dod pa dag spyad par bya 'am/_'phags pa khyod kyi sman ni 'di lags kyi gzhan gyis 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[36a.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te sman pas dge slong khyod kyi sman ni 'di yin gyi/_gzhan gyis 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bsgo na dge slong gis bsro gang bsten par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis bsro gang bsten par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis sman pa de la dris 
[\[36a.3\]]pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bsro gang ji lta bu yin pa smros shig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i gso ba bklags pa las bsro gang bsro gang zhes 'byung bar bas kyi bsro gang ji lta bu lags pa da dung ma 'tshal te/_'di ltar khyod nyid kyi ston pa 
[\[36a.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa lags pas de nyid mkhyen to zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bsro gang gi khang pa zlum po bya'o/_/de dag skar khung mi dod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skar khung gdod 
[\[36a.5\]]par bya'o/_/de dag skar khung phyi yangs la nang dog pa byed du 'jug nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyi rub la nang yangs pa rgya mtsho'i rnam pa lta bur bya'o/_/de dag gis mthon por gtod pa na mun gnag par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ha cang mthon por gdod 
[\[36a.6\]]par mi bya'o/_/de dag gis dma' bar btod pa na du ba 'tshang du mi btub nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ha cang dma' bar gdod par mi bya'o/_/de dag gis gar gdod mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dkyil du gdod par bya'o/_/bye'u dang phug ron dag 'jug 
[\[36a.7\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skar khung dra ba can bya'o/_/rlung dang char chu'i zer ma dag nang du 'ong nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skar khung la sgo glegs gzhug par bya'o/_/rlung gis bskyod de 'dug tu mi btub nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'khor 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]gtan dang /_gnam gzer dang /_phred gtan gzhug par bya'o/_/dbye ba dang bcad pas dge slong dag nyon mongs par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dbyug gu skam kha nye bar gzhag par bya'o/_/sgo la sgo glegs mi 'jug nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgo 
[\[36b.2\]]glegs gzhug par bya zhing sgo gtan yang gzhug par bya ste/_de la yang mig dang /_lag zungs kyang gzhug par bya'o/_/chu dag dma' ba'i phyogs su bzhag pas de grangs par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nang gi phyogs su gzhag stegs bya zhing der bum pa dag gzhag 
[\[36b.3\]]par bya'o/_/sa gzhir me bus pas des zhal zhal ma rung bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_so phag gi gcal dgram par bya'o/_/de dag gis me bdal ba dang de shi nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bdal nas de bzhin mi dor bar bcer te gzhag par 
[\[36b.4\]]bya'o/_/de dag gis cis bcer ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lcags kyi thal phyags byas la des bcer bar bya'o/_/de dag me 'bar ba na bsro gang gi nang du 'jug cing rmya bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_me 'bar ba na 'jug par mi bya'o/_/
[\[36b.5\]]dge slong dag der zhugs pa na me'i dugs kyis bog par gyur nas de dag myos te sa la sgyel nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phye dang yungs mar du bsres pa dag mer blug par bya'o/_/dri mi zhim par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bdug spos 
[\[36b.6\]]blug par bya'o/_/dud pas dge slong dag mchi ma 'dzag nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nas kyi bag zan gyi chang bus glan par bya'o/_/'on kyang 'dzag nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyu ru ra'i chang bus glan par bya'o/_/stan med nas dge slong dag gis stan 
[\[36b.7\]]khyer te song ba dang /_de dag 'bru mar gyis snums par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rtswa bam dag gzhag par bya'o/_/rkang pa dag sa la bzhag pas rdul gyis gos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sa gzhir rtswa dag dgram par bya'o/_/skam po dag 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]bting ba na me stag gis tshig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sngon po dag dgram par bya'o/_/sngon po dag ma rnyed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chus sbangs la dgram par bya'o/_/dge slong dag 'bru mar gyis snums pa na 'jag ma dang gseg 
[\[37a.2\]]ma dag gis lus la phrugs pas rma byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lcags kyi phrug spyad bya'o/_/de bab bab tu bzhag pas de ma rung bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lung mig byas la the gus btags te rdzas kyi blas dben par gzhag par bya'o/_/de 
[\[37a.3\]]snums par gyur nas dge slong dag de yang dang yang du sbyong bar byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mes rung bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis der khrus byas pas 'dam rdzab tu gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_der khrus mi bya bar khrus khang byas la der khrus bya'o/_/
[\[37a.4\]]gang dag khrus byed pa de dag la chus gnod par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khrus dong brkos la so phag gis bsgron te gang khrus byed pa de khrus dong du zhugs la gang khrus chu ldugs pa de ni khar 'dug ste khrus chu blug par bya'o/_/de chus gang nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[37a.5\]]pa/_stor khung gdod par bya'o/_/dge slong dag khrus byas nas 'dag rdzas dang /_ba lang gi lci ba dang /_so shing len du gtsug lag khang du 'dong nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de nyid du 'dag rdzas dang /_ba lang gi lci ba dang /_so shing gis bkang ba'i gyo mo dag gzhag par bya'o/_/
[\[37a.6\]]dge slong dag me'i dugs kyis nyam dmas par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khye'u sus bza' bar bya'o/_/de dag lag pa bsnyal bas thogs par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kha gzar bcang bar bya'o/_/dge slong zhig gis khye'u sus thug pa ha cang tsha ba zhig 
[\[37a.7\]]rnyed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kha gzar gyis btung bar bya'o/_/de la lan tshwa dgos pa dang /_lo ma dag ma rnyed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshwa khug bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bsro gang du byi dor gyi las bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]gis byi dor gyi las sus bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag gis bya'o/_/de dag gi ni gcig gis gcig la bya'o/_/de ltar bsro gang yo byad dang bcas pa rjes su gnang ngo /_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe yangs pa can na lits+tsha bI 
[\[37b.2\]]chen po zhes bya ba g.yo sgyu med pa drang po drang ba'i rang bzhin can zhig 'dug pa de nyin gcig bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba yin pas de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro ba'i tshe dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes kyang ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na yangs pa can du phyin nas de gnyis kyis 
[\[37b.3\]]de lam kar mthong nas de gnyis kyis smras pa/_chen po gar 'gro/_des smras pa/_'phags pa gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mchi'o/_/de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor dang /_tshe rabs tshe rabs su kho na yod pas de gnyis kyis smras pa/_chen po sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[37b.4\]]ldan 'das la ni gtam gyi skyes dbul bar bya ba yin na/_khyod la gtam gyi skyes cung zad yod dam/_'phags pa gnyis ma mchis so/_/chen po tshur shog_/khyod bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces/_btsun pa 'di ltar 'phags pa gyad 
[\[37b.5\]]bu nor gyis bdag gi mchis 'brang dang lhan cig mi tshangs par spyad de pham par gyur pa de ni mi mdzes shing tshul dang mthun pa ma lags so zhes gsol cig dang /_bcom ldan 'das khyod la dgyes par 'gyur ro/_/des 'phags pa gnyis de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes smras te/_bcom ldan 'das ga 
[\[37b.6\]]la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces btsun pa 'di ltar 'phags pa gyad bu nor gyis bdag gi mchis 'brang dang lhan cig mi tshangs par spyad de pham par gyur pa de ni mi mdzes shing tshul dang mthun pa 
[\[37b.7\]]ma lags so zhes gsol nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag lits+tsha bI chen po dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la lhung bzed khas dbub par bya'o/_/khas dbub pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams pa byas nas/_
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gis las bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_lits+tsha bI chen pos tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la 
[\[38a.2\]]yang dag pa ma lags pas skur na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis lits+tsha bI chen po la lhung bzed khas dbub par bgyi'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun gyis gang la lhung bzed khas phub pa de'i khyim du dge slong dag gis 
[\[38a.3\]]'gro bar mi bya/_stan la longs spyod par mi bya/_bsod snyoms blang bar mi bya/_chos bstan par mi bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la lits+tsha bI chen po la 'di skad ces/_khyod la dge 'dun gyis lhung bzed khas dbub pa mdzad do 
[\[38a.4\]]zhes sgo shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan nas lits+tsha bI chen po'i khyim ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe lits+tsha bI chen po bya ba zhig gi ched du phyi rol du song ngo /_/des de'i chung ma la smras pa/_sring mo lits+tsha bI chen po gar song /_/des smras 
[\[38a.5\]]pa/_'phags pa slad rol du mchis so/_/sring mo 'di lta ste/_khyed la dge 'dun gyis lhung bzed khas dbub pa mdzad pa shes par byos shig_/des smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo lhung bzed khas dbub pa zhes bgyi ba ci lags/_sring mo gang la lhung bzed khas dbub pa de'i khyim du dge slong dag 'dong 
[\[38a.6\]]bar mi byed/_stan la longs spyod par mi byed/_bsod snyoms len par mi byed/_chos ston par mi byed do/_/'phags pa kun dga' bo dge 'dun gyis thabs kyis bdag gi tshul shing bor te dge 'dun la bdag cag gis nongs pa de lta bu ci zhig bgyis na de'i slad du lhung bzed khas dbub pa mdzad/_sring 
[\[38a.7\]]mo 'di ltar khyod kyi khyim thab bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces btsun pa 'di ltar 'phags pa gyad bu nor gyis bdag gi mchis 'brang dang lhan cig mi tshangs par spyad de pham par gyur pa de ni mi mdzes shing tshul dang mthun pa ma lags so zhes gsol to/_/de ngo tsha 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]bar gyur nas khyim du zhugs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo phyir song ngo /_/ji tsam na lits+tsha bI chen po khyim du 'ongs nas/_chung mas smras pa/_rje'i sras 'o skol la dge 'dun gyis lhung bzed khas dbub pa mdzad do/_/bzang mo legs par lhung bzed khas phub bo/_/shin tu lhung bzed khas phub bo/_/
[\[38b.2\]]rje'i sras legs par lhung bzed khas phub bo/_/shin tu lhung bzed khas phub bo zhes gsung ngam/_khas phub zhes bgyi ba ji mkhyen tam/_mi shes so/_/rje'i sras gang la lhung bzed khas phub pa de'i khyim du dge slong dag 'ong bar mi bgyid/_stan la longs spyod par mi bgyid/_bsod snyoms len par mi bgyid/_
[\[38b.3\]]chos ston par mi bgyid do/_/rje'i sras ci khyod kyis 'phags pa gyad bu nor dang bdag lhan cig mchis pa gzigs sam/_bzang mo ma mthong ngo /_/'o na ci ste 'phags pa la yang dag pa ma lags pas skur/_gal te nga yang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun bzod pa gsol na de lta 
[\[38b.4\]]na legs/_mi gsol na khyod kho mo'i khyim du mi gzhug go zhes byas pa dang /_de sems khong du chud cing 'dug ste bsams pa 'dis ji skad smras pa de bzhin 'gyur bas bzod pa gsol du 'gro'o snyam nas/_de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste phyin nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 
[\[38b.5\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi kun tu spyod pa ni gdugs gcig bzhin nang par sngar langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mchi ba lags pas bdag la dge slong mdza' bo dang /_sa las skyes gnyis kyi mchid nas chen po tshur shog_/khyod bcom ldan 
[\[38b.6\]]'das ga la ba der song ste zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gi mchis 'brang dang lhan cig mi tshangs par spyad de pham par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/des btsun pa bdag gis ci nongs pa bzod par gsol zhes gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[38b.7\]]dge slong rnams lits+tsha bI chen po dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la lhung bzed phyir bzlog par bya'o/_/phyir bzlog pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te/_dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la lits+tsha 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]bI chen pos phyag 'tshal nas rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag lits+tsha bI chen po mi dge ba'i grogs pos bslus pas 'phags pa gyad bu nor la yang dag pa ma lags pas skur pas 
[\[39a.2\]]dge 'dun gyis bdag la lhung bzed khas dbub pa mdzad de/_bdag la lhung bzed khas phub pa/_dge 'dun las lhung bzed slar bzlog par gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis lits+tsha bI chen po bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du lhung bzed slar bzlog tu gsol/_de bzhin 
[\[39a.3\]]du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas de nas lits+tsha bI chen po thos pa'i nyen kor nas bkar te mthong ba'i nyen kor du bzhag la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gis las bya'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_lits+tsha bI chen po mi dge ba'i grogs pos bslus pa 
[\[39a.4\]]'dis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la yang dag pa ma lags pas skur te/_dge 'dun gyis de la lhung bzed khas dbub pa mdzad pa las lits+tsha bI chen po lhung bzed khas phub pa de dge 'dun las lhung bzed slar bzlog par gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang 
[\[39a.5\]]bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis lits+tsha bI chen po la lhung bzed slar bzlog pa mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun gyis gang la lhung bzed phyir bzlog pa de'i khyim du dge slong dag gis 'gro bar bya/_stan la longs spyad par bya/_bsod snyoms blang bar bya/_chos bstan par bya'o//_//
[\[39a.6\]]sdom la/_yan lag rnam pa me long dang /_/gar dang glu dang rol mo'i sgra/_/skad kyi gtang rag gnang ba dang /_/lhung bzed bzhi dang lhan cig pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na dge slong 
[\[39a.7\]]spong ba pa zhig gnas pa de gang gi tshe skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go cog na de'i tshe yan lag gi rnam pa las su rung bar gyur to/_/de dus gzhan zhig na bsod snyoms brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/_phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab ste rkang pa 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]gnyis bkrus nas shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du skyil mo krung bcas te yid la byed pa la zhugs shing 'dug pa na/_yang de'i yan lag gi rnam pa las su rung bar gyur nas des de ji ltar zhi bar 'gyur ba de ltar byas so/_/sems ni myur du 'gyur ba yin pas de sems yengs pa na yang dang yang du las su rung bar 
[\[39b.2\]]gyur nas de 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa na/_zhe sdang chen po yang skyes nas des de rdo ba'i steng du bzhag nas rdo ba gzhan gyis brdungs so/_/de sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gdungs nas bsams pa/_bdag sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gdungs na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis mi dgongs pa lta zhig snyam pa 
[\[39b.3\]]dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis der gshegs nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'di ci nyes/_des ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ngas 'dod chags kyi gnyen po ni mi sdug pa bsgom pa'o zhes ma gsungs sam/_mi 
[\[39b.4\]]gti mug can brdung bar bya ba ni gzhan yin na khyod kyis ni gzhan brdungs so/_/de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis chos gcig bsgoms na phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur bar nga khas 'che ste/_de ni 'di lta ste/_lus la dmigs 
[\[39b.5\]]pa'i dran pa'o/_/dge slong dag khyed kyis lus la dmigs pa'i dran pa sgoms shig dang /_phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur bar nga khas 'che'o/_/de lta bas na dge slong gis brdung bar bya ba gzhan yin la gzhan brdung bar mi bya'o/_/rdung na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan 
[\[39b.6\]]yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag gcig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/des rtse ba dang dga' ba dang /_dga' mgur spyad pas 
[\[39b.7\]]de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das te btsas pa las khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa zhig byung ngo /_/de dus gzhan zhig na legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas de dus chung zhig ljongs su 'dug nas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]ljongs rgyu zhing song ngo /_/de ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na gdong la phol mig byung nas des sman pa gtar ka byed du bcug pa dang /_gdong mi sdug par gyur nas/_de dus gzhan zhig na mnyan yod du song ba dang /_dge slong zhig gis 'jug tu ma ster to/_/de dge slong gzhan zhig gi gan 
[\[40a.2\]]du song nas smras pa/_btsun pas bdag mi mkhyen tam/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mi shes na khyod gang zhig yin/_des smras pa/_bdag gi ming ni 'di zhes bya/_khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi ni bu'o/_/rab tu ni der byung ngo /_/yul de nas ni 'dir 'ongs so/_/des smras pa/_tshe 
[\[40a.3\]]dang ldan pa khyod bzhin bzang zhing mdog sdug pa yin na ci'i phyir khyod kyi bzhin mi sdug par gyur/_des ji ltar gyur pa kun smras pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gi gdong me long dang 'dra ba yin pas de lta bas na 
[\[40a.4\]]dge slong gis gdong la sman pa gtar ka byed du gzhug par mi bya'o/_/byed du bcug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi gdong la sman pa gtar ka byed du gzhug par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag khrag rgyas nas gtar ka gdab dgos par gyur 
[\[40a.5\]]pa na dge slong dag mi 'debs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gtar ka gdab par bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan yod na dga' 'dun gnyis 
[\[40a.6\]]shig yod de/_tshong pa'i dga' 'dun dang /_ru ba'i dga' 'dun no/_/de gnyis las tshong pa'i dga' 'dun gyis ni ru ba'i dga' 'dun gar dang /_glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag gis pham par byed do/_/ru ba'i dga' 'dun gyis ni tshong pa'i dga' 'dun dgra thabs kyis pham par byed do/_/
[\[40a.7\]]de nas dus gzhan zhig na ru ba'i dga' 'dun dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di dag gis bdag cag gar dang glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag gis pham par byas shing bdag cag gis kyang de dag dgra thabs kyis pham par byas na bdag cag gis kyang thabs ji lta bu zhig gis de dag gar dang glu dang /_rol 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]mo'i sgra dag gis pham par bya/_de dag las kha cig gis smras pa/_de bzhin te bdag cag gis kyang gar dang /_glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag bslab par bya'o/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_legs so su las bslab par bya/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa drug sde dag gar dang /_glu dang /_
[\[40b.2\]]rol mo'i sgra dag la mkhas pas de dag las bslab par bya na de dag ni 'dod pa'i bdag nyid can yin pas gal te cung zad cig slong na yang sbyin par bya'o/_/de rnams kyis smras pa legs so/_/de bzhin du sbyin par bya'o/_/de rnams drug sde dag ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te 
[\[40b.3\]]smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag cag la gar dang glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag bslab tu gsol/_de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te bca' ba'i rin dag nged la sbyin na bslab par bya'o/_/'phags pa dag bdag cag la sman yon btags kyis dbul lo/_/de dag gis de 
[\[40b.4\]]rnams gar dang glu dang rol mo'i sgra dag bslabs so/_/gang gi tshe byang bar gyur pa de'i tshe de rnams kyis tshong pa'i dga' 'dun dag dgra thabs kyis kyang pham par byas shing gar dang glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag gis kyang pham par byas pa dang de dag gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag sngon ni 
[\[40b.5\]]khyod cag gis nged dgra thabs kyis pham par byas shing /_nged kyis kyang gar dang glu dang rol mo'i sgra dag gis khyed pham par byas na/_da ni khyod kyis kho bo cag gnyis kas pham par byas pa'i sbyor ba gang yin/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_da kho bo cag gis bslabs so/_/su las 
[\[40b.6\]]bslabs/_'phags pa drug sde dag las so/_/de rnams shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong dag gi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/_/bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/_'di ltar gar dang glu dang rol mo'i sgra dag kyang slob par byed do zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i 
[\[40b.7\]]skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_dge slong dag la nyes dmigs cung zad gang byung ba ni gar dang glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag slob pa las gyur par mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]gar dang glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag bslab par mi bya'o/_/slob na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gar dang /_glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag bslab par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dga' 'dun de rnams kyis brjed nas de rnams 
[\[41a.2\]]yang drug sde dag gi gan du dong ste smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag cag gis de bskyud par gyur na yang bslab tu gsol/_de dag gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gar dang /_glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag bslab par mi bya'o zhes bslab 
[\[41a.3\]]pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pas mi bslab bo/_/'phags pa dag gal te mi bslab na sbyang ba tsam mdzad cing gshegs su gsol/_de dag gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag 'dong ngo /_/de dag der dong nas sbyangs te de rnams kyis de dag pham par byas pa dang /_yang dge sbyong gi tshul ni 
[\[41a.4\]]tshig go/_/bram ze'i tshul ni tshig go zhes bya ba nas smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la nyes dmigs cung zad gang byung ba 
[\[41a.5\]]ni gar dang glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag sbyong bar byed pa las gyur par mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis gar dang /_glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag sbyang bar mi bya'o/_/sbyong bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gar dang /_glu 
[\[41a.6\]]dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag sbyang bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dga' 'dun rnams kyis yang brjed nas de rnams yang drug sde dag gi gan du dong ste/_de bzhin du smras pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bkag pas mi sbyang ngo /_/de rnams kyis 
[\[41a.7\]]smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed gshegs te gzigs pa tsam kho nas kyang bdag cag gis de dag gis pham par 'gyur ro/_/gal te de lta na 'dong ngo zhes de dag der dong ba dang /_dga' 'dun de rnams mthong ba tsam nyid kyis bag 'khums par gyur nas de rnams shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong dag gi dge 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/_/bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/_'di ltar gar dang /_glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag blta ba'i phyir yang 'gro zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 
[\[41b.2\]]slong dag la nyes dmigs cung zad gang byung ba de ni gar dang /_glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag ltar 'gro ba las gyur par mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis gar mi bya/_glu blang bar mi bya/_rol mo'i sgra mi bya'o/_/gar dang glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag sbyang bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[41b.3\]]de dag la ltar yang 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong dag dge slong gar slob bam/_glu slob bam/_rol mo'i sgra slob bam/_gar dang glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra sbyong ngam/_de dag la ltar 'gro na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam 
[\[41b.4\]]po bzhi pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe kau shAm+bI na khyim bdag bzang ldan zhes bya ba dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma 
[\[41b.5\]]blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/des rtse ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_dga' mgur spyad pas dus gzhan zhig na de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can de gdul ba la ltos pas de'i
