[\[41b.6\]]khyim du song ste/_khyim bdag rang bzhin bzang po de skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag nas dus dus su de'i gan du 'gro'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong med par gcig pu song ba dang /_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags 
[\[41b.7\]]pa ci khyod la phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong ma mchis sam/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong rtswa ka sha'i khrod dang /_ku sha'i khrod nas 'ong ngam/_khyod lta bu las 'thob par 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong kho nar 'gyur 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]ro/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa gal te de lta na bdag gi mchis 'brang la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de gal te khye'u btsas na de 'phags pa'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong du dbul lo/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod nad med par gyur cig_/kho bos bkri'o zhes smras nas song 
[\[42a.2\]]ngo /_/ji tsam na khyim bdag gi chung ma de zla ba dgu tshang ste btsas pa las khye'u mdog ngan zhing lus chung la skad snyan pa zhig byung ngo /_/de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par 
[\[42a.3\]]byed pa na/_nye du dag gis smras pa/_gang gi phyir khye'u 'di mdog ngan zhing lus chung yang khyim bdag bzang ldan gyi bu yin zhing skad snyan pa de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming snyan pa bzang ldan zhes bya'o zhes de'i ming snyan pa bzang ldan zhes bya bar btags so/_/de bsrings shing bskyed nas chen por gyur to/_/
[\[42a.4\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_kau shAm+bIr bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/kau shAm+bI na bsod snyoms la rgyu ba'i tshe khyim bdag bzang ldan gyi khyim du song ba dang /_khyim bdag bzang ldan gyis 'phags pa byon pa legs so zhes 
[\[42a.5\]]bya ba'i tshig kun du spyad pas kun du spyad nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas so/_/de'i chung mas kyang bca' ba dang /_bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste phul lo/_/khye'u de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du rtog nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus khyim bdag bzang ldan la 
[\[42a.6\]]brda byas pa dang /_des khye'u de la smras pa/_bu khyod ma btsas pa nyid nas/_ngas 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i zhabs 'bring du phul gyis khyod 'phags pa dang lhan cig song shig_/srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can de de'i phyi na 'dug pa'i tshe des de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/_de la lung 
[\[42a.7\]]phog nas des brtsal pa dang /_'bad pa dang bsgrim pa byas pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa tsan dan zhag lon par bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur 
[\[42b.2\]]cing rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/gang gi 
[\[42b.3\]]tshe des skad kyi gtang rag gis chos smras pa/_de'i tshe na tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad khyab par gyur cing sems can mang po dag gi rgyud la yang thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag skyed par byed de/_mdor na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can dag kyang sgra snyan pa de la rna blags te 
[\[42b.4\]]nyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste dge slong snyan pa bzang ldan 'di mchog yin no/_/de'i skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa yid du 'ong ba'i sbyor bas dge slong 'dod chags dang 
[\[42b.5\]]ma bral ba rnams rang gi bya ba btang nas nyin gcig bzhin de'i gan du 'gro bar byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal glang po che'i gtso bo pad ma dkar po gcig pa la zhon nas kha lo sgyur ba dpal 'phel dang nam gyi tho rangs ri brags shig tu song ba'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[42b.6\]]snyan pa bzang ldan gyis nang par skad kyi gtang rag gis chos smra bar brtsams pa glang po che'i gtso bo pad ma dkar po gcig pas thos so/_/des tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyi skad kyi gtang rag thos nas kyang yang rna ba blags te mi g.yo bar sdod do/_/kha lo sgyur ba dpal 'phel gyis 
[\[42b.7\]]phan tshun nas lag pa dang rkang pa dag g.yabs te bskyod par brtsams kyang de bzhin mi g.yo ba dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_dpal 'phel glang po che thob shig lha btab kyang mi mchi na 'di rgyu gang lags ma 'tshal to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_zhog shig dang lam gang du 'gro ba blta'o/_/
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]des ji bder bzhag pa dang /_de rgyal byed kyi tshal logs su song nas khad kyis khad kyis rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang /_rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na rna blags te sdod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos dag smras pa'i mjug tu/_'byung po 
[\[43a.2\]]gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te/_/sa 'am 'on te bar snang gnas pa dag_/sems can rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing /_/nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod par shog_/ces yongs su bsngo ba byas pa dang /_de nas glang po che'i gtso bo pad ma dkar po gcig pas tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa 
[\[43a.3\]]bzang ldan gyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos dag smras pa mtha' phyin par shes nas yid dang mthun par gang dang gang du bskyod pa de dang der song ngo /_/rgyal pos smras pa/_dpal 'phel rgyu gang gis 'dir gang dang gang du bskyod pa de dang der 'gro/_des smras pa lha ma 'tshal te/_'phags 
[\[43a.4\]]pa zhig gis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos smras pa'i sgra gang lags pa de dag thos nas glang po che 'di yid phrogs te dbang ma mchis par gyur to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_dpal 'phel glang po che phyir zlog shig dang /_'phags pa de btsal la na bza' zhig dbul zhing sang nang par ri brags 
[\[43a.5\]]su 'dong ngo /_/lha de bzhin 'tshal lo/_/de phyir log ste khyim du song ba dang /_btsun mo phreng ldan mas dris pa/_lha ci'i slad du slar gshegs/_des ji ltar gyur pa brjod nas 'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/phreng ldan ma nga la gos byin cig dang song la 'phags pa de la dbul 
[\[43a.6\]]lo/_/des bsams pa/_'phags pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos smras par gyur pa lta zhig na/_de ni mdog ngan zhing lus chung la rgyal po 'di ni rgya chen po la mos pa yin pas 'dis de mthong na gal te ma dad par 'gyur ba'i gnas yod par 'gyur srid kyis thabs kyi 
[\[43a.7\]]rnam pa zhig bya'o snyam nas smras pa/_lha ni ri brags su gshegs shig_/bdag gis ni 'phags pa de la na bza' dbul lo/_/des smras pa/_phreng ldan ma khyod kyis kyang gos gzhan phul cig_/ci gos gnyis kyis ko sa la'i pho brang dbul por 'gyur ram de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /_
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]rgyal pos chen po la 'os pa'i gos khyer nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo /_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug nas rgyal po glang po che las babs nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_'phags pa da nang skad kyi gtang rag gis chos smras pa'i 'phags pa 
[\[43b.2\]]de gang lags/_des smras pa/_rgyal po chen po de cir 'tshal/_'phags pa de la na bza' dbul lo/_/des bsams pa/_tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos dag ni smras na de ni mdog ngan zhing lus chung la rgyal po 'di ni rgya chen po la mos pa yin pas 'dis de 
[\[43b.3\]]mthong na gal te ma dad par 'gyur ba'i gnas yod par 'gyur srid kyis thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o snyam nas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bdag la stsol cig dang /_bdag gis de la dbul bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi lag nas dbul ba 
[\[43b.4\]]bsngags pas rang gi lag nyid nas dbul gyis de ston cig_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan nyin mo spyod pa'i phyir shing ljon pa zhig gi drung na nye bar rten cing 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_rgyal po chen po de ni shing ljon pa zhig gi drung na nye bar rten cing mchis 
[\[43b.5\]]kyis bzhud cig_/de de'i gan du song ste bltas pa dang /_re zhig na de shin tu mi sdug pa mthong ba dang /_de ma dad pa skyes nas mi dga' ste bzhin phyir phyogs nas gos 'phangs te phyir song ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/_gang dag nga yi 
[\[43b.6\]]gzugs la rtog_/sgra la'ang rjes su 'brang byed pa/_/'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa yi/_/skye bo de dag nga mi mthong /_/gal te nang ni shes gyur cing /_/phyi rol dag la mi lta ba/_/nang gi 'bras bu mthong ba gang /_/de nyid sgra yis khrid par 'gyur/_/gal te nang ni mi shes shing /_/phyi rol rnam par mthong 
[\[43b.7\]]gyur pa/_/phyi rol 'bras bu mthong ba gang /_/de yang sgra yis khrid par 'gyur/_/gal te nang yang mi shes shing /_/phyi rol dag kyang ma mthong ba/_/kun tu rmongs pa'i byis pa dag_/de yang sgra yis khrid par 'gyur/_/gal te nang yang rab shes shing /_/phyi rol dag kyang mthong ba yi/_/brtan po shes 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]rab phyogs pa de/_/sgra yis khrid par mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas mdog ngan zhing lus 
[\[44a.2\]]chung la skad snyan par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu snyan pa bzang ldan nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas snyan pa bzang ldan 
[\[44a.3\]]nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_
[\[44a.4\]]'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur 
[\[44a.5\]]ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes 
[\[44a.6\]]bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig 'jig rten du byung ste/_des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas/_bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das 
[\[44a.7\]]pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das so/_/rgyal po mdzes ldan gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig de'i sku la mchod pa rgya chen po dag byas nas mchod rten khor yug tu dpag tshad re re yod pa gnam 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis pa zhig byed du gzhug par brtsams nas de'i lag 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]gi gla mi dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can las byed pa la brtson pa zhig bskos so/_/de na yang gla mi gzhan zhig yod pa des mchod rten ha cang chen po rtsom pa de mthong nas lta zhing shes ldan dag rgyal po 'dis 'di lta bu'i mchod rten chen po byed du gzhug par brtsams pa nam tsam zin par 
[\[44b.2\]]'gyur ma shes so zhes 'phya bar brtsams pa dang /_de la lag gi blas smras pa/_kwa'e nang rje ci'i phyir 'phya bar byed/_gal te mi nus na las bya ba thong shig_/de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /_lag gi gla des de phyir dbyung bar brtsams so/_/des de la bzod pa gsol nas/_yang las bya bar 
[\[44b.3\]]brtsams pa na mchod rten de ma zin nas de yang 'phya bar brtsams pa dang /_lag gi gla des phyir phyung ngo /_/yang shin tu 'bad de bzod pa gsol nas las bya bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na mchod rten blta bas mi ngoms pa srog chags 'bum phrag mang po dag gi mig dang yid 'phrog par byed pa 
[\[44b.4\]]zhig zin par gyur to/_/de nas gla mi des de mthong nas 'di ltar las byed pa na bdag gis 'di la dpyas pa ni ma legs pa zhig byas so zhes 'gyod pa skyes nas 'di la rnam pa thams cad du mchod pa bya'o zhes des de'i gla rngan ci thob pa de las gser gyi dril bu byed du bcug nas sems mngon par dad pas mchod 
[\[44b.5\]]rten de la btags so/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na gla mi gang yin pa de ni dge slong snyan pa bzang ldan 'di nyid yin te/_des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi mchod rten gyi las byed pa na dpyas pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas ni mdog ngan zhing lus chung bar skyes 
[\[44b.6\]]so/_/yang dad pa skyes nas gser gyi dril bu byed du bcug nas mchod rten la btags pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ni skad snyan par gyur to/_/de nas yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan 
[\[44b.7\]]pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis las ci zhig bgyis na des tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad sgras khyab par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu snyan pa bzang ldan nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 
[\[45a.2\]]'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi gnas na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so/_/bA rA Na sI dang drang srong smra ba'i bar na a mra'i shing ljon pa zhig yod pa de la 
[\[45a.3\]]bya ko ki la pho zhig gnas pa des gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung bA rA Na sIr bsod snyoms la gshegs pa de'i tshe de la shin tu rtog cing sgra snyan pa khyad par can phyung nas de bzhin du yang dang yang du bltas pas/_sems tshim par gyur nas dad pa skyes so/_/des dus gzhan zhig 
[\[45a.4\]]na skad 'byin cing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dga' ba dang bde ba skyes te a mra'i shing ljon pa de nyid la 'dug go/_/'dug ma thag tu bya khra zhig gis srog dang phral te 'chi ba'i dus byas nas las drug la mkhas pa'i bram ze zhig tu skyes so/_/
[\[45a.5\]]dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na bya ko ki la gang yin pa de ni dge slong snyan pa bzang ldan 'di nyid yin te/_des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la sgra snyan pa phyung ste bskor ba byas pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad sgras khyab par gyur to/_/de nas yang dge 
[\[45a.6\]]slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom 
[\[45a.7\]]pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis te bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni smon lam gyi dbang gis te/_gang du smon lam btab ce na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung de nyid kyi gsung rab la dge slong 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]zhig rab tu byung bar gyur pa de bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/de na 'dis kyang tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i tshe 'di skad ces bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[45b.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob ste/_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye dgu'i tshe lo 
[\[45b.3\]]brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed cing ji ltar mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das yang 
[\[45b.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das des skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces btab pas smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs 
[\[45b.5\]]pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_ngas dge slong skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa zhes bya ba nas/_dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes 
[\[45b.6\]]bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/ji tsam na dge slong dag chos 'don pa nyid na rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshogs gtor ba bzhin 'don la mu stegs can rnams ni skad kyi gtang rag gis gzhung 
[\[45b.7\]]'don to/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun du spyod pa ni nang par sngar langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro'o/_/des mu stegs can rnams skad kyi gtang rag gis gzhung 'don pa thos nas des bsams pa/_mu stegs can rnams kyi chos 'dul ba ni nyes par smras pa yin 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]yang 'di dag skad kyi gtang rag gis gzhung 'don la/_bdag gi 'phags pa rnams ni gzhung 'don pa nyid na rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshogs gtor ba bzhin 'don pas 'di nyid bdag gi bya ba yin no snyam nas/_de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[46a.2\]]kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di ltar re zhig mu stegs can rnams kyi chos 'dul ba ni nyes par smras pa lags 
[\[46a.3\]]kyang /_de dag skad kyi gtang rag gis gzhung 'don par bgyi la/_'phags pa rnams ni gzhung 'don pa nyid na rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshogs gtor ba bzhin 'don pas de la gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa rnams kyang skad kyi gtang rag gis gzhung 'don par gnang na legs so/_/
[\[46a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga 
[\[46a.5\]]nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na khyed kyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos 'don par gnang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams skad 
[\[46a.6\]]kyi gtang rag gis lung 'bogs par byed/_'don par byed/_kha ton byed/_yongs su 'dri bar byed do/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba na des thos nas smras pa/_'phags pa dag ci khyed kyi gtsug lag khang 'dir rol mo mkhan gyi brang btab bam/_
[\[46a.7\]]skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis skad kyi gtang rag gis lung dbog par mi bya gdon par mi bya/_kha ton mi bya/_yongs su 'dri bar mi bya'o/_/'di ltar ston pa'i yon tan yang dag par bsgrag 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]pa dang /_rgyud chags gsum pa gdon pa dag ni skad kyi gtang rag gis gdon par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang rag gis de dag gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_gzhon nu zhig skad kyi gtang rag mi shes nas/_des gzhung dag ston pa nyid na rgya shug gi 'bras 
[\[46b.2\]]bu'i tshogs gtor ba bzhin ston par gyur nas/_dge slong dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang rag gnang gis skad kyi gtang rag gis thon cig_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis skad kyi gtang rag mi shes so/_/skabs de dge slong rnams 
[\[46b.3\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skad kyi gtang rag bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang rag bslab par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams khyams dang /_gnas khang dang /_sgo khang dag na skad kyi gtang 
[\[46b.4\]]rag dag slob par byed pa na/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang /_des thos nas smras pa/_'phags pa dag gtsug lag khang 'di rol mo mkhan gyi brang ni ma lags na/_khyed kyis da dung yang rol mo mkhan dag ma btang ngam/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom 
[\[46b.5\]]ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dben pa'i phyogs su skad kyi gtang rag dag bslab par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig 'greng ste lhung 
[\[46b.6\]]bzed 'byin pa dang /_dge slong dag gis de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'greng ste lhung bzed ma 'byin cig_/des smras pa/_ci nyes/_de dag gis smras pa/_lhung bzed de chag par 'gyur mod gzhan ci nyes par 'gyur/_de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 
[\[46b.7\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis 'greng ste lhung bzed dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du gzhug pa dang /_bkru ba dang /_skam pa dag la yang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o//_//sdom la/_lam phran dang ni snod gsum dang /_/phying pa dra bar mi bya dang /_/
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]gding ba dang ni mi 'bral ba/_/drang srong chen pos rjes su gnang /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngan spong gi bu dag na chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs rung gi nags [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi gnas na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe rgyal bu gzhon nu rtogs ldan gyis khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pad ma can/_tshon brgya 
[\[47a.2\]]rtsa gcig gis bris pa byed du bcug cing ras sar pa kha tshar ring po can dag gis chal par bting ste/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa'i tshe bcom ldan 'das khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pad ma can du gshegs par bzhed pa na ma gshegs pa dang /_rgyal bu gzhon 
[\[47a.3\]]nu rtogs ldan gyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs pa dang /_rgyal bu gzhon nu rtogs ldan gyis ras rnams bsdus pa mu stegs can rnams kyis thos nas de rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma ni bkur sti de lta bu'i 
[\[47a.4\]]gnas ma yin no zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gal te bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis lam phran dag tu yang ras sar pa kha tshar ring po can dag bting zhing 'phags pa dag 
[\[47a.5\]]bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gshegs su gsol zhes zer na/_mu stegs can rnams zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid yid la bya bas zil gyis mnan cing 'dong bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngan spong gi bu dag na chu srin byis pa gsod 
[\[47a.6\]]kyi ri la 'jigs rung gi nags [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi gnas na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig lhung bzed lag na thogs te song ba dang /_de phyogs gzhan zhig tu sgyel nas lhung bzed de sa la lhung ste chag nas de'i bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[47a.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis lhung bzed lag na bkur bar mi bya bar lhung bzed kyi snod du bcug ste bkur bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lhung bzed lag na bkur bar mi bya bar lhung bzed kyi snod du bcug ste bkur bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]slong rnams lhung bzed kyi snod du bcug ste lag pa nyid na khyer te 'dong ba na nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lhung bzed kyi snod lag na bkur bar mi bya bar lung thag btags te mchan 
[\[47b.2\]]khung gis bkur bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong rnams don mthun dag dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo /_/ji tsam na bram ze zhig na nas de sman pa'i gan du song ste smras pa/_kye bdag 
[\[47b.3\]]nyid chen po kho bo'i nad kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sman ston cig_/des smras pa/_jo bo a ru ra gsol dang snyun gdangs par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_lam ka 'di na a ru ra ga la yod/_des smras pa/_bram ze shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong 'di dag ni mkhas pa lags pas 'di dag la khyod kyis bslangs 
[\[47b.4\]]na 'di dag la mchis par 'gyur gda'o/_/de dge slong rnams kyi drung du song ste dris pa/_'phags pa dag la a ru ra lta mchis sam/_de dag gis smras pa/_bram ze yod na de cir dgos/_bdag la sman pa'i mchid nas a ru ra tshol cig ces mchi na gal te mnga' na bdag la stsal du gsol/_
[\[47b.5\]]dge slong des de'i mdun du lhung bzed kyi snod phye ba dang /_de nyid na smyung bu yang 'dug cing /_de nyid na gri'u dang /_de nyid na 'breng bu dang /_de nyid na sman dag 'dug pa bram zes mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed ni kun du spyod pa mi gtsang ba yin te/_'di 'dra ba za ba bas ni bdag shi yang ches 
[\[47b.6\]]bla'i mi gtsang ba za ba ni de lta ma yin no zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_snod gsum bcang bar bya ste/_lhung bzed kyi snod dang /_sman snod dang /_bar bur snod rnams so/_/dge slong dag gis de dag gi 
[\[47b.7\]]lung thag mnyam par btags pas de dag gis mchan khung rlo bar gyur pa dang /_ma dad pa dag 'phags pa dag ci khyed rdza rnga thogs te 'gro'am zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mnyam par gdags 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]par mi bya bar ci rigs par gdags par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis ras ma phra mo dag btags pas de dag la na bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ras ma zheng chen po dag gdags par bya'o/_/de dag gis zheng chen po dag btags pa dang de dag nyid zhum nas/_
[\[48a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dkyil phying bu dang sbyar te skabs skabs su srubs bya rog rkang dag drub par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig gis phying pa zhig rnyed nas des bsams 
[\[48a.3\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos gsum dras te bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal gyis dra'o snyam nas/_de gri'u dang khab dag khyer nas shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du song ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs te gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'di ci yin/_
[\[48a.4\]]des gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis chos gos gsum dras te bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas bdag gis phying pa 'di rnyed nas chos gos su 'dra ba lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa la gus pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams 
[\[48a.5\]]la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na lnga po 'di dag ni dra bar mi bya ste/_be'u ras thams cad dang /_la ba thams cad dang /_phying pa thams cad dang /_klam thams cad dang /_seng ba thams cad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med 
[\[48a.6\]]zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig bya ba zhig gi phyir gtsug lag khang gzhan du song ba dang /_de der nam sros par gyur nas gnas mal gyi zhal ta byed pas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gnas mal dag nos shig_/des smras pa/_bdag gis gding ba khyer te ma 'ongs 
[\[48a.7\]]so/_/gnas mal gyi zhal ta byed pas smras pa/_gal te de lta na khri brling ba nos shig_/des khri brling ba mnos nas nyal ba dang /_de grang ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen bzhin du mtshan mo 'das nas na bar gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis gding ba med par 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/'gro na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gding ba med par 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams deng nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsam 
[\[48b.2\]]pas de'i nyen kor gyi gtsug lag khang gzhan du 'gro ba dang /_'chag tu 'gro ba dang /_grong gzhan du 'gro ba de dag tu yang gding ba khyer ba na gnas brtan rgan po rgas pa nyam chung ba rnams dang /_nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa rnams nyam thag par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[48b.3\]]deng nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsam pas 'gro ba der yang gding ba med par 'gror ma gnang ngo zhes 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis nyen kor dang nyin mo spyod du 'gro ba la gding ba bkur 
[\[48b.4\]]bar mi bya'o/_/grong gzhan du 'gro ba na deng nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsam pas 'gro na der kyang bkur bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong gzhan dag gding ba med par grong gzhan du de nyid ldog pa'i bsam pas 'gro ba na de rnams la bya ba'i rnam pa de lta bu dag byung nas des nam sros par gyur pa dang /_de dag bslab pa la gus 
[\[48b.5\]]pas nub mo phyir dong ba na seng ge dang /_stag dang /_chom rkun pa dang /_g.yon can dag gis bgrod par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te de ltar bsams te dong ba dag der nam sros par gyur na de nyid du 
[\[48b.6\]]gnas par bya ste/_'di ltar tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag las gding ba brnyas te nyal bar bya'o/_/gal te rnyed na de lta na legs/_gal te ma rnyed na bla gos bzhi ltab tu byas te bting la yun thung du ni nyal/_yun ring du ni mi nyal bar mtshan mo 'da' bar bya'o/_/dge slong gzhan zhig gis dge slong zhig 
[\[48b.7\]]las gding ba brnyas pa dang /_de la rmi lam gyi gnod pa byung nas des mi gtsang bas ma rung bar gyur pa de bzhin du dge slong de la phyir dbul bar brtsams pa dang /_des ma 'dod pa'i skabs de zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bkrus te sbyin par bya'o/_/
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]dge slong des bkrus te byin na 'on kyang de len par mi byed pa'i skabs de zhes bya ba'i bar du yang snga ma bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ri ba'i rin sbyin par bya ba'am/_de'i sems mgu bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gtsug lag khang gzhan dang /_grong gzhan dag 
[\[49a.2\]]tu deng nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsam pas chos gos gsum po dag med par dong ba dang /_de rnams der dong ba dag la ci tsam na bya ba'i rnam pa de lta bu dag byung ste der nam sros par gyur to/_/de dag bslab pa la gus pas mtshan mo phyir dong ba na seng ge dang /_stag dang /_chom rkun pa dang /_g.yon can dag 
[\[49a.3\]]gis bgrod par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te de lta bu'i bsam pas dong ba rnams der nam sros par gyur na/_de nyid du 'dug par bya zhing /_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag las chos 
[\[49a.4\]]gos dag brnyas te byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/de rnams chos gos dag brnyas nas ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bya ba ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_snga ma rang gi sems kyis phyung ba byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/lnga po 'di dag ni sems bskyed pas 'grub ste/_gso sbyong 
[\[49a.5\]]dang /_dgag dbye dang /_chos gos byin gyis brlab pa dang /_chos gos dbyung ba dang /_gang zag mgron du bos pa'o/_/dge slong de dag gis chos gos dras shing kha dog ma bsgyur ba dag rnyed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te dras shing kha dog ma bsgyur ba dag rnyed na dras 
[\[49a.6\]]shing kha dog ma bsgyur ba dag byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/ji ste kha dog ma bsgyur cing ma dras pa dag rnyed na lhan thabs kyis glan la byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/gal te rnyed na de lta na legs/_gal te ma rnyed na de bzhin byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/tha na khyim pa'i gos la yang byin gyis brlab par bya ste/_
[\[49a.7\]]'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong dag cig gding ba med par yul gzhan du 'dong ba dang /_der dong ba de rnams 'gyod par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngas chos gos gsum dang bral bar ni gsungs kyi/_gding ba dang ni ma yin te/_de lta bas na bsams bzhin du bzhag ste 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/brjed pa la ni ltung ba med do//_//sdom ni/_chu tshags la ni rnam 
[\[49b.2\]]bzhi dang /_/sder rnams dang ni gcig tu za/_/gos gcig gis ni za ba dang /_/sgren mor khrus ni byed pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/lho lam nas dge slong bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 
[\[49b.3\]]'tshal ba gnyis shig mnyan yod du dong ngo /_/de gnyis lam du chu zad nas skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa na rdzing bu zhig gi drung du phyin nas de gnyis las gcig gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis myur du chu rtogs shig dang btung ngo /_/des brtag par brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na chu ma 
[\[49b.4\]]dag par gyur nas des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_bskal pa 'bum phrag stong dag tu/_/gang zhig mthong bar rab dka' bas/_/bdag gis chu dag 'thungs nas ni/_/de nas 'dren pa blta bar bya/_/cig shos kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_gang zhig sems can rnams la thugs 
[\[49b.5\]]nas thugs rje zhing /_/srid pa kun la chags pa gtan nas spangs gyur pa/_/de yi bstan mchog 'di la bslab pa blang ba yis/_/srog nyid spang gi srog chags gsad par bya ba min/_/de nas gang gis chu 'thungs pa de ni song ngo /_/gang gis ma 'thungs pa des ni brtson 'grus brtsams te/_shing ljon pa zhig 
[\[49b.6\]]gi drung du 'dug nas/_de ji srid du lus kyi mthu yod pa de srid du dge ba'i phyogs dag byas shing gang gi tshe lus kyi mthu dang bral ba de'i tshe 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/lha'i bu'am/_lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid ni skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye 
[\[49b.7\]]ste/_gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_gang du skyes pa dang /_las gang gis skyes pa'o/_/des mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas pas skyes par mthong ngo /_/de nas sngon dge slong lha'i 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]bu de 'di snyam du sems te/_gang gi phyir bdag yongs su gnas pa bsten te bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyis bdag yongs su gnas pa ma bsten pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_
[\[50a.2\]]bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas sngon dge slong lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor g.yo zhing dri ma med pa thogs te/_do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba dag gis thu ba bkang ste kha 
[\[50a.3\]]dog shin tu 'das pas mtshan mo la bab pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_'di ltar sngon dge slong lha'i bu'i kha dog 
[\[50a.4\]]gi mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dge slong lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_gang thos nas sngon dge slong lha'i bus stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig 
[\[50a.5\]]tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad 
[\[50a.6\]]pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis 
[\[50a.7\]]kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go zhes 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/yang smras pa/_khyod mthus rab dregs nyes pa mang ldan pa'i/_/ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i/_/mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur/_/shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag 
[\[50b.2\]]gis ni/_/de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing /_/go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar gyur/_/'gro ba lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po/_/srid pa stong du mthong ba rab dkon pa/_/thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras 
[\[50b.3\]]bu mchis/_/de nas gdud byas do shal rab 'phyang bas/_/zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas/_/dgra thul g.yas nas yongs su bskor byas te/_/lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song /_/de nas sngon dge slong lha'i bu tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /_zhing pa lo tog 'byor pa 
[\[50b.4\]]lta bu dang /_dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang /_nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar ba lta bur gyur te/_cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/dge slong cig shos de yang khad kyis mnyan yod du phyin to/_/
[\[50b.5\]]de nas lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab ste/_rkang pa dag bkrus nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nyid kyis dge slong glo bur du 'ongs 
[\[50b.6\]]pa la dge slong khyod da gzod gang nas 'dir 'ongs/_dbyar gang du gnas zhes yang dag par dga' bas yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa yin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la khyod ga las 'dir 'ongs/_dbyar gang du gnas zhes yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa dang /_des gsol pa/_
[\[50b.7\]]btsun pa bdag lho phyogs nas da gzod 'dir mchis te/_lho phyogs su dbyar gnas lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong khyod la grogs dge slong lta yod dam/_bcom ldan 'das mchis so/_/de gar song /_des ji ltar gyur pa gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_nga yi bstan la ma gus gang /_/des ni nga mthong ci zhig phan/_/des ni nga la bltas na yang /_/mthong ba ma yin mchod pa min/_/nga yi bslab la gang slob pa'i/_/dge slong des ni nga mthong ste/_/shes rab dman pa khyod kyis 
[\[51a.2\]]ni/_/sangs rgyas mngon sum ma mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku las bla gos phye nas yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_ltos shig dge slong lus 'di la/_/gtsang zhing gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/_/sngon gyi las kyi rnam smin dang /_/pha dang ma las byung ba'o/_/gang 
[\[51a.3\]]gis chos nyid ma mthong ba/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des ma mthong /_/gang gis chos nyid mthong gyur pa/_/de yis thub pa chen po mthong /_/gzhan yang brtan zhing dge ba'i blo gros can/_/bslab pa rjes su srung byed pa/_/de yis dang por nga la ni/_/gzugs kyi sku dang chos skur mthong /_/
[\[51a.4\]]bdag nyid chen po 'od srung gi/_/bslab mtshams 'das pa da rung du/_/e la'i 'dab de klu yi ni/_/skye gnas dag las ma thar to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams chu tshags mi 'chang ba las gyur gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis 
[\[51a.5\]]chu tshags nye bar gzhag par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chu tshags nye bar gzhag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag chu tshags du yod mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chu tshags ni lnga ste/_chu tshags gru gsum dang /_bum tshags 
[\[51a.6\]]lce'u can dang /_ril ba zhabs tshags can dang /_dpyangs tshags dang /_bsal tshags rnams so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na dge slong phan tshun zhe 'gras pa gnyis shig 
[\[51a.7\]]ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo /_/de dag las gcig la ni chu tshags yod/_cig shos la ni med do/_/gang la yod pa des chu btsags te 'thungs pa dang /_gang la med pa des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa chu tshags g.yor cig des ma ster nas de phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis zhe 'gras pa dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/gal te de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na gcig la gcig bzod pa gsol te 'dong bar bya'o//_//'dul ba phran tshegs 
[\[51b.2\]]kyi gzhi/_bam po lnga pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na dge slong gnyis zhig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang /_de dag las gcig la ni chu tshags yod/_cig shos la ni med nas de la des 
[\[51b.3\]]dris pa/_khyod la chu tshags yod dam med/_des smras pa yod do/_/sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes ni ma smras so/_/de dag las gang chu tshags yod pa des ni chu 'thungs pa dang /_gang la med pa des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa chu tshags g.yor cig_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis bdag la chu 
[\[51b.4\]]tshags ni dris kyi sbyin nam mi sbyin ma dris pas ma gus pa khyod la kho bos chu tshags ci'i phyir sbyin/_mi sbyin gyis song shig_/des de la ma byin pas de phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'gro bar 'dod pa'i dge 
[\[51b.5\]]slong gis gal te chu tshags med na dge slong grogs po la khyod la chu tshags yod dam med dri bar bya'o/_/gal te yod do zhes zer na bdag la sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes brjod par bya zhing gal te sbyin no zhes zer na 'gro bar bya'i gzhan du na 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 
[\[51b.6\]]tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na dge slong gnyis shig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo /_/de dag las gcig la ni chu tshags yod/_cig shos la ni med pa dang /_gang la med pa des de la dris pa/_khyod la chu tshags yod dam med/_des smras pa/_yod do/_/bdag la g.yar 
[\[51b.7\]]ram mi g.yar/_g.yar ro/_/de dag dong ba dang ji tsam na lam kar 'gron pa dag cig 'ongs nas gang la chu tshags yod pa de'i bya ba gang yin pa de 'gron pa de nyid las grub ste/_de phyir ldog par brtsams pa dang /_cig shos des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis bdag la chu tshags khas blangs pa g.yor cig_/
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]des smras pa/_de lta na de ni bden na bdag gis chu btsag pa'i slad du byin gyi/_thams cad kyi thams cad du byin pa ni ma yin no zhes des ma byin pas de phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[52a.2\]]gang la chu tshags med pa des dge slong grogs po la khyod la chu tshags yod dam med ces dri bar bya'o/_/gal te yod do zhes zer na des ji bdag la sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te sbyin no zhes zer na gal te khyod slar ldog par gyur tam/_gzhan du 'gro bar gyur na sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes brjod 
[\[52a.3\]]par bya'o/_/gal te sbyin no zhes zer na 'gro bar bya'i gzhan du na 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa chu 
[\[52a.4\]]tshags ma mchis par gtsug lag khang gzhan nam/_grong gzhan du mchir gnang ngam/_nye ba 'khor mi gnang ngo /_/gal te der song nas phongs par mi 'gyur na gnang ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/
[\[52a.5\]]de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa chu tshags gcig gis gnyis ljongs rgyu zhing mchir gnang ngam/_nye ba 'khor gal te der song nas phongs par mi 'gyur na gnang ngo /_/btsun pa chu tshags gcig gis mang po rnams sam/_dge 'dun dag ljongs 
[\[52a.6\]]rgyu zhing mchir gnang ngam/_nye ba 'khor gal te der song nas phongs par mi 'gyur na gnang ngo /_/btsun pa chu tshags ma mchis par chu klung gi 'gram nas mchir gnang ngam/_nye ba 'khor gnang ste/_mgyogs pa la gal te chu gzhan dang 'dres par ma gyur na rgyang grags re re zhing brtag par bya'o/_/
[\[52a.7\]]chu gzhan dang 'dres par gyur na gang dang gang du len pa de dang der brtag par bya'o/_/mi mgyogs pa la ni 'gram dang 'gram du brtag par bya'o/_/de la mgyogs pa ni rgyun myur ba'o/_/mi mgyogs pa ni rgyun bul ba'o/_/btsun pa 'gram gyi nye 'khor gang lags/_nye ba 'khor 'dom 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]gang kho ra khor yug go/_/btsun pa chab ma btsags shing ma brtags pa 'tshal du gnang ngam/_nye ba 'khor mi gnang ngo /_/btsun pa chab ma btsags shing brtags pa 'tshal du gnang ngam/_nye ba 'khor mig gis dag go zhes bya ste gnang ngo /_/btsun pa chab btsags shing 
[\[52b.2\]]brtags pa 'tshal du gnang ngam/_nye ba 'khor gnang ngo /_/'on kyang chu rung ba ni lnga ste/_dge 'dun gyis rung ba dang /_gang zag gis rung ba dang /_chu tshags kyis rung ba dang /_chu mig gis rung ba dang /_khron pas rung ba'o/_/de la dge 'dun gyis rung ba ni gang dge 'dun 
[\[52b.3\]]mthun pas bskos pa'i dge slong gis chu btsags par gyur pa ste/_dge 'dun gyis rung ba de la dge slong gis longs spyad par bya'o/_/gang zag gis rung ba ni dge slong gang tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang /_lta ba ma nyams pa dang /_spyod pa ma nyams pa dang /_'tsho ba ma nyams pas 
[\[52b.4\]]yongs su dag par gyur pa ste/_gang zag gis rung ba de la dge slong gis longs spyad par bya'o/_/chu tshags kyis rung ba ni chu tshags gang nam yang ma dag pa ma yin pa des btsags pa ste/_btung bar bya'o/_/chu mig gis rung ba ni 'bab pa'o/_/khron pas rung ba ni khron pa gang gi chu dag 
[\[52b.5\]]pa de las nyi ma nub kar blangs nas ji srid nyi ma shar gyi bar du ste/_khron pas rung ba'i chu btung bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams ha cang yun ring du chu rtog pas 'khrul pa mthong bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_glang drug gi shing rta smyig mas bkang ba 'khor ba tsam mam/_ji 
[\[52b.6\]]tsam gyis yid ches pa de tsam du brtag par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dge slong rnams la sder spyad dag 'bul bar byed pa na dge slong rnams mi len 
[\[52b.7\]]to/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe ni mu stegs can dag yon gnas lags/_da ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bas khyed yon gnas lags te/_gal te khyed kyis mi bzhes na ci 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]bdag cag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du dge ba'i lam rgyags ma mchis par 'chi'am bzhes shig_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi phyir sder spyad dag 
[\[53a.2\]]blang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi phyir sder spyad dag blang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de dag blangs nas mdzod du bcug ste bzhag nas de bzhin du lhung bzed dag tu za ba dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis 
[\[53a.3\]]mthong ste smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag cag gis sder spyad phul ba de dag mi gda' na/_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag mdzod na 'dug go/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag ci bdag cag gi khyim na gnas ma mchis te/_bdag cag gis khyed la 
[\[53a.4\]]phul lam/_yongs su longs spyad na bdag cag la yongs su longs spyad pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i bsod nams su 'gyur ba zhig na khyed kyis kyang mdzod du bcug pa lta/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbyin 
[\[53a.5\]]bdag gis byin pa'i sder spyad dag yongs su longs spyad par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin bdag gis byin pa'i sder spyad dag yongs su longs spyad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis yongs su longs spyad par brtsams so/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag gzhan 
[\[53a.6\]]rgya chen po la mos pa de dag gis sder spyad tshad chen po dag phul ba dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams de dag 'khru bas ngal bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sder spyad kyi zhal ta ba bsko bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sder spyad kyi zhal ta ba 
[\[53a.7\]]bsko bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_bye brag med par bskos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos lnga dang ldan pa'i sder spyad kyi zhal ta ba ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya/_bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya ste lnga gang zhe na 'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_sder spyad brims pa dang ma brims pa dag mi shes pa'o/_/chos lnga dang ldan pa'i sder spyad kyi zhal ta ba ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya/_bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis ma yin pa dang /_gti mug gis ma 
[\[53b.2\]]yin pa dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_sder spyad brims pa dang ma brims pa dag shes pa'o/_/bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas ma la bshams nas/_gaN+DI brdungs te/_dris pa'i tshig gis dge 'dun rnams la bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'dug pa dang /_re 
[\[53b.3\]]zhig dang por spro ba bya ste/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi sder spyad 'brim par bsko bar spro'am gal te spro na des spro'o zhes smra bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi 
[\[53b.4\]]ba 'di dge 'dun gyi sder spyad 'brim par spro ste/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sder spyad kyi zhal ta bar bskos te/_sder spyad kyi zhal ta ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi sder spyad 'brim par 
[\[53b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la sder spyad 'brim par spro ste/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sder spyad kyi zhal ta bar bsko zhing sder spyad kyi zhal ta 
[\[53b.6\]]ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la sder spyad 'brim par 'gyur na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sder spyad kyi zhal ta bar bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas sder spyad kyi zhal ta ba 
[\[53b.7\]]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la sder spyad dag 'brim par 'gyur te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge slong rnams kyis zas zos nas lhag mas 'bags bzhin du de nyid la byin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lhag mas 'bags pa dag lhan 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas rnams kyis bkru bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag mas 'bags pa dag lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas rnams kyis bkru bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong gzhan dag cig la 'khor med nas de dag bdag nyid 
[\[54a.2\]]'khru bar byed pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag ni sder spyad kyi zhal ta ba dag kho nas bkru bar bya zhing de dag gis kyang de dag la sbyin par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs 
[\[54a.3\]]so/_/drug sde rnams lhung bzed nag po gcig tu cig char bza' bar brtsams nas de drug car gyis mnyam du lag pa bcug pa dang /_lhung bzed lag pa la thogs te de 'phyang bar gyur pa dang /_de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag lhung bzed nag po cho 'phrul byed pa la ltos/_de dag gis lag 
[\[54a.4\]]pa drangs te lhung nas chag pa dang /_de dag gis rta gad kyis btab pa dge slong rnams kyis mthong ste de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di lta bu mi mdzes pa byas nas gnong ste 'dug par bya ba yin na/_khyed dgod pa lta/_de dag gis smras pa/_ci byas chang 'thungs sam kun 
[\[54a.5\]]dong zos/_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa dang /_ci de yang byed dam/_gzhan ci byas/_lhung bzed nag po ma bcag gam/_'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/_ci rdza mkhan shi'am/_'jim pa med dam/_gzhan byar zad mod/_de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /_skabs 
[\[54a.6\]]de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams gcig tu za ba las gyur gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis gcig tu bza' bar mi bya'o/_/za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[54a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis gcig tu bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag cig 'gron pa dang /_thabs cig chas pa 'gron pa phyogs gcig tu zan bza' bar brtsams pa na dge slong de dag thams cad la sder spyad dag mi bdog ste/_de dag re re 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]nas zan za ba la ring zhig thogs nas 'gron pa thal ba dang /_chom po dag gis bcom mo/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lam du zhugs pa na gal te sder spyad dag ma rnyed na gcig tu bza' bar bya ste/_
[\[54b.2\]]lag pa ni re re nas gzhug par bya zhing dbyung bar bya'i cig car du ma yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lam du zhugs pa na gal te sder spyad dag ma rnyed na gcig tu bza' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de na dge tshul gang dag 'khod pa de dag dang lhan cig gcig tu za bar byed pas nyes 
[\[54b.3\]]dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lhung bzed bzung la de dag dang lhan cig bza' bar bya'o/_/rung ba byed pa gzhan dag cig yod pa de dag zan za ba na 'gron pa rnams dang bral nas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[54b.4\]]pa/_gong bur sgongs la byin cig_/dge slong gzhan dag cig gnyen gyi khyim du song ba dang /_gnyen dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag lhan cig zos nas ring zhig lon pas zan lhan cig bzas tshur/_de dag gis smras pa/_khyed ni khyim pa/_bdag cag ni rab tu byung ba yin pas 
[\[54b.5\]]bzar mi rung ngo /_/de dag mi dga' nas mchi mas brnangs shing 'dug go/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te yang dang yang du don du gnyer na gdon mi za bar dus kyis 'chu bar shes nas gang 
[\[54b.6\]]du gzhan dag gis mthong na mi mdzes par mi 'gyur ba der sder spyad bzung la bza' bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde rnams gos gcig 
[\[54b.7\]]pu dang bsod snyoms za ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas dris pa/_shes ldan dag zan za ba 'di dag su zhig_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_dge sbyong shAkya'i bu yin no/_/de dag 'phya zhing shes ldan dag ston pa ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa de lta bu la ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]dang bral ba 'di dag lta bu ga la yod ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams gos gcig gon pa las gyur gyis de bas na dge slong gis gos gcig 
[\[55a.2\]]dang zan bza' bar mi bya'o/_/za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gos gcig dang zan bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_rgan po rgan te nyam chung ba dang /_nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa dag chos gos rnams gyon te zan bza' bar mi nus nas/_
[\[55a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gis rngul zan 'jam po dang /_zan bza' bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/'on kyang gzhan dag cig gis ma nus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gis phyogs dben par bza' bar bya ste/_'di 
[\[55a.4\]]la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde rnams chu bo dregs ldan la gcer bur khrus byed pa bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas dris pa/_shes ldan dag 
[\[55a.5\]]gcer bu pa khrus byed pa 'di dag su zhig gzhan dag gis smras pa/_dge slong shAkya'i bu yin no/_/de dag 'phya zhing shes ldan dag ston pa ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa de lta bu la ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang bral ba 'di lta bu dag ga la yod ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom 
[\[55a.6\]]ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams sgren mor khrus byed pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis sgren mor khrus mi bya'o/_/byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang khrus ras bcang 
[\[55a.7\]]bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khrus ras bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams nyis sbyar 'chang nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chig rkyang bcang bar bya ste/_gang la nyis sbyar yod pa des ni chu brtags la bkru bar bya'o/_/chos gos 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]gsum pa rnams mi rung ngo snyam nas mi 'chang ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de rnams kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs te bcang bar bya'o/_/gzhan dag cig gis khrus ras ma rnyed pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang dag gis khrus ras ma rnyed pas 
[\[55b.2\]]lo ma dag gis mdun dang rgyab nas g.yogs te/_phyogs dben pa gang na gzhan dag gis mthong nas ma dad par mi 'gyur bar khrus bya'o/_/dge slong rnams khrus ras gcus te de dag 'gyod par gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ras chig rkyang la ni srog chags dag 
[\[55b.3\]]med mod kyi 'on kyang ras bshal nas gcu bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//_//sdom ni/_mon sran gre'u dang mi rung ba'i/_/sa dang bskyugs shing za ba dang /_/bdams shing zas ni za ba dang /_/'gyod dang khar ba'i lhung bzed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na 
[\[55b.4\]]rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nam gru gang ci la yang khu phrig za ba cig pas de'i ming nam gru khu phrig can nam gru khu phrig can zhes bya bar chags so/_/de dus gzhan zhig na chab khung sar zhugs pa dang /_des de na mon sran gre'u'i 
[\[55b.5\]]zhal lu zhig mthong nas de yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa skyes pa bdag gis sa bon gyi chos ma rung bar byas so snyam mo/_/ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge 'dun la mon sran gre'u'i bza' ba dag cig grub pa de mi za bar lhung bzed bkab ste 'dug pa dang /_lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas 
[\[55b.6\]]dag gis smras pa/_mkhan po dge 'dun la mon sran gre'u'i bza' ba dag byung ba ci'i slad du mi gsol/_des smras pa/_bu dag kho bos sa bon gyi chos ma rung bar byas so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_mkhan po ji lta bu zhig bgyis/_des ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang /_de dag gis kyang mi 
[\[55b.7\]]bza' bar brtsams so/_/de dag la 'grogs bshes rnams kyis dris pa/_ci'i phyir mi za/_de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang /_de 'khor mang po can zhig pas de la brten nas dge 'dun thams cad kyis ma zos so/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sa bon gyi rigs tshos dka' ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de yang rlangs pa byung na tshos so zhes byas nas bza' bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal 
[\[56a.2\]]byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa mi rung ba'i sa nas shing 'khrungs la rung ba'i sar 'bras bu lhags na yongs su longs spyad par bgyi'am/_yongs su longs spyad 
[\[56a.3\]]par mi bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nye ba 'khor yongs su longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/btsun pa re zhig mi rung ba'i sa nas shing 'khrungs la mi rung ba'i sar 'bras bu dag lhags na yongs su longs spyad par bgyi 'am/_yongs su longs spyad par mi bgyi/_nye ba 'khor 
[\[56a.4\]]yongs su longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/btsun pa re zhig rung ba'i sa nas shing 'khrungs la mi rung ba'i sar 'bras bu dag lhags na yongs su longs spyad par bgyi'am/_yongs su longs spyad par mi bgyi/_nye ba 'khor gal te zhag tu ma lon na yongs su longs spyad par bya'o/_/btsun pa re zhig 
[\[56a.5\]]rung ba'i sa nas shing 'khrungs la rung ba'i sar 'bras bu dag lhags na yongs su longs spyad par bgyi 'am/_yongs su longs spyad par mi bgyi/_nye ba 'khor yongs su longs spyad par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi 
[\[56a.6\]]kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na bram ze zhig gnas pa des slong mo btab pas glang zhig rnyed do/_/de'i 'og tu ba zhig rnyed do/_/de'i 'og tu yang glang zhig rnyed do/_/de'i 'og tu yang ba zhig rnyed de de'i ba lang khyu longs par gyur to/_/bram ze des thog mar rnyed pa'i glang la bkra shis kyi 
[\[56a.7\]]blo byung nas/_glang de yan du btang ngo /_/dus gzhan zhig na de rgas 'khogs nyam chung bar gyur te/_de chu 'dod nas chu bo dregs ldan gyi 'gram du song ba las 'dam du song ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang lam der song ba las/_des de mthong nas bsams pa/_glang 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba lta 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]cung zad yod dam snyam pa dang /_yod par mthong ngo /_/su la rag las snyam pa dang /_bdag kho na la ste/_des 'dam nas phyung nas lag pas phyis so/_/de nas bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi 
[\[56b.2\]]ba'o zhes chos tshig gsum bshad de nga la dad par yang gyis shig dang /_de lta na byol song gi skye gnas las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas song ngo /_/de yang wa dag gis zos pa dang /_de wa dag gis za ba'i tshe bsams pa/_gal te 'phags pa de 'dir ma phyin na bdag 'di 
[\[56b.3\]]'dra ba'i gnas skabs su mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la sems mngon par dang bar byas nas dus las 'das te/_mnyan yod na bram ze las drug la brtson pa'i rigs zhig tu skyes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus glang de'i gnas skabs de ji lta bu zhig yin bsams pa 
[\[56b.4\]]dang /_ji tsam na dus las 'das par mthong ngo /_/yang gar skyes bsams pa dang /_mnyan yod nyid du bram ze las drug la brtson pa'i rigs su skyes par mthong nas de khyim der yang dang yang du song zhing des bram ze de chung ma dang bcas te skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la 
[\[56b.5\]]bkod do/_/de dus gzhan zhig na phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul med par song ba dang /_bram ze des smras pa/_'phags pa ci phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul mi mnga' 'am/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul dag rtswa ku sha las bzung ba 'am/_rtswa ku sha 
[\[56b.6\]]la bzung bas 'byung ngam/_khyod lta bu las rnyed pa gang yin pa de kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul du 'gyur mod/_'phags pa bdag gi mchis 'brang 'di la sems can zhugs te gal te khye'ur btsas na de khyod kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul bgyi'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nad med cig blangs so zhes 
[\[56b.7\]]smras nas song ngo /_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas bu ba lang gi sha tshugs lta bu zhig btsas pa dang /_de'i nye du rnams lhags te 'dus nas zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u'i ming cir gdags/_nye du rnams kyis 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]smras pa/_gang gi phyir khye'u 'di sha tshugs ba lang dang 'dra ba'i de'i phyir khye'u'i ming ba lang bdag tu gdags so zhes ming ba lang bdag ces bya bar btags so/_/de bskyed bsrings nas chen por gyur pa dang /_de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos 
[\[57a.2\]]lhung bzed thogs te/_mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/_/mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na des bram ze de'i khyim du phyin pa dang /_bram ze des byon pa legs so zhes bya ba'i smra ba kun du spyad nas rkang pa la phyag byas so/_/chung mas kyang de la bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang 
[\[57a.3\]]zhing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste phul lo/_/khye'u de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du lta nas des bram ze la brda byas pa dang /_des khye'u de la smras pa/_bu khyod ngas ma btsas pa nas 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul du phul gyis 'phags pa dang lhan cig song shig_/sems 
[\[57a.4\]]can de srid pa tha ma pa zhig ste/_de'i phyi bzhin song ba dang /_des de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/_gdams ngag byin no/_/des 'bad brtsal bsgrims pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang /_mi g.yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rtogs nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad chos nyid kyis 
[\[57a.5\]]'jig pa ltung ba/_'gyes pa/_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can du bsgoms te nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/_sems gser dang bong bar mtshungs pa/_tsan dan dang ste'ur 'dra ba/_nam mkha' 
[\[57a.6\]]dang lag mthil du mnyam pa/_ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang /_phyag 
[\[57a.7\]]bya ba dang /_gus par smra bar bya ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to/_/de la las las skyes pa'i mid pa gnyis yod de/_gcig nas ni skyugs pa 'byin to/_/cig shos nas ni mid do/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ma yin pa'i zas kyi bslab pa ma bcas pa de'i tshe ni bskyugs shing 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]mid do/_/gang gi tshe bcas pa de'i tshe ni bskyugs shing 'dor bas de lus rke/_nyam chung /_shig shig po/_rod nyams par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/_kun 
[\[57b.2\]]dga' bo ba lang bdag ci'i phyir lus rke/_nyam chung /_shig shig po/_rod nyams par gyur/_des ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gang la las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i mid pa gnyis grub pa des skyugs pa lan gnyis 
[\[57b.3\]]sam/_gsum bor te kha bkrus nas lhag ma mid par bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/dge slong rnams zas zos nas bskyugs te de dag 'gyod par gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te dge slong gzhan zhig zan zos te skyugs na des kha bkru bar bya ste/_'di 
[\[57b.4\]]la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag rab tu byung ba de'i tshe bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya smod/_kha zer zhing dge sbyong shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul nyams shing tshangs pa'i tshul nyams te/_da ni ba lang bdag la sogs pa 'jigs 'jigs lta 
[\[57b.5\]]rnams kyang rab tu 'byin to zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyan thos chen po ri rab dang 'dra ba la skye bo'i tshogs phal po che ma dad par byed kyis/_de lta bas na ba lang bdag yul dbus su gnas su mi 
[\[57b.6\]]gzhug go snyam nas/_tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag la bka' stsal pa/_ba lang bdag khyod deng phyin chad yul dbus na ma gnas par mtha' 'khob kyi gnas mal dag sten cig_/btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas mnyan 
[\[57b.7\]]yod nas mi snang bar gyur te/_shing shir sha ka'i gzhal med khang stong par 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong ba lang 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]bdag 'di yin no/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas sha tshugs ba lang lta bur gyur lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[58a.2\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ba lang bdag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa/_tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_chu bo bzhin nye bar gnas pa nges par myong bar 'gyur ba yin te/_ba lang bdag nyid kyis byas pa'i las rnams gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 
[\[58a.3\]]'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la ma yin/_me'i khams la ma yin/_rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/_'on kyang las dge ba dang /_mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_skye 
[\[58a.4\]]mched dang /_khams dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang /_/las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri 
[\[58a.5\]]thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste de'i 
[\[58a.6\]]bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung bar gyur to/_/dge slong gang gis rab tu byung ba de rgas 'khogs nyam chung ba zhig ste/_des de'i lhung bzed 'khru ba na dge slong gzhan zhig dang lhan cig kha ton zer ba las ring zhig thogs nas de'i mkhan po des rang dgar zan zos pa dang /_de kha ton la chags pas mkhan 
[\[58a.7\]]po de las 'phyas so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na zan zos nas bdag nyid kyi lhung bzed bkrus te mkhan po'i drung du song ba dang /_da dung zan za ba mthong nas de kun nas dkris pas smras pa/_mkhan po ci khyod glang rgan bzhin du ldad cing bzhugs sam/_des bsams pa/_'di kun nas 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]dkris pas gal te cung zad cig smras na/_je thu bar 'khrug pa skyed par 'gyur gyis gang gi tshe 'di kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de'i tshe dri bar bya'o snyam nas/_des de kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba dang smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa ci zer/_des smras pa/_khyod glang rgan bzhin ldad dam zhes de skad 
[\[58b.2\]]mchi mod/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis nga su yin shes sam/_'tshal te khyod kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ba lags la/_bdag kyang de kho na'i gsung rab la rab tu byung ba lags so/_/des smras pa/_de ni de lta 
[\[58b.3\]]yin te bden na 'on kyang rab tu byung bas bya ba 'am byed pa gang yin pa de ngas byas te/_de lta bas na nga ni 'ching ba thams cad las grol ba yin/_khyod ni 'ching ba mtha' dag gis bcings pa yin na khyod kyis ngag gi las rtsub mo smras kyis/_khyod kyis las de ci nas kyang bsrabs pa 
[\[58b.4\]]nyid dang /_yongs su zad pa nyid dang /_yongs su gtugs par 'gyur bar nyes pa la nyes par shogs shig_/des nyes pa la nyes par bshags so/_/gang 'dis dge slong dgra bcom pa la glang rgan zhes bya ba'i smra ba kun du spyod pa kun du spyad pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 
[\[58b.5\]]tshe rabs lnga brgyar ba lang gi skye gnas su skyes so/_/las kyi lhag ma de nyid kyis da ltar sha tshugs ba lang lta bur skyes so/_/yang dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par 
[\[58b.6\]]smin pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu lung bstan lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang gis so/_/gang du smon lam btab lags/_'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung de kho na'i 
[\[58b.7\]]gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur te/_der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par ma gyur to/_/gang gi thad du rab tu byung ba de ni bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu lung bstan to/_/de na 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]'dis smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung gi thad du tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par ma gyur gyis/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bcom 
[\[59a.2\]]ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la/_bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'i gsung rab 
[\[59a.3\]]la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur zhing /_ji ltar bdag gis mkhan po bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin 
[\[59a.4\]]du bdag kyang shAkya'i rgyal po shAkya thub pa des bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu ston par gyur cig_/smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bstan to/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig 
[\[59a.5\]]tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag la/_gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar/_'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang 'dren ma rnams spangs nas las gcig tu dkar ba dag la brtsal bar bya ste/_
[\[59a.6\]]dge slong dag gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde rnams 'di byin cig_/'di las byin cig ces 'dam zhing 'dam zhing zas za ba dang 'drim pa 'khrugs par 
[\[59a.7\]]gyur nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis bdams shing zas bza' bar mi bya ste/_za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong rnams zas za ba na lhung bzed bzed pa las de lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i steng du lhung lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzed pa las lhung bzed du lhung nas de rnams 'gyod de mi za ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[59b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag lhung bzed bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i steng du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya/_lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi nang du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya/_lhung bzed bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi nang du lhung na byin 
[\[59b.3\]]len byas pa zhes bya/_lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i nang du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya ste/_'on kyang byin len gyi sems ni nye bar gzhag par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra 
[\[59b.4\]]ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo khar ba'i mgar ba'i drung du song nas des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khar ba'i lhung bzed cig bya na nus sam/_des smras pa/_'phags pa 'di nyid bdag gi bzo lags kyis tshad ji tsam zhig bgyi/_chen por bya'o/_/'phags pa khyod 
[\[59b.5\]]la khar ba'i lhung bzed chen po ci 'tshal/_bkren pa khyod ci rin med par byed du 'jug snyam mam/_rin thang sbyin gyis byos shig_/des bsams pa/_'di la bdag gi khar ba ci zhig 'god bya'o snyam nas des de'i khar ba'i lhung bzed chen po zhig byas so/_/des smras pa/_gang 
[\[59b.6\]]'di'i nang du chud pa gzhan zhig kyang gyis shig_/des gzhan yang byas so/_/de bzhin du gzhan gang yin pa bdun pa'i bar du byas nas de rnams tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bos dge tshul 'khrur bcug ste/_tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa las dra ba byed du bcug nas de rnams der bcug ste/_
[\[59b.7\]{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bshams nas dge tshul gyi mgo la bskur te gang du mgron du bos pa der 'gro'o/_/son nas de dag bkram ste 'dug pa dang /_khyim bdag dang bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa ci khyod kyis khar ba'i mgar ba'i zong bkram mam/_des smras pa/_bkren pa 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]khyed ci shes/_'dir ni re zhig phye dag blang ngo /_/'dir ni snum khur dag go/_/'dir ni 'bras chan dag go/_/gzhan rnams su ni tshod ma dag blang ngo /_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa gal te de lta na ko res 'ga' tshod ma mang po dag 'byung bas gzhan dag dang 
[\[60a.2\]]gzhan dag kyang nye bar gzhag dgos so zhes byas pa dang /_de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams khar ba'i lhung bzed 'chang ba las gyur 
[\[60a.3\]]gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis khar ba'i lhung bzed bcang bar mi bya'o/_/'chang na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/kha gzar dang /_tshwa khug dang /_phul ba'i btung phor ni ma gtogs so//_//sdom ni/_rkang pa bkru ba bkag pa dang /_/shol zangs dag ni gnang ba dang /_/de bzhin bsil 
[\[60a.4\]]yab nyid dang ni/_/sbrang ma rnams la g.yab pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong rnams bab bab tu rkang pa 'khru ba der sbrang bu dag gis gang bar 'dug go/_/ji tsam na bram ze dang 
[\[60a.5\]]khyim bdag gtsug lag khang ltar 'ongs pa de dag gis mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa sbrang bu za zi mchi bas gang ba'i phyogs 'di ci zhig_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag cag gis 'dir rkang pa bkrus so/_/de dag 'phya ste/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni gtsang 
[\[60a.6\]]sbra med de bab bab tu rkang pa 'khru'o zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rkang pa bab bab tu bkru bar mi bya'i/_'on kyang gnas khang gi steng shar lho'i mtshams su rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[60a.7\]]'das kyis rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ru sbal lta bur bya'o/_/rab tu 'jam par byed pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rtsub por bya'o/_/dge slong rgas 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]pa 'khogs pa nyam chung ba de dag phyogs der 'gro mi nus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gi gyo mo nye bar gzhag par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams gyo mor 'khru ba na de chag nas ji ma rung bar gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shol zangs nye bar gzhag 
[\[60b.2\]]par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis shol zangs nye bar gzhag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel las byas pa'i shol zangs dag nye bar bzhag go/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa 'di ci zhig_/
[\[60b.3\]]de rnams kyis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag bcom ldan 'das kyis shol zangs gnang ngo /_/'phags pa ci dge sbyong khyed 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gnod dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_khyed kyi mgrin par rdog pas mnan to/_/de dag 'phya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[60b.4\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_shel dang /_bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i shol zangs dag nye bar gzhag par mi bya ste/_'on kyang 'jim pa las byas pa'i shol zangs nye bar gzhag par bya'o/_/rnga mo lta bu nye bar gzhag pa dang /_de ldeg nas bcom ldan 
[\[60b.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_glang po che'i rkang pa lta bur bya zhing de'i dbus su 'bur ka dam pa'i me tog lta bur bya'o/_/shin tu 'jam por byas pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rtsub por bya'o/_/dge slong rnams shol zangs bab bab tu 'jog nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[60b.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi ni khang tog tu khas phub la zhog cig_/gang zag dag gi ni gnas khang gi sgo lkog tu zhog cig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul kau shAm+bI na sgra len gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dpyid kyi dus la bab nas dge slong rnams tsha bas rmya ste/_de dag 
[\[60b.7\]]lus skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rke/_nyam chung /_shig shig po/_rod nyams par gyur pa khyim bdag dang /_bram ze rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa khyed ci'i slad du lus skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rke/_nyam chung shig shig po/_rod nyams par gyur/_de dag gis 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed bsil yab mi 'chang ngam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/'phags pa dag khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/skabs de dge slong rnams
