[\[61a.2\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis bsil yab bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bsil yab bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis yu ba gser dang /_dngul dang /_shel dang /_
[\[61a.3\]]bai DUr+ya las byas pa bsrubs pa/_bkra ba dang /_nye bar bkra ba'i yu ba can gyi bsil yab dag bcangs pa dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas/_khyed kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan to zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de dag 'phya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom 
[\[61a.4\]]ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yu ba gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel las byas pa bsrubs pa bkra ba dang /_nye bar bkra ba'i yu ba can gyi bsil yab dag nye bar gzhag par mi bya'i/_'on kyang bsil yab gnyis po rtswa ba ru ta 
[\[61a.5\]]las byas pa dang /_shing ta la'i 'dab ma bcang bar bya'o/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la bsil yab rnam pa sna tshogs 'bul ba na zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dge 'dun gyi phyir bcang bar 
[\[61a.6\]]bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/_/dge slong rnams la sbrang ma dag za ste/_de dag gi lus sbrang mas zos pas 'brum bus gang ste/_de dag gis yang dang yang du phrugs pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis 
[\[61a.7\]]smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed ci'i phyir lus 'di ltar 'brum bus gang /_de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed sbrang yab mi 'chang ngam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/'phags pa dag khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis sbrang yab bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrang yab bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug 
[\[61b.2\]]sde rnams kyis yu ba gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel las byas pa dang /_rnga ma las byas pa'i sbrang yab dag nye bar gzhag pa dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/sbrang yab ni lnga ste/_bal las byas pa dang /_sha na las byas pa 
[\[61b.3\]]dang /_ras bal las byas pa dang /_ras ma dang /_lo ma sbams pa'o//_//sdom ni/_gos mdud pa dang lus dang ni/_/khar ba dra ba 'chang ba dang /_/sgog skya dag ni bkag pa dang /_/nad pa la ni gnang ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[61b.4\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis stongs mo bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de na dge slong gcig skas la 'dzeg pa na 'og na shing mkhan zhig 'dug pa des de mdoms dang ba mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa khyod skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan 
[\[61b.5\]]pas bdag gis pho lags par gdod 'tshal lo/_/de gnong nas cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams gos mdud pa ma bor ba nyid du skas la 'dzeg pa las 
[\[61b.6\]]gyur gyis de'i phyir dge slong mkhar len byed pa gos mdud pa bor nas mkhar len byed du gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong stongs mo byed pas gos mdud pa bor nas mkhar len bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis 
[\[61b.7\]]gos mdud pa bor nas mkhar len bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams gos mdud pa bor nas mkhar len byed pa na ma dad pa rnams 'phya ste/_'phags pa ci stobs 'gyed dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag mkhar len byed do/_/de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang dag skas la 'dzeg pa de dag gis mdud pa bor bar bya'i gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[62a.2\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde rnams lus kyis khur khyer ba dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams 'phya ste/_'phags pa bdag cag ni re zhig pha ma dang bu dang chung ma'i slad du khur thogs na khyed su'i slad du lus kyis khur bsnams/_de dag gis smras 
[\[62a.3\]]pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag bdag cag la yang ston pa mchod pa dang /_dge 'dun bshos gsol ba dang /_nad pa rnams kyi rim gro dang /_bya ba mang po yod do/_/de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[62a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis lus kyis khur bkur bar mi bya'o/_/khyer na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs so/_/dge slong rnams bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzeg cing 'bab pa na de dag gred cing rdeg 
[\[62a.5\]]'chos te snad par gyur to/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang /_de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyi khar ba bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis khar ba bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa 
[\[62a.6\]]dang /_drug sde rnams kyis gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel las byas pa'i khar ba bsrubs pa/_bkra ba nye bar bkra ba dag bcangs pa/_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[62a.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na gnyis kyis khar ba bcang bar bya ste/_rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba dang /_nad pa sbyor mi nus pas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis kyis khar ba bcang bar bya ste/_rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba dang /_nad pa sbyor mi bzod pas so zhes bka' stsal pa 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]dang /_rgan por gtogs pa dang /_nad par gtogs pa rnams kyang khar ba 'chang ba la zhugs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgan po dang nad pas dge 'dun la khar ba'i sdom pa gsol bar bya zhing /_gang la dge 'dun gyis khar ba'i sdom pa byin pa des khar ba bcang bar 
[\[62b.2\]]bya'o/_/gsol ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa dang /_dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/_nad pa sbyor mi bzod pas rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dug la thal mo 
[\[62b.3\]]sbyar te 'di skad ces smra bar bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las khar ba'i sdom pa gsol na/_dge 'dun thugs brtse ba can btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar 
[\[62b.4\]]bzung ste/_bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/_nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la khar ba'i sdom pa stsal du gsol/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun 
[\[62b.5\]]pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/_nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las khar ba'i sdom pa gsol te/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis 
[\[62b.6\]]dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/_nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la khar ba'i sdom pa stsal to/_/'di ni gsol pa'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/_nad pa sbyor mi bzod 
[\[62b.7\]]pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las khar ba'i sdom pa gsol te/_de'i slad du dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/_nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la khar ba'i sdom pa stsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/_nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la khar ba'i sdom pa stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/_nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la khar 
[\[63a.2\]]ba'i sdom pa stsal lags te 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/gang la dge 'dun gyis khar ba'i sdom pa byin pa des khar ba bcang bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po drug pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[63a.3\]]rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs so/_/dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams dang /_rlung nad can rnams bya rgod phung po'i ri la 'dzeg pa dang /_'bab pa na gred cid rdeg 'chos nas snad par yang gyur/_bya ma bum dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dag kyang chag go/_/skabs de dge 
[\[63a.4\]]slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis dra ba bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dra ba bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa las byas 
[\[63a.5\]]pa'i dra ba bcangs pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya bar byed do/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa las byas pa'i dra ba bcang bar mi bya'i 'on kyang tshon sna gcig pa las byas 
[\[63a.6\]]pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshon sna gcig las byas pa'i dra ba bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_rgas pas nyam chung bar gtogs pa rnams dang /_rlung nad can du gtogs pa rnams kyang dra ba 'chang ba la zhugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgan po dang rlung nad can gyis 
[\[63a.7\]]kyang dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol bar bya zhing /_gang la dge 'dun gyis dra ba'i sdom pa byin pa des dra ba bcang bar bya'o/_/gsol ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'dug pa dang /_dge slong 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/_rlung nad can gyis rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/_rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las dra ba'i 
[\[63b.2\]]sdom pa gsol na/_dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtse ba can rnams kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/_rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsal du gsol/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge 
[\[63b.3\]]slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/_rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang 
[\[63b.4\]]bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/_rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa gsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/_rlung 
[\[63b.5\]]nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/_rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/_rlung nad can ming 
[\[63b.6\]]'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba'am/_rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsal lags 
[\[63b.7\]]te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/gang la dge 'dun gyis dra ba'i sdom pa byin par gyur pa des dra ba bcang bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/dge slong gzhan dag cig la khar ba yang dgos/_dra ba yang dgos nas de dag la dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]khar ba dang /_dra ba'i sdom pa so sor byin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khar ba dang dra ba'i sdom pa cig car snga ma bzhin sbyin par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs 
[\[64a.2\]]so/_/mnyan yod na dge slong zhig 'dug pa des sgog skya zos nas/_de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dge slong 
[\[64a.3\]]khyod la chos bstan gyis rna ba gtod la 'dug cig_/des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan par brtsams te/_ji lta ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan pa de lta de ltar dge slong 
[\[64a.4\]]de bcom ldan 'das la dris gnod par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas kha logs shig tu lta'o/_/lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces dge slong dge slong khyod la chos bstan gyis rna gtod cig ces bka' stsal na/_dge slong de lan gnyis lan 
[\[64a.5\]]gsum du yang kha gzhan du bltas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[64a.6\]]dga' bo la rmas pa/_kun dga' bo ci'i phyir ngas ji lta ji ltar chos bstan pa de lta de ltar dge slong de kha gzhan du lta/_des gsol pa/_btsun pa dge slong des sgog skya 'tshal to/_/kun dga' bo dge slong dag gang gis na bden pa rnams kyi bar chad du 'gyur ba sgog skya za lta/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[64a.7\]]'tshal lags so/_/kun dga' bo gal te dge slong 'dis de ring sgog skya zos par ma gyur na deng nyid du 'dis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na dge slong gis da phyin cad sgog 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]skya dang kun dong dang /_ki'u yongs su longs spyad par mi bya ste/_yongs su longs spyod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bsams pa/_dge slong 'dis de ring bden pa dag ma mthong na re zhig sang mthong bar 'gyur 
[\[64b.2\]]ram blta'o snyam nas sems pa la zhugs pa dang ma mthong ngo /_/des rab kyi mtha' ba'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la rnam par bltas nas dus ji tsam na mthong bar 'gyur ba sems pa la zhugs na/_'on kyang ma mthong ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_
[\[64b.3\]]dal ba'i mchog 'di 'dir bor nas/_/'di yis 'di na bden pa dag_/nams kyang shin tu mthong bar ni/_/mi 'gyur ba yi gnas de yod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems mkhyen nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod sangs 
[\[64b.4\]]rgyas kyi yul la lag 'jug par ma byed cig_/'di ni 'di nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul las 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 
[\[64b.5\]]'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces 
[\[64b.6\]]gsungs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong sgog skya za ba las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis sgog skya bza' bar mi bya'o/_/za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sgog skya bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa 
[\[64b.7\]]dang /_dge slong zhig na ba de sman pa'i drung du song ste/_nad med cig ces byas nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo la nad 'di lta bu zhig byung na sman ston cig_/sman pas smras pa/_'phags pa sgog skya gsol cig dang khyod sos par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]ma gnang ngo /_/'phags pa khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/_gzhan gyis ni gsos par mi nus so/_/skabs de dge slong rnams la smras so/_/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te sman pas dge slong khyod kyi sman 
[\[65a.2\]]'di yin te/_gzhan gyis ni gsos par mi nus so zhes zer na bza' bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong nad pas sman pa'i lung gis sgog skya bza'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong nad pas sgog skya zos nas gtsug lag khang la yang longs spyod par byed/_
[\[65a.3\]]gnas mal dang /_snam phyis dang /_chab khung du yang 'jug_/dge 'dun gyi nang du yang 'gro/_bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs zhing lhags pa rnams la yang chos ston/_mchod rten la yang phyag byed/_bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu yang nye bar 'gro/_skyed mos tshal dang /_'dun 
[\[65a.4\]]sa dang /_lha khang dang /_skye bos gang ba'i phyogs gzhan dag tu yang 'dug pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis dri tshor nas 'phya smod kha zer zhing /_dge slong shAkya'i bu rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul nyams/_tshangs pa'i tshul nyams te/_da ni rab tu byung ba rnams sgog skya za'o zhes 
[\[65a.5\]]pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas dge slong sgog skya za ba'i kun du spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong sgog skya za bas sgog skya za bzhin du gtsug lag khang la yongs su longs spyad par mi bya/_
[\[65a.6\]]gnas mal la ma yin/_snam phyi sar 'jug par mi bya/_chab khung sar ma yin/_dge 'dun gyi nang du 'gro bar mi bya/_bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par mi bya/_mchod rten la phyag mi bya/_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim du nye bar 'gro bar mi bya/_
[\[65a.7\]]skyed mos tshal dang /_'dun sa dang /_lha khang dang /_skye bos gang ba gzhan dag tu gnas par mi bya'i/_phyogs dben pa gang du gzhan dag gis mthong na ma dad pa skye bar mi 'gyur bar bza' bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bya ba zin par gyur pa de'i tshe phyogs de nyid du zhag bdun 'dug par bya'o/_/kun dong 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]na ni zhag gsum/_ki'u na ni zhag gcig go/_/de nas khrus byas la chos gos dag kyang bkru bar bya zhing bdug pa dag gis bdug par bya'o/_/de nas dri nga ba med pa dang /_gtsug lag khang du 'jug par bya zhing ji ltar bkag pa yang bya'o/_/sgog skya za ba'i dge slong gis kun du spyad pa'i chos 
[\[65b.2\]]ji ltar bcas pa rnams yang dag par blangs te/_mi gnas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/phran tshegs las sgo dang po rdzogs so//_//bsdus pa'i sdom ni/_chan pas 'dreg dang gdugs dang ni/_/be'u ras dang ni rgyan spel ma/_/len dang tshogs dang khrus dang ni/_/gcin 
[\[65b.3\]]dang sgo 'phar spo ba'o/_/sdom ni/_chan pas 'dreg dang mdoms dang ni/_/de bzhin byin pa nyid dang ni/_/khri dang rtswa stan gcig dang ni/_/khyim na gnas dang bgo ba min/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na 
[\[65b.4\]]bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul ba de'i tshe des 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spu bregs shig ces 'breg mkhan gyi mi btang ba dang zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/nye dga' bos smras pa/_bzhin 
[\[65b.5\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod skra chan pas 'breg shes sam/_des smras pa/_'phags pa de nyid bdag gi bzo lags so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gal te de lta na tshur shog bregs shig_/des skra chan pas bregs pa dang /_nye dga' bos smras pa/_da rung bregs shig_/des yang bregs pa dang /_des smras pa/_da rung 
[\[65b.6\]]yang bregs shig_/des yang bregs so/_/de bzhin du ji tsam nyi ma nub kyi bar du ma btang nas/_de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces smras so/_/bkren pa khyod ci yang mi shes pa zhig 'di kho na bzhin mnyam par byos te song shig ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[65b.7\]]dge slong gis skra chan pas breg par mi bya'o/_/dge slong skra chan pas 'breg na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis skra chan pas breg par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gi mgo la rma byung nas spu gris reg pa na de dag snad pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rma'i than kor gyi skra chan pas breg par bya zhing /_lhag ma rnams spu gris breg par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na 
[\[66a.2\]]bzhugs so/_/de nas yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'breg mkhan gyi mi btang ste zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu 'bregs shes sam/_des smras pa/_'phags pa de nyid bdag gi bzo lags so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gal te de 
[\[66a.3\]]lta na tshur shog bregs shig_/'phags pa ji 'dra bar breg_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mdzes par bregs shig_/des breg par brtsams pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di ltar byos shig_/des de bzhin byas pa dang /_yang smras pa/_gzhan 'di lta bur yang byos shig ces des 
[\[66a.4\]]de ji tsam nyi ma nub kyi bar du ma btang nas/_dge sbyong shAkya'i sras rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni nyams/_tshangs pa'i tshul ni nyams te/_da ni gsang ba'i phyogs kyi spu yang 'breg par byed do zhes smod par byed/_gzhogs 'phyas byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis 
[\[66a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu breg par mi bya'o/_/dge slong mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu 'breg par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis mdoms kyi 
[\[66a.6\]]phyogs kyi spu breg par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis mdoms kyi phyogs su rma byung ba dang /_dge slong dag 'gyod nas spu 'breg par mi byed do/_/dge slong gzhan dag la yang srin bu byung ste/_de dag de'i gnod pas dge ba'i phyogs kyi bya ba mi nus pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom 
[\[66a.7\]]ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag la bstan nas rma'am srin bu'i phyir ni mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu breg par bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'breg mkhan gyi mi btang ba dang zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod byin spu 'breg shes sam/_'phags pa de nyid bdag gi bzo lags so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gal te de lta na 
[\[66b.2\]]tshur shog bregs shig_/'phags pa ci 'dra bar breg par bgyi/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mdzes par bregs shig_/des breg par brtsams pa dang /_nye dga' bos smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di ltar byos shig_/des de bzhin byas pa dang yang smras pa/_gzhan 'di ltar yang byos shig_/des de 
[\[66b.3\]]ji tsam nam sros kyi bar du ma btang bas/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de la zhes bya ba nas/_dris pa zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /_de smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[66b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis byin spu breg par mi bya'o/_/dge slong byin spu 'breg par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis byin spu breg 
[\[66b.5\]]par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyi brla la rma byung zhing dge slong gzhan dag la srin bu byung nas/_de dag de'i gnod pas dge ba'i phyogs bya bar mi nus par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[66b.6\]]rma byung ba'i phyir ram/_srin byung ba'i phyir ni byin spu breg par bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde rnams khri gcig la nyal bar byed cing /_de dag der nyal 
[\[66b.7\]]nas ku re byed/_rtse bar byed/_ca co smra bar byed/_dgod pa dang 'phyar g.yeng dang /_lus la rdeg par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams khri gcig la nyal bar byed pa las 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]gyur pas de'i phyir dge slong gzhan dang lhan cig khri gcig la nyal du mi gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis deng phyin cad dge slong gis khri gcig la nyal bar mi bya'o/_/byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[67a.2\]]kyis dge slong gis khri gcig la nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_ji tsam na dge slong mang po rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ste/_ljongs rgyu ba na ri brags shig tu phyin nas de dag gis der khri brnyas pa dang /_de dag gis khri dag byin no/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_'di dag nyung gis gzhan 
[\[67a.3\]]yang snoms te spyon cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag cag ni khri re re la skye bo mang po dag nyal bar bgyid na/_khyed gzhan yang g.yor ram/_re re la gnyis sam gsum gzims par mdzod cig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khri gcig la gnyis sam 
[\[67a.4\]]gsum nyal du ma gnang na ji ltar nyal bar bya/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag khri gzhan ni ma mchis so/_/de skad smras pas cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gang dag 
[\[67a.5\]]ngo tsha shes shing 'gyod pa dang ldan la/_bslab pa 'dod pa de dag gis dran pa nye bar bzhag ste/_gding ba bting ba la bar du chos gos kyi gtur bu'am/_lhung bzed kyi snod dag bcug la nyal bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/khri la ji lta bar rtswa stan dang gzhan dag la yang de dang 'dra'o/_/
[\[67a.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong mang po rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang /_ri brags shig tu phyin nas de rnams kyis khyim bdag cig las bsti gnas brnyas so/_/grang ba'i dus la bab pas de rnams 
[\[67a.7\]]kyis gos brnyas pa dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba yin no snyam ste/_snying rje nye bar bdag ste gos dag byin pa dang /_gang gis gang thob pa des de gyon te nyal nas dge slong gzhan dag grang bas sbrebs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gis gang thob pa de dag nyid kyis bgo bar mi bya'i thams cad kyis bgo bar bya ste/_gcig rnyed par gyur pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyi steng du rgan rims bzhin ji tsam yog pa dgab par bya'o/_/ji tsam na yang ri brags gzhan zhig 
[\[67b.2\]]tu dong ba dang /_der gos gcig cig rnyed nas de dag gi steng du g.yogs pa na nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de gyon te 'chag tu song ba dang /_dge slong rnams grang bas sdug bsngal bar gyur nas smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' bo bdag cag ni grang bas sdug bsngal na khyod 'ba' zhig gyon nas 'chag gam/_des 
[\[67b.3\]]smras pa/_kho bos bkag gam ci/_khyed kyang ci'i phyir mi 'chag_/de rnams grang ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mtshan 'das par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'chag pa gang yin pa des gang zag gi gos 
[\[67b.4\]]bgos te bcag par bya'o/_/gzhan gyis 'chag na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/grang ba'i dus la bab pas dge slong rnams grang ba'i gnod pas glos 
[\[67b.5\]]phab ste 'dug go/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang /_des de dag mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa ci'i slad du gcig tu brtson pa'i gsung rab la glos phab ste bzhugs shing dge ba'i phyogs dag mi mdzad/_de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag 
[\[67b.6\]]bde ba dang ldan pa dag ni chos dran par 'gyur gyi/_kho bo cag shin tu grang bas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/des khyim du song nas be'u ras lnga brgya bskur ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis khyim pa'i gos de dag bgos te phyi rol du dong ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas co dri zhing smras pa/_
[\[67b.7\]]'phags pa dag ci khyed babs sam/_de dag gis smras pa/_kho bo cag gis grang bar gyur nas bgos kyis tshe dang ldan pa dag de skad ma zer cig_/de rnams smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]khyim pa'i gos bgo bar mi bya'o/_/de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na steng du gos ngur smrig gis g.yogs nas bgo bar bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi yang de bzhin du gyon par byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi ni 'og tu gos bcug nas steng nas g.yogs te bgo bar 
[\[68a.2\]]bya'i gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//sdom ni/_gdugs dang 'jig rten rgyang 'phen dang /_/bsdebs sbyar de bzhin nags me dang /_/gnas med par ni lam dag dang /_/la ba bgos pas mi 'chag pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon 
[\[68a.3\]]med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na bram ze gos spyod pa zhig 'dug pa de gos byas shing byas shing 'tshong bar byed do/_/dus gzhan zhig na des gos mang po rnyed par gyur nas/_des bsams pa thabs ji lta bu zhig byas na des bsod nams kyang 'thob cing rnyed pa yang 'grub par 'gyur 
[\[68a.4\]]snyam pa dang /_de dad pa can zhig pas de'i blo skyes te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs la gos kyi gdan bshams te gdugs tshod gsol lo/_/de ltar byas na gos kyang yongs su spyad par 'gyur la/_gos yongs su longs spyad pa dang /_zhal zas yongs su longs spyad 
[\[68a.5\]]pas bsod nams chen po yang 'thob par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas/_des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rang gi khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas zhal zas gtsang zhing bsod pa bshams te gdan dag gi steng du gos bting ngo /_/de nas gdam bshams zin pa dang /_bcom 
[\[68a.6\]]ldan 'das spyan 'dren gyis spyan drangs na dge slong gi dge 'dun ni gshegs/_bcom ldan 'das ni gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms drangs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu rnam pa lngas gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms 'dren te/_lnga gang zhe na/_
[\[68a.7\]]nang du yang dag 'jog bzhed par gyur pa dang /_lha rnams la chos ston bzhed par gyur pa dang /_nad pa gzigs bzhed par gyur pa dang /_gnas mal gzigs bzhed par gyur pa dang /_nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa'o/_/don 'di la ni sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]ldan 'das nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas/_gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms drangs so/_/dge slong rnams lam kar char pa bab nas de dag gi gos char pas gsher bzhin du 'khod pas gang gi gos ci 'dra bas 'khod pa de'i de kho na lta bu'i sbra 
[\[68b.2\]]sbre byung bar gyur pa bram ze des mthong ba dang 'khrugs nas smras pa/_bdag gi zong 'di lta bu dag zong du mi rung bar bgyis kyis gos 'di dag khyed thal byung snoms shig ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[68b.3\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze des ma dad pa skyes nas byin pas blang bar mi bya'o/_/de 'khrugs pa de dang bral nas yang des dad pa'i sems kyis phul ba'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da 
[\[68b.4\]]ni bram ze des dad pa'i sems kyis phul bas blang bar bya ste/_blangs nas kyang rung ba byas la bgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis blangs pa dang /_bram ze des smras pa/_e ma'o 'phags pa dag gdugs bcang ba'i rigs so/_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[68b.5\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te de lta na rjes su gnang ste/_dge slong dag gis gdugs bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis gdugs bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis gdugs kyi rtsa ba gser dang /_
[\[68b.6\]]dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel las byas shing /_gzhan yang bkra zhing nye bar bkra ba dang /_bsrubs pa las byas la/_gdugs ni dkar po dang /_rma bya'i mdongs dag las byas pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag 'di ci 
[\[68b.7\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gdugs gnang ngo /_/'phags pa dag dge sbyong khyed ci 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir tam/_gang gi phyir 'di 'dra ba'i gdugs dag 'chang /_de dag gis smras pa/_dgra bo rnams kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan nas 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir to/_/
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]de dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bu'i gdugs dag bcang bar mi bya'o/_/'on kyang rtswa ba ru rta dang /_lo ma las byas pa'i gdugs rnam pa gnyis bcang bar bya'o/_/
[\[69a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gdugs rnam pa gnyis bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis gdugs kyi rtsa ba ring po ring por byas nas gdugs kyi rtsa ba bsgreng ste grong khyer gyi nang du song ba dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag gis mthong nas 'di lta bu nor can nam/_tshong dpon 
[\[69a.3\]]nam/_ded dpon nam/_su zhig 'ong zhes langs nas rtog par byed do/_/kha cig stsur dong ba dang /_gang gi tshe mthong bar gyur pa de'i tshe ma dad par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gdugs kyi rtsa ba 
[\[69a.4\]]ring po ring por mi bya'i 'on kyang gdugs kyi tshad tsam gyi rtsa ba gdags par bya zhing grong gi nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis grong gi nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_ji tsam na dge slong mang po dag don mthun dang lhan cig 
[\[69a.5\]]ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang /_re zhig na grong du lam byung bar gyur nas de dag gis bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis grong gi nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas grong dor bar bya'o snyam nas de dag gis grong spangs pa dang /_don mthun rnams dang bral bas chom pos 
[\[69a.6\]]bcom pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te grong gi dbus su lam byung bar gyur na gdugs glor bsnyal nas 'dong bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/bsod snyoms pa rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa 
[\[69a.7\]]dang /_char pa bab nas char chus gos gsher bar gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bsod snyoms pas gdugs kyi rtsa ba rung bar byas nas 'jug par bya ste/_zhugs nas gal te char pa chad na gdugs khyim 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]dang por bzhag la 'jug par bya zhing de nas phyir blangs te 'gro bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/lho phyogs kyi yul nas kun du rgyu 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa 'char ba zhes bya ba zhig ljongs rgyu zhing 
[\[69b.2\]]mnyan yod du 'ongs so/_/de ngal bsos nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya ga la ba der song ste phyin nas smras pa/_kye dge slong kho bos bla ma dag las blangs pa'i yi ge cung zad yod de/_de'i phyir khyod dang lhan cig gtam bya bar 'dod do/_/des de la smras pa/_bram ze kho bo smra ba don du 
[\[69b.3\]]gnyer ba ma yin gyis song shig_/de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /_bzang po dang /_rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_grags pa dang /_gang po dang /_dri med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ga la ba der song ba dang /_de rnams kyis kyang de kho na skad smras so/_/de nas tshe dang 
[\[69b.4\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas smras pa/_kye dge slong kho bos bla ma las yi ge cung zad blangs pa dag yod de/_de'i phyir khyod dang lhan cig gtam bya bar 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/_ci kun du rgyu 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam 'on te med 
[\[69b.5\]]snyam na yod par mthong ngo /_/su la rag las brtags na bdag nyid la'o/_/ci smra bas 'dul ba gzhan cung zad yod dam snyam na yod par mthong ngo /_/ji tsam na tshogs pa brtags na zhag bdun tshun chad kyis chogs par shes nas smras pa/_legs te de bzhin bya na rig pa'i 
[\[69b.6\]]gnas gang du bya/_che ge mo zhig tu'o/_/smra ba'i zhal che ba bzhag ste phyogs snga ma dang phyi ma rnam par bzhag nas/_sus phyogs snga ma/_sus gzugs shes glengs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_kun du rgyu glo bur du 'ongs pa yin pas 'di nyid kyis phyogs sa snga 
[\[69b.7\]]ma tshugs shig_/kun du rgyus phyogs snga ma smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bzlas nas khyod kyi 'di ni mi rigs so/_/'di ni mi 'dra'o/_/'di ni mi 'thad do zhes skyon btags so/_/des yang smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jug tu ma phyin par bzhag go/_/
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]lho phyogs kyi yul nas kun du rgyu 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa 'char ba zhes bya ba zhig mnyan yod du 'ongs te/_de dang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang lhan cig brtsad nas/_deng du zhag bdun lon no zhes kun du sgra grags pa dang /_srog chags brgya phrag mang po dag kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes/_
[\[70a.2\]]kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul nas 'dus pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/_bdag gi smra bas 'dul ba 'dus sam snyam na 'dus par mthong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ma lus par smras pa dang /_kun du rgyu de tshar gcad do/_/de nas mngon 
[\[70a.3\]]par dad par gyur te smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi dngos po 'thob na/_bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rab tu 
[\[70a.4\]]phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/_gdams ngag byin no/_/des brtsal ba dang 'bad pa dang bsgrim pa byas pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste zhes bya ba nas gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas 'khor de dag 'phags 
[\[70a.5\]]pa shA ri'i bus 'di lta bu'i smra ba chen po pham par byas so/_/zhes shin tu ya mtshan skyes so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor de dag gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang rang bzhin rtogs nas de dag dang mthun par chos bstan te/_srog chags 'bum phrag mang 
[\[70a.6\]]po dag gis de thos nas lhag pa'i khyad par chen po thob pa 'di lta ste/_kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/_kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu kha cig gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba nas dge 'dun la gzhol zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/
[\[70a.7\]]skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag thams cad du dge slong shA ri'i bu 'am/_shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bar mi 'gyur bas de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong dag gis 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa la sogs pa phyi rol pa'i 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]bstan bcos bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa la sogs pa phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos bslab par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong byis pa'am/_rmongs pa 'am/_mi gsal ba dag gis kyang thams cad kyis khyad par med par 
[\[70b.2\]]bslabs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod nus pa gang yin pa de dag gis 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa la sogs pa phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos bslab par bya'i/_byis pa dang /_rmongs pa dang /_mi gsal ba dang /_mi mkhas pa dag gis ma yin 
[\[70b.3\]]no/_/de rnams de la brtson pa nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dus gsum du byas la/_dus gnyis ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab bklag par bya zhing gsum pa la ni phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos dag go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dus gsum du bya'o zhes bka' 
[\[70b.4\]]stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams lo dang zla ba'i dus dag tu slob par byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag tshe ni skad cig ma yin pas ngas lo dang zla ba'i dus la dgongs te ma gsungs kyi/_'on kyang nyin gcig la cha gsum du bya'o/_/dge slong rnams 
[\[70b.5\]]gsal ba'i dus su ni phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos 'don la/_gzhan dag tu ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab 'don nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gsal ba'i dus su sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab gdon par bya ste/_phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos ni ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[70b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bram ze'i khye'u lha sbyin dang /_ba lang 'byor gnyis rab tu phyung nas/_de dag tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus mdo sde 'don du bcug go/_/ji tsam dus gzhan 
[\[70b.7\]]zhig na ljongs rgyu zhing dong nas ri brags shig tu phyin pa dang /_der de dag la rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung nas de gnyis der 'khod do/_/de gnyis sngon goms pa'i shugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab sdeb sbyor dang /_tshig dang rim pa sbyar nas kha ton du 'don to/_/de dag las gcig ni shi'o/_/cig 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]shos kyis gzhung brjed par gyur nas/_de la kha ton las byung ba'i rnyed pa med nas de dang de dag tu 'khyam 'khyam nas phyir mnyan yod du 'ongs so/_/de nas ngal bsos te tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya ga la ba der song ste phyag byas nas smras pa/_gnas brtan g.yar ton dbog tu 
[\[71a.2\]]gsol/_des smras pa/_bu legs so de bzhin kha ton bslab bo zhes des de dang lhan cig kha ton bya bar brtsams pa dang /_kha ton thung ngur 'don nas smras pa/_gnas brtan khyod kyis ring por ma bton pas gdon nongs so/_/des smras pa/_bu kho bos de ltar bslabs so/_/des 
[\[71a.3\]]de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /_bzang po dang /_rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_grags pa dang /_gang po dang /_dri med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_smras pa/_gnas brtan 
[\[71a.4\]]g.yar ton dbog tu gsol/_des smras pa/_bu legs so de bzhin kha ton bslab par bya'o zhes des de dang lhan cig kha ton gdon par brtsams pa dang /_de nas kha ton thung ngur bton nas smras pa/_gnas brtan khyod kyis gdon nongs so/_/des smras pa/_bu kho bos de ltar 
[\[71a.5\]]bslabs so/_/des de'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mkhan pos g.yar ton dbog tu gsol/_des smras pa/_bu legs 
[\[71a.6\]]so/_/de bzhin du kha ton du bslab bo/_/des de dang lhan cig kha ton bya bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na kha ton ring por bton nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang ring por bton pa dang /_des smras pa/_mkhan po dge slong de dag kun gyis ni gdon nongs kyi/_khyod nyag gcig 
[\[71a.7\]]gis ma nyams par bton to/_/des smras pa/_mi blun po khyod nyid kyis gdon nyes kyi/_dge slong dag gis ni ma nyams par bton to zhes des de spyos nas cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]nyes dmigs cung zad gang byung ba ni dge slong rnams sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab sdeb sbyor dang /_tshig dang rim pa sbyar nas 'don pa las gyur gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab sdeb sbyor dang /_tshig dang rim par sbyar nas gdon par mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis sangs 
[\[71b.2\]]rgyas kyi gsung rab sdeb sbyor dang /_tshig dang rim par sbyar nas 'don na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/yul gyi nges pa'i tshig dang /_skad kyi nges pa'i tshig dang /_ljongs kyi nges pa'i tshig yin na ltung ba med do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon 
[\[71b.3\]]med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde rnams rgas pa'i gnas skabs na yang rgod bag byed pa dang /_dge slong dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed mgo skyas kyang da dung rgod bag mi gtong ngam/_de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod nas mtha' gcig tu dong ste smras pa/_
[\[71b.4\]]dga' bo nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can dkos thag pa 'di dag la mi dga' ba zhig bya'o zhes de dag de ltar glags tshol ba la brtson par 'khod pa na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag dgon pa'i gnas su dong ste bsam gtan dang bklag par bya ba dag brtsams so/_/de nas drug sde rnams 
[\[71b.5\]]kyis gnas gsum nas nags mes btang ste ngos gcig tu 'dus nas bsdad pa dang /_dge slong rnams nags mes tshig pa'i gnod pa byung bas rings pa rings par 'bros par brtsams so/_/drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/_gnas brtan dag ci'i slad du [{]rings [,]ring [}{]rings [,]ring [}]ltar bzhud/_
[\[71b.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa dag nags kyi me ma mthong ngam/_gnas brtan dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba'i gnas skabs su tshul khrims gsungs sam ci lags zhes cung zad bgad pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis kho bo cag la bsams bzhin du ma gtses grang /_
[\[71b.7\]]bkren pa dag khyed de ltar mi dga' bar bya'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis nags mes gtang bar mi bya'o/_/gtong na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na dge slong rgan po zhig dang /_gsar bu zhig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang /_rgan po la ni snod mang zhing yo byad mang la/_gsar bu ni ma grags shing chos gos gsum 
[\[72a.2\]]las lhag pa med pa zhig pas/_rgan pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kho bo ngal gyis re zhig chos gos kyi gtur bu khyer te shog shig_/gsar bu des smras pa/_gnas brtan bka' 'bab par mi 'gyur na re zhig cung zad cig gsol ba mchis so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'di la su 
[\[72a.3\]]zhig gshe smros shig_/gnas brtan sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la ma gzigs sam ci/_rmongs pa'i yo byad 'dis ci zhig bgyi/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gal te mi bkur ba ni re zhig rung na 'di dri bar bya ste/_khyod kho bo'i mkhan po 'am/_slob dpon yin nam/_ci gang gi phyir rjes 
[\[72a.4\]]su ston par byed/_de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /_rgan pos bsams pa/_bkren pa 'di mi dga' bar bya'o snyam mo/_/ji tsam na de gnyis gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang /_de na nub gcig kyang mi gnas par 'dug par mi bya ba'i khrims su bya ba yod de/_de gnyis la gnas mal gyi 
[\[72a.5\]]zhal ta byed pas gnas mal dag snoms shig ces smras pa dang /_rgan pos ni blangs so/_/gsar bu des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kho bos gnas ma bcas kyis/_je gnas gsol lo zhes de dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gan du song ste rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/_gnas brtan 
[\[72a.6\]]bdag gi gnas mdzad du gsol/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod su dang lhan cig 'ongs/_gnas brtan dge slong che ge mo zhig dang ngo /_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis bdag 'khor dang phye'o zhes zer du 'ong gis song la de nyid la gnas gsol cig_/de gzhan dag 
[\[72a.7\]]gi gan du song ba dang /_thams cad kyis de bzhin spangs nas nam sros te rgan po de nyid kyi gan du song nas sgo la brdabs te smras pa/_gnas brtan phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod su zhig bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de lags so/_/khyod nad med par gyur cig_/gnas brtan gtsug lag khang 'di na 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]nub gcig kyang mi gnas par mchis par mi bgyi ba'i khrims su mdzad pa mchis na bdag gi gnas mdzad du gsol/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge 'dun gyis de lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba mdzad pa legs te/_gal te ma mdzad na kho bos 'char gzhug pa zhig de'i tshe ni kho bo snod mang zhing yo byad mang ba yin 
[\[72b.2\]]la/_nga ni gnas brtan yin nam/_khyod ma gus pa byas kyang gnas ster ba gang yin pa de la gnas chos shig_/de spobs pa med par gyur nas cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/_de'i gnas bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[72b.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas med par ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro bar mi bya/_dge slong gis seng ge bzhin gtum por mi bya/_dge 'dun gyis kyang dge slong rnams la gnod par 'gyur ba'i khrims bca' bar mi bya ste/_dge slong gnas ma bcas par ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro'am/_seng 
[\[72b.4\]]ge bzhin gtum por byed dam/_dge 'dun gyis khrims su bya ba de lta bu bcas na thams cad 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring ba tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong dang yul ma ga d+hAr ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te grong khyer sad kar can du gshegs nas/_
[\[72b.5\]]sad kar can na gnod sbyin ba ku la'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo nam sros te/_mun gnag cing khad kyis cung zad cung zad char 'bab cing glog 'byung ba na bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag pa mdzad do/_/chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[72b.6\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi zhabs 'bring ba dge slong rnams ni ji srid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nang du yang dag 'jog la mi bzhugs pa de srid du nang du yang dag 'jog la mi 'jug go/_/brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i shes pa dang mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des bsams pa/_
[\[72b.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de grong khyer sad kar can nas sad kar can gyi ri la gnod sbyin ba ku la'i gnas na bzhugs shing /_de mtshan mo nam sros te mun gnag cing khad kyis cung zad cung zad char 'bab cing glog 'byung ba na/_bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag ste/_ma la bdag 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]der nye bar 'gro'o snyam du rig nas bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i dri gtsang khang mngon par sprul te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa mdzad pa'i zhabs 'bring na 'chag cing 'dug go/_/de'i tshe yul ma ga d+hA pa'i mi 
[\[73a.2\]]rnams khye'u dang bu mo ngu ba gang yin pa de dag la de rnams gnod sbyin ba ku la'i ming gis sdigs par byed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong gis 'di snyam du bsams te/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das ha cang yun ring du bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag pa mdzad pas ma la bdag gis de la 
[\[73a.3\]]gnod sbyin ba ku las bsdigs so snyam du rig nas la ba bzlog ste bgos nas 'chag sa'i slad du 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ba ku la ba ku la dge sbyong nga ni gnod sbyin ba ku la yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong la 'di skad 
[\[73a.4\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/mi blun po khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gnod sbyin ba ku las bsdigs par sems sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni bsnyengs pa dang bag tsha ba dang bral ba ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyengs 
[\[73a.5\]]pa'am/_zhum pa'am/_spu zing zhes byed pa mi mnga'o/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ma dad par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa chos 'dul ba 'di la 'di 'dra ba'i gang zag kyang mchis sam/_kau shi ka khyod sdod cig_/gau ta ma'i 
[\[73a.6\]]rigs ni rgya che ba yin pas 'di yang phyis rnam par dag pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag la ba bzlog ste gyon pa las gyur par mkhyen nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mi blun 
[\[73a.7\]]po klu skyong gis la ba bzlog ste bgos nas de bzhin gshegs pa la ba ku la ba ku la/_dge sbyong nga ni gnod sbyin ba ku la yin no/_/zhes zer te/_de lta bas na dge slong gis la ba bzlog ste bgo bar mi bya'o/_/gyon na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]gis la ba bzlog ste bgo bar mi bya'o/_/gyon na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong ba lang gi gnas na 'khod pa de dag gis der la ba'i bgo ba dag rnyed pa dang /_de dag la shig zhugs te/_dge slong rnams shig gis zos pas bde ba mi 'thob pa'i skabs de dge 
[\[73b.2\]]slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_la ba bzlog ste gyon pas 'dug par bya/_nyal bar bya'i bcag par ni mi bya'o//_//sdom ni/_be'u ras dang ni la ba dang /_/de bzhin la ba'i mchog dang ni/_/sgrog mig sgrog rten mdud pa 
[\[73b.3\]]dang /_/ska rags dag ni gsum yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gal te dge 'dun la be'u ras 
[\[73b.4\]]grub na yang gnang la/_gang zag la yang gnang ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs shing snga ma bzhin te/_dge 'dun la la ba grub na yang gnang la/_gang zag la yang gnang ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[73b.5\]]ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs shing snga ma bzhin te/_dge 'dun la la ba mchog grub na yang gnang la/_gang zag la yang gnang ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin 
[\[73b.6\]]gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig 'dug pa de snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/_lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/_/de bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na chos gos nar nas/_des myur ba myur bar lhung bzed 
[\[73b.7\]]sa la bzhag nas/_de tshags byas pa dang /_de bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya zhing dge slong shAkya'i bu rnams ni gtsang sbra med de/_lhung bzed bab bab tu 'jog go zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]stsal pa/_dge slong gis lhung bzed bab bab tu gzhag par mi bya'o/_/dge slong lhung bzed bab bab tu 'jog na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang chos gos bsrung ba'i phyir chos gos kyi sgrog mig gdags par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis btags pa dang /_des chos gos ral 
[\[74a.2\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgrog zungs kyis glon la thogs shig_/dge slong rnams kyis sgrog zungs kyis glan nas btags pa dang /_de sgrog mdud med pas ma chags te nyes dmigs su gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mdud pa bya'o/_/
[\[74a.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig 'dug pa de snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/_lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs 
[\[74a.4\]]so/_/de bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na smad g.yogs snyil ba dang /_de myur ba myur bar lhung bzed sa la bzhag ste/_de tshags bcos so/_/bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos gos bsrung ba'i 
[\[74a.5\]]phyir ska rags rnam pa gsum po/_shur bu dang /_shur bu phre'u dang /_lcag pod bcang bar bya'o//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po bdun pa/_sdom ni/_ston pa ser skya'i gnas bzhugs pas/_/rgyan spel ma dang phyang phrul can/_/zla gam dang ni gser skud 
[\[74a.6\]]can/_/khra bo thams cad bkag pa yin/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas na n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe shAkya ming chen gyi khyim gyi zhal ta ba dus las 'das pa dang /_ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag shAkya ming chen ga la ba der song ste 
[\[74a.7\]]smras pa/_rje khyod kyi khab kyi zhal ta ba gum na/_zhal ta ba gzhan zhig bskor gsol/_des de'i drung na bram ze'i khye'u zhig 'dug pa de la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u re zhig khyod song shig_/ji tsam na zhal ta ba gzhan zhig btang ngo /_/de song nas des chos bzhin du rigs par spyad 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]pas dpya nar ma dang /_bla skyes rab tu mang por phul ba dang /_shAkya ming chen gyis smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dpya nar ma dang bla skyes 'di ltar mang ba khyod kyis skye bo'i tshogs la gnod par ma byas grang /_des smras pa/_rje dpya nar ma dang bla skyes 'di rigs pas mchis pa lags te/_bdag 
[\[74b.2\]]gis skye bo'i tshogs la gnod pa bgyis pa ma lags so/_/des ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de la smras pa/_shes ldan dag bram ze'i khye'u 'dis khyed 'ga' la gnod pa mi byed grang /_rje dpya nar ma dang bla skyes 'di rigs pas mchis pa lags te/_'dis 'ga' 
[\[74b.3\]]la yang gnod pa ma bgyis so zhes smras pa dang /_des de ri brags kyi zhal ta bar bcug go/_/'jig rten ni 'byor pa 'dod cing rgud pa dang mi mthun pa yin pas/_de la bram ze gzhan zhig gis bu mo byin pa dang /_des de nyi ma dang /_tshes grangs dang /_yud tsam dang sbyar nas bag 
[\[74b.4\]]mar blangs so/_/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu khye'u zhig btsas te/_de btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas rigs dang mthun pa'i ming yang btags so/_/yang 
[\[74b.5\]]de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas ming zla ba zhes bya bar btags so/_/de bskyed bsrings te chen mor gyur pa dang /_de mkhas shing spyod lam dang 'gro 'dug 'o gze bas ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i 
[\[74b.6\]]tshogs thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar gyur to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bram ze'i khye'u de na bar gyur nas rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu'i sman gyis rim gro byas kyang nad de zhi bar ma gyur nas/_ri brags pa des dpya nar ma dang /_bla skyes phul ba gang yin pa de dag 
[\[74b.7\]]thams cad spyad cing skyin po gzhan dag blangs nas/_'on kyang sos par ma gyur nas de de nyid du dus las 'das so/_/ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag shAkya ming chen ga la ba der 'ongs te smras pa/_rje zhal ta ba de ni gum lags so/_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag de na dpya nar ma dang bla skyes 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]su phul ba yod dam/_rje te por mang du phul mod kyi des bro 'tshal ba'i yo byad du spyad na 'on kyang sos par ma gyur nas skyin po gzhan dag kyang bgyis so/_/nged la de na lhag ma cung zad ci yod pa des bu lon sobs shig_/rje de na cung zad kyang ma mchis te/_lus par btab na de'i mchis 
[\[75a.2\]]'brang dang /_bu pho dang bu mo mchis te/_de'i bu mo de mkhas shing spyod lam dang 'gro 'dug 'o gze ba lags pas ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi yid du mchi bar gyur to/_/ming chen gyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag de'i chung ma dang bu pho dag ci dgar thong la bu mo de 'dir khug 
[\[75a.3\]]shig_/de rnams kyis de'i chung ma dang bu pho de dag ci dgar btang nas bu mo de ming chen gyi gan du khrid do/_/shAkya ming chen gyi chung ma rgan mo gcig kha zas g.yo ba dang /_me tog thu ba'i las rnam gnyis byed pa des smras pa/_jo bo da ni bdag shin du rgas pas sug las rnam gnyis bgyid rngo 
[\[75a.4\]]mi thog na/_zla ba 'di bdag gi dan grogs su bskor gsol/_des de ngan grogs su bskos so/_/de la des smras pa/_zla ba khyod ni kun dga' bar song la me tog thus shig_/ngas ni kha zas g.yo'o/_/de kun dga'i ra bar song nas me tog btus te de nas phreng ba legs par brgyus 
[\[75a.5\]]nas ming chen gyi gan du song ba dang /_de mthong nas yongs su dga' ste smras pa/_legs so zhog shig ces smras nas chung ma rgan mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci'i phyir sngon ni me tog nyung la de ring mang bar gyur/_des smras pa/_sngon ni khyod kyi gnyen dag mchis nas bdag la slong ba na 
[\[75a.6\]]bdag gis de dag la stsal pa/_'dis ni su la yang ma stsal ba dang bdag ni rgas pas mig rtul la/_'di ni mig rno bas thu mkhas pa las gyur to/_/des smras pa/_gal te de lta na de kun dga' ra bar thong la der zhog shig_/des de kun dga'i ra ba de nyid du bzhag pa dang /_de me tog gi 
[\[75a.7\]]phreng ba bzang po rgyud par byed pas de'i ming phreng ldan ma phreng ldan ma zhes bya bar grags so/_/dus gzhan zhig na de khyim nas rang gi zan blangs te kun dga' ra bar song ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyang bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/des bcom ldan 'das sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas shin tu 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]bde zhing rab tu dga' bas rtog par byed cing bsams pa/_'di lta bu'i yon gnas yang dag pa la bdag gis bya ba ma byas pas des na bdag 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur par gdon ma zos so/_/de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag las bsod snyoms bzhes na/_bdag gis 
[\[75b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la dbul lo snyam pa dang /_skabs de lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen pa dang /_mi gzigs pa dang /_mi rig pa dang /_rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang mi mnga' bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nyid kyis zhes bya ba nas/_lus 
[\[75b.3\]]can rnams la 'bras bur smin ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rjes su gzung ba'i phyir lhung bzed bzed de sring mo khyod kyis gal te yongs su btang na lhung bzed 'dir byin cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_des shin tu dad pas bcom ldan 'das la bsod 
[\[75b.4\]]snyoms de phul nas zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bran mo dang dbul por mi 'gyur bar shog shig_/ji tsam na de'i pha'i grogs po bram ze mtshan mkhan zhig yod pa des de mthong nas smras pa/_bu mo khyod ga las 'ongs/_
[\[75b.5\]]ri brags de kho na nas so/_/su la gnas shing 'dug des smras pa/_gang na skal ba chung ngu gnas pa na ste/_bdag ming chen gyi bran mo bgyis so/_/khyod kyi pha de gar song /_gum mo/_/ma dang ming po de dag gar dong /_gar mchis ma 'tshal to/_/zla ba khyod bran mo'i 'os ma yin na lag 
[\[75b.6\]]pa rkyong shig dang blta'o/_/des lag pa brkyang ba dang /_des bltas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gang gi lag pa'i mthil dag la/_/lcags kyi 'khor lo'i mtshan yod pa/_/bran gyi rigs su skyes gyur kyang /_/rgyal po'i btsun mor bzhes par 'gyur/_/gang gi bzhin ni 
[\[75b.7\]]rgyas pa dang /_/ngang pa'i rgyal po'i gdangs 'dra ba/_/bran gyi rigs su skyes gyur kyang /_/rgyal po'i btsun mor bzhes par 'gyur/_/gang gi rkang pa'i mthil dag la/_/grong khyer cog dang rta babs bcas/_/bran gyi rigs su skyes gyur kyang /_/rgyal po'i btsun mor bzhes par 'gyur/_/
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]khyod mi dgar ma byed par song shig dang /_khyod bran mor mi 'gyur gyi khyod rgyal po'i btsun mor 'gyur ro/_/de gnas de nas skyed mos tshal du song ba dang /_yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du chas pa rtas kha khyer te/_gcig pu ser skya'i gnas su 
[\[76a.2\]]phyin to/_/de phan tshun 'khyam pa las ming chen gyi kun dga' ra bar song nas/_des bu mo de la dris pa/_bu mo 'di su'i kun dga' ra ba yin/_des smras pa/_lha shAkya ming chen gyi lags so/_/de rta las babs te smras pa/_bu mo rkang pa bkrus chu long shig_/de shin du myur 
[\[76a.3\]]bar rdzing bur song ste nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis bsros pa'i chu blangs pa dang /_des rkang pa bkrus nas yud tsam zhig bsdad de smras pa/_bu mo gdong bkrus chu long shig_/des chu'i steng rim lag pas bsal te/_chu ha cang dro ba yang ma yin ha cang grang ba yang ma yin pa blangs nas des gdong 
[\[76a.4\]]bkrus so/_/des yang smras pa/_bu mo btung dgos kyis chu long shig_/des chu rnam par glongs te chu bsil ba'i lo ma'i snod du blangs pa rgyal pos 'thungs nas smras pa/_bu mo kun dga' ra ba 'di na rdzing bu gsum yod dam ci na/_khyod kyis chu rnam pa gsum khyer te 'ongs/_des 
[\[76a.5\]]smras pa/_lha 'di na rdzing bu gcig kho na mchis kyi/_gsum ni ma mchis so/_/des smras pa/_'o na khyod kyis chu rnam pa gsum ga las khyer te 'ongs/_des ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_des ni go 'o 'di dri bar bya ste/_ci'i phyir khyod kyi chu rnam pa gsum 
[\[76a.6\]]khyer te 'ongs/_des smras pa/_lha bdag gis dang por chab dron po 'tshal te mchis pa ni lha mnyel bsos par bgyi ba'i slad du'o/_/slad kyis ha cang dro ba yang ma lags/_ha cang grang ba yang ma lags pa 'tshal te mchis pa ni dro ba dang grang ba gang lags pa dag spyan la gnod pa'i slad du'o/_/
[\[76a.7\]]rnam par glongs nas shin tu bsil ba 'tshal te mchis pa ni lha skyems pa dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o/_/des bsams pa/_bu mo 'di ni mkhas pa yin no snyam du rig nas smras pa/_bu mo mdzangs shing mkhas pa khyod rkang pa mnye dgos kyis re zhig mal chos shig_/des de'i rkang pa 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]mnyes pa dang /_de reg bya dang ldan pa yin pas mnyes ma thag nyid du de gnyid log go/_/de gnyid log pa dang /_des bsams pa/_rgyal po 'di dag la ni dgra mang bas gal te 'di gnyid log pa la 'ga' zhig gis gnod pa byed na nges par bdag gi rje bo la grags pa ma yin par 
[\[76b.2\]]'gyur bas sgo gcad par bya'o snyam nas/_de sgo bcad de 'dug pa dang /_ji tsam na gcig nas gcig tu thos te dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dag skyed mos tshal der lhags nas de rnams sgo phye zhes zer ro/_/des sgo ma phye ba dang /_rgyal po ku cho'i sgras sad nas smras pa/_bu mo 
[\[76b.3\]]de ci zhig_/des smras pa/_lha mi dag cig chab sgo phye zhes mchi zhing /_lha'i mtshan yang smos so/_/des smras pa/_bu mo sgo 'di sus bcad/_lha bdag gis bkum mo/_/ci'i phyir bcad/_lha bdag gis glo ba la rgyal po 'di dag la ni dgra mang bas gal te 'di mnal log pa la 
[\[76b.4\]]'ga' zhig gis gnod pa bgyis na nges par bdag gi rje bo la grags pa ma lags par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de'i slad du bdag gis chab sgo bkum mo/_/des smras pa/_bu mo mdzangs ma khyod la nga'i the tshom 'di dri bar bya ste/_re zhig khyod ming chen gyi cir 'ong smros shig_/des smras 
[\[76b.5\]]pa/_bdag de'i mngag gzhug bgyid pa'i bran mo lags so khyod de'i mngag gzhug byed pa'i bran mo ma yin gyi/_khyod nges par de'i bu mo yin gyis drang por smros shig_/de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu mo khyod ming chen gyi gan du song la/_rgyal po gsal 
[\[76b.6\]]rgyal khyod kyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes byos shig_/de myur ba myur bar song ste/_jo bo ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khyod kyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes smras so/_/shAkya ming chen gyis thos nas bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_dri dang phreng ba dag bshams nas/_skye bo 
[\[76b.7\]]phal po ches bskor te kun dga' ra bar song ngo /_/de nas gcig la gcig byon pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun du spyad pas so so yang dag par dga' bar byas nas/_rgyal po khrus byas shing zan zos nas gtam dag byas te yud tsam zhig bsdad nas smras pa/_ming chen bu mo 'di khyod kyi cir 'ong /_
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]lha mngag gzhug bgyid pa'i bran mo lags so/_/'di khyod kyi mngag gzhug byed pa'i bran mo ma yin gyi/_'di khyod kyi bu mo yin gyis nga la byin cig_/des smras pa/_lha shAkya'i bu mo gzhan 'di bas ches khyad par 'phags pa dag mchis na de dag bzhes su gsol/_'di 
[\[77a.2\]]cir 'tshal/_rgyal pos smras pa/_'di nyid nga la dgos kyis/_'di nga la byin cig_/des smras pa/_lha gal te de lta na tshul bzhin bgyis te dbul lo/_/de bzhin byos shig_/de nas shAkya ming chen gyis grong khyer mdzes par byed du bcug ste/_bu mo de rgyan thams cad kyis 
[\[77a.3\]]bklubs nas glang po che la bskyon te lam po che dang /_srang dang /_lam gyi sum mdo dang /_bzhi mdo dag tu grong khyer ser skya'i gnas na 'khod pa dang /_yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la shes ldan dag nyon cig shAkya ming chen gyi bu mo phreng ldan ma ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal 
[\[77a.4\]]rgyal gyi btsun mor phul lo zhes dril bsgrag pa byas so/_/de nas de ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mor phul bar skye bo phal po che rnams kyis kyang shes so/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas mnyan yod du khrid pa dang /_de'i mas 
[\[77a.5\]]bdag gi bus bran mo chung mar blangs so zhes thos te/_de kun nas dkris pa skyes nas bsams pa/_'di ni nges par pha de'i bu ma yin pa'am/_bdag gi khong du don med pa zhig bsrel te/_'di ltar bran mo'i khyor skyes par gyur to snyam nas/_de yang sems khong du chud cing 'dug 
[\[77a.6\]]pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang phreng ldan ma la smras pa/_phreng ldan ma song la sgyug mo'i zhabs la phyag byos shig_/de song ste de'i rkang pa gnyis la bzung ba dang /_de reg bya dang ldan pa yin pas des reg pa tsam gyis de gnyid log ste sad nas bsams pa/_bu zan ma'i bu mo 'di'i reg pa 'di 
[\[77a.7\]]'dra bas ko sa la'i rigs 'di rgyas par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de'i tshe ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la btsun mo dam pa rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang /_phreng ldan ma gnyis yod de/_gang gi tshe rgyal po phreng ldan ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa de'i tshe/_phreng ldan ma rgyal rigs dbyar 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]tshul ma ni 'di lta bur yang gzugs bzang ngo zhes dbyar tshul ma'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_des smras pa/_lha de bdag gis nam zhig na mthong bar 'gyur lags/_rgyal pos smras pa/_ma [{]rings [,]ring [}]shig dang ring po mi thogs par mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de re ba dang bcas pas 
[\[77b.2\]]'dug go/_/gang gi tshe rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang thabs cig tu 'dug pa de'i tshe yang dbyar tshul ma phreng ldan ma ni de lta bu'i reg bya dang yang ldan pa yin no zhes phreng ldan ma'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_des smras pa lha de bdag gis nam zhig na mthong bar 'gyur lags/_rgyal 
[\[77b.3\]]pos smras pa/_ma [{]rings [,]ring [}]shig dang ring por mi thogs par mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag rgyal pos ji lta ji ltar ya mtshan bskyed pa de lta de ltar phan tshun mthong bar spro bar gyur to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na so ga'i dus la bab ste/_nags tshal na shing rnams me tog rgyas par gyur 
[\[77b.4\]]cing ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug dang /_shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa'i skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su rgyal po btsun mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing gshegs so/_/bud med ni me tog dang 'bras bu la dga' ba yin pas skyed mos 
[\[77b.5\]]tshal de dang de dag tu 'khyam par brtsams pa dang /_rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma ngal bas skyo zhing snyom par gyur nas shing mya ngan 'tshang la snyes te 'dug pa dang /_ji tsam na phreng ldan mas mthong ngo /_/de de'i gzugs bzang ba mthong bas shing gi lha mo yin no snyam du rig nas/_mod 
[\[77b.6\]]la rkang pa la phyag byas pa dang /_phreng ldan ma'i lag pas reg ma thag pa nyid du gnyid log par gyur to/_/ji tsam na rgyal pos dbyar tshul ma la phreng ldan ma'i bsngags pa brjod par brtsams pa dang /_des smras pa/_lha de bdag gis nam zhig na mthong bar 'gyur lags/_rgyal 
[\[77b.7\]]pos smras pa/_de khyed kyis mthong ngo /_/lha bdag mi dran no/_/ngas khyod dran par bya'o/_/legs so/_/gang gis lag pa gnyis kyis khyod kyi rkang pa la bzung ba de dran nam/_lha de lha mo phreng ldan ma lags sam/_de yin no/_/lha gang khyod reg bya dang ldan pa'i btsun mo de lta 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]bu spangs te/_bdag gi drung du gshegs pa de ni khyod bdag la nges par byams shing thugs gcugs pa lags so/_/de bzhin du phreng ldan ma la dbyar tshul ma ni 'di lta bu yin no zhes bsngags pa brjod par brtsams pa dang /_des smras pa/_lha bdag gis nam zhig na 
[\[78a.2\]]mthong bar 'gyur lags/_rgyal pos smras pa/_de khyod kyis mthong ngo /_/lha bdag mi dran no/_/ngas khyod dran par bya'o/_/legs so/_/khyod kyis shing mya ngan 'tshang la snyes te 'dug pa gang la phyag byas pa de dran nam/_lha ci de dbyar tshul ma lags sam/_de yin no/_/lha gang khyod 
[\[78a.3\]]kyis btsun mo gzugs bzang ba de lta bu spangs te bdag gi drung du gshegs pa de ni khyod nges par bdag la byams shing thugs gcugs pa lags so/_/skabs der ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la btsun mo dam pa rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang /_phreng ldan ma gnyis yod de/_de dag las 
[\[78a.4\]]gcig ni gzugs bzang ba rnams kyi mchog yin la/_cig shos ni reg bya dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes phyogs su sgra grags pa dang /_dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/_the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun mo phreng ldan ma 
[\[78a.5\]]dang /_dbyar tshul mas las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas gcig ni reg bya dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur la/_cig shos ni gzugs bzang ba rnams kyi mchog tu gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_/
[\[78a.6\]]rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni sa'i khams la rnam par smin 
[\[78a.7\]]par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la ma yin/_me'i khams la ma yin/_rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/_'on kyang las dge ba dang /_mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]yang /_/las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri brags shig na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_
[\[78b.2\]]dga' mgur spyod par byed de/_de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyad pas bu khye'u zhig btsas so/_/yang rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/_de dag bsrings shing bskyed nas chen por gyur to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig 
[\[78b.3\]]na bram ze de chung ma dang bcas te shi nas bram ze'i khye'u de pha ma dang bral bas dben pa la dga' bar gyur te/_de sring mo de khrid de dgon pa'i gnas su song nas 'khod de/_der de dag rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dag gis 'tsho bar brtsams so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[78b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sbrul nag po la ni nyes dmigs rnam pa lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_khro ba dang /_khon du 'dzin pa dang /_'khu ba dang /_byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_dug rno ba'o/_/de bzhin du bud med kha cig la yang nyes dmigs rnam pa lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_khro ba dang /_
[\[78b.5\]]khon du 'dzin pa dang /_'khu ba dang /_byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_dug rno ba'o/_/dge slong dag de la bud med kyi dug rno ba ni 'di yin te/_'di ltar bud med ni phal cher 'dod chags lhag par che ba'o/_/de'i sring mo de nyon mongs pa dag gis gdungs nas/_des smras pa/_ming po bdag dgon 
[\[78b.6\]]pa'i rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bus 'tsho ba'i rngo mi thog gis grong mthar bzhud do/_/des de khrid de grong mthar song ste/_de bram ze zhig gi der slong mo la zhugs so/_/des sring mo dang lhan cig slong mo'i phyir cig car sgra phyung ba bram zes thos nas phyir phyung nas smras pa/_
[\[78b.7\]]drang srong dag kyang chung ma dang bcas te rgyu'am/_des smras pa/_'di bdag gi chung ma ma yin gyi sring mo'o/_/'di su la byin/_su la yang ma byin no/_/gal te de lta na kho bo la ci'i phyir mi byin/_'di ni dam pa ma yin pa sdig pa'i chos de spangs pa yin no/_/de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis gdungs 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]pas smras pa/_ming po ci bdag dgon pa'i rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bus 'tsho ba'i rngo mi thog pa med snyam mam/_bdag gis ni nyon mongs pa spang rngo ma thog pa'i slad du khyod la 'di skad bgyis kyis/_bdag bram ze 'di la stsol cig_/des 
[\[79a.2\]]smras pa/_de ni chos dang 'gal bas ngas khyod sbyin par mi bya'i khyod nyid shes par zad do/_/bram ze des de dang de'i bsam pa shes pa nas 'byor pa'i dpal chen pos de bag mar blangs te/_rang gi khyim du bcug go/_/de nas de'i ming po de la smras pa/_ming po tshur spyon khyod kyi khab 
[\[79a.3\]]dbub par mdzod cig dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/des smras pa/_sring mo kho bo ni 'dod pa don du mi gnyer te/_khyod kyis gnang na rab tu 'byung ngo /_/des smras pa/_dam zhig bca' ste/_gal te khyod skabs skabs su bdag gzigs shing byon na gnang bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[79a.4\]]des smras pa/_legs te de bzhin bya'o/_/de des gnang nas drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ngo /_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin pas des slob dpon med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum bcu rtsa bdun mngon du byas te rang byang chub mngon sum du byas nas des bsams pa/_
[\[79a.5\]]bdag gis sring mo de la 'ong ngo zhes dam bcas pas de'i phyir de'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/_de de'i gan du song ngo /_/song nas 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bab pa dang /_glog 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams pa dang /_so so'i skye bo dag ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du dad pa 
[\[79a.6\]]yin pas de shing drungs nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_ming po khyod kyis yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bu thob bam/_thob bo/_/gal te de lta na khyod ni bsod snyoms don du gnyer ba lags/_bdag kyang bsod nams don du gnyer ba lags pas de'i slad du 'di 
[\[79a.7\]]nyid du bzhugs shig dang /_khyod la bdag gis bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_sring mo khyod ni gzhan la rag las pa yin gyis/_khyim thab la je dris shig_/legs te de bzhin bgyi'o/_/des khyim thab la smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag gi ming po rab tu byung ba 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]brtul zhugs grub pa bdag nyid chen por gyur te/_gal te khyod kyis gnang na bdag gis zla ba gsum du bsod snyoms la spyan drang ngo /_/des smras pa/_bzang mo gal te 'di rab tu byung bar ma gyur na bdag cag gis mi 'dod bzhin gso dgos par 'gyur na/_da rab tu byung ste brtul zhugs grub pa 
[\[79b.2\]]bdag nyid chen por gyur na lta smos kyang ci dgos/_song la spyan drongs shig_/des de zla ba gsum du bsod snyoms la spyan drangs so/_/bram ze de'i chung ma gnyis pa gzhan zhig yod pa des bsams pa/_bdag cag longs spyod thun mong las 'di ni bsod nams 'di lta bu byed na bdag gi ci'i 
[\[79b.3\]]phyir mi bya snyam du rig nas de la smras pa/_phu nu mo khyod kyi dral gang lags pa de bdag gi ming po yang de kho na lags pas khyod kyi gdugs gcig bshos gsol la/_bdag gis kyang gdugs gcig bshos gsol bar bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_legs te/_de bzhin bgyi'o/_/rang sangs 
[\[79b.4\]]rgyas kyi sring mo de de'i sems bsrung ba'i phyir zas bsod pa reg bya phun sum tshogs pa zas dman pas g.yogs te de la bstan nas phu nu mo khyod rjes su yi rang bar byos shig_/bdag gi ming po la zhal zas 'di lta bu gsol lo/_/des smras pa/_legs so/_/rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de yang de'i 
[\[79b.5\]]sems bsrung ba'i phyir zas dman pa bsod pa dag gis g.yogs te de la bstan nas/_phu nu mo khyod kyang rjes su yi rang bgyis shig_/bdag kyang dral la zhal zas bsod pa kha dog phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu gsol lo/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sring mo gang 
[\[79b.6\]]yin pa des rang sangs rgyas la reg bya phun sum tshogs pa zas dman pas bkab ste 'bul ba gang yin pa de ni lha mo phreng ldan ma 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dis gang rang sangs rgyas la reg bya phun sum tshogs pa zas dman pas bkab ste/_phul ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar 
[\[79b.7\]]reg bya dang ldan par gyur te/_da'i bar du yang reg bya dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/_/cig shos gang yin pa des rang sangs rgyas la zas dman pa kha dog phun sum tshogs pas bkab ste phul ba gang yin pa de ni rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na gang 'dis rang sangs 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]rgyas la zas dman pa kha dog phun sum tshogs pas bkab ste phul ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar gzugs bzang bar gyur te/_da'i bar du yang gzugs bzang ba rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam 
[\[80a.2\]]par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas/_dge slong dag 'di ltar bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/dus gzhan zhig na lha mo phreng ldan ma sems can zhugs par gyur to/_/nyi ma gang la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la bram ze mdun na 'don 
[\[80a.3\]]gyi chung ma la yang sems can zhugs par gyur te/_nyi ma gang la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de nyid kyi nyi ma nas sdug bsngal gyis nyen to/_/ji tsam na lha mo phreng ldan ma zla ba dgu lon nas khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa zhig btsas so/_/de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston 
[\[80a.4\]]rgya cher byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed pa na/_rgyal pos smras pa/_song la 'di phyi mo la phul cig dang /_de nyid ming 'dogs par 'gyur ro/_/blon po rnams kyis de khyer te de'i gan du dong nas smras pa/_lha mo lha'i zhal nas gzhon nu'i ming 
[\[80a.5\]]gdags su gsol zhes byung ngo /_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag ngas dang po nyid nas bu zan ma'i bu mo 'dis ko sa la'i rigs 'di rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/zhes ma smras sam/_blon po dag gis smras pa/_de'i don 'tshal te/_lha mos 'di ma bltam pa nyid nas 'phags skyes po 
[\[80a.6\]]zhes kun du spyad pas de'i slad du gzhon nu'i mtshan 'phags skyes po zhes gdags so zhes de'i ming 'phags skyes po zhes bya bar btags so/_/gang gi nyin par gzhon nu 'phags skyes po btsas pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la mdun na 'don gyi bu btsas nas/_de'i nye du dag kyang 'ongs shing 
[\[80a.7\]]'dus nas zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed pa na/_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_'di gang gi nyi ma la ma'i mngal du zhugs pa de'i nyin mo nyid nas ma sdug bsngal gyis nyen cing /_skyes nas kyang sdug 
[\[80b\]]
