[\[80b.1\]]bsngal ba kho na yin pas de'i phyir khye'u'i ming ma la gnod ces gdags so zhes de'i ming ma la gnod ces bya bar btags so/_/gzhon nu 'phags skyes po ma ma brgyad po nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse na grogs kyi 
[\[80b.2\]]ma ma gnyis la gtad de/_ma ma brgyad po de dag gis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par gtso bo gtso bo dag gis rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du bsrings shing bskyed do/_/gang gi tshe de chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge 
[\[80b.3\]]bslabs te/_yi ge mthar phyin nas brtag pa brgyad po 'di lta ste/_rin po che brtag pa dang /_shing brtag pa dang /_gzhi brtag pa dang /_gos brtag pa dang /_glang po che brtag pa dang /_rta brtag pa dang /_bud med brtag pa dang /_skyes pa brtag pa dag la mkhas par gyur cing /_
[\[80b.4\]]dbye ba dang /_bklag pa la mkhas shing spyod pa gsal ba/_rnam pa thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas te/_de rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/_yul gyi dbang phyug mthu dang /_brtson 'grus thob pa sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po cham du phab ste/_gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i 
[\[80b.5\]]gnas dang las kyi gnas gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/_glang po che'i gnyar bzhon pa dang /_rta la bzhon pa dang /_shing rta'i thabs dang /_ral gri'i thabs dang /_gzhu gzung ba dang /_mdun du bsnur ba dang /_phyir bsnur ba dang /_lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang /_zhags pa gdab 
[\[80b.6\]]pa dang /_mda' bo che'i 'phen thabs dang /_'dzin stangs dang /_gom stabs dang /_thor tshugs dang /_rgyang nas phog pa dang /_sgra grag par phog pa dang /_gnad du phog pa dang /_mi 'chor bar phog pa dang /_tshabs che ba dang /_dral ba dang /_dbug pa dang /_gcad pa'i gnas lnga po 
[\[80b.7\]]dag la mkhas par gyur to/_/khye'u ma la gnod kyang ma ma brgyad po dag la gtad de zhes bya ba nas rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge bslabs te/_bram ze'i lta ba dang /_spyod lam dang /_tshul dang /_gtsang sbra dang /_
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]spyod tshul dang /_ril ba gzung ba dang /_sa blang ba dang /_thal ba blang ba dang /_oM zhes bya ba dang /_b+ho zhes bya ba dang /_nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /_snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_srid srung gi rig byed dang /_drang srong ga rgas byas pa dang /_mA tha 
[\[81a.2\]]ras byas pa dang /_sa g.yo ba'i dpyad dang /_bar snang gi dpyad dang /_bram ze'i las kyi mtha' drug po mchod sbyin byed pa dang /_mchod sbyin byed du 'jug pa dang /_klog pa dang /_klog tu 'jug pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_len pa dag la mkhas par gyur to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na 
[\[81a.3\]]'phags skyes po dang /_ma la gnod lhan cig [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bshor ba'i phyir dong ba dang /_de rtas kha khyer te ser skya'i gnas su phyin nas de dang de dag na 'khyam zhing ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyi skyed mos tshal du song ngo /_/skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mis ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams la smras 
[\[81a.4\]]pa/_shes ldan dag 'phags skyes po rtas kha khyer te khyed kyi skyed mos tshal du 'ongs so/_/de rnams mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te de lta na dus la bab pa 'di yin gyis 'dong de bsad do/_/de bzhin bya'o zhes de rnams go bgos te dong ba dang /_shAkya rgan rabs rnams 
[\[81a.5\]]kyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_gzhon nu dag gar 'dong /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags skyes po bdag cag gi skyed mos tshal du mchis te/_de 'gums su mchi'o/_/shAkya rgan rabs rnams kyis smras pa/_gzhon nu dag de glo bur pa yin pas de'i nyes pa 'ga' bzod 
[\[81a.6\]]pa gyis la phyir log shig_/de rnams phyir log pa dang /_ji tsam na 'phags skyes po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pas gcig nas gcig tu thos nas tshol zhing skyed mos tshal du 'ongs nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pas skyed mos tshal kun nas khyab par gyur pa dang /_skyed 
[\[81a.7\]]mos tshal srung ba'i mis ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'phags skyes po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnams skyed mos tshal du lhags te/_glang po che dang /_rta'i mi gtsang ba dag gis skyed mos tshal thams cad ma rung bar byas so/_/de rnams 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]shin tu mi bzod pa skyes nas shAkya rgan po'i tshig bcag ste 'phags skyes po gsad pa'i phyir dong ba dang /_'phags skyes pos 'di ltar ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams bdag gsod du 'ong ngo zhes thos nas/_des mi zhig bzhag ste smras pa/_kye skyes bu nga gud du 'gros/_/khyod kyi ser skya na 
[\[81b.2\]]gnas pa'i shAkya rnams ci zer ba de nga la zlos shig_/ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams skyed mos tshal du 'ongs pa na 'phags skyes po mi snang nas/_de rnams kyi mi de la bran mo'i bu de gar song zhes dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_bros te mchis so/_/de dag las kha cig gis smras pa/_
[\[81b.3\]]de gal te bdag cag gis mthong bar gyur na/_bdag cag gis de'i lag pa bcad par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_gal te bros par ma gyur na/_de kho bo cag gis rkang pa bcad par 'gyur ro/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_kho bo cag gis ni thams cad kyi thams cad du srog 
[\[81b.4\]]dang phral bar 'gyur ba zhig na/_gal te bros na da ji ltar bya/_de dag gi gla mi rnams la bsgo ba/_skyed mos tshal phyag dar byos la bran mo'i bus phyogs gang du bcag pa'i phyogs de'i sa dag 'or la sa gzhan gyis khong shig_/rtsig pa'i phyogs gang la brten pa de dag kyang zhal zhal 
[\[81b.5\]]khogs la gzhan gyis yugs shig_/'o ma'i chus chag chag thob la spos chus thor te/_dri dang me tog la sogs pas kyang shin tu phun sum tshogs par byos shig_/des de bzhin du byas so/_/de nas mi des ji ltar gyur pa dag mthong nas 'phags skyes po'i gan du song ste rkang pa 
[\[81b.6\]]gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/'phags skyes pos smras pa/_kwa'e skyes bu ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams ci zer/_lha ji skad mchi ba lha la gsol ba'i rngo mi thog ste/_de ni de dag nyid la gyur cig_/kwa'e skyes bu de yang shes pa tsam du byas smros shig_/
[\[81b.7\]]des de dus kyis 'chu bar rtogs nas rgyas par bsnyad pa dang /_des nang mi rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang gi tshe nga yab 'das te rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe ngas de dag srog dang dbral ba gang yin pa de kho na thog mar bya dgos kyis/_khyed kyis ji ltar gyur pa 'di thams cad skul cig dang /_ngas 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kha gdag go/_/de rnams kyis kyang khas blangs so/_/ma la gnod kyis smras pa/_legs so legs so/_/lha khyod kyis kyang de ni gdon mi 'tshal bar bgyi 'tshal te/_dge ba rnams ni dam bcas pa la brtan pa lags so/_/des smras 
[\[82a.2\]]pa/_nga dus ji tsam zhig na rgyal por 'gyur ba de mi shes so/_/ma la gnod kyis smras pa/_de ltar ma dgongs shig_/rgyal po bgres po ni ring por mi thogs par lha nyid du gshegs pas khyod nyid rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa bsten pas ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med pas 
[\[82a.3\]]ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la blon po lnga brgya yod pa las 'phags skyes po blon po rnams dang dbye bar brtsams pa dang /_spyod pa'i bu ring po ma gtogs pa thams cad kha phyin to/_/blon po'i mchog de ni rje bo la snying nye ba yin pas kha ma phyin to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na spyod pa'i bu ring 
[\[82a.4\]]po bya ba zhig gi phyir 'phags skyes po'i gan du song ba dang /_'phags skyes pos rgyal po gsal rgyal gsad pa'i sbyor bas spyod pa'i bu ring po la ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams la ngas sha glan par bya na/_nga nam rgyal por 'gyur ba smros shig_/des smras pa/_lha ci'i 
[\[82a.5\]]slad du bsod nams ma lags pa skyed par mdzad/_rgyal po bgres po ni ring por mi thogs par lha nyid du gshegs te rgyal por gzhan mi 'gyur gyi khyod nyid 'gyur ro/_/spyod pa'i bu ring po de ni ngas bgam par khyod kho na la smras kyi/_khyod kyis su la yang smra bar mi bya'o/_/lha bdag gis 
[\[82a.6\]]ma 'tshal tam ci/_su la yang ji ltar brjod par bgyi zhes smras te song ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi nang na shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal me tsu ru di zhes bya ba na bzhugs te/_de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bzhon pa bzang po la zhon te kha lo sgyur ba spyod pa'i bu ring po dang /_/
[\[82a.7\]]ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na grong khyer zhig tu phyin nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dgon pa'i nags 'dab bas mtha'i gnas mal dben pa skye bo sdig can dang bral ba mi chig rkya thub pas so sor bsten pa nang du yang dag 'jog dang mthun pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas yang spyod pa'i bu ring po 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]la smras pa/_spyod pa'i bu ring po bcom ldan 'das de dgon pa nags 'dab bas mtha'i gnas mal dben pa skye bo sdig can rnams dang bral ba mi chig rkya thub pas so sor bsten pa nang du yang dag 'jog dang mthun pa 'di lta bu na bzhugs te/_der ngas bcom ldan 'das de la re 'ga' bsnyen bkur byas 
[\[82b.2\]]na ring po bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs/_ji ga khyod kyis thos sam/_lha bdag gis thos te bcom ldan 'das ni shAkya rnams kyi nang na shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal me tsu ru di zhes bgyi ba na bzhugs so/_/ring po shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal me tsu ru di zhes bya bar thag ji srid yod/_/lha rgyang 
[\[82b.3\]]grags gsum lhag tsam mchis so/_/des ring po shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal me tsu ru di ga la ba der shing rta drongs shig_/lha de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes spyod pa'i bu ring pos ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ltar mnyan nas/_shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal me tsu ru di ga la ba der shing rta khrid de bzhon pas 'gro ba'i 
[\[82b.4\]]sa ji srid pa de ji srid du zhon te song nas bzhon pa las babs te rkang pas kun dga'i ra bar zhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang chen po sgo bcad pa zhig na nyin mo gnas pas bzhugs so/_/dge slong mang po rnams ni gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag 
[\[82b.5\]]par byed pa ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mthong ngo /_/dge slong mang po dag thag ring po nyid nas mthong nas kyang dge slong mang po dag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas dge slong mang po dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa dag bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs/_rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das 
[\[82b.6\]]ni gtsug lag khang chen po chab sgo bkum pa 'di na nyin mo gnas pas bzhugs te/_rgyal po chen po khyod bzhed na gtsug lag khang chen po sgo bkum pa ga la ba der bzhud de/_der byon pa dang khad kyis dal bu dal bus sgo glegs la rdungs shig dang /_bcom ldan 'das chab sgo 'byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[82b.7\]]de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi rgyal po'i rtags lnga po gtsug tor dang /_gdugs dang /_ral gri dang /_rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /_lham khra bo dag phud de/_spyod pa'i bu ring po la byin nas kha phyir lta'o/_/de nas spyod pa'i bu ring po 'di snyam du sems te/_lhas rgyal po'i rtags 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]lnga po gtsug tor dang /_gdugs dang /_ral gri dang /_rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /_lham khra bo dag bdag la bzhag ste/_zhal phyir gzigs pa las na/_lha ni phrin las gsang ba zhig mdzad par bzhed pas bdag 'di nyid du 'dug par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas ko sa la'i 
[\[83a.2\]]rgyal po gsal rgyal gtsug lag khang chen po sgo bcad pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_khad kyis dal bu dal bus sgo glegs la brdabs pa dang /_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo phye'o/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[83a.3\]]kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_gdong dang kha phyis nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ring mo zhig lags nas mthong ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis ring mo zhig lags nas mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po 
[\[83a.4\]]gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po khyod ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la shin tu dman pa bas kyang ches dman pa byed/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la chos las byung ba'i dad pa mchis te/_des na bdag 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[83a.5\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/_/khyod kyi chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs pa'o/_/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa'o snyam mo/_/rgyal po chen po khyod nga la chos las byung ba'i dad pa ji lta bu zhig yod/_btsun pa bdag gis 'di na dge sbyong dang bram ze 
[\[83a.6\]]mkhas pa mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can smra ba dang /_phas kyi rgol ba la goms par bgyis pa/_skye bo phal po che la byis pa'i dang yas 'bigs pa'i ngo bor bkur ba kha cig mthong ste/_de dag rang gi shes rab dang spobs pas gzhan gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'dren ma'i ngo bo dag 'jig cing de dag zhu ba rtsom 
[\[83a.7\]]par bgyid de/_bdag cag shes ldan gau ta ma de'i drung du dong la dri ba 'di dang 'di lta bu dag dri ste/_gal te lung ston par mi byed na ni brtsad par bya'o/_/gal te 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bu yin no/_/zhes lung ston par byas na/_de lta na de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/_kye gau ta ma khyod kyi 'di ni mi 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]rigs so/_/'di ni mi 'dra'o/_/'di ni mi 'thad do/_/zhes brjod par bya'o/_/zhes de rnams kyis zhu ba de dag bsngogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bab par mchis pa'i rngo yang ma thog na smra bar lta ga la rngo thog ste/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa de lta 
[\[83b.2\]]bu mchis te/_des na bdag 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lags/_khyod kyi chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs pa lags/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa lags so snyam bgyid do/_/btsun pa 
[\[83b.3\]]bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/_btsun pa 'di na bdag gis dge sbyong dang /_bram ze mkhas pa mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can zhes bya ba nas/_kha cig mthong ste zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de rnams kyis zhus pa de dag bsngogs nas/_bcom 
[\[83b.4\]]ldan 'das ga la ba der mchis te phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhu ba'i rngo mi thog gi/_gzhan du na bcom ldan 'das kho na'i zhal du lta ba dang /_zhal du rtog par bgyid cing /_bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma 'di kho nas shes par bya ba mkhyen to/_/gzigs par bya ba gzigs so snyam ste/_
[\[83b.5\]]btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags te/_zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/_/btsun pa bdag la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/_btsun pa 'di na bdag gis dge sbyong dang /_bram ze mkhas pa mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can zhes bya ba nas kha cig mthong ste zhes bya ba'i 
[\[83b.6\]]bar snga ma bzhin no/_/des zhu ba de dag bsngogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der mchis te phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba yongs su ma rdzogs par zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la zhu ba yongs su ma rdzogs par zhus bzhin yongs su rdzogs par lung bstan pa dang /_de dag 
[\[83b.7\]]zhu ba lung bstan pa de yi rangs shing mgu nas sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi zhing bslab pa'i gnas dag kyang len pa bgyid de/_btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/btsun pa 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/_'di na bdag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag mkhas pa mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can zhes bya ba nas/_kha cig mthong zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de dag gis zhus pa de dag bsngogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga 
[\[84a.2\]]la ba der song ste phyin nas/_zhu ba rdzogs par zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la chos yongs su rdzogs par lung bstan nas/_de dag lung bstan pa des yi rangs shing mgu nas bcom ldan 'das la rab tu byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gsol zhing /_bcom ldan 
[\[84a.3\]]'das kyis rab tu byung bar mdzad/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de/_rab tu byung ba bsnyen par rdzogs pa dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba nyams su myong ba de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag de'u ma rung ngo /_/bdag cag rab tu de'u ma rung ngo /_/bdag cag 
[\[84a.4\]]sngon dge sbyong ma yin bzhin du bdag cag dge sbyong ngo snyam du khas 'che 'che/_bdag cag bram ze dang /_dgra bcom pa ma yin bzhin du bdag cag dgra bcom pa'o snyam du khas 'che'i/_nga ni bdag cag dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_dgra bcom pa yin no snyam ste/_btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 
[\[84a.5\]]'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags te zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/_/btsun pa bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/_btsun pa 'di la bdag gis dge sbyong dang bram ze skya bo bseng bseng po sha bri srab pa/_nyam chung ba mdog ngan pa/_dbang po nyams pa skye bo 
[\[84a.6\]]mang po'i mig gis bltar mi chags pa dag cig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_shes ldan 'di dag mi 'dod bzhin du tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa 'am/_nad yun ring po 'ga' zhig gis thebs sam/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i las 'ga' zhig lkog tu byas nas bcabs par ma 
[\[84a.7\]]gyur grang /_'di ltar shes ldan 'di dag skya bo bseng bseng po sha bri ngan pa/_nyam chung ba dbang po nyams pa/_skye bo mang po'i mig gis bltar mi chags so snyam mo/_/de dag gi drung du mchis shing mchis nas 'di skad ces bgyis te/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir skya bo bseng bseng po sha bri ngan pa/_
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]nyam chung ba dbang po nyams pa/_skye bo mang po'i mig gis bltar mi chags par gyur/_de dag gi mchid nas rgyal po chen po 'dod chags kyis gnod do/_/btsun pa de la bdag 'di snyam du sems te gal te 'dod pa rnams rnyed pa dang bsten pa dang bsags pas gzugs bzang ba'am blta na sdug pa'am/_mdzes pa 
[\[84b.2\]]zhig tu 'gyur na ni da lta ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bdag gzugs ches bzang ba dang /_ches blta na sdug pa/_ches mdzes par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bdag ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po rnams 'dod dgur rnyed pa dang /_tshegs med par rnyed lags so/_/
[\[84b.3\]]gang gi phyir 'dod pa rnams rnyed pa dang bsten pa dang bsags pas gzugs ches bzang ba dang /_ches blta na sdug pa/_ches mdzes par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gzugs shin tu bzang ba/_dbang po rgyas pa/_bzhin gyi mdangs gsal ba/_pags 
[\[84b.4\]]pa'i mdog yongs su dag pa/_sems khral chung ba/_'tsho ba gzhan la rag ma lus pa mthong ste/_des na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba spyod par nus so snyam ste/_btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 
[\[84b.5\]]'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags te zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/_/btsun pa bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/_btsun pa 'di na bdag gis nor gyi slad du mchis pa rnams 'dod pa'i rgyu dang /_'dod pa'i gzhi dang 'dod pa'i ched kyi slad du ma ni bu dang lhan 
[\[84b.6\]]cig rtsod/_bu ni ma dang /_pha ni bu dang /_bu ni pha dang /_ming po ni sring mo dang /_sring mo ni ming po dang /_grogs po ni grogs dang rtsod pa dag mthong na skye bo dang skye bor lta smos kyang ci 'tshal de dag rtsod cing 'gyed par gyur pa na/_ma ni bu'i mi snyan pa smra/_bu ni ma'i/_pha ni bu'i/_bu ni pha'i/_
[\[84b.7\]]ming po ni sring mo'i/_sring mo ni ming po'i/_grogs ni grogs kyi mi snyan pa smra na/_skye bo skye bo'i lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_yang 'di na bdag gis mthong ba/_dge slong gnyis shig dge slong dag dang lhan cig gzhi 'ga' zhig gi slad du rtsod nas bslab pa phul te babs par gyur na/_de dag rnam grangs gang 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]gis kyang sangs rgyas la mi snyan pa brjod pa'am/_chos dang dge 'dun la mi snyan pa brjod par mi bgyid kyi/_gzhan du na bdag nyid kho na la yongs su smod pas yongs su smod par bgyid de/_bdag cag gnyis ni 'di na dman pa dang ma rabs dang dpal med pa ste bdag cag gis bcom ldan 
[\[85a.2\]]'das kyi spyan sngar ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba/_spyad par ma nus so zhes mchis te/_btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags so zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/_/btsun pa 
[\[85a.3\]]bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/_btsun pa 'di na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bdag dgum par bgyi ba ma lags pa rnams kyang 'gums/_dgum par bgyi ba rnams ni gtong bar dbang na/_bdag don gyi ched du mchis pa la rgyal rigs rgya chen po shing sA 
[\[85a.4\]]la chen po lta bu dag dang /_bram ze rgya chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang /_khyim bdag rgya chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu dag gtam mjug tu phyin pa la mi sdod par bar skabs bar skabs su bka' mchid mchi zhing /_ma gus pa dang zhes ma mchis par smra bar bgyi bar sems lags so/_/
[\[85a.5\]]btsun pa dus gcig cig na/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs shing /_chos ston par mdzad pa de na lud pa'i sgra yang mi gda' sbrid pa'i sgra yang mi gda'o/_/de nas mi zhig gis lud pa'i sgra phyung ba dang /_yang mi zhig gis mi de la 'di skad ces kye skyes 
[\[85a.6\]]bu khyod kha rog par 'dug_/bcom ldan 'das sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsis tshim par mdzad pa lta bu'i chos snyan pa bas snyan pa ston par mdzad pa ma mthong ngam zhes smras lags so/_/de skad ces bgyis pa dang /_mi de cang mi mchis par mchis so/_/de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[85a.7\]]ni de tsam du mthu che zhing /_rdzu 'phrul che ba lags na/_'di na da ltar chad pa med pa dang /_mtshon cha med pa'i chos snyan pas 'khor btul ba ngo mtshar to snyam ste/_btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags te zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/btsun pa bdag la bcom 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan 'di yang mchis te/_btsun pa 'di na bdag gis dge sbyong dang /_bram ze kha cig mthong na nor med par bgyis te/_tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa las de zla ba dgu 'am zla ba brgyad 'das pa dang /_rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang mtshan ma de dag bor te/_
[\[85b.2\]]phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag 'byor cing ldan par gyur cing rtse bar bgyid/_dga' bar bgyid/_dga' mgur spyod par yang bgyid do/_/btsun pa 'di na bdag gis mthong ba bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs 
[\[85b.3\]]su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba spyod cing zhes bya ba nas/_srog gi mtha'i bar zhes bya ba dang /_btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po brgyad pa/_btsun pa 
[\[85b.4\]]bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan 'di yang mchis te/_btsun pa 'di na bdag drang srong sbyin pa dang /_rnying pa dang /_de dag la yid rton cing de dag la longs spyod rnams kyang stsol/_grags pa yang stsol ba nas/_de dag gi srog gi bar yang stsol na/_de dag bcom ldan 
[\[85b.5\]]'das la ji lta ba de ltar bdag la bgyi ba bgyid par mi sems te/_btsun pa dus gcig cig na bdag drang srong yid brtan pa sbyin pa dang /_rnying pa dag brtag par 'tshal nas/_'khor gyi nang nas byung ste phyogs dog pa zhig tu mchis nas/_'di ltar 'di dag bcom ldan 'das dang bdag gang 
[\[85b.6\](]lags [,]logs [)]su rkang pa ston blta'o snyam na/_de dag gis rnam grangs du mar sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod/_chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su ni mgo bstan/_bdag ga la ba de logs su ni rkang pa bstan to/_/de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/_
[\[85b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das ni de tsam du rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ste/_'di na da ltar bdag 'di dag la longs spyod rnams kyang sbyin/_grags pa yang sbyin pa nas/_srog gi bar yang stsol na/_'di dag bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba de ltar bdag la bya ba byed par mi sems pa ni ngo mtshar to snyam ste zhes bya ba nas/_
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/btsun pa bdag la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/_btsun pa bdag kyang yul ko sa la pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyang yul ko sa la pa lags/_
[\[86a.2\]]bdag gi rigs kyang rgyal rigs lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyi rigs kyang rgyal rigs lags/_bdag kyang rgas pa 'khogs pa/_gtugs pa na tshod lo brgyad bcu lon pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyang bgres pa/_'khogs pa/_gtugs pa/_sku na tshod lo brgyad bcu lon 
[\[86a.3\]]pa lags/_btsun pa bdag kyang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyang bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po lags pas/_btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags te/_des na bdag 'di snyam du bcom ldan 
[\[86a.4\]]'das ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/_/khyod kyi chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs pa'o/_/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa'o/_/snyam du sems lags so/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 
[\[86a.5\]]'das kyi spyan sngar chos sna tshogs rgya cher bshad nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis chos sna tshogs 
[\[86a.6\]]pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag chos sna tshogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ni don dang ldan pa/_chos dang ldan pa/_tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan pa ste/_mngon par shes par byed pa dang /_rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang /_mya ngan 
[\[86a.7\]]las 'das par byed pa yin no/_/de lta bas na rigs kyi bu dad pas rab tu byung bas chos sna tshogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs blangs te kun chub par byas nas de lta de ltar gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya'o/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos nyan pa la ring zhig 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]thogs pa dang /_spyod pa'i bu ring po yang cung zhig bsdad nas shing rtar zhugs te mnyan yod du song nas/_des 'phags skyes po rgyal srid la bzhag go/_/phreng ldan ma dang /_dbyar tshul mas spyod pa'i bu la dris pa/_spyod pa'i bu lha ga la bzhugs/_grong rdal me tsu ru di na bzhugs so/_/de dag 
[\[86b.2\]]rkang gis grong rdal me tsu ru dir chas so/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang bcom ldan 'das las chos mnyan nas gtsug lag khang nas byung na spyod pa'i bu ring po mi snang nas/_des dge slong rnams la dris pa/_'phags pa dag spyod byed kyi bu ring po gar mchis/_de dag gis smras pa/_de lha 
[\[86b.3\]]nang du gshegs ma thag tu shing rtar zhugs nas mchis so zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po rkang gis song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyang ches snga ba zhig tu rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs so/_/ji tsam na rgyal pos lam kar phreng ldan ma dang /_dbyar tshul ma mthong nas/_des de dag la dris pa/_khyed 
[\[86b.4\]]ci'i phyir rkang gis 'dir 'ongs/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha spyod pa'i bu ring pos 'phags skyes po rgyal srid la bzhag ste/_de nas bdag cag lha'i gan du mchis mod/_bdag cag gzhan gar mchi/_rgyal pos smras pa/_phreng ldan ma khyod kyis khyo'i rgyal srid nyams su myong zin gyis song 
[\[86b.5\]]la da bu'i rgyal srid nyams su myong bar gyis shig nga yang dbyar tshul ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang /_phreng ldan ma snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don cing ngu bzhin phyir log go/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang dbyar tshul ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab tu chas te rim 
[\[86b.6\]]gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas phan tshun 'khyam 'khyam pa las ma skyes dgra'i skyed mos tshal du 'dug ste/_des dbyar tshul ma la smras pa/_dbyar tshul ma song la rgyal po ma skyes dgra la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal skyed mos tshal na 'dug go zhes gyis shig_/des rgyal po ma skyes dgra la smras 
[\[86b.7\]]pa/_lha ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khyod kyi skyed mos tshal na bzhugs te/_lha gzigs par bzhed do/_/des thos nas bsngangs te smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po de dmag mang po can yin te/_glo bur kho nar 'ongs na khyed sus kyang ma tshor ram/_dbyar tshul mas smras pa/_lha de la dmag 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]ga la mchis/_bus rgyal srid las phyung nas de g.yog dang gnyis 'dir mchis so/_/des smras pa/_de rgyal po byed pa legs te/_bdag ni gzhon nu'i gnas na gnas so zhes smras nas/_blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang ngas rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang 
[\[87a.2\]]bskur ba bkur sti med par spyan drang ba ni nga la rigs pa ma yin par 'gyur bas deng la grong khyer mdzes pa dang /_lam mdzes par gyis shig_/de dag gis grong khyer de rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par byas zhes bya ba nas/_lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal bzhin du zhes 
[\[87a.3\]]pa'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas lam mdzes pa dang /_grong khyer mdzes pa so sor khyad par du 'phags par byas nas/_dril bsgrags pa shes ldan rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa dang /_pho brang 'khor ba dang /_yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag nyon cig_/ko sa la'i rgyal po 
[\[87a.4\]]gsal rgyal skyed mos tshal na 'dug gis/_de khyed lha dang lhan cig tu gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis bsu bar bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra shing rta stong phrag du ma phyi bzhin du khrid de/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang /_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 
[\[87a.5\]]stsur dong ngo /_/de yang ma skyes dgra ring du thogs pas bru bas bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/skyed mos tshal dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na la phug gi ra ba zhig yod pa der song ba dang /_de la ldum pas la phug spar gang byin no/_/de nas des la phug gi rdog ma dang /_lo ma dag zos pa 
[\[87a.6\]]dang /_skom rab tu gyur nas rdzing drung du song ste chu ngoms par 'thungs nas langs pa dang /_lag pa rengs shing ma zhu bas thebs nas shing rta'i lam du 'gyel ba dang /_de 'khor lo'i dril ba'i rdul gyis kha gang nas dus las 'das so/_/rgyal po ma skyes dgra skyed mos tshal du song ste phan tshun btsal 
[\[87a.7\]]bar bsams nas ma rnyed de/_des phyogs bzhir pho nya rta pa bkye ste tshol cig ces byas pa dang /_de na pho nya gcig la phug gi ra bar phyin nas/_des ldum pa de la dris pa/_kye skyes bu skyed mos tshal 'dir 'ongs pa 'ga' lta yod dam/_'ongs so de gar song la phug spar gang khyer 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]nas lam 'di nas rdzing bur song ngo /_/de de'i rjes bzhin du song na shing rta'i lam na dus las 'das par mthong ngo /_/des rgyal po ma skyes dgra la smras pa/_lha shing rta'i lam ga ge mo zhig gi phyogs su dus las 'das so/_/rgyal pos kye ma kyi hud ces smras nas skye bo brgya stong du mas bskor te phyogs der 
[\[87b.2\]]song ba dang /_ji tsam na shi ba'i ro shin tu mi sdug pa mthong nas yang blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'di nga'i yul du dus las 'das pa nga la snyan pa ma yin par gyur gyis/_khyed kyi 'di bkur sti chen pos bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du skyol cig_/_nga yang 
[\[87b.3\]]'di'i khog pa la mchod pa lhag par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/_/de dag gis kyang de bkur sti chen pos bsil tshal gyi dur khrod chen por bskyal to/_/rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di 
[\[87b.4\]]skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bdag gi yul du dus las 'das na de'i khog pa la bdag gis mchod pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po ci nus ci phod kyis lus la mchod pa cher gyis shig_/de nas rgyal pos de'i khog 
[\[87b.5\]]pa la mchod pa chen po byas nas/_yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas la phug gi rdog ma dang /_lo ma dag 'tshal nas sug pa rengs shing ma zhu bas thebs te/_dus 
[\[87b.6\]]las 'das lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_dba' rgal bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung ba dag gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur te/_rgyal po 
[\[87b.7\]]chen po las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la ma yin/_me'i khams la ma yin/_rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/_'on kyang las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang /_/las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/_/tshogs shing dus dang ldan pa na/_/lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba ri brags shig na bram ze zhig gnas pa des rigs 
[\[88a.2\]]mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu pho zhig btsas te/_ji tsam na bskyed bsrings nas chen por gyur to/_/de dus gzhan zhig na slong mo la song 
[\[88a.3\]]ba dang /_la phug spar gang zhig rnyed do/_/des ma la 'di re shig zhog shig khrus byas te 'ong ngo zhes btams so/_/des de la btams nas khrus byed du song ngo /_/sangs rgyas rnams ma byung ba'i tshe 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas ngan pa dang dman pa la thugs brtse ba can/_bas mtha'i gnas mal 
[\[88a.4\]]la dad pa/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na ri brags der phyin te/_de phyogs shig tu zhag lon nas/_snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/_lhung bzed blangs te ri brags su bsod snyoms la zhugs 
[\[88a.5\]]pa dang /_rim gyis khyim der phyin to/_/bram ze mo des de lus mdzes pa dang /_sems mdzes pa la sogs mthong ste/_de sems dang ba skyes pa des la phug spar gang rang sangs rgyas de la phul lo/_/bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos ston gyi tshig gis ma yin pas/_des 
[\[88a.6\]]ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du nam mkha'i dbye la 'phags te/_cho 'phrul sna tshogs dag bstan par brtsams so/_/so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du dad par byed pa yin pas de shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la gtugs pa dang /_des de la snying brtse ba byas nas song 
[\[88a.7\]]ngo /_/ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u de 'ongs nas smras pa/_yum la phug spar gang po de stsol cig_/des smras pa/_bu rjes su yi rang ba gyis shig_/ngas de rab tu byung ba zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/_bsod snyoms don du gnyer ba phyin nas de la phul lo zhes byas pa dang /_de bkres pas sdug 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]bsngal dang yid mi bde ba skyes te smras pa/_rab tu byung ba des de zos nas ci ste lag pa rengs shing gsud de dus byas par ma gyur/_rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_bram ze'i bu gang yin pa de ni ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dis rang sangs rgyas la 
[\[88b.2\]]tshig rtsub mo smras pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_lo mang po/_/lo brgya phrag mang po/_/lo stong phrag mang po/_/lo brgya stong phrag mang por dmyal ba rnams su skyes so/_/las kyi lhag ma de nyid kyis lan drug tu lag pa rengs shing gsud pas dus las 'das te/_da lta'i dus kyi bar 
[\[88b.3\]]'di dang lan bdun du lag pa rengs shing gsud pa kho nas dus las 'das so/_/de lta bas na rgyal po chen po las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kho na la 'bad par bya ste/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de lta bur bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar 
[\[88b.4\]]snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dad nas rjes su yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/ji tsam na ma la gnod kyis 'phags skyes po la 'di skad 
[\[88b.5\]]ces smras so/_/lha yab rgyal po mdzad cing lha dbang ma bskur ba na/_gang gi tshe nga rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe ngas shAkya rnams kha gdag ste/_de ni ngas dang por bya ba yin no zhes de lta bu'i khyu mchog gi tshig rlabs po che gsungs nas/_gcig tu chad par mdzad de 'khor gyi nang du seng 
[\[88b.6\]]ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrags pa gang lags pa de dgongs sam/_da ni de'i dus la bab lags so/_/des smras pa/_ma la gnod cing ji snyed smras pa de thams cad bya 'am/_don de 'das pa yin pas thong /_rgyal po'i bya ba dag dang rgyal po'i byed pa dag yongs su nyams par 'gyur 
[\[88b.7\]]ro/_/des smras pa/_lha dge ba rnams ni dam bcas pa la brtan pa lags pas ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin bsgrub tu gsol/_ma la gnod re zhig zhog shig dang /_de yang mi dka' bar 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_lha 'di ni thog mar dam bcas pa lags pas gdon mi 'tshal bar bgyi 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]'tshal te/_deng kho na gdugs kyang bzang /_yud tsam yang bzang /_skar ma yang bzang /_bsod nams kyi gdugs kyang bzang bas lha de dag gis ngo lon ma bshams par deng nyid gshegs pa'i rigs so/_/de nas 'phags skyes po ma la gnod kyis bslus pas dpung gi tshogs 
[\[89a.2\]]yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams gsad pa'i phyir mnyan yod nas ser skya'i gzhir chas so/_/skabs de lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen 
[\[89a.3\]]pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/_de ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyi las chud mi za bar mkhyen nas ches sngar mnyan yod nas ser skya'i gzhir gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lam kar shing shA ko Ta ka shun pa ra ri 'chus shing mi sdug 
[\[89a.4\]]pa/_lo ma srab pa/_grib ma chung ba zhig gi drung du skyil mo krung bcas te nyin mo'i gnas pas bzhugs so/_/rgyal po 'phags skyes pos bcom ldan 'das thag ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[89a.5\]]btsun pa shing lo ma sdug cing grib ma chung ngu ma lags pa gzhan dag mchis na ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de dag spangs te/_shing shA ko Ta ka shun pa 'chus shing mi sdug pa/_lo ma srab pa/_grib ma chung ngu 'di'i drung na bzhugs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po gnyen 
[\[89a.6\]]bshes rnams la ni gnyen bshes kyi grib ma bsil lo/_/'phags skyes pos bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das la gnyen rnams la gzigs shing /_thugs brtse ba mnga' ste/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das ni gnyen rnams la thugs brtse ba mdzad do snyam du rig nas de nyid nas slar log go/_/bcom 
[\[89a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gal te ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis bden pa ma mthong bar 'phags skyes po'i dmag gis thebs na bden pa dag mthong ba'i snod du mi 'gyur ro snyam du mkhyen nas/_shAkya rnams kyi nang du ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las ser skya'i gzhir byon te/_ser skya'i gzhi 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi nang na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las 'dir byon te/_n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba 'di kho na na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom 
[\[89b.2\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu bstan pa mdzad pa dang /_de thos nas 
[\[89b.3\]]srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/_kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/_kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba nas/_dge 'dun la 'bab pa la bkod do zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/ma la gnod kyis 'phags skyes 
[\[89b.4\]]po mthong nas/_des smras pa/_lha ci ste slar log_/des smras pa/_ma la gnod bcom ldan 'das la nye du rnams la gzigs shing thugs brtse ba mnga' ste/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das nye du rnams la thugs brtse ba mnga' bas rgyal po chen po nye du rnams la ni nye du'i grib ma bsil lo zhes de lta bu'i 
[\[89b.5\]]gsung 'di bka' stsal to/_/de ni nga'i snying la lhangs zhes byas kyis/_ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams gsad pa thong shig_/des smras pa/_lha dge sbyong gau ta ma ni 'dod chags dang bral ba lags te/_'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi nye du la mi lta bas deng kho na lha'i nyi ma yang bzang /_yud tsam 
[\[89b.6\]]yang bzang /_skar ma yang bzang /_bsod nams kyi gdugs kyang bzang bas deng nyid ser skya'i gzhir gshegs shig_/de mi dge ba'i grogs pos log par bzung bas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs 
[\[89b.7\]]go bskon nas ser skya'i gzhir song ste ha cang mi ring ba zhig tu phru ma btab nas 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gis skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas ser skya na gnas 
[\[90a.2\]]pa'i shAkya rnams dgum pa'i slad du ser skya'i gzhir mchis zhes thos te/_de'i slad du bdag de dpung dang bzhon pa dang bcas te/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du bskur ba'am/_khor yug gi slad rol du 'phang ba'am/_ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer lcags kyi ra bas bskor ba'am/_lcags kyi 
[\[90a.3\]]dra bas bskor bar spro lags so/_/maud gal gyi bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_khyod kyis snga ma bzhin du bskor ba zhes bya ba'i bar nus mod kyi/_'on kyang ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_dba' rgal bzhin nye bar gnas 
[\[90a.4\]]pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pa rnams gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi'i sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la ma yin/_chu'i khams la ma yin/_rlung gi khams la ma yin 
[\[90a.5\]]gyi/_'on kyang las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang /_/las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/_/tshogs shing dus dang ldan pa na/_/lus can rnams 
[\[90a.6\]]la 'bras bur smin/_/maud gal gyi bu 'jig rten ni las bdag gir bya ba/_las kyi skye gnas pa/_las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/_las la rton pa yin pas gang gis las dge ba'am sdig pa byas pa de ni las de'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/maud gal gyi bu de lta bas na las la gzhol bar bya'o/_/
[\[90a.7\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas song ngo /_/ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]chung gi tshogs go bskon nas bdag cag gsod du 'ongs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas de dag gis kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas g.yul sprad pa'i phyir 'phags skyes po logs su spags 
[\[90b.2\]]so/_/de dag bden pa mthong ba yin pas gsod par ni cung zad kyang mi byed kyi/_gzhan du na de'i tshe dbyug pa dang lcag dag gis bsnun cing /_gzhu rgyud dang /_rgyun dang /_'bring pa rnams gcod pa dang /_rna rgyan dag la mda' 'phen par byed do/_/'phags skyes po'i dpung go cha zhig par byas nas ser 
[\[90b.3\]]skya'i gnas su zhugs te sgo dag bcad nas ra ba la sbrengs te 'khod do/_/de dag gis pha rol gnod pa'i mthu nye bar bcom pa dang /_ma la gnod la smras pa/_ma la gnod mthong ngam/_shAkya rnams kyis bdag cag brlag par byas su 'ong gis thong la 'dong /_des smras pa/_lha thugs ma 'chad 
[\[90b.4\]]cig/_ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams ni bden pa mthong ba lags pas 'di rnams srog chags grog sbur yang srog dang 'bral ba'i thugs mi thub ste/_de ni 'di dag gis bdag cag gi sems can gcig kyang ma bsad pa las mngon no/_/de des bslus nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/shAkya rnams 
[\[90b.5\]]kyis kyang khrims su bcas pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag las sus kyang 'phags skyes po'am/_'phags skyes po'i dpung la bsnun par mi bya ste/_gang zhig bsnun pa de ni bdag cag gi nye du yang ma yin/_shAkya yang ma yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na shAkya sham+b+ha ka zhes bya ba zhig ri brags shig na 
[\[90b.6\]]rang zhal ta byed cing las kyi mtha' byed pa des shAkya rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa ma thos so/_/de yang so so'i skye bo zhig yin te/_des 'phags skyes po bdag cag gsad pa'i phyir ser skya'i gnas su 'ongs nas phyogs che ge mo zhig na 'dug go zhes ji lta bu yin pa thos so/_/thos nas kyang khro bas 
[\[90b.7\]]kun nas dkris pas bskyed pa'i yid mi bde ba'i mod la 'phags skyes po'i dpung gi thog tu drangs nas des der skye bo'i tshogs mang po zhig ni kha btag_/kha cig ni tha ma ma shi tsam du byas so/_/de nas 'phags skyes po yid mi bde nas smras pa/_ma la gnod khyod kyis mthong ngam/_khyod cag na re 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]'di dag bden pa mthong ba yin pas srog chags grog sbur yang srog dang 'bral bar mi byed do zhes na/_re zhig 'di gcig gis kyang bdag cag gi skye bo mang po 'di lta bu bsad na/_gal te thams cad lhags par gyur na bdag cag gi sems can 'ga' yang mi 'tsho bar 'gyur 
[\[91a.2\]]ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_dus kyis gcus pas chog gis slar 'dong /_des smras pa/_lha shAkya rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba bgyis te bdag cag las gang gis kyang 'phags skyes po'am/_'phags skyes po'i dpung la bsnun par mi bya ste/_gang zhig snun pa de ni 
[\[91a.3\]]bdag cag gi nye du yang ma yin/_shAkya yang ma yin no zhes dam bcas na de 'dis ma thos pas da ni 'di nang du mi chud pa'i gnas gang lags pa de mchis so/_/de ser skya'i gnas kyi sgor song ste 'dug nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag nang du 'ong gis sgo phye zhig_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyod kyi kho 
[\[91a.4\]]bo cag gi khrims su bcas pa dral bas da phyin chad khyod kho bo cag gi gnyen yang ma yin/_shAkya yang ma yin na/_khyod nang du lta ga la gtang song shig_/des smras pa/_bdag gis khyed kyi khrims su bca' ba ma thos te 'on kyang mang du smra ci dgos/_gal te bdag gis khyed kyi khrims su 
[\[91a.5\]]bca' ba dral na bdag gi 'khor phyir phyung shig dang gzhan du 'gro'o/_/de dag gis de'i 'khor phyir phyung ba dang /_des de dag khrid nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig 
[\[91a.6\]]tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la shAkya sham+b+ha kas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la gang la bgyi ba bgyi ba'i mtshan ma cung zad cig bdag la stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la rdzu 'phrul gyi dbu skra dang /_sen mo dang /_tshems dag cig gnang 
[\[91a.7\]]ba dang /_des de dag khyer nas yul ba ku dar chas so/_/de rnams kyis shAkya sham+b+ha ka zhes bya ba brtson pa dang /_stobs dang /_pha rol gnon pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa zhig bdag cag gi yul du rgyal srid 'dod de 'ong ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /_/
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]shes ldan dag shAkya sham+b+ha ka zhes bya ba brtson pa dang /_stobs dang /_pha rol gnon pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa zhig bdag cag gi yul du 'ong ngo zhes grag gis de'i phyir re zhig tshur shog 'dus shig_/ci de dang phrad cing 'dong ngam mi 'dong /_de dag thams cad re zhig gi drung du 
[\[91b.2\]]'dus te re zhig 'dug pa de'i bar du sham+b+ha kas 'khor rnams phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas bang chen gyi cha lugs su byas te de dag gi drung du song ba dang /_de dag gis 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i smras pa kun du spyad nas dris pa/_khyod ga las 'ongs des smras pa/_shAkya sham+b+ha ka zhes bya ba brtson 
[\[91b.3\]]pa dang /_stobs dang /_pha rol gnon pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa de rgyal srid 'dod cing 'dir 'ong bar 'dod de des spring yig 'di bskur gyis 'khod la lhogs shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_stan yang med na gang du 'khod/_des ral gri shubs nas phyung nas pha bong dum bu dum bur gshegs 
[\[91b.4\]]te 'di la 'khod cig ces byas pa dang /_de dag gis mthong nas ngo mtshar gyi mig gdangs te smras pa/_kye skyes bu de la khyod 'dra ba de lta bu'i mi ji tsam yod/_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bo ni de'i bang chen te/_kho bos lta ci zhig nus/_de la skyes bu dpa' bo gzhan mang du yod do/_/de dag 
[\[91b.5\]]gis thos nas bsngangs te phan tshun smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang gi bang chen 'di 'dra ba de'i mi gzhan ci 'dra ba zhig yod/_tshur de yong bdag cag gi rgyal por gzhug go zhes de dag gis spring yig bklags nas de la spring yig gi lan byin pa/_byon pa legs so/_/sman btags te bdag cag ni 
[\[91b.6\]]bka' bzhin bgyid pa lags so/_/des spring yig gi lan khyer nas 'khor dang bcas te 'byor pa mchog dang /_yul ba ku dar 'ongs pa dang /_de dag gis de bkur sti chen pos bsu nas/_rgyal srid la bzhag go/_/yul ba ku da pa rnams kyis shAkya sham+b+ha ka zhes bya ba rgyal srid la dbang 
[\[91b.7\]]bskur ro zhes kun du sgra grags te/_rgyal po sham+b+ha ka rgyal po sham+b+ha ka zhes bya bar ming chags so/_/des der bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang /_sen mo'i mchod rten byed du bcug ste sham+b+ha ka'i mchod rten sham+b+ha ka'i mchod rten zhes bya bar ming chags so/_/de'i chung ma dad pa med pa zhig na/_de yang de'i 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]btsun mo dam pa yin pas des de'i ngo cung zad kyang mi chod pas des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_dgon pa bsrung bgyis shig_/de dag gis dgon pa bsrung ba byas pas da dung yang de na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag mi gsod do/_/'phags skyes pos ma la gnod la smras pa/_ma la gnod da 
[\[92a.2\]]ni shAkya rnams kyis sgo rnams bcad de ra ba rnams su sbrengs nas/_bag brkyang ste 'khod na nges pa'i dus kyis 'chu bas ci zhig bya 'dod/_des smras pa/_lha ci grong khyer thams cad pha rol gnod pa gcig pus choms sam/_bdag rgyal po'i pho brang na spyod pas thos pa ni/_/mkhas pa rnams ni bzham 
[\[92a.3\]]pa dang /_/rab tu sbyin dang bslu ba dang /_/kun du spyad dang lnga pa ni/_/dpung gis don rnams sgrub par byed/_ces bgyi ste/_de lta bas na de dag la dbyen bgyi ba dgongs shig_/'phags skyes pos de dag la spring ba/_shes ldan dag da ni khyed la rjes su chags pa yang med/_khong khro ba yang med kyi/_'on kyang 
[\[92a.4\]]nga'o nir bya ba cung zhig yod de/_de ngas byas shing thob nas myur ba myur bar 'gros sgo phye shig_/shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'dus la ci sgo dbye'am/_'on te mi dbye ba dpyad par bya'o zhes de dag thams cad 'dus pa dang /_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_dbye bar bya'o/_/gzhan dag gis 
[\[92a.5\]]smras pa/_gal te phye na ma legs so/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag kha cig ni dbye'o zhes zer/_gzhan dag ni phye na ma legs so zhes zer bas/_de'i phyir gal te khyed 'dod na tshul shing rims shig dang /_skye bo mang po'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de bya'o zhes de rnams kyis tshul shing brim 
[\[92a.6\]]par brtsams so/_/skabs der bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis lan du ma zhig dge sbyong gau ta ma la glags btsal zhing klan ka btsal te phyi bzhin phyi bzhin du 'brangs kyang glags ma rnyed kyis/_ma la nga bdag gis 'di'i nye du rnams kha btag go snyam du rig nas bdag nyid shAkya rgan po 
[\[92a.7\]]zhig tu mngon par sprul te rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas des thog mar tshul shing blangs pa dang /_shAkya rgan pos tshul shing blangs so zhes thams cad kyis blangs so/_/de nas blo gcig pas 'phags skyes po la spring ba nang du zhugs shig_/de dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang nang du zhugs te zhugs 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]nas smras pa/_ngas shAkya rnams kha btag go/_/ngas shAkya rnams yongs su spangs so zhes smras pa'i tshig rjes chad ma thag tu skyes bu mtshon gzas pa rnams kyis shAkya rnams kun nas gsad par brtsams pa dang /_ku cho chen po 'thon to/_/shAkya ming chen gyi sgra de thos nas nye du la byams pas bskyed 
[\[92b.2\]]pa'i yid mi bde bas rings pa rings par 'phags skyes po'i drung du song ste/_des smras pa/_lha dam pa 'os pa bdag la dam pa stsol cig_/des smras pa/_khyod dam pa ci slong smros shig_/des smras pa/_lha bdag gi nye du rnams la mi 'jigs pa stsol cig_/'phags skyes pos smras pa/_
[\[92b.3\]]ngas khyod kyi nye du rnams la ni mi 'jigs pa mi sbyin no/_/'on kyang khyod 'khor dang bcas te phyir byung shig_/des smras pa/_lha ji srid bdag chu'i nang du nub ste 'dug pa de srid du gang dag phyir 'byung ba de dag la mi 'jigs pa stsol cig_/des blon po rnams kyi gdong du blta bar brtsams pa dang /_de dag 
[\[92b.4\]]gis smras pa/_lha ming chen 'di ni khyod kyi yum mes kyang lags/_yab kyi grogs po yang lags pas 'di la ni dam pa de stsal ba'i rigs so/_/des smras pa/_gal te de lta na de skad cig byin no/_/shAkya ming chen nye du la chags pas bskyed pa'i yid mi bde ba snying rjes brlan pa'i sems 
[\[92b.5\]]kyis chu'i rdzing du song ste/_de'i 'gram na shing sA la zhig yod pa de'i yal ga rdzing gi chu'i nang du nub pa de la des gtsug phud btags nas nam srog dang bral ba de'i bar du nub ste 'dug go/_/de na ser skya'i gnas na gnas pa'i shAkya gang dag gis tshogs pa can gyi las ma byas pa de dag las kha cig ni ser 
[\[92b.6\]]skya'i gnas nas byung ste gyad rgyu bar song ngo /_/kha cig ni bal yul du dong ngo /_/kha cig ni grong dang grong rdal dang /_rgyal po'i yul 'khor dang /_pho brang de dang de dag tu song ngo /_/gang dag gis tshogs pa can gyi las byas pa de dag ni ser skya'i gzhi'i shar sgor byung nas lho nas 'jug_/lho nas byung nas nub 
[\[92b.7\]]nas 'jug_/nub nas byung nas byang nas 'jug_/byang nas byung nas shar nas 'jug pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha kye ma shAkya rnams ni tshig go/_/kye ma shAkya rnams ni tshig ste/_'di na da ltar shar sgo nas nang du zhugs nas lhor 'byung /_lho nas zhugs nas nub tu 'byung /_nub 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]nas zhugs nas byang du 'byung /_/byang nas zhugs nas lhor 'byung ngo /_/'phags skyes pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag mes po de chur nub nas ring zhig lon gyis ltos shig blon po rnams kyis rings par chu'i rdzing du song nas brtag par brtsam pa las de tsam na dus las 
[\[93a.2\]]'das so/_/de dag 'ongs te lha dus las 'das so zhes byas pa dang /_de che thang du kun nas dkris pas smras pa/_shes ldan dag stan shoms shig_/ji srid du lam po cher khrag gi 'od pa bab par ma gyur pa de srid du phyogs 'di nas mi 'gro'o/_/skyes bu dpa' bo rnams 
[\[93a.3\]]bsad na khrag nyung ngu 'byung ba 'di ni chos nyid yin pas blon po rnams phan tshun bgro bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag sems can 'di ni sdig pa'i las byed pa dang /_dam bcas pa la brtan pa yin na/_'dir 'di snyed kyi khrag cig ga las 'byung /_rgya skegs dag cig len du gzhug go zhes de 
[\[93a.4\]]rnams kyis rgya skegs blangs nas rgya skegs kyi chu bum pa brgya stong du ma lam po cher phab pa dang /_'phags skyes pos bsams pa/_bdag gi dam bcas pa rdzogs pas 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos shAkya bdun khri bdun stong bsad de phal cher ni bden 
[\[93a.5\]]pa mthong ba sha stag go_/des sems can de snyed bsad nas gzhon nu lnga brgya dang /_bu mo lnga brgya khrid de gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba phag mo'i gnas zhes bya ba ga la ba der song ba dang /_ma la gnod kyis smras pa/_lha khyod kyis dgra yongs su bskyangs so/_/dgra 
[\[93a.6\]]'di dag ci ste yal bar bzhag sod cig_/'phags skyes pos gshed ma'i mi rnams la gtad de/_'di rnams glang po che dag gis rdzir chug shig ces bsgo'o/_/de rnams kyis glang po che dag gis rdzir gzhug par brtsams pa dang /_de dag gis glang po che de dag gan rkyal du mnan te lag pa nas lag 
[\[93a.7\]]par sbed par brtsams so/_/ma la gnod kyis smras pa/_lha khyod kyis 'di dag gi pha rol gnon pa gzigs sam mthong ngo /_/lha 'di dag yal bar bzhag na/_lha la gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ram/_ma la gnod de de bzhin te/_'di dag ji ltar gsad par bya ba dris smros shig_/des smras 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]pa/_lha dong du stsol la/_steng nas lcags kyi shal bas 'tshal du stsol cig_/de bzhin byed du chug shig_/des de dag dong du bcug nas steng nas lcags kyi shal bas mnan to/_/de nas gnyis shig bros te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo /_/son nas de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[93b.2\]]lhung bzed kyis bkab pa dang de nyid du shi'o/_/shAkya rnams bsad pa na bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu shin tu bsnyung bar gyur to/_/de nas skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos mi zhig la smras pa/_kye skyes bu khyod tshur de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar song ste 'dug la/_bcom ldan 'das ci gsung ba 
[\[93b.3\]]de khyod kyis nyon la nga la zlos shig ces smras nas song ngo /_/mi de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo nga la chu lhung bzed gang byin cig_/des bcom ldan 'das la chu lhung bzed gang phul lo/_/
[\[93b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis der chu'i thigs pa gnyis gsum tsam blugs pa dang /_de dag chu'i nang de nas du bar 'thul zhing tsi ri ri zer la sgra yang 'byin to/_/dge slong rnams cho 'phrul de mthong nas yid dad cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci zhig 
[\[93b.5\]]mdzad nas/_phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das dbu bsnyung bar gyur/_ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis sug las ci zhig bgyis na/_des nongs pa yang ma mchis/_gnod pa bgyis pa yang ma mchis par skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos bkum lags/_
[\[93b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag tshur gzhan mu stegs kun du rgyu rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba phag mo'i gnas gang du skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos shAkya rnams bsad pa ga la ba de kho nar de rnams dang /_bdag nyid kyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bya'o/_/btsun pa de 
[\[93b.7\]]ltar 'tshal lo zhes dge slong de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba phag mo'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs so/_/bre bo dang rus mthun pa'i bram ze zhig gis bcom ldan 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]'das thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste/_mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma gang gi slad du skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya nongs pa yang ma mchis/_gnod pa bgyis pa yang ma mchis pa rnams srog dang phral ba ni 
[\[94a.2\]]bsod nams ma lags pa mang po zhig bskyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bram ze de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_gang gi phyir skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya nyes pa yang med/_gnod pa byed pa yang med pa rnams srog dang phral ba ni bsod 
[\[94a.3\]]nams ma yin pa mang po zhig bskyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba phag mo'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs pa dang /_de na ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya lcags kyi shal bas bshal ba las srog gi lhag ma cung zad lus pa gang dag yin pa 
[\[94a.4\]]de dag gis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas skad ngan bton to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyogs gcig tu gshegs nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya 'di 
[\[94a.5\]]rnams kyi 'di dang lan gsum gyi bar du sgra chen po phyung ste/_sngon nya pa byed pa'i tshe nya 'dod pa'i phyir gang yin pa dang /_chom rkun pa byed pa'i tshe grong 'joms pa'i phyir gang yin pa dang /_da ltar ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya byed pa'i tshe skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos srog gi lhag ma cung 
[\[94a.6\]]zad tsam lus par byas te 'chi ba la mngon du phyogs pa'i tshe gang yin pa'o/_/'di dag thams cad kyi brdol ba la ni khyad par ram/_bsam pa'am/_tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med de mtshungs so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_shan pa 'di las de dang bzo de dang 'tsho ba des glang po 
[\[94a.7\]]che la zhon te 'gro ba'am/_rta la zhon te 'gro ba'am/_shing rtar zhon te 'gro ba'am/_dpung bu chung dang bcas te 'gro ba'am/_nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po grub nas gnas pa lta cig la mthong ngam/_thos sam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/dge slong dag legs so legs so/_/
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]ngas kyang shan pa 'di las de dang zhes bya ba nas/_nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs nas gnas pa zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/_ma mthong ma thos so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shan pa rnams ni sdig pa'i bsam pas rtog par byed de/_des na 'di glang po che la zhon te 'gro 
[\[94b.2\]]ba'am/_rta la zhon te 'gro ba'am/_shing rtar zhugs te 'gro ba'am/_dpung bu chung dang chas te 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur la/_nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_khyed kyis bya gag gsod pa'am/_phag 
[\[94b.3\]]gsod pa'am/_nya pa'am/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor ba'am/_bya ba'am/_bong bu rgyas 'chor ba'am/_ba lang gsod pa dag las de dang zhes bya ba nas/_nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas pa de mthong ngam/_thos sam zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[94b.4\]]'di ltar ba glang gsod pa'i sdig pa'i bsam pas rtog par byed de/_des na de glang po che la zhon te 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/_nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag re zhig byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i 
[\[94b.5\]]srog chags rnams kyis kyang sdig pa'i bsam pas brtag na glang po che la zhon te 'gro ba'am/_rta la zhon te 'gro ba'am/_shing rta la zhugs te 'gro ba'am/_dpung bu chung dang chas te 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur la/_nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas par yang mi 'gyur 
[\[94b.6\]]na/_skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes po slob bas longs zhes smras pas tshul khrims kyi gzi brjid kyis nye bar bcom pa lta zhig glang po che la zhon te 'gro ba'am/_rta la zhon te 'gro ba'am/_shing rtar zhugs te 'gro ba'am/_dpung bu chung dang chas te 'gro ba'am/_nor gyi phung po 
[\[94b.7\]]rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas pa lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos te/_de ni gnas med do/_/dge slong dag ko sa la'i rigs 'di 'di nas zhag bdun na sbrul gyis bltas pa bzhin du rabs chad par 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes po yang ma la gnod dang bcas te zhag bdun 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]na mes tshig nas cho nge 'don bzhin dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_gang mgal dum la yang ngan sems mi bya na rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos/_dge slong dag khyed 
[\[95a.2\]]kyis de lta bur bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa shAkya lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyi las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas nongs pa yang ma ma mchis/_gnod pa bgyis pa yang 
[\[95a.3\]]ma mchis par skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos srog dang phral/_bcom ldan 'das kyang shAkya rnams bkum pa'i tshe dbu snyun tshabs chen pos thebs par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di dag nyid dang /_ngas las byas shing bsags 
[\[95a.4\]]pa tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_dba' rgal bzhin nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung ba dag yin te/_'di dag dang ngas las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i 
[\[95a.5\]]khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la ma yin/_me'i khams la ma yin/_rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi 'on kyang las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur 
[\[95a.6\]]te/_bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang /_/las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba chu bo zhig gi 'gram na nya pa lnga brgya gnas so/_/de rnams kyis nya gnyis shig rgya mtsho chen po na 
[\[95a.7\]]phan tshun rgyu rgyu ba las chu bo der zhugs pa mthong ba dang /_de rnams rab tu dga' ba skyes nas de dag nya rgya chen pos bcus so/_/de rnams kyis de gnyis kyi lus mthong nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_'di dag lus che ches pas gal te 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]bsad na sha ldom par mi 'gyur te/_de 'drul bar 'gyur ro/_/de na kha cig gis smras pa/_'di la ci zhig bsgrub tu yod/_gcig ni bsad la gcig ni btags te gzhag mod/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_'di yang che ste/_'di yang ldom par mi 'gyur bas sdong po la btags la 
[\[95b.2\]]gson par sha bcad cing bcad cing btsong ngo /_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_legs te de ltar bya'o de dag gis de ltar bya bar brtsams pa dang /_de dag de ltar gcod pa na rang gi skad du 'o dod 'bod par brtsams so/_/de dag mi bde ba de nya pa'i khye'u zhig gis thos nas rab tu dga' ba skyed par byed do/_/
[\[95b.3\]]de nas nya de gnyis de ltar bcad pa'i tshe de rnams la 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed de/_gang bdag cag gis nyes pa yang med/_gnod pa byed pa yang med par 'di dag gis 'di ltar bsad de/_de'i phyir bdag cag kyang gang du 'di dag nyes pa yang med/_gnod pa byas pa yang med par gsod par 'gyur ba 
[\[95b.4\]]der skye bar gyur cig_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_nya gnyis po gang dag yin pa de dag ni 'phags skyes po dang /_ma la gnod 'di dag kho na yin no/_/nya pa lnga brgya gang dag yin pa de dag ni shAkya lnga brgya po 'di dag kho na yin te/_gang 'di gnyis kyis nya de dag de ltar bsad pa'i las kyi 
[\[95b.5\]]rnam par smin pas/_da ltar 'phags skyes po dang ma la gnod dag gis shAkya gyur pa nyes pa yang med/_gnod pa byas pa yang med pa rnams lcags kyi shal bas mnan cing 'o dod 'bod bzhin bsad do/_/nya pa'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na de yin te/_gang ngas nya bsad pa na 
[\[95b.6\]]rab tu dga' ba bskyed pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar nga mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang dbu snyun tshabs chen pos thebs par gyur to/_/gal te ngas yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob par ma gyur na nga yang las 'di lta bu dag thob par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang ser skya na gnas 
[\[95b.7\]]pa'i shAkya rnams kyis las gang byas pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba chom rkun lnga brgya zhig gis lam du 'gro ba dag bcom nas phrogs pa'i rdzas dag khyer te/_ri brags shig tu 'joms su song ngo /_/de dag gis ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de thams cad bcom nas phrogs 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]so/_/khyim bdag gnyis shig yang tog tu 'dzegs te 'dug pa dang /_rkun po rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang dag 'dir 'dzegs pa de dag bobs shig_/thams cad kyi thams cad du med par gyur ta re/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_ji srid 'tsho ba de srid du mi 
[\[96a.2\]]'babs so/_/de rnams kyis rtswa dang shing phal mo che bcer nas yang tog de me btang ba dang de gnyis tsha bas sdug bsngal bskyed pas gdungs te 'di lta bu sems bskyed do/_/bdag cag nyes pa yang med/_gnod pa byas pa yang med par 'di rnams kyis bsad pas bdag cag kyang 'di rnams nyes 
[\[96a.3\]]pa yang med/_gnod pa byas pa yang med par gsod par gyur cig_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_khyim bdag gnyis po gang dag yin pa de dag ni 'phags skyes po dang ma la gnod 'di dag kho na yin no/_/g.yon can lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag ni shAkya lnga brgya po 'di dag kho na yin 
[\[96a.4\]]te/_gang 'di rnams chom rkun par gyur pas de dag nyes pa yang med/_gnod pa byas pa yang med par srog dang bral ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar 'phags skyes pos ma la gnod dang bsdongs nas shAkya lnga brgya po 'di dag nyes pa yang med/_gnod pa byas pa yang med par srog 
[\[96a.5\]]dang phral lo/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag la gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi yang gcig tu dkar/_'dren ma rnams kyi yang 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang 'dren ma rnams spangs nas 
[\[96a.6\]]las gcig tu dkar ba dag la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong rnams kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/_/'phags skyes bos shAkya rnams de ltar bsad nas mnyan yod du song ngo /_/de nang du zhugs pa dang /_rgyal po'i gzhon nu rgyal bu rgyal byed steng gi khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]song nas skyes pa med par 
[\[96a.7\]]rol mos rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa/_'phags skyes pos mthong nas des smras pa/_shes ldan dag rtse ba'o ni su zhig blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_gzhon nu rgyal bu rgyal byed lags so/_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag de bos shig_/de rnams 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]kyis de bos pa dang /_'phags skyes pos smras pa/_rgyal bu rgyal byed nga ni dgra bsad nas 'ongs na khyod rtse zhing 'dug gam/_des smras pa/_lha'i dgra su dag zhig lags/_shAkya rnams so/_/gal te shAkya rnams khyod kyi dgra lags na/_mdza' bo ji lta bu dag cig lags/_
[\[96b.2\]]de smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di yang de dag gi phyogs kho na yin pas 'di gsad par bya'o zhes de dag gis de bsad de dus las 'das nas lha gya nom pa sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi nang du skyes nas/_de'i mi'i rol mo'i sgra ma zhi bar lha'i sgra byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[96b.3\]]byung ba de la tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa/_bsod nams byas pa 'dir dga' phyi mar dga'/_/gnyi gar dga' ste de ni bdag nyid kyi/_/las rnam smin mthong de dga' rab tu dga'/_/'gro ba bzang por song ba phyir zhing dga'/_/bsod nams byas pa 'dir mgu phyi mar mgu/_/
[\[96b.4\]]gnyi gar mgu ste de ni bdag nyid kyi/_/las rnam smin mthong de mgu rab tu mgu/_/'gro ba bzang por song ba phyir zhing mgu/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol te/_btsun pa tshigs bcad 'di'i don ma mjal lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[96b.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gzhon nu rgyal bu rgyal byed de nyes pa med cing gnod pa med par skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos srog dang phral te de'i mi'i rol mo'i sgra ma zhi bar lha'i sgra byung ngo /_/ngas de las dgongs nas 'di skad du bsod nams byas pa 'dir dga' phyi mar 
[\[96b.6\]]dga' zhes bya ba nas/_'gro ba bzang por song ba phyir zhing mgu zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na 'phags skyes po btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du ngom zhing rnam par ngom ste/_nga rgyal can mthu dang ldan pa/_
[\[96b.7\]]dpa' bo brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa can gang dag yin pa de dag ngas rmeg med par byas te/_nga dang 'dra ba su zhig yod ces zer ro/_/de nas 'phags skyes pos shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya khrid pa de dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khyod kyi gang dag rmeg med byas/_/de dag rgyal 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]sras shAkya'i sras/_/bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin/_/khyod kyis 'dir smras ci zhig rung /_de skad ces smras pa dang /_khros nas blon po rnams la tshigs su bcad pas bsgo ba/_klu rnams bsad na klu'i bu mo dag_/dug gis gang ba sprin gyis khebs pa ltar/_/
[\[97a.2\]]'di dag la gor rkang lag rnams chod la/_/nye du de dag nyid rjes myur du thong /_/blon po rnams kyis shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dmar bu can gyi rdzing 'gram du lag pa dang rkang pa dag bcad de/_de lag pa'i dong lag pa'i dong zhes bya bar ming chags nas gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang de 
[\[97a.3\]]bzhin du mdo sde'i mgo la bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na lag pa'i dong gi rdzing 'gram na bzhugs so zhes dris so//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po dgu pa/_de rnams sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba na bsams 
[\[97a.4\]]pa/_bdag cag mi bzad pa dog pa nyam nga bar gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma dgongs pa lta snyam mo/_/skabs de lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_thugs su ma chud pa'am/_rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi 
[\[97a.5\]]mnga' ste/_de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos bskul nas phyogs der gshegs pa dang /_ji tsam na bud med de dag thams cad sgren mor 'dug pa gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed do/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[97a.6\]]ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs sems kyis shes so/_/gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs 
[\[97a.7\]]sems kyis mi shes na/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_kye ma lha'i bu mo bde sogs kyis gos dag dang chu khyer te 'ongs kyang bla na snyam du bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs bskyed ma thag tu lha'i bu mo bde sogs 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]kyis ras zung lnga brgya dang /_mtsho chen po ma dros pa las chu blangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa ras yug lnga brgya 'di dag dang chab 'tshal te mchis so/_/bcom 
[\[97b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_song la shAkya'i bu mo 'o ni rnams dbugs phyung ste/_dbugs phyung nas rkang pa dang lag pa dag khrus la gos rnams skon cig_/btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/_des de rnams kyi rkang pa dang lag pa dag bkrus nas gos rnams bskon no/_/de 
[\[97b.3\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams kyi sdug bsngal rgyun bcad do/_/rgyun bcad nas bka' stsal pa/_sring mo dag khyed nyid kyis las 'di 
[\[97b.4\]]dag byas shing bsags pa/_tshogs pa rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_dba' rgal bzhin nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung ba yin te/_khyed kyis las byas shing bsags pa rnams gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/_sring mo dag las la gzhol bar gyis shig 
[\[97b.5\]]ces gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs so/_/de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dang bar byas nas dus las 'das te/_rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/chos nyid kyis lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste/_gang 
[\[97b.6\]]nas shi 'phos pa dang /_gang du skyes pa dang /_las gang gis yin pa'o/_/de rnams kyis mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang /_las gang gis zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dang bar byas pas yin par 
[\[97b.7\]]mthong ngo /_/de nas sngon shAkya'i bu mo byed byed pa'i lha lnga brgya po de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag zhag tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'dong ba ni cha ma yin gyis/_ma la bdag cag zhag ma lon pa nyid du bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo/_/de 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]nas sngon shAkya'i bu mo byed byed pa'i lha rnams rna cha gdub kor dri ma med pa g.yo ba thogs shing /_lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang nas 
[\[98a.2\]]rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog rnams kyis gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin 
[\[98a.3\]]mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad pa dang /_de rnams kyis de thos nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas ched du 
[\[98a.4\]]brjod pa lan gsum brjod pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bdag cag la sman btags pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la mas ma bgyis/_phas ma lags/_rgyal pos ma lags/_lha rnams kyis ma lags/_rang gi skye bo dang gnyen sdug pa'i tshogs kyis ma lags/_sngon gyi mes po rnams 
[\[98a.5\]]kyis ma lags/_dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bcad/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/_lha dang mi rnams la ni bkod do/_/yang smras pa/_khyod kyi mthu yis ngan song lam 
[\[98a.6\]]dag ni/_/shin tu mi bzad nyes mang ldan pa bcad/_/mtho ris sgo phye bdag gis bsod nams ni/_/shin tu bzang dang mya ngan 'das lam thob/_/khyod bsnyen de ring bdag gis skyon bral zhing /_/shin tu rnam par dag mig dag pa thob/_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i go 'phang zhi ba'ang thob/_/sdug bsngal 
[\[98a.7\]]rgya mtsho pha rol mchog tu rgal/_/'gro bar lha min lha dang mis mchod cing /_/skye rga 'chi ba'i skyon dang bral ba po/_/srid pa stong du mthong rab rnyed dka' ba/_/thub pa khyod deng mthong ba 'bras bu mchis/_/de nas se mo do 'phyang dga' skyes rnams/_/zhabs gnyis la ni gdud pa byas nas kyang /_/dgra 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]thul ba la yongs su bskor byas nas/_/slar yang lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs dong /_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya po dag gis las ci zhig bgyis na des lag pa dang rkang pa dag bkum/_
[\[98b.2\]]las ci zhig bgyis na des lha rnams kyi nang du skyes/_las ci zhig bgyis na des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa/_tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/_lus can 
[\[98b.3\]]rnams la 'bras bur smin/_/ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_
[\[98b.4\]]skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i gsung rab la 'di rnams rab tu byung bar gyur to/_/de na 'di rnams kyis slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong rnams la lag rdum rkang 
[\[98b.5\]]rdum zhes bya ba'i tshig kun du spyod pa kun du spyad de las de'i rnam par smin pas lo mang por dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/las de nyid kyi lhag mas 'di rnams tshe rabs lnga brgyar lag pa dang /_rkang pa dag bcad de/_da lta'i bar du yang lag pa dang rkang pa dag bcad pa yin no/_/gang nga la sems 
[\[98b.6\]]rab tu dang bar byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/gang 'di rnams kyis de na lung mnos pa dang /_bklags pa dang /_kha ton byas pa des na nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas pa yin no/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas/_
[\[98b.7\]]brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bur bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas mi de 'phags skyes po'i drung du 'ongs pa dang /_'phags skyes pos smras pa/_kye skyes bu bcom ldan 'das ci gsung /_des smras pa/_lha bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'di nas zhag bdun 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]na ko sa la'i rgyal rigs sbrul gyis bltas pa bzhin du rabs 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/'phags skyes po yang ma la gnod dang bcas te mes tshig bzhin sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo /_/'phags skyes pos thos nas lag pa 'gram pa la 
[\[99a.2\]]gtad nas sems khong du chud de 'dug go/_/ma la gnod kyis smras pa/_lha khyod ci'i phyir phyag 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/_des smras pa/_ma la gnod 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces zhag bdun na 'phags skyes po ma la gnod dang bcas te mes tshig 
[\[99a.3\]]bzhin sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung na/_da ji ltar sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug_/des smras pa/_lha gang zhig bram ze 'ongs pa la 'tshal ma mi stsol ba de yang phung ba brgya stong du sems na/_lhas dge sbyong gau ta ma'i gnyen bshes de snyed cig 
[\[99a.4\]]bkum pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_de de skad gsung yang rung /_gzhan gsung yang rung ste/_'on kyang lhas skyed mos tshal du chab kyi nang du khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ka ba gcig pa zhig bgyid du stsal te/_lha der gshegs nas dgung bdun du bzhugs la dgung bdun 'das pa dang /_slar mnyan 
[\[99a.5\]]yod du gshegs par mdzod cig_/des smras pa/_de ltar byas 'gro'o zhes de btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te der song nas 'dug go/_/nyin zhag gcig thal ba dang /_ma la gnod kyis smras pa/_lha dgung zhag bdun las gcig ni thal lags/_lhag ma dgung zhag drug mchis 
[\[99a.6\]]te/_dgung zhag drug 'das nas mnyan yod du gshegs par mdzad do zhes bya ba nas/_nyin zhag gnyis dang gsum nas bdun pa la lha deng kho na la mnyan yod du gshegs par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i bar de bzhin du byas so/_/de na yul ngan zhig kyang byung bar gyur to/_/bud med ni rgyan la dga' ba yin 
[\[99a.7\]]pas btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyis smras pa/_phu nu mo dag bdag cag deng mnyan yod du 'dong dgos pas rgyan thogs par bya'o zhes de rnams kyis rgyan thogs par brtsams so/_/de na btsun mo'i 'khor zhig gis sngas nang tshangs can gyi steng du nor bu me shel bzhag nas rgyan thogs par brtsams 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]so/_ji tsam na yul ngan sangs pa dang /_nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis me shel gyi thog tu bab nas me byung ba de sngas nang tshangs can la mched do/_/de las kyang khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la mched nas btsun mo'i 'khor rnams ni bros so/_/'phags skyes po dang ma la gnod tshig bzhin bros par brtsams pa dang /_
[\[99b.2\]]ji tsam na mi ma yin pa dag gis sgo rnams bcad nas 'phags skyes pos tshig bzhin du smras pa/_ma la gnod tshig go/_/des smras pa/_lha tshos so zhes de dag de skad du 'o dod 'bod cing dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la
