[\[99b.3\]]tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa/_sdig pa byas pas 'dir tshig phyi mar tshig_/gnyi gar tshig ste de ni bdag nyid kyi/_/las rnam smin mthong de tshig rab tu tshig_/'gro ba ngan par song ba phyir zhing tshig_/sdig pa byas pa 'dir smre phyi mar smre/_/gnyi gar smre ste de ni bdag nyid kyi/_/las 
[\[99b.4\]]rnam smin mthong de smre rab tu smre/_/'gro ba ngan par song ba phyir zhing smre/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gi don bdag gis ma 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[99b.5\]]dga' bo skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes po de ma la gnod dang bcas te mes tshig bzhin dmyal ba mnar med par song ste ngas de las dgongs nas/_sdig pa byas pa 'dir tshig phyi mar tshig_/ces bya ba nas/_'gro ba ngan par song ba phyir zhing smre/_/zhes bya ba'i bar gsungs pa yin no/_/gang gi 
[\[99b.6\]]tshe 'phags skyes pos shAkya rnams bsad pa de'i tshe shAkya'i bu mo rnams kyis de rnams kyi rgyan dag mthong nas ngu bar brtsams te/_de rnams kyis bsams pa/_shAkya rnams ni 'phags pa rnams la mngon par dad pa yin pas rgyan 'di dag 'phags pa rnams la dbul lo zhes de rnams kyis rgyan de dag 
[\[99b.7\]]dge slong rnams la phul lo/_/drug sde rnams kyis rgyan de dag thogs nas ser skya'i gnas su zhugs pa dang /_shAkya'i bu mo rnams kyis de dag mthong nas de bzhin du ngu bar gyur cing smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag cag gis de'i slad du 'di dag phul na nyes dmigs de nyid byung bar gyur to zhes byas 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]pa dang /_de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams rgyan thogs pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis rgyan spel ma dang /_'phyang 
[\[100a.2\]]phrul can dang /_zla gam can dang /_gser skud dang /_rgyan sna tshogs ci yang rung ba yang thogs par mi bya ste/_thogs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//sdom ni/_blangs pa dang ni bslab pa dang /_/du ba'i ri lu sman gce'u bcas/_/lhung bzed snod dang zu nga dang /_/mar dkar 'bru mar 
[\[100a.3\]]byug pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/ri brags zhig na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par 
[\[100a.4\]]byed do/_/dus gzhan zhig na de nye du rnams kyang zad par gyur/_nor yang zad/_longs spyod kyang zad nas/_des bsams pa/_da ni bdag rgas pas nor bsgrub par bya yang mi nus/_bdag la longs spyod dag kyang med/_bdag gi nye du rnams kyang dus las 'das pas/_song la rab tu 
[\[100a.5\]]'byung ngo snyam du rig nas des chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo da ni nga rgas pas nor bsgrub par bya yang mi nus/_nga la longs spyod dag kyang med/_nga'i nye du rnams kyang dus las 'das pas khyod la dris te song la rab tu 'byung ngo /_/khyim bdag de drang bo zhig na de ni g.yos kun du spyod cing rtag tu skyes pa 
[\[100a.6\]]gzhan dag la lta ba zhig pas des smras pa/_rje'i sras de bzhin du mdzod cig_/'on kyang dus dus su ltar spyon cig_/des de bzhin bya'o zhes dam bcas nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/_dge slong zhig gi drung du phyin nas smras pa/_'phags pa rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/_/des smras 
[\[100a.7\]]pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod 'jigs pa med par spobs pa dge ste legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phan yon lnga yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas ni rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya ba nyid du 'os te/_lnga gang zhe na/_bdag gis rang gi don ma 'dres pa thob par 'gyur bar yang dag par 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid dang /_bdag gang dag gi bran dang /_mngag gzhug pa dang /_bkol ba dang /_rang dbang med pa dang /_dga' mgur 'gror med pa yin pa de dag gis mchod par bya bar 'gyur ba dang /_bstod par bya bar 'gyur bar 
[\[100b.2\]]yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid dang /_bdag mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa 
[\[100b.3\]]dang bde ba bla na med pa ma thob pa las yongs su nyams kyang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid dang /_sangs rgyas rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos skyes bu dam pa yang dag par song ba mchog rnams 
[\[100b.4\]]kyi rnam grangs du mar rab tu 'byung ba bsngags par yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid do zhes bka' stsal te/_khyod kyis sems bskyed pa dges legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung shig ces des de rab tu phyung bsnyen par 
[\[100b.5\]]rdzogs par byas so/_/de nas zhag gnyis gsum zhig kun du spyad pa'i chos bslabs nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mi sos kyis mnyan yod rgya chen por rang gi spyod yul pha'i yul du bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing 'tsho bar gyis shig_/de phyi de nyin snga dro sham thabs 
[\[100b.6\]]dang chos gos bgos/_lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/_/de bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na rang gi chung ma 'dra ba'i bud med cig mthong nas/_des bsams pa/_bdag gi sngon gyi chung ma de la rab tu byung nas ltar 'ong ngo des dam bcas kyis de'i phyir bdag 
[\[100b.7\]]da gzod rab tu byung ba yin pas dus cung zad cig bsdad la de mi dga' bar mi 'gyur bar de ltar 'gro'o snyam du bsams nas/_bsod snyoms la brgyus te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo /_/de dus cung zhig bsdad nas/_mkhan po la smras pa/_mkhan po bdag la sngon kyi 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]mchis 'brang zhig mchis te/_de la bdag gis rab tu byung nas ltar mchi'o zhes dam bcas pas de'i slad du gnang bar mdzod cig dang mchi'o/_/des smras pa/_bu song la khyod kyis sems srungs shig_/des smras pa/_bsrung bar bgyi'o zhes smras nas chas 
[\[101a.2\]]pa dang /_rim gyis ri brags der phyin no/_/des de rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ba dang /_dga' ba dang bcas shing myur ba myur bas bsu nas smras pa/_rje'i sras byon pa legs so/_/byon pa legs te/_ring mo zhig lon nas mthong ngo zhes smras nas/_reg par brtsams pa dang /_des 
[\[101a.3\]]smras pa/_ci byed chos gos dag blangs nas mnyel bsor gzhug mod/_des smras pa/_ma reg shig_/ci'i slad du mkhan pos nga la khyod kyi sems srungs shig ces bsgo'o/_/des smras pa/_rje'i sras khyod sems srung la rag mod/_bdag gis bkag gam/_ci zhes des de'i chos 
[\[101a.4\]]gos blangs stan bting ste rkang pa bkrus nas bskus so/_/de nas khrus byas nas zan byin te/_de yang de nyid du zan bza' bar 'dug pa dang /_des smras pa ci byed des smras pa/_rje'i sras khyod dang lhan cig zan zos nas ring mo zhig lon no/_/des smras pa/_mkhan pos nga la khyod kyis 
[\[101a.5\]]sems srungs shig ces bsgo'o/_/des smras pa/_rje'i sras khyod sems srung la rag mod/_bdag gis bkag gam ci bdag khyod dang lhan cig zan zos nas ring mo zhig lon pas gdon mi za bar bza'o zhes des de dang lhan cig zan zos so/_/de nas mal bshams nas smras pa/_rje'i 
[\[101a.6\]]sras gzims mal 'dir shul gyis mnyel ba'i mnyel sos shig_/des rkang pa bkrus nas nyal ba dang /_de yang de nyid du nyal bar brtsams so/_/des smras pa ci byed/_des smras pa/_rje'i sras khyod dang lhan cig nyal nas ring mo zhig lags pas ma bkyon cig_/des smras pa/_mkhan pos 
[\[101a.7\]]nga la khyod kyi sems srungs shig ces bsgo'o/_/des smras pa/_rje'i sras khyod sems srung la rag mod/_bdag gis bkag gam ci/_khyod dang bdag lhan cig nyal nas ring mo zhig lags pas gdon mi za bar nyal bar bgyi'o/_/des ma btub pa dang /_des bsams pa/_mgul nas 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]'jus na bdag gi dbang du 'gyur ro snyam nas/_des de'i mgul nas 'jus pa dang /_bud med ni reg pa'i dug yin pas reg pa tsam gyis log par spyad do/_/dus ring zhig 'dug nas smras pa/_bzang mo 'gro'o/_/des bsams pa/_'di dang bdag lhan cig gsang ba byas pa gang yin pa 
[\[101b.2\]]de dge slong rnams kyis mi shes pas skye bo mang pos shes par bya'o/_/des na de dag gis bskrad pas slar 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/_des smras pa/_rje'i sras de bzhin du ji ltar bzhud/_lam rgyags kyi zong kAr ShA pa Na dag snoms shig_/des smras pa/_bzang mo dge slong 
[\[101b.3\]]rnams dbyig la mi reg na ji ltar blang /_des smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag gis ji nas kyang mi reg pa de ltar bgyis snoms shig ces des dbyig thum por bcug nas bcings te/_'khar gsil gyi rtsa ba la btags so/_/dregs pas ldongs pa dang /_sred pas ldongs pa rnams ni mi byed pa cung zad 
[\[101b.4\]]kyang med pas des de khyer te song ba dang /_rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin no/_/drug sde rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stong pa yin pas tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug pa des de thag ring po nas 
[\[101b.5\]]mthong na skra spra ba'i me tog lta bu smin ma rab tu 'phyang ba zhig nas/_des bsams pa/_'di dge slong gnas brtan zhig 'ong gis bsur 'gro'o zhes de bsur song ste/_gnas brtan byon pa legs so/_/byon pa legs so zhes byas pa dang /_de slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo zhes 
[\[101b.6\]]zer nas tshe dang ldan pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_kye ma 'di ni rgan zhugs zhig ste/_slob dpon yang mi shes/_mkhan po yang mi shes so/_/re zhig 'di ga las 'ongs pa dri'o snyam du bsams nas smras pa/_rgan zhugs khyod ga las 'ongs/_des smras pa/_slob dpon bdag sngon gyi mchis 
[\[101b.7\]]'brang zhig mchis pa ltar mchis te/_bdag de nas mchis so/_/rgan zhugs legs te khyod ni byas pa gzo ba zhig go/_/byas pa gzo ba ni mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na/_'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_'di ltar 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa tshor bar bya zhing byas pa chung ngu yang chud gzan par mi bya na/_chen po lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bka' stsal to/_/sngon gyi chung ma mthong ngam/_mthong lags so/_/de khams bde'am/_khams bde lags so/_/rgan zhugs de ni go na 'khar gsil gyi rtsa ba la 'phyang 
[\[102a.2\]]ba'o ni ci yin/_slob dpon de shul rgyags kyi zong du kAr ShA Na dag cig stsal ba lags so/_/rgan zhugs khyod lta bsod nams byas pa zhig ste/_sngon gyi chung ma yang mthong la/_rnyed pa yang grub bo/_/slob dpon khyod kyi bka' drin lags so/_/des bsams pa/_'di las gzhan yang 'byung 
[\[102a.3\]]gis/_re zhig 'di la dri bar bya'o snyam nas/_des de la tshig 'jam po brjod pa'i tshul gyis thams cad dris pa dang /_rgan zhugs de drang po'i rang bzhin can zhig pas des ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad do/_/des smras pa/_rgan zhugs de thams cad mkhan po la smros shig dang /_khyod kyi mkhan po yid 
[\[102a.4\]]dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de de ltar bslus pas ji ltar gyur pa mkhan po la bsnyad pa dang /_des kyang dge slong rnams la bsnyad/_dge slong rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag skyes bu gti mug 'di sbyor ba nyams kyi 
[\[102a.5\]]bsam pa ni ma nyams so/_/'di phas pham pa byung ste/_de lta bas na gnang gis rab tu byung ma thag tu phas pham par gyur pa'i chos bzhi rgyas par shod cig dang /_nyes pa 'dir mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi 
[\[102a.6\]]kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na dge slong dga' ba can zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de rtag tu dgon pa nags mtha'i gnas mal dag na bsam gtan byed pa zhig pas/_de'i ming bsam gtan pa dga' ba can zhes bya bar chags so/_/de gang gi tshe skyil mo krung bcas nas bsam 
[\[102a.7\]]gtan byed pa de'i tshe bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis gtses so/_/de dus gzhan zhig na skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dang /_bdud kyi ris kyi lha mo zhig gis de'i skyil mo krung gi steng du 'dug pa dang /_bud med ni reg pa'i dug yin pas des de dang lhan cig log par spyad do/_/log par spyad ma thag tu zug 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]rngus zug pa bzhin du gnod nas sems bskyed pa bdag gis mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten pas/_bdag song la 'babs so snyam mo/_/yang bsams pa/_bdag gis bcab pa'i sems gcig gis kyang ma bcabs pas re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/_gal 
[\[102b.2\]]te skal ba yod pa zhig tu gyur na ni gnas so/_/'on te med na ni dga' mgur spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_lag pa g.yas pas ni chos gos rnams khyer/_lag pa g.yon pas ni yan lag skyes bkab nas ngom zung gnag cing mchi ma dang bcas bzhin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 
[\[102b.3\]]song ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor dge slong brgya stong du ma'i gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs te chos ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' ba can rgyang ring po kho na nas gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang dgongs pa/_gal te dga' ba can la ma smras na gang 
[\[102b.4\]]khrag dron por skyugs nas dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do snyam du dgongs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa dga' ba can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dga' ba can 'ongs pa legs so/_/khyod ji ste ngom zung gnag_/des gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag sngon ni dga' ba 
[\[102b.5\]]can lags kyi da ni mi dga' ba can lags so/_/dga' ba can ci ste de skad smra/_khyod kyis ci zhig byas/_btsun pa bdag gis bslab pa ma phul bar mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten te/_de ni bcab pa'i sems gcig gis kyang ma bcabs lags so/_/dga' 
[\[102b.6\]]ba can khyod ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa la slob par spro'am/_bcom ldan 'das spro lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong dga' ba can gyis spyad par bya ba ma yin pa spyad kyang sems gcig gis kyang ma bcabs pas/_
[\[102b.7\]]'di phas pham par ma gyur gyi/_dge slong dga' ba can dang gzhan yang rung ste/_'di lta bu gang yin pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa'i sdom pa byin cig_/sbyin pa yang 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bshams nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bsgo nas dge 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]'dun thams cad 'dus te 'dug pa dang /_dge slong dga' ba can gyis rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gdud pa byas la rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_bdag dge slong dga' 
[\[103a.2\]]ba can zhes bgyi bas bslab pa ma phul bar mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten te/_de ni bcab pa'i sems gcig gis kyang ma bcabs nas/_bdag dge slong dga' ba can dge 'dun las ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa gsol na/_dge 'dun thugs brtse ba can btsun pa rnams 
[\[103a.3\]]kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_bdag dge slong dga' ba can la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa stsal du gsol/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong dga' ba can thos pa'i nyen kor nas bkar te mthong ba'i nyen kor du bzhag la/_dge slong gcig gis 
[\[103a.4\]]gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong dga' ba can 'dis bslab pa ma phul bar mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten te/_de ni 'dis 'chab pa'i sems gcig gis kyang ma bcabs nas/_dge slong dga' ba can 'di dge 'dun las 
[\[103a.5\]]ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong dga' ba can la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa 
[\[103a.6\]]rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong dga' ba can 'dis bslab pa ma phul bar mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten te/_de ni 'dis bcab pa'i sems gcig gis kyang ma bcabs nas/_dge slong dga' ba can 'di dge 'dun las ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa gsol te/_de'i slad 
[\[103a.7\]]du dge 'dun gyis dge slong dga' ba can la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa stsal na/_dge slong dga' ba can la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa stsal bar tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_las brjod 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]pa gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa yang de bzhin du bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong dga' ba can la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ngas bslab pa byin pa'i dge slong gi kun du spyad pa'i chos 
[\[103b.2\]]bca' bar bya ste/_bslab pa byin pa'i dge slong gis rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong gi gus par smra ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_mngon du ldang ba dang /_thal mo sbyor ba dang /_gdud ba'i las bdag gir mi bya/_stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya/_gal te 'dug na yang stan ches dma' 
[\[103b.3\]]ba long shig_/'chags gcig tu 'chag par mi bya/_gal te 'chag na yang gom pa bsri'o/_/phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu 'gro bar mi bya/_gal te 'gro na dge sbyong mdun du gtang bar bya/_steng g.yogs 
[\[103b.4\]]gcig par nyal bar mi bya/_rab tu dbyung bar mi bya/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya gnas sbyin par mi bya/_dge sbyong gi ched du gzhag par mi bya/_gsol ba'i las mi bya/_gsol ba dang gnyis ma yin/_gsol ba dang bzhi mi bya'o/_/las byed par bsgo bar mi bya/_dge slong 
[\[103b.5\]]ma'i ston pa mi bya/_sngon bskos pa zhig na yang des dge slong ma la gdams par mi bya/_dge slong la tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_lta ba nyams pa dang /_spyod pa nyams pa dang /_'tsho ba nyams pas gleng bar mi bya/_des gdams ngag dbog par mi bya/_gso sbyong ma yin/_
[\[103b.6\]]dgag dbye ma yin/_gsol ba'i las ma yin/_gsol ba dang gnyis ma yin/_gsol ba dang bzhi ma yin/_nang par sngar langs te sgo dbye bar bya/_mar me'i snod bsal bar bya/_gtsug lag khang chag chag gdab par bya/_phyag dar bya/_ba lang gi lci ba sar pa bzang pos 
[\[103b.7\]]byug par bya/_bshang gci khang phyag dar bya/_sa dang lo ma dag dang chu grang mo 'am dron mo dus dang mthun par gzhag par bya/_de nas wa'i kha phyag par bya/_dus shes par bya ste/_stan bsham par bya/_bdug pa'i snod dang bdug pa nye bar gzhag par bya/_gal te ston pa'i yon tan sgrogs 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]par nus na bdag nyid kyis bya/_ci ste mi nus na smra ba po la gsol bar bya'o/_/zas kyi skos sa la brtag par bya zhing /_zas bskos zin nas khang steng du song ste gaN+DI brdung bar bya/_tsha ba'i dus su dge slong rnams la bsil yab kyis g.yab par bya/_de nas bsnyen 
[\[104a.2\]]par rdzogs pa thams cad kyi ni 'og_/bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa rnams kyi ni gong du spyod lam zhi bas dge slong gi 'du shes nye bar bzhag ste/_zas bza' bar bya/_zas kyi bya ba byas nas gnas mal phug tu brtul bar bya/_lhung bzed kyi gzhi dor bar bya/_dus shes par byas nas 
[\[104a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang /_sen mo'i mchod rten dag phyag dar bya zhing /_ba lang gi lci ba sar pa bzang pos byug par bya/_'du ba'i dus su gnas mal bsham par bya zhing bdug pa dang bdug pa'i snod gzhag par bya/_ston pa'i yon tan bsgrag par bya/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams 
[\[104a.4\]]gsan du gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi tshes gcig lags te/_gtsug lag khang gi bdag po dang /_gtsug lag khang gi lha rnams kyi don du tshigs su bcad pa gsung shig ces nyi ma brjod par bya/_ci ste mi nus na dge slong la bcol bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams de'i gnas khang 
[\[104a.5\]]sko bar mi byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas khang bsko bar bya'o/_/rnyed pa yang mi ster nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnyed pa sbyin par bya'o/_/de dge ba'i phyogs la brtson par mi byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge ba'i phyogs 
[\[104a.6\]]la brtson par bya'o/_/de'i spyad pa ni 'di yin te/_ji srid lam du ma zhugs kyi bar du'o/_/de la lam du zhugs pa ni 'di yin te/_zag pa zad pa'o/_/des 'bad brtsal bsgrims pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rtogs nas 'dus byas kyi rnam pa thams cad chos nyid 
[\[104a.7\]]kyis 'jig pa/_lhung ba/_'gyes pa/_rnam par 'jig par bsgoms te nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa/_tsan dan dang ste'ur 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]'dra ba/_ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa la chags pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang /_rjed pa dang /_gus par smra bar bya 
[\[104b.2\]]ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob kyang de bzhin du 'dug cing las kyang byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de rgan rims bzhin 'dug par bya zhing ji ltar bkag pa yang rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i 
[\[104b.3\]]khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu rab tu byung tshun chad de rtag tu na nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis de'i drung du song ste dris pa/_gnas brtan bde 'am/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag na ste mi bde'o/_/gnas brtan 
[\[104b.4\]]khyod ci na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag glo lu zhing na'o/_/gnas brtan sman cung zad mdzod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis sngon ri lu'i du ba bsten to/_/gnas brtan da ci ste mi sten/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa 
[\[104b.5\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong nad pas ri lu'i du ba brngub par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong nad pas ri lu'i du ba brngub par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams de bzhin du rngub pa dang ma legs nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[104b.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_kham phor bu ga phug la/_kham phor kha sbyar nas rngubs shig_/'on kyang ma legs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbu gu can gyis rngubs shig_/de rnams kyi smyug ma'i sbu gus brngubs pa dang /_nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[104b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_smyug ma'i sbu gus brngub par mi bya'i/_'on kyang lcags kyi sman gce'u bya'o/_/ha cang thung ba byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ha cang thung ngur mi bya'o/_/ha cang ring por byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ha cang ring por mi bya'i/_'on 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]kyang sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad du bya'o/_/de dag rnon por byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnon por mi bya'o/_/rtsub por byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rtsub por mi bya'o/_/de bab bab tu 'jog nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bab 
[\[105a.2\]]bab tu gzhag par mi bya'i/_'on kyang snod du bcug ste gzhag par bya'o/_/de rnams kyi snod du bcug ste sa la 'jog pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_snod sa la gzhag par mi bya'i/_'on kyang zung nga 'am/_gos kyi gdang la gdags par bya'o/_/de btsas khyer nas bcom 
[\[105a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mar dkar ram 'bru mar gyis bskus te gzhag par bya'o/_/dgos pa byung ba'i tshe de bkrus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bkru bar mi bya'i/_'on kyang mer gzhug par bya ste/_de nyid de'i bkru ba yin no//_//sdom ni/_bsogs pa dang 
[\[105a.4\]]ni khrus rtsi dang /_/snar blugs spyad dang btung phor dang /_/khyogs dang chab khungs dag dang /_/chu dang bkru ba'i sa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong nad pa zhig sman pa'i drung du song 
[\[105a.5\]]nas bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]sman ston cig ces byas pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa bsogs pa'i khrus kyis khrus mdzod cig dang sos par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[105a.6\]]skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te sman pas bstan na bsogs pa'i khrus kyis khrus bya ste/_khrus bya ba 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bsogs pa'i khrus kyis khrus bya'o zhes 
[\[105a.7\]]bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis bsogs pa'i khrus ji lta bu yin pa ma shes nas/_de rnams yang sman pa'i drung du song ste/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/_bsogs pa'i khrus ji lta bu yin pa ston cig_/des smras pa/_'phags 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]pa bdag gis kyang mi shes te/_bdag gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i gso ba'i spyad las bsogs pa'i khrus zhes bya ba bton na/_de ni ji lta bu yin pa ni mi shes so/_/'on kyang khyed nyid kyi ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin pas de nyid kyis mkhyen gyis song la de nyid la zhus shig_/skabs de dge slong 
[\[105b.2\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rlung 'byin pa'i rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu gang dag yin pa de dag bskol nas khrus bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis de dag bskol te khrus byas pa dang /_de rnams rtsub por gyur 
[\[105b.3\]]to/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_snum bsku bar bya'o/_/de rnams kyis bskus pa dang /_ha cang snum ches pas gnas mal dag ma rung bar gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khrus rtsis 
[\[105b.4\]]bkru bar bya'o/_/de rnams de bzhin du rtsub por gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chu'i bum pa tha ma'i nang du 'bru mar thigs pa gsum mam/_gnyis blug par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/
[\[105b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu gang nas rab tu byung ba de tshun chad rtag tu na nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams de'i drung du song ste/_gnas brtan bde'am zhes dris pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag na ste mi bde'o/_/gnas brtan khyod ci na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cham pa bdo'o/_/gnas brtan 
[\[105b.6\]]sman cung zad mdzod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag sngon bdag gis snar blugs pa'i las byas so/_/gnas brtan ci ste mi byed/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis 
[\[105b.7\]]snar blugs pa'i las bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis snar blugs pa'i las bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams de bzhin du snar blugs pa dang po nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin du blug par mi bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis lo ma'i phur mas blugs pa dang /_nyes 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lo ma'i phur mas blug par mi bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis chos gos kyi grwas blugs pa dang /_nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos gos kyi grwas blug par mi 
[\[106a.2\]]bya'i/_'on kyang snar blugs pa'i spyad kyis blug par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams snar blugs pa'i spyad mchu gcig pa byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_snar blugs pa'i spyad mchu gnyis pa bya'o/_/dge slong rnams mchu rnon por byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[106a.3\]]mchu rnon por mi bya'o/_/dge slong rnams lag pa ma bkrus par blugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag pa dag bkrus te byin len byas nas blug par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa pi 
[\[106a.4\]]lin da'i bu gang nas rab tu byung ba de tshun chad rtag tu na nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams de'i drung du song ste/_gnas brtan bde 'am zhes dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_bdag na ste mi bde'o/_/gnas brtan khyod ci na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gnang ngo /_/gnas brtan sman cung zad mdzod 
[\[106a.5\]]cig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis sngon phul ba'i btung phor bcangs so/_/gnas brtan da ci ste mi bcang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang 
[\[106a.6\]]gis phul ba'i btung phor bcang bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu'i gnyen dag 'ongs pa dang /_des 'ongs pa de dag la chos bstan nas de rnams khyim du song ste chung ma dag la smras 
[\[106a.7\]]pa/_'phags pa pi lin da'i bus chos snyan cing snyan pa dag bshad de/_bdag cag gis de mnyan nas 'ongs so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyed ni sangs rgyas byung ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no/_/ci'i phyir de dag gis smras pa/_khyed kyis 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu la chos 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]snyan cing snyan pa dag mnyan pas so/_/khyed kyang ci'i phyir mi nyan/_bdag cag ni ngo dman pa ste ngo tsha'o/_/'on kyang gal te 'phags pa 'dir gshegs te bshad na bdag cag gis kyang mnyan to/_/gal te de lta na 'phags pa la bya'o/_/de dag gis smras pa legs so/_/de rnams kyis 
[\[106b.2\]]de'i drung du song nas/_'phags pa bud med dag chos nyan par 'tshal lo zhes byas pa dang /_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag nyan la rag mod/_ci kho bos bkag gam/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa bud med kyi mchid nas bdag cag ngo tsha ste/_gal te 'phags pa 'dir 
[\[106b.3\]]gshegs nas bshad na bdag cag kyang nyan to zhes mchi'o/_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag na bas song ste bshad mi nus so/_/'phags pa khyogs 'tshal te mchis des gshegs shig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang na ji ltar 'gro/_/skabs de dge 
[\[106b.4\]]slong rnams kyis thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis bzhon pas 'gro bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhon pas 'gro bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu lhan 
[\[106b.5\]]cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag gis bskor te khyogs su zhugs nas chos ston du chas pa drug sde rnams kyis mthong nas/_de rnams kyis de'i lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag la dris pa/_shes ldan dag 'gro ba 'di su zhig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_mkhan 
[\[106b.6\]]po'o/_/ci bcom ldan 'das kyis khyogs gnang ngam/_gnang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa ni bzang ste/_shAkya skyid de ba 'di rnams rkang gis 'gro bar mi nus pas rnam pa thams cad du bdag cag la thugs brtse bar mdzad do/_/de dag song ba dang /_drug sde rnams kyis 
[\[106b.7\]]smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bo bdag cag ci ste 'khod/_khyogs bya'o/_/legs te de bzhin bya'o zhes de rnams kyis rnga ma dang dril bu la sogs pas mdzes par byas pa'i khyogs byas so/_/de nas de rnams zhugs nas srang gi nang du 'jig rten la bu bzhin du rlom zhing chas pa dang /_bram ze 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di ci zhig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhon pa gnang ngo /_/'phags pa ci dge sbyong khyed kyang 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gnang ngam/_de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[107a.2\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong mi na ba bzhon pas 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong mi na ba bzhon pas 'gro na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang bzhon pas 'gro ba ni gnyis te/_rgas 'khogs pa nyam chung ba dang /_nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa'o/_/
[\[107a.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag dad pa can zhig 'dug pa de bram ze ma dad pa zhig dang lhan cig rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/_dad pa can gyis de la nye ba'i tshal bstan par 
[\[107a.4\]]brtsams so/_/de phan tshun 'khyam 'khyam pas shing drung na ngan skyugs shig mthong nas/_des smras pa/_grogs po dge sbyong shAkya'i bu'i rnams ni gtsang sbra med pa ste/_me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing gi drung du bshang ba dang gci ba byed do/_/des smras pa/_grogs po bdag nyid chen 
[\[107a.5\]]po de dag ni de ltar mi byed kyi gdon mi za bar khyim pa 'ga' zhig gis byas so/_/de dag de skad du smra ba na rgan zhugs zhig mgo gos kyis dkris nas shing drung du bshang ba bya bar brtsams pa dang /_de bram ze ma dad pa des mthong nas smras pa/_grogs po khyed cag na re khyim pas byas so zhes mi 
[\[107a.6\]]zer ram/_dge sbyong mgo gos kyis dkris te shing drung na bshang ba byed pa'o ni la ltos zhes byas pa dang /_de skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go_/des skabs de dge slong rnams la bsnyad do/_/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[107a.7\]]dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams shing drung du bshang ba byed pa las gyur gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis shing drung du bshang ba dang gci ba mi bya'o/_/byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis shing drung du bshang ba dang gci ba mi bya'o zhes bka' 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag lam du zhugs te dong ba dang /_ji tsam du 'brog cig tu phyin to/_/de na dge slong kha cig bshang ba bro'o/_/kha cig ni gci ba bro na de rnams shing 'di dag 'dab chags pa'o snyam nas bshang ba yang ma byas gci ba yang ma byas pas de rnams na bar gyur to/_/skabs de dge 
[\[107b.2\]]slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dgon pa'i shing 'dab chags pa gang yin pa der ni bshang ba dang gci ba bya ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgon par bshang ba dang gci ba dag bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[107b.3\]]grong mtha'i dge slong rnams mi byed de/_ji tsam na dpyid kyi dus la bab pa dang bshang ba dang gci ba byed cing nyi ma la bshang ba dang gci ba byed pas rmya bar gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis shing 
[\[107b.4\]]tsher ma can gang dag yin pa de dag gi drung du bshang ba dang gci ba bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/gang gi tshe nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]la phug gi ra ba bshang bas ma rung bar byas pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis rtsa sngon po yod par bshang ba dang gci ba mi bya'o/_/dge 
[\[107b.5\]]slong rnams rtsa sngon po med pa'i sa phyogs su bshang ba dang gci ba byas pas de mi gtsang bas gang bar gyur pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/_'phya bar byed/_smod par byed de/_dge sbyong shAkya'i bu 'di rnams kyi chos re bzang ji ltar gcig tu 'dus nas za ba de kho na 
[\[107b.6\]]bzhin du bshang ba dang gci ba byed do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis bshang ba'i sa bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis byang dang nub kyi ngos su bshang ba'i khang pa bya bar brtsams pa 
[\[107b.7\]]dang /_de dag gis ji lta bu bya ba ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chab khungs ni rnam pa gnyis su bya ste/_khang bu lta bu dang ba gam lta bu'o/_/de la khang bu lta bu ni gru bzhir byas la dbus su gdung bres la khung bu gdod cing wa gzhug par bya'o/_/ba gam lta bu yang 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]gdung phyir phyung la bya ste/_de'i 'og tu shing tsher ma can bskyed do/_/chab khung sar chab khung sa'i khung bu'i steng du chab khung sa'i rkang rten gzhag par bya/_ril ba spyi blugs gzhag pa'i gnas bya zhing /_sgo bsnol mar gtod la sgo 'phar dang sgo gtan dag kyang gzhug par bya'o/_/
[\[108a.2\]]gal te gcig nang du zhugs par gyur na cig shos kyis sgra dbyung bar bya zhing /_gal te sdod na nang du 'jug par bya'o/_/nang na gnas pas kyang sgra dbyung bar bya'o/_/dri mi zhim par gyur na khang skyong gis nyin gcig bzhin sbyang bar bya zhing /_sa dang lo ma dag kyang gzhag par bya ste/_de lta 
[\[108a.3\]]bas na chab khung sa 'khor dang bcas pa rjes su gnang ngo //_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po bcu pa/_sdom ni/_gci ba'i sa dang snod spyad dang /_/ston pa la ni dga' nyid dang /_/bza' ba lnga dang 'o ma dang /_/zho dang zas dang gnang ba'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[108a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chab khung sa 'khor dang bcas pa bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag de nyid du gci bar byed pa na/_dge slong gzhan dag bshang ba bro bas mi 
[\[108a.5\]]bde zhing de dag bgags pas na bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gci ba'i gnas logs shig tu bya'o/_/dge slong dag phyogs gang du ji lta bur bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de nyid dang nye bar ba gam lta bu bya ste/_wa 
[\[108a.6\]]bcug la sgo gdod cing sgo 'phar dang sgo gtan gzhug par bya ste/_chab khung ji lta bar thams cad snga ma bzhin du bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/so ga'i dus kyi tshe bram ze zhig skom pas 
[\[108a.7\]]nyam thag ste/_chu 'dod nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te de dge slong zhig gi gan du song nas/_des smras pa/_dge slong dag skom na chab stsal du gsol/_des ril ba blangs nas song ste/_des smras pa/_bram ze 'thung shig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa gtsang sbra ni tha dad pa lags na/_kye 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]ma'o khyed kyi chab snod bzhag la/_de nas dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze dag blud na ci nongs/_khyed bsod nams la mi sbyor ram/_skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi chu snod gzhag par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[108b.2\]]'das kyis dge 'dun gyi chu snod gzhag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_khyim bdag cig gis bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi chu snod gzhag par gnang ngo zhes thos nas/_des rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod spyad gtsug lag khang gi nang du spungs te/_de las kun dga' ra ba pa dang /_
[\[108b.3\]]khyim pa gzhan dag gis kyang gang dang gang 'dod pa khyer nas dong ste/_dge slong rnams kyis ma bkag pas snod spyad de dag zad nas/_dge slong dag gis khyim bdag de la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]snod spyad dag zad kyis gzhan dag byin cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag gis mang po rab 
[\[108b.4\]]tu phul na ci'i slad du ring por ma thogs pa kho nar bas par gyur/_de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa dag yal bar bor ba gang lags pa ni ma legs pa zhig bgyis te/_de dag bdag gis khyim pa rnams la ni ma stsal to zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong dag 
[\[108b.5\]]gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin yal bar dor bar mi bya'o/_/'on kyang snod spyad 'brub pa bsko bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis bye brag med par bskos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_snod spyad 'brub pa chos lnga 
[\[108b.6\]]dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_snod spyad brubs pa dang /_ma brubs pa mi shes pa'o/_/snod spyad 'brub pa chos lnga 
[\[108b.7\]]dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_snod spyad brubs pa dang ma brubs pa shes pa'o/_/bsko ba yang 'di ltar 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]bya ste/_gnas mal bsham par byas la gaN+DI brdungs nas zhes bya ba nas/_spro bar bya ste zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub par spro'am/_gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol 
[\[109a.2\]]ba byas nas las bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun 
[\[109a.3\]]gyi snod spyad 'brub par bsko bar bgyi ste/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub po/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las kyang 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub par spro ste/_
[\[109a.4\]]de'i slad du dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub par bsko na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing 
[\[109a.5\]]gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod spyad 'brub par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/des dge slong rnams la ni snod spyad rnying pa dag sbyin zhing /_khyim pa rnams la ni sar pa dag sbyin par byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[109a.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams la sar pa dag sbyin par bya zhing /_khyim pa rnams la ni rnying pa dag sbyin par bya'o/_/de khyim pa rnams la byin pa ni phyir len par mi byed cing /_dge slong rnams las ni phyir len nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim pa rnams la byin pa ni blang bar bya'i/_
[\[109a.7\]]dge slong rnams la ni ma yin no/_/phyi rol du bzhag pas de dag 'khyams par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_snod spyad kyi mdzod cig byas la der rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod spyad rnams gzhag par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis snod spyad kyi mdzod cig byas la/_der rdza mkhan 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]gyis byas pa'i snod spyad rnams gzhag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_ji tsam na byang phyogs nas 'gron pa zhig 'ongs nas des dge 'dun la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs te/_des bsams pa/_bdag gis dge 'dun la yo byad brnyan pos ci'i phyir bsnyen bkur bya/_
[\[109b.2\]]ma la bdag nyid kyi snod spyad kyis bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas des zangs kyi snod spyad mang po nye bar bzhag go/_/de nas yo byad mang pos bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig zla ba gsum du ston mo gsol nas/_mjug tshod kyi ston mo byas nas chas so/_/de 'gro ba'i tshe zangs kyi snod spyad 
[\[109b.3\]]de dag thams cad dge 'dun la phul nas/_dge slong dag gis mdzod de nyid du rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod spyad dang lhan cig bzhag pa dang /_zangs kyi snod spyad kyis bsngos te rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod spyad rnams chag nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zangs kyi snod spyad 
[\[109b.4\]]rnams gud du gzhag cing /_rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i snod spyad rnams kyang gud du gzhag par bya'o/_/ji tsam na bram ze zhig skom pas nyen nas dze ta'i tshal du song ste de dge slong zhig gi gan du phyin nas smras pa/_kye dge slong bdag skom na bdag la chab stsal du gsol/_des de la bum 
[\[109b.5\]]pa dang srad bu dag byin pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa 'dis ci bgyi/_chab stsal du gsol/_des smras pa/_bram ze chu bcus zin pa med do/_/'phags pa khyed ni sems can thams cad la phan par zhugs pa lags pas kye ma'o khyed kyis chab nye bar bzhag kyang ci ma rung /_des 
[\[109b.6\]]smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyis chu nye bar gzhag par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis khyams dang /_gnas khang dang /_gtsug lag khang gi nang 
[\[109b.7\]]dang /_sgo khang dang bang rim dag tu bab bab tu bzhag nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyams dang /_gnas khang dang /_gtsug lag khang gi nang dang /_sgo khang dang /_bang rim dag tu bab bab tu gzhag par mi bya'i/_'on kyang chu'i khang pa bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chu'i 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]khang pa bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis phyogs gang du ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gtsug lag khang gi nang lho dang nub kyi ngos su chu'i khang pa bya'o/_/mun gnag par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[110a.2\]]pa/_skar khung dag gdod par bya'o/_/rdzab chags par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_so phag gi gcal dgram par bya zhing stor khung gdod par bya'o/_/sgo gdod par bya zhing sgo glegs dang yang ming kyang gzhug par bya'o/_/chu sa la 'jog par byed nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[110a.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shing gi khri la gzhag par bya'o/_/shing dag med nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_so phag gi stegs bu byas la de'i steng du rten ma bya zhing bum pa gzhag par bya'o/_/bum pa'i nang gi chu rul nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[110a.4\]]stsal pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dus dus su bum pa bkru bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis cis bkru ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shing la pu shel tsi'i khrud shing ngam/_lo ma sbams pa'am/_ras ma'i thum po bcings nas rung 
[\[110a.5\]]bar bya ste bkru bar bya'o/_/'on kyang chu rul ba nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bum pa dag la phyed ni bkru bar bya zhing /_phyed du chu blug par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chu blug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis sus chu blugs pa mi 
[\[110a.6\]]shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas pa dag gis chu blug par bya ste/_de lta bas na chu'i khang pa 'khor dang bcas pa gnang ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau 
[\[110a.7\]]ta mI 'khor lnga brgya dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das sbrid pa byung zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gi bcom ldan 'das yun ring du 'tsho zhing thub pa chen po bskal par bzhugs par gyur cig_/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen 
[\[110b.2\]]mo gau ta mI'i sgra thos nas/_dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag gis kyang de kho na skad du bcom ldan 'das yun ring du 'tsho zhing thub pa chen po bskal par bzhugs par gyur cig ces smras so/_/dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag gi sgra sa bla pa'i gnod sbyin dag gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das yun ring du 'tsho zhing thub 
[\[110b.3\]]pa chen po bskal par bzhugs par gyur cig ces sgra 'byin cing dbyangs sgrogs par byed do/_/sa bla pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sgra nam mkha' la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul 
[\[110b.4\]]dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis thos nas/_skad cig de dang /_thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de dang /_skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam de la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra grags par gyur nas/_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[110b.5\]]yun ring du 'tsho zhing thub pa chen po bskal par bzhugs par gyur cig ces sgra 'byin cing dbyangs sgrogs par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gau ta mI khyod kyis sems can mang po'i bar chad byas te/_gau ta mI khyod 
[\[110b.6\]]kyi sgra dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag gis thos nas de bzhin du sgra sgrogs par byed cing /_dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag gis sgras bla pa'i gnod sbyin dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' 
[\[110b.7\]]ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis thos nas/_skad cig de dang /_thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de dang /_skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam de la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar sgras khyab par gyur cing /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]kyang de kho na bzhin sgra phyung mod kyi/_gau ta mI de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ni de ltar phyag mi bya ste/_de ltar phyag byas pa ni legs par phyag byas pa ma yin no/_/btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[111a.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag ji ltar bgyi/_phyag ji ltar bgyis na legs par phyag bgyis par 'gyur/_gau ta mI de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ni 'di ltar phyag bya ste/_bdag gi bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas te 
[\[111a.3\]]mthun kun du dga'/_mi rtsod rtse gcig_/'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/_ston pa'i bstan pa gsal ba mthong bar gyur cig ces de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag bya ste/_de ltar phyag 
[\[111a.4\]]byas na legs par phyag byas par yang 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe dge slong zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_skye dgu'i bdag chen gau ta mIs/_/ston pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_/bdag gi bcom ldan ring du bzhugs/_/thub chen bskal par bzhugs gyur cig_/de yis 
[\[111a.5\]]ston la de skad gsol/_/sru la 'di skad bka' stsal te/_/gau ta ma ji ltar phyag byas pa/_/de bzhin gshegs la phyag byas min/_/shes rab ldan pa ji ltar du/_/de bzhin gshegs la phyag bgyis na/_/ji ltar legs par phyag bgyis 'gyur/_/zhus pa bdag la bstan du 
[\[111a.6\]]gsol/_/brtson 'grus brtsams pa bdag nyid brtson/_/rtag tu pha rol gnon brtan pa'i/_/nyan thos mthun pa lta phyed pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal yin/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni dge 'dun mthun pa'i bsngags pa brjod par 
[\[111a.7\]]mdzad de/_de'i phyir ji srid bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing dge slong gi dge 'dun mthun pa de'i tshe bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam du rig nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]to/_/btsun pa bdag bsams bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas/_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs bcom ldan 'das la lan gnyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[111b.2\]]btsun pa bdag bsams bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das lan gnyis lan gsum du cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas/_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag bsams 
[\[111b.3\]]bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gau ta mI mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir smra'am/_bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du'o/_/
[\[111b.4\]]gau ta mI mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir smra'am/_bde bar gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du'o/_/gau ta mI khyod mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir smra na/_gau ta mI 'dus byas thams cad ni de lta bu'i chos can yin na ngas smra ci dgos/_dge slong ma lnga brgya po de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[111b.5\]]kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag kyang bsams bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gau ta mI dag mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir smra'am/_bcom ldan 'das mya ngan 
[\[111b.6\]]las 'da' ba'i slad du'o/_/gau ta mI dag mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir smra'am/_bde bar gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du'o/_/gau ta mI dag khyed mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir smra na 'dus byas thams cad ni de lta bu'i chos can yin pas ngas smra ci dgos/_de nas skye dgu'i bdag 
[\[111b.7\]]mo chen mo gau ta mI bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_sgra can zin dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa bdag cag bsams bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal lo/_/gau ta mI dag khyed mya ngan las 
[\[112a.2\]]'da' ba'i phyir smra'am/_btsun pa kun dga' bo mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du'o/_/gau ta mI dag mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir smra'am/_btsun pa kun dga' bo mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du'o/_/gau ta mI dag khyed mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir smra na sring mo dag 'dus byas rnams ni de lta bu'i 
[\[112a.3\]]chos can yin pas nged kyis smra ci dgos/_de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI dang /_'khor dge slong ma lnga brgya dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te dbyar khang du song ngo /_/der 'khor gsum po dag gi rnam pa la brtags nas 
[\[112a.4\]]nyin zhag bdun du gang thos nas sems can mang pos khyad par chen po thob pa de lta bu'i chos bstan to/_/de nas sa phyogs bar skabs yangs pa zhig tu dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi gung la skyil mo krung phyed bcas nas 'dug go/_/dge slong ma de dag kyang de bzhin du 'dug go/_/
[\[112a.5\]]de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs te/_gang la sems mnyam par bzhag na rang gi stan las mi snang bar gyur cing /_shar phyogs kyi steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi po 'chag pa dang /_
[\[112a.6\]]'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal bdag ston par byed cing me'i khams la yang snyoms par zhugs so/_/me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs nas/_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI'i lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_
[\[112a.7\]]dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod kha dang /_shel gyi kha dog lta bu dag ston par byed cing cho 'phrul zung dag kyang ston par byed de/_lus kyi smad nas me 'bar la/_lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'byung ba dang /_lus kyi stod nas me 'bar la/_lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]rgyun 'byung bar byed do/_/shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang gi phyogs su yang de bzhin byed de/_'di ltar phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi po dag ston par byed cing bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so/_/dge slong ma lnga brgya po de dag 
[\[112b.2\]]kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bsam gtan dang po las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la/_gnyis pa las bsam gtan gsum pa la/_gsum pa las bsam gtan bzhi pa la/_bzhi pa las nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la/_nam mkha' mtha' 
[\[112b.3\]]yas skye mched las rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las ci yang med pa'i skye mched la/_ci yang med pa'i skye mched las 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug cing /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs 
[\[112b.4\]]nas/_yang ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par zhugs so/_/ci yang med pa'i skye mched las rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las bsam gtan bzhi pa la/_
[\[112b.5\]]bzhi pa las gsum pa la/_gsum pa las gnyis pa la/_gnyis pa las bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas bsam gtan dang po nyid la brten nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/dge slong ma lnga brgya po de dag kyang de bzhin du lugs dang mthun pa dang /_lugs 
[\[112b.6\]]las ldog par snyoms par zhugs nas bsam gtan dang po nyid la brten te yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI mya ngan las 'das ma thag tu sa chen po g.yos par gyur cing /_skar mda' ltung ba dang /_phyogs dmar po dang /_bar snang la lha'i rol 
[\[112b.7\]]mo'i sgra dag byung ngo /_/de nas dge slong gang ri rab kyi bang rim dang /_gzhan yang grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_dben pa'i gnas mal dag na bsam gtan byed pa de dag gis sa chen po g.yos par rig nas sa chen po 'di ci'i phyir g.yos 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]zhes bsam pa la zhugs na/_ji tsam na skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI 'khor lnga brgya dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong nas/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas kyi sru yongs su mya ngan las 'das na/_de'i lus la mchod pa lhag par bya ba la brtson par 
[\[113a.2\]]byas 'dong ngo snyam nas/_de dag shing dri zhim po dag khyer nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI'i dbyar khang du dong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyang nyan thos chen po kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_'od srung chen po dang /_rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal 
[\[113a.3\]]gyi bu la sogs pa dang /_gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dag dang thabs cig tu skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI'i dbyar khang du gshegs so/_/de bzhin du yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_grong mi dang /_yul gyi mi 
[\[113a.4\]]rnams kyi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang /_bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang /_rnyid pa dang /_gzhan yang yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag kyang skye dgu'i bdag 
[\[113a.5\]]mo chen mo gau ta mI'i dbyar khang du song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rin po che dang /_gos sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i khyogs lnga brgya dang /_dri dang /_bdug spos dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna 
[\[113a.6\]]tshogs dag phul lo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_kun dga' bo dang /_sgra can zin gyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI'i khyogs bteg go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phyag g.yas pas bzung ngo /_/dge slong lhag ma rnams kyis kyang dge slong 
[\[113a.7\]]ma lhag ma rnams kyi khyogs bteg go/_/de nas mchod pa chen po byas te khyer nas sa phyogs bar skabs dben par khyogs rnams bzhag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI dang /_dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag gi lus las bla gos phud nas/_dge slong 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI dang /_dge slong ma lnga brgya po 'di dag lo brgya nyi shu lon yang lus la gnyer ma dang /_skra dkar med cing bu mo lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu la ltos/_de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i tshogs 
[\[113b.2\]]dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi dang bcas pas dri sna tshogs kyi shing gi phung po spungs nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag bsregs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mi rtag pa dang ldan pa'i chos dag bshad nas 
[\[113b.3\]]gtsug lag khang du gshegs so/_/gshegs nas kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ltar sbrid pa byung ba la sos zhes zer ba la nyes dmigs 'di lta bu dang /_
[\[113b.4\]]gzhan dag kyang yod pas de lta bas na dge slong gis sbrid pa byung ba la sos zhes brjod par mi bya'o/_/brjod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa skye dgu'i bdag 
[\[113b.5\]]mo chen mo la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag gis las ci zhig bgyis na/_des 'di dag skyes nas dgung lo brgya nyi shu lags kyang lus la gnyer ma dang /_skra dkar ma mchis shing bu mo dgung lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[113b.6\]]skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya po dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar myong bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags te/_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa dge 
[\[113b.7\]]slong ma lnga brgya po dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang /_/las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/_/tshogs 
[\[114a.2\]]shing dus la bab pa na/_lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi 
[\[114a.3\]]gnas na rten cing bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe rgyal 
[\[114a.4\]]po kr-i kI zhes bya bas de'i sku la sku'i mchod pa byas nas/_lam po che'i bzhi mdor rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la gnam 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa byas so/_/rgyal po kr-i kI'i btsun mo dam pa la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya po de dag rgas pa'i gnas 
[\[114a.5\]]skabs na lus la gnyer ma dang skra dkar byung nas rgyal pos spangs pa dang /_de dag phan tshun smra bar brtsams pa/_grogs mo dag lhas da bdag cag ci'i phyir spangs/_de dag las kha cig gis smras pa/_'di la dpyad du ci yod bdag cag da lus gnyer ma dang skra dkar can du gyur 
[\[114a.6\]]pas de'i phyir bdag cag spangs mod/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_de ni de lta yin te/_da bdag cag lha la ji zhig bya/_bud med gzugs dang na tshod dang ldan pa gzhan dag yod pa de dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod grang /_de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi mchod rten gyi drung du dong 
[\[114a.7\]]nas mchon pa byas la des na bdag cag phyin chad 'khor bar lus gnyer ma dang skra dkar can du ma gyur cig ces smon lam gdab par bya'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin bya'o zhes de dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis mchod pa byas nas me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dri zhim zhing ma rnyis pa'i chun po dang /_phreng ba yid du 'ong ba dag btags nas/_bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od 
[\[114b.2\]]srung la mchod pa bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa 'dis bdag cag skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu lon yang lus la gnyer ma dang skra dkar mchis par ma gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_rgyal po kr-i kI'i btsun mo dam pa la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya po 
[\[114b.3\]]gang dag yin pa de dag ni skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/_'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la mchod pa byas shing smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar skyes nas lo brgya 
[\[114b.4\]]nyi shu lon yang lus la gnyer ma dang skra dkar med cing bu mo lo bcu drug lon pa'i gzugs lta bur gyur to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas de ltar brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma 
[\[114b.5\]]bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sbrid pa byung ba la sos shes brjod par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[114b.6\]]mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed kyang /_bu pho yang med/_bu mo yang 
[\[114b.7\]]med la/_rgas pa'i gnas skabs su nor zad cing longs spyod zad par gyur nas/_des chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo kho bo ni rgas shing bkren la bu pho yang med/_bu mo yang med pas rgyal byed kyi tshal du rab tu byung du 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_rje'i sras de bzhin rab tu 'byung bar mdzod 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]cig/_de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste rab tu byung ngo /_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de'i chung ma blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa dang /_de sbrid pa byung na dge slong gang gis kyang sos zhes ma byas so/_/de nas de'i sngon gyi chung mas lag pa g.yon pas sa blangs te sas mtshams gcad 
[\[115a.2\]]pa byas nas yun ring du 'tsho bar gyur cig ces smras so/_/dge slong dag gis de la brtag par brtsams pa dang /_des de'i lag nas bzung ste drangs nas smras pa/_rje'i sras khyod dgra bo rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste rgyal byed kyi tshal 'di gnod sbyin gos sngon po gyon pa lnga brgyas mi stongs 
[\[115a.3\]]te/_bdag 'ba' zhig gis khyod la sos zhes bgyis pa des na de rnams kyis khyod kyi mdangs ma khyer te/_'dir bzhugs pas 'tshal gyis/_khyim nyid du bzhud kyis gshegs zhes des de'i lag pa nas bzung ste song ba dang /_de la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_rgan zhugs ma 
[\[115a.4\]]'gro bar 'dug shig_/de 'gro ba nyid du byed cing mi 'dug nas dge slong dag gis de'i lag pa ya gcig nas bzung ste drangs pa dang /_des smras pa/_na'o na'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyi 
[\[115a.5\]]lag pa gang na zhes dri bar bya ste/_gal te khyed kyis bzung ba gang yin pa'o zhes zer na rgan zhugs 'gro 'dod par nges kyis thams cad kyi thams cad du gtang bar bya'o/_/gal te sngon gyi chung mas bzung ba gang yin pa'o zhes zer na 'gro bar mi 'dod pas de gtang bar mi bya'o/_/'on kyang dge slong 
[\[115a.6\]]dag rgan zhugs ni 'tsho bar 'dod pa'i bsam pa can yin pas de lta bas na rgan zhugs sbrid pa byung ba la sos zhes brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis de la smras pa/_rgan zhugs khyod kyi lag pa gang na/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis bzung ba gang yin pa'o/_/de dag 
[\[115a.7\]]gis de btang ba nas rang gi khyim du song ste/_de nyid de'i rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po'i bar chad du gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]dad pa can zhig 'dug pa de bram ze ma dad pa zhig dang lhan cig rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_khyim bdag de sbrid pa byung na dge slong gang gis kyang sos zhes ma byas kyi/_bram ze de nyid kyis sos zhes byas nas des smras pa/_grogs po khyed ni dgra bo rnams la dad de rgyal byed kyi tshal 'di ni gnod 
[\[115b.2\]]sbyin gos sngon po gyon pa lnga brgyas mi stongs te/_khyod la kho bo 'ba' zhig gis sos zhes byas pa des na de dag gis khyod kyi mdangs ma phrogs kyis tshur shog 'dong zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[115b.3\]]dge slong dag khyim pa rnams ni 'tsho ba'i bsam pa can yin pas de lta bas na khyim pa sbrid pa byung ba la sos zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gzhan yang dge slong dag rgan pa sbrid pa byung ba la ni langs nas phyag bya zhing gzhon pa sbrid pa byung ba la ni rgan pas nad med cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[115b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga tshan pa rnams nges pa la zhugs pa dang ldan pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la btsud pa de'i tshe de dag gis bca' bar bya ba gang yin pa dang /_
[\[115b.5\]]bza' bar bya ba gang yin pa mi shes pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bca' ba ni lnga ste/_rtsa ba'i bca' ba dang /_sdong po'i bca' ba dang /_lo ma'i bca' ba dang /_me tog gi bca' ba dang /_
[\[115b.6\]]'bras bu'i bca' ba'o/_/bza' ba ni lnga ste/_phye ma dang /_'bras chan dang /_zan dron dang /_sha dang snum khur ro/_/de dag gis tshod ma gang dag dang /_bza' bar bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar sar dang /_mar dang /_
[\[115b.7\]]nya dang /_sha dang /_sha skam dang /_gzhan yang rung ba gang yin pa ste tha na chus kyang rlan par bya ste bza' bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag rlan pa thams cad ni nyam skyed par byed pa yin no//_//sdom la/_sgo 'phar gyi ni lag zungs dang /_/skar khung dag gi dra ba dang /_/ma dpyis dang ni ya dpyis 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]dang /_rked gtan dbyug gu skam ka'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong rnams gnas khang dag rtsig cing sgo dod par mi byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[116a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_sgo gdod par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis sgo btod cing sgo 'phar 'jug par mi byed pas bsam gtan dang 'don pa la zhugs pa dag snang ste/_de dag bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas nye bar 'ongs te de dag gtam brjod pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid du ma gyur 
[\[116a.3\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sgo 'phar gzhug par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis sgo 'phar bcug cing lag zungs yang mig ma btags pas dbye dka' bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag zungs yang mig gdags par bya'o/_/
[\[116a.4\]]de phye ba na sgra 'byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ko ba'i dum bu gzhug par bya'o/_/skar khung ma btod pas mun gnag par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skar khung gdod par bya'o/_/ha cang dma' bar btod nas chom rkun pa dang /_g.yon can dag 
[\[116a.5\]]gis bgrod par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dma' bar gdod par mi bya'o/_/ha cang mtho bar btod pa dang nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dkyil du gdod par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis nang rub la phyi yangs par byas nas/_
[\[116a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyi rub la nang yangs pa rgya mtsho'i rnam pa lta bur gdod par bya'o/_/bye'u dang phug ron dag 'jug nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dra ba bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis dra ba byas shing sgo glegs ma bcug pas sbrul dang /_sdig pa dang /_srin bu t+r+yai 
[\[116a.7\]]ma bu ka dang /_trai la ta dag 'jug nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgo glegs gzhug par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis sgo glegs bcug pa dang /_'og mi chags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma dpyis gzhug par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis ma dpyis bcug na 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]steng 'dug tu mi rung nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ya dpyis gzhug par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis ya dpyis bcug na rlung gis phye nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phreng gtan gzhug par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis phreng gtan bcug pa dang /_gcad dka' ba 
[\[116b.2\]]dang /_dbye dka' bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dbyi gu skam ka bcang bar bya ste/_des gcad pa dang dbye bar bya'o//_//sdom la/_gsor dang lcags kyi thu lum dang /_/phor pa shing gi thal phyags dang /_/rdo gu khri dang rgyab rten dang /_/sta re dang ni gzong bu'o/_/sangs 
[\[116b.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo 'phar la lag zungs kyi lung mig gdags par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis sgo 'phar la yang mig gis brkos te sgo 'phar gas 
[\[116b.4\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgo 'phar la brko bar mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo 'phar la brko bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis yang mig btags te drangs na mi brtan zhing phyir byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na 
[\[116b.5\]]rjes su gnang ste gsor bcang bar bya zhing /_des phug la yang mig gdags par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu gang gi tshe rab tu byung ba nas zhes bya ba nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[116b.6\]]dag bdag na ste mi bde'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/gnas brtan khyod ci na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag rlung nad na'o/_/gnas brtan sman cung zad mdzod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag sngon ni bdag gis lcags kyi thu lum bsregs te/_des chab bsros nas lus rngul bar bgyis so/_/gnas brtan ci'i 
[\[116b.7\]]slad du mi srel/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_rlung nad can gyis lcags kyi thu lum bcang bar bya ste/_des chu bsros la lus rngul bar bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis lcags kyi thu lum bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis de bsregs pa dbyung ma nus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lcags thag gis gdags par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis lcags thag kyang mer bcug pas de yang tsha bar gyur 
[\[117a.2\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de der gzhug par mi bya'i des gsher ba'i nang du bcug la lcags kyi thu lum bsreg par bya'o/_/de dag lcags kyi thu lum rtswa u Sha tu gas rung bar byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de rung bar mi bya'i bsregs pa de nyid de'i rung 
[\[117a.3\]]ba yin no/_/dge slong dag dang por yongs su spyad pa'i chu bsro bar byed cing phyis rung ba'i chu bsro bar byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sngar rung ba'i chu bsro bar bya zhing phyis yongs su spyad pa'i chu bsro bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka len 
[\[117a.4\]]da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu gang gi tshe rab tu byung ba nas zhes bya ba nas/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag na ste mi bde'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/gnas brtan khyod ci na/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di dang 'di na'o/_/gnas brtan sman cung zad mdzod cig_/tshe dang 
[\[117a.5\]]ldan pa dag sngon ni bdag gis sman phor bcangs so/_/gnas brtan da ci ste mi bcang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_sman phor bcang 
[\[117a.6\]]bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/khyim bdag cig gis dge 'dun gyi bsro khang byas na der sol ba dag bdal de 'jog nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bsdu bar bya'o/_/
[\[117a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis sol ba dag bsdu bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag cis bsdu bar bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lcags kyi thal phyags byas la des bsdu bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lcags kyi thal phyags bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/_
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]dge slong dgon pa ba dag la de'i 'byor pa med pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gis shing gi thal phyags byed du gzhug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis shing gi thal phyags byed du gzhug go zhes bka' stsal 
[\[117b.2\]]pa dang /_dge slong dag gis thal phyags ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mgo sbom por byas la de nas lci ba dang 'jim pas bskus te des sol ba bsdu bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas 
[\[117b.3\]]sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig na nas sman pa'i gan du song ste smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo la nad 'di lta bu byung na sman ston cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa 'di dang 'di mdzod cig dang khyod sos par 'gyur ro/_/de la sman sbyar ba'i rdo gu dgos nas de khyim bdag 
[\[117b.4\]]cig gi gan du song ste/_rdo gu brnyas pa dang /_des de la rdo gu byin no/_/des sman sbyar te slar khyim bdag de nyid la byin pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyi lags kyis bzhud cig_/des smras pa/_khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/des smras pa/_'phags 
[\[117b.5\]]pa gal te de lta na zhog la bzhud cig_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_rdo gu bcang bar bya'o/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa gas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rdo gu ji ltar 
[\[117b.6\]]'chang du gnang ba thos nas des lcags rdo gu lnga brgya phul na/_dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin brim par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin brim par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_gzhon 
[\[117b.7\]]pa'i mthar ma khyed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag la kham pa'i rdo gu sbyin par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig sa la nyal bas de'i kha zas ma zhu bar gyur nas des khyim bdag cig gi gan du song ste khri brnyas nas de de'i steng du nyal bas sos te slar de la byin pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod nyid kyi lags kyis bzhud cig_/khyim bdag bcom 
[\[118a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/des smras pa/_'phags pa gal te de lta na zhog la bzhud cig_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_dge slong gis khri bcang bar bya'o/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin 
[\[118a.3\]]gyi ma sa gas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la khri bog ri can ji ltar gnang ba thos nas de khri bog ri can lnga brgya phul na dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin brim par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[118a.4\]]mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig la rgyab rten dgos par gyur nas des khyim bdag cig la brnyas te des dgos pa byas nas slar byin pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod nyid kyi lags kyis bzhud cig_/khyim 
[\[118a.5\]]bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/des smras pa/_'phags pa gal te de lta na zhog la bzhud cig_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_dge slong gis rgyab rten bcang bar bya'o/_/
[\[118a.6\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa gas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rgyab rten ji ltar gnang ba thos nas des rgyab rten lnga brgya phul na dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgan rims bzhin brim par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[118a.7\]]'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig gi btso blag gi las byed pa de la sta re dgos par gyur nas des khyim bdag cig la brnyas te des dgos pa byas nas slar byin pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]nyid kyi lags kyis bzhud cig_/khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/des smras pa/_'phags pa gal te de lta na zhog la bzhud cig_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su 
[\[118b.2\]]gnang ste dge slong gis sta re bcang bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig gi khri'i ya thog chag nas des khyim bdag cig las gzong bu brnyas te/_des dgos pa byas nas 
[\[118b.3\]]slar byin pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod nyid kyi lags kyis bzhud cig_/khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/des smras pa/_'phags pa gal te de lta na zhog la bzhud cig_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[118b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_dge slong dag gis gzong bu bcang bar bya'o//_//sdom la/_ste'u dang skas ni gsum dag dang /_/sgre'u dang nang pa phan gdags dang /_/shing dang rdo dang sa dag gi/_/thang ma skas gsum gnang ba'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[118b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig gi khri'u'i rkang pa chag ste de la ste'u dgos nas des khyim bdag cig la ste'u brnyas nas des dgos pa byas nas slar byin pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa 
[\[118b.6\]]khyod nyid kyis lags kyis bzhud cig_/des smras pa/_khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/des smras pa/_'phags pa gal te de lta na zhog la bzhud cig_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[118b.7\]]de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_dge slong gis ste'u bcang bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na shar gyi kun dga' ra ba na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis rtsig pa'i grogs bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]slong dag mchod rten dang /_gtsug lag khang rtsig pa'i grogs byed do/_/ji tsam na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mthon por brtsigs pas de la gzeg dgos par gyur na/_dge slong dag gis ci las gzeg par bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[119a.2\]]stsal pa/_skas las gzeg par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis skas la gzeg par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag skas du yod mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skas ni rnam pa gsum ste/_shing gi dang /_thag pa'i dang /_smyug
