[\[138a.5\]]la rten cing mchu dag za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs sbrang rtsi'i 'dab ces bya ba ni so la rten cing so dag za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs shing sgo zhes bya ba ni so'i rtsa ba la rten cing so'i rtsa ba dag za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs khab mchu zhes bya ba ni lce la rten cing lce za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs mchu rnon zhes 
[\[138a.6\]]bya ba ni lce drung la rten cing lce drung za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs lag can zhes bya ba ni dkan la rten cing dkan za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs gnyis po chu'i dra ba dang /_phyed sgur ni lag sor la gnas shing lag sor dag za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs gnyis po 'phyang ba dang rab tu 'phyang ba ni lag 
[\[138a.7\]]pa'i bol la rten cing lag pa'i bol za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs gnyis po dpung pa dang nye dpung ni dpung pa la rten cing dpung pa dag za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs gnyis po rko ba dang /_nye rko ni lkog ma la rten cing lkog ma za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs gnyis po khon can dang /_khon can chen po ni snying 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]la rten cing snying za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs gnyis po dung dang dung chu ni sha la rten cing sha za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs gnyis po mdog can dang stobs can ni khrag la rten cing khrag 'thung bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs gnyis po dpa' bo dang dri sgo ni chu rgyus la rten cing chu rgyus za bar byed/_srin bu'i 
[\[138b.2\]]rigs gnyis po dma' ba dang /_kha sbubs can ni sgal tshigs la rten cing sgal tshigs za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs tshil mdog ces bya ba ni tshil la rten cing tshil za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs mkhris mdog ces bya ba ni mkhris pa la rten cing mkhris pa za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs mu 
[\[138b.3\]]tig ces bya ba ni mcher pa la rten cing mcher pa za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs mu tig chen po zhes bya ba ni mkhal ma la rten cing mkhal ma za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs 'ongs min zhes bya ba ni mchin pa la rten cing mchin pa za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs bzhi po chu 'dres dang /_chu 'dres chen 
[\[138b.4\]]po dang /_khab mchu dang khab mchu chen po ni rgyu ma la rten cing rgyu ma dag za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs lnga po zla ba dang /_zla gdong dang /_zla 'od dang /_zla 'od gdong dang /_rgya chen ni glo g.yas pa la rten cing glo g.yas pa za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs de skad ces bya ba gzhan dag ni glo 
[\[138b.5\]]g.yon pa la rten cing glo g.yon pa za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs bzhi po rim 'bigs dang /_sngar 'bigs dang /_sra 'bigs dang /_brtan 'bigs ni rus pa la rten cing rus pa za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs bzhi po dkar po dang /_nye dkar dang /_stobs 'phrog dang /_snom pa ni rtsa 
[\[138b.6\]]la rten cing rtsa za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs bzhi po seng ge dang /_stobs can dang /_'dam bu dang /_me tog len ni pho ba la rten cing pho ba za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs gnyis po brtan pa dang /_nye brtan ni long ka la rten cing long ka za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs bzhi po srin bu'i mchu dang /_
[\[138b.7\]]phung po'i gdong dang /_dra ba'i kha dang /_'dral byed ni gci ba'i lam la gnas shing gci ba'i lam za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs bzhi po sgra ngan dang /_sgra ngan chen po dang /_'dren byed dang /_'drul ldan ni bshang ba'i lam la rten cing bshang ba'i lam za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs gnyis po kha nad dang /_
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]'jigs byed ni brla la rten cing brla za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs gnyis po mdze dang /_nye mdze ni pus mo la rten cing pus mo dag za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs glen gzhi zhes bya ba ni rje ngar la rten cing rje ngar za bar byed/_srin bu'i rigs mgo nag ces bya ba ni rkang sor la rten cing rkang sor dag za 
[\[139a.2\]]bar byed do/_/dga' bo lus 'di ni de ltar srin bu'i rigs brgyad khris nyin mtshan du za bas gtses te des na gdung ba dang /_kun du gdung ba dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rmya bar 'gyur zhing dga' bo gzhi de las gdung ba dang /_kun du gdung ba dang /_yongs su gdung ba dag myong bar 'gyur/_
[\[139a.3\]]so sor myong bar 'gyur/_tshor bar 'gyur/_yang dag par tshor bar 'gyur la/_sems kyi gdung ba dang /_kun du gdung ba dang /_yongs su gdung ba dag kyang myong bar 'gyur/_so sor myong bar 'gyur/_tshor bar 'gyur/_yang dag par tshor bar 'gyur ro/_/lus kyi rims dang /_
[\[139a.4\]]ngal ba dang /_yongs su gdung ba dag kyang myong bar 'gyur/_so sor myong bar 'gyur/_tshor bar 'gyur/_yang dag par tshor bar 'gyur zhing sems kyi rims dang /_ngal ba dang /_yongs su gdung ba dag kyang myong bar 'gyur/_so sor myong bar 'gyur/_tshor bar 'gyur/_yang 
[\[139a.5\]]dag par tshor bar 'gyur te/_de la ni sman pa rnams kyang rmongs shing sman gyi sbyor ba mi shes na dga' bo de la 'khor ba na yang srid pa la mngon par dga' ba de ltar sdug bsngal du mas nyen pa la mnog ci zhig yod/_dga' bo de ltar byung zhing de ltar mngon par grub pa de lus la gdon 'di lta bu 
[\[139a.6\]]dag 'byung ste/_'di lta ste/_lha'i gdon dang /_klu'i gdon dang /_lha ma yin gyi gdon dang /_rlung lha'i gdon dang /_nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang /_dri za'i gdon dang /_mi'am ci'i gdon dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang /_gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang /_srin po'i gdon dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[139a.7\]]kyi gdon dang /_sha za'i gdon dang /_'byung po'i gdon dang /_grul bum gyi gdon dang /_srul po'i gdon dang /_lus srul po'i gdon dang /_srul po long ba'i gdon dang /_skem byed kyi gdon dang /_smyo byed kyi gdon dang /_grib gnon gyi gdon dang /_rngul byed kyi gdon dang /_bya'i gdon dang /_
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi gdon dang /_nam gru'i gdon dang /_phyugs bdag gi gdon dang /_ma mo'i gdon dang /_'dzums byed kyi gdon dang /_rkang bam gyi gdon dang /_nyams byed kyi gdon dang /_zla ba'i gdon dang /_nyi ma'i gdon dang /_rgyu skar gyi gdon te/_gdon de lta bu dag lus la 'byung 
[\[139b.2\]]na dga' bo de la srid pa tshol ba ma'i mngal na gnas pa la mnog ci zhig yod/_dga' bo de ltar skyes shing de ltar mngon par grub pa de mas rang gi khrag gi dri mas skyed par byed/_gso bar byed/_sring bar byed de/_dga' bo ma'i nu zho de ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'di lta ste/_khrag gi dri ma 
[\[139b.3\]]zhes bya'o/_/dga' bo de la srid pa tshol ba ma'i mngal gyi gnas na gnas pa de ltar skyes shing de ltar byung /_de ltar mngon par grub/_de ltar zas rags pa za ba la mnog ci zhig yod de/_de ltar legs par bde bar yongs su bsrungs na de ring na lo brgya'am/_cung zad cig lhag par 'tsho'o/_/
[\[139b.4\]]de las kyang phyed ni gnyis kyis khebs so/_/lo bcu ni byis pa'o/_/lo nyi shu rgas pa ste/_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams kyis kyang gcad/_lus las byung ba'i nad rnam pa du ma brgya phrag du mas kyang gcad do/_/dga' bo lus 
[\[139b.5\]]kyi nad shin tu bzod par dka' ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag gis gzir na srog chags rnams 'chi yang 'dod do/_/dga' bo da ltar lus can rnams kyi 'tsho ba ni shin tu mi bzad pa thung ba ngan pa ste/_de yang sdug bsngal dang ldan zhing tshe phyi mar 'gro ba yin pas dge ba bya zhing tshangs par spyod pa 
[\[139b.6\]]spyad par bya ste/_skyes pa la mi 'chi ba med do/_/'on kyang da ltar mi rnams ni 'di lta ste/_don spyad pa dang /_chos spyad pa dang /_bsod nams spyad pa dang /_dge ba spyad pa dang /_dge legs spyad pa la bag bor nas gnas te/_las kyis ni 'di la las dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dag byed pa yin no/_/dga' 
[\[139b.7\]]bo dran pa dang ldan pa dang /_bag yod par gnos shig_/khyod mjug tu 'gyod ta re/_'dod pa dang /_sdug pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang 'bral bar 'gyur te/_'bral ba dang /_'gyes pa ni gdon mi za bar 'byung ngo /_/dga' bo lus can rnams ni las bdag gir bya ba dang /_las 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]kyi bgo skal la spyod pa dang /_las la rton pa can yin te/_las dge ba'am/_sdig pa yang rung /_gang dang gang kho na byed pa'i las de dang de'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo lo brgyar 'tsho ba la gnas skabs bcu so sor myong bar 'gyur te/_gnas skabs 
[\[140a.2\]]dang po la ni byis pa dman pa gan rkyal du nyal bar 'gyur ro/_/gnas skabs gnyis pa la ni gzhon nu rtse ba'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro/_/gnas skabs gsum pa la ni thor bu 'dod pa spyod par 'gyur ro/_/gnas skabs bzhi pa la ni stobs dang ldan zhing spro ba can du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[140a.3\]]gnas skabs lnga pa la ni shes rab dang ldan zhing spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gnas skabs drug pa la ni dran pa dang ldan zhing dpyod pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro/_/gnas skabs bdun pa la ni brtan pa tshad la bab par 'gyur ro/_/gnas skabs brgyad pa la ni brtan pa rgyal po lta bur 
[\[140a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/gnas skabs dgu pa la ni rgan po rga bas 'khogs par 'gyur ro/_/gnas skabs bcu pa la ni tshe zad cing 'chi ba'i chos can du 'gyur te/_dga' bo de ltar na lo brgyar 'tsho ba la gnas skabs bcu po de dag so sor myong bar 'gyur ro/_/lo brgyar 'tsho ba ni dus tshigs 
[\[140a.5\]]sum brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur te/_dgun rnams kyi dus tshigs brgya dang /_so ga rnams kyi dus tshigs brgya dang /_dbyar rnams kyi dus tshigs brgya'o/_/dus tshigs sum brgyar 'tsho ba ni zla ba stong nyis brgyar 'tsho ste/_dgun rnams kyi bzhi dang /_so ga rnams kyi bzhi dang /_dbyar rnams 
[\[140a.6\]]kyi bzhi'o/_/zla ba stong nyis brgyar 'tsho ba ni zla ba phyed po nyis stong bzhi brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur te/_dgun rnams kyi brgyad dang /_so ga rnams kyi brgyad dang /_dbyar rnams kyi brgyad do/_/zla ba phyed po nyis stong bzhi brgyar 'tsho ba ni nyin zhag sum khri drug stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur te/_nyin zhag 
[\[140a.7\]]sum khri drug stong du 'tsho ba ni zan gyi bar chad kyi zan ma gtogs par zan bdun khri nyis stong za bar 'gyur ro/_/de la zan gyi bar chad ni 'di dag yin te/_gang khros pas mi za ba dang /_bde bas mi za ba dang /_sdug bsngal bas mi za ba dang /_rnyed kyang mi za ba dang /_ma rnyed de mi za ba dang /_nyal te 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]mi za ba dang /_smyung bar gnas te mi za ba dang /_rtse bas myos te mi za ba dang /_bya bas g.yengs te mi za ba'o/_/za ba gang yin pa dang /_mi za ba gang yin pa de dag gcig tu bsdus nas ma'i nu zho dang bcas te zan bdun khri nyis stong du 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo de lta bas na mi tshe lo brgya 
[\[140b.2\]]thub pa rnams kyi tshe dang /_dus tshigs dang /_zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed dang /_nyin zhag dang /_zan dang /_zan gyi bar chad dag kyang brjod pa yin no/_/dga' bo de ltar skyes shing de ltar byung /_de ltar mngon par grub pa'i lus la lus kyi nad 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_mgo 
[\[140b.3\]]nad dang /_mig nad dang /_rna ba'i nad dang /_sna nad dang /_so nad dang /_mgul nad dang /_snying nad dang /_cham pa dang /_shu ba dang /_g.yan pa dang /_rkang shu dang /_mdze dang /_'bras dang /_'brum bu phra mo dang /_sha bkra dang /_brjed byed dang /_lhog pa dang /_rkang bam dang /_mtshan bar rdol dang /_
[\[140b.4\]]dmu rdzing dang /_skyigs bu dang /_skyug bro ba dang /_ser ga dang /_'khru ba dang /_rims dang /_rims drag po dang /_lud pa dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_skem pa dang /_bkres ngab dang /_skya rbab dang /_skrang ba dang /_tshil nad dang /_mkhris nad dang /_me dbal dang /_rims nad dang /_rims nyin 
[\[140b.5\]]gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa dang /_rtag pa'i rims dang /_yan lag tsha ba dang /_rtsib logs tsha ba dang /_snying tsha ba dang /_yan lag na ba dang /_rtsib logs na ba dang /_snying na ba dang /_nam tshong na ba ste/_dga' bo de lta bu dang cha mthun pa'i nad rlung las gyur 
[\[140b.6\]]pa'i nad brgya rtsa gcig dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad brgya rtsa gcig dang /_bad kan las gyur pa'i nad brgya rtsa gcig dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad brgya rtsa gcig ste/_de dag bsdoms na nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi nang du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dga' bo lus 'di ni nad du gyur pa/_'bras su 
[\[140b.7\]]gyur pa/_zug rngur gyur pa/_ring po mi thogs pa dang /_'jig pa dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_'gran zla dang bcas pa dang /_dbugs mi phyin pa dang /_rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can no/_/dga' bo srog chags rnams ni skyes na lag pa bcad 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/_so sor myong bar 'gyur/_tshor bar 'gyur/_so sor tshor bar 'gyur/_rkang pa bcad pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_rna ba bcad pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_mchu bcad pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_lce bcad pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_mgo bcad pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_su mi 
[\[141a.2\]]'dod dang /_lcags dang /_mdor thod dang /_phyin ka log tu bcings pa dang /_bcing ba lngas bcing ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/_so sor myong bar 'gyur/_tshor bar 'gyur/_so sor tshor bar 'gyur/_re lder dril ba dang /_gsal shing gis gzugs pa dang /_gag shing 
[\[141a.3\]]du gzhug pa dang /_zangs su btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs drag pa/_rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa/_'chi ba la thug pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/_so sor myong bar 'gyur/_tshor bar 'gyur/_so sor tshor bar 'gyur ro/_/gsad pa dang /_bcing ba dang /_brdeg pa dang /_bsdigs 
[\[141a.4\]]pa dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_lhags pa dang /_char pa dang /_sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_rlung dang nyi ma dang /_sdig sbrul gyi reg pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs dag myong bar 'gyur/_so sor myong bar 'gyur/_tshor bar 'gyur/_so sor tshor 
[\[141a.5\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo de ltar sdug bsngal de lta bu dag gis g.yen spyo zhing shin tu nyam nga bar gyur pa'i srog chags kun du tshol ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal don du gnyer ba yongs su tshol ba rnams la yang dang yang du don du gnyer ba la zhen pa las 'byung /_lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal 
[\[141a.6\]]drag pa/_rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba/_nad gdung bar byed pa dag skye bar 'gyur te/_dga' bo de lta bas na skye ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/rga ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/na ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/'chi ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/sdug pa dang bral ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/mi sdug pa dang phrad 
[\[141a.7\]]pa ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/gang 'dod pa btsal te mi rnyed pa de yang sdug bsngal ba'o/_/mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal ba'o/_/dga' bo 'chag pa dang /_'dug pa dang /_'greng ba dang /_nyal ba'i spyod lam dag kyang so so so sor sdug bsngal bar rig par bya ste/_bsam gtan pas spyod lam de dang /_
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]de dag gi rang bzhin brtags na/_gal te 'chag pas nyi ma 'da' bar byed cing /_'greng bar mi byed/_'dug par mi byed/_nyal bar mi byed na des 'chag pa de la sdug bsngal kho na so sor myong bar 'gyur zhing /_drag pa nyid dang /_rtsub pa nyid dang /_mi bzad pa nyid dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba nyid so sor myong bar 
[\[141b.2\]]'gyur gyi/_'chag pa de la bde ba'i 'du shes 'byung bar ni mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'dug pas nyi ma 'da' bar byed cing /_'chag par mi byed/_'greng bar mi byed/_nyal bar mi byed na de 'dug pa de la/_sdug bsngal kho na so sor myong bar 'gyur zhing /_drag pa nyid dang /_rtsub pa nyid dang /_mi bzod pa nyid 
[\[141b.3\]]dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba nyid so sor myong bar 'gyur gyi/_'dug pa de la bde ba'i 'du shes 'byung bar ni mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'greng bas nyi ma 'da' bar byed cing /_'dug par mi byed/_'chag par mi byed/_nyal bar mi byed na des 'greng ba de la sdug bsngal kho na so sor myong bar 'gyur zhing /_drag pa nyid dang /_
[\[141b.4\]]rtsub pa nyid dang /_mi bzad pa nyid dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba nyid dag so sor myong bar 'gyur gyi 'greng ba de la bde ba'i 'du shes 'byung bar ni mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te nyal bas nyi ma 'da' bar byed cing 'chag par mi byed/_'greng bar mi byed/_'dug par mi byed na des nyal ba de la sdug bsngal kho na so sor myong 
[\[141b.5\]]bar 'gyur zhing /_drag pa nyid dang /_rtsub pa nyid dang /_mi bzad pa nyid dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba nyid so sor myong bar 'gyur gyi/_nyal ba de la bde ba'i 'du shes 'byung bar ni mi 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo 'on kyang spyod lam gyi sdug bsngal de dang de rgyun gcad pa'i phyir sdug bsngal sar pa gzhan dang gzhan 'byung 
[\[141b.6\]]ba la bde ba'i 'du shes 'byung ste/_dga' bo 'byung ba na yang sdug bsngal 'di kho na 'byung la/_'gag pa na yang sdug bsngal kho na 'gag_/'byung ba na yang 'du byed dag nyid 'byung la/_'gag pa na yang 'du byed dag nyid 'gag go/_/de bzhin gshegs pas ni 'du byed rnams kyi rgyud nying mtshams sbyor ba thugs su 
[\[141b.7\]]chud nas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba bka' stsal to/_/dga' bo 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/_mi brtan pa/_'du byed thams cad ni dbugs mi phyin pa/_rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can no/_/dga' bo de lta bas na 'du byed thams cad la yid byung bar bya ba'i rigs spangs pa dang /_rnam par grol 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]bar bya ba'i rigs so/_/dga' bo bde 'gro'i 'gro ba'o snyam pa'i 'du shes can gang yin pa de dag na yang shin tu mi bzad pa/_'jigs su rung ba/_smad pa/_brjod dka' ba de lta bu dang /_slu ba de lta bu dang /_sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa de lta bu 'byung na/_dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 
[\[142a.2\]]yul du skyes pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa ni 'di 'dra'o zhes dpe bstan par yang shin tu dka'o/_/dga' bo mngal du 'jug pa ni bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di na la la shes bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug_/shes bzhin du ma'i mngal na gnas/_shes bzhin du ma'i 
[\[142a.3\]]mngal nas 'byung ste/_'di ni mngal du 'jug pa dang po'o/_/dga' bo gzhan yang 'di na la la shes bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug_/shes bzhin du ma'i mngal na gnas shing shes bzhin ma yin par ma'i mngal nas 'byung ste/_'di ni mngal du 'jug pa gnyis pa'o/_/dga' bo gzhan yang 'di na la 
[\[142a.4\]]la shes bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug cing /_shes bzhin ma yin par ma'i mngal na gnas/_shes bzhin ma yin par ma'i mngal nas 'byung ste/_'di ni mngal du 'jug pa gsum pa'o/_/dga' bo gzhan yang 'di na la la shes bzhin ma yin par ma'i mngal du 'jug_/shes bzhin ma yin par ma'i mngal 
[\[142a.5\]]na gnas/_shes bzhin ma yin par ma'i mngal nas 'byung ste/_'di ni mngal du 'jug pa bzhi pa'o/_/ji ltar na 'di shes bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug_/shes bzhin du ma'i mngal na gnas/_shes bzhin du ma'i mngal nas 'byung zhe na/_'di na la la so so'i skye bo nyid yin la rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims 
[\[142a.6\]]dang ldan par gyur cing /_dge ba'i chos can/_dge ba la 'dun pa/_dge ba kun du spyod pa/_sdom pa mang ba so sor rtog pa mang ba/_bag yod par gnas pa/_shes rab chen po can yin zhing /_de 'gyod pa med par ram/_rgyun du zhugs pa de ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa 'am/_rigs nas rigs 
[\[142a.7\]]su skye ba'am/_lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'am/_bar chad gcig pa zhig 'chi ba'i dus byed na dge ba'i chos de dag gis nye bar brtan pa de 'chi ka'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag pa/_rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba/_srog 'phrog par byed pa dag gis kun du reg kyang dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur zhing /_
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]de dran pa ma nyams par 'chi ba'i dus byed de/_de nas de dran pa ma nyams par shes bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de der zhugs nas las bdag gir bya ba/_las kyi skye gnas pa/_las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/_las la brten pa/_sems pas byas pa/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de 
[\[142b.2\]]phug rab tu tsha ba/_las bdag gir bya ba/_las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/_las la rton pa/_sems pas byas pa/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/_bdud la rag las pa/_bdud kyi snod bdud kyi khyim/_mi gtsang ba thams cad kyi gter/_mi brtan pa/_slu ba'i chos can byis pa 'drid pa/_rus pa'i 
[\[142b.3\]]'khrul 'khor rtsa'i breng chags pa can/_chu rgyus kyi dra bas che long sbrel ba/_sha dang /_khrag dang /_tshil gyis dkris pa/_pags pa tsam gyis g.yogs pa/_sla tsha'i tshogs bcer ba skra dang sen mo dang /_so dang /_spu skye bar 'gyur bar mngon pa can nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin 
[\[142b.4\]]pa/_gsal bas mngon par zhen pa/_rang dbang med pa/_snabs rul pa'i rlan sungs shing myags pa dang /_tshil dang /_chu ser dang /_rngul gyi dri ma dang /_kha chu dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_glo ba dang /_rgyu ma dang /_gnye ma dang /_mcher pa dang /_lgang pa dang /_mi gtsang ba rnam pa mang pos yongs su gang 
[\[142b.5\]]ba/_srin bu'i rigs stong phrag mang po'i gnas shin tu dri nga ba'i sgo gnyis dang ldan pa/_rus pa'i bu ga dang /_khung bu phug du ma dang ldan pa/_gcin dang /_klad pa dang /_klad rgyas dang /_rkang gi tshogs kyi ljan ljin can du pho ba'i 'og long ka'i steng na kha ni sgal tshigs la bltas/_rgyab ni lto ba'i pags 
[\[142b.6\]]pa la bstan te/_zla ba re re zhing zla mtshan 'byung bas ni brta ma'i zas kyi rnam pa so'i phreng ba gnyis kyis zhib mor byas shing mid par mid pa/_'og nas kha'i rma'i dri ma dang kha chus brlan pa steng nas klad rgyas kyis sbags pa/_skyugs pa dang 'dra ba'i zas kyi ro khong na lte ba'i bu gnas 'jug pas ni skyed cing /_nur 
[\[142b.7\]]nur po dang mer mer po dang /_nar nar po dang /_gor gor po dang /_rkang lag 'gyus pa'i ngo bor yongs su 'gyur bar 'gyur zhing /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_'gram pa ni sha ma'i snod kyis dkris/_snam phyis bzhin du dri nga ba mnam pa mi bzad pa/_mun gnag 'greng bar ni yan man rgyu/_zas kyi ro kha ba dang /_
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]skyur ba dang /_rtsub pa dang /_lan tshwa dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba me stag lta bu dag gis ni reg_/srin grol ma bzhin mi gtsang ba'i khu bas ni gso/_/mi gtsang ba myags pa rab tu 'bar ba'i 'dam gyi nang du ni song /_srog gi dbang po ni mi brtan/_ma'i lus kyi nang gi mes ni kun nas gdung /_
[\[143a.2\]]kun du gdung /_yongs su gdung /_tsha kun du tsha/_yongs su tsha/_sreg kun du sreg_/yongs su sreg cing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar de'i ma g.yo ba dang /_kun du g.yo ba dang /_yongs su g.yo ba dang khur lci ba khyer 
[\[143a.3\]]ram/_lus 'phyang ba de lta de ltar yang de bcing ba lngas bcings pa dang /_me ma mur gyi dong du bcug pa lta bur sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba/_dpe bya bar dka' ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de de ltar ma'i mngal gyi gnas na gnas shing sdug bsngal gyis 
[\[143a.4\]]nyen kyang dbang po rno ba'i phyir dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar ma'i mngal na gnas pa rnams la yang kha cig la sngon gyi las kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi dbang gis mngal log par 'gyur zhing /_mngal na gnas pa la mi bde bar 'gyur ro/_/mas bza' ba dang btung ba mi mthun pa ha cang grang ba'am/_ha cang 
[\[143a.5\]]dro ba'am/_ha cang skyur ba'am/_ha cang mngar ba'am/_ha cang kha ba 'am/_ha cang tsha ba'am/_ha cang bska ba 'am/_ha cang rtsub pa'am/_ha cang lan tshwa che ba bsten pa'am/_btung bas mus byung bar gyur pa'am/_skyes pas mus byung bar gyur pa 'am/_nad mang ba 'am/_smra ba mang ba 'am/_
[\[143a.6\]]mya ngan mang ba'am/_chags ches pa'am/_sgyel ba'am/_brgyab par gyur na rgyu de dag gis de'i lus la gnod par 'gyur ro/_/lus la gnod na de la brten pa mngal na gnas pa la yang gnod par 'gyur ro/_/de de na gnod cing shin tu sdug bsngal bas nyen pa na 'gul te 'gul bas log 
[\[143a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de shes pa'i bud med dam/_gzhon nu gso ba la mkhas pas chu 'jam tsam dang /_mar dkar dang /_'bru mar gyis lag pa byugs nas chab khungs lta bur dri nga ba/_mnam pa/_mi bzad pa/_mun gnag_/ljan ljin gyi 'dam can/_srin bu'i rigs stong phrag shin tu mang po'i 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]gnas rtag tu 'dzag pa/_rgyun du byi dor bya dgos pa/_btsog pa/_khrag gi dri ma dang /_chu ser kun du rul/_rnam par rul cing myags pa can/_'dred pa mthong na shin tu 'jigs su rung ba/_bu ga'i pags pas g.yogs pa/_rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor chen po'i bu ga der lag pa bcug ste/_dal bu dal 
[\[143b.2\]]bus mnams shing gnas ji lta ba bzhin du 'jog par byed do/_/de der chu 'jam tsam dang /_mar dkar dang /_'bru mar gyis byugs pa'i lag pas mnams shing cham du 'bebs pa na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' 
[\[143b.3\]]bo dper na rigs kyi bu shin tu gzhon nu'i rang bzhin can gyi lus la spu gri rnon po spu breg tu rung bas yan lag dang nying lag thams cad bcad cing /_lus rtsi drag pos kun nas bskus na lus la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po shin tu drag pa/_rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[143b.4\]]ro/_/dga' bo de bzhin du de la chu 'jam tsam dang /_mar dkar dang /_til mar gyis byugs pa'i lag pas mnams na lus la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub pa mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mngal gyi gnas na gnas pa de'i lus la sdug bsngal gyi reg pa las byung 
[\[143b.5\]]ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba de dag byung yang dbang po rno ba'i phyir dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar na de shes bzhin du ma'i mngal na gnas pa yin no/_/de nas de yan lag dang nying lag thams cad skyes nas gcin gyi gnas rul ba/_ltung ba/_
[\[143b.6\]]'greng ba/_mi bzad pa/_dri nga ba/_mnam pa/_mun gnag_/mthong na shin tu 'jigs su rung ba/_phyi sa dang /_gcin gyis bsgos pa/_dri mi zhim pa'i dri ma dang /_khrag dang chu ser can rtag tu 'dzag pa'i rma'i sgor sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i rlung gis rkang pa ni gyen du bstan/_mgo 
[\[143b.7\]]ni thur du bstan/_lag pa gnyis ni bskums pa na rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor gnyis kyis gzir/_kun du gzir/_yongs su gzir cing /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba dag gis lus kyi yan lag rma sar pa lta bu gze re can thams cad sngon por 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]'gyur la/_lus kyi dbang po thams cad ni tsha/_mngal gyi dri ma shin tu btsog pas ni lus yog_/skom pas chu dang mgrin pa dang snying ni skams te/_dog pa dang nyam nga bas mi bzad par gnas pa de rgyu dang rkyen gyi dbang gis sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i rlung gis phul ba na dka' dka' 
[\[144a.2\]]ltar ji zhig lta ste 'byung ngo /_/de byung ma thag tu phyi rol gyi rlung rma la rtsi drag po'i reg pa can lta bu'am/_lag pa 'am/_gos kyis reg na ral gris bcad pa bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub pa mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de sdug bsngal de lta bus nyen kyang dbang po rno ba'i phyir dran 
[\[144a.3\]]pa nyams par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar na de shes bzhin du ma'i mngal nas 'byung ba yin no/_/dga' bo de ltar na ma'i mngal du 'jug pa yang sdug bsngal ba/_gnas pa yang sdug bsngal ba ma'i mngal nas 'byung ba yang sdug bsngal ba yin na/_dga' bo de la srid pa mngon par 'dod pa ma'i mngal gyi gnas na 
[\[144a.4\]]gnas pa la mnog ci zhig yod/_ji ltar na 'di shes bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug_/shes bzhin du ma'i mngal du gnas shing shes bzhin du ma yin par ma'i mngal nas 'byung zhe na/_'di na la la so so'i skye bo nyid yin la/_rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing /_dge ba'i chos can/_dge ba la 
[\[144a.5\]]'dun pa/_dge ba kun du spyod pa/_sdom pa mang ba/_so sor rtog pa mang ba/_bag yod par gnas pa yin zhing 'gyod pa med pa'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa de ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa'am/_rigs nas rigs su skye ba'am/_lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'am/_bar chad gcig pa zhig 'chi ba'i dus byed na dge 
[\[144a.6\]]ba'i chos de dag gis nye bar brtan pa/_de 'chi ka'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag pa/_rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba/_srog 'phrog par byed pa dag gis reg kyang dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur zhing de dran pa ma nyams par 'chi ba'i dus byed de/_de nas de dran pa ma nyams par shes bzhin du ma'i mngal 
[\[144a.7\]]du 'jug go/_/de der zhugs nas las bdag gir bya ba zhes bya ba nas/_srin grol ma bzhin du khu bas ni gso/_/mi gtsang ba myags pa rab tu 'bar ba'i 'dam gyi nang du ni song /_srog gi dbang po ni mi brtan/_ma'i lus kyi nang gi mes ni kun nas gdung zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/sreg_/kun du 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]sreg_/yongs su sreg cing /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas/_ji lta ji ltar de'i ma g.yo ba dang /_kun du g.yo ba dang /_yongs su g.yo ba de lta de ltar yang de bcing ba lngas bcings pa dang /_me ma mur gyi dong du bcug pa lta bur sdug 
[\[144b.2\]]bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa yid du mi 'ong ba/_dpe bya bar dka' ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de de ltar ma'i mngal gyi gnas na gnas shing sdug bsngal gyis nyen kyang dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar ma'i mngal na gnas pa rnams la yang kha cig la sngon gyi las kyi rgyu dang rkyen 
[\[144b.3\]]gyi dbang gis mngal log par 'gyur zhing mngal na gnas pa la mi bde bar 'gyur ro/_/mas bza' ba dang /_btung ba mi mthun pa ha cang grang ba'am/_ha cang dro ba 'am zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/chags ches pa'am/_sgyel ba'am/_brgyab par gyur na rgyu de dag gis de'i lus la gnod par 'gyur 
[\[144b.4\]]ro/_/lus la gnod na de la rten pa mngal na gnas pa la yang gnod par 'gyur ro/_/de de na gnod cing shin tu sdug bsngal bas nyen pa na 'gul te 'gul bas log par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de shes pa'i bud med dam/_gzhon nu gso ba la mkhas pas chu 'jam tsam dang /_mar dkar dang 'bru mar gyis lag 
[\[144b.5\]]pa byugs nas zhes bya ba nas/_mnams shing gnas ji lta ba bzhin du 'jog par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de der chu 'jam tsam dang /_mar dkar dang /_'bru mar gyis byugs pa'i lag pas mnams pa na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub pa mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 
[\[144b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/dga' bo dper na rigs kyi bu shin tu gzhon nu'i rang bzhin can gyi lus la spu gri rnon po spu breg tu rung bas yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad bcad cing lus la rtsi drag pos kun nas bskus na lus la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub pa mi bzad pa yid du mi 'ong ba myong 
[\[144b.7\]]bar 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po bcu gsum pa/_dga' bo de bzhin du de la chu 'jam tsam dang /_mar dkar dang /_'bru mar gyis bskus pa'i lag pas mnams pa na lus la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub pa mi bzad pa yid du mi 'ong ba 'byung bar 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/mngal gyi gnas na gnas pa de'i lus la sdug bsngal gyi reg pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub pa mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba de dag byung yang dran pa nyams par ni mi 'gyur te/_de ltar na 'di shes bzhin du ma'i mngal na gnas pa yin no/_/
[\[145a.2\]]de nas de yan lag dang nying lag thams cad skyes nas gcin gyi gnas rul ba/_ltung ba 'gred pa/_mi bzad pa dri nga ba/_mnam pa/_mun gnag mthong na 'jigs su rung ba/_phyi sa dang /_gcin gyis bsgos pa/_dri mi zhim pa'i dri ma dang /_khrag dang chu ser can rtag tu 'dzag pa'i rma'i sgor sngon gyi 
[\[145a.3\]]las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i rlung gis rkang pa ni gyen du bstan/_mgo ni thur du bstan/_lag pa gnyis ni bskums pa na rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor gnyis kyis gzir kun du gzir/_yongs su gzir cing /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba 
[\[145a.4\]]dag gis lus kyi yan lag rma sar pa lta bu gze re can thams cad sngon por gyur la/_lus kyi dbang po thams cad ni tsha/_mngal gyi dri ma shin tu btsog pas ni lus g.yogs/_skom pas mchu dang /_mgrin pa dang /_snying ni bskams te/_de dog pa nyam nga bas mi bzad par gnas pa 
[\[145a.5\]]de rgyu dang rkyen gyi dbang gis sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i rlung gis phul ba na dka' dka' ltar ji zhig lta ste 'byung ngo /_/de byung ma thag tu phyi rol gyi rlung rma la rtsi drag po'i reg pa can lta bu'am/_lag pa 'am/_gos kyis reg na ral gris bcad pa bzhin du sdug 
[\[145a.6\]]bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub pa mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de sdug bsngal de lta bus nyen na dbang po 'bring po yin pa'i phyir dran pa nyams pa dang /_sems nye bar nyams par 'gyur te/_de ltar na de shes bzhin ma yin par ma'i mngal nas 
[\[145a.7\]]'byung ba yin no/_/dga' bo de ltar na ma'i mngal du 'jug pa yang sdug bsngal ba/_ma'i mngal na gnas pa yang sdug bsngal ba/_ma'i mngal nas 'byung ba yang sdug bsngal ba yin na/_dga' bo de la srid pa 'dod pa ma'i mngal gyi gnas na gnas pa la mnog ci zhig 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]yod/_ji ltar na 'di shes bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug cing shes bzhin ma yin par ma'i mngal na gnas/_shes bzhin ma yin par ma'i mngal nas 'byung zhe na/_'di na la la so so'i skye bo kho na rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing /_dge ba'i chos can dge 
[\[145b.2\]]ba la 'dun pa/_dge ba kun tu spyod pa/_sdom pa mang ba/_so sor rtog pa mang ba/_bag yod par gnas pa/_'gyod pa med pa'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa de ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa'am/_rigs nas rigs su skye ba'am/_lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'am/_
[\[145b.3\]]bar chad gcig pa zhig 'chi ba'i dus byed na dge ba'i chos de dag gi nye bar brtan pa de 'chi ka'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag pa rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba srog 'phrog par byed pa dag gis reg kyang dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur zhing de dran pa ma nyams par 'chi 
[\[145b.4\]]ba'i dus byed de/_de nas de dran pa ma nyams par shes bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug go/_/de der zhugs nas las bdag gir bya ba las kyi skye gnas pa/_las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/_las la rton pa/_sems pas byas pa/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de 
[\[145b.5\]]phug rab tu tsha ba/_las bdag gir bya ba/_las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/_las la rton pa/_sems pas byas pa/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/_bdud la rag las pa/_bdud kyi snod/_bdud kyi khyim mi gtsang ba thams cad kyi gter/_mi brtan pa/_slu ba'i 
[\[145b.6\]]chos can/_byis pa 'drid pa/_rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor/_rtsa'i breng chags pa can/_chu rgyus kyi dra bas che long sbrel ba/_sha dang khrag dang tshil gyis dkris pa/_pags pa tsam gyis g.yogs pa/_sla tsha'i tshogs bcer ba/_skra dang sen mo dang /_so dang /_
[\[145b.7\]]spu skye bar 'gyur bar mngon pa can/_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal/_ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa gsal bas mngon par zhen pa/_rang dbang med pa/_snabs rul pa'i rlan sungs shing myags pa dang /_tshil dang /_chu ser dang /_rngul gyi dri ma dang /_khu chu 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_glo ba dang /_rgyu ma dang /_gnye ma dang /_mcher pa dang /_lgang pa dang /_mi gtsang ba rnam pa mang pos yongs su gang ba/_srin bu'i rigs stong phrag mang po'i gnas/_shin tu dri nga ba'i sgo gnyis dang ldan pa/_
[\[146a.2\]]rus pa'i bu ga dang khung bu'i phug du ma dang ldan pa/_gcin dang /_klad pa dang /_klad rgyas dang /_rkang gi tshogs kyi ljan ljin can du pho ba'i 'og long ka'i steng na kha ni sgal tshigs la bltas/_rgyab ni lto'i pags pa la bstan te/_zla ba re re zhing zla mtshan 'byung bas ni brta ma'i 
[\[146a.3\]]zas kyi rnam pa so'i phreng ba gnyis kyis zhib mor byas shing mid par mid pa/_'og nas kha'i rma'i dri ma dang /_kha chus brlan pa/_steng nas klad rgyas kyis spags pa/_skyugs pa dang 'dra ba'i zas kyi ros khong na lte ba'i bu gnas 'jug pas ni skyed cing nur nur po dang /_mer mer po 
[\[146a.4\]]dang /_nar nar po dang /_gor gor po dang /_rkang lag 'gyus pa'i ngo bor yongs su 'gyur bar 'gyur zhing lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_'gram pa ni sha ma'i snod kyis dkris snam phyi sa bzhin du dri nga ba/_mnam pa/_mi bzad pa/_mun gnag 'gred par ni yan man 
[\[146a.5\]]rgyu/_zas kyi ro kha ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_rtsub pa dang /_lan tshwa dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba me stag lta bu dag gis ni reg/_/srin grol ma bzhin mi gtsang ba'i khu bas ni gso/_/mi gtsang ba myags pa rab tu 'bar ba'i 'dam gyi nang du ni song /_srog gi dbang po 
[\[146a.6\]]ni mi brtan/_ma'i lus kyi nang gi mes ni kun nas gdung /_kun tu gdung /_yongs su gdung /_tsha kun tu tsha/_yongs su tsha/_sreg kun tu sreg_/yongs su sreg cing /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba myong 
[\[146a.7\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar de'i ma g.yo ba dang /_kun tu g.yo ba dang /_yongs su g.yo ba dang /_khur lci ba khyer ram/_lus 'phyang ba de lta de ltar yang de bcing ba lngas bcings pa dang /_me ma mur gyi dong du bcug pa lta bur sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]drag pa/_rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba dpe bya bar dka' ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de de ltar ma'i mngal gyi gnas na gnas shing sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa na dran pa nyams par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar ma'i mngal na gnas pa rnams la yang kha cig la sngon gyi las kyi rgyu 
[\[146b.2\]]dang rkyen gyi dbang gis mngal log par 'gyur zhing mngal na gnas pa la mi bde bar 'gyur ro/_/mas bza' ba dang btung ba mi mthun pa ha cang grang ba 'am/_ha cang dro ba 'am zhes bya ba nas chags ches pa'am/_sgyel ba'am/_brgyab par gyur na rgyu de dag gis de'i lus la gnod 
[\[146b.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/lus la gnod na de la brten pa mngal na gnas pa la yang gnod par 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de de nas log par 'gyur te/_de nas de shes pa'i bud med dam/_gzhon nu gso ba la mkhas pas chu 'jam tsam dang /_mar dkar 
[\[146b.4\]]dang /_'bru mar gyis lag pa byugs pas mnams shing cham du 'bebs par byed do/_/de der chu 'jam tsam dang /_mar dkar dang /_'bru mar gyis byugs pa'i lag pas cham du 'bebs pa na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 
[\[146b.5\]]'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo dper na rigs kyi bu shin tu gzhon nu'i rang bzhin can gyi lus la spu gri rnon po/_spu breg tu rung bas yan lag dang nying lag thams cad bcad cing /_lus rtsi drag pos kun nas bskus na lus la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag 
[\[146b.6\]]pa/_rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo de bzhin du mngal na gnas pa de la chu 'jam tsam dang /_mar dkar dang /_'bru mar gyis bskus pa'i lag pas mnams na lus la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub 
[\[146b.7\]]pa/_mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mngal gyi gnas na gnas pa de'i lus la sdug bsngal gyi reg pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po drag pa/_rtsub pa mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba de dag byung na dbang po rtul ba'i phyir dran pa 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]nyams par 'gyur zhing sems nye bar nyams par 'gyur te/_de ltar na de shes bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug cing shes bzhin ma yin par ma'i mngal na gnas pa yin/_shes bzhin ma yin par ma'i mngal nas 'byung ba yin no/_/dga' bo de ltar ma'i 
[\[147a.2\]]mngal du 'jug pa yang sdug bsngal ba/_ma'i mngal na gnas pa yang sdug bsngal ba/_ma'i mngal nas 'byung ba yang sdug bsngal ba yin na/_dga' bo de la 'khor ba na srid pa mngon par 'dod pa ma'i mngal gyi gnas na gnas pa la mnog ci zhig yod/_ji ltar na 
[\[147a.3\]]'di shes bzhin ma yin par ma'i mngal du 'jug_/shes bzhin ma yin par ma'i mngal na gnas/_shes bzhin ma yin par ma'i mngal nas 'byung zhe na/_'di na la la rang bzhin kho nas tshul khrims 'chal pa yin zhing mi dge ba'i chos can/_mi dge ba la 'dun pa/_
[\[147a.4\]]mi dge ba kun tu spyod pa/_sdom pa ma yin pa mang ba/_so sor rtog pa med pa mang ba/_bag med par gnas pa/_yo byad kun tu 'dzin pa/_ser sna can/_'jungs pa/_brnab sems can/_gnod sems can/_log par lta ba/_'gyod pa can yin la/_
[\[147a.5\]]'chi ba'i dus byed na mi dge ba'i chos de dag gis nye bar brtan pa de 'chi ka'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag pa/_rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba/_srog 'phrog par byed pa de dag gis reg na/_dran pa nyams par 'gyur zhing sems nye bar nyams par 'gyur 
[\[147a.6\]]te/_de na sdug bsngal du ro gcig pa'i rnam par shes pa can 'di gang yin/_'di ji lta bu yin/_bdag gang yin/_gang nas shi 'phos gang nas 'ongs/_gang du skye zhes bya ba mi shes te/_de ltar na 'di shes bzhin ma yin par ma'i mngal du 'jug_/shes bzhin 
[\[147a.7\]]ma yin par ma'i mngal na gnas/_shes bzhin ma yin par ma'i mngal nas 'byung ba yin no/_/dga' bo de ltar na ma'i mngal du 'jug pa yang sdug bsngal ba/_ma'i mngal na gnas pa yang sdug bsngal ba/_ma'i mngal nas 'byung ba yang sdug bsngal ba yin na 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]dga' bo de la 'khor ba na yang srid pa la mngon par dga' ba de ltar sdug bsngal du mas nyen pa la mnog ci zhig yod/_dga' bo skye ba de ni de ltar sdug bsngal du mas gtses par gyur pa yin yang mi nyid ni bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du yang rnyed par dka'o/_/dga' bo lha 
[\[147b.2\]]dag 'chi 'pho ba na lha gzhan dag kye bde 'gro'i 'jig rten du song la rab tu brtan par so sor gnos shig ces skul bar byed do/_/dga' bo lha rnams kyi bde 'gro'i 'jig rten gang zhe na/_mir skye ba yin te/_de ltar shin tu rnyed par dka'o/_/de lta bas na dal ba phun 
[\[147b.3\]]sum tshogs pa shin tu rnyed par dka'o/_/sems can dmyal ba rnams ni gcig tu sdug bsngal ba dang /_gcig tu drag pa dang /_gcig tu rtsub pa dang /_gcig tu mi bzad pa dang /_gcig tu yid du mi 'ong ba ste/_dga' bo de ni sdug bsngal gyi dpe yang 
[\[147b.4\]]bya bar mi nus so/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams ni gnod sems can/_sems nyon mongs pa can/_sems 'jam pa ma yin pa/_g.yo dang sgyu yod pa/_rtsub pa/_'tshe ba/_lag pa khrag gis gsher ba/_yid du mi 'ong ba/_sgrib pa can/_gcer bu/_gzugs 
[\[147b.5\]]mi sdug pa/_'jigs su rung ba/_bkres pa dang /_skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa yin no/_/lha rnams ni 'chi 'pho ba dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'gyur ba dang /_sdug pa dang 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_mya ngan gyi chos can rtag tu 'jigs 
[\[147b.6\]]pa yin no/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can ni mtha' med na dga' bo de na don spyod pa ma yin/_bsod nams spyod pa ma yin/_chos spyod pa ma yin/_dge ba spyod pa ma yin/_dge legs spyod pa ma yin gyi/_gcig la 
[\[147b.7\]]gcig za bar byed pa ste/_sems can de dag ni ji ltar mthu chung ba za bar byed pa'o/_/dga' bo dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes pa'i sems can dag la gang dag mun par skyes shing mun par rgas/_mun par 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/de dag kyang 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbur ba dang /_phye ma leb dang /_sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_zas su til gyi phub ma za ba dang /_srin bu t+r+yai ma bu ka dang /_srin bu trai la ta dang /_gzhan yang sems can mun par skyes shing mun par rgas/_mun par 'chi 
[\[148a.2\]]ba'i dus byed pa gang dag yin pa'o/_/de la byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa/_sngon ro la lhag par chags pa/_lus kyis nyes par spyod pa spyad cing ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa spyad nas sems can de lta bu rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/_
[\[148a.3\]]sems can de dag ni mun par skyes shing mun par rgas mun par 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes pa'i sems can dag la gang dag lus las skye zhing lus la rgas/_lus la 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/de dag kyang gang 
[\[148a.4\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sro ma dang /_shig dang srin bu g.yon can dang /_'bu dang /_gzhan yang sems can lus las skyes shing lus la rgas/_lus la 'chi ba'i dus byed pa gang dag yin pa'o/_/de la byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa sngon ro'i rjes 
[\[148a.5\]]su chags pa/_lus kyis nyes par spyod pa spyad cing ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa spyad nas sems can de lta bu dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/_sems can de dag ni lus las skye zhing lus la rgas/_lus la 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[148a.6\]]dga' bo dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes pa'i sems can dag la gang dag chur skyes shing chur rgas/_chur 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nya dang ru sbal dang /_sbal pa dang /_chu srin byis pa gsod dang /_srog 
[\[148a.7\]]chags pa lu ka dang /_gzhan yang sems can chur skyes shing chur rgas/_chur 'chi ba'i dus byed pa gang dag yin pa'o/_/de la byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa sngon ro'i rjes su chags pa/_lus kyis nyes par spyod pa spyad cing ngag dang yid kyis 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]nyes par spyod pa spyad nas sems can de lta bu rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/_sems can de dag ni chur skyes shing chur rgas/_chur 'chi ba'i dus byed do/_/dga' bo dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes pa'i sems can dag la gang dag bshang ba dang gci ba'i 
[\[148b.2\]]dri tshor nas 'di bza'o 'di btung ngo snyam zhing der rgyug_/kun tu rgyug pa dag kyang yod do/_/de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ra dang lug dang /_bya gag dang /_phag dang /_khyi dang /_wa dang /_bya rog dang /_chun lag dang /_sbrang bu dang /_gzhan 
[\[148b.3\]]yang sems can bshang ba dang /_gci ba'i dri tshor nas 'di bza'o 'di btung ngo snyam zhing der rgyug_/kun tu rgyug pa gang dag yin pa'o/_/de la byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa/_sngon dri'i rjes su chags pa/_lus kyis nyes par spyod pa spyad cing 
[\[148b.4\]]ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa spyad nas sems can de de lta bu rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/_sems can de dag ni bshang ba dang gci ba'i dri tshor nas 'di bza'o 'di btung ngo snyam zhing rgyug_/kun tu rgyug par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo dud 
[\[148b.5\]]'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes pa'i sems can dag la gang dag rtswa skam po dang /_gsher ba lce'i rtse mos bsdus nas so'i skam pas bcad de za ba dag kyang yod do/_/de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_ba lang dang /_
[\[148b.6\]]bong bu dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_ma he dang /_phag rgod dang /_gzhan yang sems can rtswa skam po dang /_gsher ba lce'i rtse mos bsdus nas so'i skam pas bcad de za ba gang dag yin pa'o/_/dga' bo 'khor ba ni bzang rlag pa shin tu bzang rlag pa ste/_'di thams 
[\[148b.7\]]cad ni 'bar/_kun tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa yin no/_/dga' bo gzhan yang thams cad ni mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dang /_gzugs rnams dang /_sgra dang dri dang /_ro dang /_
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]reg bya dang /_chos rnams so/_/dga' bo de thams cad gang gis kun tu 'bar/_rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa yin zhe na/_'dod chags kyi me dang /_zhe sdang gi me dang /_gti mug gi mes kyang kun tu 
[\[149a.2\]]'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa yin/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams kyis kyang kun tu 'bar sdug 
[\[149a.3\]]bsngal gyis kyang kun tu 'bar ro zhes bshad do/_/dga' bo le lo can sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa/_yang srid pa pa/_rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba can/_tshe phyi ma la skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi bar 'gyur ba dag dang /_
[\[149a.4\]]'dres pa can ni sdug bsngal bar gnas so/_/dga' bo brtson 'grus brtsams pa/_mthu dang ldan pa/_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/_spro ba can/_pha rol gnon pa brtan pa/_nem nur med pa/_dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson pa ma btang ba ni bde bar 
[\[149a.5\]]gnas so/_/dga' bo de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_pags pa dang /_chu rgyus dang /_rus pa tsam lus kyang rung /_lus las sha dang khrag dag skams kyang bla 'on kyang kye ma brtson 'grus brtsams pa mthu dang ldan pa/_brtson 'grus dang ldan 
[\[149a.6\]]pa/_spro ba can/_pha rol gnon pa/_brtan pa/_nem nur med pa/_dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson pa ma btang bas thob par bya ba gang yin pa de ma thob par bar skabs su brtson 'grus dor bar mi bya'o zhes dga' bo khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/dga' 
[\[149a.7\]]bo nga ni 'jig rten dang lhan cig rtsod par mi byed de/_'jig rten nyid nga dang lhan cig rtsod par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos smra ba ni su yang 'ga' dang yang lhan cig rtsod par mi byed de/_nga'o zhes rtsod par mi byed/_lta ba rtog pa'i bzod pas ma yin/_
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]skal ba yod pa'i gzugs kyis ma yin gyi/_nga ni bdag gis ji tsam mthong ba dang /_rig pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_mngon sum du byas pa de kho na smra'o/_/dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan du 
[\[149b.2\]]'gyur ba'i tshig gang yin pa de gsung ngam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/dga' bo legs so legs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan du 'gyur ba'i tshig gang yin pa de gsung ba ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag pa 
[\[149b.3\]]gsung ba/_bden pa gsung ba/_chos gsung ba/_de kho na nyid gsung ba/_phyin ci ma log par gsung ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni yun ring po nas 'jig rten la phan pa bzhed pa/_bde ba bzhed pa/_grub pa dang bde ba bzhed pa/_lam mkhyen pa/_lam 
[\[149b.4\]]grub pa/_lam ston pa/_lam brjod pa/_lam yongs su 'dren pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i 
[\[149b.5\]]kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so/_/dga' bo 'jig rten ni dad pa med pa/_dbang pos 'khol ba/_'phral gang du lta ba/_lag tu 'ongs pa mthong ba/_'god pa che ba/_bsags pa nyung 
[\[149b.6\]]ba ste/_sla ba mi byed kyi dka' bas bdag nyid kun tu rtsol bar byed do/_/dga' bo lung yang mi dgos/_shes rab kyang mi dgos/_khyod kyis sha'i mig gis ji tsam mthong ba de kho na la yang dag par rtogs shig dang /_ji ltar mthong ba la yang dag par brtags 
[\[149b.7\]]pa nyid kyis thar par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo khyod nga la dad pas ma 'gro/_dga' bas ma 'gro/_rjes su thos pas ma 'gro/_rnam pa la rtog pas ma 'gro/_dge sbyong du lta bas ma 'gro/_dge sbyong gi lta ba rtog pa bzod pas ma 'gro/_dge sbyong la gus pas 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]ma 'gro/_bdag gi bla ma dge sbyong gau ta ma'o zhes ma 'gro shig_/dga' bo 'on kyang gcig pu lkog tu song la ngas chos gang dag nyid kyi mngon par mkhyen pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag soms shig_/gzhol cig_/nye bar rtogs shig_
[\[150a.2\]]lan mang du gyis shig dang /_chos gang dang gang mngon sum du byas pa'i chos de dang de rdzogs par byas na bdag nyid gling dang /_bdag nyid skyabs can dang /_chos gling dang /_chos skyabs can dang /_gzhan ma yin pa gling dang /_gzhan ma yin pa skyabs can 
[\[150a.3\]]du gnas so/_/dga' bo ji ltar na dge slong bdag nyid gling dang /_bdag nyid skyabs can dang /_chos gling dang /_chos skyabs can dang /_gzhan ma yin pa gling dang /_gzhan ma yin pa skyabs can du gnas she na/_dga' bo 'di na dge slong rtun pa dang ldan pa/_
[\[150a.4\]]dran pa dang shes bzhin can/_'jig rten la brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par spangs nas nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas/_phyi'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas/_phyi dang nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas/_lus la kun 
[\[150a.5\]]'byung ba'i chos su rjes su lta zhing gnas/_lus la kun 'byung ba la zad pa'i chos su lta zhing gnas/_lus yod do zhes de'i dran pa 'di lta ste/_shes pa tsam dang /_mthong ba tsam dang /_so sor dran pa tsam du legs par gnas shing mi rten par gnas la/_'jig 
[\[150a.6\]]rten na [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang len par mi byed do/_/dga' bo de bzhin du dge slong rtun pa dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang shes bzhin can/_'jig rten la brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par spangs nas/_nang gi lus la yang lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas/_phyi dang nang gi 
[\[150a.7\]]lus la yang lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas/_nang gi tshor ba dag dang /_phyi'i tshor ba dag dang /_phyi dang nang gi tshor ba dag la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas/_nang gi sems dang /_phyi'i sems dang /_phyi dang nang gi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas/_
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]nang gi chos rnams dang /_phyi'i chos rnams dang /_phyi dang nang gi chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas/_chos rnams la kun 'byung ba'i chos su rjes su lta zhing gnas/_chos rnams la kun 'byung ba la zad par rjes su lta zhing gnas/_chos rnams yod 
[\[150b.2\]]do zhes de'i dran pa 'di lta ste/_shes pa tsam dang /_mthong ba tsam dang /_so sor dran pa tsam du legs par gnas shing mi rten par gnas la/_'jig rten na cung zad kyang nye bar len par mi byed de/_dga' bo de ltar na dge slong bdag nyid gling dang /_bdag nyid 
[\[150b.3\]]skyabs can dang /_chos gling dang /_chos skyabs can dang /_gzhan ma yin pa gling dang /_gzhan ma yin pa skyabs can du gnas pa yin no/_/dga' bo tshur skyes bu g.yo med pa/_sgyu med pa/_drang po/_brtan pa'i rang bzhin can de ni ngas nang btams na/_nub 
[\[150b.4\]]kun shes pa lung ston par 'gyur/_nub btams na nang kun shes pa lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo nga'i chos ni legs par gsungs pa/_yang dag par mthong ba/_nad med pa/_dus chad pa med pa/_nye bar gtod pa/_'di mthong ba la don yod pa/_
[\[150b.5\]]mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya ba yin no/_/gsung rab 'di ni 'di lta ste/_ston pa yang mngon sum du gyur/_dam pa'i chos nye bar gtod pa/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba/_rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro ba/_bde bar gshegs pas thugs 
[\[150b.6\]]su chud pa yang ston pas snying po btung bar bya ba yin no/_/dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis rang gi don dang /_gzhan gyi don dang /_gnyi ga'i don la lta zhing so sor yang dag par bslab par bya ste/_ci nas kyang bdag rab tu byung nas don yod pa dang /_'bras bu dang bcas pa dang /_rnam 
[\[150b.7\]]par smin pa bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag gi chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_na ba'i rkyen gyi yo byad sman dag yongs su spyad pa/_de dag gi bya ba byas pa de dag kyang ci nas kyang shin tu 'bras bu che ba dang /_shin tu phan yon che ba dang /_
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]shin tu gzi brjid che ba dang /_rgya chen por 'gyur ba de ltar dga' bo khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/_/gang la dga' ba dang /_gang la mngon par dga' ba'i gzugs de la rnam par 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan du 'gyur ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa 
[\[151a.2\]]dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i gzugs ni ngas gcig kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs rtag gam mi rtag_/btsun pa mi rtag lags so/_/
[\[151a.3\]]mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba yin nam sdug bsngal ba ma yin/_btsun pa de ni sdug bsngal ba lags te/_gang mi rtag pa ni sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i chos can lags so/_/de ji ga 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag 
[\[151a.4\]]gi'o/_/'di ni bdag go/_/de ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag gir khas len tam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag gam mi rtag_/btsun pa mi 
[\[151a.5\]]rtag lags so/_/mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba yin nam/_sdug bsngal ba ma yin/_btsun pa de ni sdug bsngal ba lags te/_gang mi rtag pa ni sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i chos can lags so/_/de ji ga 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 
[\[151a.6\]]'di ni bdag gi'o/_/'di ni bdag go/_'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len tam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung /_'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa'am/_da ltar byung ba'am/_nang 
[\[151a.7\]]gi'am/_phyi'i'am/_rags pa'am/_phra ba'am/_ngan pa'am/_gya nom pa'am/_thag ring ba gang yin pa'am/_nye ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad la/_'di ni bdag gi ma yin/_'di ni bdag ma yin/_'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no/_/zhes de 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]de ltar yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya zhing /_tshor ba gang yin pa ci yang rung ba dang /_'du shes gang yin pa ci yang rung ba dang /_'du byed gang yin pa ci yang rung ba dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa ci yang rung /_'das pa'am/_
[\[151b.2\]]ma 'ongs pa'am/_da ltar byung ba'am/_nang gi'am/_phyi'i 'am/_rags pa'am/_phra ba'am/_ngan pa'am/_gya nom pa'am/_thag ring ba gang yin pa'am/_nye ba gang yin pa de thams cad la 'di ni bdag gi ma yin/_'di ni bdag ma yin/_de ni 
[\[151b.3\]]bdag gi bdag ma yin no/_/zhes de de ltar yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa de ltar lta ba na gzugs las kyang yid 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[151b.4\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa las kyang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yid byung na 'dod chags dang 'bral lo/_/'dod chags dang bral na rnam par grol lo/_/rnam par grol na bdag gi zag pa zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/'di las 
[\[151b.5\]]srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes rnam par grol lo snyam pa'i ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa 
[\[151b.6\]]dag las sems rnam par grol lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/dga' bo mnyam gzhag min sems la/_phung po thams cad zad pa dang /_/
[\[151b.7\]]ye shes dag pa skye mi 'gyur/_/de ltas brtson pa lhur blang bya/_/phung po skye zhing 'jig pa dag_/yang dang yang du so sor brtag_/dag pa yang dag skyes pa la/_/lha rnams thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/_/sdug dang grogs dang 'grogs pa dang /_/
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]ldang zhing rim gro byed pa dang /_/rnyed dang bkur sti tshigs su bcad/_/gang de dga' bo yongs spang gyis/_/khyim gnas de bzhin khyim pa min/_/gnyi ga dang ni mi 'dre na/_/sdug bsngal gyi ni mthar byed khyod/_/de lta na ni mthar phyin 'gyur/_/dang po 
[\[152a.2\]]nur nur por 'gyur te/_/de nas mer mer por 'gyur ro/_/mer mer po las nar nar 'gyur/_/nar nar po las gor gor 'gyur/_/gor gor po las yan lag ni/_/bzhi dang mgo yang skye 'gyur zhing /_/las kyi rgyu las byung ba yi/_/rus tshigs sna 
[\[152a.3\]]tshogs skye bar 'gyur/_/mgo yi thod pa'i dgu dang ni/_/'gram pa yi ni rus pa gnyis/_/so ni sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang /_/so yi rtsa ba sum bcu gnyis/_/mgrin pa dang ni rna ba'i drung /_/sna dang dkan ni gong ma dang /_/snying ga lkog ma med pa yi/_/
[\[152a.4\]]rus pa dag ni nyi shur 'gyur/_/mig gi rus pa bzhi dang ni/_/thal gong gi yang rus pa bzhi/_/dpung pa g.yas dang g.yon dag gi/_/rus pa dag ni lnga bcu yod/_/brang gi rus pa brgyad yin te/_/de la sgal tshigs sum bcu gnyis/_/rgyab kyi 
[\[152a.5\]]rtsib ma'i rus pa ni/_/rus pa dag ni sum bcu'o/_/ngos gnyis rtsib logs g.yas pa na/_/rtsib rus bcu gsum ldan pa ste/_/de bzhin rtsib logs g.yon pa na/_/gzhan yang bcu dang gsum yod do/_/de dag nyi shu rtsa drug ste/_/tshigs gsum pa ni gsum 
[\[152a.6\]]gsum dang /_/tshigs gnyis pa ni gnyis dang ldan/_/lhag ma rnams ni tshigs med do/_/brla ni g.yas dang g.yon dag la/_/rus pa dag ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yod/_/lus 'di dag la rus pa ni/_/brgya dang lnga dang gsum yod par/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab 
[\[152a.7\]]mkhyen pa/_/bden pa'i mtshan gyis bka' stsal to/_/'og tu rkang pa'i mthil nas ni/_/gong du klad pa'i bar gyi lus/_/gang dag gis ni nyer brten pa/_/'dam bu'i khyim bzhin nyam chung ngo /_/gzer gyi gzungs kyis ma zin pa/_/sha dang khrag gis 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]g.yogs pa ste/_/sgyu ma mkhan gyi srad bu yis/_/shing gi 'khrul 'khor sbrel ba ltar/_/de bzhin du ni lus 'di yang /_/chu rgyus dag gis breng gis sbrel/_/pags pa rlon pas so sor g.yogs/_/sgo dgu'i rma ni chen por ldan/_/mi gtsang rul pa'i dri mnam 
[\[152b.2\]]pa/_/kun nas rab tu 'dzag par 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'bru ni sna tshogs kyis/_/spyad ni bkang bar gyur pa ltar/_/de bzhin du ni lus 'di yang /_/sna tshogs rul pa'i 'byung gnas yin/_/rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'di 'dra ba'i/_/lus ni rul pa snying po med/_/
[\[152b.3\]]'di la byis pa bag med de/_/chags su med par shes par gyis/_/rngul dang mchil ma snabs dag dang /_/bad kan rnag dang khrag rnams dang /_/mchin pa mkhris pa zhag dang ni/_/zag pa klad pa klad rgyas dang /_/snying dang sul [{]mangs [,]mang [}]mkhal ma dang /_/mi gtsang 
[\[152b.4\]]glo ba lgang pa dang /_/tshil dang spu dang mcher pa dang /_/rgyu ma dang ni gnye ma ste/_/'di ni rul pa sna tshogs pa/_/'di 'dra ba yi 'byung khung yin/_/sdig lus 'jigs pa chen po ste/_/dgra dang 'dra bar shes par bya/_/grong khyer rnying pa ci bzhin du/_/rul pa'i 
[\[152b.5\]]lus ni nyam chung ngo /_/'dus byas nyin dang mtshan du yang /_/rnam par 'jig cing rab tu 'jig_/grong khyer rus pa'i rtsig pa can/_/sha dang khrag gis zhal zhal byugs/_/de la 'dod chags zhe sdang dang /_/gti mug dang ni 'chab pa skye/_/grong khyer 
[\[152b.6\]]rtsig pa'i rus pa can/_/sha dang khrag gis byugs pa dag_/phyi dang nang bcas rtag tu yang /_/mi mdza' ba yis mngon par gtses/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /_dge slong lnga brgya pa de dag yi rangs 
[\[152b.7\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo mngal du 'jug pa'i mdos btams nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las 'das 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]pa la bzhag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i dge slong dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong dga' bo 'di yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dgra 
[\[153a.2\]]bcom pa nyid thob ste rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba myong bas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bsro gang gi ni khrus dag dang /_/zas dang snum bsku byug pa dang /_/gdugs kyis dgab pa byas pa yi/_/bde ba mang po nyams su myong /_/dge 
[\[153a.3\]]slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di'i lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur grub cing skyes bu chen 
[\[153a.4\]]po'i mtshan sum bcus ni brgyan/_bcom ldan 'das pas ni sor bzhis thung la/_'dod pa dag la lhag par chags pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis nan gyis phral nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te/_shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las 
[\[153a.5\]]'das pa la bzhag lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dga' bo nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa/_tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_dba' rgal bzhin nye bar gnas pa/_nges par gyur pa yin te/_dga' bo nyid kyis 
[\[153a.6\]]las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la ma yin/_me'i khams la ma yin/_rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/_'on kyang las 
[\[153a.7\]]dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang /_/las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/lus can rnams la 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]'bras bur smin/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams 
[\[153b.2\]]kyi ston pa rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba mi'i 'jig rten du byung ste/_de 'khor dge slong 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa gnyis dang ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du byon nas gnyen ldan gyi tshal na bzhugs so/_/de'i g.yas khyim gyi gcung 'dod pa dag 
[\[153b.3\]]la shin tu chags par gyur pa las yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis nan gyis phral nas 'khor ba'i btson ra las bsgral te shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag go/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rgyal 
[\[153b.4\]]po gnyen ldan zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_rgyal srid 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba/_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'khrug pa dang /_'khrug long zhi ba chom rkun dang /_nad dang 
[\[153b.5\]]bral ba/_sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa/_chos kyi rgyal po chos dang mthun pas chos bzhin du byed du 'jug go/_/de'i g.yas khyim gyi nu bo ni 'dod pa rnams la shin tu chags par gyur to/_/rgyal po gnyen ldan gyis 
[\[153b.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs 'khor dge slong 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa gnyis dang 'dir byon nas 'di nyid na gnyen ldan gyi tshal na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_grong 
[\[153b.7\]]khyer gyi mi dang bcas te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ga la ba der song ngo /_/de la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gang zhig thos nas rgyal po gnyen ldan btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]po dang /_grong khyer gyi mi dang bcas te/_khyad par chen po thob pa de lta bu'i chos bstan to/_/de'i g.yas khyim gyi nu bo ni 'dod pa la lhag par chags pa dang ldan pas khyim nas ma byung ba dang /_de la blon po'i bu dang /_mdun na 'don gyi bu dang /_
[\[154a.2\]]gzhan yang chung po grogs rnams kyis dong ste smras pa/_grogs po rgyal po ni btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_grong mi dang bcas te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs blta ba'i phyir gshegs na/_khyod lta bu mi nyid 
[\[154a.3\]]rnyed dka' zhing shin tu rnyed dka' ba thob nas 'dod pa rnams la shin tu chags nas khyim nas ma byung ngo /_/de de dag gis btams pa dang /_snying la ngo tsha bar gyur nas de dag 'grogs te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ga la ba der song ngo /_/ji 
[\[154a.4\]]tsam na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi gcung gis de rnams kyis bzhin btab nas khrid pa mthong ste/_des dris pa/_ci'i phyir 'di de ltar bzhin btab nas khrid/_de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa de la rgyas par bsnyad pa dang /_des smras pa/_shes 
[\[154a.5\]]ldan dag nga yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi gcung yin te/_de kho na bzhin du 'dod pa rnams la lhag par chags par gyur pa las/_nga bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis nan gyis 
[\[154a.6\]]phral nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te shin tu mthar phyin pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag go/_/de lta bas na skyes bu gti mug kha cig ni de ltar bya dgos pas khyed kyis 'di khrid de 'ongs pa gang yin pa ni legs pa byas kyis/_deng la bcom 
[\[154a.7\]]ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar khrid cig dang /_'di gdon mi za bar bcom ldan 'das la dad pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/ji tsam na de dag gis de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi spyan sngar khrid pa dang /_de la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]rnam par gzigs kyis de lta bu'i chos bshad do/_/des de thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la dad pa rnyed pa dang ldan te/_stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs 
[\[154b.2\]]ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas te bdag gi sdum par khrus khang gi khrus mdzad par ci gnang /_bcom ldan 
[\[154b.3\]]'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bshad pa la mngon par dga' ste/_rjes su yi rangs nas 
[\[154b.4\]]zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_stan las langs nas song ste rgyal po gnyen ldan ga la ba der song ngo /_/song nas rgyal po gnyen ldan gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te rgyal po gnyen ldan la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[154b.5\]]rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas te bdag gi sdum par khrus khang gi khrus mdzad par spyan drang ba las des cang mi gsung bas gnang ste/_de ni bkur sti bgyi bar 'os pa lags pas lha de'i slad du de grong khyer du gshegs pa'i grong khyer du mdzes 
[\[154b.6\]]par bgyi ba dang /_shul mdzes par bgyi ba'i rigs so/_/rgyal po gnyen ldan gyis bsams pa/_gal te de lta na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa'i grong khyer mdzes pa dang /_lam mdzes par bya na/_ci bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul dka' 
[\[154b.7\]]ba gang yin pa 'di yang btul ba lta snyam du rig nas smras pa/_nu bo legs pa byas kyis khyod song la rdzas dag sta gon gyis shig_/ngas ni grong khyer mdzes pa dang /_lam mdzes pa bya'o/_/de dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba skyes nas rgyal po gnyen ldan gyi rkang 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/rgyal po gnyen ldan gyis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag de nga la grong khyer du dril sgrogs te/_sang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs grong khyer du 
[\[155a.2\]]gshegs kyis/_de'i phyir khyed grong khyer na gnas pa dang /_yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis grong khyer mdzes pa dang /_lam mdzes par gyis la rang gi 'byor pa dang mthun pa'i mdzes pas bsu shig_/lha de ltar 'tshal lo zhes blon po rnams 
[\[155a.3\]]kyis rgyal po gnyen ldan gyi ltar mnyan nas dril bsgrags te/_'di skad du shes ldan grong khyer na gnas pa dag dang /_grong mi dang /_yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag nyon cig_/lha'i zhal nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[155a.4\]]rgyas rnam par gzigs grong khyer du gshegs kyis de'i phyir khyed grong khyer na gnas pa dang /_yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis grong khyer mdzes pa dang /_lam mdzes par gyis la thams cad kyis rang gi 'byor pa dang mthun pa'i mdzes 
[\[155a.5\]]pas bsu shig ces de skad bka' stsal to/_/de dag gis grong khyer de yang rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo ni med par byas/_tsan dan gyi chus ni chag chag btab bdug pa dri zhim po can gyi pog phor ni bzhag_/dar gyi lda ldi mang po ni bres/_rgyal mtshan dang ba 
[\[155a.6\]]dan ni bsgreng /_me tog sna tshogs ni bkram ste lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal bzhin du dga' dga' ltar byas/_lam yang de bas kyang lhag par mdzes par byas te/_der yang dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i chu dron dang /_'bru mar yang sta gon byas/_khrus 
[\[155a.7\]]khang yang byi dor byas/_gdan yang bshams nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs grong khyer du gshegs pa bsu'o/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs rgyal po gnyen ldan btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]dang /_blon po dang /_grong mi dang /_gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs phal po che dang bcas pas zhabs ring byas te 'byor pa mchog gis rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du gshegs so/_/de nas rgyal po'i nu bo de dad pa skyes nas khrus khang gi nang du gshegs su gsol to/_/
[\[155b.2\]]nang du gshegs nas khrus mdzad par brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi sku gser gyi mdog lta bu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang yang dad pa skyes te/_khrus byas nas 
[\[155b.3\]]zhabs la gtugs te smon lam btab pa/_gang bdag gis yon gnas yang dag pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag kyang bdag nyid chen po 'di'i ji lta bar lus gser gyi mdog lta bu dang /_'dis gcung po 'dod pa rnams la shin tu chags pa 
[\[155b.4\]]las nan gyis phral te rab tu phyung nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang /_bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pas ji lta bar bdag kyang ston pa 'di lta bu'i gcung du gyur cing gal te bdag de bzhin du 'dod pa rnams la lhag par 
[\[155b.5\]]chags par gyur na yang /_bdag bcom ldan 'das des nan gyis phral te rab tu phyung nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jog par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_
[\[155b.6\]]rgyal po gnyen ldan gyi nu bo gang yin pa de ni rigs kyi bu dga' bo 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la khrus khang gi khrus kyis khrus byas nas/_smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin 
[\[155b.7\]]pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gcung du gyur cing /_'di'i lus kyang gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur la/_ngas kyang nan gyis phral te rab tu phyung nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa yin no/_/
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu mngon par 
[\[156a.2\]]grub lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa/_tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_dba' rgal bzhin nye bar gnas par gyur pa yin te/_'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag 
[\[156a.3\]]gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la ma yin/_me'i khams la ma yin/_/rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/_'on kyang dge ba dang mi dge 
[\[156a.4\]]ba'i las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang /_/las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/lus can rnams la 
[\[156a.5\]]'bras bur smin/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri brags shig na khyim bdag phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba zhig gnas te/_de la skyed mos tshal me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_rtsa ba sna tshogs dang /_chu phun sum tshogs pa/_shing rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 
[\[156a.6\]]brgyan pa rab tu byung ba'i skye bo dang mthun pa zhig yod do/_/sangs rgyas dag 'byung ba med pa na 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang phongs pa la snying brtse ba can/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 
[\[156a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing ri brags der phyin te/_de gnas tshol zhing phan tshun rgyu ba na/_skyed mos tshal der phyin pa dang /_skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mis byon pa legs so zhes bya ba'i kun tu spyod pas spyad nas bstir bcug go_/
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]de nub mo me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mis mthong nas rab tu byung ba 'di ni 'di lta bur bdag nyid chen po brtul zhugs grub pa'o zhes shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo langs te/_khyim bdag la smras pa/_rje 
[\[156b.2\]]rab tu dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/_khyod kyi skyed mos tshal du rab tu byung ba bdag nyid chen po brtul zhugs grub pa zhig dgongs btab ste/_des skyed mos tshal de thams cad mtshan mo snang bar bgyis so/_/des thos nas rab tu dga' ba skyes te/_rings pa 
[\[156b.3\]]rings par song ste rkang pa la gtugs nas smras pa/_'phags pa khyod ni bsod snyoms don du gnyer pa/_bdag ni bsod nams don du gnyer ba lags na skyed mos tshal 'di nyid du bzhugs su gsol/_bdag gis khyod kyi bsod snyoms sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[156b.4\]]des khas blangs nas de der bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba nyams su myong bar byed cing /_dus cung zad cig 'dug nas des bsams pa/_bdag gis lus rul pa 'dis thob par bya ba gang yin pa de 
[\[156b.5\]]ni thob zin gyi ma la bdag zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug go snyam du rig nas 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bab pa dang /_glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul dag byas te/_phung po'i lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su 
[\[156b.6\]]mya ngan las 'das so//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po bcu bzhi pa/_de nas khyim bdag des dri thams cad kyi bsreg shing dag bcer nas bsregs te/_bsreg shing de dag 'o mas bsad do/_/rus pa de rnams bum pa sar par bcug 
[\[156b.7\]]ste/_rus pa'i mchod rten byas nas gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag btsugs so/_/btsugs nas dad pa skyes te/_de nas gur gum gyis bskus nas dri'i lag ris sum bcu byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_khyim bdag gang 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]yin pa de ni rigs kyi bu dga' bo 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dis rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten byas nas gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan btsugs te/_dad pa skyes nas gur gum gyis byugs shing /_dri'i lag ris 
[\[157a.2\]]sum bcu byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu grub pa yin no/_/yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' 
[\[157a.3\]]bos las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas gal te rab tu byung bar ma gyur na 'dis stobs kyis 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid bgyis par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dga' bo 'di nyid kyis las byas shing 
[\[157a.4\]]bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_dba' rgal bzhin nye bar gnas pa nges par gyur pa yin te/_las byas shing bsags pa rnams gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi 
[\[157a.5\]]sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la ma yin/_me'i khams la ma yin/_rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/_'on kyang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las byas pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang /_skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin 
[\[157a.6\]]par 'gyur te/_bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang /_/las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa 
[\[157a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rten cing drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na bA rA Na sI na rgyal po kr-i kI zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_rgyal srid 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_
[\[157b.2\]]lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba zhes bya ba nas/_chos bzhin byed du 'jug go zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/rgyal po de la bu gsum ste/_rab dang /_'bring po dang /_tha [{]chungs so[,]chung ngo [}]/_/gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od 
[\[157b.3\]]srung sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe rgyal po kr-i kIs de'i sku la mchod pa byas nas rin po che bzhi las byas pa mchod rten khor 
[\[157b.4\]]yug tu dpag tshad gcig pa/_'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa zhig brtsigs so/_/de la gdugs 'dogs par byed pa ni rgyal po kr-i kI'i bu 'bring po dad pa skyes nas gdugs 'bring zhig btags so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_rgyal po kr-i kI'i bu 'bring po gang yin pa de ni rigs 
[\[157b.5\]]kyi bu dga' bo 'di nyid yin te/_'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la dad pa skyes nas gdugs 'bring btags pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas stobs kyis 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid nyis stong lnga brgya byas te/_gal te da 
[\[157b.6\]]ltar rab tu byung bar ma gyur na da ltar yang 'dis stobs kyis 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid byas par 'gyur ro/_/yang dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par 
[\[157b.7\]]smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang gis so/_/gang du smon lam btab lags/_dge slong dag 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung bar gyur te/_gang las 'di rab tu byung ba de bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/de na 'dis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang 
[\[158a.2\]]yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob po/_/de na 'dis 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar bdag gis yon gnas bla na med pa bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi 
[\[158a.3\]]tshogs 'ga' yang thob par ma gyur gyis/_bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya 
[\[158a.4\]]thub par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'i gsung rab la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed par 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bdag gi mkhan po dbang 
[\[158a.5\]]po'i sgo bsdams pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal po gtso bo des dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung ston par gyur cig ces byas te/_smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po'i 
[\[158a.6\]]sgo bsdams pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams zhes bya ba nas brtsal par bya ste/_dge slong rnams kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/dge slong zhig 
[\[158a.7\]]na ste de sman pa'i drung du song nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag la nad 'di lta bu byung na sman ston cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa sman mas gtang ba mdzod cig dang khyod sos par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/
[\[158b\]]
