[\[158b.1\]]sman pas smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/des skabs de dge slong rnams la bsnyad do/_/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas 
[\[158b.2\]]na gnang gis dge slong nad pas sman pa'i lung gis sman mas gtang bar bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis gtsug lag khang lnga rtseg tu byed na dri gtsang khang ni bdun rtseg_/sgo khang steng gi bsil khang yang 
[\[158b.3\]]bdun rtseg tu bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis gtsug lag khang sum rtseg tu byed na dri gtsang khang ni lnga rtseg_/sgo khang steng gi bsil khang yang lnga rtseg tu bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis phyogs gang nas 'dzeg mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[158b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_them skas rnam pa gsum pa shing gi them skas dang sa'i them skas dang /_rdo'i them skas dag bya'o/_/dge slong dag steng du ni rdo'i bar du ni sa'i tha mar ni shing gi btsugs nas 'dzegs pa dang /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tha mar ni 
[\[158b.5\]]rdo'i/_bar du ni sa'i steng du ni shing gi gzugs par bya'o/_/phran tshegs kyi gzhi las sgo gnyis pa'o//_//bsdus pa'i sdom ni/_chos gos gdang dang nang dang bskrad/_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lan tshwa sbu bu dang /_/gdong phyis dang ni phyi ba dang /_/mkhar len 
[\[158b.6\]]stan dang spu gri'o/_/sdom ni/_chos gos tshad kyi shing dang ni/_/glegs bu dag dang rdul phyags dang /_/sa drud pa ni nyid dag dang /_/mchig ni mchig gur bcas pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas 
[\[158b.7\]]sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dras pa'i chos gos gsum dge slong dag gis bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis chos gos dra bar brtsams te/_de dag gis glegs bu dang /_glegs bu phyed dag mi 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]mnyam par byas so/_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis glegs bu dang glegs bu phyed dag mi mnyam par dra bar mi bya'i 'on kyang mnyam par dra'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag gis ji ltar mnyam par 'gyur ba 
[\[159a.2\]]mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_glegs bu dang glegs bu phyed dag gi tshad kyi shing bcad par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong 
[\[159a.3\]]dag gis chos gos kyi tshal bu dag mi mnyam par drubs pa dang /_de dag mi mdzes nas/_skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshal bu dag mnyam par drub par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[159a.4\]]'das kyis tshal bu mnyam par drub par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag ji ltar mnyam par bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshal bu'i tshad kyi shing bcad zhing des gzhal nas drub par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshal bu 
[\[159a.5\]]shing gis gzhol la drubs shig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis tshal bu tshad las 'das par byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshal bu tshad las 'das par mi bya'o/_/'on kyang tshal bu ni gsum ste/_chen po dang /_'bring dang /_
[\[159a.6\]]chung ngu'o/_/de la chen po ni sor bzhi 'am/_bya rog gi mtho gang ngo /_/chung ngu ni sor gnyis sam mthe bo'i lto gang ngo /_/'bring ni de dag gi bar ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na 
[\[159a.7\]]bzhugs so/_/dge slong dag sa rdul can la chos gos 'drub pa dang /_de dri ma can du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lci ba'i byug pas bskus la chos gos drub par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lci ba'i byug pas bskus la chos gos 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]drubs shig ces gsungs pa dang /_lci ba ma rnyed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyogs der chag chag btab cing phyags te drub par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun 
[\[159b.2\]]dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong dag gis khri'i rkang pa rnon por byas pa dang /_de dag gis sa bstar ba ma rung bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khri'i rkang pa rnon por mi bya'i 'on kyang zlum por gcad par bya'o/_/'on kyang ma rung par gyur 
[\[159b.3\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phub ma'i thum po la gzhag gam/_ras mas dkri bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 
[\[159b.4\]]'dug pa de dgos pa zhig gi phyir phyi rol du byung nas de de dang de dag tu 'khyam pa las nyi ma phyed kyi dus kyi tshe yongs su ngal nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du zhugs pa dang /_des de na stan bzang po bshams pa dang /_kha zas bsod par sbyar ba mthong ngo /_/des mthong nas mngon 
[\[159b.5\]]par dad de/_des chen po la 'os pa'i gos gyon pa de des gding ba'i phyir rgan pa'i mtha' logs su gos de phul lo/_/de dus gzhan zhig na dri ma can du gyur nas dge skos kyis gzhon pa'i mtha' logs su bting ngo /_/re zhig cig na bram ze de gtsug lag khang du zhugs 
[\[159b.6\]]pa dang /_des gos de rgan pa'i mtha' logs na mi snang nas de rim gyis lta zhing gzhon pa'i mtha' logs su song ba dang /_ji tsam na dri ma can du gyur nas gzhon pa'i mthar bting ba mthong ste/_des bsams pa/_gos 'di sar pa chen po la 'os pa yin na/_gang gis 
[\[159b.7\]]'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur pa 'di la rgyu gang yin re zhig blta'o snyam nas cung zhig bsdad pa dang /_ji tsam na dge skos kyis gdan rim bzhin bshams nas phyag dar bya bar brtsams pa dang /_des bsams pa/_gang gis gos 'di dri ma can du gyur pa 'di la 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]rgyu ni 'di yin no snyam du rig nas/_dge skos la smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyis ji ltar sa la chag chag btab ste phyags nas rim bzhin gding bar bya ba 'di tsam yang mi mkhyen tam/_de bas kyang khyod kyis bdag gi gos dri ma can du byas so/_/skabs 
[\[160a.2\]]de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sa la chag chag btab ste phyags nas rim bzhin gding bar bya'o/_/dge skos kyis rdul gyis gang ba'i stan la mal stan dag bting ba dang /_nyes dmigs 
[\[160a.3\]]de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stan rnams sprugs la mal stan dag gding bar bya'o/_/ci yis sprug pa dge skos kyis mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de las gos gcig gis sprug par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_des 
[\[160a.4\]]bzang pos sprugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngan pas sprug par bya'o/_/dge skos kyis ngan pas sprugs pa dang /_gang gi tshe de rnyings shing zhigs nas bcos su mi rung ba de'i tshe bor ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de 
[\[160a.5\]]nyid tshal bu dang shar bu dag tu gyis la shing la bcings te sprug par bya'o/_/de shin tu spyad par mi rung ste bor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shin tu spyad par mi rung yang ma dor bar lci ba'am/_'jim pa dang bsres la ka ba'i ser ga 'am/_rtsig 
[\[160a.6\]]pa'i bu ga dag tu skus shig dang /_sbyin bdag gi bsod nams yun ring du 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas dus de'i tshe dge slong gzhon nu 
[\[160a.7\]]zhig phyogs shig na 'chag pa dang /_de 'chag pa'i sa phyogs de rkang pas drud pas zad do/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag cig de dang de dag tu 'khyam zhing phyogs der 'ongs pa dang /_des bsams pa/_re zhig yang gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur na 'phags pa 'di'i 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]rkang pa ci 'dra ba zhig tu gyur snyam nas smras pa/_'phags pas 'di ci zhig gis 'di ltar yongs su zad/_des smras pa/_khyim bdag bdag 'chag 'chag pas so/_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa re zhig yang gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur na/_khyod 
[\[160b.2\]]kyi zhabs ci 'dra bar gyur/_re zhig khyod kyi zhabs blta'o/_/des de la rkang pa bstan pa dang /_des mthong ste snying rje skyes nas/_des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis sa 'di la par tang dag gding bar bgyis/_bde bar tshogs shig ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_
[\[160b.3\]]khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/skabs de des dge slong dag la bsnyad do/_/dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[160b.4\]]stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong brtson 'grus brtsam pa'i 'chag sar par tang bting bar bya'o/_/khyim bdag des bting ba dang /_dge slong de de la phyogs gcig tu 'chag par brtsams pas ji tsam na de dum bu gnyis su gyur nas/_de'i dum bu 
[\[160b.5\]]gcig ni phyogs gcig na 'dug/_gnyis pa yang gzhan na 'dug go/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag de 'ongs nas par tang de'i dum bu gcig ni phyogs gcig na 'dug_/gnyis pa yang gzhan na 'dug pa mthong nas des smras pa/_'phags pa par tang de gnas 
[\[160b.6\]]skabs 'di lta bur gyur na/_e ma khyod kyis ral ba btsem na ci nongs/_skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag de zer ba bden te de lta bas na ral ba dang ral ba dag drub cing 
[\[160b.7\]]gzungs dang lhan bdag gdab par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe shin tu rnyings shing dengs te bcos dka' ba de'i tshe de lci ba'am/_'jim par bsres la de nyid du byugs shig dang /_sbyin bdag gi bsod nams yun ring du 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig na ste sman pa'i drung du song ste smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag la nad 'di lta bu byung na sman ston cig ces smras pa dang /_des 
[\[161a.2\]]smras pa/_'phags pa 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bu mdzod dang khyod sos par 'gyur ro/_/des sman btag pa'i mchig dgos nas de khyim bdag gcig gi drung du song ste/_mchig brnyas pa dang /_des de la mchig mchi gu dang bcas te byin no/_/des sman btags 
[\[161a.3\]]nas yang khyim bdag de nyid la slar byin pa dang /_des 'phags pa khyod nyid bzhes la bzhud cig_/des smras pa/_khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/des smras pa/_'phags pa gal te de lta na zhog la bzhud cig_/skabs de bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[161a.4\]]dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong gis mchig mchi gu dang bcas te bcang bar bya'o//_//sdom ni/_/nang dang phyi rol chos gos gdang /_/de bzhin lcug ma thag gu dang /_/mar me 
[\[161a.5\]]dang ni 'khor gyi khyams/_/chos gos mtshan mas gdab pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong dag chos gos bab bab tu 'jog ste/_de rdul gyis dri ma can du gyur 
[\[161a.6\]]cing /_sril gyis zos nas skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos gos bab bab tu gzhag par mi bya'o/_/'on kyang chos gos gdang la gzhag par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis rtsig pa la khung 
[\[161a.7\]]brkos nas chos gos kyi gdang bcug pa dang /_rtsig pa snyi bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rtsig pa la khung brko bar mi bya'o/_/'on kyang gang gi tshe gtsug lag khang rtsig pa de nyid kyi tshe bu ga gdod par bya zhing /_der chos gos kyi gdang 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]gzhug par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang du chos gos kyi gdang gi bu ga thod cig ces gsungs pa dang /_nyen kor du ma byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gtsug lag khang du ji lta ba de bzhin du nyen kor dag tu yang bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[161b.2\]]ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos kyi gdang la chos gos dag gzhag par bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dgon pa pa dag gis chos gos kyi 
[\[161b.3\]]gdang ma rnyed nas skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gis lcug ma btags nas gzhag par bya'o/_/gzhan dag la lcug ma yang med nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[161b.4\]]de dag gis tha gu btags te gzhag par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag mtshan zhing chos mnyan pa sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs te/_
[\[161b.5\]]dge slong dag mtshan mo chos mnyan pa sbyin par brtsams so/_/ji tsam na chos nyan pa'i dus su sbrul zhig 'ongs pa de dge slong gzhon nu zhig gis mthong nas de sngangs te/_shes ldan dag rgyab [{]rings [,]ring [}]rgyab [{]rings [,]ring [}]zhes smras so/_/dge slong dag kyang so so'i skye bo yin 
[\[161b.6\]]pas sngangs te/_de dag gis chos nyan pa bar bcad do/_/skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos mnyan pa gcad par mi bya'i 'on kyang mar me bus te chos bstan par bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[161b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis mar me bus te chos bstan par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang dge slong dag gis dbyar gyi mtshan mo mar me bus te chos bshad pa dang /_srog chags dag mar mer song nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/mar me'i khang bu bya'o/_/dge 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]slong dag gis mar me'i khang bu ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smyig ma'i tshal pa gzer bur gyis la ras dkar pos g.yog par bya'o/_/ras dkar po ma rnyed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[162a.2\]]lhang tsher gyis g.yog par bya'o/_/de yang ma rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bu ga brgya pa bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis bu ga brgya pa ci 'dra bar bya ba mi shes nas/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rdza mkhan gyis 'jim 
[\[162a.3\]]pa gsher ba las gyo mo byas la bu ga brgya par bya'o/_/rdza mkhan med na bum pa'i gyo mo 'am/_gzhan yang rung bcag nas bu ga brgya pa bya ste/_de nas mar me sbar la des g.yog par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 
[\[162a.4\]]tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/so ka'i dus la bab pa dang /_dge slong dag tsha bas gdungs te lus rmya zhing sha bri ngan pa dang /_/mdog ngan pa skya bo bseng bseng por gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen 
[\[162a.5\]]bzhin du 'dri bar mdzad pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/_kun dga' bo ci'i phyir da ltar dge slong dag lus rmya zhing /_sha bri ngan pa dang /_mdog ngan pa skya bo bseng bseng por gyur/_skabs de bcom ldan 
[\[162a.6\]]'das la rgyas par gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bas na gnang gis 'khor gyi khyams bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngos gsum par bya'o/_/de dag gis nang du 
[\[162a.7\]]ni rtsig pa brtsigs/_phyir ni ka ba'i phreng ba byas pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nang du ni ka ba'i phreng ba bya'o/_/phyi rol du ni rtsig pa brtsig go/_/skar khung ma btod pas phyir tsha bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]stsal pa/_skar khung dag gdod par bya'o/_/de dag gis dma' bar btod pas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bstod de gdod par bya'o/_/ha cang mthon por btod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ha cang 
[\[162b.2\]]mthon por mi gdod kyi/_'on kyang stan dang thad kar gdod par bya'o/_/bye'u dang phug ron dag 'jug nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skar khung dra ba can du bya'o/_/rlung dang char pa dag gis gnod par gyur nas/_/bcom 
[\[162b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgo 'phar gzhug par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis zan za ba na sgo bcad pas mun pa gnag par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zan za ba'i dus kyi tshe dbye bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag tsha ba'i dus na klog pa dang /_
[\[162b.4\]]kha ton byed pa dang /_rnam par nges pa'i gtam la 'khod pa'am/_chos gos kyi las byed pa'am/_las kyis shin tu dub pa na der rngul gzan dang /_sham thabs gnyis gyon la 'dug par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu 
[\[162b.5\]]rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas ri spos kyi ngad ldang dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang sems can dmyal ba dag tu khrid de 
[\[162b.6\]]slar mnyan yod du khrid pa dang /_de glo bur pa yin pas dge slong thams cad kyis ngo ma shes te/_de'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu mtshan gyis mngon par gsal ba'i lus de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs so snyam nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas 
[\[162b.7\]]brtan dag kyang ldang bar byed do/_/gang gi tshe kun shes par gyur pa de'i tshe 'gyod pa skyes nas skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ni ston pa'o/_/'di ni gzhan no zhes 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]bde blag tu shes par bya ba'i phyir dga' bo dang gzhan yang rung gang de lta bu'i chos gos la mtshan mas gdab par bya'o//_//sdom ni/_dge slong rnams ni bskrad pa dang /_/so shing rnam pa gsum dag dang /_/gzhon nu bskrad par bya ba dang /_/kun 
[\[163a.2\]]du bskrad par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe chu bo snyan ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong dag gis dang po bum pa dang /_pho long gi sbyor bas 'bad 
[\[163a.3\]]pa dang /_bsgrim pa dang /_brtsal bas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa de'i tshe de dag gi spyod lam dang /_spyod pa dag la sgrub pa des skye bo mang po rnams mngon par dad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[163a.4\]]rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gang dag gi grong gi zhing na chu bo snyan ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong rnams gnas pa'i mi de dag gi rnyed pa ni legs par rnyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bsnyen bkur ba tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi drung na spyod 
[\[163a.5\]]cing gnas pa des bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa rtags sam/_gsung ba las shes nas des de dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ni khyed kyi bsngags pa brjod cing gzigs par yang bzhed kyis khyed 'ong ba'i rigs so zhes spring ngo /_/de dag gis 
[\[163a.6\]]thos nas phan tshun glengs pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ni bdag cag gi bsngags pa brjod cing gzigs par yang bzhed ces zer na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_'di la ci zhig bsgrub tu yod 'dong mod/_dgra bcom pa 
[\[163a.7\]]rnams ni ma bsams par ye shes mthong ba mi 'jug pas gzhan dag cig gis smras pa legs te/_'on kyang skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag la sbran nas 'dong ngo /_/de nas de dag gis dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]'das bdag cag gi yon tan brjod cing gzigs par bzhed de/_khyed la bltas nas 'dong ba yin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag de lta na bdag cag kyang 'gro'o/_/de ltar gyis shig_/de rnams de dag dang lhan cig chas te rim gyis mnyan 
[\[163b.2\]]yod du phyin pa dang /_de nas kun dga'i ra bar dge slong glo bur ba dag dang /_gzhi ba rnams phan tshun yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i sgra mthon po/_sgra chen po dang /_skye bo'i tshogs phal po che'i sgra skad byung bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga'i 
[\[163b.3\]]ra bar sgra mthon po/_sgra chen po dang /_skye bo'i tshogs phal po che'i sgra skad gsan te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du 'dri bar mdzad pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/_kun dga'i 
[\[163b.4\]]ra bar sgra mthon po/_sgra chen po dang /_skye bo'i tshogs phal po che'i sgra skad grag pa 'o ni ci zhig_/des gsol pa/_btsun pa de ni chu bo snyan ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong rnams kyis skye bo mang po sbran nas dge slong rab tu mang po dang lhan cig 'dir mchis te/_dge 
[\[163b.5\]]slong gzhi ba dang /_glo bur ba rnams phan tshun yang dag par dga' bar bgyid pa'i sgra mthon po/_sgra chen po dang /_skye bo'i tshogs phal po che'i sgra skad lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 
[\[163b.6\]]song la chu bo snyan ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong rnams la dge slong dag khyed 'di na ma gnas par deng shig ces skrod cig_/btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo/_/zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas snyan ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong rnams 
[\[163b.7\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyed 'di na ma gnas par deng shig ces bskrad do/_/de dag bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bskrad do snyam du rig nas lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te ljongs rgyu 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]zhing dong ngo /_/lan gnyis lan gsum du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gang dag gi grong gi zhing na chu bo snyan ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong rnams gnas pa'i mi de dag gi rnyed pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do 
[\[164a.2\]]zhes bya ba nas/_de dag bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bskrad do snyam nas lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gang dag 
[\[164a.3\]]gi grong gi zhing na chu bo snyan ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong rnams gnas pa'i mi de dag gi rnyed pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes bya ba nas/_'ong ba'i rigs so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de dag phan tshun gleng ba tshe dang ldan pa dag ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 
[\[164a.4\]]gi bsngags pa brjod cing gzigs par yang bzhed la/_'on kyang song dgun bcom ldan 'das kyis bskrad/_gdon ma zos par bdag cag gis skye bo mang po la sbran pas bskrad kyis/_ma la da ni bdag cag gis mi sbran pa kho nar 'dong ngo zhes de dag gis ma 
[\[164a.5\]]sbran pa kho nar nyi tshe bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la 
[\[164a.6\]]gtsug lag khang gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_chu bo snyan ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong dag gi khri shoms shig_/btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas gtsug lag khang gcig tu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[164a.7\]]pa dang /_chu bo snyan ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong dag gi khri bshams nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dang /_chu bo snyan ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong rnams kyi khri gtsug lag khang gcig tu bshams lags na/_bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan

[\[164b.6\]]bo snyan ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong rnams kyang bsam gtan dang po las langs nas gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes

[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das ci yang med pa'i skye mched las bzhengs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched

[\[165b.1\]]bya'o snyam du dgongs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de dag dang /_rtags de dag dang /_rgyu mtshan de dag gis gang la nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad rdugs pa'i bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te bzhugs so/_/de nas chu bo snyan

[\[165b.4\]]ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yang dang yang du chu bo snyan ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong dag gi bsngags pa brjod cing gzigs par yang bzhed la/_'on 
[\[165b.5\]]kyang de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par dga' bar ni ma mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas chu bo snyan ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong rnams la yang 'phags pa'i yang dag par dga' bas yang dag 
[\[165b.6\]]par dga' bar byas so/_/btsun pa ji tsam gyis na 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'phags pa'i so so yang dag par dga' ba lags/_ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i dga' bas yang dag par dga' bar mdzad lags/_kun dga' 
[\[165b.7\]]bo 'di nang chu bo snyan ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong dag gi gtsug lag khang gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du zhabs bkrus te gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas stan bshams pa nyid la skyil mo krung bcas nas lus drang por bsrang 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]ste dran pa mngon du bzhag nas 'dug go/_/chu bo snyan ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong rnams kyang gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa bkrus nas gtsug lag khang du dong ste rang gi stan bshams pa la skyil mo krung bcas te lus drang por bsrang nas

[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]snyoms par zhugs/_nga 'du shes med 'du shes min skye mched las langs nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par zhugs na/_chu bo snyan ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong rnams kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas ci yang

[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]kyang 'phags pa'i yang dag par dga' bas yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chu bo snyan ldan gyi 'gram gyi dge slong rnams 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i dga' bas yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do/_/zhes kun du sgra grags pa nyen kor na 'khod 
[\[167a.2\]]pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis thos nas/_de rnams blta ba'i phyir 'ong ba dang /_de dag nye bar 'ongs pa de rnams la chos ston par byed do/_/de dag la chos ston pa na kha nas dri mi zhim pa byung nas de dag phan tshun du bltas nas dris pa/_'phags pa dri mi zhim pa 'di su las 
[\[167a.3\]]byung /_de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag gi kha nas byung ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag ci khyed so shing mi 'dor ram/_tshe dang ldan pa dag mi dor ro/_/'phags pa ci'i slad du tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/'phags 
[\[167a.4\]]pa ci khyed so shing ma zos pas yongs su dag par 'gyur ram/_de dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do/_/skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis legs par smras so/_/de

[\[167a.6\]]slong dag so shing ni mig la phan pa yang yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis so shing dor bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_ji tsam na dge slong gzhon nu zhig gis mi dben par 'dug ste/_so shing thung ngu zhig dor bar brtsams pa na bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs so/_/de nas 
[\[167a.7\]]dge slong des bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang spa gong bar gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kha gdangs te so shing bza' ba gang yin pa ni bdag gi cha ma yin no snyam nas des mid pa dang mgrin par thogs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]rnams ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos can yin te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yon pa 'khor lo dang /_bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung can bsod nams brgya phrag du ma las skyes pa 'jigs pa rnams la dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas mgo nas mnan te/_phyag g.yas 
[\[167b.2\]]pa'i mdzub mo bkug pas khrag dang bcas te kha nas phyung ste/_dge slong de la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'di ci yin des skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag mi dben par 
[\[167b.3\]]so shing za ba las gyur to snyam du mkhyen nas dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong gzhon nu [(]cha [,]che [)]ge mo zhig gis mi dben par 'dug ste so shing thung ngu zhig zos pa dang /_de la nyes dmigs 'di lta bu byung ngo /_/de lta bas na dge slong gis mi dben par 'dug 
[\[167b.4\]]ste so shing bza' bar mi bya/_thung ngur yang mi bya'o/_/dge slong mi dben par 'dug ste so shing za 'am/_thung ngur byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis mi dben par 'dug ste so shing bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong 
[\[167b.5\]]gsar bu rnams gnas brtan dag gi nang du 'dug nas so shing za bar brtsams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gsar bu dag gnas brtan rnams kyi nang na 'dug cing so shing bza' bar mi bya/_mi dben par yang mi bya'i 'on kyang gsum ni dben par bya 
[\[167b.6\]]ste/_bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang /_so shing bza' ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis so shing thung ngu bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_drug sde rnams lcug ma ring po ring po dag za bar rtsom pa dge slong dag gis mthong nas smod de/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ci lhag chad du byed dam/_'di la 
[\[167b.7\]]lhag chad ci zhig yod/_khyod kyis dge slong so shing thung ngu zos te de'u shi ba las bcom ldan 'das kyis bskyabs pa ma mthong ngam/_ci khyed cag nged kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos 'dod dam/_'di la phan yon gzhan dag kyang yod de rdza ma'i 'og tu bud pa dang /_dge sbyong brdab pa'o/_/de dag 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]cang mi zer bar 'khod nas/_skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis so shing ha cang ring po bza' bar mi bya ste/_dge slong so shing ha cang ring po za bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur 
[\[168a.2\]]ro//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so shing ring po bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis tshad ji tsam bza' bar bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_so shing rnam pa gsum 
[\[168a.3\]]ste/_ring po dang 'bring dang thung ngu'o/_/ring po ni sor bcu gnyis so/_/thung ngu ni sor brgyad do/_/de'i bar ni 'bring po'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs dben pa dag tu so shing bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_nad pa dang rgan po 'khogs pa dag gis gnas dben par 'gro mi nus 
[\[168a.4\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gis chol zangs gzhag par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]de bzhin gyo mo dag nye bar bzhag pa dang /_de la rkang pas reg pas 'gyel te sa gzhi ma rung bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_glang po 
[\[168a.5\]]che'i rkang pa lta bu dag nye bar gzhag par bya'o/_/gzhan dag gis chol zangs ma rnyed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gis chu khung gi sgor bza' bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag chu khung gi sgo nas ha cang thag ring ba na za bar byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chu 
[\[168a.6\]]khung gi sgo nas khru gang nyen kor du 'dug ste bza' bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis so shing bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis so shing za zhing lce ma bzhar bas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_so shing zos 
[\[168a.7\]]nas lce bzhar bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis so shing zos nas lce bzhar bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong rnams ci zhig gis lce bzhar bar bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis lce bzhar bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis lce bzhar bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel las byas pa'i lce bzhar bcangs pa bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa 'di ci zhig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das 
[\[168b.2\]]kyis lce bzhar gnang ngo /_/'phags pa ci dge sbyong khyed 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir tam/_de dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do/_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lce bzhar bzhi bcang bar bya ste/_ra gan dang 
[\[168b.3\]]zangs ma dang lcags dang khar ba'i 'o/_/dge slong dag gis rnon por byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnon por mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lce bzhar bzhi bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong kha cig gis ma 'byor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[168b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_gang dag gis ma 'byor pa de dag gis so shing de nyid bkas te/_lce bzhar bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis so shing bkas nas ma sbyangs par lce bzhar ba dang snad nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_so shing bkas te phan tshun drud nas lce bzhar bar bya'o/_/
[\[168b.5\]]dge slong dag gis so shing zos nas sgra ma phyung bar de bzhin bor ba dang /_gtsug lag khang de na gnas pa dag gi mgor phog ste/_de dag phya nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin mi dor gyi 'on kyang sgra dbyung bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag so shing 'dor ba na sgra 'byin gyi/_
[\[168b.6\]]gzhan yang gang cung zad bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang mchil ma dang snabs dang /_skyugs pa dang 'khru ba dag de bzhin bor ba dang /_nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang cung zad bshang ba dang /_gci ba la sogs pa thams cad 
[\[168b.7\]]la sgra dbyung zhing dor bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis so shing bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag lam du zhugs pa na/_lam du zhugs pa de rnams la phyogs kha cig na shing dang lo ma dang yal ga med de so shing ma rnyed nas de dag zan gcad par byed pa dang /_
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zan gcad par mi bya'i/_'on kyang lci ba'i phye ma 'am/_lci bas kha rung bar byas la lan gsum bshal nas bza' bar bya ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon 
[\[169a.2\]]med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la dge tshul tsun da dang /_sgra can zin dang gnyis yod do/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ljongs rgyur chas pa na dge sbyong gi mched tsun da dang /_sgra can zin la smras pa/_/dge tshul dag nga ni 
[\[169a.3\]]ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro na/_khyed 'dug gam 'on te 'gro/_tshe dang ldan pa tsun ngas smras pa/_mkhan po bdag ni khyod kho na dang lhan cig mchi'o/_/sgra can zin gyis smras pa/_mkhan po bdag ni 'di nyid na mchis so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_sgra can zin gal te de lta na su la gtad/_
[\[169a.4\]]des smras pa/_mkhan po btsun pa 'char ka la gtad du gsol/_de'i drung na mchis so/_/des smras pa/_sgra can zin de ni gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa yin pas khyod la gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur grang /_mkhan po de ni bdag gi pha ma dang 'dra bar gnas pa lags pas des gnod pa ci zhig bgyid 
[\[169a.5\]]par 'gyur/_des de la gtad nas ljongs rgyur chas pa dang /_de dang sgra can zin yang gtsug lag khang nas byung ngo /_/des smras pa/_sgra can zin 'di dang 'di gyis shig_/des smras pa/_mi byed do/_/'char kas khros te smras pa/_blun po 'di tsam yang mi bya na gzhan ci zhig bya des smras pa/_ci khyod 
[\[169a.6\]]nga'i slob dpon yin nam/_mkhan po yin nam/_mi byed do/_/'char ka je khros nas des de'i mgul nas bzung ste gtsug lag khang nas bskrad pa dang /_de rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na ngu zhing 'dug go/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI 'khor lnga brgya dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal 
[\[169a.7\]]du rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs pa dang /_des de ngu ba mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa sgra can zin ci ste bshums/_gau ta mI bdag bskrad do/_/su zhig gis/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas so/_/des bsams pa bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi sras la rgyab bstan te 'gro ba gang yin pa ni bdag gi cha ma 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]yin no snyam nas de dag gis de bskor te 'khod do/_/ji tsam na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang /_des kyang de la dri bar brtsams pa/_'phags pa sgra can zin ci ste bshums/_des ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang /_des kyang bsams 
[\[169b.2\]]pa bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi sras dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sru la rgyab bstan te 'gro ba gang yin pa ni bdag gi cha ma yin no snyam nas des kyang de bskor te 'dug go/_/tha gi tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs te des kyang de la dri bar brtsams 
[\[169b.3\]]pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin ci ste bshums/_des ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang /_des bsams pa bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi sras dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sru dang /_rgyal po la rgyab bstan te 'gro ba gang yin pa ni bdag gi cha ma yin no snyam nas des kyang de bskor te 'dug go/_/
[\[169b.4\]]bar skabs der kun dga'i ra ba'i nang du sgra mthon po sgra chen po dang /_skye bo'i tshogs phal po che'i sgra skad byung bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas 
[\[169b.5\]]pa/_kun dga' bo kun dga'i ra ba na sgra mthon po sgra chen po dang /_skye bo'i tshogs phal po che'i sgra skad grag pa 'o ni ci zhig_/des gnas skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong dag dge slong dge 'dun 
[\[169b.6\]]gyi gtsug lag khang nas skrod par byed dam/_bcom ldan 'das skrod par byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong ni rang gi gnas khang la dbang gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang la ni ma yin no/_/de lta bas na dge slong gis dge slong dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang 
[\[169b.7\]]nas bskrad par mi bya'o/_/skrod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dge slong dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang nas bskrad par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag la cung zad kyang ma smras pas de dag 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]dbang du ma gyur cing ma dul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thul gzhug par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis thul gzhug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/_de dag gis ji ltar thul gzhug par bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thul 
[\[170a.2\]]gzhug pa ni lnga ste/_mi smra ba dang mi gdams pa dang longs mi spyod pa dang /_dge ba'i phyogs rgyun gcad pa dang gnas dgag pa'o/_/de la mi smra ba ni smra bar mi bya ba dang /_kun du smra bar mi bya'o/_/mi gdams pa ni gdams par mi bya ba dang rjes su bstan par mi bya'o/_/longs mi spyad pa 
[\[170a.3\]]ni de dag las rim gro bdag gir mi bya ba dang /_zang zing gi longs spyad mi bya ba dang chos kyi longs spyod kyang mi bya ba'o/_/dge ba'i phyogs rgyun gcad pa ni de dag gis dge ba'i phyogs gang brtsams pa de rgyun gcad par bya ba'o/_/gnas dgag pa ni de dag gnas 'char mi 
[\[170a.4\]]gzhug pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis thul gzhug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag khyad par med par thul 'jug par byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos lnga dang ldan pa'i lhan cig gnas pa'am/_nye gnas thul gzhug par bya ste/_lnga 
[\[170a.5\]]gang zhe na/_ma dad pa dang /_le lo can dang bka' blo mi bde ba dang ma gus pa dang sdig pa'i grogs po can no/_/dge slong dag gang zhig chos lnga car dang ldan pa de kho na thul 'jug par byed kyi/_gang zhig de dag las gang yang rung ba zhig dang ldan pa de ni thul 'jug par mi byed nas/_
[\[170a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos lnga po 'di dag las gang yang rung ba zhig dang ldan na de yang thul gzhug par bya'o/_/de thul bcug pa dang gzhan sdud par byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mkhan po dang slob dpon dag gis thul bcug pa bsdu bar mi bya ste/_
[\[170a.7\]]byed na dbyen dang nye ba'i nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lhan cig gnas pa'am/_nye gnas thul bcug pa sus kyang bsdu bar mi bya ste/_byed na dbyen dang nye ba'i nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa dang sus kyang ma bsdus pas de dag shin tu ma gus par gyur te 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]kha cig ni yul gzhan du 'gro/_/kha cig ni bstan pa las 'da' bar byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang zhig de sdums byed pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya'o/_/de dag gis mi mkhas pa bskos te/_de song nas tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi mkhan po na re tshur spyon bzod pa 
[\[170b.2\]]mdzod cig ces zer ro zhes byas pa dang /_de je khengs par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang zhig rang gi blo gros kyis sdums byed pa'i mkhas pa bsko bar bya'o/_/thams cad la khyad par med par bzod pa gsol bas de dag dge ba'i chos mi 'phel 
[\[170b.3\]]zhing gsar bu gzhan dag kyang bstan pa las gyed par byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos lnga dang ldan pa la bzod pa gsol bar bya ste/_dad pa can dang brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_gus pa dang bka' blo bde ba dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen can no/_/
[\[170b.4\]]dge slong dag gang zhig chos lnga car ldan pa de la bzod pa gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang zhig de dag las gang yang rung ba zhig dang ldan pa de la bzod pa gsol bar bya'o/_/dge slong thul gzhug par mi 'os pa thul 'jug na 'gal tshabs can du 
[\[170b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/thul gzhug par 'os pa thul mi 'jug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa gsol bar 'os pa la bzod pa mi gsol na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa gsol bar mi 'os pa la bzod pa gsol na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/de la chos gong ma lnga las gang yang 
[\[170b.6\]]rung ba zhig dang ldan pa bzod pa gsol te/_gal te sems ngad ldang bar 'gyur ba lta na bzod pa gsol bar bya'o/_/sems ngad mi ldang ba lta na bzod pa gsol bar mi bya'o/_/gang zhig chos lnga car dang ldan pa de la ni bzod pa gsol bar mi bya ba nyid de/_bzod pa gsol bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur 
[\[170b.7\]]ro/_/gang zhig bzod pa mi byed pa de gal te dge tshul yin na chu tshags dang /_ril ba dang stod g.yogs dang /_smad g.yogs bcas pa byin te bskrad par bya'o/_/'on te bsnyen par rdzogs pa'am bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa zhig yin na yo byad lnga byin te bskrad par bya'i sgren mor ni mi bya'o//_//
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]sdom ni/_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]stegs bu de bzhin du/_/lan kan dra ba zu nga dang /_/phyags ma dang ni yang tog dang /_/yang tog lan kan gdags pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra 
[\[171a.2\]]ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas mal rnams kyi nang na shing drung ni rung ba rnyed kyang sla ba ste/_de la gnas na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ro/_/lhag par rnyed na gnas khang ngam/_
[\[171a.3\]]snga khang ngam khang pa rtseg ma'am zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams gnas khang dag byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/_dge slong dag gis ji lta bur bya ba mi shes 
[\[171a.4\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhi so phag rim pa bdun nam brgyad brtsigs te stegs bu pus mo tsam du phyin pa dang ka rten gzhag go/_/de'i steng du ka ba'i phreng ba gzugs so/_/ka ba rnams kyi steng du ka zhu'o/_/ka zhu'i steng du gdung ngo /_/gdung 
[\[171a.5\]]gi steng du spang leb po/_/de rnams kyi steng du so phag gis g.yogs so/_/de nas so phag gi phye mas g.yogs te/_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ni de ltar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de ltar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas dge slong rnams kyis khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byas te lan kan ma byas nas/_
[\[171a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lan kan bya'o/_/lan kan byas pa dang de lhung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'byor par bya zhing de lcags kyi gzer bu dag gis gdab par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]zan za ba na bye'u dang phug ron dag gis 
[\[171a.7\]]gtses nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyas gcad par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas gcad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/_dge slong dag gis ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgya ni lnga ste/_sha na las byas pa 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]dang /_rtswa mun dza las byas pa dang /_rtswa bal ba dza las byas pa dang /_rtswa ku sha las byas pa dang /_srad bu las byas pa'o/_/dge slong dag gis phyogs gang du bre ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grwa bzhi nas zu nga thogs pa de dag la legs par 
[\[171b.2\]]gdags par bya'o/_/de rnams kyis shing gi zu nga btags pa dang /_nyi mas gas shing char gyi chus kyang rul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lcags las byas pa gdags par bya'o/_/bya rog dang bye'u dang phug ron dag phyin cad mi 'ong nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[171b.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyogs gcig tu bya rog gi khung gdod par bya zhing de yang zan za ba'i dus su chod la dge slong dag zan zos zin nas yang dbye bar bya'o/_/dge slong zhig zan za ba na de'i mdun na khyi zhig bdag la gdon mi za bar sbyin par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_
[\[171b.4\]]re bzhin sdod pa las dge slong des de la ma byin pa dang /_de yi chad de dus las 'das so/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dud 'gro'i phyir zas kyi chang bu gzhag par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[171b.5\]]'das kyis dud 'gro'i phyir zas kyi chang bu gzhag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dgon pa pa zhig 'dug pa des wa rnams la zas kyi chang bu byin te bya rog dag bskrad pa dang /_de dag khros nas bya rog gi skad du rkun po'i sde dpon la dge slong 'di la gser mang du 
[\[171b.6\]]yod do zhes smras so/_/rkun po'i sde dpon de bya rog gi skad la mkhas pa zhig pas des dge slong de la brdeg par brtsams pa dang /_des smras pa/_kye skyes bu nga la ci ste brdeg_/des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod la gser yod pa byin cig_/des smras pa/_kye skyes bu 
[\[171b.7\]]nga la gser gyi 'byor pa ga la yod/_dmigs med par ma rdeg shig_/des smras pa/_khyod la gser yod kyis byin cig_/gal te mi ster na khyod ngas gsad do/_/des smras pa/_kye skyes bu khyod ni gcig gis bslus na khyod la su zer ba smros shig rkun po'i sde 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]dpon gyis smras pa/_bya rog dag zer ro/_/des smras pa/_kye skyes bu de dag ni nga la khros pa yin no/_/ci'i phyir/_des ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang /_rkun po'i sde dpon gyis smras pa/_'phags pa gal te khyod kyis bdag la de skad du drang por ma 
[\[172a.2\]]smras par gyur na bdag khyod bsad par gyur to/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nyes dmigs 'di dag bsdos te bzhag pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na sems can thams cad 
[\[172a.3\]]kyi phyir spyi la ci bde ba'i zas kyi chang bu gzhag par bya'o/_/dbyar khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]chus gang nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyabs bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis skyabs bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/_dge slong dag skyabs ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[172a.4\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_ka ba'i bar rnams su spang leb kyis gcad par bya'o/_/thams cad du bcad pas mun nag par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thams cad du gcad par mi bya'i 'on kyang snang ba'i sa gzhag par bya'o/_/shing dag ma rnyed nas 
[\[172a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_re lde 'am seg gis gcad par bya'o/_/de dag gis bcad pa dang chus rul cing sril dag kyang zhugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zla ba bzhi bzhir bzhag nas phyis dbyung bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[172a.6\]]'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun du spyod pa ni nang par sngar langs nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir nye bar song nas rgyal byed kyi tshal rang gis 'phyag go/_/de nas 
[\[172a.7\]]dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin brel ba 'ga' zhig byung nas de ma 'ongs pa dang /_rgyal byed kyi tshal ma phyags par lus te phyag dar gyis gang ba de bcom ldan 'das 'chag pas gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang kye ma lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ri spos kyi ngad 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]ldang las phyags ma khyer te 'ongs kyang bla na snyam du 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de/_chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed par mdzad pa de'i tshe srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so/_/
[\[172b.2\]]gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems bskyed par mdzad pa de'i tshe ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis mi shes na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su su song ba'i srog chags rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ci'i 
[\[172b.3\]]phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed snyam du bsams na rgyal byed kyi tshal phyag bzhed par mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes nas shing bal ltar reg na 'jam pa'i phyags ma lnga brgya blangs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[172b.4\]]'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod nams 'dod pa'i sems can rnams la bsod nams kyi stegs nye bar bstan pa'i phyir nyid kyis phyags ma bsnams te rgyal byed kyi tshal 'phyag par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das mthong nas nyan thos chen po shA ri'i bu 
[\[172b.5\]]dang maud gal gyi bu dang 'od srung dang kun dga' bo dang nam gru la sogs pa yang 'phyags pa la zhugs so/_/de nas nyan thos chen po dag dang thabs cig rgyal byed kyi tshal phyags nas rim gro'i khang par gshegs te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la 
[\[172b.6\]]bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag phyag dar 'chags pa la phan yon lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_bdag nyid kyi sems rab tu dang bar 'gyur/_gzhan gyi sems rab tu dang bar 'gyur/_lha rnams 
[\[172b.7\]]yid dga' bar 'gyur mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur/_lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang phyogs der phyin pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po dang 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]thabs cig nyid kyis tshal ji ltar phyags pa thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_gang du bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po dang thabs cig nyid kyis phyag dar mdzad pa de'i steng du bdag ji ltar 'gro snyam mo/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ngo tsha shes pa snying 
[\[173a.2\]]la ngo tsha nas de nyid du 'dug go/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rmas pa/_dge slong dag 'o ni su zhig_/dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/_mgon med zas sbyin lags te gang 
[\[173a.3\]]du bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po dang thabs cig nyid kyis phyag dar mdzad pa de'i steng du sug pa dor du bcom ldan 'das la g.yar tsha nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchi bar mi 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag sangs rgyas kyi bka' 
[\[173a.4\]]kha ton bya zhing 'jug par bya ste/_'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos la gus pa yin la/_chos ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyi yang bla ma yin no/_/de nas mgon med zas sbyin tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs 'don cing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nye bar song ngo /_/de nas 
[\[173a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par len du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag 
[\[173a.6\]]par bstan/_yang dag par len du bcug yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar byas nas song ngo /_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos la gus pa skyes 
[\[173a.7\]]shing zhe sa dang bcas par gyur pas de ltar chos kyi bsngags pa brjod pa gang lags pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar 'dod chags dang bral ba zhe sdang dang bral ba/_gti mug dang bral ba/_skye ba dang /_
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su grol zhing thams cad mkhyen pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes kyis shes bya thams cad la dbang brnyes nas chos la 
[\[173b.2\]]gus pa skyes shing zhe sa dang bcas par gyur pas de ltar chos kyi bsngags pa rjod par mdzad pa gang yin pa 'di la ngo mtshar ci zhig che/_'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas zhe sdang dang bcas gti mug dang bcas/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan 
[\[173b.3\]]dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dag las yongs su ma grol bas chos kyi phyir rang gi srog yongs su btang ba gang yin pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA 
[\[173b.4\]]rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_rgyal srid 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba/_'thab pa dang /_/rtsod pa dang /_'khrug pa dang /_'khrug long rab tu zhi ba/_chom rkun med 
[\[173b.5\]]pa sA lu dang bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa/_chos kyi rgyal po chos dang mthun pas chos bzhin byed du 'jug go/_/rgyal po de yang dad pa can dge ba'i bsam pa bzang ba/_bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa/_snying rje can bdag nyid chen po chos 'dod 
[\[173b.6\]]pa/_skye dgu la 'o byams pa/_thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/_thams cad yongs su gtong ba zhig ste/_gtong ba chen po la 'jug go/_/de dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo dam pa dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed dga' bar 
[\[173b.7\]]byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las btsun mo la sems can zhugs par gyur te/_de la legs par gsungs pa nyan 'dod pa skyes so/_/des rgyal po la smras nas/_rgyal pos mtshan mkhan rnams bos te dris pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_lha sems can 'di'i mthu 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]lags so/_/de nas rgyal pos legs par gsungs pa'i don du gser srang 'bum bskur te/_grong dang grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du bskor kyang legs par gsungs pa ma rnyed do/_/ji tsam na zla ba dgu tshang nas btsun mo de la khye'u gzugs 
[\[174a.2\]]bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa mdzes pa mdog gser gyi kha dog can/_mgo gdugs lta bu dpung pa ring ba/_dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/_smin ma 'dab chags pa/_sna mtho ba/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas pa dang /_zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig 
[\[174a.3\]]tu de btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gang gi slad du khye'u 'di ma btsas pa nyid nas legs par gsungs pa tshol ba de'i slad du khye'u'i ming legs gsungs tshol zhes 
[\[174a.4\]]de'i ming legs gsungs tshol zhes bya bar btags so/_/khye'u legs gsungs tshol ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 
[\[174a.5\]]'o ma dang zho dang mar sar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi snying khu dang /_yo byad kyi khyad par gtso bo gzhan dang gzhan dag gis bskyed bsrings nas rdzing gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yang legs par gsungs pa btsal na ma rnyed do/_/
[\[174a.6\]]de pha 'das nas rgyal srid la bzhag pa dang /_blon po rnams la smras pa/_gtso bo dag nga la legs par gsungs pa dgos kyis legs par gsungs pa tshol cig_/de nas blon po de rnams kyis gser srang 'bum bskur te 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag gi grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_
[\[174a.7\]]yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu bskor kyang legs par gsungs pa ma rnyed do/_/de nas de rnams kyis rgyal po la byas pa dang /_de nas rgyal po legs par gsungs pa mnyan pa'i phyir re bas yongs su gdungs par gyur to/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]shes pa dang mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des rgyal po legs par gsungs pa'i phyir sdug bsngal bar mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_ma la bdag gis rgyal po bgam par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gnod sbyin gyi gzugs su lag pa dang rkang pa dang /_
[\[174b.2\]]mig mi sdug par bsgyur nas rgyal po'i mdun du 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_legs par spyad pa'i chos spyad bya/_/nyes spyad de ni spyad mi bya/_/chos spyod 'jig rten 'di dang ni/_/pha rol du yang bde bar gnas/_/de nas rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa de thos ma 
[\[174b.3\]]thag tu dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba skyes nas gnod sbyin la smras pa/_gsang ba po tshigs su bcad pa de yang smros shig_/smros shig mnyan par bya'o/_/de nas gnod sbyin des rgyal po la smras pa/_lha bdag gis smras pa gang yin pa de mdzad na gdod bdag kyang bka' stsal pa gang 
[\[174b.4\]]lags pa de bgyid do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ci smra/_gnod sbyin gyis smras pa/_nyin zhag bdun du seng lding gi shing dag me dong du bus nas gal te der bdag nyid 'dor na de'i 'og tu bdag gis tshigs su bcad pa smra'o/_/de thos ma thag tu rgyal po yid dga' nas gnod sbyin de la smras 
[\[174b.5\]]pa de bzhin bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po des yul thams cad du dril bsgrags te/_zhag bdun na rgyal po legs par gsungs pa mnyan pa'i phyir me dong du bdag nyid 'dor na gang dag ya mtshan blta bar 'dod pa de dag kyang shog shig ces byas so/_/de nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma yang 
[\[174b.6\]]'dus/_nam mkha'i ngos la yang lha brgya stong du ma yang 'dus te byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa nyid shes nas ya mtshan gyi ngo bo blta ba'i phyir der 'khod do/_/de nas gnod sbyin de nam mkha' la 'phags nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_rgyal po chen po ji 
[\[174b.7\]]ltar dam bcas pa bzhin mdzod cig_/de nas rgyal po des gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid la bzhag ste/_blon po dang /_grong rdal pa dang /_yul mi rnams la yang bzod pa gsol/_skye bo'i tshogs kyang dbugs phyung nas me dong gi drung du nye bar song ste tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_me dong 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]'jigs pa che byed nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od dang 'dra ba 'dir/_/chos phyir srog la 'dzem med nges pa'i yid kyis rab tu mchong bar bya/_/bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis me dong 'di yang pad ma 'khrigs pa yi/_/mtsho chu tsan dan 'de gus bcin pa lta bur bsil ba 
[\[175a.2\]]bzang gyur cig_/de skad ces smras nas byang chub sems dpa' me dong der mchongs pa dang /_de mchongs ma thag tu me'i dong de mtshor gyur to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po'i ya mtshan lha dang mi dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul de mthong nas gnod sbyin gyi gzugs mi snang 
[\[175a.3\]]bar byas nas rang gi gzugs kyis 'dug ste/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_legs par spyad pa'i chos spyad bya/_/nyes spyad de ni spyad mi bya/_/chos spyod 'jig rten 'di dang ni/_/pha rol du yang bde bar gnas/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas tshigs 
[\[175a.4\]]su bcad pa de bzung nas gser gyi glegs ma dag la bris te 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag gi grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu bskur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe 
[\[175a.5\]]de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/_de'i tshe yang ngas chos kyi phyir srog yongs su btang na da lta lta smos kyang ci dgos/_dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_chos la gus par bya bla mar bya/_mnyes par bya mchod par bya ste chos la gus par 
[\[175a.6\]]byas/_bla mar byas/_mnyes par byas/_mchod par byas shing nye bar brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 
[\[175a.7\]]mngon par bstod do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar 'phyag pa la phan yon lnga yod do zhes bka' stsal pa dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag bsam 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]gtan dang 'don pa bor te rgyal byed kyi tshal 'phyag pa la zhugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas dge skos las dgongs te gsungs kyi dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag ni ma yin no/_/'on kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong 
[\[175b.2\]]gi las ni gnyis te/_'di lta ste bsam gtan dang /_gdon pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ngas dge skos la dgongs te gsungs so zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_des rgyal byed kyi tshal ril phyag par ma nus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji tsam sbyang dgos 
[\[175b.3\]]pa de dge skos kyis phyag par bya zhing gzhan tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la gaN+DI brdungs te dge 'dun thams cad kyis phyag par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la gaN+DI brdungs te dge 'dun thams cad kyis phyag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong 
[\[175b.4\]]kha cig lag na phyags ma thogs te gtam bzang po ma yin pa zer zhing las byed pa dang /_rgyal byed kyi tshal na gnas pa'i mi ma yin pa dang /_dge slong gzhan dag kyang 'phya nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam par nges pa'i gtam chos dang mthun par 
[\[175b.5\]]bya ba 'am 'phags pa'i mi smra bas phyag dar bya'o/_/dge slong dag rgyal byed kyi tshal phyags nas lus la rdul gyis gos bzhin 'dug pa dang /_ma dad pa dag gis mthong ste 'phya nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyags te phyag dar bor nas gang dag khrus byed par 'dod pa 
[\[175b.6\]]de dag gis ni khrus bya'o/_/gang dag khrus bya bar mi 'dod pa de dag gis ni lus chus phyis nas lag pa dang rkang pa bkrus te 'jug par bya'o/_/de nyid kyis nyin par gnas mal la blta bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge 'dun thams cad de bzhin du lta nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[175b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun thams cad kyis blta bar mi bya'i 'on kyang gnas 'cha' ba rnams kyis blta bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar byas pa'i steng du sangs rgyas kyi bka' kha ton bya zhing 'gro bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag chag chag btab nas phyag dar 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]byed cing dkyil 'khor byed de des na phyogs der 'gror mi rung ngo snyam nas dge slong dag mi 'gro ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gtsug lag gi tshigs su bcad pa gdon zhing 'gro bar bya ste/_de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/dri gtsang khang gi grib ma 
[\[176a.2\]]dang /_sku gzugs dang /_mchod rten gyi srog shing gi grib ma dag byung ba dang /_de dag la yang dge slong rnams 'gyod cing ma bgoms pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag grib ma ni mi brtan pa yin pas de la yang gtsug lag gi tshigs su bcad 
[\[176a.3\]]pa gdon cing bgom par bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/ge ra'i rgyal pos ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ge ra'i khye'u bran bu dang /_skyong ba zhes bya ba gnyis skyes su bskur te/_de gnyis las bran bu ni bza' ba dang btung ba'i cho ga la mkhas/_skyong ba ni gnas 
[\[176a.4\]]mal gyi cho ga la mkhas so/_/mtha' 'khob na gnas pa rnams ni phal cher brkam chags can gyi rang bzhin can yin pas gang gi tshe srang du 'gro ba de'i tshe yul mi las nya dang /_sha dang /_snum khur dag phrogs shing za nas de rnams kyis de dag la brgyab pa dang /_de gnyis kyis 
[\[176a.5\]]rgyal po la smras pa/_lha deng bdag cag srang du mchis nas der bdag cag gis nya las cung zad cig sug nya bgyis na de rnams kyis bdag cag btsogs te tha ma ma gum tsam du bgyis so/_/rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dril bsgrags nas sus kyang bran bu dang /_skyong ba dag brdeg 
[\[176a.6\]]par mi bya'i 'on kyang bdag nyid kyi rdzas bsrung bar bya'o zhes bsgo nas gang gi tshe de gnyis srang du 'gro ba de'i tshe skye bo'i tshogs kyis de gnyis mthong nas bdag nyid kyi rdzas sbed par byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po las byed pa las ngal te mal du 'phres pa dang /_bran 
[\[176a.7\]]bu dang skyong ba dag de'i rkang pa mnyed cing drung na 'khod pas rgyal po bsgul nas bran bus skyong ba la smras pa/_skyong ba lha mnal log gam/_des smras pa/_mnal log go/_/rgyal pos thos nas bsams pa gdon mi za bar 'di gnyis gsang gtam cung zad cig byed 'dod 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]par gyur to snyam nas des gnyid log pa ltar rdzus te 'dug pa dang /_bran bus skyong ba la smras pa/_skyong ba 'jig rten pha rol yod dam med cig gu/_des smras pa/_bran bu 'jig rten pha rol yod re skan/_skyong bas smras pa/_bran bu 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa yod dam/_des 
[\[176b.2\]]smras pa/_'jig rten na dgra bcom pa yod re skan/_rgyal pos de thams cad thos nas des bsams pa/_'di gnyis kyang 'di lta bu'i sdig pa'i lta ba kun du spyod de/_'di la gcig ni rtag par lta/_gcig ni chad par lta'o snyam mo/_/kun tu yang yul ko sa la'i rgyal 
[\[176b.3\]]po gsal rgyal gyi ge ra'i khye'u gnyis las gcig ni rtag par lta/_cig shos ni chad par lta'o zhes sgra grags par gyur to/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis khyu mchog gi tshig rlabs po che 'di lta bu mgo gcig bzung nas smras pa/_su gang zhig nga'i khyim 
[\[176b.4\]]du mir gyur nas dus byed pa de thams cad lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrags so/_/rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa/_gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'dir 'ongs pa de'i 
[\[176b.5\]]tshe de la khye'u 'di gnyis thabs zhig bshams te sbyin no snyam mo/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang /_khye'u zhig gis de'i stan bting ste dus ran pa dang 'ong ngo snyam nas phyir byung ste byis pa rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar brtsams 
[\[176b.6\]]so/_/rgyal pos de song bar shes nas bsams pa/_'di gnyis thabs bshams nas sbyin pa'i dus de ni 'di yin no snyam du rig nas des sgo ba la gsang ste/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khye'u phyir byung ba gang yin pa de nang du ma gtang shig ces bsgo ba dang /_sgo bas 
[\[176b.7\]]de nang du ma btang ngo /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'gro bar brtsams nas stan las langs te phan tshun bltas pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_khyim bdag ci lta lha stan 'tshal ba'i khye'u 'o/_/des smras pa/_khyim bdag ngas bran bu dang /_skyong ba gnyis sbyin gyis 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]khyer la song shig_/des rgyal po'i ngor khas blangs nas des bsams pa/_ci'i phyir lhas bran bu dang /_skyong ba gnyis bdag la byin snyam mo/_/yang bsams pa/_'di gnyis sdig pa'i lta ba can yin pas lhas bdag brtag par bzhed do snyam nas des 
[\[177a.2\]]de gnyis khyim du khrid de mdzod pa bos te smras pa/_kye skyes bu 'di dag ci 'dod pa de thams cad khyod kyis byin cig_/srang du song ste skye bo'i tshogs la smras pa/_bran bu dang /_skyong ba ci len pa de khyed kyis byin la rin yang rtsis te zhog shig dang ngas nyis gyur du sbyin no/_/
[\[177a.3\]]de dag gis mdzod pa'i lag nas gang cung zad ci bslangs pa de thams cad thob pa dang /_de dag mgu nas smras pa/_kye skyes bu kho bo cag gis gang bslangs pa de thams cad khyod kyis kho bo cag la byin na khyod la su zhig gis bsgo/_des smras pa/_bdag la khyim 
[\[177a.4\]]bdag gis de skad du bsgo'o/_/de dag gis bsams pa/_khyim bdag ni bdag cag gi pha ma dang 'dra bar gnas te gang bslangs pa de thob po snyam mo/_/dus gzhan zhig na de dag srang du song ba dang /_de dag la skye bo'i tshogs kyis sgra phyung nas sbyin te/_kha cig ni bran bu nged las 
[\[177a.5\]]khyer cig ces zer/_gzhan dag kyang nged las khyer cig ces zer ba dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed sngon nged mthong na snod du sbed na da sgra phyung nas ster ba 'di la rgyu gang zhig yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_sngon ni khyed 'phrog cing za/_da ni khyim bdag gis rin 
[\[177a.6\]]nyis gyur tu byin no/_/de dag gis bsams pa/_khyim bdag ni bdag cag shin tu phan bsgrub pa lhur len to snyam nas de dag khyim bdag gi drung du song ste smras pa/_khyim bdag bdag cag la las dbog tu gsol/_shes ldan dag sdod cig dang las kyang yod do/_/ji tsam 
[\[177a.7\]]na dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bran bu dang skyong ba dag khrid nas rgyal byed kyi tshal 'phyag tu song ngo /_/de der son pa dang bya ba cung zad cig byung nas/_des smras pa/_bran bu dang /_skyong ba nga la bya ba zhig byung gis khyed kyis rgyal byed tshal phyogs la sheg shig_/
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]de dag gis phyag par brtsams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar phyag dar mi zad pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de dag jo bo la snying nye bas skyo bzhin ma btang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo bran bu dang /_
[\[177b.2\]]skyong ba dag la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zhog shig_/des de dag la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma bzhag go/_/phyag dar bor ba dang /_de kho na bzhin du zad ma shes nas de dag ji srid nam sros par gyur pa de srid du las byed cing 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[177b.3\]]dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis bran bu dang /_skyong ba dag drung du snyol cig_/dge slong rnams la yang ngas dge slong dag khyed kyis dge ba mi spyoms pa dang /_sdig pa bshags te gnas par bya'o zhes gsungs mod kyi 'on kyang bran bu dang /_skyong ba 
[\[177b.4\]]dag lta ba dbral bar bya dgos pas khyed las gang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang thob pa des gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa des gnos shig ces byos shig_/btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas 
[\[177b.5\]]bran bu dang /_skyong ba la smras pa/_khyed kho bo kho na'i drung du nyol cig_/dge slong rnams la yang smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas ngas dge slong dag khyed kyis dge ba mi spyoms pa dang /_sdig pa bshags te gnas par bya'o zhes gsungs 
[\[177b.6\]]mod kyi 'on kyang bran bu dang /_skyong ba dag lta ba dbral bar bya dgos pas khyed las gang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang thob pa des gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa des gnos shig ces de skad bka' stsal to/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das 
[\[177b.7\]]kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/_mtshan mo thun dang po la rdzu 'phrul bstan pa brtsams te/_kha cig ni 'bar bar byed/_kha cig ni glog 'gyu bar byed pa dang /_bran bu dang /_skyong bas smras pa/_'phags pa kun dga' bo 'di ci zhig lags/_des 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]smras pa/_'di dag ni dgra bcom pa rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba yin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_kun dga' bo 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa mchis pa lta zhig 'di dag mngon sum kho nar mi snang ngam/_'di la the tshom zar ci zhig yod ces byas pa dang /_de dag 
[\[178a.2\]]las gang gi lta ba 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa med do snyam pa de dang bral zhing 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa yod do snyam pa yang dag pa'i lta ba thob par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gung thun la kye ma brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha dag 'ongs kyang bla na snyam du 
[\[178a.3\]]'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed par mdzad do/_/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed par mdzad pa zhes bya ba nas/_brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes nas bcom ldan 
[\[178a.4\]]'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de rnams kyi mthus snang ba rgya chen po byung ba dang /_bran bu dang /_skyong ba dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa kun dga' bo 'di ci zhig lags/_des smras pa/_'di dag ni brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa 
[\[178a.5\]]lha rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags pa yin no/_/'jig rten pha rol mchis pa lta zhig_/'di dag mngon sum kho nar mi snang ngam/_'di la the tsom zar ci yod ces byas pa dang /_de dag las gang gi lta ba 'jig rten pha rol med do snyam pa de dang bral zhing 
[\[178a.6\]]'jig rten pha rol yod do snyam pa yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes so/_/de dag dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa dang /_
[\[178a.7\]]bag la nyal ba dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/de thos nas bran bu dang /_skyong ba dag gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/de dag bden pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob na/_
[\[178b.2\]]bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la bran bu dang /_skyong ba khyed tshur tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas kun tu bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[178b.3\]]stsal ma thag tu de dag skra bregs pa dang /_snam sbyar gyon pa dang /_lag na lhung bzed dang /_bya ma bum thogs pa dang /_skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa lta bu dang /_dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur 
[\[178b.4\]]to/_/de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/_/mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar bgos gyur cing /_/mod la dbang po rab tu zhir gnas te/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus kyi cha lugs bsgyur//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po bcu 
[\[178b.5\]]drug pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la gdams ngag gnang ba dang /_de gnyis kyis 'bad brtsal bsgrims pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba sems bong 
[\[178b.6\]]ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa/_ste'u dang tsan dan du mtshungs pa/_ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral ba/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang rnyed pa las chags pa dang /_bkur 
[\[178b.7\]]sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang /_rjed pa dang /_gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bran bu dang /_skyong ba dag rab tu phyung ba de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]kyis bran bu dang /_skyong ba dag rab tu byung ba gang yin pa ni ma legs pa zhig mdzad de de dag ni sdig pa'i lta ba kun tu spyod pa'o zhes ma dad par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyan thos chen po ri rab dang 'dra ba dag la rgyal po gsal rgyal ma dad par gyur 
[\[179a.2\]]gyis/_de'i phyir de dag gi yon tan brjod par bya'o snyam du dgongs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de snyam du dgongs pa dang /_de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 
[\[179a.3\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag pa ston par mdzad/_yang dag par len du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_
