[\[179a.5\]]nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig sang 
[\[179a.6\]]bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[179a.7\]]kyis bshad pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo bran bu dang /_skyong ba dag 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]gi drung du song la song nas 'di skad ces/_sang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gdugs tshod sbyar ba'i tshe khyed gnyis kyis chu rims shig ces gyis shig_/btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_tshe dang ldan pa bran bu dang /_
[\[179b.2\]]skyong ba ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa bran bu dang /_skyong ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas sang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi gdugs tshod sbyar ba'i tshe khyed gnyis kyis chu rims shig ces de skad bka' stsal to/_/de dag 
[\[179b.3\]]gis smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes smras nas bsams pa/_ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag bzhag ste/_bdag cag la sang khyed gnyis kyis chu rims shig ces 
[\[179b.4\]]bka' stsal/_gdon ma zos par bdag cag kho na'i yon tan [(]brdzod [,]brjod [)]par mdzad par bzhed de legs kyis ston pa'i dgongs pa rdzogs par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin de nyid kyi mtshan mo bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa yang dag par bsgrubs 
[\[179b.5\]]nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams/_chu ra bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la pho nya las btsun pa gdugs tshod dus su bshams lags te/_bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes dus bdas par gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[179b.6\]]snga dro chos gos mnabs lhung bzed bsnams te/_dge slong gi tshogs kyis bskor nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs so/_/gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la 
[\[179b.7\]]bzhugs so/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi thog tu pho nya btang ste/_lha bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sdum par gdugs tshod la spyan drangs na/_de'i slad du gshegs shing rjes su yi rang ba mdzad pa'i 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]rigs so zhes byas pa dang /_de btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon pos bskor nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du gdugs tshod sbyar ba la rjes su yi rang bar bya ba'i phyir 'ongs te rgan rims bzhin du phyag byas nas 'dug go/_/de nas 
[\[180a.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa bran bus rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug nas ji ltar gzhon pa'i mthar phyin nas 'bo ba de ltar chu'i rgyun byin gyis brlabs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa skyong bas kyang ji ltar rgan pa'i mthar phyin nas 'bo ba de ltar chu'i rgyun byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_rgyal po gsal 
[\[180a.3\]]rgyal gyis bsams pa/_ston pa'i spyan sngar rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba byed pa'i dge slong gang zhig yin snyam nas chu'i rgyun gyi rjes bzhin gzhon pa'i mthar song ba dang /_ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa skyong ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang phyir chu'i rgyun gyi rjes bzhin rgan pa'i 
[\[180a.4\]]mthar song ba dang /_ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa bran bu mthong nas de shin tu ya mtshan skyes nas ro stod bstod/_lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/_kye ma'o sangs rgyas/_kye ma'o chos/_kye ma'o dge 'dun/_kye ma'o chos legs par gsungs pa nyid/_da ltar 'di na bran 
[\[180a.5\]]bu dang /_skyong ba la sogs pa sdig pa'i lta ba can dag kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur to zhes ched du rjod par byed do/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag dar te bza' ba dang bca' ba 
[\[180a.6\]]gtsang zhing bsod pas kun du tshim par byed/_kun tu stobs par byed do/_/rnam grangs du mar rang gi lag dar te bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas kun du tshim par byas/_kun du bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol te/_phyag bcabs lhung bzed 
[\[180a.7\]]gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par len du 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bran bu dang /_skyong ba dag 
[\[180b.2\]]gis las ci zhig bgyis na des na yul mtha' 'khob tu skyes shing gcig ni rtag par lta/_gcig ni chad par lta bar gyur/_las ci zhig bgyis na des na bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum 
[\[180b.3\]]du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bran bu dang /_skyong ba dag gis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan dag tu las byas shing bsags pa/_tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/_lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/dge 
[\[180b.4\]]slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba nas/_drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de'i bstan pa la 'di gnyis rab tu byung bar gyur te de na 'di gnyis mtha' 'khob tu dong nas gdams 
[\[180b.5\]]ngag med par yid la bya ba bskyed do/_/de na 'di gnyis kyis ma rtogs par rtogs so snyam pa'i 'du shes thob po/_/de nas 'di gnyis 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa la log par lta ba thob po/_/de gnyis log par lta bas nyams nas smras pa/_yang dag 
[\[180b.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bslus te/_re zhig bdag cag la yang nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i dgra bcom pa nyid med na gzhan la lta yod par 'gyur re skan zhes smras so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab 
[\[180b.7\]]la rab tu byung nas mtha' 'khob tu gdams ngag med par yid la byed pa bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag ni bran bu dang /_skyong ba 'di dag nyid yin no/_/de na 'di dag gis mtha' 'khob tu song ste gdams ngag med par yid la byed pa bskyed nas lta ba log pa thob pa gang yin pa'i las 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]de'i rnam par smin pas ngan song rnams kyi nang du skyes nas lo mang por mtha' 'khob rnams su skyes shing log par lta ba can du gyur te/_da lta'i bar du yang mtha' 'khob tu skyes nas log par lta ba can du gyur pa yin no/_/gang yang 'di dag gis de na bklags 
[\[181a.2\]]pa dang /_kha ton byas pa dang /_phung po la mkhas pa dang /_khams la mkhas pa dang /_skye mched la mkhas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa des na nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon 
[\[181a.3\]]mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag gdams ngag med par bsam gtan byed pa la nyes dmigs/_'di dag dang gzhan yang yod de/_de lta bas na dge slong gis gdams ngag med par bsam gtan mi bya'o/_/dge slong 
[\[181a.4\]]gdams ngag med par bsam gtan byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag_/las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi yang gcig tu dkar/_'dren ma rnams kyi yang 'dren 
[\[181a.5\]]ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang 'dren ma rnams spangs nas/_las gcig tu dkar ba dag la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag gis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug 
[\[181a.6\]]pa des dgon par spyil bu byed du bcug ste/_de na dge slong gcig 'dug pa de so ka tsha bas rmya nas skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing lus sha bri ngan pa/_nyam chung ba/_shig shig por gyur nas de khyim bdag shes par gyis shig_/gzhan zhig tu 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang /_
[\[181a.7\]]des smras pa/_'phags pa cung zad cig brel bar ma gyur grang /_des smras pa/_khyim bdag brel ba ni cung zad kyang med mod kyi 'on kyang so ka'i dus la bab pas spyil bu de na tsha ste skyo'o/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa bzhugs shig dang /_sa'i khang pa bgyid du stsal 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]lo/_/khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na 
[\[181b.2\]]gnang gis sa'i khang pa byed du gzhug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i khang pa byed du gzhug go/_/zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_khyim bdag des sa'i khang pa byas so/_/de dbyar gyi dus su rlan par gyur pa dang /_dge slong de khyim bdag gi drung du song nas smras pa/_
[\[181b.3\]]khyim bdag shes par gyis shig_/gzhan zhig tu 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa cung zad brel bar ma gyur grang /_des smras pa/_khyim bdag brel ba ni cung zad kyang med mod kyi 'on kyang sa'i khang pa tshan can 'dir 'dug mi phod do/_/des smras pa/_
[\[181b.4\]]'phags pa gal te de lta na yang thog bgyid du stsal gyis bzhugs shig_/des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[181b.5\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis yang thog byed du gzhug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang thog byed du gzhug go zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_khyim bdag des yang thog byas so/_/de rdib par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[181b.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_lan kan gdags par bya'o/_/de 'gul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rten ma gzhug cing lcags gzer dag gis gdab par bya'o//_//sdom ni/_lan tshwa dang ni sbu bu rwa/_/kha sbyar sman gyi phor bu dang /_/par tang dang ni gding 
[\[181b.7\]]ba dang /_/rkang pa'i rten dang rdo ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da bad sa'i bu gang nas bzung ste rab tu byung ba de tshun chad rtag tu na'o/_/de'i drung du tshangs pa mtshungs par 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]spyod pa rnams song ste dris pa/_gnas brtan bde 'am/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag na ste mi bde'o/_/gnas brtan khyod kyis sngon ci dag bsrel/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lan tshwa'o/_/gnas brtan gal te de lta na da ci ste mi srel/_
[\[182a.2\]]bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis lan tshwa bsrel bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lan tshwa bsrel bar bya'o zhes 
[\[182a.3\]]bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bab bab tu bzhag ste chud zos pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bab bab tu gzhag par mi bya'i 'on kyang sbu bur gzhag par bya'o/_/de dag gis smyug ma'i sbu bur bzhag pa dang de zhu nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[182a.4\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rwa'i sbu bur gzhag par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis rwa tsam pa'i nang du bcug ste/_de'i dri mi zhim par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rwa tsam pa'i nang du gzhug par mi bya'i 'on kyang ba lang gi gci ba dang /_tshos la bkrus te 
[\[182a.5\]]gzhug par bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lan tshwa rwa'i nang du gzhug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus lan tshwa rwa'i nang du bcug nas bzhag ste kha gab ma bkab pas rdul zhugs so/_/skabs de dge slong 
[\[182a.6\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kha gab dgab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kha gab gdab par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis ji lta bus dgab pa mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[182a.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rwa de kho na lta bu gnyis pa zhig byas la rwa kha sbyar du gzhag par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu gang nas bzung ste rab tu byung ba 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]tshun chad de rtag tu na'o/_/de'i drung du tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams song ste dris pa gnas brtan bde'am/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag na ste mi bde'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_gnas brtan khyod kyis sngon ci zhig bcangs/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]sman gyi 
[\[182b.2\]]phor bu'o/_/gnas brtan gal te de lta na da ci ste mi bcang /_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis sman phor bcang bar 
[\[182b.3\]]bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig yod pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang rtse bar byed/_dga' bar 
[\[182b.4\]]byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu zhig btsas te/_de bskyed bsrings nas chen por gyur to/_/de dus gzhan zhig na legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /_des 
[\[182b.5\]]khri 'ba' zhig thob kyi mal stan ni med do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_bu de khri stong pa la nyal te mal stan med par mthong nas des smras pa/_bu dge slong 'di rnams la mal stan yod na khyod la ci ste med/_des smras pa/_pha 
[\[182b.6\]]dge slong 'di dag ni rab tu byung nas yun ring du lon pas 'di dag gis mal stan thob kyi bdag ni da gzod rab tu byung bas na bdag gis ma thob po/_/des smras pa/_bu gal te de lta na/_ngas khyod la par tang zhig bskur gyis de 'dir thing shig_/des smras pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[182b.7\]]'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/bu bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong gis par tang gding bar 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis par tang gding bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_des par tang de gding ba med par spyad pas dri ma can du gyur to/_/re zhig cig na khyim bdag de yang gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang par tang dri ma can de mthong nas 
[\[183a.2\]]des ngo ma shes te smras pa/_bu khyod shes nyen can bsod nams chen por gyur tam/_pha ci mngon par tang gzhan 'di rnyed mod/_pha gzhan rnyed re skan/_bu ci'i phyir 'di 'di ltar dri ma can du gyur/_pha bdag gis gding ba med par spyad pas so/_/bu khyod kyis chen po la 
[\[183a.3\]]'os pa'i gos 'di lta bu yang ma rung bar byas sam/_kye ma khyod kyis gding ba bting nas spyad kyang bla na/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang zag gi khra bo la yang gding ba med par spyad 
[\[183a.4\]]par mi bya ste/_spyod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos mnyan pa sbyin par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_chos smra ba 
[\[183a.5\]]seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa'i rkang pa 'phyangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rkang rten bca' bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rkang rten bca' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis ji lta bu bca' ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[183a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_seng ge'i khri brtan po gang yin pa la ni so phag gi them skas bya'o/_/'on te yang dang yang du rkyong na ni shing gi khri'u gzugs so/_/bskyod dka' bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rtsa ba bzhi la lcags kyi yang 
[\[183a.7\]]mig gdags par bya zhing de dag nas bzung ste/_ci dgar spyod par bya'o/_/bsod nams 'dod pa'i dge slong dag dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis rkang rten la dri'i lag ris dang /_dri dag gis byugs pa dang chos smra ba 'gyod de de la rkang pa 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]'jog par mi byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i steng du lo ma'i khres sam/_rtswa bam gzhag par bya zhing bzhag nas rkang pa gzhag par bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi 
[\[183b.2\]]kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge'i khri la rkang rten gzugs par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dgon pa pa rnams la rkang rten mi bdog nas de dag rkang pa 'phyang bzhin chos ston par byed pas ngal bar gyur to/_/skabs de dge slong rnams 
[\[183b.3\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gis rdo gzhag par bya'o//_//sdom ni/_phyi ba seng ras mchil ma'i snod/_/lus phyi ba dang gzhong [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_/gcal dang me shel dag dang ni/_/gtso blag mkhan 
[\[183b.4\]]dang shing leb po/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu gang nas bzung ste rab tu byung ba tshun chad de rtag tu na'o/_/de'i drung du tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams song ste dris pa/_gnas brtan bde'am/_
[\[183b.5\]]des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag na ste mi bde'o/_/gnas brtan khyod kyis sngon ci zhig bcangs/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gdong phyi ba'o/_/gnas brtan gal te de na da ci ste mi bcang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[183b.6\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis gdong phyis bcang bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/so ga'i dus la bab pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[183b.7\]]pi lin da'i bu tsha bas rmya ste/_skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing lus sha bri ngan pa/_nyam chung ba shig shig por gyur to/_/de'i drung du tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams song ba dang /_de dag gis 'di'i lus kyi gnas skabs mthong nas smras pa/_gnas brtan ci ste skya 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]bo bseng bseng po lus sha bri ngan pa nyam chung ba shig shig por gyur/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]tsha bas bdag gi lus kyi gnas 'di lta bur gyur to/_/gnas brtan khyod kyis sngon so ga'i dus su ci zhig bcangs/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]seng ras so/_/gnas 
[\[184a.2\]]brtan gal te de lta na da ci ste mi bcang /_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong gis seng ras bcang bar bya'o/_/sangs 
[\[184a.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig cham lud bdo ste na ba des sa la mchil ma bor bas mal gyi g.yas g.yon gnyis mi mdzes par byas so/_/ji tsam na de'i lhan cig gnas pa nang par sngar 
[\[184a.4\]]langs te gnas khang du zhugs nas phyag byas te nad dris nas byung ngo /_/de phyag 'tshal ba na dpral ba la mchil ma'i thal ba reg pa de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang du khyod kyis dpral ba la mchil ma 'di reg_/des smras pa/_
[\[184a.5\]]mkhan po cham lud na ba des sa la mchil ma bor bar ma gyur grang /_re zhig blta'o zhes de gnas khang du zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na mal gyi glo g.yas g.yon du mchil ma bor ba mthong ngo /_/des dge slong dag la bsnyad pa dang /_de dag 'phya bar byed/_smod par 
[\[184a.6\]]byed/_kha zer bar byed de da ji lta bu zhig tu gyur/_dge slong dag mchil mas dge 'dun gyi gnang khang ma rung bar byed do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gi 
[\[184a.7\]]gnas mal bcas par mchil ma dor bar yang mi bya/_mun par phyag byed pas mgos drung du gtugs par yang mi bya'i/_tshig tsam gyis phyag bya zhing gang cung zad bya ba yod na yang der tshig tsam gyis dri bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang gang la cham pa dang kha chu bdo ba des mchil ma'i snod nye bar gzhag 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis kham phor du mchil ma bor ba dang de 'dril te ches mang du ma rung bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mchil ma snod rten ma dang bcas pa'am/_yang na zangs po che gzhag par bya'o/_/dge slong dag zangs po che ci 'dra ba 
[\[184b.2\]]yang rung nye bar 'jog par byed pas de yang 'dril te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_glang po che'i rkang pa lta bu nye bar gzhag par bya'o/_/gzhan dag cig mchil ma 'dor ba na zer ma yar nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[184b.3\]]gcal dgram par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis gcal ci zhig gis dgram pa mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_so phag gi bur ma 'am bye ma'o/_/der sbrang ma dag 'du nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bskrad par bya'o/_/dri mi zhim 
[\[184b.4\]]par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dus dus su bshal bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis bshal nas ma bskams pa dang srog chags dag byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bshal nas bskam par bya'o/_/dge slong gzhan 
[\[184b.5\]]dag cig lud pa bdo nas de dag ji srid du bskams pa de'i bar du nyam nga bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nad pa tshabs po che gang dag yin pa de dag gis ni mchil ma'i snod gnyis nye bar gzhag par bya'o/_/dge slong khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag tu 
[\[184b.6\]]klog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_chags pa de dag mchil ma bro ba dang /_de dag sems yengs shing bab bab du mchil ma 'dor bar byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_brjed phyal bar gnas mal bcas par mchil ma dor bar mi bya'i 
[\[184b.7\]]'on kyang gtsug lag khang gi grwa bzhir ka ba'i drung du dge 'dun gyi mchil ma'i snod bzhi gzhag par bya zhing de dag tu klog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa'am/_'chags pas dran pa nye bar bzhag ste mchil ma dor bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa gang gi ka spun po tshe rabs lnga brgyar sems can dmyal ba dag gi nang nas shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal ba dag gi nang du skyes shing de nas phyir 'dir skyes pa de byis pa'i gnas 
[\[185a.2\]]skabs nas khyim pa/_khyim la lhag par chags pa/_rtse ba'i dga' bas dga' ba dang /_cha ba la brtson pas dmyal ba la dmigs pa'i dran pa ma skyes so/_/de dus gzhan zhig na legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo 
[\[185a.3\]]sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_chos mngon pa'i phyogs de dang de dag tu dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro dang /_lha dang mi dag bshad pa dang /_des dmyal ba'i gtam thos nas sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba mngon du gyur te ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas khrag byung 
[\[185a.4\]]ste/_chos gos dag kyang khra bor gyur/_dri yang mi zhim par gyur to/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong rnams kyis lus phyi ba bcang bar bya'o/_/
[\[185a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis lus phyi ba bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag gis chos gos kyi phyi rol du bgos pas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nang du bgo bar bya'o/_/de dag gis de kho nas lus drud pas ril rma 
[\[185a.6\]]byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de kho nas drud par mi bya'i 'on kyang bska ba'i chus sbangs nas dal bus bags kyis bkru bar bya'o/_/lus phyi ba'i gos kyis rnag dang khrag kyang dus dus su bkru bar bya zhing de yang tshon gyis kha bsgyur bar bya'o/_/
[\[185a.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu gang nas bzung ste rab tu byung tshun chad de rtag tu na'o/_/de'i drung du tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams song ste dris pa/_gnas brtan 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]bde'am/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag na ste mi bde'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_gnas brtan khyod kyis sngon ci zhig bcangs/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lcags kyi gzhong [{]rings so[,]ring ngo [}]/_/gnas brtan gal te de lta na da ci ste mi bcang /_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/
[\[185b.2\]]skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong gis lcags kyi gzhong [{]rings [,]ring [}]bcang bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas 
[\[185b.3\]]sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong dag mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba na de dag gi rkang pa la 'dam rdzab gos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gcal dgram par bya'o/_/de dag gcal ci las 'gram pa mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[185b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_so phag gi gcal dgram par bya zhing de nas so phag gi phye mas btab ste rdo thal gyis byug par bya'o/_/mchod rten gyi 'khor sa chen por gyur te ma 'byor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyen kor 'dom gang dgram par bya'o/_/'on 
[\[185b.5\]]kyang ma 'byor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te mi 'byor na spang leb dgram par bya'o/_/de yang ma 'byor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bar bar tu so phag gzhag par bya'o/_/dge slong sgo gang la rten pa rnams 
[\[185b.6\]]kyi khyams su 'dam rdzab chags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_der yang rim pa de bzhin du bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod 
[\[185b.7\]]na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des dgon par spyil bu byed du bcug ste/_de na dge slong gcig gnas so/_/dgun stod kyi dus la bab pa dang /_de lhags pas nyen nas skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing lus sha bri ngan pa rid pa rmya bar gyur nas de khyim bdag de'i drung du song 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]ste/_khyim bdag shes par gyis shig_/gzhan zhig tu 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa cung zad brel bar ma gyur grang /_des smras pa/_brel ba ni cung zad kyang med mod kyi 'on kyang lhags pas skyo'o/_/des smras pa/_'phags 
[\[186a.2\]]pa bzhugs shig dang /_khyed la nor bu me shel sbyin to/_/des smras pa/_khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[186a.3\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong nor bu me shel nye bar gzhag par bya zhing des me phyung la me'i bya ba bya'o/_/khyim bdag des dge slong de la nor bu me shel byin nas/_de des me 'byin cing me'i bya ba byed do/_/ji 
[\[186a.4\]]tsam na rkun po lnga brgya ri brags shig tu las byed par 'dong ba phyogs der phyin pa dang /_de dag gis dge slong de la smras pa/_'phags pa lhags pas sbrebs na 'di na me yod dam/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]med do/_/'phags pa khyod me'i bya ba ji ltar byed/_
[\[186a.5\]]bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag ni nor bu me shel gyis me phyung nas me'i bya ba byed do/_/'phags pa nor bu de dag ga re/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]phyogs 'di na'o/_/de dag gis de mthong nas ri brags su song ste/_der las byas nas byung ste smras pa/_shes ldan dag tshur 'phags 
[\[186a.6\]]pa de'i nor bu dbrog gis 'dong /_de dag de'i drung du dong nas/_smras pa/_nor bu me shel de ga re bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]phyogs 'di nyid na 'dug go/_/de dag gis de khyer te song ngo /_/yang dge slong de lhags pas nyen nas khyim bdag de'i drung du song ste smras pa/_khyim bdag 
[\[186a.7\]]shes par gyis shig gzhan zhig tu 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]brel bar ma gyur grang /_des smras pa/_khyim bdag brel ba ni [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang med kyi 'on kyang lhags pas skyo'o/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis khyod la nor bu me shel 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]ma byin tam/_khyim bdag byin no/_/de ga re rkun po dag gis phrogs so/_/chen po la 'os pa'i nor bu de lta bu yang khyod kyis rkun po la bkur ba lta/_kye ma khyod kyis phyogs dben pa zhig tu bzhag mod/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[186b.2\]]la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rin po che de lta bu dag ma byin pa len pa rnams la bstan par mi bya'i/_'on kyang me phyung la gtad par bya'o/_/me shel ji lta bar chu shel yang de dang 'dra'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[186b.3\]]mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde rnams btso blag mkhan la chos gos dag 'khrur 'jug go/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na mnyan yod du dus ston byung ste/_mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 
[\[186b.4\]]rnams kyi gos tshon sna tshogs can dag btso blag mkhan la 'khrur bcug go/_/nye dga' yang nyi ma nub kar chos gos ngur smrig gcig khyer te btso blag mkhan gyi drung du song nas/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]chos gos 'di khrus shig ces byas so/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa deng 
[\[186b.5\]]'jig rten pa'i gos mang zhig 'tshal te mchis kyis bzhud cig sang bkru bar bgyi'o/_/de khros nas bsdigs par brtsams pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa bsdigs su ci mchis/_gal te mi bzod na zhog la bzhud cig sad bkru mod des bzhag ste song ba dang /_
[\[186b.6\]]de'i tug rid kyis btso blag mkhan sems g.yengs par gyur nas des chos gos de bul tog gi nang du sbangs nas gos tshon sna tshogs can rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa dang /_der zhag lon nas gos tshon sna tshogs can rnams kyis thams cad khra bor byas so/_/btso blag 
[\[186b.7\]]mkhan lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang /_skye bo'i tshogs ma dad par gyur to/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag ma dad par gyur pa thog tu 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]bab par mkhyen nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]chos gos ngur smrig btso blag mkhan la 'khrur bcug pa 'jig rten pa'i gos tshon sna tshogs can rnams kyis khra bor byas so/_/de lta bas na dge slong gis gos ngur smrig dag btso 
[\[187a.2\]]blag mkhan la 'khrur mi gzhug go/_/dge slong gos ngur smrig dag btso blag mkhan la 'khrur 'jug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gos ngur smrig dag btso blag mkhan la 'khrur mi gzhug go/_/zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug 
[\[187a.3\]]sde rnams kyis gos dkar po dag 'khrur gzhug par brtsams so/_/btso blag mkhan gyis de dag bag med par shing leb la brdabs nas bkrus pa dang /_de na gos kha cig ni ral/_kha cig ni mtha' zegs so/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[187a.4\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis thams cad du btso blag mkhan la gos 'khrur mi gzhug go/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra 
[\[187a.5\]]ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis thams cad kyis thams cad du btso blag mkhan la gos 'khrur mi gzhug go zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams btso blag mkhan gyi 'khru sar dong nas/_mgo chos gos kyis dkris te/_btso blag mkhan 
[\[187a.6\]]bzhin du sngam pa su su zhing bdag nyid gos dag 'khru bar byed pa bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas ma dad par gyur to/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis btso blag 
[\[187a.7\]]mkhan gyi 'khru sar song ste/_btso blag mkhan bzhin du sngam pa su su zhing bdag nyid kyis gos dag bkru bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong btso blag mkhan gyi 'khru sar song ste/_btso blag mkhan bzhin du sngam pa su su zhing bdag nyid kyis gos dag 'khru bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis btso blag mkhan gyi 'khru sar song ste/_btso blag mkhan bzhin du sngam pa su su zhing bdag nyid kyis gos dag 
[\[187b.2\]]bkru bar mi bya'o/_/zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams shing leb la 'khru bar byed de nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shing leb la gos dag bkru bar mi bya'i 'on kyang gzhong khung du chu 'jam tsam gyi nang du dal bus bzlog 
[\[187b.3\]]cing bzlog cing bdag nyid kyis bkru bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhong khung du dal bus bzlog cing bzlog cing bkru bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong gzhan dag cig gis lag pa gnyis kyis bkru bar ma nus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[187b.4\]]stsal pa/_gang dag lag pa gnyis kyis 'khru bar mi nus pa de dag gi rkang pa gnyis kyis bkru bar bya'o/_/gzhan dag cig gi lag pa gnyis kyis kyang ma nus la/_rkang pa gnyis kyis kyang ma nus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gi zhal 
[\[187b.5\]]ta gyis la gzhan dag 'khrur chug shig/_//sdom ni/_phyi ba dang ni sbrul gyi rnyi/_/rdo phru 'gyod pa nyid dang ni/_/tshon gyi gzhong khung rtsig pa dang /_/tshon rtsi rnam pa bzhi yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon 
[\[187b.6\]]med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong rnams khrus byas nas lus gsher bzhin du chos gos dag gyon pa dang /_de dag khra bo dang dri mi zhim par gyur to/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[187b.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis lus phyi ba bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lus phyi ba bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong gzhan dag cig la de mi bdog nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang dag la mi bdog 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]pa de dag gis re zhig tsog tsog por 'dug la khrus ras kyis lus phyis te chos gos dag bgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis lham la rdul chags par gyur nas dge slong dag gis de dag brdabs so/_/de dag brdabs pa dang ral cing gzungs kyi srad bu dag 
[\[188a.2\]]kyang chad nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lham brdabs par mi bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis chus bkrus pa dang /_de dag ma rungs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chus bkru bar mi bya'i 'on kyang ras chus sbangs la phyi bar bya ste/_
[\[188a.3\]]de lta bas na gnang gis lham phyi ba bcang bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul tsam pa na drang srong gar ga'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na bzhugs so/_/yul tsam pa na tsam pa'i klu'i bu mo dad pa can dge ba'i bsam pa bzang ba zhig yod pa de'i bu ma dad pa ma dul ba 
[\[188a.4\]]byed pa zhig go/_/des de chos mnyan pa yang dag par len du bcug ste/_bu song la 'phags pa rnams kyi drung du phyin nas chos nyon cig dang /_khyed la bsod nams su 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang /_de des yang dag par len du bcug pas rang bzhin gyi cha lugs kyis chos 
[\[188a.5\]]nyan par zhugs pa rnams kyi nang du song ngo /_/de gzhon nu zhig gis mthong nas de sngangs te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag rgyab rings po rgyab rings po zhes smras pa dang thos nas dge slong gang dag 'dod chags dang ma bral ba de dag sngangs nas de dag gis de ske nas rnga ma'i srad bus btags 
[\[188a.6\]]te/_gtsug lag khang gi steng nas 'phangs so/_/de mas mthong ste smras pa/_bu khyod kyis 'phags pa rnams las chos thos sam/_des smras pa/_ma de 'dra ba'i 'phags par ni su yang ma gyur cig_/bu de dag gis khyod la ci zhig byas/_des ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang /_
[\[188a.7\]]des smras pa/_bu de bas dang de dag 'phags pa yin no/_/gzhan dag cig gis khyod mthong du zin na bsad par gyur to zhes pa dang /_de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de la ne'u ldangs rnams kyis bzhad gad du mgrin snad mgrin snad ces smras pa dang /_de de dag gis ku re smras 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]pas lus skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing sha bri ngan pa rke ba skem por red par gyur to/_/de la mas smras pa/_bu khyod ci ste lus skya bo bseng bseng por sha bri ngan pa rke ba skem por gyur/_des smras pa/_ma bdag la klu gzhon nu 'di dag mgrin snad mgrin snad ces 
[\[188b.2\]]co 'dri bar byed de ci bya'i gtol med do/_/bu khyod rang gi cha lugs kyis song bas des na gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur gyi gal te khyod sprul pa'i gzugs kyis song bar gyur na rnga ma'i rnyis btags par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/da sprul pa'i gzugs kyis song la chos 
[\[188b.3\]]nyon cig dang khyod la thams cad legs par 'gyur ro/_/'on te rang gi gzugs kyis nyan na khyod gnas na 'dug ste nyon cig ces byas pa dang /_de ma dad pa'i phyir khas ma blangs te ma'i ngor cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/des bsams pa/_'phags pa dag 
[\[188b.4\]]klu gzhon nu rnga ma'i rnyis 'dogs pa ni gang su yang rung /_chos nyan par 'dod pa de dag gi yang bar chad du 'gyur bas 'di kho na bdag gis bya ba yin no snyam ste/_de kha dog 'phags pas nam sros pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 
[\[188b.5\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_de'i tshe tsam pa'i klu'i bu mo'i kha dog gi mthus drang srong gar ga'i rdzing 'gram thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tsam pa'i klu'i bu mos 
[\[188b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gi bu ma dad pa zhig mchis pa de bdag gis chos nyan pa yang dag par len du stsal nas de chos nyan du mchis pa dang /_'phags pa rnams kyis rnga ma'i rnyis ske nas btags te bor bas de'i mgrin pa snad de/_
[\[188b.7\]]de la ne'u ldangs rnams kyis mgrin snad mgrin snad ces gtses lags so/_/de de ltar gtses pa na lus skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing /_sha bri ngan pa rke ba skem par gyur na/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_gang gis na 'phags pa rnams 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]klu gzhon nu rnga ma'i rnyis 'dogs par mi 'gyur bar 'phags pa rnams dran par bgyid pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig bcar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tsam pa'i klu'i bu mo la cang mi gsung bas gnang ba dang /_de nas tsam pa'i klu'i bu mo bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 
[\[189a.2\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[189a.3\]]slong dag mdang tsam pa'i klu'i bu mo nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_de'i tshe tsam pa'i klu'i bu mo'i kha dog gi mthus drang srong gar ga'i rdzing 'gram thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/phyogs 
[\[189a.4\]]gcig tu 'dug nas tsam pa'i klu'i bu mos nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gi bu ma dad pa zhig mchis pa de bdag gis chos nyan pa yang dag par len tu stsal nas de 'phags pa rnams kyi drung du chos nyan du mchis pa dang /_de dag gis de rnga ma'i rnyis btags te 
[\[189a.5\]]bor bas de'i mgrin pa snad nas/_de la ne'u ldangs rnams kyis mgrin snad mgrin snad ces co dri ba smras lags so/_/de la/_de skad ces bgyis pa na lus skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing sha bri ngan pa/_rke ba skem por gyur na kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs 
[\[189a.6\]]te gang gis na 'phags pa rnams klu gzhon nu rnga ma'i rnyis 'dogs par mi 'gyur bar 'phags pa rnams dran par bgyid pa cung zad cig bcar gsol zhes zer ro/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na gang la da ltar lha rnams kyang kye ma shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni dge ba'i chos rnams 
[\[189a.7\]]las yongs su nyams par gyur to zhes 'phya bar 'gyur ba 'di ni mdzes pa ma yin rung ba ma yin gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis klu gzhon nu rnga ma'i rnyis gdags par mi bya'i 'on kyang klu gzhon nu mthong na se gol gyi sgra phyung ste/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mthong ba'i lam na ma 'dug shig ces 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]brjod par bya'o/_/gal te mthong ba'i lam na mi 'dug na de lta na legs/_ji ste 'dug na dbyug gu skam khas dal gyis blangs te bum pa'am rdza mar bcug la de la bu ga btod de kha bcad nas dbyung bar bya'o/_/gal te dbyug gu skam kha med na shur bu'am/_lcags pod 
[\[189b.2\]]dam/_rgya cang gis ske nas btags te dbyung bar bya'o/_/ji ste shur bu'am/_lcags pod dam/_rgya cang med na gdang thag gi rnyi'am/_gres thag gi rnyi la ras mas dkris nas des gdags par bya zhing de nas bum par bcug ste dbyung bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis 
[\[189b.3\]]de de bzhin du phyung nas nags kyi nang du bor ba dang /_de khros pa'i mes nags bsregs te de yang de nyid du tshig pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nags kyi nang du dor bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis snang ba'i gnas su bor ba dang /_skad cig kyang ma thogs 
[\[189b.4\]]par srog chags 'ol bas khyer nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i mod kho na la ldog par mi bya'i 'on kyang snang ba'i gnas su bzhag nas ji srid gnas su ma zhugs pa de srid du bsdad par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka 
[\[189b.5\]]lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa rdo'i las la mkhas pa zhig ste/_rdo phru dag byas shing byas shing 'tshong ngo /_/dus gzhan zhig na de la rnyed pa mang du grub nas des bsams pa/_gang gis na bsod nams su yang 'gyur la rnyed pa 
[\[189b.6\]]yang mang du 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs de gang zhig yin snyam pa dang /_de dad pa can zhig pas de 'di snyam du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du spyan drangs la/_rdo phru dag nas bshos gsol na bdag gi bsod nams su yang 'gyur la/_rnyed pa yang mang du 
[\[189b.7\]]'gyur ro snyam du bsams so/_/de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste zhes bya ba nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag dar te bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas kun tu tshim par byed/_kun tu stobs par byed do/_/rnam grangs du mar rang gi lag dar te bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas kun tu tshim par byas/_kun tu 
[\[190a.2\]]bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol te phyag bcabs lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa de la rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes 
[\[190a.3\]]su yi rang ba mdzad do/_/mchod sbyin nang na sbyin sreg mchog_/bsdebs sbyar nang na skyong byed mchog_/mi yi nang na rgyal po mchog_/chu bo'i nang na rgya mtsho mchog_/skar ma'i nang na zla ba mchog_/gsal ba'i nang na nyi ma mchog_/steng dang 'og dang thad kar yang /_/
[\[190a.4\]]skye bo'i 'gro ba ji snyed pa/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/mchod bya dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te bzhud do zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/des yang sangs rgyas la sogs pa 
[\[190a.5\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du bshos la spyan drangs nas des rgan rims bzhin rdo phru sar pa brims nas spyad spyad pa de dag nyid kyang brim par brtsams pa dang /_dge slong rnams 'gyod de len par mi byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim pas yongs su dag

[\[190a.7\]]gis tshon gsher bar bskol ba dang /_de zho can yin pa'i phyir btsos pa dang mi sdug par gyur cing de dag kyang ma rung nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bskams nas bskol bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis nyi ma la bskams te non chung bar gyur nas/_
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyi ma la bskam par mi bya'o/_/dge slong dag grib ma la skems te rlams khyer nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grib ma la bskam par mi bya'i 'on kyang nyi ma phyed yod pa la bskam par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis tshon

[\[190b.3\]]gsum gyi bar du bskol nas dor bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis lan gsum gyi bar du bskol na gcig kho nar bzhag pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_snod so sor gzhag par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis dang po ni gang yin/_gnyis pa ni gang yin/_

[\[190b.6\]]gis ha cang skam pa la bsugs pas chos gos dag khra bor gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ha cang skam po la bsug par mi bya'i 'on kyang ran tsam la bsug par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams chos gos dag sa la skems par byed de/_de dag rdul gyis dri
