[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]slong dag gis de bzhin du gzar thag la bkal bas bar du tshon ma chags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grwa nas tha gus btags la rgyang shing bres nas gzungs btab ste bskam par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis bsugs nas ma bzlog 
[\[191a.2\]]ste tshon phyogs gcig tu 'dris nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yang dang yang du bzlog par bya'o/_/snam sbyar gzhan dag cig tshad che ste gzar thag la ma shong nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rtswa bting nas bskam par bya zhing yang dang yang 
[\[191a.3\]]du bzlog par bya'o/_/dge slong dag chos gos rnying pa dag la ni tshon sar pa ldugs/_chos gos sar pa dag la ni tshon rnying pa ldugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshon sar pa yang sar pa kho na dag la blug par bya zhing rnying pa yang rnying pa dag la blug 
[\[191a.4\]]par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams chos gos sar pa dag ni grib ma la skems/_rnying pa dag ni nyi ma la skems nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sar pa dag ni nyi ma la bskam par bya zhing /_rnying pa dag ni grib ma la bskam par bya'o/_/dge slong dag dang por 
[\[191a.5\]]ni tshon gsum pa/_de'i 'og tu ni gnyis pa/_de'i 'og tu ni dang po ldugs pas dang po lhag par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dang por dang po dang gnyis pa blug par bya zhing phyis gsum pa blug par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis chu'i nang du ma 
[\[191a.6\]]bsugs pas chos gos dag khra bor gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chu'i nang du bsug par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis de nyid kyi nyin par chu'i nang du bsugs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyi de nyin bsug par 
[\[191a.7\]]bya'o/_/dge slong gzhan dag cig tshon gyi las byed pa na rlung dang char pa byung nas dge slong rnams phyogs gang du bskam zhes chos gos dag phan tshun sbed par byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rlung dang char pa byung na khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]tshon gyi las bya'o/_/
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis rlung dang char pa byung na khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]tshon gyi las bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]tshon gyi las byas pas khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]tshon gyis sbags nye bar sbags shing 'dug pa bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 
[\[191b.2\]]smras pa/_'phags pa khrag 'di ga las bo/_/dge slong dag gis smras pa/_'di khrag ma yin gyi kho bo cag gis phyogs 'dir tshon gyi las byas so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag gis khrag yin no snyam du bsams so/_/skabs de dge slong rnams 
[\[191b.3\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyogs der ba lang gi lci ba 'am 'jim pas byug par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs 
[\[191b.4\]]so/_/gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal byed kyi tshal phul ba na de'i blo skyes pa/_bdag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul na der rtsig pa dag ri 
[\[191b.5\]]mo ma bris pas song la bcom ldan 'das la bdas par gsol te bri'o snyam nas/_de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim 
[\[191b.6\]]bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'dir rtsig pa dag ri mo ma bris te de'i slad du gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na da rtsig pa ri mo bri bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[191b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gnang gis bris shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsig pa ri mo bri bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis tshon sna du'i ri mo bri ba ma shes nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]mgon med zas sbyin la gnang ste/_rtsig pa ri mo bri bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa de tshon sna du zhig gis bri bar bgyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ma shes pa de khyed kyis dris pa legs 
[\[192a.2\]]so legs so/_/tshon sna bzhi po sngon po thams cad dang /_ser po thams cad dang /_dmar po thams cad dang /_dkar po thams cad kyis bri bar bya'o//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po bcu bdun pa/_sdom ni/_mkhar len pa yi spyad dag 
[\[192a.3\]]dang /_/bu ga can gyi khri'u dang ni/_/phyag dang skra rnams bzed pa dang /_/phreng ba khab dang tshar ma'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 
[\[192a.4\]]gnas pa de'i khyim du bsod snyoms pa zhig dus dus su 'ong zhing des de skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag go/_/dus gzhan zhig na de la rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags 
[\[192a.5\]]pa bdag gis rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yang rung ba zhig bgyi'o/_/bsod snyoms pas smras pa/_khyim bdag legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig_/'phags pa ci zhig bgyi/_khyim bdag dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gyis shig_/
[\[192a.6\]]'phags pa bdag la kAr ShA pa Na dag ni mchis na/_'on kyang chos kyi grogs bgyid pa ma mchis so/_/khyim bdag kAr ShA pa Na dag byin cig dang /_khyod kyi chos kyi grogs nga yin no/_/'phags pa legs kyis kAr ShA pa Na 'di re zhes des de la kAr ShA pa Na dag 
[\[192a.7\]]byin no/_/bsod snyoms pa des bsams pa/_'di phyogs bzhi'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi nor yin pas 'di las ji ltar spyad par bya/_bzhag la re zhig gzhan bslang bar bya'o snyam nas des kAr ShA pa Na mdzod du bcug ste bzhag go/_/ji tsam 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag des bsams pa/_'phags pa bdag gi gtsug lag khang byed kyis re zhig song la de na ci dag byed blta'o snyam mo/_/de song ba dang ji tsam na ci yang mi snang nas/_des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gi gtsug lag khang 
[\[192b.2\]]cung zad kyang ma bgyis sam/_bsod snyoms pas smras pa/_re zhig gtsug lag khang gi mkhar len pa'i lag spyad kyang med na cis bya/_'phags pa kye ma kAr ShA pa Na dag gar mchis/_khyim bdag mdzod na 'dug go/_/'phags pa de nyid las mkhar len pa'i 
[\[192b.3\]]lag cha bgyid du stsol cig_/khyim bdag ngas ji ltar phyogs bzhi pa'i nor gyis mkhar len pa'i lag cha byed du gzhug_/'phags pa gtsug lag khang 'di yang phyogs bzhi'i dge slong dag kho na'i slad du bgyid na 'di la ci zhig 'gal/_khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das 
[\[192b.4\]]la zhu'o/_/'phags pa de bzhin mdzod cig_/des gnas skabs de dge slong rnams la bsnyad pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nor de nyid las mkhar len pa'i lag spyad bya ste/_'di la 
[\[192b.5\]]'gyod par mi bya'o/_/bsod snyoms pa de gtsug lag khang byed cing bsod snyoms la yang rgyu ba dang /_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis gtsug lag khang mdzad cing bsod snyoms la yang rgyu'am/_'di nyid las mkhar len pa'i bsod snyoms 
[\[192b.6\]]su mdzod cig dang bdag gis kAr ShA pa Na gzhan dag kyang dbul lo/_/khyim bdag mkhar len pa'i nor las ji ltar bsod snyoms su bya/_'phags pa 'di bdag nyid kyi sems kyis bag yangs su bgyis pas mdzod cig_/'di la 'gal ba ci zhig mchis/_des 
[\[192b.7\]]smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/_/'phags pa de bzhin mdzod cig_/des gnas skabs de dge slong rnams la bsnyad pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mkhar len byed pas mkhar 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]len gyi nor kho na las bsod snyoms yongs su spyad par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhar len pa'i nor kho na las bsod snyoms yongs su spyad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de ha cang ngan pa za nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[193a.2\]]stsal pa/_ha cang ngan pa bza' bar mi bya'o/_/de ha cang bsod pa bza' bar brtsams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ha cang bsod pa bza' bar mi bya'i 'on kyang gtsug lag khang gzhan gyi thad tsam du yongs su spyad par bya'o/_/sangs 
[\[193a.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig 'khru bag na ba de yang dang yang du chab khung sar 'gro bas rmya'o/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[193a.4\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khri'u bu ga can bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khri'u bu ga can bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis khyad par med par khri'u dag la mtshon gyis phug ste bu ga btod pa dang /_bcom 
[\[193a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbas btags pa dang /_'breng bus btags pa gang yin pa de la ni phug nas bu ga gdod par bya'o/_/the gus btags pa gang yin pa de la ni bu ga btod la bcing bar bya'o/_/de bshang ba byed pa na rkub rus na nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[193a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyogs der lo ma'i khres gzhag par bya'o/_/bshang ba sa la lhung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'og tu gyo mo gzhag par bya'o/_/ha cang mthon por 'jog par byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[193a.7\]]ha cang mthon por gzhag par mi bya'o/_/de dri mi zhim par gyur te dge slong dag gis de phyung nas bor te gzhan bzhag pa dang /_de yang dri mi zhim par gyur to/_/de yang bor ba dang gzhan ma rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thams cad dor bar 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]mi bya'i gnyis bcangs la gcig bkrus te bskam par bya zhing cig shos kyang de bzhin du bya'o/_/'on te gnyis su ma rnyed par gyur na de'i steng du lo ma sbrel ba gzhag cing der bshang bar bya ste/_de lta bu gzhan yang gzhag par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[193b.2\]]gyo mo de bkru bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de bkrus kyang dri mi zhim par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_til mar gyis bsku bar bya'o/_/'on kyang dri mi zhim par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yungs mar 
[\[193b.3\]]gyis bsku bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis nad pa la blta bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_de'i drung du nad pa la blta ba'i dge slong rgan po yang 'ong ngo /_/gzhon nu dag kyang 'ong ngo /_/de nas gzhon nu gang dag yin pa de dag ni de phyag 'tshal bar byed/_rgan po 
[\[193b.4\]]gang dag yin pa de dag la ni nad pa de phyag 'tshal bar byed pas de skyo bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'bags pa la phyag mi bya/_'bags pas phyag mi bya/_'bags pas phyag bdag gir mi bya/_'bags pa las phyag bdag 
[\[193b.5\]]gir mi bya'o/_/'bags pa la phyag byed dam/_'bags pas phyag byed dam/_'bags pas phyag bdag gir byed dam/_'bags pa las phyag bdag gir byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor 
[\[193b.6\]]gyis zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bags pa la phyag mi bya/_'bags pas phyag mi bya/_'bags pas bdag gir mi bya/_'bags pa las phyag bdag gir mi bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa/_btsun pa 'bags pa du zhig mchis lags/_nye bar 'khor 
[\[193b.7\]]'bags pa ni gnyis te/_zas kyis 'bags pa dang /_mi gtsang bas 'bags pa'o/_/de la zas kyis 'bags pa ni so shing dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_'bras bu dang /_rtsa ba la sogs pa za bas brel ba'o/_/mi gtsang bas 'bags pa ni 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang /_de dag bkru bar mi gtsang ba'i gnas kyi byi dor bya ba byed pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[194a.2\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bram ze pad ma'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis nam bdag shing rta la 'tshal ba'am/_kha lo sgyur ba'am/_lcag sgreng ba'am/_skad cher smra ba gzigs pa de'i tshe 
[\[194a.3\]]bdag phyag 'tshal bar gau ta ma khyod kyis gzung du gsol/_nam srang na mchis sam/_lham 'bud dam/_shul las byol lam/_sug pa brkyang pa gzigs pa de'i tshe bdag phyag 'tshal bar gau ta ma khyod kyis gzung du gsol/_nam 'khor gyi nang nas 
[\[194a.4\]]mchis sam/_stan las 'phags sam/_gtsug tor dang /_gdugs phog pa de'i tshe bdag phyag 'tshal bar gau ta ma khyod kyis gzung du gsol zhes gsol pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa ci lags 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la de lta bu dag phyag 
[\[194a.5\]]'tshal bar chud dam/_nye ba 'khor phyag byas pa ma yin gyi/_nye ba 'khor de ni gus par smra ba'i tshig tsam du zad kyi lus 'dud pa dang /_tshig tu 'byin pa gang yin pa de ni mchod pa yin no/_nye ba 'khor 'on kyang 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la ni phyag gnyis 
[\[194a.6\]]te/_yan lag lnga pa dang /_byin pa la 'khyud pa'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/dge slong dag chos gos gang dag gyon nas skra dang kha spu 'breg pa byed pa de dag nyid gyon nas zan za bar byed/_de dag nyid dang ston pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa dang /_ma dad pa 
[\[194a.7\]]rnams 'phya bar byed cing shAkya'i bu'i dge slong rnams ni gtsang sbra med pa ste/_chos gos gang dag gyon nas skra dang kha spu 'breg pa de dag nyid gyon nas zan za bar byed cing de dag nyid dang ston pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos gos dag gyon nas skra dang kha spu breg par mi bya'i 'on kyang skra bzed kyi gos bcang bar bya zhing de bgos nas skra breg par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis skra bzed kyi gos bcang bar bya'o zhes 
[\[194b.2\]]gsungs pa dang /_gzhan dag cig la 'byor pa med nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang dag la 'byor pa med pa/_de dag gis rngul gzan gyis lus dkris la skra breg par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis skra dang kha spu bregs nas de bzhin du song ba 
[\[194b.3\]]dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni spu gri'i las byas nas khrus mi byed pas gtsang sbra med pa'o zhes 'phya bar byed do/_/skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[194b.4\]]spu gri'i las byas nas khrus bya'o/_/dge slong gzhan dag cig ni rgas 'khogs shing nyam chung bar gyur/_gzhan dag cig ni na nas khrus kyi sbyor ba mi bzod par gyur/_gzhan dag cig la ni chu'i rnyed pa med nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de 
[\[194b.5\]]dag gis ni yan lag lnga tsam bkru bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis dge slong dag la me tog gi phreng ba 'bul 
[\[194b.6\]]ba dang /_de dag gis ma blangs nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas/_ci bdag cag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu dge ba'i lam rgyags bral te mchi'am/_bzhes shig 
[\[194b.7\]]ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na me tog gi phreng ba len par rjes su gnang ngo /_/de dag gis blangs te de dag nyid kyi mdun du bor ba 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]dang /_de dag 'phya zhing 'phags pa bdag cag gis ri ba'i rin gyis nyos pa yin na ci khyed kyis blangs te dor ram zhes zer nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dor bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten 
[\[195a.2\]]dag la btags pa dang de dag gis smras pa/_ci 'phags pa bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang /_sen mo'i mchod rten ma mthong snyam mam/_bdag cag gis khyed la byin pa lags kyi bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i 
[\[195a.3\]]mchod rten dag la ni dang po nyid du phul lo/_/dge slong rnams kyis blangs nas gnas khang gi sgor bzhag pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can gyis mthong nas dri gtsang khang yin no snyam ste phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas khang gi sgor 
[\[195a.4\]]gzhag par mi bya'i nang du gzhag par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis sgo'i drang thad du bzhag pas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dri zhim po thams cad mig la phan pas phyogs dben par gzhag cing bsnam par bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[195a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis gnas dben par gzhag cing bsnam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis ji ltar gzhag pa mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sngas logs su khab bam tsher ma btab la 'phyang du gzhug par bya'o//_//sdom ni/_
[\[195a.6\]]stan bzang dang ni rgyab rten dang /_/dris bsku lhung bzed bu ga dang /_/'bru mar snod ni gsum dag dang /_/gtur thag dang ni khron pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/
[\[195a.7\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge 'dun la ni 'byor na stan bzang po gnang gi gang zag la ni mi gnang ngo /_/dge 'dun la ni 'byor na rgyab rten gnang gi gang zag la ni mi gnang ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis dge slong rnams la dri phul ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis ma blangs nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa gang gi tshe sangs 
[\[195b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dri blang bar bya'o/_/zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de rnams kyis blangs nas de dag nyid kyi mdun du bor ba dang /_de dag gis 
[\[195b.3\]]'phags pa dag bdag cag gis ri ba'i rin gyis nyos pa yin na khyed kyis blangs te dor ram zhes 'phya bar byed do/_/skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dor bar mi bya'o/_/de dag gis 
[\[195b.4\]]dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la phul ba dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag ci bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten ma mthong ngam/_bdag cag gis khyed la phul gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod 
[\[195b.5\]]rten la ni bdag cag gis dang po nyid du phul lags so/_/dge slong dag gis blangs nas gnas khang gi sgor bzhag pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis mthong nas dri gtsang khang yin no snyam ste zhabs la gtugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[195b.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_gnas khang gi sgor mi gzhag gi/_'on kyang nang du gzhag par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis sgo'i drang thad du bzhag nas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgo'i drang thad du gzhag par mi bya'i 'on kyang dri zhim 
[\[195b.7\]]po thams cad ni mig la phan pas sngas kyi thad kar dri'i lag ris bya zhing de nas dus dus su bsnam par bya'o/_/gzhan dad pa can dag gis dge slong dag khyim du spyan drangs te mchod ston gsol nas de rnams de dag gi rkang pa la dri'i lag ris skud pa dang /_dge slong 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]dag gis ma blangs nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa gang dag bram ze la mngon par dad pa de dag gis de dag la dang por dri dang phreng ba dag phul na de dag gis blangs te/_mgo dang lus la nye bar sbyor bar bgyid na bdag cag gis ni khyed la mngon par dad de 
[\[196a.2\]]zhabs dag la 'bul ba 'gal ba ci zhig mchis bzhes su gsol/_skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rkang pa dag la 'bul ba bdag gir bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis blangs te de dag nyid kyi 
[\[196a.3\]]mdun du bor ba dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_e ma 'phags pa khyed cag gtsug lag khang du gshegs te ci bder mdzod cig_/ji ltar bdag cag dad pa skyes pa de ltar ma dad pa'ang skyes so/_/skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_
[\[196a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag nyid kyi mdun du dor bar mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong dag lhung bzed bab chol du 'jog par 
[\[196a.5\]]byed pas de dag ma rung bar gyur nas/_skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lhung bzed bab chol du gzhag par mi bya'i/_'on kyang lhung bzed bzhag pa'i bu ga byas la der gzhag par 
[\[196a.6\]]bya'o/_/dge slong dag rtsig pa rko bar byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rtsig pa brko bar mi bya'i 'on kyang gang gi tshe/_gtsug lag khang rtsig pa de kho na'i tshe lhung bzed kyi bu ga bya ste/_de bzhin du 'khor gyi khang pa la'ang bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[196a.7\]]kyis lhung bzed gzhag pa'i bu gar lhung bzed gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dgon pa pa dag lhung bzed gzhag pa'i bu ga med nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gis lcug ma 'am/_srad bu'i skon bu byas te de la ba lang gi 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]lci ba'am/_'jim pas bskus la der gzhag par bya'o/_/rdul gyis khyer nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de la de dang 'dra ba'i kha gab bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis de sa la bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sa la mi gzhag gi 
[\[196b.2\]]'on kyang gdang thag gam/_shing gi yal ga la dpyang du gzhug par bya'o/_/de dag gang gi tshe ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba de'i tshe de khyer zhing dong nas ma dad pa dag 'phags pa ci 'dir khyim bya 'am spre'u khyer zhes 'phya bar byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[196b.3\]]pa/_gar 'gro dgur skon bu khyer te/_'gro bar mi bya'i 'on kyang gang du 'gro ba der gzhan zhig gzhag par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig ljongs 
[\[196b.4\]]rgyu zhing ri brags shig tu phyin te/_des khyim zhig tu gnas brnyas nas rkang pa bkrus te 'bru mar bslang bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na bud med cig gis til mar khyer te 'ongs nas dge slong des lag pa brkyang ba dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa 
[\[196b.5\]]slong bar mdzad la snod mi mnga' ba de ga la gda'/_e ma'o khyod kyis 'bru mar gyi snod bcang 'dad cig_/des smras pa/_sring mo bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol 
[\[196b.6\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis 'bru mar gyi snod bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bru mar gyi snod bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nye dga'i dge tshul gnyis 'bru mar gyi 'brag 
[\[196b.7\]]khyer te 'bru mar gyi bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_bud med cig gis 'bru mar khyer te 'ongs pa dang /_ji tsam na dge tshul gnyis shig 'bru mar gyi 'brag thogs pa mthong nas des brang brdungs te smras pa/_'phags pa khyed kyi 'di su zhig gis 'gengs 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]par byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_bkren pa mo khyod kyis re zhig ci byin pa de lugs shig_/lhag ma lta bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag 'gengs so/_/de cang mi zer bar gyur nas skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis 
[\[197a.2\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis 'bru mar gyi snod ha cang chen po bcang bar mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis 'bru mar gyi snod ha cang chen po bcang bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_de 
[\[197a.3\]]dag gis ha cang chung ngu bcangs pas des dgos pa mi chog nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ha cang chung ngu yang mi bcang gi 'on kyang 'bru mar gyi snod ni gsum ste/_chen po dang /_'bring dang /_chung ngu'o/_/de la chen po ni phul gang ba'o/_/
[\[197a.4\]]chung ngu ni phul phyed pa'o/_/de dag gi bar ni 'bring ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong rgan po dang gsar bu zhig dang gnyis lam du zhugs 
[\[197a.5\]]te dong ba dang /_de dag gtam bzang po ma yin pa zer zhing 'gro ba ji tsam na gnod sbyin ma dad pa zhig gis thos nas des bsams pa/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di gnyis gtam bzang po ma yin pa zer zhing 'dong bas 'di dag gi mdangs dbrog par bya'o snyam 
[\[197a.6\]]bsams te/_de de gnyis kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo /_/yang bsams pa/_gang 'das pa de ni 'das su zad/_gal te da gtam bzang po ma yin pa dag zer na nges par mdangs dbrog par bya'o snyam mo/_/de de ltar sems shing de dag gi phyi bzhin 'brang 
[\[197a.7\]]ba las gnod sbyin dad pa can gzhan zhig phyogs der 'ongs te/_des de la grogs po gar 'gro zhes dris pa dang /_des ji ltar gyur pa de la smras so/_/des smras pa/_grogs po dge slong 'di dag ni dka' thub dang ldan pas gor ma chag 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]par chos kyi gtam zer zhing 'dong ngo /_/khyod la dge slong dag gis ci zhig byas/_'dug cig dang /_bdag cag phan tshun yang dag par dga' ba'i gtam dag bya zhing 'dong ngo /_/des smras pa/_grogs po bdag gis 'di gnyis nges par mi gtang gis tshur shog 
[\[197b.2\]]'dong ngo /_/des de dus kyis 'chu bar shes nas de dang lhan cig tu de gnyis kyi phyi bzhin du 'brangs pa dang /_dge slong de gnyis gtam bzang po ma yin pa kho na zer zhing 'dong ba las ji tsam na lam gnyis su gyur nas/_dge slong de gnyis las kyang gcig ni rgyal 
[\[197b.3\]]byed kyi tshal du 'gro'o/_/gcig ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma'i khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]'gro'o/_/de gnyis las gsar bu gang yin pa des rgan po la phyag byas te/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa bdag ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma'i khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]mchi yis khyod bag 
[\[197b.4\]]yod par mdzod la nad med par gshegs shig ces smras nas de song ba dang /_gnod sbyin ma dad pa de skra gyen du bslang ste mdangs dbrog ces byas pa dang /_gnod sbyin dad pa can des smras pa/_grogs po gzu lums ma byed cig_/'di gnyis kyis 
[\[197b.5\]]chos bshad de/_gang nad med par gyur cig ces smras pa nad med pa de ni rnyed pa'i mchog yin la/_gang bag yod par byos shig ces zer ba bag yod pa ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /_bag yod 'chi med gnas yin 
[\[197b.6\]]te/_/bag med pa ni 'chi ba'i gnas/_/bag yod 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/_/bag med rtag tu 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so zhes des de slar bzlog go/_/gnod sbyin dad pa can de 'di snyam du 'di kho na bdag gis bya ba yin no snyam bsams nas/_
[\[197b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa/_mi ma lags pa/_gnod sbyin gtum po rtag tu gnas shing mchis lags so/_/btsun pa mngon par dad pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni nyung zad cig mchis lags te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[198a.2\]]kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa/_mi ma lags pa/_gnod sbyin gtum po/_/rtag tu gnas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa'i gnod sbyin gtum po rtag tu gnas pa ni ches mang lags la/_btsun pa 'phags pa 'di dag ni 
[\[198a.3\]]gtam bzang po ma lags pa mchi zhing shul du zhugs te mchi na/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis brtse bar dgongs te/_gang gis na 'phags pa dag gtam bzang po ma lags pa mchi zhing shul du zhugs te mchi bar mi 'gyur bar 'phags pa rnams dran par 
[\[198a.4\]]bgyid pa cung zad cig bcar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin de la cang mi gsung bas gnang nas/_de nas gnod sbyin de bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom 
[\[198a.5\]]ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin de song ste ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' 
[\[198a.6\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngas gnod sbyin zhig las dge slong dag gtam bzang po ma yin pa zer zhing lam du zhugs te 'dong ba la gnod sbyin ma dad pa dag skabs tshol zhing glags lta zhes thos so/_/dge slong dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la 
[\[198a.7\]]rab tu byung ba rnams 'di lta ste/_gtam bzang po ma yin pa zer ba de ni mdzes pa ma yin zhing 'tsham pa ma yin no/_/de lta bas na ngas dge slong lam du 'jug pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/_lam du 'jug pa'i dge slong gis chos 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]kyi gtam dang /_'phags pa'i mi smra ba dang rnam pa gnyis kyis lam du zhugs nas 'gro'o/_/ngal bso ba'i gnas kyi phyogs su gtsug lag gi tshigs su bcad pa gdon par bya'o/_/chu chu ba na chu de gang gi yin pa dang /_de'i lha la tshigs su bcad 
[\[198b.2\]]pa gdon par bya'o/_/gang du gnas 'cha' ba der rgyud chags gsum pa gdon par bya'o/_/lam du zhugs pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs 
[\[198b.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong dag gis chos gos zin pa/_chos gos mthar phyin pa tshon sar pa can dag phrag pa la bkal te lam du zhugs pa dang /_
[\[198b.4\]]de dag rdul dang rdul gyis ma rung bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gtur bu byas la der bcug ste bkur bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gos dag gtur bur bcug ste bkur bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag 
[\[198b.5\]]gis chos gos kyi gtur bu ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ras gang chur ni khru gsum zheng du ni khru phyed dang do pa de gnyis su bltab la drub par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis mtha' mar kha btod pas glang po che'i sna 
[\[198b.6\]]ltar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mthar kha mi gdod kyi 'on kyang dbus su gdod par bya'o/_/de dag gis kha thag ma btags pas de bzhin du rdul zhugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_srad bus dra ba lta bu 
[\[198b.7\]]byas la de nas srad bu gzhan gyis brgyu bar bya'o/_/de dag gis chos gos gang dag bgo ba de dag ni 'og tu bzhag_/gzhan ni steng du phyung ba dang /_de dag gtur bu yang dang yang du 'byed pa na 'chol bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]pa/_gang dag bgo ba de dag ni steng du bzhag la/_lhag ma dag ni 'og tu gzhag par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe 
[\[199a.2\]]mi rgod dag gis 'gron pa bcom nas phan tshun khus 'debs shing bros pa dang /_so so'i grong na gnas pa dag khyim nas lhags te mi rgod dag btags rab tu btags nas/_mgon med cing skom pas gdungs te/_gcig nas gcig tu chu btsal ba'i 
[\[199a.3\]]phyir rmed cing khron pa zhig tu phyin pa dang /_rkun po'i sde dpon gyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'dir chu snod dang /_thag pa dag ltos shig_/bltas na thag pa yang med/_chu snod kyang med do/_/sde dpon gyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te 'gron pa 'ga' 
[\[199a.4\]]zhig 'ong na de la thag pa dang /_chu snod brnyas/_shing la 'dzegs te ltos shig_/de dag gis shing la 'dzegs te blta bar brtsams na/_ji tsam na thag ring ba zhig nas dge slong dag cig 'ong ba mthong ste/_de dag gis smras pa/_sde dpon shAkya'i bu 
[\[199a.5\]]mang zhig 'ong ngo /_/des smras pa/_shes ldan de dag ni mkhas pa yin pas gdon mi za bar de dag la gdang thag dang /_chu snod yod do/_/de dag gis smras pa/_sde dpon gal te de dag la yod na de lta na legs/_ji ste med na de dag gi lto dral te khrag 
[\[199a.6\]]btung bar bya'o/_/de dag gis de ltar gros byas te bsdad pa dang /_dge slong dag kyang lhags so/_/mi rgod dag gis dris pa/_'phags pa bdag skom na khyod la gdang thag dang /_chu snod yod dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]med do/_/mi 
[\[199a.7\]]rgod dag 'khrugs par gyur te mtshon cha la nom pa dang /_de na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dgra bcom pa zhig gis ci'i phyir 'di dag 'khrugs shing mtshon cha la nom zhes bsam pa la zhugs pa dang /_dge slong dag gsad par 'dod par mthong nas/_des 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed ci'i phyir 'khrugs par gyur/_de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa smras so/_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag thabs yod kyis tha mal par 'dug la chu 'thung shig_/de dag tha mal par 'dug pa dang /_dge slong dag 
[\[199b.2\]]gis lhas ma dang /_lcag phod dang /_rgya cang dag mthud de lhung bzed khron par dpyang la btang nas de nas chu bcus te btags so/_/btags nas mi rgod thams cad ngoms par byas pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag gal te khyed kyis bdag 
[\[199b.3\]]cag la chu ma stsal bar gyur na bdag cag gis khyed thams cad bsad par gyur to/_/e ma khyed gdang thag 'chang bar mdzod cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag de bzhin bya'o/_/mi rgod dag gis phyag byas te dong ngo /_/dge slong dag 
[\[199b.4\]]gis kyang ji tsam ngoms pa chu 'thungs nas ril ba dang /_bya ma bum dag bkang ste dong nas de rim gyis mnyan yod du lhags so/_/dge slong dag gis 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i kun du spyod pas kun tu spyad nas tshe dang ldan pa dag ci bde bar spyad dam/_
[\[199b.5\]]zhes dris pa dang /_de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa smras so/_/skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong dag gis gdang thag bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[199b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis gdang thag bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis shin tu ring po dag 'chang nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shin tu ring po yang bcang bar mi bya'o/_/de dag shin tu thung ngu dag bcangs 
[\[199b.7\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shin tu thung ngu yang bcang bar mi bya'o/_/'on kyang gdang thag gsum bcang bar bya ste/_ring po dang /_'bring dang /_thung ngu'o/_/ring po ni khru brgya lnga bcu'o/_/thung ngu ni khru brgya'o/_/de dag gi bar ni 'bring ngo /_/
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gdang thag gsum bcang bar bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong rnams 'chang bar gyur te/_yul gzhan zhig na chu mod pa der yang dge slong dag gdang thag khyer te 'dong nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[200a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_gdang thag ni yul rnams dang sbyar zhing bcang bar bya'o//_//sdom ni/_spu gri bdar dang sen gri dang /_/smang tsher dang ni sngas shing dang /_/bad tsha'i rigs la 'jim pa ni/_/dri yis yongs su bsgos pa'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[200a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig gi skra ring po ring por gyur te/_de 'breg mkhan gyi gan du song nas bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag gi skra regs shig_/des bsams pa/_
[\[200a.4\]]shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni nan che ste rngan pa med par las byed du 'jug pas gal te 'di'i skra bregs nas thos pa dang /_gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur bas dus ring du bsgyangs te bzhag pa dang /_'di rang gi blos ldog go snyam nas des dus btab 
[\[200a.5\]]pa/_'phags pa gshegs la sang gnangs snga dro'am/_slad gro'am/_gdugs kyi gung zhig la spyon cig_/de des bslus pas yang dang yang du 'gro'o/_/de la dge slong mdza' bshes shig yod pa des de yang dang yang du 'gro ba mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[200a.6\]]ldan pa khyod ci'i phyir 'dir yang dang yang du 'gro/_/ci 'di gnyen gyi khyim mam/_rigs kyi khyim yin/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa de ni gnyen gyi khyim dang /_rigs kyi khyim yang ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang bdag gi skra ring po ring por gyur nas bdag gis 'breg 
[\[200a.7\]]mkhan de la 'di skad du/_bdag gi skra ring po ring po regs shig dang /_khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang /_des dus btab ste ma bregs so/_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa bzo bo la bden par smra ba dkon no zhes khyod kyis ma thos sam/_kho 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]bo ni skra 'breg kyang mkhas na bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/des skabs de dge slong dag la bsnyad pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong gang zhig 
[\[200b.2\]]shes pa des phyogs dben par skra breg par bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gang zhig mkhas pa des phyogs dben par skra breg par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dge slong de'i drung du song nas tshe dang ldan pa bcom 
[\[200b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis gnang gis skra regs shig des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba ni legs na de ci mdzub mos breg par bya'am/_'di la spu gri dang /_bdar dang /_sen gri dang /_smang tsher dag kyang dgos so/_/des skabs de dge slong dag 
[\[200b.4\]]la smras nas/_dge slong dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dge 'dun gyi phyir spu gri'i lag cha bcang bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun 
[\[200b.5\]]dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya'i rigs las re re rab tu phyung ba na de dag rab tu gzhon pa'i rang bzhin can yin pas de dag sngas shing med par khas bub tu nyal nas gnyid log go/_/de dag de bzhin du 
[\[200b.6\]]gnyig log pas khams ma snyoms te drod chung bar gyur nas de dag sman pa'i drung du song ste smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag cag drod chung bar gyur na sman ston cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa bzhud cig dang khyed cag ci 'dra bar nyal zhing 'dug pa ltar 'dong ngo /_/
[\[200b.7\]]de song ba dang /_ji tsam na sngas shing med par khas bub tu nyal ba mthong nas des smras pa/_'phags pa khyed cag khas bub tu nyal bas de'i phyir khyed khams ma snyoms la drod chung bar gyur gyis sngas shing chug la nyol cig_/des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]kyis ma gnang ngo /_/des smras pa/_'phags pa khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang 
[\[201a.2\]]gis sngas shing btsugs te nyal bar bya'o/_/de dag sngas shing btsugs te nyal na 'on kyang sos par ma gyur nas de dag gis yang sman pa la smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa sngas nang tshangs can bcug ste nyal bar bya'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom 
[\[201a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/'phags pa khyed kyi ston pa thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong gis sngas 
[\[201a.4\]]nang tshangs can bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sngas nang tshangs can bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis ci 'dra ba zhig bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ras de ni srid du khru bzhi zheng du khru dor byas la 
[\[201a.5\]]drub ste/_de nas shing bal gyis bkang la sngas su gzhug par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu rab tu byung tshun cad ces bya ba nas/_gnas brtan khyod kyis 
[\[201a.6\]]ci bcangs zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dris bsgos pa'i 'jim pa dag bcangs so/_/gnas brtan da ci'i phyir mi bcang /_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis 
[\[201a.7\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong nad pas dris bsgos pa'i 'jim pa bcang bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi las sgo gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//bsdus pa'i sdom ni/_gnas 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]brtan rab lhan pa dang /_/nad pa dang ni rigs ngan phag_/ri mo lhung bzed med pa dang /_/gnas bca' ba dang shing bskyed pa'o/_/sdom ni/_gnas brtan re mos gzhan dang ni/_/gso sbyong mtshams ni sbyar ba dang /_/btung ba rnams gnyis ldan pa 
[\[201b.2\]]dang /_gtsug lag khang ni dus kun pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing gso sbyong gi tshe kha ton gdon par bya'o 
[\[201b.3\]]zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis gang gis kha ton gdon par bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis kha ton gdon par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan 
[\[201b.4\]]gyis kha ton gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan zla ba phyed phyed cing gso sbyong gi tshe kha ton 'don par zhugs so/_/re zhig cig na gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig na gnas brtan zhig 'dug pa de kha ton 'don mi nus pa dang /_de 
[\[201b.5\]]la dge slong dag gis smras pa/_gnas brtan gso sbyong nye bar gnas na ci mi sems par 'dug gam/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis mi nus na ji ltar bya/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[201b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis mi nus na gnas brtan gnyis pas kha ton gdon par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan gnyis pas kha ton gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_re zhig na gtsug 
[\[201b.7\]]lag khang gzhan zhig na gnas brtan gnyis pas kyang ma nus nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te gnas brtan gnyis pas kyang ma nus na gnas brtan gsum pas kha ton 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]gdon par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan gsum pas kha ton gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_re zhig cig na gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig na gnas brtan gsum pas kyang ma nus nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[202a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te gnas brtan gsum pas kyang ma nus na dge slong rnams kyis res su bklags te kha ton gdon par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis res su 
[\[202a.3\]]bklags te kha ton gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong rnams res su bklags te kha ton gdon par brtsams pa dang /_res su bklags te kha ton gdon pa de dag las kha cig ni nus pa la res bab/_kha cig ni mi nus pa la res bab 
[\[202a.4\]]nas/_de la nus pa gang yin pa des ni res bab pa na zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed/_mi nus pa gang yin pa de ni res bab pa na mi shes na ji ltar bya zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[202a.5\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_des kyang nus pa gang yin pa de la bcol bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mi nus pa la res bab pa gang yin pa des kyang gzhan la bcol bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_re zhig cig 
[\[202a.6\]]na gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig na mi nus pa la res bab pa des gang la bcol ba de ma btub nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nus pa gzhan gang yin pa de kho na la 
[\[202a.7\]]rtag tu bcol bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon par bya'o/_/de med na gnas brtan gnyis pas so/_/de yang med na gsum pas so/_/de yang med na res su bklags 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]te kha ton gdon par bya ba'am/_gzhan nus pa gang yin pa de la bcol bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig na so sor thar pa'i mdo bstan pa ril thon pa ni 'ga' yang med kyi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis phas pham par gyur 
[\[202b.2\]]pa'i chos bzhi bton te/_lhag ma mthon nas dge slong dag gis gso sbyong bzhag go/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gso sbyong gzhag par mi bya'i 'on kyang gang 
[\[202b.3\]]gis gang thon pa des de gdon par bya ste/_gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis phas pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi thon na de dag gdon par bya zhing gzhan gyis dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum gzhan gyis ma nges pa'i chos gnyis/_gzhan gyis 
[\[202b.4\]]spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum bcu/_gzhan gyis ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu/_gzhan gyis so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi/_gzhan gyis bslab pa mang po'i chos rnams gzhan gyis rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bdun te/_de ltar gso sbyong gi 
[\[202b.5\]]mtshams sbyar na gso sbyong gi bar chad du 'gyur bar nga mi smra'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa dus su rung ba'i btung ba zhes kyang bka' stsal/_dus ma lags par rung 
[\[202b.6\]]ba zhes kyang bka' stsal na/_btsun pa dus su rung ba ni gang lags/_dus ma lags par rung ba ni gang lags/_nye ba 'khor ma btsags pa ni dus su rung ba'o/_/btsags te chu dang bsres pa ni dus ma yin par rung ba'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/
[\[202b.7\]]drug sde rnams sdig pa 'dod pa/_ser snas mi rigs par gtsug lag khang la yongs su spyod par byed de kha cig la ni dus thams cad pas kha cig la ni gnas res su gcod pas/_kha cig la ni dus re zhig pas/_kha cig la ni rting gnon pas yongs su 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]spyod par byed do/_/ji ltar dus thams cad pas yin zhe na/_'di ni bdag gi dgun gyi gtsug lag khang ngo /_/'di ni dpyid kyi'o/_/'di ni dbyar gyi'o zhes bya ba ste/_de ltar na dus thams cad pas yin no/_/ji ltar na gnas res su gcod 
[\[203a.2\]]pas yin zhe na/_'di ni bdag gi sang gi gtsug lag khang ngo /_/'di ni gnangs kyi'o/_/'di ni gzhes kyi'o zhes bya ba ste/_de ltar gnas res su gcod pas yin no/_/ji ltar na dus re zhig pas yin zhe na/_'dir ni snga dro gnas so/_/'dir ni phyi 
[\[203a.3\]]dro'o zhes bya ba ste/_de ltar na dus re zhig pas yin no/_/ji ltar na rting gnon pas yin zhe na/_'di ni bdag gi slob dpon gyi gtsug lag khang ngo /_/'di ni mkhan po dang /_lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dang /_gtam 'dres pa dang /_phebs par 
[\[203a.4\]]smra ba'i 'o zhes bya ba ste/_de ltar na rting gnon pas yin no/_/yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dag lhags pa dang phongs par gyur nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_

[\[203a.6\]]shing thags dang /_/lam dang 'obs dang skar rgyal dang /_/chos gos bcags shing phyis pa dang /_/cha ga dang ni bram ze'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang 
[\[203a.7\]]gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba de'i tshe 'jig rten dag rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi nang du dga' mgur 'gro zhing 'ong nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bsams pa/_bdag gi 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]gtsug lag khang lam po cher gyur gyis de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis ra bas bskor ro snyam du bsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te

[\[203b.3\]]bdag gis 'di ra bas bskor bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag de lta bas na gnang gis skor cig_/des ra bas bskor ba dang /_gang gi tshe dbyar gyi dus la bab pa'i tshe rgyal byed kyi tshal chus sbyang bzhin gang ste 'dug go/_/
[\[203b.4\]]ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du song ba dang /_des rgyal byed kyi tshal chus sbyang bzhin du gang ba mthong nas/_des bsams pa bdag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal ra bas bskor gyi stor khung ma btod pas des na 
[\[203b.5\]]'di chus sbyang bzhin du gang ste 'dug go/_/de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na stor khung gdod do snyam du bsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal ra bas bskor gyi stor khung ma btod pas 
[\[203b.6\]]des na 'di chab kyis sbyang bzhin bltam ste mchis so/_/de'i slad du gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis stor khung gdod par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag de lta bas na gnang gis thod cig_/des stor khung btod do/_/

[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]'ongs nas 'di la lus kyis bsnyogs shing rwas brud do/_/de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis 'di shing thags kyis bskor bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi

[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]gis 'obs kyis skor cig_/des 'obs kyis bskor to/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/mnyan yod na dge slong ma skar rgyal zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa de skra ring po ring por gyur nas de 'breg mkhan gyi drung du song ste/_bu skra regs shig_/khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur 
[\[204b.2\]]ro zhes byas pa dang /_des bsams pa/_ji ltar shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag nan che ba de ltar 'di dag kyang rngan pa med par las byed du 'jug ste/_gal te 'di'i skra bregs na gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur bas dus ring du bshol te bzhag pa dang /_'di rang gi blos

[\[205a.1\]]'phags ma bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang gis tshur spyon skra regs shig_/des smras pa/_'phags ma gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na legs na/_de ci'i sor mos breg gam/_'di la spu gri dang /_bdar dang /_sen gri dang /_smang tsher

[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]gis chos gos bcags shing rab tu bcags pa dag bcang bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la chos gos bcags shing rab tu bcags pa dag 'bul ba na dge slong rnams kyis ma blangs nas/_de dag gis

[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]sbyong gau ta ma bcom ldan 'das kyang bgo bsha' byed pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin la/_de'i nyan thos rnams kyang bgo bsha' byed pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pas/_nyis na mu stegs can dag rung gi dge sbyong mgo reg de dag ni ma yin no zhes zer ro/_/

[\[206a.3\]]khyed kyis mngon sum du gyur par bya'o/_/de dag gis smras pa legs te/_de bzhin du gyis shig dang blta'o/_/des ras yug cig khyer nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/_des ras yug de rgan pa'i mtha' logs su bzhag nas/_phyogs bzhi'i dge slong

[\[206a.5\]]dang /_sems kyi yo byad dang /_rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /_don gyi mchog thob pa dang /_lha dang mi'i gos dag thob par gyur cig ces byas pa dang /_des bcos mar mgos phyag byas nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'

[\[206a.7\]]ni chos gos kyi sgro gur gyis shig ces bsgo shig_/btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas ras yug 'o ni bram zes glags btsal ba'i 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]phyir phul gyis/_de lta bas na khyed kyis mnyam par bgos la/_la las ni cha gar thob shig_/la las ni sgrog gzungs su/_la las lhan par/_la las ni chos gos kyi sgro gur gyis shig ces de skad bka' stsal to/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_btsun pa kun 
[\[206b.2\]]dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes de rnams kyis de mnyam par gses/_de bzhin du bgos so/_/ji tsam na bram ze nang par sngar langs nas mnyan yod kyi sgo na 'dug go/_/dge slong dag kyang snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung 
[\[206b.3\]]bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'jug par brtsams pa dang /_bram ze des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis dge 'dun la ras phul ba gang lags pa de khyed kyis cir bgyis/_de na dge slong gcig cig gis smras pa/_bram ze chen

[\[206b.6\]]ni bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can yin pas 'di dag kho na'i nang du rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas/_de dad pa skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[206b.7\]]gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob na bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bram ze 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis sems bskyed pa ni bzang ste/_rab tu 'byung ba ni mchog go/_/phan yon lnga mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs te/_lnga gang zhe na/_bdag gis rang gi don ma 'dres pa thob par 
[\[207a.2\]]'gyur ro zhes bya bar mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs so/_/bdag gang dag gi bran dang mngag gzhug pa dang /_bsgo ba bzhin byed pa dang /_rang dbang med pa dang /_dga' mgur byed pa de dag gi yang mchod par bya ba dang /_bsngags 
[\[207a.3\]]par bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs so/_/grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs so/_/bdag grub 
[\[207a.4\]]pa dang bde ba bla na med pa mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa las nyams kyang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs so/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dam pa yang dag par 
[\[207a.5\]]zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis rab tu byung ba rnam grangs du mar bsngags so zhes bya bar mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs so/_/de lta bas na legs kyis rab tu byung shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur 
[\[207a.6\]]shog zhes bya bas rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas gdams ngag gnang ba dang /_des 'bad brtsal bsgrims pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa ltung ba dang 'gyes pa 
[\[207a.7\]]dang /_'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis 'joms par rtogs te nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba/_sems bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]lag mthil du mnyam pa/_ste'u dang tsan dan du mtshungs pa/_rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral ba/_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang du bcas 
[\[207b.2\]]pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang rjed pa dang gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag tshod zin pa la phan yon 'di dang /_gzhan dag kyang yod do/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na zas kyi rnyed pa 
[\[207b.3\]]zhig byung na/_'u su'i lo ma tsam du yang mnyam par byas te bgo bar bya'o/_/gos kyi rnyed pa zhig byung na mar me'i snying po tsam du yang mnyam par byas te bgo bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi 
[\[207b.4\]]kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na bram ze gtsang sbra 'dod pa zhig rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa des bsams pa/_gang zhig gi gtsang sbras bdag gi sems rangs pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas des mu stegs can gyi gnas de dag 
[\[207b.5\]]byul na/_de dag gis gtsang sbras de'i sems ma rangs so/_/des bsams pa/_bdag gis mu stegs can thams cad bgams na gang gis kyang bdag gi sems ma rangs kyis/_da ni shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag lus pas song ste de dag bgam par bya'o snyam nas de rgyal 
[\[207b.6\]]byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ril ba thogs te phyi rol du chab khung sar chas pa mthong nas des bsams pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog 'di yin pas re zhig 'di kho na gtsang sbra ji ltar byed pa blta'o snyam mo/_/de de'i phyi bzhin 
[\[207b.7\]]'brang zhing song ba dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams ni ma bsams par ye shes mthong ba mi 'jug pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems pa la zhugs te/_bram ze 'di ci'i phyir bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang snyam na ji tsam na gtsang sbra 'dod par mthong ngo /_/yang bsam pa la zhugs 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]te/_ci 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba 'ga' zhig yod dam 'on te med snyam na yod par mthong ngo /_/su la rag las snyam na bdag kho na la yin par mthong ngo /_/des bsams nas/_lham phud/_chos gos dag bzhag ste/_de nas phyogs gcig tu sa phung bu 
[\[208a.2\]]bdun bzhag_/gzhan zhig tu bdun/_gzhan zhig tu yang sa'i phung bu gnyis bzhag go/_/de nas sa phung bu gsum zhig khyer nas ci nas bram ze des mthong ba de ltar bshang ba bya bar brtsams so/_/de nas bshang sa zin nas sa phung gcig gis rkub phyis/_gnyis 
[\[208a.3\]]kyis khrus byas so/_/de nas dal gyis langs nas phyogs der 'ongs te phyin nas lag pa g.yon pas sa phung bu bdun gyis khrus byas so/_/de nas gnyi gas phung bu bdun gyis khrus byas so/_/de nas sa phung bu gcig gis dpung pa man cad bkrus so/_/lag pa dag 
[\[208a.4\]]bkrus nas gnyis pas ril ba dag bkrus so/_/de nas dal gyis langs te spyod lam zhi bas chos gos bgos nas rkang pa dag bkrus pa dang /_bram ze des mthong nas mngon par dad par gyur te/_des bsams pa/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi sa'i phung bu gcig 
[\[208a.5\]]ni mchog yin gyi mu stegs can rnams kyi brgya yang de lta ma yin no snyam du rig nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa la gtugs nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa shA ri'i bu bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 
[\[208a.6\]]'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob na/_bdag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_bram ze legs so/_/khyod kyis sems bskyed pa ni bzang ste/_rab tu 'byung ba ni mchog go/_/bcom ldan 
[\[208a.7\]]'das kyis kyang phan yon lnga mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs te zhes bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dam pa yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis rab tu byung ba rnam grangs du mar bsngags 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]so zhes bya bar mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs so zhes gsungs zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de lta bas na legs kyis rab tu phyung shig_/des de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te gdams ngag byin pa dang /_des 'bad 
[\[208b.2\]]brtsal bsgrims pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rig nas zhes bya ba nas/_gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[208b.3\]]'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gtsang sbras bram ze 'di dad par bgyis nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te/_grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa shin tu mthar thug pa mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[208b.4\]]pa/_dge slong dag 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/_ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis 'di rkun po las bzlog ste brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga la bzhag pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri brags shig na bram ze zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma 
[\[208b.5\]]blangs te/_de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas bu mo gzugs 
[\[208b.6\]]bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de btsas ston zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas/_rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags so/_/de bskyed bsrings te chen mor gyur pa dang /_re zhig cig na ri brags der rkun po lnga brgya zhig 'joms 
[\[208b.7\]]'dod cing lhags so/_/de dag gi sde dpon gang yin pa de skom pas gdungs nas bram ze de'i khyim du zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na bu mo de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang smras pa/_bu mo chu byin cig_/des smras pa/_re zhig cung zhig gzhes shig_/de cang mi smra bar 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]'dug go/_/des myur ba myur bar mar me bus pa dang /_rkun po'i sde dpon bu mo de la mig gtad de rtog go/_/bu mo de mar me bus nas chu la lta ba dang /_rkun po'i sde dpon gyis smras pa/_bu mo ci la lta/_des smras pa/_chu la lta'o/_/des smras pa/_de 
[\[209a.2\]]la bltar ci yod/_des smras pa/_'dir sbur ma'am skra song du 'ong bas so/_/des smras pa/_bu mo kho bo ni khyed la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin pas kho bo la dug blud par bya ba yin na khyod ko de skad smras pa lta zhig_/des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gzhan gyi nor 
[\[209a.3\]]'phrog g.yon can gyis/_/bya ba gang de rkun po rnams/_/byed dam 'on te min yang rung /_/bdag gis chos ni rtag bsrung bya/_/de shin tu dga' nas smras pa/_bu mo khyod bdag gi sring mor bya na ci zhig bya smros shig_/des smras pa/_khyod gzhan gyi nor la mngon par chags 
[\[209a.4\]]pa bskyed pas mdas gnad du bsnun nas dus byas par gyur na/_bdag ming po dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing cho nges 'debs na dga' bar mi 'gyur bas rkun po byed pa'i ming po gang yin pa de lta bu ni bdag la mi dgos so/_/de lta bas na gal te khyod kyis brtul 
[\[209a.5\]]zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang dag par len nus na de lta na bdag gis khyod kyi sring mo bya'o/_/des mi 'dod bzhin du tshig yid du 'ong ba snyan pa'i tshul gyis smras pa dang /_des de sring mo bya bar shin tu dga' zhing 'dod par gyur te/_des smras pa/_sring mo legs te de bzhin du bya'o/_/
[\[209a.6\]]des de chom rkun las bzlog ste brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga la bzhag go/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rkun po'i sde dpon de ni bram ze 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze'i bu mo de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'dis de rkun 
[\[209a.7\]]po las bzlog ste bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bzhag go/_/da ltar yang 'di gtsang sbras dad par byas nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te/_grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa shin tu mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa yin no/_/dge slong dag de ltar na gtsang sbra la 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]phan yon 'di dang gzhan dag kyang yod do/_/de lta bas na ji ltar shA ri'i bus byas pa ltar dge slong dag gis rnam pa des gtsang sbra bya'o//_//sdom ni/_cha ga gzungs dang rngul gzan dang /_/dge slong ma ni zla ba dang /_/gnas ni bca' ba drug ldan dang /_/khri la gsum 
[\[209b.2\]]ni 'dug bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe dge slong dag gis dus su bgos pa'i chos gos rnams mi bsri bar spyad pas de dag gi mtha' ma'i skud pa rnams 
[\[209b.3\]]zegs so/_/skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chos gos zegs pa rnams kyi mthar cha ga gdab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos zegs pa rnams kyi mthar cha ga gdab par 
[\[209b.4\]]bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis cha ga btab nas spyad par brtsams na/_'on kyang skud pa rnams zegs par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bar bar du gzungs gdab par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal 
[\[209b.5\]]byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis snam sbyar ni pags pa dang 'dra bar bsrung bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong gzhan dag cig la gos spyad par 'os pa gzhan med nas de dag gis rtag par snam sbyar bgos 
[\[209b.6\]]pas/_de so ga tsha ba'i dus su mchan khung gi phyogs kyi rngul zags pas dri ma can du gyur cing dengs pa dang /_dri mi zhim par gyur nas/_skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mchan khung gi phyogs su 
[\[209b.7\]]rngul gzan gzhug par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mchan khung gi phyogs su snam sbyar gyi rngul gzan gzhug par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis rngul gzan ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gos chur khru phyed dang ngo /_zheng du 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]mtho gang gang yin pa de phyogs der gzhug par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis drubs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drub par mi bya'o/_/de dri ma can du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dus dus su bkru zhing kha bsgyur bar bya'o/_/
[\[210a.2\]]dge slong dag gis ngos gcig tu bcug nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngos gnyi gar gzhug par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kha bsgyur bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis ngur smrig btsos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[210a.3\]]ngur smrig tu btso bar mi bya'i btsag gis kha bsgyur bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de 
[\[210a.4\]]de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/_/de zla ba dgu 'das pa dang bu mo zhig btsas te/_de'i 
[\[210a.5\]]btsas ston rgya cher byas nas de'i ming zla ba zhes bya bar btags te/_de bskyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang /_de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI 'khor lnga 
[\[210a.6\]]brgyas bskor te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la chos 
[\[210a.7\]]dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par len du 'jug par mdzad yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par bskul/_
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[210b.2\]]gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la dge slong gi 'dul ba bstan lags na/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_dge slong ma rnams la dge slong ma'i 'dul ba bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[210b.3\]]gau ta mI de bzhin gshegs pa chos tshig re nas gsungs pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do/_/'on kyang gal te dge slong ma 'ga' zhig ngas lan gcig bshad pa 'dzin par spro na de ltar na ngas bstan par bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe dge slong ma zla ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 
[\[210b.4\]]'dug par gyur to/_/de nas dge slong ma zla ba stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gcig bka' stsal pa/_bdag gis gzung bar 'tshal na bstan 
[\[210b.5\]]du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bstan pa dang /_des lan gcig gsungs pa bzung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma rnams kyi nang na thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog ni 'di 
[\[210b.6\]]lta ste/_dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_thams cad du dge slong ma zla ba'am/_zla ba lta bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis kyang dge slong ma'i 'dul ba bzung nas bcang bar bya zhing /_dge slong ma rnams la 
[\[210b.7\]]yang bstan par bya/_kha ton byed pa dang /_'dri bar byed pa dag la yang sbyin par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gal te dge slong ma zla ba sang las dge slong ma'i 'dul ba lan gcig bshad pa blangs mod kyi 'on kyang thams 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]cad du dge slong ma zla ba'am/_zla ba lta bu mi 'byung bas dge slong dag gis kyang dge slong ma'i 'dul ba gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya zhing dge slong ma rnams la yang bstan par bya/_kha ton byed pa dang /_'dri bar byed pa dag la yang sbyin par bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[211a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims la brten cing tshul khrims la gnas nas zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi chos gnyis bsgom par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong ma zla bas 'dul ba'i rjes su mthun par tshul khrims la brten cing tshul khrims la gnas nas/_bsam 
[\[211a.3\]]gtan dang 'don pa'i sbyor bas 'bad brtsal bsgrims pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rig ste/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /_ltung ba dang /_'gyes pa dang /_'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis 'joms par rtogs te/_
[\[211a.4\]]nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom ma khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/_sems gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa/_ste'u dang tsan dan du mtshungs pa/_rig 
[\[211a.5\]]pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral ba/_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams thob pa/_sred pa dang rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis bltas pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_
[\[211a.6\]]gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos dge slong ma rnams kyi nang na shes rab che ba dang /_spobs pa che ba dang /_thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin 
[\[211a.7\]]no/_dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong ma zla bas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas shes rab che zhing spobs pa che ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang thos pa 'dzin 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]pa'i mchog tu bstan la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong ma zla ba nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa tshogs 
[\[211b.2\]]rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/_lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/_/ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[211b.3\]]rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba ston pa 'jig rten du byung ste/_de 'khor dge slong drug khri 
[\[211b.4\]]nyis stong dang rgyal po'i khab gnyen ldan du gshegs te/_gnyen ldan gyi tshal na bzhugs so/_/de nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab gnyen ldan na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' 
[\[211b.5\]]mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/_/de zla ba dgu 'das nas bu mo zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas rigs dang mthun pa'i ming 
[\[211b.6\]]btags te/_de bskyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur pa dang /_khyim bdag de dad pa can zhig pas dgag dbye'i tshe de khrid nas dge slong ma'i dbyar khang du song ste/_des dge slong ma rnams la so sor khab dang gri la sogs pa'i yo byad kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la 
[\[211b.7\]]dgag dbye byed do/_/bu mo des mdzes par mthong nas dad pa skyes te/_pha la smras pa/_yab bdag gis kyang ji zhig cig gis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyi'o/_/khyim bdag des smras pa/_bu mo legs te de bzhin dgag dbye gyis shig_/des 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]khab dang /_gri dang /_gser dang /_dbyig la sogs pa yo byad kyi khyad par dag gis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye byas te/_rab tu dang ba drag pos rgan pa'i mtha' nas rkang pa la phyag byas nas smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis sems bskyed 
[\[212a.2\]]de sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su btang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis shes rab che zhing spobs pa che ba dang /_thos pa 'dzin par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_khyim bdag gi bu mo gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma zla ba 'di nyid yin te/_'dis gang yang 
[\[212a.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la khab dang /_gri dang /_gser dang /_dbyig la sogs pa yo byad kyi khyad par dag gis dgag dbye byas nas/_bdag gis sems bskyed cing sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su btang ba'i dge ba'i 
[\[212a.4\]]rtsa ba 'dis bdag shes rab che zhing spobs pa che ba dang /_thos pa 'dzin par gyur cig ces smon lam btab po/_/de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas da ltar shes rab che zhing spobs pa che ba dang /_thos pa 'dzin par gyur to/_/yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi gsung rab las 
[\[212a.5\]]rab tu byung bar gyur te/_des de na tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par ma gyur to/_/mkhan po gang las rab tu byung ba de ni bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog tu bstan 
[\[212a.6\]]to/_/de na 'dis 'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung gi spyan sngar tshe gcig gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par ma gyur gyis/_bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gang 
[\[212a.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]pa la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom 
[\[212b.2\]]ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/_shAkya'i rgyal po'i gtso bo des thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/de'i smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog tu bstan pa yin no/_/de lta bas na dge slong dag 
[\[212b.3\]]las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag_/gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar zhes bya ba nas/_brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag gis de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs 
[\[212b.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na dge slong gzhon nu zhig dge slong zhig dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing mnyan yod du phyin nas dge slong de ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[212b.5\]]su song /_gzhon nu de yang rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/_des dge slong zhig la gnas bcas nas de de'i thad na cung zad cig 'dug nas smras pa/_bdag gis 'phags pa gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig tu lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag ste mchis la de blangs nas 
[\[212b.6\]]slar mchi'o/_/des smras pa/_bu song la myur du shog shig_/des smras pa/_slob dpon bdag de na ci zhig bgyid de/_bdag myur du mchis par bgyi'o zhes rkang pa la phyag byas te song nas rim gyis gtsug lag khang der phyin no/_/ji tsam na dge 'dun dag gis gtsug lag 
[\[212b.7\]]khang der gnas med par nub gcig kyang mi gnas par khrims su bya ba bcas so/_/des khrims bzhin du dge slong zhig la gnas bcas nas de nub mo nyal lo/_/nam nangs nas bsams pa/_bdag song la slob dpon de blta'o snyam nas de'i gnas khang du song ste/_sgo la 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]brdabs te slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/_/khams bde 'am zhes byas pa dang /_bu bdag na ste mi bde'o/_/de 'di snyam du bdag slob dpon na ba bor te 'gro ba gang yin pa ni bdag gi tshul ma yin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de'i phyir gcig gis gcig 
[\[213a.2\]]bstang zhing na ba'i nad g.yog bya ba'i phyir gnas bca' bar gnang bas de'i phyir de'i nad g.yog byas te sos nas 'gro bar bsams so/_/des de'i g.yog byas nas sos par gyur pa dang /_des smras pa/_slob dpon mkhyen par mdzod cig mchi'o/_/des smras pa/_
[\[213a.3\]]bu cung zad mi bde ba lta med grang /_slob dpon mi bde ba ni cung zad kyang ma mchis na 'on kyang bdag 'dir gnas su mchis pa ma lags kyi bdag gis chos gos dang lhung bzed bzhag pa len du mchis pa las dge 'dun gyi gnas med par nub gcig kyang mi gnas 
[\[213a.4\]]par khrims su bya ba bcas so/_/de'i slad du bdag gis khrims bzhin du gnas bcas pa dang /_khyod na bar gyur nas bdag gis bsams pa/_bdag slob dpon bor nas 'gro ba gang yin pa ni bdag gi tshul ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de'i phyir 
[\[213a.5\]]gcig gis gcig bstang zhing na ba'i nad g.yog bya ba'i phyir gnas bca' bar gnang bas de'i phyir nad g.yog byas la sos na 'gro'o snyam pa las/_da ni khyod sos par gyur pas mkhyen par mdzod cig mchi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa legs so legs so/_/khyod ji ltar zhugs 
[\[213a.6\]]pa de ltar lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas dag gis mkhan po dang slob dpon dag la bsgrub par bya'o/_/lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas rnams kyis mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dag la de ltar sgrub na ji ltar ut+pa la chu nas 'byung ba bzhin du dge ba'i chos 
[\[213a.7\]]rnams kyis 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod bag yod par byos la song shig_/des de la phyag byas nas rim gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang /_de'i slob dpon gyis mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'ongs pa legs na/_ci ste ring zhig thogs 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]nas 'ongs/_des ji ltar gyur pa smras so/_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa legs so legs so/_/khyod ji ltar zhugs pa de ltar gnas pa dang nye gnas dag gis mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dag la bsgrub par bya'o/_/de ltar bsgrubs na ji ltar ut+pa la chu nas 
[\[213b.2\]]'byung ba bzhin du dge ba'i chos rnams kyis 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes te/_'di'i gnas de nyid kyis chog gam/_'on te gzhan zhig sbyin dgos snyam nas des skabs de dge slong dag la smras te/_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[213b.3\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag des re zhig pa'i gnas bcas par zad de/_de lta bas na de'i gnas de kho nas chog gi gzhan ni ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi

[\[213b.5\]]ni shan pa byed kyang bla'o zhes gsungs te/_'di ltar nye gnas kyang de bzhin du slob ma yin na/_bdag kyang spong ba pa zhig pas 'di gang zhig sbyin par byed pa 'ga' zhig la gtad do snyam bsams nas de dge slong zhig gi thad du song nas tshe dang ldan pa gzhon nu 'di bslab par gyis 
[\[213b.6\]]shig_/des smras pa/_gal te khyod bdag gi g.yog byed na dam bcas te bslab par bya'o/_/des smras pa/_bslab tu gsol bgyi'o/_/des de bslab par brtsams so/_/dus gzhan zhig na de na bar gyur nas gnas bcas pa'i slob dpon des de'i nad g.yog byas so/_/
[\[213b.7\]]ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na gnas bcas pa'i slob dpon de na bar gyur na/_des de slar ma bltas shing de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du yang ma bltas nas/_des de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod gzhan zhig gi drung du song la gnas chos shig_/des smras pa/_'phags 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]pa bdag khyod kho na'i drung du mchis te/_bdag la phongs pa cung zad kyang ma mchis so/_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod la phongs pa med pa ni bden na/_'on kyang kho bo phongs te khyod na bar gyur pa na ngas khyod kyi nad g.yog byas na nga lan gsum gyi 
[\[214a.2\]]bar du na bar gyur pa na ci ste khyod kyis nga la slar ma bltas kyis song la gang zhig khyod 'dra ba'i ma gus pa la gnas ster ba de la gnas chos te 'dug shig_/des spobs pa med de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa 
[\[214a.3\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas pas slob dpon la rim gro bya'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na klog pa'i slob dpon na bar gyur na des slar ma bltas kyi gang gi tshe sos par gyur pa de'i drung du song ste des smras pa/_slob dpon bdag la lung 
[\[214a.4\]]phog shig_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kho bo na ba na khyod kyis res 'ga' yang slar ma bltas kyis khyod song la gang zhig khyod lta bu ma gus pa la klog tu 'jug pa de las lhogs shig_/des spobs pa med de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas skabs de bcom ldan 'das 
[\[214a.5\]]la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_klog pa'i slob dpon la rim gro bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis klog pa'i slob dpon la rim gro bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na klog pa'i slob dpon dang /_
[\[214a.6\]]gnas kyi slob dpon de gnyi ga na bar gyur nas des gang gi rim gro bya ba mi shes nas skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te nus na gnyis ka'i bya'o/_/ji ste mi nus na gnas kyi slob dpon la bya ste 
[\[214a.7\]]'di ltar klog pa med par ni 'dug tu rung gi gnas pa med par ni ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa zhig dge slong zhig gi drung du 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]song ba dang /_des de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te ljongs rgyu zhing song ngo /_/lhan cig gnas pa de la zang zing gis bsdu ba ni byas na/_chos kyis ma byas pas de gzhan zhig la gnas te 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po 
[\[214b.2\]]bzhi po sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don spyod pa dang /_don mthun pa zhes gsungs pas des de la chos dang zang zing dag gis kyang sdud pas de slob dpon de la rtag tu lta zhing sems la 'dzin to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan na de'i mkhan po ci 'dod par ljongs 
[\[214b.3\]]brgyus nas slar mnyan yod du phyin pa dang de mthong nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gsar bu gang dag yin pa de dag ni stan las ldang bar byed/_gang dag rgan pa de dag gis ni 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i kun tu spyod pas kun tu spyod do/_/de'i lhan cig gnas pa de
