[\[214b.5\]]kun tu spyad na khyod de mthong bzhin du stan las kyang ma langs pa de ni rigs pa ma yin no/_/des smras pa/_bdag 'dis rab tu phyung nas ci zang zing gis bsdu ba byas sam/_'on te chos kyis bsdu ba byas/_gang zhig dran nas ldang bar bya/_de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[214b.6\]]ldan pa de skad ma zer cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang zag gcig gang zag gang zhig la brten nas de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung 
[\[214b.7\]]ba'i gang zag des ni gang zag de la ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du yang 'di lta ste/_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_nad kyi gsos sman dang /_mal stan dang /_yo byad dag gis lan glan par sla ba ma yin no/_/zhes ma gsungs sam/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod de skad zer 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]ba de ni legs pa ma yin no/_/de spobs pa med de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas/_skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas kyi dge slong rnams

[\[215a.3\]]po 'dug mi phod pa dag cig 'ongs shing de dag dus cung zad 'dug nas 'gro bar byed do/_/de la kha cig la ni mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams gshe_/kha cig la ni dga' bar gyur cing /_de rnams gang dag la gshe ba de dag la ni sngun gnas bcas pa la yang mi ster

[\[215a.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'dug mi phod pa gang dag yin pa de dag la yang thams cad bya zhing /_sngon gyi slob dpon rnams la yang thams cad bya mod kyi/_'on kyang gnyis ka'i sems kyang mgu ba lhur blang bar bya zhing gnyi ga la yang dri bar bya'o/_/
[\[215a.6\]]gal te thams cad kyi thams cad du mkhan po dag 'dug na de nyid la dri bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig gis gzhon nu gcig cig la gnas byin te/_de zla 
[\[215a.7\]]ba phyed cing gso sbyong gi tshe de'i thad du song nas smras pa/_slob dpon/_phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhu'o/_/gso sbyong byin gyis brlabs so/_/des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo ji ltar khyod kyi slob dpon du 'gyur/_des smras pa/_bdag ni khyod nyid la gnas bcas te 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]mchis pas so/_/des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gang zhig khyod lta bu ma gus shing zhe sa med pa la gnas ster ba de la gnos te 'dug la de nyid la zhus shig_/de spobs pa med de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas/_skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_

[\[215b.3\]]rnams blta ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas rnams kyis dus gsum du mkhan po dang slob dpon dag blta ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[215b.4\]]ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig gis dge slong gzhon nu gcig cig la gnas byin nas des de bu bzhin bskyangs so/_/des dus gzhan zhig na ljongs rgyu bar chas te

[\[215b.7\]]yo byad thams cad sbyar ba las bdag song ba ma legs kyis slar ldog par bya'o snyam du bsams nas der slar log pa dang /_slob dpon gyis mthong nas des smras pa/_bu ci ste slar log_/cung zad brjed pa lta med dam/_des smras pa/_slob dpon brjed pa lta ci yang 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]ma mchis na 'on kyang bdag gis bsams pa/_bdag la slob dpon gyis yo byad thams cad sbyar na don ci zhig la 'gro snyam nas bdag slar log pa lags so/_/des smras pa/_bu gal te slar log na legs so/_/khyod kyi slob dpon ni nga nyid yin no zhes smras 
[\[216a.2\]]nas bsams pa/_ci 'di'i gnas bcas pa de kho nas chog gam/_'on te gdod sbyin par bya snyam ste/_des skabs de dge slong dag la smras nas/_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gal te 
[\[216a.3\]]slob dpon gyis ma btang ba la/_nye gnas kyis btang na gnas bcas pa ma zhig pa zhes brjod do/_/slob dpon gyis btang la nye gnas kyis ma btang na gnas bcas pa ma zhig pa zhes brjod do/_/slob dpon gyis kyang ma btang la nye gnas kyis kyang ma btang na gnas bcas 
[\[216a.4\]]pa ma zhig pa zhes brjod do/_/slob dpon [(]kyis [,]gyis [)]kyang btang la nye gnas kyis kyang btang na gnas bcas pa zhig pa zhes brjod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod 
[\[216a.5\]]na dge slong tshogs la ston pa zhig 'dug pa de gzhon nu mang po dag klog tu 'jug go/_/de dus gzhan zhig na na bar gyur pa dang /_de dag gis slar ma bltas shing de bzhin du lan gsum na bar gyur kyang de dag gis slar ma bltas so/_/de dus gzhan zhig na sos par gyur 
[\[216a.6\]]pa dang /_nye gnas dag de'i drung du 'ongs te/_de na gcig gis smras pa/_slob dpon bdag la lung dbog tu gsol/_gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_bdag la g.yar ton dbog tu gsol/_gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_zhu bar 'tshal lo/_/des smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[216a.7\]]ldan pa dag bdag lan gsum gyi bar du na bar gyur kyang khyed gang gis kyang slar ma bltas pas gang zhig khyed lta bu ma gus pa la gdams ngag dang /_kha ton dag 'bogs par byed pa de'i thad du deng shig_/skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_klog pa'i slob dpon la rim gro bya'o/_/de dag thams cad kyis byas pa dang de rnams kyi dge ba'i phyogs nyams par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_res su bcad de bya'o/_/de dag gis res kyis bya bar brtsams 
[\[216b.2\]]pa dang /_rgan po rab tu byung ba zhig de la gnas te 'dug pa de la de dag gis smras pa/_rgan zhugs sang khyod la res bab po/_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ci slob dpon la res kyis g.yog bya'am/_kho bo kho nas g.yog byas/_khyed cag sems las chung ngur gyis 
[\[216b.3\]]shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_rgan zhugs gal te de lta na legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang nad pa la rim gro byed pa de ni nga la rim gro byed pa yin no/_/zhes gsungs pas skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis gyis shig_/des de'i rim gro byed par brtsams nas/_de sos 
[\[216b.4\]]par gyur te de'i lus kyi gnas skabs shes nas smras pa/_slob dpon bdag la gdams ngag dbog tu gsol/_des smras pa/_khyod kyi res la ma bab pas re zhig sdod cig_/yang smras pa/_slob dpon kha ton dang zhu ba dag gnong shig_/khyod kyi res la ma bab pas re zhig 
[\[216b.5\]]sdod cig_/des smras pa/_slob dpon rim gro byed pa ni bdag la res bab na klog pa dang 'don pa ni 'di dag la res bab pa ci'i slad du bdag mchi'i mkhyen par mdzod cig_/des smras pa/_bu thams cad byas ma 'gro bar sdod cig_/de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas skabs de bcom ldan 
[\[216b.6\]]'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang zhig rtag tu g.yog byed pa de mi dga' bar ma gyur par gzhan dag la lung dang /_kha ton dang zhu ba dag sbyin par bya'o/_/mkhas pa dang mi mkhas pa kha cig klog pa na mkhas pa dag la ni lung 
[\[216b.7\]]byin pas mi mkhas pa dag la gnod par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de rnams la yang lung dang kha ton dang dri ba dag skabs su sbyin par bya'o//_//bar sdom ni/_nad pa spong ba mkhan po dang /_/zla ba phyed cing 'ong ba dang /_/tshogs dag klog tu 'jug 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]byed pa/_/bar sdom dag tu yang dag bstan/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde rnams rigs kyi khyim du song ba dang /_de dag gis khri phyung ste 'phags pa ci 
[\[217a.2\]]bder bzhugs shig_/de rnams cig car 'khod nas khri de chag par gyur te/_de dag gis rta gad kyis btab pa dang /_dge slong gzhan dag kyang der 'ongs te/_de dag gis de rnams mthong nas/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyed 'di lta bu'i 'phyar po byas nas/_dgod 
[\[217a.3\]]dam zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_ci chang 'thungs sam/_sgog skya zos/_des smras pa/_ci de dag kyang byed dam/_gzhan ci zhig byas/_khri ma bcag gam/_ci shing zad dam/_shing mkhan dag shi'am/_de dag ma rangs bzhin cang mi zer bar 'dug nas skabs de 
[\[217a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na khri gcig la drug 'dug par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khri gcig la drug 'dug par mi bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_lnga 'dug ste nyes dmigs de nyid 
[\[217a.5\]]du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lnga yang 'dug par mi bya'o/_/bzhi 'dug ste nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bzhi yang 'dug par mi bya'i 'on kyang khri la ni gsum 'dug par mi bya'o/_/khri'u la ni gnyis 
[\[217a.6\]]so/_/khri'u chung la ni gcig go//_//sdom ni/_nad pa yi ni nad g.yog dang /_/shing la 'dzeg par mi bya dang /_/bkrabs pa bsnyen rdzogs mi bya dang /_/lag pa gcad par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med 
[\[217a.7\]]zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis nad pa'i rim gro bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa de yo byad ji lta bu dag gis bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]stsal pa/_nye ba 'khor rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dag ma gtogs pa gzhan dag gis bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye dga'i dge tshul bsnyen 
[\[217b.2\]]par rdzogs par 'dod nas des bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i ched du las byed pa'i dge slong dang /_gsang ste ston pa dang /_dge slong gang dag dkyil 'khor du 'ong ba la gsol ba btab ste/_de nas dge tshul dang stan khyer te dkyil 'khor du sngar song nas dkyil 'khor phyag dar 
[\[217b.3\]]byas te stan bshams na dge slong dag ma 'ongs te/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]phan tshun du bltas na des me tog gi shing zhig mthong ste/_des smras pa/_dge tshul re zhig me tog dag lhogs la dge slong rnams la rims shig_/des 'dzegs pa dang ma stes te lhung nas lag pa chag ste/_
[\[217b.4\]]de nyid de'i bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po'i bar chad du gyur nas skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu thu bo dbang bskur bar 'os pa dbang ma bskur bar 
[\[217b.5\]]'dug cing mtshams la bab pa bsrung bar bya ba dang /_bskyang bar bya ba yin pa de bzhin du dge slong gis dge tshul bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa yang bsrung zhing bskyang bar bya ba yin no/_/de lta bas na dge slong gis bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa'i dge tshul shing la 
[\[217b.6\]]'dzeg tu mi gzhug ste/_'dzeg tu 'jug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po bcu dgu pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/
[\[217b.7\]]yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la nang mi gcugs pa chen po zhes bya ba zhig yod do/_/de dus gzhan zhig na rgyal pos spyos nas des bsams pa/_rgyal po dag ni ji ltar byas kyang mgu dka' bas song la rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo /_/drug 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stong pa yin pas tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' sgo na 'dug go/_/des de snga na ngo shes pas des de la 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba kun tu spyad nas chen po khyod zla ba lta bur gnas na ring mo 
[\[218a.2\]]zhig lon te ga las 'ongs zhes byas pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa yang dang yang mthong bas ni brnyas par 'gyur gyi yun ring zhig lon te mthong ba ni legs pa yin no/_/chen po dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/_'phags pa rgyal po ni mgu dka' bas lha'i thugs mnyes par 
[\[218a.3\]]bya mi nus te rab tu 'byung ngo /_/chen po khyod kyi sems bskyed pa ni bzang ste legs so/_/rab tu 'byung ba ni mchog yin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phan yon rnam pa lnga mthong ba zhes bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dam pa yang dag par 
[\[218a.4\]]zhugs pa skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis rab tu byung ba rnam grangs du mar bsngags pa zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/legs kyis rab tu byung zhig ces de rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/_/rgyal pos blon po dag la bka' stsal pa/_shes ldan dag chen 
[\[218a.5\]]po mi snang na mi na grang /_de dag gis smras pa/_lha de bro 'tshal ba ni ma mchis mod kyi lhas ci zhig bka' stsal na rgyal byed kyi tshal du mchis nas rab tu byung lags/_sus rab tu phyung /_'phags pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]so/_/rgyal pos de thos nas khros te/_des de la pho nya btang 
[\[218a.6\]]nas 'phags pa dag gis spyos pa khyod kyis rab tu dbyung ngam/_khyod kyis chen po rab tu phyung na nga bdag dang 'phags skyes po dang /_phreng ldan ma dang /_dbyar byed ma dag kyang rab tu phyung la khyed rang rgyal srid gyis shig_/des kyang de la lan spring ba/_lha kye tshur shog_/khyod 
[\[218a.7\]]dang /_'phags skyes po dang /_phreng ldan ma dang /_dbyar byed ma rab tu phyung la nga nyid rgyal srid byed do/_/'di ltar ngas khyod kyi chen po'am gzhan yang rung ba bslus te rab tu phyung ngam ci/_nged ni gang zhig rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs nas nged la gsol ba 'debs pa de rab tu 'byin to/_/rgyal 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]pos thos te ma dad par gyur nas skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag rgyal pos bkrabs pa rab tu 'byin pa las gyur gyis de'i phyir dge slong gis rgyal pos bkrabs 
[\[218b.2\]]pa rab tu mi dbyung bar dgongs nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag skyes bu gti mug nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]blon po rab tu phyung bas rgyal po ma dad par gyur to/_/de lta bas na dge slong dag gis rgyal pos bkrabs pa rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/gang yang rung ba zhig gi drung du 
[\[218b.3\]]rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa zhig nye bar 'ongs na des de la rgyal pos bkrabs pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya ste/_ma dris par rab tu 'byin na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal pos bkrabs pa rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_kha cig yul ring 
[\[218b.4\]]po dag nas kyang 'ong /_rgyus mi shes pa yang 'ong ma gnang ba dag kyang 'ong nas dge slong dag the tshom du gyur te de dag kyang rab tu ma phyung nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang yul ring po dang /_rgyus mi shes pa dang /_ma gnang ba dag 'ong ba de dag rab tu dbyung 
[\[218b.5\]]bar bya ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo skra dang kha spu bregs nas ring po ma yin par snga dro chos gos bgos te lhung bzed 
[\[218b.6\]]thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/de rim gyis srang du song ba dang /_ji tsam na bram ze zhig bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug ste/_de yang gtum po gzu lums can rtsub mo zhig yin pas des bram ze'i khye'u zhig la smras 
[\[218b.7\]]pa/_kye bram ze'i khye'u khyod dge sbyong mgo reg 'di'i mgor ltag dbyug snun nus sam/_des smras pa/_mkhan po te por rngo thog go zhes de de'i drung du song nas de'i mgor ltag dbyug gis brgyab po/_/tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo log ste bram ze de la bltas pa dang /_de je khros nas 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]des smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u yang rgyob shig_/des de la lan gnyis su ltag dbyug gis brgyab pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bsams pa/_bdag gis bltas te ci rung 'gro'o snyam ste song ngo /_/rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin nas zas kyi bya ba byas te lhung bzed 
[\[219a.2\]]bkrus nas dge slong dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag srang che ge mo zhes bya bar ma 'dong shig_/dge slong dag gis smras pa/_ci'i phyir des smras pa/_de na bram ze gtum po gzu lums can rtsub mo zhig bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam zhig la bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 
[\[219a.3\]]'jug pa 'dug ste/_des bdag la ltag dbyug gnyis bsnun no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyod kyis ci nyes/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gcig ni nyes/_gnyis pa ni ma nyes so/_/ji ltar ni nyes ji ltar ni ma nyes/_gcugs med par des kho bo la ltag dbyug gis 
[\[219a.4\]]bsnun nas kho bos log ste bltas pa dang /_des lan gnyis bsnun nas kho bos de la log ste bltas pa gang yin pa de ni nyes so/_/snga ma ni ma nyes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]thos nas/_des smras pa/_'phags pa ci zhig gsung /_des smras pa/_chen po ma 
[\[219a.5\]]lags so/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_'phags pa de bdag gis thos kyis yang gsungs shig_/des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]mgo lan gsum gcogs nas mjal to zhes byas te mi dga' bar bya'o/_/snyam nas de mgo bzlas te bregs nas til mar 
[\[219a.6\]]gyis bskus te bkrus nas snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/de rim gyis srang du phyin na bram ze de gzhan du yengs pas des de ma mthong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' de'i mdun du 'chag par brtsams pa dang /_
[\[219a.7\]]bram ze des mthong nas des bram ze'i khye'u zhig la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u song la dge sbyong mgo reg 'di'i mgor ltag dbyug gis snun cig_/tshe dang ldan pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de thos nas smras pa/_bkren pa 'o ni gtang ci dgos/_khyod nyid tshur/_de skad smras pa dang /_bram ze de khros 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]te des bdag nyid song nas nye dga' la ltag dbyug gis bsnun nas nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bram ze de'i dpung pa nas bzung ste bkren pa nye dga' la yang rdeg gam/_tshur rgyal po'i pho brang du 'dong ngo zhes des de'i dpung pa nas bzung ste drangs pa dang /_des bram ze'i khye'u de dag la bos nas de dag 
[\[219b.2\]]gis kyang de'i dpung pa ya gcig nas bzung ste drangs so/_/nye dga' tshan po che chen po'i stobs can des bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag dang /_bram ze de drangs nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor song ste 'dug go/_/'di ni chos nyid yin te/_gang gi tshe drug sde rnams khros nas rgyal po'i pho 
[\[219b.3\]]brang gi sgo na 'dug pa de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos bltas te mthong nas mi zhig la bsgo ba/_kye skyes bu sgor 'phags pa drug sde 'ga' zhig byon par ma gyur grang /_song la ltos/_des byung ste/_bltas na tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bram 
[\[219b.4\]]ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam dang sgo na 'dug nas/_des rgyal po la smras pa/_lha 'phags pa nye dga' chab sgo na mchis so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_de nang du spyan drongs shig_/de nang du 'ongs te smras pa/_lha 'phags pa dga' bo rab tu byung bar ma gyur na ci zhig tu 'gyur/_'phags 
[\[219b.5\]]pa stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/'o na khyod de'i cir 'gyur/_'phags pa g.yog tu 'gyur ro/_/lha khyod kyis dge slong rnams ni gzhon nu'i thabs su gnang /_dge slong ma rnams ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi thabs su gnang ste/_de ltar bdag cag la'o 
[\[219b.6\]]byams na bram ze gcig cig gis lha khyad du bkum ste/_slob dpon dga' bo la ltag dbyug gnyis bsnun/_bdag la yang khros nas ltag dbyug gis brgyab bo/_/rgyal po khros te des blon po rnams la bka' stsal pa/_song la bram ze de'i lag pa chod cig_/des de khrid de 
[\[219b.7\]]srang du song na bram ze de'i pha ma gnyis kyis thos nas de dag mdza' bo dang /_phu nu dang gnyen dag dang 'dus shing snying rje rje ltar sma bab pa'i tshig dal gyis smra zhing kyi hud bu zhes cho nges 'debs bzhin srang du song nas de dag dang skye bo'i tshogs des blon po de la smras pa/_kye 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]dge ba lha la nyes pa byas pa lag pa bcad pa'i ni rigs na bram ze 'di lag pas 'tsho ba zhig pas lag pa g.yon pa gcad pa'i rigs so/_/des de'i lag pa g.yon pa bcad pa dang /_ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bram ze de de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa g.yogs 
[\[220a.2\]]nas g.yas pas klog par byed do/_/re zhig cig na nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]mthong nas de shin tu khros te rgyal po'i thad du song nas smras pa/_rgyal po rnams kyi bde ba ni 'di lta ste/_bka'i 'bras bu brtsan pa 'dir zad na de yang lha la med do/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa ci zhig byas/_
[\[220a.3\]]nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_lha bram ze de'i lag pa ma bcad do/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams bos te smras pa/_khyod kyis bram ze de'i lag pa ma bcad dam/_des smras pa/_lha bkum lags so/_/de lta na 'o na 'phags pa nye dga' 'di skad zer ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_
[\[220a.4\]]lha bram ze de de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pas sgyur sgyur bgyid cing bram ze'i khye'u rnams klog tu 'jug go/_/blon pos smras pa/_lha de'i pha ma dag gi mchid nas bram ze 'di lag pas 'tsho ba zhig pas lag pa g.yon pa chod cig ces mchi ste/_de'i slad du bdag gis de'i sug pa 
[\[220a.5\]]g.yon pa bkum mo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te de'i pha ma dag gis lag pa g.yon pa gcod du bcug na ngas g.yas pa gcod du gzhug gis song la chod cig_/des de'i drung du song nas lag pa g.yas pa bcad pa dang /_de lag pa gnyi ga 'phyang zhing 'dug go/_/de sdug 
[\[220a.6\]]bsngal zhing 'dug pa dang nye dga' bos smras pa/_bram ze ci ste kho bo cag la ltag dbyug gis mi rdeg par lag pa dpyangs te 'dug_/de sma bab nas dregs pa dang nga rgyal bcag ste cang mi zer bar 'dug pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams ni snying 
[\[220a.7\]]rje med pa ste/_chad pas bcad nas kyang zhe gcod par byed do zhes 'phya bar byed/_smod par byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]dag lag pa yang gcod du 'jug pa las gyur gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis lag pa dang /_rkang pa dag gcad par mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag skyes bu gti mug nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]dge sbyong gi las ma yin pa byas te/_dge 
[\[220b.2\]]slong dag nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba rnams las de lta bu byed du 'jug pa de ni mdzes pa ma yin/_'tsham pa ma yin no/_/de lta bas na dge slong gis lag pa dang rkang pa dag gcad par mi bya'o/_/gcod par byed na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag the tshom 
[\[220b.3\]]skyes nas/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bram ze de tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos ni bsrungs/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]ni yongs su btang ba la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma 
[\[220b.4\]]zad kyi ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang dga' bos ni bsrungs/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]ni btang ba de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba skyed mos tshal shing sna tshogs kyi tshal gyis brgyan pa me tog dang 'bras bu dang chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig na drang srong 'bras bu dang /_rtsa ba dang /_chu za zhing 
[\[220b.5\]]'thung ba g.yang gzhi dang shing shun gyon pa zhig gnas te de shing bil ba'i drung na 'dug cing rang gi don sems par byed do/_/de'i steng nas spre'u zhig gis bil ba'i 'bras bu zhig 'phangs pa des drang srong de'i mgo snad nas des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khyod med 'gyur ba gang 
[\[220b.6\]]yin pa/_/de ni kho bo mi byed kyi/_/khyod med 'gyur ba gang yin pa/_/de ni khyod nyid byed cing 'dug_/drang srong de'i smos 'drin rngon pa zhig 'dug pa de [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du song ba las bsti gnas der phyin to/_/drang srong de ni bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shing bil ba'i drung nas gzhan zhig tu 
[\[220b.7\]]song ngo /_/rngon pa de de mi snang nas te por lta zhing bil ba de'i drung na 'dug go/_/spre'u des rngon pa de'i mgor bil ba'i 'bras bu gcig 'phangs pa dang /_rngon pa de spyi cer zhig pas de'i klad pa snad nas bil ba'i 'bras bus bsnun pas bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]bas gyen tu blta bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na spre'u mthong nas de khros pas gzhu rna drung du bkang ste dug mda' gcig de'i gnad du bsnun pa dang /_sa la lhung nas dus las 'das so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong 
[\[221a.2\]]gang yin pa de ni dge slong dga' bo 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi spre'u gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rngon pa gang yin pa de ni nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'di dga' bos ni bsrungs la/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]ni yongs su btang ngo /_/da ltar 
[\[221a.3\]]yang dga' bos ni bsrungs la/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]ni yongs su btang ngo //_//sdom ni/_/rigs ngan dang ni 'char kar bcas/_/snam sbyar dang ni brnyas pa dang /_/mtshams [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang ni bzang sbyin dang /_/bdag gir 'du shes lhung bzed blangs/_/ma pham pa dang zla 
[\[221a.4\]]srungs kyi/_/rang gi bcos bu'i ras brkus pa'o/_/sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni phas pham pa gnyis pa las ji skad 'byung ba de bzhin du rgyas par sbyar bar bya ste/_khyad par cung zad kyang med do//_//sdom ni/_phag dang bu ram shing dang ni/_/ta la chos gos gnag 
[\[221a.5\]]dga' bo/_/spra tshil gyis ni byugs pa'i snod/_/mching bu'i phor ba sbom dga' mo'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mu ge'i dus la bab nas ma byin par len pa rnams 
[\[221a.6\]]kyis phag dag cig brkus te tshal stug po'i nang du dong ste der de dag gis de bsad do/_/bsad nas sha bzang po rnams zos te/_mgo dang /_rus thogs dang /_sug pa rnams bor ro/_/drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni nang par sngar langs nas khang pa'i steng du 'dzegs te 
[\[221a.7\]]phyogs bzhir lta zhing de dag gis gang na dud pa 'thul ba dang /_bya rgod lding ba dag mthong ba der thams cad 'dus te 'dong bas nang par sngar langs nas khang pa'i steng du 'dzegs te phyogs bzhir blta bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na tshal stug po'i nang na dud pa dang bya rgod lding 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]ba mthong nas smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' tshal gyi nang na dud pa 'thul zhing bya rgod lding bas gal te cung zad rnyed kyang srid pas 'dong ngo /_/de dag myur ba myur bar dong ba dang /_phag gi mgo dang /_rus thogs dang /_sug pa bor ba dag mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye 
[\[221b.2\]]dga' phyag dar lta bu zhig rnyed kyis btsos te bza' bar bya'o/_/de dag gis bsdus nas 'tshed pa na phag bdag rnams tshol zhing der lhags pa dang /_ji tsam na drug sde rnams phag sha 'tshod pa mthong ste/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag drang srong gi rgyal mtshan yang 
[\[221b.3\]]thogs la bya ba 'di lta bu yang byed dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo cag srog gcod du rung na lta bdag cag gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzang po bzang po dag bsad nas sha bzang po dag bza' mi nus sam ci/_ci'i phyir kho bo cag mgo dang rus pa dang /_sug pa dag bsdus 
[\[221b.4\]]nas 'tshed/_ma byin par len pa 'ga' zhig gis brkus te zos nas bor ba 'di dag kho bo cag gis phyag dar bor ba lta bu blangs par zad do/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa gal te de lta na 'on kyang 'di ltar khyed rab tu byung ba yin pas 'di ni 'tsham pa ma yin no zhes zer 
[\[221b.5\]]ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong gis de lta bu'i phyag dar blang bar mi bya'o/_/blangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na 
[\[221b.6\]]rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/ma byin par len pa rnams kyis bu ram gyi shing dag brkus te zos nas de dag gis rtsa ba dang /_thor to ro chung ba dag bor ba dang /_drug sde rnams phan tshun 'phyan zhing phyogs der phyin pa dang /_
[\[221b.7\]]de dag gis mthong nas smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' phyag dar lta bu 'di rnyed kyis blang bar bya'o/_/de dag gis blang bar brtsams na/_bu ram shing srung ba dag tshol zhing der lhags pa dang /_ji tsam na drug sde rnams bu ram shing gi rtsa ba dang /_thor to ro chung ba dag len pa 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]mthong nas des smras pa/_'phags pa dag drang srong gi rgyal mtshan yang thogs la 'di lta bu'i sdig pa'i las kyang byed dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gal te bdag cag ma byin par len du rung na lta bdag cag gis bdams shing bdams nas bu 
[\[222a.2\]]ram shing bzang po'am/_gzhan yang nor bu dang mu tig la sogs pa rin po che dbrog par mi nus sam ci/_ma byin par len pa 'ga' zhig gis brkus te zos nas da gzod kho bo cag gis rtsa ba dang /_rtse mo ro chung ba dag bsdus par zad do/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags 
[\[222a.3\]]pa gal te de lta na 'on kyang 'di ltar khyed rab tu byung ba yin pas 'di ni 'tsham pa ma yin no/_/de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug nas skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong gis 
[\[222a.4\]]de lta bu'i phyag dar blang bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong de lta bu'i phyag dar len na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/ma byin par len pa rnams 
[\[222a.5\]]kyis shing ta la'i 'bras bu dag brkus nas nags stug po'i nang du khyer nas bdams shing bdams te zos te snyigs ma dag bor ba dang /_drug sde rnams phan tshun 'khyam pa las phyogs der phyin nas de dag gis de mthong nas/_de dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' 
[\[222a.6\]]phyag dar lta bu 'di rnyed kyis bsdu bar bya'o/_/de rnams kyis de bsdu bar brtsams na/_shing ta la'i srung ma 'tshol zhing der son pa dang /_ji tsam na drug sde rnams shing ta la'i mgo thogs dang snyigs ma dag sdud pa mthong nas/_des smras pa/_'phags pa drong srong gi rgyal 
[\[222a.7\]]mtshan yang thogs la 'di lta bu'i sdig pa'i las kyang byed dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gal te kho bo cag ma byin par len du rung na lta bdams shing bdams te shing ta la'i 'bras bu bzang po dag dang /_gzhan yang nor bu dang mu tig la sogs pa rin po che 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]dag dbrog par mi nus sam ci/_ma byin par len pa 'ga' zhig gis 'di dag brkus pa las kho bo cag gis nyal nyil bsdus par zad do/_/des smras pa/_gal te de lta na yang 'di ltar khyed rab tu byung ba yin pas 'di ni 'tsham pa ma yin no/_/de dag cang mi zer bar 
[\[222b.2\]]'dug nas skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis de lta bu'i phyag dar blang bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis de lta bu'i phyag dar blangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[222b.3\]]ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan yod na spos 'tshong gi khye'u zhig 'dug pa de la la ba bzang po zhig bdog nas de de la shin tu chags so/_/de dus gzhan zhig na na bar gyur pa dang /_la ba de la 
[\[222b.4\]]ji lta bar dbyig dag la ni mya ngan mi byed do/_/de rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu'i sman dag byas kyang phan par ma gyur te/_des gang gi tshe lus kyi gnas skabs shes pa de'i tshe nye du rnams bsogs te smras pa/_gang gi tshe kho bo shi bar gyur na de'i 
[\[222b.5\]]tshe khyed cag gis ma bsregs par 'on kyang la ba 'dis dkris nas 'or cig_/de dag gis de dbugs phyung ste smras pa/_ji snyed nad kyis btab pa thams cad 'chi'am ci sos par 'gyur bas ma 'jigs shig_/de tshe zad pa zhig pas rim gro dang gsos byas kyang ma phan te shi 
[\[222b.6\]]nas la ba la lhag par chags pas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lba ba can rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/de nye du rnams kyis gos sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dag gis khyogs brgyan nas la ba de nyid kyis dkris te dur khrod du bor ro/_/de dge slong dag gis mthong nas/_
[\[222b.7\]]de dag gis dge slong dur khrod pa gnag dga' bo zhes bya ba de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa spos 'tshong gi khye'u shi ba de nye du dag gis la bas dkris nas/_dur khrod du bor gyis song la phyag dar khrod long shig_/de myur ba myur bar dur khrod du song nas la ba blangs pa dang /_mi ma yin pa 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]des smras pa/_'phags pa gnag dga' bo bdag gi la ba ma bsnams shig_/dur khrod pa phal cher snying stobs can yin pas des de la smras pa/_bkren pa khyod la ba 'di la lhag par chags pa [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lba ba can rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_da yang ci dmyal 
[\[223a.2\]]bar skye bar 'dod dam thong shig ces byas na/_'on kyang des ma btang ngo /_/de lhag par chags pas des de la rdog pas bsnun nas bshus te des de khyer nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo /_/de yang cho nges 'debs shing de'i phyi bzhin du 'brangs te/_'phags pa gnag dga' bo/_
[\[223a.3\]]la ba 'o ni stsol cig ces byas na des khyad du bsad de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_rgyal byed kyi tshal na sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dag 'dug pas dbang chung ngur grags pa de nang du 'jug ma nus nas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na cho nges 'debs 
[\[223a.4\]]shing 'dug go/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa yin pas de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/_kun dga' bo ci'i phyir rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na mi ma yin pa du/_des gsol pa/_btsun pa gnag dga' bos de'i 
[\[223a.5\]]la ba blangs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa mi ma yin pa 'di chags pa de lta bus ngu ste/_gal te la ba ma thob na khrag dron du skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do snyam du dgongs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' 
[\[223a.6\]]stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong gnag dga' bo la mi ma yin pa 'di la la ba byin cig_/gal te 'di la la ba ma byin na gdon mi za bar 'di khrag dron du skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe byin pa de'i tshe yang mdun du song shig ces smra bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe dur khrod 
[\[223a.7\]]du son pa de'i tshe yang nyol cig ces brjod par bya zhing gang gi tshe nyal ba de'i tshe de'i steng du dgab par bya'o zhes gyis shig_/btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas tshe dang ldan pa gnag dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]ldan pa gnag dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gnag dga' bo shes par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas mi ma yin pa 'di la la ba byin cig_/gal te 'di la la ba ma byin na gdon mi za bar khrag dron du skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe byin pa 
[\[223b.2\]]de'i tshe yang mdun du song shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe dur khrod du phyin pa de'i tshe yang nyol cig ces brjod par bya zhing /_gang gi tshe nyal ba de'i tshe de'i steng du dgab par bya'o zhes de skad bka' stsal to/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de 
[\[223b.3\]]bzhin du 'tshal lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo song ba dang /_gnag dga' bos mi ma yin pa de la smras pa/_gal te khyod la ba 'dod na mdun du song shig dang sbyin no/_/de mdun du song ba dang /_yang smras pa/_gal te khyod la ba 'dod na nyol cig ces byas pa dang /_de nyal 
[\[223b.4\]]nas de'i steng du bkab bo/_/mi ma yin pas kyang de la rdog pas bsnun pa dang /_de stobs dang ldan pa yin pas des mnags so/_/skabs de dge slong rnams la bsnyad pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[223b.5\]]slong dag gya tshom du ro'i gos blang ba'am sbyin par mi bya'i/_len na des rkang pa'i mtha' nas mgo'i mthar song ste blang bar bya'o/_/gang zhig sbyin pa des kyang mgo'i mtha' nas rkang pa'i mthar song ste sbyin par bya'o/_/dge slong ro'i gos la nyes dmigs lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_
[\[223b.6\]]kha dog ngan pa dang /_dri mi zhim pa dang /_rnyings pa dang /_shig mang ba dang /_gnod sbyin mi srun pa mang ba'o/_/'on kyang phyag dar khrod pas ji srid du rma ma phyung bar ro'i gos blang bar mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rma ma phyung bar shi ba'i gos blang bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_
[\[223b.7\]]drug sde rnams kyis khyi khrid de dong ba dang /_ma dad pa dag gis mthong nas/_'phags pa khyed ci ste khyi khrid nas dgon par 'dong /_ci srog gcod par byed dam zhes kha zer ba dang /_de dag gis lan gzhan du glan no/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyi khrid de 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/de dag gis mtshon gyis rma phyung ste blangs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtshon gyis rma phyung ste blang bar mi bya'i 'on kyang gang gi tshe srin bu phre'u dang /_
[\[224a.2\]]grog mas zos kyang rung de'i tshe blang bar bya'o/_/de dag gis blangs te de bzhin du gyon nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin du bgo bar mi bya'i/_'on kyang zhag bdun nam brgyad du dben par bzhag la gang gi tshe rlung dang nyi mas gdungs par gyur pa de'i tshe 
[\[224a.3\]]bkrus nas btsos la bgo bar bya'o/_/de dag gis de bgos te gtsug lag khang du 'jug cing mchod rten dag la phyag 'tshal bar byed nas/_skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas dge slong dur khrod 
[\[224a.4\]]pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong dur khrod pas ro'i gos bgos te gtsug lag khang du 'gro bar mi bya/_mchod rten la phyag 'tshal bar mi bya/_de ste phyag byed na yang 'dom gang khor yug las nye bar 'gro bar mi bya/_gnas khang la longs spyad par mi 
[\[224a.5\]]bya/_gnas mal la yang 'dug par mi bya/_dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dug par mi bya/_bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par mi bya/_bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu 'gro bar mi bya/_gal te 'gro na yang sgor bsdad par bya'o/_/gal te 
[\[224a.6\]]'phags pa nang du gshegs zhes zer na/_bdag ni dur khrod pa'o zhes smra bar bya'o/_/ji ste 'phags pa gal te khyed lta bu sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs te 'dug pa dag khyim gyi nang du byon na bdag gis rnyed pa dag legs par rnyed pa ma lags sam zhes zer na 
[\[224a.7\]]nang du 'gro bar bya zhing stan la ni 'dug par mi bya'o/_/gal te 'phags pa gdan la bzhugs shig ces zer na/_bdag ni dur khrod pa'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/ji ste 'phags pa gal te khyod lta bu sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs te 'jug pa dag stan dang khyim la 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]yongs su longs spyod na bdag gis rnyed pa dag legs par rnyed pa ma lags sam zhes zer na der 'dug par bya ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/dge slong dur khrod pas kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te mi 'jug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[224b.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong rnams gri dang khab dag bab chol du 'jog pas de dag btsas zos nas/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[224b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bab chol du gzhag par mi bya'i 'on kyang snod du gzhag par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis snod du gzhag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis snod ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[224b.4\]]ras la spra tshil gyis byugs nas/_der khab dang gri dag gzhug par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na dge slong ma sbom dga' mo zhes bya ba de la mching phor zhig yod 
[\[224b.5\]]do/_/ji tsam na dge slong ma gzhan zhig skom pas nyam thag ste chu 'thung 'dod nas de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/_'phags ma skom ste chu btung gis mching phor g.yor cig des smras pa/_'di na 'dug gis long la song shig_/des blangs te song ba dang /_lag nas lhung ste 
[\[224b.6\]]chag nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/dus gzhan zhig na sbom dga' mos de dran nas de'i drung du song ste smras pa/_'phags ma mching phor bsnams pa de stsol cig_/des smras pa/_'phags ma 'tshal na 'on kyang lag nas lhung ste chag gis gzhan zhig nyos te dbul lo/_/des 
[\[224b.7\]]smras pa/_de nyid byin cig ces des de ring zhig tu gtses te btang ngo /_/skabs de dge slong ma dag gis dge slong dag la bsnyad do/_/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]mching phor nas chu 'thung ba las gyur gyis/_de'i phyir dge slong mas mching phor du chu btung bar mi bya'o snyam du mkhyen nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong ma dag mching phor nas chu 'thung ba las gyur gyis/_de 
[\[225a.2\]]lta bas na dge slong mas mching phor nas chu btung bar mi bya zhing gzhan yang btung ba dang bza' bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong ma mching phor nas chu'am gzhan du yang rung 'thung ngam za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//sdom ni/_ri mo'i mkhar len me dang ni/_/khrus dang 
[\[225a.3\]]'gags dang lhung bzed kyi/_/lhag rol ma yin lhung bzed gzhir/_/rkang pa mi gzhag lham dag go/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas 
[\[225a.4\]]sbyin gyis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la rgyal byed kyi tshal phul ba de'i tshe de'i blo skyes pa 'di ri mo ma bris pas mi sdug ste/_de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na 'di ri mo bri'o snyam du rig nas de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[225a.5\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal 'di ri mo ma bris pas mi sdug ste/_de'i slad du bcom 
[\[225a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis 'di ri mo bri bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag de lta bas na gnang gis ri mo ris shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ri mo ris shig ces bka' stsal nas/_des tshon rtsi dag kyang bsogs/_ri mo 
[\[225a.7\]]mkhan rnams kyang bos te smras pa/_shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang gis/_de'i phyir tshon rtsi 'di dag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal ri mo ris shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag ri mo bri na phyogs gang du ci zhig bri ba gsung shig_/des smras pa/_
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]shes ldan dag bdag gis mi shes kyis sdod cig dang bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag legs te de bzhin du mdzod cig dang sdod do/_/de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[225b.2\]]'das tshon rtsi dag kyang bsogs/_ri mo mkhan rnams kyang bos na de dag gi mchid nas khyim bdag phyogs gang du ci zhig bri ba smros shig ces mchi na/_de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste phyogs gang du ci zhig bri ba bka' stsal du gsol/_
[\[225b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gal te de lta na song la re zhig phyi sgor gnod sbyin lag na dbyug thogs 'drir bcug nas/_sgo khang du ni cho 'phrul chen po dang 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa/_khyams su ni skyes pa'i rabs kyi phreng ba/_dri gtsang khang gi sgor ni 
[\[225b.4\]]gnod sbyin lag na phreng ba thogs pa dag_/rim gro'i khang par ni dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag chos rnam par gtan la 'bebs par byed pa/_bkad sar ni gnod sbyin lag na zas thogs pa dag_/mdzod kyi sgor ni gnod sbyin lag na lcags kyu thogs pa dag_/chu'i khang 
[\[225b.5\]]par ni klu lag na bum pa thogs pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag_/khrus khang ngam/_bsro gang du ni lha'i mdo las 'byung ba'am/_gzhan dmyal ba'i rabs/_nad pa'i sman khang du ni de bzhin gshegs pa nad pa'i nad g.yog mdzad pa/_chab khung sar ni dur khrod shin tu 
[\[225b.6\]]'jigs su rung ba/_gnas khang gi sgor ni rus pa'i keng rus dang /_mgo'i thod pa bri'o/_/btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas thams cad de kho na bzhin du 'drir bcug go/_/gang gi tshe khyim bdag 
[\[225b.7\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal ri mo bris pa de'i tshe dge slong shes bzhin med par gnas pa kha cig gis der me bus pas du bas ri mo ma rung bar gyur nas/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngas me'i khang pa gnang gis dge slong gang zhig la me dgos pa des me'i khang par me bud par bya'i khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]ni ma yin no/_/khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]me 'bud na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis me'i khang 
[\[226a.2\]]par me bud par bya'i khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]ni ma yin no zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong gzhan nad pa dag cig 'khod pa de dag mes phongs par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nad pa gang dag mes phongs pa de dag gis gtsug lag khang gi phyi 
[\[226a.3\]]rol lam/_rdzing drung du me bus la mdag ma du ba med pa nang du gzhag par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]khrus byed pas ri mo byid nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]khrus mi bya'i 'on kyang rdzing gi grwa gcig tu ston pa'i spyan sngar 
[\[226a.4\]]ma bab pa'am/_khrus kyi khang pa byas nas der khrus bya'o/_/'dam du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyogs der so phag gi gcal dgram par bya'o/_/chu 'khyil nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chu'i stor khung gdod par bya'o/_/
[\[226a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis chu'i stor khung gdod par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_chu'i stor khung gi kha 'gags par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dus dus su bsal bar bya zhing chu'i stor khung gi kha nyid du khrus bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[226a.6\]]mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na bram ze zhig gi bu na bar gyur nas de sman pa'i drung du song ste smras pa/_bkra shis par gyur cig_/bkra shis par gyur cig_/sman pas smras pa/_jo bo ci bzhed 
[\[226a.7\]]gsung shig_/des smras pa/_kye dge ba cung zad kyang mi 'dod mod kyi/_'on kyang kho bo'i bu nad 'di dang 'dis thebs kyis sman ston cig_/sman pa de dad pa can zhig pas des smras pa/_bram ze 'phags pa rnams kyi drung du bzhud la lhung bzed kyi chu slongs la de khrus 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]shig dang sos par 'gyur ro/_/des bram ze bkra shis par gyur cig ces smras nas chas te rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo /_/drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stong pa yin te/_tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[226b.2\]]gyi sgo na 'chags pa des bram ze de mthong nas smras pa/_bram ze chen po 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so/_/khyod zla ba lta bur gnas pa yin na ring mo zhig ste ga las 'ongs/_'phags pa phyag 'tshal lo/_/ring mo zhig ste mthong ba ni legs te/_yang dang yang du 
[\[226b.3\]]mthong bas ni brnyas par 'gyur ro/_/dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/_'phags pa bdag gi bu bro tshabs chen po zhig gis thebs te/_de la sman pas 'phags pa rnams kyi thad nas lhung bzed kyi chu blangs te des bkrus dang sos par 'gyur ro zhes bstan nas/_bdag lhung bzed kyi 
[\[226b.4\]]chu bslang ba'i slad du 'dir mchis kyis stsol cig_/des smras pa/_khyod ko lhung bzed kyi chu'i phyir 'dir 'ongs pa lta/_'phags pa de lta lags te dgos pa de ni mchis so/_/gal te de lta na sdod cig dang kho bos lhung bzed kyi chu blang ngo zhes byas nas de nang du song ngo /_/
[\[226b.5\]]des zan zos nas lhung bzed bkrus te der rus pa dang /_sha'i kham tshad dang /_nya'i gram dang /_'bras can gyi brul ma dang /_phye dang /_tshong shol dang /_khur ba cung zad cig blugs so/_/de nas phyir byung nas smras pa/_bram ze lhung bzed kyi chu 'de re khyer cig_/bram zes 
[\[226b.6\]]mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gi bu gum bla'i chu 'di lta bu mi gtsang bas khrus bgyis pa ni mi rung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_khyod dad pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pas khyod kyi bu sos zin du zad do/_/bram ze de 'phya ba la zhugs nas/_skabs de

[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]du dgongs te/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis lhung bzed nas lhag rol dor bar mi bya'o/_/'dor na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang ngas dge slong gis lhung bzed kyi chu sbyin par byed pa'i 
[\[227a.2\]]kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong lhung bzed kyi chu sbyin par byed pas lhung bzed lan gsum bkrus te/_lhung bzed kyi chu la gtsug lag gi tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bsngags nas sbyin par bya'o/_/dge slong lhung bzed kyi chu sbyin par byed pas kun 
[\[227a.3\]]tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te mi 'jug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong dag lhung bzed kyi gzhi la rkang 
[\[227a.4\]]pa bzhag ste zan za ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni gtsang sbra med pa ste/_lhung bzed kyi gzhi la rkang pa bzhag ste zan za'o/_/zhes 'phya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan

[\[227a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/_/dge slong dag lham ma phud par zan za ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni gtsang sbra med pa ste lham ma phud

[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]bya'o/_/dge slong lham ma phud par zan za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lham ma phud par zan bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong dag gis lham phud de zan za bar brtsams pa dang /_de dag na bar gyur pa'i skabs

[\[227b.4\]]snga nas lhung bzed nye bar ma bzhag go/_/ji tsam na dge slong rnams zas kyi dus la bab ste rang rang gi lhung bzed dag bkrus nas lhung bzed kyi gzhi la bzhag ste mchod rten la phyag 'tshal du dong ba dang /_des bsams pa/_lhung bzed 'di dag mang mo zhig 'dug pas gdon mi za bar

[\[227b.6\]]'di ni gnas brtan kun shes kauN+Di n+ya'i yin gyis 'di ma len cig_/des de bzhag nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /_bzang po dang /_rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_gang po dang /_dri ma med pa dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_dge slong gzhan dag cig gi lhung bzed dag blang 
[\[227b.7\]]bar brtsams pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod la lhung bzed med na lhung bzed med pa khyod sus rab tu phyung /_des smras pa/_mkhan po nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]so/_/dge slong rnams 'phya bar byed de gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa de ma yin pa gzhan su zhig gis lhung 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]bzed med pa rab tu 'byin ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis lhung bzed med pa rab tu dbyung bar mi bya ste/_rab tu 'byin na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/rab tu

[\[228a.3\]]'khor bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa rnams ni 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa dge slong dag gis lhung bzed chung ngu'am/_lhung bzed chen po'am/_lhung bzed skya bos bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyid na bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes

[\[228a.5\]]chom rkun par grags pa zhig rkun po byed pa tshor nas des bzung ba dang /_brkus pa bor nas bros so/_/de lam gyi ngal bas dub nas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi lam ka shing zhig gi drung na lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' 
[\[228a.6\]]snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir chas pa des de mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod su'i/_des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag ni mgon med pa zhig ste/_bdag la ci yang ma mchis so/_/des smras pa/_bzhin 
[\[228a.7\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gal te de lta na ci ste rab tu mi 'byung /_des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod rab tu byung ba lags pas re zhig drang por smra bar bgyi ste/_bdag ni chom rkun par grags pa lags na su zhig bdag rab tu 'byin/_bu bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ni thugs rjes rab tu phye ba 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]yin pas su zhig rab tu mi 'byin/_sems rton cig dang ngas rab tu dbyung ngo /_/'phags pa legs te rab tu 'byung ngo /_/des de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas/_smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mi gsos kyis mnyan yod rgya chen por rang gi spyod

[\[228b.3\]]ldan dag 'di ni chom rkun par grags pa de yin na rab tu byung ngo zhes zer/_gzhan dag na re dge sbyong shAkya'i bu pa rnams kyi chos ni bzang ste chom rkun par grags pa yang rab tu 'byin par byed do/_/'di dag ni nyin mo bsod snyoms pa'i cha byad kyis khyim dag tu glags bcad nas nub

[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]bar 'ongs na/_des de la chom rkun par grags pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par rab tu 'byin na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po nyi shu pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod 
[\[229a.2\]]na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe gnas zhig na dge slong mang po zhig gcig cig la gnas bcas te 'dug pa las/_ji tsam na de dag gi gnas kyi slob dpon de dus las 'das pa dang /_de dag gis su zhig la 
[\[229a.3\]]bdag cag gis 'phral gyi bya ba zhu bar bya ba dang /_gang la gnas bcas te 'dug par bya ba mi shes nas/_skabs de dge slong rnams la bsnyad do/_/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong de dag gis 
[\[229a.4\]]dge slong zhig las su bsko ba spang ba dang /_gnas khang spang ba dang /_mal stan spang ba dang /_rim gro pa spang bas btsal bar bya ste/_ci ste rnyed na de lta na legs/_ci ste ma rnyed na dge slong de dag gis gnas der gso sbyong gnyis pa'i bar du 'dug par mi bya ste 'dug na 'gal tshabs

[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]dag gi slob dpon de yang dus las 'das nas/_de dag gis kyang ji ltar bsgrub pa mi shes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong de dag gis kyang dge slong zhig las su bsko ba spang ba dang /_
