[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]dag gis gnas der gso sbyong gnyis pa'i bar du 'dug par mi bya ste/_'dug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gzhan dag cig gnas shig tu dge slong gcig cig gis rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa las/_de dag gi mkhan po de dus las 
[\[230a.2\]]'das pa dang /_de dag gis kyang ji ltar bsgrub pa mi shes zhes bya ba nas thams cad slob dpon la ji lta bar snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/ri 'or zhig 
[\[230a.3\]]na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des gtsug lag khang byed du bcug ste yo byad thams cad kyis bkang nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de rgyal po'i pho brang du bzung ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis thos so/_/de dag gis thos 
[\[230a.4\]]nas gtsug lag khang bor te bros pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor ma byin par len pa rnams kyis brkus so/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag de slar btang ste/_dge slong rnams kyis gtsug lag khang gi bdag po de ji ltar slar btang ba thos nas de dag khyim bdag de'i drung du song ba dang /_
[\[230a.5\]]khyim bdag des ji ltar dge slong dag gtsug lag khang bor te bros nas dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor ma byin par len pa rnams kyis brkus pa snga nas thos pas des de dag bskyengs pa/_'phags pa khyed ci'i phyir bros/_de dag gis smras pa/_kho bo cag gis khyod rgyal po'i pho brang du 
[\[230a.6\]]ji ltar bzung ba thos te thos nas de nas bdag cag skrag ste bros so/_/'phags pa dag gal te bdag rgyal po'i pho brang du bzung yang khyed ko ci'i slad du 'bros/_bdag gi nye du dag ni ma bzung na ci de dag kyang khyed kyi yo byad sbyor bar mi 'gyur ram/_de dag spobs pa med par cang mi zer 
[\[230a.7\]]bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin 'bros par mi bya'i 'on kyang gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i nye du dag la gtsug lag khang gi bdag po ni rgyal po'i khab tu bzung na/_ci khyed kyis bdag 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]cag gi bsod snyoms kyi yo byad sbyar nus sam zhes dri bar bya ste/_gal te de dag sbyor na de lta na legs/_ci ste mi sbyor na lo lnga'i bar du bsod snyoms bya zhing 'dug par bya'o/_/lo lnga 'das nas gal te gtsug lag khang gi bdag po slar btang na de lta na legs/_ji ste ma btang na 
[\[230b.2\]]gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las byas nas gtsug lag khang de'i nyen kor gyi gtsug lag khang dag yongs su skyong bar byed pa rnams dang /_rnyed pa thun mong dang gso sbyong tha dad pa dag gis lo gzhan lnga'i bar du 'dug par bya'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_nyen kor gyi gtsug lag khang 
[\[230b.3\]]dag tu gnas mal bshams te/_gaN+DI brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa dang /_dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gtsug 
[\[230b.4\]]lag khang che ge mo zhig gi bdag po rgyal pos bzung ste/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis gtsug lag khang de gtsug lag khang 'di dag dang rnyed pa thun mong dang gso sbyong tha dad par bgyi'o/_/'di ni 
[\[230b.5\]]gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig gi bdag po rgyal pos bzung ste/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis gtsug lag khang de gtsug lag khang 'di dag dang rnyed pa thun mong dang gso sbyong tha dad par mdzad 
[\[230b.6\]]na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gtsug lag khang de gtsug lag khang 'di dag dang rnyed pa thun mong dang gso sbyong tha dad par mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis gtsug lag khang che ge 
[\[230b.7\]]mo zhig rnyed pa thun mong dang gso sbyong tha dad par mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/gal te rnam pa des lo bcu'i bar du gnas pa rnams la gtsug lag khang gi bdag po 'ongs na de lta na legs/_ji ste ma 'ongs na nyen kor gyi gtsug lag khang dag tu 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]gnas mal dang /_snod dang /_yo byad dag bzhag nas nang sgo bcad de 'gro bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe gtsug lag khang gi bdag po slar btang ba de'i tshe nyen kor gyi gtsug lag khang nas rdzas ji ltar bzhag pa rnams phyir blangs te de nyid du sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te nyen kor 
[\[231a.2\]]gyi gtsug lag khang na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis byin na de lta na legs/_ci ste ma byin na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde rnams lus kyis 
[\[231a.3\]]khur khyer ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya bar byed de/_'phags pa re zhig bdag cag ni khyim pa khyim na gnas pa lags pas pha ma dang bu dang /_bu mo dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_rgyal po dang /_lha dang /_gshin ngog 
[\[231a.4\]]dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze rnams kyi don du lus kyis khur 'tshal na khyed ko su'i don du khur snoms/_de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim 
[\[231a.5\]]bdag rnams 'phya ba ni thog tu bab po/_/de lta bas na dge slong gis lus kyis khur bkur bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong lus kyis khur khyer na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis lus kyis khur bkur bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[231a.6\]]drug sde rnams kyis rgyab dang /_rked pa dang /_glo dang /_mgos khur bkur bar brtsams te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyab kyis ma yin/_rked pas ma yin/_glos ma yin/_mgos khur bkur bar mi bya ste/_'khur na 'gal 
[\[231a.7\]]tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//sdom ni/_gnas dang yo byad drug dang ni/_/de nas de las phrogs pa dang /_/yid gcugs len pa lnga dang ni/_/btso blag sgo khang 'chag sa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bram ze rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa zhig rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_ji tsam na dge slong lag na lhung bzed thogs pa mang po khar gsil thogs nas bsod snyoms la chas pa de dag des mthong nas des bsams pa/_re zhig 'di dag gang du 'gro 
[\[231b.2\]]dri'o snyam nas des de dag la dris pa/_'phags pa gang du bzhud de dag gis smras pa/_bram ze bsod snyoms la 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa dge slong thams cad bsod snyoms la rgyu'am/_de dag gis smras pa/_bram ze dge slong bshes gnyen can gang dag yin pa de dag la ni bram ze 
[\[231b.3\]]dang khyim bdag rnams bsod snyoms gtsug lag khang du khyer te 'ongs nas 'bul lo/_/bshes gnyen med pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni bsod snyoms la 'gro'o/_/des bsams pa/_dge sbyong shAkya'i bu pa rnams kyi nang du rab tu phyung ba dang khyad par ci yod kyis bdag gis 'dir yang de bzhin 
[\[231b.4\]]du bsod snyoms la 'gro bar bya'o snyam mo/_/des yang bsams pa/_re zhig dge slong gzhan zhig la yang ci 'di dag bsod snyoms kho na la gnas te rab tu byung ngam/_'on te gnas gzhan yang yod dri bar bya'o snyam nas/_de dge slong zhig gi drung du song ba dang /_des de la 'ongs pa legs 
[\[231b.5\]]so zhes bya ba'i kun tu spyod pa kun tu spyad nas smras pa/_bram ze khyod gang nas ci'i phyir 'dir 'ongs/_des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod blta ba kho na'i phyir 'ongs te/_re zhig khyod ci la gnas nas rab tu byung ba dri'o/_/des smras pa/_bram ze legs so legs so/_/khyod kyi rtog pa 
[\[231b.6\]]ni bzang ste 'dug shig dang gtam bya'o/_/bram ze rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa des rkang pa la phyag byas nas de'i mdun du 'dug pa dang /_des smras pa/_bram ze bzhi po 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi 
[\[231b.7\]]gnas su bcas pa yin no/_/bram ze bzhi gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gos rnams kyi nang na phyag dar khrod ni rung ba rnyed kyang sla ba ste/_de la gnas na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]ro/_/zas rnams kyi nang na bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal rnams kyi nang na shing drung dang /_sman rnams kyi nang na bkus te bor ba ni rung ba rnyed kyang sla ba ste/_de la gnas na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 
[\[232a.2\]]'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/bram ze bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la gnas su bcas pa ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te/_'di dag la gnas nas bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ro/_/bram 
[\[232a.3\]]zes smras pa/_'phags pa su zhig gnas 'di dag gis 'tsho bar nus/_bdag rab tu 'byung ngo snyam ste 'dir mchis na rab tu 'byung ba 'di yang dka' ba zhig pas phyag 'tshal lo mchi'o zhes smras te song ngo /_/de nyid de rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po'i 
[\[232a.4\]]bar chad du gyur nas/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag rab tu ma byung ba kho na la gnas bzhi brjod pa las gyur gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis rab tu ma byung ba'am/_
[\[232a.5\]]bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la gnas bzhi brjod par mi bya'i/_gang gi tshe rab tu byung bsnyen par rdzogs pa/_de'i tshe gnas bzhi brjod par bya'o/_/rab tu ma byung bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la gnas bzhi rjod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/mnyan yod na khyim 
[\[232a.6\]]bdag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/_/rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags te de bskyed bsrings 
[\[232a.7\]]nas chen por gyur to/_/de dus gzhan zhig na phas spyos pa dang /_des bsams pa/_pha mgu dka' bar gyur gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal du song la rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo /_/drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stong 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]pa yin te/_tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' sgo na 'dug pa des de mthong nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'ongs pa legs so/_/khyod zla ba lta bur gnas pa yin na ring mo zhig lon te ga las 'ongs/_des smras pa/_'phags pa ring mo zhig lon te mthong ba ni legs kyi/_yang dang yang mthong ba ni 
[\[232b.2\]]brnyas par 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang 'phags pa rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal gyis rab tu phyung shig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyi sems bskyed pa ni bzang ste rab tu byung ba ni mchog go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis phan yon lnga mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar bya bar mos par bya ba'i rigs so zhes bya ba 
[\[232b.3\]]nas/_sangs rgyas rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dam pa yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de lta bas na legs kyis rab tu phyung shig_/de lta mod kyi 'di la yo byad drug dgos na khyod la yo byad drug yod dam/_'phags pa yo byad 
[\[232b.4\]]drug po de dag ji lta bu zhig lags/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lhung bzed dang /_chu tshags dang /_chos gos gsum dang /_gding ba'o/_/'phags pa ma mchis so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo la yang med de/_re zhig song shig dang kho bos yo byad drug btsal lo/_/de pha spangs nas gnyen dag gi drung du song 
[\[232b.5\]]ba dang /_de dag gis khye'u de ji ltar rab tu 'byung ba thos pas de dag gis de'i chung ma blangs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]yo byad drug bzhag ste mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /_des khye'u de srang du mthong nas/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bos yo byad drug po de 
[\[232b.6\]]dag rnyed de/_tshur rab tu dbyung gis 'dong /_des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis kyang yo byad drug rnyed do/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci 'dra ba dag cig_/'phags pa mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid do/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de ji tha tshig_/'phags pa bdag nye 
[\[232b.7\]]du rnams kyis chung ma blangs na/_ci da rab tu 'byung ngam/_de nyid de'i rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po'i bar chad du gyur nas/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]lta bas na gnang gis yo byad drug brnyas nas rab tu dbyung bar bya zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o/_/legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po rnyed dka' bas yo byad drug po dag rim gyis btsal nas brnyas pa slar 
[\[233a.2\]]byin cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang rkun po dag gis bcom nas de dag gis phrogs pa de khyer te rgyal byed kyi tshal du lhags nas btsong bar brtsams so/_/dge slong bcom pa de dag kyang de nyid du 'ongs nas dge slong de dag gis 
[\[233a.3\]]rang gi lhung bzed dang chos gos dag ngo shes te de dag gis ku cho'i sgra bton nas shes ldan dag 'di dag gis bdag cag gi lhung bzed dang chos gos 'di phrogs kyis/_rkun po rnams zung shig zung shig ces byas pa dang /_de dag ku cho'i sgra thos nas skrag ste bros so/_/dge slong rnams 
[\[233a.4\]]kyis rang rang gi lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs nas 'dug ste ci 'di bdag cag la rung ba yin nam 'on te rung ba ma yin mi shes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni gang gis phrogs pa de kho na'i 
[\[233a.5\]]yin pas de dag bsdigs par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de ni gang gis phrogs pa de kho na'i yin no zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong gzhan dag cig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang /_rkun po rnams kyis mthong nas de dag gis de rnams gzhom par brtsams te/_de dag 
[\[233a.6\]]gis de rnams kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos ji snyed la lag pas reg pa de rnyed lta ba med par bor nas de rnams lhung bzed dang /_chos gos kyis phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji srid rkun po 
[\[233a.7\]]dag gis phrogs khyer nas sbyor ba'i rgyun ma bcad pa de srid du lta ba med par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji srid du rkun po dag gis phrogs pa khyer nas sbyor ba rgyun ma bcad pa de srid du lta ba med par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_rkun po de dag gis phrogs pa de khyer nas 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]mnyan yod du zhugs te srang du btsong bar brtsams so/_/dge slong de rnams kyis phrogs pa de ngo shes te ngo shes nas rkun po de rnams rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid de/_de dag der gsad pa dang /_bcing ba dang /_gcad pa dang /_dbug pa la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi khyad par dag gis 
[\[233b.2\]]nye bar gzir cing shin tu sdug bsngal bar byas pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po'i pho brang du sbron par mi bya'i 'on kyang sngar chos bshad nas bslang bar bya'o/_/gal te mi ster na rin phyed kyis 
[\[233b.3\]]blang bar bya'o/_/gal te de ltar yang mi ster na rin tshang bar byin la blang bar bya ste/_dge slong dag gis lhung bzed dang chos gos byas pa mthar phyin pa ni rnyed par dka'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/dge slong dag gis lci ba skam po dang /_so shing tshon rtsi'i shal ma la 
[\[233b.4\]]sogs pa de bzhin du bor nas mi lta bar dong ba dang /_de dag dge slong 'gas kyang 'gyod pas ma blangs pas de nyid du chus zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yid gcugs pa lngas len pa 
[\[233b.5\]]mdza' ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_bla ma dang /_dran par bya ba dang /_thos nas dga' bar 'gyur ro snyam nas len pa ni legs par blangs pa yin te 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis btso blag gi las bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa/_
[\[233b.6\]]dge slong dag gis sgo khang dang 'chag sa dag tu chos gos dag btsos pas de dag rdul gyis kyang phog_/rdzi char gyis kyang gsher ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gtsug lag khang du btso blag 
[\[233b.7\]]gi las bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis gtsug lag khang du btso blag gi las bya bar brtsams pa dang /_tshon sa la bo ba khrag lta bur snang ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa phyogs 'dir ra lug gsad dam ci/_de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]dag bdag cag gis phyogs 'dir btso blag gi las byas pas 'dir tshon rtsi bo'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa gal te tshon rtsi pho na te por mi sdug par snang gis sa byi dor bgyid du stsol cig_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa 
[\[234a.2\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zhal zhal byug par bya'o/_/de dag gis thams cad du byugs pa dang /_rdo thal dag ma rung bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rdo thal can ni bkru bar bya'o/_/gzhan du ni zhal zhal gyis byug par bya'o//_//
[\[234a.3\]]sdom ni/_shing rnams bskyed par gnang ba dang /_/na me ru ka gos dag dang /_/kha tshar ring po tshigs bcad du/_/bsdus nas sdom du yang dag bstan/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom 
[\[234a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin lus 'phags ri la bden pa la bzhag pa'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos der dus ston btsugs pas der yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad 'du'o/_/lus 'phags ri rdo can shing med pa zhig pas yul ma ga d+hA na 
[\[234a.5\]]gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs tsha bas gdungs te smras pa/_'phags pa kye ma khyod kyis 'dir shing bskyed mdzod cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/'phags pa 'di la ci zhig 'gal/_de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs 
[\[234a.6\]]de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis shing bskyed par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis shing bskyed par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis shing bskyed de dong bas 
[\[234a.7\]]de dag de bzhin du bskams so/_/yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs phyi de lo lhags pa dang /_de bzhin du tsha bas gdungs nas smras pa/_'phags pa khyed kyis shing de dag ma bskyed dam/_shes ldan dag bskyed na 'on kyang zhal ta ma byas pas ma rung ngo /_/'phags pa 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]gal te khyed kyang pha ma dag gis bskyed nas zhal ta byas par ma gyur na khyed kyang ma rung bar 'gyur ro/_/kye ma khyed kyis zhal ta mdzod cig_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shing bskyed nas yal bar 
[\[234b.2\]]dor bar mi bya'i 'on kyang zhal ta bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis shing bskyed nas yar bar dor bar mi bya'i 'on kyang zhal ta bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis ji ltar zhal ta bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dus dus su 
[\[234b.3\]]chus bcu bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag de kho na lhur len pas dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lhur blang bar mi bya'i la lar ni lag pa/_la lar ni rkang pa bkru bar bya'o/_/la lar ni so shing bza' bar bya'o/_/la lar 
[\[234b.4\]]ni lhung bzed bkru bar bya'o/_/la lar ni khrus bya'o/_/de dag dgun stod kyi dus su kha bas tshig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshas su gzhug par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis tshas su bcug pa dang /_de dag nags me shor bas tshig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[234b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_ra bas bskor bar bya'o/_/rlung ma shor bas tsha bas gdungs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skar khung gdod par bya'o/_/dbyar sbyong bzhin du chus gang ste 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dbyar gyi dus su rtsig pa bshig 
[\[234b.6\]]la chu 'bo bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis ji srid shing de dag chen por ma gyur par de dag bor te dong ba dang /_de dag de bzhin du bskams nas/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas dge slong shing 
[\[234b.7\]]skyed par byed pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong shing skyed par byed pas gal te me tog gi shing bskyed par gyur na ji srid du me tog ma chags pa de srid du 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/'on te 'bras bu'i shing bskyed par gyur na ji srid du 'bras bu ma chags pa de srid du 'gro 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]bar mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong shing skyed par byed pas/_ji srid du me tog dang 'bras bu ma chags pa de srid du 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams la bya ba rings pa dag cig byung ste/_de dag gis ji ltar bsgrub pa 
[\[235a.2\]]mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gis kun dga' ra ba pa'am/_dge slong smos 'drin la bcol nas 'gro bar bya ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na'o/_/rgyal po sa 'dzin gyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po 
[\[235a.3\]]la la ba rin po che zhig skyes su bskur ba dang /_de rgyal po gzugs can snying pos tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu la byin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus de gyon nas dgon pa'i gnas su song ste 'dug pa dang /_rkun po rnams kyis rgyal po sa 'dzin gyis rgyal po gzugs 
[\[235a.4\]]can snying po la la ba rin po che zhig bskur ba de des 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu la byin pa dang /_des de gyon nas dgon pa'i gnas che ge mo zhig na 'dug go zhes ji lta ba bzhin du thos nas de dag phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag de skad ces grag na 'di 
[\[235a.5\]]la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_kha cig gis smras pa/_'di la ci zhig bsgrub tu yod/_tshur dong la dbrog mod/_de dag dong ste sgo la dal gyis brdungs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus smras pa/_'di su zhig_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa bdag 
[\[235a.6\]]cag ni rkun po'o/_/ci 'dod/_'phags pa la ba rin po che'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gal te de lta na skar khung nas lag pa rkyong shig_/de nas gcig cig gis lag pa brkyang ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus la ba rin po che de ma 'chad cig_/ma 
[\[235a.7\]]'tshig cig 'dren pa na zad par ma gyur cig ces de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas skar khung nas de'i phyogs cig phyung ba dang /_rkun po rnams kyis drang shing drang nas phung por byas te drangs nas zad du ma btub nas de dag gis mtshon gyis bcad par brtsams na yang ma 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]chod/_mes bsregs par brtsams na yang 'tshig tu ma btub nas/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa pi lin da'i bu bdag cag la ci zhig tho btsam/_thong shig_/des smras pa/_skyes bu gti mug dag khyed kyis tho ma btsams na ngas ji ltar tho btsam/_khyed 
[\[235b.2\]]kyi stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa des drangs na ngas ji ltar mi gtang /_de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu rdzu 'phrul chen po mthu chen pos ma btang phan chad 'dzin pa 'ongs na mi rung gis bros te 'dong ngo 
[\[235b.3\]]zhes de dag bros so/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong de lta bu'i rin po che dag gyon nas dgon pa'i gnas na 'dug pa las gyur gyis/_de'i 
[\[235b.4\]]phyir dge slong gis de lta bu'i rin po che dag dgon pa'i gnas su bkur bar mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong pi lin da'i bus la ba rin po che de 'dra ba gyon nas dgon pa'i gnas su 'dug pa gang yin pa ni ma legs 
[\[235b.5\]]pa zhig byas so/_/de lta bas na dge slong gis la ba rin po che de lta bu gyon nas dgon pa'i gnas su 'dug par mi bya'o/_/'dug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang dge slong dgon pa'i gnas na gnas pa gang zhig la la ba rin po che de lta bu bdog pa 
[\[235b.6\]]des khyim du gzhag par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis la ba rin po che de 'dra ba khyim du gzhag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dgon pa'i gnas na 'dug pa gzhan zhig la chen po la 'os pa'i la ba grub pa des de khyim du bzhag pa dang /_srog 
[\[235b.7\]]chags dag gis rmugs pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_na me ru kas btab ste gzhag par bya'o/_/gal te ma rnyed na shing kun nam/_ba sha ka'i lo ma'am/_a ri sta'i 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]lo mas rim pa rim par btab nas gzhag par bya'o/_/rim pa rim pas gdab tu ma 'byor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te 'byor pa med na steng du btab nas gzhag par bya zhing dus dus su bskam par bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod 
[\[236a.2\]]na'o/_/gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba de'i tshe de'i dus na dus su ston pa'i zhabs dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la phyag 'tshal du 'ong ngo /_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dgun ga 
[\[236a.3\]]dge slong rnams lhags pas sbrebs nas bskums te gnas khang dag na nyal zhing 'dug go/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi ston pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal du rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba des dge slong de dag dge ba'i phyogs btang ste de bzhin du 'dug pa mthong nas des 
[\[236a.4\]]smras pa/_'phags pa gcig tu brtson pa'i bstan pa la ci ste dge ba'i phyogs btang ste bzhugs/_de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag lhags pas sbrebs so/_/de cang mi smra bar rkang pa la phyag byas te song ngo /_/des khyim du phyin nas gos lnga brgya dge 'dun la bskur ba 
[\[236a.5\]]dang /_dge slong rnams kyis kha tshar bcad nas btsag dang tshon gzhan gyis ci dga' mgur kha bsgyur te gyon no/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang ston pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pas dge slong rnams kyi gnas khang du bltas na gos de dag 
[\[236a.6\]]mi snang nas des smras pa/_'phags pa gos de dag mi gda' na khyed kyis gang du bzhag_/de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa khyed kyis chen po la 'os pa'i gos de lta bu chud gsan to/_/kye ma khyed kyis kha tshar ring po nyid dang 
[\[236a.7\]]dkar por bzhag mdzod cig_/de dag spobs pa med nas cang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dge 'dun gyis gos sar pa kha tsar ring po ring po dag 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]bcang bar bya'o/_/'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi las sgo bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//bsdus pa'i sdom ni/_lus dang gleng ba sangs rgyas dang /_/spang ba dag dang nga 'das dang /_/mtshams las phyi rol dge slong rnams/_/dus ston rgyu bar bcas pa'o/_/sdom 
[\[236b.2\]]ni/_ro ni bsreg par bya ba dang /_/shA ri'i bu yi mchod rten dang /_/der ni dus ston bya ba dang /_/dung dang nya phyis tshong pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na 
[\[236b.3\]]khyim bdag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig ces bya ba nas/_bu pho zhig btsas te de btsas pa'i btsas ston zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags te bsrings bskyed nas chen por 
[\[236b.4\]]gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /_de'i khams ma mnyam nas na bar gyur te/_de rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu'i sman dag gis rim gro byas na ma 
[\[236b.5\]]phan te dus las 'das so/_/de dge slong dag gis lhung bzed dang bcas/_chos gos dang bcas par lam dang nye ba zhig tu bor ro/_/ji tsam na lam de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag 'gro ba de dag gis de mthong ste/_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 
[\[236b.6\]]shAkya'i bu zhig dus las 'das so/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_tshur sheg blta bar bya'o/_/de dag gis mthong nas ngo shes te de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di ni khyim bdag che ge mo'i bu yin te/_dge sbyong shAkya'i bu pa mgon med pa rnams kyi 
[\[236b.7\]]nang du rab tu byung bas gnas skabs 'di 'dra bar gyur to/_/'di dag gi nang du rab tu byung bar ma gyur na de nye du dag gis 'di rim gro byas par 'gyur ba zhig_/skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong shi ba'i rim gro bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong shi ba'i rim gro bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag ji ltar rim gro bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bsreg 
[\[237a.2\]]par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bsreg par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'di la srin bu'i rigs brgyad khri yod do zhes gang gsungs pa de dag ji lta bu lags/_
[\[237a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nye ba 'khor de skyes ma thag tu de dag kyang skye la/_shi ba'i tshe de dag kyang 'chi mod kyi 'on kyang rma'i sgo rnams su brtags te bsreg par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bsreg par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_shing ma 'byor nas 
[\[237a.4\]]skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chu klung dag tu dor bar bya'o/_/chu klung med nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sa brkos te gzhug par bya'o/_/dbyar kha sa yang 'thas la 
[\[237a.5\]]shing yang srog chags can du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thibs po'i phyogs su mgo byang phyogs su bstan te sngas su rtswa'i bam po bzhag la glo g.yas pas bsnyal te rtswa'am lo ma'i tshogs kyis g.yogs la yon bsngo zhing rgyun chags 
[\[237a.6\]]gsum gyi chos mnyan pa byin nas 'dong bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag de bzhin du dong ba dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni ro bskyal nas khrus mi byed par de bzhin 'dong ste gtsang sbra med do/_/zhes 'phya bar byed nas/_skabs de bcom 
[\[237a.7\]]ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin du 'dong bar mi bya'i 'on kyang khrus bya'o/_/de dag thams cad bkru bar brtsams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thams cad khrus mi 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]bya'i gang dag reg pa de dag gis gos dang bcas te bkru bar bya'o/_/gzhan dag gis ni rkang lag nyi tshe bkru bar bya'o/_/de dag mchod rten la phyag mi 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mchod rten la phyag 'tshal bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[237b.2\]]ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyi kun tu spyod pa ni dus dus su sems can dmyal bar yang rgyu zhing 'dong /_dud 'gror yang 'dong /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag tu yang 'dong /_lha'i 
[\[237b.3\]]nang du yang 'dong /_mi dag tu yang rgyu zhing 'dong ngo /_/de gnyis dus gzhan zhig na dmyal bar rgyu zhing 'dong ba las mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen por son pa dang /_der tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa maud 
[\[237b.4\]]gal gyi bu dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams ngal sos par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i ltar mnyan te/_nam mkha' la 'phags nas char shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi 
[\[237b.5\]]rgyun dbab par brtsams pa dang /_chu de mnar med pa'i me lce'i 'od kyis bar du bskams par gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po gzhes shig dang /_bdag gis ngal sos par bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_legs 
[\[237b.6\]]kyis de bzhin du ngal sos par mdzod cig ces smras te/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bsdad pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ting nge 'dzin mos pa can zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas des mnar med pa chen po de bsil bar byas te/_mnar 
[\[237b.7\]]med pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rgyun bcad do/_/de nas de gnyis kyis rdzogs byed chos log par ston pas lus chen por gyur cing de'i lce la yang gshol lnga brgyas rmed pa mthong ba dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]gal te 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bdag gi mchid nas/_ngas chos log par bstan pas skye bo'i tshogs mang po bslus te/_nga las yang dag par blangs shing kun tu spyad pa des lce la gshol 
[\[238a.2\]]lnga brgyas rmed cing khyed kyis ji lta ji ltar nga'i mchod rten la rjed pa byas pa de lta de ltar nga la sdug bsngal ches mi bzad par gyur gyis phyin cad ma byed par thong shig ces mchi'o zhes gsungs shig_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu dag gis rdzogs 
[\[238a.3\]]byed la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu mnar med pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/_rgyal po'i khab tu dong ngo /_/de gnyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dbyug thogs spyi phud can dag cig phyir byung nas 
[\[238a.4\]]de dag kha cig gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag brdeg go/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_de bzhin kho nar brdegs na ma legs te klan ka btsal nas brdeg par bya'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_de bzhin du bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 
[\[238a.5\]]sngar song ba dang /_de dag gis de la smras pa/_'phags pa shA ri'i bu kun tu 'tsho ba dag la dge sbyong yod dam/_des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_kun tu 'tsho la dge sbyong med/_/shAkya rnams kyi nang na yod/_/dgra bcom dag la chags ldan med/_/bus pa so 
[\[238a.6\]]so'i skye bo'ang med/_/de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de'i don khong du ma chud nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di ni bdag cag gi bsngags pa smras kyis su ci yang ma smra bar 'gror chug shig ces byas te de song ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu phyi 
[\[238a.7\]]bzhin du 'ong ba sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa nye bar gnas pas dal nas dal nas 'ong ba de dag gis mthong nas/_'phags pa maud gal gyi bu kun tu 'tsho ba dag la dge sbyong yod dam/_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag kun tu 'tsho ba dag la dge sbyong ga la yod 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di la dge sbyong dang po yod/_'di la gnyis pa yod/_'di la gsum pa yod/_'di la bzhi pa yod kyi 'di las phyi rol pa la ni dge sbyong dang bram ze med de pha rol rab tu smra ba rnams ni dge sbyong dang bram zes stong ngo /_/de lta bas na 'dir 
[\[238b.2\]]'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrags so/_/zhes gsungs so/_/gzhan yang khyed kyi ston pa de mnar med pa chen por skyes te/_chos log par bstan pas lus chen por gyur cing lce la gshol lnga brgyas rmed do/_/des nga la than btang ba bdag gi tshangs 
[\[238b.3\]]pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la ngas chos log par bstan pas skye bo'i tshogs mang po bslus te/_nga las yang dag par blangs shing kun tu spyad pa des lce la gshol lnga brgyas rmed cing khyed kyis ji lta ji ltar nga'i mchod rten la rjed par byas pa de lta de ltar nga la sdug 
[\[238b.4\]]bsngal ches mi bzad par gyur to/_/zhes gsungs shig ces zer ro/_/de dag rngam nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag mgo reg ngan pa bdag cag la kha zer bar ma zad/_bdag cag gi ston pa la yang mi snyan pa zer na ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_'di 
[\[238b.5\]]la bsgrub tu ci yod/_'di te por gtal du zad mod/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_sngar yang bdag cag gis smras pa yin te/_de de bzhin du brdeg gis tshur/_khyed na re klan ka btsal nas brdeg go zhes zer ba de ni da bdag cag dang bdag cag gi ston pa la kha byas 
[\[238b.6\]]pas don gyis grub po zhes de dag gis de'i yan lag dang nying lag 'dam bu bzhin bcom nas dong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu ci thogs snyam bsam nas/_des phyir log ste bltas na ji tsam na yan lag dang nying lag 'dam bu bzhin 
[\[238b.7\]]du bcom nas sa la 'gyel ba mthong ste/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu 'di ci nyes/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu las su zad mod gzhan ci zhig yin par 'gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]bu khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog tu ma bstan tam/_de ji ltar gyur/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bdag las kyis non pas rdzu zhes bya ba yang mi dran na rdzu 'phrul lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i 
[\[239a.2\]]bus tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu byis pa chung ngu bzhin du bla gos kyi nang du bcug nas gtsug lag khang du khyer ba dang /_dge slong dag gis de lta bu'i mi sdug pa mthong nas sngangs te 'dus nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la dris pa/_'di ci zhig_/des smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[239a.3\]]ldan pa maud gal gyi bu kun tu rgyu dbyug thogs spyi phud can rnams kyis 'di lta bur byas mod ces smras te/_des de dal gyis sa la bsnyal lo/_/dge slong dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog tu bstan pa ma yin 
[\[239a.4\]]nam/_des smras pa/_bstan na tshe dang ldan pa dag las rnams kyi mthu la ltos/_gang gis lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya brgya byin gyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnam par rgyal byed rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bos bsgul/_rab tu bsgul/_kun tu rab tu bsgul te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 
[\[239a.5\]]'phrul che ba dang mthu che ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa deng las kyis non nas rdzu zhes bya ba mi dran na rdzu 'phrul lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de na dge slong gang dag 'phags pa'i lam ma skyes pa de dag mi dga' zhing shin tu skyo nas dgon pa dang /_nags khrod dang /_bas mtha'i 
[\[239a.6\]]gnas mal dag tu gnas nas yid la byed pa bskyed par brtsams so/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer kun du kun du rgyu dbyug thogs spyi phud can rnams kyis/_'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po brdegs te yan lag dang nying lag 'dam bu bzhin du bcom nas/_'phags 
[\[239a.7\]]pa shA ri'i bus bu chung ngu bzhin du bla gos kyi nang du bcug ste 'od ma'i tshal du khyer nas srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig lus de ring po mi thogs par dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i sgra de grags nas srog chags brgya stong du ma 'od ma'i tshal du 'dus pa dang /_rgyal po ma 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]skyes dgra'i blon po dag gis lha 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po kun du rgyu dbyug thogs spyi phud can rnams kyis brdegs te yan lag dang nying lag 'dam bu bzhin du bcom nas/_'phags pa shA ri'i bus de bus pa chung ngu bzhin du bla gos kyi nang du bcug ste/_'od ma'i tshal 
[\[239b.2\]]du 'tshal te mchis na/_srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig lus te ring po mi thogs par dus bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/zhes sbran pa dang /_des thos nas khros de de rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag kun du rgyu dbyug thogs spyi phud can rnams tshol cig ces smras nas/_de btsun 
[\[239b.3\]]mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dag dang lhan cig 'od ma'i tshal du song ngo /_/de nas skye bo'i tshogs mang pos rgyal po mthong nas lam phye ba dang /_de mig mchi mas gang zhing snying rje rje skad du mi dga' ba'i tshig gis dal gyis dris pa/_'phags 
[\[239b.4\]]pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di ci zhig_/des smras pa/_rgyal po chen po las su bas mod/_gzhan ni ci zhig tu 'gyur/_'phags pa khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog tu bstan pa ma yin nam/_rgyal po chen po de de bzhin te bstan mod kyis 
[\[239b.5\]]las kyis non pas 'on kyang rdzu zhes bya ba yang mi dran na rdzu 'phrul lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bcom ldan 'das ni gnyis su mi gsung ba ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/_bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang /_/las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/_/tshogs shing dus 
[\[239b.6\]]la bab pa na/_/lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/_/ces gsungs pa de nye bar gnas par gyur to zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal pos gos kyi mtha' mas mchi ma phyis te sman pa thams cad bkug nas bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag gal te 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen 
[\[239b.7\]]po zhag bdun na sos par ma byas na khyed kyi dbang thang gcad par bya'o/_/zhes bsgo ste blon po dag la yang gtad nas song ngo /_/kun du rgyu dbyug thogs spyi phud can rnams kyang thos nas bros so/_/sman pa rnams kyis phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]dag rgyal pos ni de skad bka' stsal na 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ni bgres la/_de'i yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'dam bu bzhin du bcom pas de ji ltar gso bar nus/_ye de nyid mthu che ba rdzu 'phrul 
[\[240a.2\]]che ba yin pas de nyid la skyabs su 'dong ngo /_/kha cig gis smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin du bya'o zhes de dag thams cad 'dus nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i thad du song ste rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas/_smras pa/_'phags pa bdag cag la lhas 'di 
[\[240a.3\]]skad du 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po zhag bdun na ma sos na khyed kyi dbang thang gcad do zhes bka' stsal na/_khyod ni bgres pas sngon bzhin du bgyi bar bdag cag gis rngo mi thog ste/_khyod nyid rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bas ji ltar bdag cag gi dbang thang gcad par mi 
[\[240a.4\]]'gyur ba de ltar mdzad du gsol/_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te de lta na deng la/_rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bdag nyid zhag bdun na rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la 'jug go zhes gyis shig_/de dag rab tu dga' nas de'i 
[\[240a.5\]]rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i thad du song nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa lha 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bdag nyid dgung bdun na rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la 'jug go/_/rgyal po rab tu dga' nas smras pa/_shes ldan 
[\[240a.6\]]dag gal te de lta na legs so/_/ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang /_'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po rang nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis mi bde ba de med par byas te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/dgra bcom pa rnams kyi ye shes mthong ba ni bsam pas 
[\[240a.7\]]'jug pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po rab tu na na ci'i phyir bdag nyid rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs shes bsam pa la zhugs na yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'dod par mthong ngo /_/de de dang mdza' ba'i bag chags kyis 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]rgyud bsgos pas de nyid kyi nyin par nas na bar gyur te/_des bsam pa/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' na bdag ci ste 'dug_/bdag ches sngar mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam du bsams te/_rgyal po'i khab nas grong na la dar 
[\[240b.2\]]song ste/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i grong khyer na la da na rim gro pa dge sbyong gi ched skul byed dang /_nad tshabs chen pos mi bde zhing sdug bsngal te 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nad de nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_
[\[240b.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po yang grong khyer shing thags can du song nas/_de'i phyi dro yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/_dge slong phal cher dbang dang ldan pa sha stag la brgyad khri yongs 
[\[240b.4\]]su mya ngan las 'das so/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/_yang dge slong phal cher dbang dang ldan pa sha stag la bdun khri bdun stong yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas dge sbyong gi ched skul byed 
[\[240b.5\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i ring bsrel la lus kyis mchod pa byas te/_ring bsrel dang /_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dag khyer nas/_rgyal po'i khab ga la ba der rgyu zhing song ste rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba na rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to/_/dge sbyong gi ched skul byed lhung 
[\[240b.6\]]bzed dang chos gos cham du phab nas/_rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge sbyong 
[\[240b.7\]]gi ched skul byed kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bos mkhyen par mdzod cig_/bdag gi mkhan po btsun pa shA ri'i bu ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_de'i ring bsrel dang /_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos kyang 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]'di lags so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/_dge sbyong gi ched skul byed khrid de/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs 
[\[241a.2\]]gcig tu 'dug nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa dge sbyong gi ched skul byed kyis 'di bdag gang na ba der mchis te/_mchis nas bdag la 'di skad du/_btsun pa kun dga' bos mkhyen par mdzod cig_/
[\[241a.3\]]bdag gi mkhan po btsun pa shA ri'i bu yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_de'i ring bsrel dang /_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos kyang 'di lags so/_/zhes mchis nas/_btsun pa bdag gi lus gdung bar gyur cing phyogs kyang bslang /_chos shes pa rnams kyang bskyud 
[\[241a.4\]]par gyur to//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po nyi shu gcig pa/_kun dga' bo ci dge slong shA ri'i bus tshul khrims kyi phung po khyer te yongs su mya ngan las 'das sam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi 
[\[241a.5\]]phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po khyer te yongs su mya ngan las 'das sam/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/gang yang ngas nyid kyi mngon par shes pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te bshad pa'i 
[\[241a.6\]]chos 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dag khyer te yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[241a.7\]]sam/_btsun pa ma lags te/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshul khrims kyi phung po 'tshal te/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma lags/_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yang ma lags/_shes rab kyi phung po yang ma lags/_rnam par grol ba'i phung po yang 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]ma lags/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po 'tshal te mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma lags/_gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi mngon par shes pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_bshad pa'i chos 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[241b.2\]]bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dag 'tshal te yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma lags mod kyi 'on kyang /_
[\[241b.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_mang du thos pa/_chog shes pa/_'dod pa chung ba rab tu dben pa/_brtson 'grus brtsams pa/_dran pa nye bar gnas pa/_mnyam par gzhag pa/_shes rab can/_shes rab myur ba/_shes rab mgyogs pa/_
[\[241b.4\]]shes rab rno ba/_nges par 'byung ba'i shes rab can/_nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab can/_shes rab che ba/_shes rab yangs pa/_shes rab zab pa/_shes rab mnyam pa med pa/_shes rab rin po che dang ldan pa/_yang dag par ston par bgyid pa/_yang 
[\[241b.5\]]dag par len du 'jug par bgyid pa/_yang dag par gzengs stod par bgyid pa/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bgyid pa/_yang dag par ston pa dang /_yang dag par len du 'jug pa dang /_yang dag par gzengs stod pa dang /_yang dag par rab tu dga' ba'i 
[\[241b.6\]]bsngags pa brjod pa/_'khor bzhi la chos ston pa na dub pa ma mchis pa ste/_bdag tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i chos dang /_chos kyi longs spyod gang dag lags pa de dag rjes su dran na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i slad du dbyar 
[\[241b.7\]]ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don to/_/kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed/_blong bar ma byed/_smre sngags 'don par ma byed cig_/gang skyes pa dang /_byung ba dang /_byas pa dang /_'dus byas pa dang /_bsams pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar byung ba de ni 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]'jig pa'i chos can te/_de dang ldan pa la 'jig par mi 'gyur ba de ga la yod de de ni gnas med do/_/kun dga' bo ngas snga nas khyod la 'dod pa dang /_sdug pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba thams cad ni 'gyes pa dang /_med pa dang /_bral 
[\[242a.2\]]ba dang /_mi ldan par 'gyur bar ma bstan tam/_kun dga' bo dper na ljon shing chen po rtsa ba dang bcas/_snying po dang bcas/_sdong po dang /_lo ma dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dag dang ldan pa'i 'dab ma gang ches mtho ba de dang por ltung ngo /_/rin po 
[\[242a.3\]]che'i ri chen po'i rtse mo gang ches mtho ba dag kyang dang por rnyil lo/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs pa'i nang na dge slong shA ri'i bu yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_dge slong shA ri'i bu phyogs gang na gnas pa'i phyogs der nga thugs khral 
[\[242a.4\]]chung ngur bzhugs so/_/'di lta ste/_dge slong shA ri'i bu gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de ngas stong pa ma yin par mthong ngo /_/de lta bas na kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed/_blong bar ma byed/_smre sngags 'don par ma byed cig_/gang skyes pa dang /_byung ba dang /_byas 
[\[242a.5\]]pa dang /_'dus byas pa dang /_bsams pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par byung ba de ni 'jig pa'i chos can te/_de dang ldan pa la 'jig par mi 'gyur ba de ga la yod de de ni gnas med do/_/kun dga' bo ngas snga nas khyod la 'dod pa dang /_sdug pa dang /_dga' ba 
[\[242a.6\]]dang /_yid du 'ong ba thams cad ni 'gyes pa dang /_med pa dang /_'bral ba dang /_mi ldan par 'gyur bar ma bstan tam/_kun dga' bo de lta bas na da lta nga'am/_nga 'das kyang rung bdag nyid gling dang /_bdag nyid skyabs dang /_chos gling dang /_chos skyabs 
[\[242a.7\]]dang /_gling gzhan ma yin pa dang /_skyabs gzhan ma yin par gnas par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo da ltar ram/_nga 'das kyang rung gang dag bdag nyid gling dang /_bdag nyid skyabs dang /_chos gling dang /_chos skyabs dang /_gling gzhan ma yin 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]pa dang /_skyabs gzhan ma yin pa la gnas pa de dag ni 'di lta ste/_nga'i dge slong bslab pa 'dod pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar dge slong bdag nyid gling dang /_bdag nyid skyabs dang /_chos gling dang /_chos skyabs dang /_gling gzhan ma yin pa dang /_skyabs 
[\[242b.2\]]gzhan ma yin par gnas pa yin zhe na/_'di na dge slong nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing 'jig rten la brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba brtul nas rtun pa dang /_shes bzhin dang /_dran pa dang ldan par gnas shing phyi'i lus dang /_phyi nang gi lus dang /_nang gi tshor 
[\[242b.3\]]ba dang /_phyi'i tshor ba dang /_phyi dang nang gi tshor ba dag dang /_nang gi sems dang /_phyi'i sems dang /_phyi dang nang gi sems dang /_nang gi chos dang /_phyi'i chos dang /_phyi dang nang gi chos dag la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing 'jig rten la brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba 
[\[242b.4\]]brtul nas rtun pa dang /_shes bzhin dang /_dran pa dang ldan par gnas pa yin te/_kun dga' bo de ltar na dge slong bdag nyid gling dang /_bdag nyid skyabs dang /_chos gling dang /_chos skyabs dang /_gling gzhan ma yin pa dang /_skyabs gzhan ma yin par gnas 
[\[242b.5\]]pa yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i 
[\[242b.6\]]skye bo'i tshogs kyis ji ltar kun tu rgyu dbyug thogs spyi phud can rnams kyis 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i yan lag dang nying lag dag 'dam bu bzhin du bcom pas/_'phags pa shA ri'i bu rgyud de dang mdza' ba'i bag chags kyis bsgos pa yang grong na la dar 
[\[242b.7\]]song ste/_snga dro yongs su mya ngan las 'das tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po yang grong shing thags can du song ste yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa thos so/_/bar skabs der dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/_
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas kun tu rgyu dbyug thogs spyi phud can rnams kyis 'di'i yan lag dang /_nying lag 'dam bu bzhin du 
[\[243a.2\]]bcom lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong maud gal gyi bu 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa/_tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhes bya 
[\[243a.3\]]ba nas/_lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na bram ze zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs de/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed 
[\[243a.4\]]do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u zhig btsas te zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu de btsas pa'i btsas ston rgyas par byas 
[\[243a.5\]]nas ming btags te bskyed bsrings nas chen por gyur to/_/phas de'i chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed cing de la yang rab tu chags so/_/de la de'i mas rtag tu tshig yid du mi 'ong ba ngan par smra ba dag gis spyos 
[\[243a.6\]]pa dang /_des khyo la bzlas nas des de ci nas kyang ma la shin tu byams pa med pa dang /_de'i bya dgu la phyi lang byed pa de lta de ltar bslus so/_/des smras pa/_khyod gang gi phyir de la shin tu chags pas nga la phyir lang byed dam/_de ngo tsha nas cang mi zer bar 'dug pa dang /_de'i chung 
[\[243a.7\]]mas bsams pa/_re zhig kha dug can 'di lang tsho yal yang rang gi khyo la chags pa cung zad kyang mi gtong zhing bdag gi khyo la gshe bar byed do snyam du rig nas de glags tshol bar zhugs so/_/ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na de'i ma skar ma dang sbyar te khrus byas nas dri dang me tog dag 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]gis lus brgyan te nyi ma ma nub pa kho nar des khyim mi dag ma brtags par khyo dang lhan cig gsang ba spyod do/_/de nas mna' ma des khyo de khrid nas ci nas kyang phyogs der son pa de ltar byas pa dang /_ji tsam na pha dang ma gnyis gsang ba spyod pa mthong nas/_des bsams pa/_
[\[243b.2\]]'dug can 'di/_bdag la ni khyod bud med la shin tu chags so/_/zhes gshe bar byed na 'di da rung yang zhi ba med de/_khyim mi dag la yang mi rtog par nyi ma ma nub pa nyid du gsang ba spyod do/_/snyam du bsams nas khros te/_gang zhig 'di gnyis kyi yan lag dang nying 
[\[243b.3\]]lag 'dam bu bzhin bcom pa de 'ga' med dam zhes ngag gi las rtsub mo smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'ur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/_dge slong maud gal gyi bu 'di nyid yin te/_gang 
[\[243b.4\]]'dis sems 'khrugs te/_pha dang ma la ngag gi las rtsub mo smras pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar 'di'i yan lag dang nying lag 'dam bu bzhin du bcom ste/_da ltar srid pa tha ma/_gnas tha ma/_lus tha ma/_bdag nyid tha ma thob ste/_rdzu 'phrul can gyi nang 
[\[243b.5\]]na mchog tu bstan pa'i bar du yang yan lag dang nying lag 'dam bu bzhin du bcom par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag_/gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi yang gcig du dkar/_'dren ma rnams 
[\[243b.6\]]kyi yang 'dren ma'o/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang /_'dren ma rnams spangs nas/_las gcig tu dkar ba dag la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[243b.7\]]dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa/_btsun pa kun tu rgyu dbyug thogs spyi phud can rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ni btang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]bu chen po ni brdegs pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/_'das pa'i dus na yang ji ltar shA ri'i bu ni btang la/_maud gal gyi bu ni brdegs pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 
[\[244a.2\]]ri'i 'or zhig na khye'u dang /_bu mo dag cig rtse ba de dag gis bram ze'i khye'u gnyis shig mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u pha bi dag brdeg go/_/yang smras pa/_re zhig mi brdeg par je dri ba zhig dris la/_gal te sems mgu bar byas na ni mi brdeg ji ste ma yin 
[\[244a.3\]]na ni brdeg go/_/de dag gis bram ze'i khye'u gcig la dris pa dus gang du grang /_des bsams pa/_ji lta bu'i sems kyis 'di dag bdag la 'dri snyam na des gor ma chag par 'di dag brdeg par 'dod par shes nas/_des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_grang ngam gal te 
[\[244a.4\]]dro yang rung /_/gang gi tshe na rlung langs pa/_/rlung gis btab na grang ba ste/_/rlung med pa yi grang ba med/_/de de dag gis btang nas/_cig shos la dris pa dang /_des smras pa dgun drang mod ces byas pa dang /_de de dag gis brdegs so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du 
[\[244a.5\]]sems/_btang ba gang yin pa de ni shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin no/_/brdegs pa gang yin pa de ni maud gal gyi bu 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe yang shA ri'i bu ni btang la/_maud gal gyi bu ni brdegs so/_/da ltar yang shA ri'i bu ni btang la/_maud gal gyi bu ni brdegs so/_/yang ji 
[\[244a.6\]]ltar shA ri'i bu ni btang la/_maud gal gyi bu ni brdegs pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba chu klung bskams pa'i shol cig na khye'u dang bu mo dag cig rtse ba de dag gis shing shal ma la'i me tog chu'i rgyun gyis khyer ba zhig dang /_bram ze'i khye'u gnyis shig 'ong 
[\[244a.7\]]ba mthong nas zhes bya ba nas/_de dag gis bram ze'i khye'u gcig la dris pa/_chus khyer ba 'di ci zhig_/des bsams pa/_ci 'dra ba'i sems kyis 'di dag bdag la 'dri snyam na/_gor ma chag par brdeg 'dod par zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/des 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_stobs dang ldan pas tshar bcad pa/_/nges par 'byung ba'i tshol ba yis/_/shal ma li zhes mi bsam ste/_/skam gyi pad ma bzhin par bsam/_/de de dag gis btang nas/_cig shos la dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_ma mthong ngam/_
[\[244b.2\]]shing shal ma li'i me tog yin mod ces byas pa dang /_de de dag gis brdegs so/_/dge slong dag ci snyam du sems zhes bya ba rgyas par snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na ji tsam dgyes par bzhugs nas mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so/_/rgyu 
[\[244b.3\]]zhing gshegs pa dang /_rim gyis mnyan yod du byon te mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'phags pa shA ri'i bu yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_de'i ring bsrel 'phags pa kun 
[\[244b.4\]]dga' bo'i lag na yod do zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag 
[\[244b.5\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa kun dga' bo mkhyen par mdzod cig_/'phags pa shA ri'i bu ni bdag gi yun ring po nas sdug pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_bla ma dang /_dran par bgyid pa lags 
[\[244b.6\]]na/_de yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_de'i ring bsrel khyod kyi phyag na mnga' ba de dag bdag la stsol cig dang /_de'i ring bsrel la ring bsrel gyi mchod pa bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_khyim bdag de ni bdag gi yang yun ring po nas sdug pa dang /_yid du 'ong 
[\[244b.7\]]ba dang /_bla ma dang dran par bya ba yin pas bdag nyid de'i ring bsrel la ring bsrel gyi mchod pa byed do/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_'phags 
[\[245a.2\]]pa shA ri'i bu ni/_bdag gi yun ring po nas sdug pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_bla ma dang /_dran par bgyi ba lags te/_de'i ring bsrel 'phags pa kun dga' bo'i sug pa na mchis pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la stsol du stsal bar gsol/_bdag 
[\[245a.3\]]de'i ring bsrel la ring bsrel gyi mchod pa 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo dge slong shA ri'i bu'i ring bsrel rnams khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la byin la/_de 
[\[245a.4\]]mchod pa byed du chug shig_/bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams ni don 'dis na dad pa can yin no/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang 'di tsam gyis na/_khyod kyis nga'i bstan pa la phan pa byas pa'am/_lan lon pa ma yin no/_/de lta bas na khyod kyis rab tu phyung shig_/
[\[245a.5\]]bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig_/gnas byin cig_/dge sbyong gi ched nye bar zhog shig_/de dag la yang ji ltar thon pa bzhin 'don du chug shig_/'dzin du chug shig_/slobs shig dang 'di tsam gyis na/_khyod kyis nga'i bstan pa la phan btags pa dang /_
[\[245a.6\]]lan lon pa yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ston pa'i bkas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i ring bsrel dag byin te/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/_lan 'ga' yang yab yum dang /_
[\[245a.7\]]mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_gzhan bla ma'i gnas lta bu dag gi tshig ma bcag pas so/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i ring bsrel dag khyer nas/_rang gi khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_de dag khyim gyi 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]mchog gi nang du mthon po zhig tu bzhag nas nang mi dang bcas/_mdza' bo dang /_nye du dang /_phu nu dang bcas te/_mar me dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa rnams kyis mchod pa bya bar brtsams so/_/mnyan 
[\[245b.2\]]yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis ji ltar 'phags pa shA ri'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i grong na la dar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i ring bsrel dag 'phags pa kun dga' bos blangs nas/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la byin te/_des de dag khyim du 
[\[245b.3\]]bzhag nas nang mi dang bcas/_mdza' bo dang /_gnyen dang /_phu nu dang bcas te/_mar me dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dag gis mchod pa thos so/_/de bzhin du yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang 
[\[245b.4\]]thos nas/_btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /_rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang /_drang srong byin dang /_rnying pa dag dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang /_gzhan yang dad pa can mang po dag dang /_lhan cig de dag thams cad mchod pa'i yo byad dag khyer te/_khyim bdag 
[\[245b.5\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du dong nas/_de rnams kyis mchod pa'i yo byad dag gis mchod par brtsams pa las der kha cig gis yon tan gyi tshogs dag thob bo/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ri 'or zhig tu bya ba cung zad zhig byung nas des der 
[\[245b.6\]]sgo bcad nas song ngo /_/skye bo phal po che dag de bzhin du 'ongs pa dang /_ji tsam na sgo bcad pa mthong nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sgo bcad de song bas des bdag cag gi bsod nams kyi bar chad byas so/_/zhes de dag 'phya bar byed/_gzhogs 'phyas byed/_smod par byed 
[\[245b.7\]]do/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ri 'or de nas 'ongs pa dang /_de'i nang mis smras pa/_khyim bdag skye bo'i tshogs chen po mchod pa'i yo byad thogs te 'ongs pa las sgo bcad pa mthong nas/_des bdag cag gi bsod nams kyi bar chad byas so/_/zhes 'phya bar byed/_gzhogs 'phyas byed/_
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]smod par byed do/_/de 'di snyam du 'di nyid bdag gis bya ba yin no snyam du shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[246a.2\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la rab tu dad pa'i skye bo'i tshogs chen po mchod pa'i yo byad dag thogs te/_bdag gi sdum par mchis pa las bdag bgyi ba cung zad cig gi slad du chab sgo bkum nas gzhan du mchis pa dang /_de dag khyim 
[\[246a.3\]]bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sgo bcad de song bas/_bdag cag gi bsod nams kyi bar chad byas so zhes 'phya bar bgyid/_gzhogs 'phyas bgyid smod par bgyid do/_/de'i slad du gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis/_'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i 
[\[246a.4\]]mchod rten phyogs snang yal can zhig tu bgyis la/_der skye bo'i tshogs chen po bag yangs su mchod pa bgyid du stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag de lta bas na gnang gis byos shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang gis byos shig ces bka' 
[\[246a.5\]]stsal pa dang /_des ji lta bur bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rim gyis bang rim bzhi byas la de nas bum rten bya'o/_/de nas bum pa dang bre dang srog shing dang /_gdugs gcig dang /_gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi bya ba byas nas bcu

[\[246a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ni rnam pa thams cad rdzogs par bya'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi char khab mi gzhag par bya'o/_/dgra bcom pa'i ni gdugs 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]bzhi'o/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i ni gsum mo/_/phyir 'ong ba'i ni gnyis so/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i ni gcig go/_/so so'i skye bo dge ba rnams kyi mchod rten ni byi bor bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa rnams kyi mchod rten ni rnam pa 'dis so/_/so so'i skye bo rnams kyi ni 'dis 
[\[246b.2\]]so zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_des gang gi gnas gang du bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na/_shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu dag 'dug pa de bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten yang bya'o/_/
[\[246b.3\]]gzhan yang gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi mchod rten ni rgan rims bzhin sbreng bar bya'o/_/so so'i skye bo dge ba rnams kyi ni dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol du bya'o/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gsol pa/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/_bdag 
[\[246b.4\]]gis 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i mchod rten gyi dus ston dag bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gnang gis gyis shig_/yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ji ltar/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'phags 
[\[246b.5\]]pa shA ri'i bu'i mchod rten gyi dus ston gzugs par gsol ba las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzugs par gnang ba thos nas/_ma la bdag gis kyang de'i grogs bya'o snyam nas/_des 'di ltar dril bsgrags nas/_shes ldan mnyan yod na gnas pa'i grong khyer pa rnams dang /_
[\[246b.6\]]yul gzhan nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag nyon cig_/'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i mchod rten gyi dus ston la bab pa'i tshe zong thogs nas 'ongs pa gang yin pa de la sho gam yang med la gcan kyang med/_gru btsas kyang med kyis de bag yangs su 'dir shog shig_/bar skabs 
[\[246b.7\]]der rgya mtsho chen po nas tshong pa lnga brgya zhig gru bo che'i nor grub ste/_mnyan yod du phyin pa de dag gis ji ltar rgyal pos mnyan yod du dril bsgrags te/_'di skad du gang zhig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i mchod rten gyi dus ston la bab pa'i tshe zong thogs te 'ong ba de la sho gam yang med la 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]gcan yang med/_gru btsas kyang med kyis de bag yangs su 'dir shog shig_/ces bsgo ba thos nas re zhig rgyal po 'di rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu la gnas kyang bsod nams dag gis ngoms mi shes te/_sbyin pa dag sbyin/_bsod nams dag byed 
[\[247a.2\]]na bdag gis ci'i phyir sbyin pa dag mi sbyin/_bsod nams dag mi bya snyam nas/_de dag yid rab tu dang ba skyes te/_dus ston de'i dus su dung dang /_nor bu dang mu tig la sogs pa phul ba dang /_dge slong dag gis ji ltar bsgrub pa mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[247a.3\]]pa/_pud dud gang yin pa de dag ni shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma na bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs la dbul bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang chung shas shig ni shA ri'i bu'i mchod rten de'i bcos legs bya bar bzhag la lhag ma ni dge 'dun tshogs pas bgo bar bya'o/_/de de bzhin gshegs 
[\[247a.4\]]pa'i mchod rten gyi ma yin gyi/_shA ri'i bu'i mchod rten gyi yin te/_de lta bas na 'gyod par mi bya'o//_//sdom ni/_gleng dang dran pa nyid dang ni/_/skabs dbye ba dang smra mi bya/_/lung 'bogs pa dang gso sbyong dang /_/dgag dbye 'jog par byed pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[247a.5\]]mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong drug sde dag gis nyes par mthong ba dang /_nyes par thos pa dang /_nyes par dogs pas dge slong dag la glengs so/_/dge slong dag la nyes par mthong ba dang /_nyes par thos 
[\[247a.6\]]pa dang /_nyes par dogs pas glengs pa na de dag bag tsha bzhin du gnas so/_/de dag bag tsha bzhin du gnas pas rid pa dang /_skem pa dang /_rnyis pa dang /_lus las su ma rung bar gyur te lung ston pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_nang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dag shor nas 
[\[247a.7\]]skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag dge slong la nyes par mthong ba dang /_nyes par thos pa dang /_nyes par dogs pas gleng ba las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis dge slong la nyes par 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]mthong ba dang /_nyes par thos pa dang /_nyes par dogs pas gleng bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis nyes par mthong ba dang /_nyes par thos pa dang /_nyes par dogs pas dge slong la gleng bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gleng bar byed pa ji lta bar dran par byed pa dang /_skabs 'byed par byed pa dang /_mi smra 
[\[247b.2\]]bar byed pa dang /_lung 'bogs par byed pa dang /_gso sbyong 'jog par byed pa dang /_dgag dbye 'jog par byed pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa thams cad snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o//_//sdom ni/_sangs rgyas mtshan nas smos pa dang /_/tshe dang ldan pa kun mi spyad/_/'phral 
[\[247b.3\]]thabs can la ma dad dang /_/'dul ba mdor ni bsdus pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga po dag la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la 'di ni sdug bsngal 
[\[247b.4\]]'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byas pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o/_/'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba 
[\[247b.5\]]'phags pa'i lam mo/_/zhes tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang rig pa dang /_blo dang /_rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa de mngon par shes pas yongs su shes par bya'o/_/zhes tshul

[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de bsgom par bya'o/_/zhes tshul bzhin yid la byas pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang rig pa dang blo dang rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos 
[\[248a.2\]]rnams la sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa de mngon par shes pas yongs su shes so/_/zhes tshul bzhin yid la byas pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang rig pa dang blo dang rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa de mngon par shes 
[\[248a.3\]]pas spangs so zhes tshul bzhin yid la byas pa na mig skyes so/_/shes pa dang rig pa dang blo dang rtogs pa skyes so/_/dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa de mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas so/_/zhes tshul bzhin yid la byas pa na mig skyes so/_/
