[\[248a.5\]]ji srid du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di dag la de ltar lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i mig skyes par ma gyur/_shes pa ma yin/_rig pa ma yin/_blo ma yin/_rtogs pa ma skyes pa de srid du nga 'jig rten lha dang bcas/_bdud dang bcas/_tshangs pa dang bcas/_dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang 
[\[248a.6\]]bcas/_lha dang mi dang bcas pa 'di las grol ba dang /_nges par byung ba dang /_bral ba dang /_rab tu grol ba dang /_phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis mang du gnas par ma gyur pa de srid du nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so snyam du shes par ma gyur gyi dge slong dag gang nas 
[\[248a.7\]]bzung ste/_nga la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di dag la de ltar lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i mig skyes/_shes pa dang rig pa dang blo dang rtogs pa skyes pa de nas bzung ste/_nga 'jig rten lha dang bcas bdud dang bcas tshangs pa dang bcas/_dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas/_lha dang mi dang 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]bcas pa 'di las grol ba dang /_nges par byung ba dang /_rab tu grol ba dang /_phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis mang du gnas par gyur/_de nas bzung ste nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so snyam du shes par gyur to/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[248b.2\]]'di bshad pa na tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya dang /_lha brgyad khri chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/_kauN+Di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/_bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal to/_/kauN+Di n+ya khyod kyis chos 
[\[248b.3\]]kun shes sam/_bde bar gshegs pa kun 'tshal to/_/tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya chos kun shes pa de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya'i ming kun shes kauN+Di n+ya zhes bya bar chags so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kauN+Di n+ya chos kun shes pa na sa bla ba'i gnod sbyin rnams kyis sgra phyung zhing dbyangs rjes su bsgrags pa/_grogs 
[\[248b.4\]]po dag bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde bar mdzad pa'i slad du 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa gang gis kyang chos dang 
[\[248b.5\]]mthun par ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang mthun pa lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis pa 'di yul bA rA Na sI drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su bskor bas lha'i ris dag ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur/_lha ma yin gyi ris dag ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro/_/sa bla pa'i gnod 
[\[248b.6\]]sbyin rnams kyi sgra bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin rnams dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /_'thab bral ba rnams dang /_dga' ldan pa rnams dang /_'phrul dga' ba rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis thos nas skad cig de dang /_thang cig 
[\[248b.7\]]de dang /_yud tsam de dang /_skad cig dang /_thang cig dang yud tsam de la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra grags par gyur te/_tshangs ris pa'i lha rnams kyi sgra phyung zhing dbyangs rjes su bsgrags pa/_grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang mi rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas/_'di yul bA rA Na sI 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su bskor bas lha'i ris dag ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur/_lha ma yin gyi ris dag ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yul bA rA Na sI drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags su chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang 
[\[249a.2\]]mthun pa lan gsum gyi bar du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis pa bskor te/_de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga po dag gi rgyud la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_de dag bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por gyur pa de'i tshe de dag 
[\[249a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la shin tu mtshan nas smos pa dang /_gdung nas smos pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa zhes smos pa kun tu spyod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la shin tu mtshan nas smos pa dang /_gdung nas smos pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa zhes smos pa kun tu 
[\[249a.4\]]ma spyod cig_/dge slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la shin tu mtshan nas smos pa dang /_gdung nas smos pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa zhes smos pa kun tu spyod pa de ni skyes bu gti mug de la yun ring por gnod pa dang /_phan pa ma yin pa dang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 
[\[249a.5\]]'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan nas smos pa dang /_gdung nas smos pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa zhes smos pa kun tu spyod pa las gyur gyis/_de'i phyir dge slong gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan nas smos pa dang /_gdung nas 
[\[249a.6\]]smos pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa zhes smos pa kun tu spyad par mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas dge slong lnga po dag la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan nas smos pa dang /_gdung nas smos pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa zhes smos pa kun du spyad par mi bya ste/_kun tu 
[\[249a.7\]]spyod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan nas smos pa dang /_gdung nas smos pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa zhes smos pa kun tu spyad par mi bya ste/_kun tu spyod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong gzhon 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]nu gzhon nu dag dge slong rgan pa rgan pa dag la ming nas smos pa dang /_rus nas smos pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa zhes smos pa kun tu spyod nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gzhon nus dge slong ches rgan pa la 
[\[249b.2\]]ming nas smos pa dang /_rus nas smos pa kun tu spyad par mi bya'o/_/'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa zhes bod pa'am/_btsun pa zhes bod pa gnyis kun tu spyad par bya'o/_/dge slong gzhon nus dge slong ches rgan pa la ming nas smos sam/_rus nas smos pa kun tu spyod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur 
[\[249b.3\]]ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/mnyan yod na dge slong 'phral thabs can dang /_dge slong ma gsod mo ji lta ji ltar skye bo'i tshogs mang po mi dad par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar khyim dag tu rgyu ba byed ces bya ba rgyas par rnam par 'byed pa las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[249b.4\]]ldan 'das ku sha'i grong khyer na gyad kyi nyen 'khor shing sA la zung gi tshal na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe de na dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngas 'dul ba rgyas par bstan na/_mdor bsdus te yang ma bstan pas 
[\[249b.5\]]legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig bshad do/_/dge slong dag khyed kyis ngas sngon gnang ba yang med/_bkag pa yang med pa gang yin pa de yang gal te mi rung ba sten cing rung ba dang mi mthun na rung ba ma yin pa'i phyir spyad par mi bya'o/_/gal te rung ba sten cing mi rung ba dang mi mthun na rung 
[\[249b.6\]]ba yin pa'i phyir spyad par bya ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//_//sdom ni/_spangs pa dag ni bged pa dang /_/sbrang ma rnams kyi skyabs dang ni/_/spyad tshags dang ni gyo mo dang /_/sra brkyang gding dang mang po'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[249b.7\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig la chos gos kyi spang ba byung nas/_des de rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste dge 'dun la spangs so/_/dge skos kyis bsams pa/_'di ni dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa grub pa yin te spel nas bgo bar bya'o snyam nas/_des 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]de spel nas dge 'dun la brims pa dang /_dge slong de phongs par gyur to/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag spang ba dge 'dun la spangs pa las 
[\[250a.2\]]gyur gyis/_de'i phyir dge slong gis dge 'dun la spang bar mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong zhig gis spang ba dge 'dun la spangs pa dang /_de dge skos kyis spel te bgos kyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis spang ba dge 'dun 
[\[250a.3\]]la spang bar mi bya'i/_'on kyang gang zag la spang bar bya'o/_/gal te mi shes pas spangs na yang dge 'dun gyis bgo bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis spang ba dge 'dun la spangs sam/_dge 'dun gyis bgos na gnyi ga la 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[250a.4\]]dge slong gi spang ba dge 'dun la spang bar mi bya'i/_'on kyang gang zag la spang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong gzhan zhig la chos gos kyi spang ba byung ste/_des dge slong mi shes pa zhig la spangs pa dang /_des blangs nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/skabs de dge slong 
[\[250a.5\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gzhan gyis brda sprad par bya ste/_gal te byin na legs/_ci ste mi ster na mthus phrogs la byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/rung bar bya ba'i phyir spangs pa yin pas spangs pa gtan 
[\[250a.6\]]bkur bar mi bya'i 'on kyang spangs pa slar sbyin par bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni yangs pa can na'o/_/dbyar gyi dus su dge slong dag sbrang bu mchu [{]rings kyis [,]ring gis [}]zos te/_de dag g.ya' ste sen mos lus kun phrugs pa dang /_bar bar du khrag gi thigs pa dang thor bu dag byung bar snang 
[\[250a.7\]]ngo /_/de ltar lus mi sdug pa de dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa khyed ci zhig gis lus kyi gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur/_de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa khyed sbrang 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]skyabs mi 'chang ngam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang na ji ltar bcang /_'phags pa khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[250b.2\]]stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong dag gis sbrang skyabs bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sbrang skyabs bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/_dge slong gis ci 'dra ba bcang bar ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ras srid du khru bzhi 
[\[250b.3\]]zheng du khru do pa de shing la brgyangs la steng nas dgab par bya zhing ras khru bcu gnyis pas ngos khor yug tu bskor bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis ras de ma lus par byas pa dang /_glo nas sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dag 'jug nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ras lhag ma dang bcas pa 
[\[250b.4\]]bcang bar bya zhing des glo nas dkri bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis sbrang skyabs byas nas ras de phyogs gcig nas bteg ste 'dzul ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgo gdod par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis sgo thad kar btod pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[250b.5\]]pa/_bsnol mar bya'o/_/tsha nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de nyid du bsil yab gzhag par bya'o/_/'og nas sbrang ma mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dag 'jug nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas mal gyis dgab par bya zhing rnam pa gang dang gang gis sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]
[\[250b.6\]]za ba de thams cad rung ba bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chu btsag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag lag pas chu tshags 'dzin pas de dag ngal bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shing la btags te btsag par 
[\[250b.7\]]bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis shing la btags te btsags na 'on kyang ngal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dbyug gu gsum bcang bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis dbyug gu gsum la btags na 'dug tu ma btub nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag phug la srad 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]bu'am/_gzer bus sbrel la chu tshags gdags par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis chu tshags btags nas chu blugs pa dang /_phyed sa la bo nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ci nas sa la mi 'bo bar dran pa nye bar gzhag ste blug par bya'o/_/dge slong 
[\[251a.2\]]dag gis bum pa zhabs rten med par bzhag pas de 'dril nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zhabs rten gzhug par bya'o/_/dge slong gzhan dag gcig gis chu blang bar brtsams pa dang /_de chu tshags su ma tshags pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[251a.3\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gcal gzhug par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis ci zhig gzhug pa ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bye ma'am/_ba lang gi lci ba'o/_/'on kyang ma tshags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[251a.4\]]pa/_tshags rten snod bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshags rten snod bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis ji lta bu bcang mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshags rten snod ni gnyis te/_zangs las byas pa dang /_
[\[251a.5\]]sa las byas pa'o/_/dge slong dag gis tshags rten snod lag pas bzung ba dang /_de dag ngal nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zangs las byas pa gang yin pa de ni phug la lcags thag 'jam pos dbyug gu gsum la gdags par bya'o/_/sa las byas pa gang yin 
[\[251a.6\]]pa de ni phug la tha gus gdags par bya'o/_/chu tshags gzhan dag chu ma phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gis glor yang dang yang du brdab par bya'o/_/dge slong dag chu rtog pa na bum pa ma gang ba la brtags pas srog chags dag ma rtogs nas/_
[\[251a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bum pa legs par bkang la ji srid du chu mi g.yo ba de srid du gzhag par bya zhing /_de nas brtag par bya'o/_/bum pa bkang ba dang /_steng du rdul zhugs pa dge slong dag gis de ma bsal bas srog chags dag ma rtogs nas/_bcom 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rdul bsal nas brtag par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis srog chags mdzub mo'i rtse mos bstan pas de dag 'gul te mig gis ma sod pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shing bu'i rtse mo'am/_rtswa'i rtse mo'am phra mo gzhan gang yang 
[\[251b.2\]]rung bas bstan par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis chu tshags nyid nas chu khron par pho ba dang /_srog chags dag rdab snun pas gnod par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bsal tshags bsrel bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis bkang ste btang na phyir gang bzhin du 'ong ba gang 
[\[251b.3\]]yin pa de lta bu bsrel nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bkang ste btang na phyir stong par 'ong ba ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba bsrel bar bya'o/_/gzhan dag gcig gis bsal tshags ma 'byor nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gis ni chu tshags the gus btags 
[\[251b.4\]]la ci nas bkang ste btang na phyir stong par 'ong ba de ltar gtang bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis chu pho nas chu tshags bshal bar mi byed 'khru bar mi byed/_'tshir bar mi byed/_skems par mi byed/_ltob par mi byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chu tshags kyis chu pho nas de bshal 
[\[251b.5\]]bar bya/_bkru bar bya/_btsir bar bya/_bskam par bya/_bltab par bya'o/_/dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi chu yang chu tshags kyis tshag par byed pa dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun phal ches pas skyo bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te dge slong gi dge 'dun phal che bar 
[\[251b.6\]]gyur na chu tshags mang po bcang ba'am/_yang na bum tshags gce'u can bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bum tshags gce'u can gyis btsag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bum tshags gce'u can ji lta bu mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sa 'am zangs 
[\[251b.7\]]las bum pa'i dbyibs lta bu bya zhing de la pad ma'i snying po lta bu'i bu ga dag gdod par bya'o/_/de dag bsdu ba'i phyir de dag gi steng du bu ga chen po gcig gdod do/_/de dag nyid bsdu ba'i phyir gce'u gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas steng ras kyis g.yogs la chu btsag par bya zhing ras de yang bshal bar bya/_bkru bar bya/_bskam par 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]bya'o//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/_dge slong dag gis shig dang /_rtswa shig dang /_srog chags gzhan dag g.yang sa nas bor ba dang /_de dag dran pa nyams shing gnod par gyur to/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[252a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_srog chags thams cad g.yang sa nas dor bar mi bya'o/_/de dag gis gar bab bab tu bor ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gar bab bab tu bor bar mi bya'i/_shig ni 
[\[252a.3\]]ra de'i nang du gzhug par bya/_de ma rnyed na ka ba'i ser ka'am/_rtsig pa'i bu gar chug shig_/rtswa shig ni ne'u gsing sngon po'i sa phyogs su gzhag par bya'o/_/de ma rnyed na bsil ba'i phyogs su'o/_/srog chags gzhan yang rang rang gi gnas su gtang bar 
[\[252a.4\]]bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa chab btsags pa ma brtags pa 'tshal du rung lags sam/_nye ba 'khor mig gis ma brtags na mi rung ngo /_/btsun pa chab btsags pa brtags pa 'tshal du rung 
[\[252a.5\]]lags sam/_nye ba 'khor mig gis brtags pa'i phyir rung ngo /_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang gding bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 
[\[252a.6\]]thos nas des dge 'dun la sra brkyang phul lo/_/de bzhin du btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /_rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang /_drang srong byin dang /_rnying pa dag dang /_phya mkhan dag dang /_gzhan mang po dag gis sra brkyang 
[\[252a.7\]]phul ba dang /_dge slong dag gis sra brkyang gcig cig byin gyis brlabs nas lhag ma gzhan de dag nyid la slar bskur bar brtsams pa dang /_de dag gis 'phags pa 'di dag ni bdag cag gis dge 'dun la phul ba lags pas bdag cag slar ji ltar 'tshal/_
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i phyir gnang gis blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang gtan pa 'ding ba'i dge slong mang po bsko bar bya'o/_/ji ltar sngar bskos pa de las phyis gcig gding 
[\[252b.2\]]bar bya'o/_/lhag ma rnams ni gzhag par bya zhing /_de ni dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge 'dun gyi bgo ba'i rnyed pa yin pas dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge 'dun tshogs pas ci dgar bgo bar bya ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//_//sdom ni/_
[\[252b.3\]]nga 'das pa la sbyin med dang /_/gang gis bsngos pa shi ba dang /_/gang la gtad pa shi ba dang /_/babs pa dang ni 'gyod pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan 
[\[252b.4\]]yod na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las rim gyis bu gsum byung ngo /_/de 
[\[252b.5\]]rnams kyi tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]gang yin pa de legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ngo /_/de dus gzhan zhig na ljongs rgyu zhing song ngo /_/ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na de'i pha nad kyis thebs nas de rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu'i 
[\[252b.6\]]sman rnams kyis rim gro byas kyang de'i nad de zhi bar ma gyur te/_gang gi tshe de shi la thug pa'i tshor ba byung ste/_ring po mi thogs par 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe des mdza' bo dang /_gnyen dang phu nu bo dang /_khyim tshes rnams bsdus nas bu de gnyis la smras 
[\[252b.7\]]pa/_bu nga'i khyim na cung zad ci yod pa de thams cad khyer te shog shig_/de dag gis kyang de'i tshig mnyan te thams cad khyer te 'ongs pa dang /_des mdza' bo dang /_gnyen dang /_phu nu de dag dang /_khyim tshes kyi mi de la smras pa/_shes ldan dag gson cig_/
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]bdag gi bu gsum yod pa las phu bo gnyis ni 'di dag yin/_tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]gang yin pa de ni dge sbyong shAkya'i nang du rab tu byung ngo /_/de'i phyir bdag gi khyim na nor gang cung zad ci yod pa de thams cad de rnams mnyam par bgos shig ces smras nas/_bsags 
[\[253a.2\]]pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing /_/mthon po'i mtha' ni rnyil bar 'gyur/_/'du ba'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/_/gson po'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/_/zhes bya bas dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur te/_de khyogs gos sngon po dang /_dmar po dang /_ser po dang /_dkar po dag 
[\[253a.3\]]gis brgyan te dur khrod du khyer nas bsregs so/_/de'i bu de dag gis de'i shid btang ba dang mya ngan bsang ba byas te 'dug go/_/de'i bu des bdag gi pha de shi'o zhes thos nas/_de 'di snyam du bdag song la ma yar mo de dang /_phu bo de dag la chos bshad de mya ngan bsang bar bya'o 
[\[253a.4\]]snyam du bsams nas de ji srid 'dod par ljongs na 'dug nas lhung bzed dang /_chos gos khyer te/_mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song nas/_rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba las mnyan yod du phyin to/_/des chos gos dang lhung bzed rgyal byed kyi tshal du bzhag ste lam 
[\[253a.5\]]gyis dub pa ngal bso nas rang gi khyim du song ngo /_/nang mi rnams kyis de mthong nas ngus so/_/ngu ba de thos nas khyim tshes rnams 'dus te/_la la ni skad phyung ste ngu /_la la ni mig mchi mas gang bar gyur to/_/de so so'i skye bo yin pas skye bo'i tshogs chen 
[\[253a.6\]]po smre zhing 'dug pa thos nas da yang mig mchi mas gang zhing 'dug pa dang /_de la khyim tshes kyi bud med gcig gis smras pa/_bu mya ngan ma byed cig_/khyod kyi pha de bsod nams byas pas lha yul du song ngo /_/khyod la yang phas mdza' bo dang /_gnyen dang /_phu nu 
[\[253a.7\]]bo dang /_khyim tshes rnams bsdus te nor gyi sum cha gcig kyang byin no/_/des bsams pa bcom ldan 'das kyis nga 'das nas 'di la byin cig ces zer ba ni med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni 'di lta bu yin no snyam du rig nas nga de'i phyir mya ngan byed pa ni 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]ma yin gyi nga'i pha de dka' ba byed byed pas dbang med par mchi ma byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang pha ma ni bu la dka' ba byed de/_snyod pa dang /_gso ba dang /_bskyed pa dang /_'dzam bu'i gling sna tshogs ston pa yin te/_bu'i phrag pa gcig gis pha blangs shing /_
[\[253b.2\]]cig shos kyis ma blangs te lo brgya tshang bar bkur ba byas pa'am/_sa chen po 'di la nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_man shel dang /_byu ru dang /_dngul dang /_gser dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_spug dang /_pad ma rA ga dang /_g.yas su 'khyil pa 
[\[253b.3\]]de lta bu'i dbang phyug gi bdag por bzhag kyang 'di tsam gyis na bus pha dang ma la phan thogs pa'am lan lon par mi 'gyur gyi/_gang zhig gis pha ma de dag ma dad pa las dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par len du 'jug_/gzengs stod par byed/_'dul 
[\[253b.4\]]bar byed/_'jog par byed/_rab tu 'jog par byed cing /_tshul khrims 'chal ba tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'jungs pa gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_shes rab 'chal pa shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par len tu 'jug_/gzengs 
[\[253b.5\]]stod par byed/_'dul bar byed/_'jog par byed/_rab tu 'jog par byed na de tsam gyis na bus pha ma la phan btags pa dang lan blan par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nga 'das nas de la byin cig ces zer ba ni sbyin pa ma yin no 
[\[253b.6\]]zhes bkag go_/bud med de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngas ni khyim pa las dgongs te gsungs pa ma yin gyi/_'on kyang rab tu 
[\[253b.7\]]byung ba las dgongs pa yin no/_/khyim bdag ni chags pa dang bcas bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur la/_rab tu byung ba ni ma yin no/_/de lta bas na de'i phyir khyim pa 'di snyam du nga 'das nas 'di la sbyin no snyam du sems pa ni byin pa yin gyi/_rab tu byung ba ni ma yin 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]pas blang bar bya zhing blangs nas kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du longs spyod du yongs su spyad par bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/dge slong zhig gis dge slong zhig la chos gos dag bsngos so/_/des de dag bsngos nas dus las 'das pa dang /_dge slong 
[\[254a.2\]]de dag gis de khyer nas sreg tu song ngo /_de'i bar du dge slong des de'i gnas khang nas de'i chos gos de dag blangs te rang gi gnas khang du bzhag go/_/de nas dge slong de dag gis de'i rim gro byas nas gtsug lag khang du log pa dang /_/dge skos kyis de'i gnas khang du 
[\[254a.3\]]brtags na/_ji tsam na lhung bzed dang chos gos gsum dang /_chu tshags mthong nas/_des rgan pa'i mthar khyer ba dang /_de la dge slong de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis de'i chos gos gsum po 'di khyer te 'ongs sam/_de la chos gos rung 
[\[254a.4\]]bar byas pa gzhan yang mang du yod na de dag khyer te shog shig_/des smras pa/_de'i gnas khang na ni 'dir zad kyi gzhan cung zad kyang med do/_/dge slong dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa de'i smos 'drin dge slong che ge mo zhes bya ba de la dris shig_/des de la dris pa dang smras 
[\[254a.5\]]pa/_bdag gis khyer te/_des bdag la bsngos so/_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rung bar bya ba'i phyir ngas bsngo bar gnang ste/_gang gis de dag khyer ba de la 'di skad 
[\[254a.6\]]ces gyis shig_/shi ba'i yo byad kyi rnyed pa de dag dge 'dun la phul la rang gi skal bas chog par gyis shig ces sgos shig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/dge slong gzhan zhig gis dge slong zhig la chos gos dag bsngos pa dang /_gang la bsngos pa de dus 
[\[254a.7\]]las 'das so/_/de dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du khyer nas bsregs te slar 'ongs nas de'i chos gos de dag rgan pa'i mthar khyer ba dang de la dge slong dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag su'i yin/_des smras pa/_'di dag ni bdag gi lags mod kyi 'on kyang 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]bdag gis de la bsngos so/_/dge slong dag gis de ji ltar bsgrub pa mi shes nas/_skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rung bar bya ba'i phyir ngas bsngo bar gnang mod kyi 
[\[254b.2\]]'on kyang gang gis bsngos pa de nyid kyi yin no/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/dge slong gzhan zhig gis dge slong zhig la chos gos dag bsngos pa dang /_gang la bsngos pa de babs nas/_des bsams pa/_bdag la dge slong des chos gos dag bsngos pas 
[\[254b.3\]]bdag babs mod kyi 'on kyang de dag bdag dbang gis len du 'gro'o snyam nas/_de dge slong de'i drung du song ste/_des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyis chos gos dag bdag la bsngos na de dag bdag la stsol cig_/skabs de dge slong dag la brjod pa dang /_de dag 
[\[254b.4\]]gis ji ltar bsgrub pa mi shes nas/_skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong gang kho na la yid brtan te chos gos dag btams pa de kho na'i 
[\[254b.5\]]mdun du bsngo ba las gyur gyis de'i phyir dge slong gis gang la yid brtan te chos gos dag btams pa de kho na'i mdun du bsngo bar mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis yid brtan cing chos gos btams 
[\[254b.6\]]pa de nyid kyi mdun du chos gos bsngo bar mi bya'i/_de'i mngon sum du bsngo bar ma byas na nyes dmigs der mi 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/dge slong gzhan zhig gis dge slong zhig la chos gos dag bsngos te/_gang la bsngos pa de thab khrol 
[\[254b.7\]]can zhig ste/_rtag tu dge slong dag dang lhan cig thab khrol byed pa las de gzhan zhig dang thab mo byas nas 'gro bar chas pa dang /_gang gis de la chos gos dag bsngos pa des de mi btang bar brtsams te/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gro shig ces des de bzung ba dang /_
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]'dug tu ma btub bo/_/des yang dang yang du bzlog pa dang /_de la dge slong zhig gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni thab khrol can zhig ste rtag tu dge slong rnams la mi bde bar byed pa yin gyis thong shig_/des smras pa/_gzhan gyi phyir 'di 
[\[255a.2\]]mi gtong ba ma yin gyi/_nga nyid kyi chos gos dag 'di la bsngos pas 'di 'dzin to/_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te yid brtan pa'i dge slong rgya mtsho'i pha rol na 'dug pa zhig yin 
[\[255a.3\]]na de la yang yid brtan te/_bsngo ba byas nas gzung bar byas te/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gal te yid brtan pa'i dge slong rgya mtsho'i pha rol na 'dug pa zhig yin na de la yang chos gos dag bsngo bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge 
[\[255a.4\]]slong gzhan zhig gis dge slong yul shin tu thag ring po na 'dug pa zhig la chos gos bsngos te/_de dus las 'das par gyur pa dang /_dge slong des dge slong de ji ltar dus las 'das par gyur pa'i ring zhig lon nas thos pa dang /_dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes so/_/skabs 
[\[255a.5\]]de dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gi tshe thos pa de'i tshe gzhan la bsngo bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//_//sdom ni/_mtshams kyi phyi rol 'dug pa yis/_/
[\[255a.6\]]dad pa mi dbul sbyin mi bya/_/gcig la gcig ni mi bya dang /_/gso sbyong dang ni dgag dbye'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong drug sde dag mtshams kyi 
[\[255a.7\]]phyi rol na gnas kyang dad pa 'bul ba'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas dad pa dbul bar mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]pas dad pa dbul bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong gzhan dag cig mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ngo /_/de dag chas pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi bya ba zhig byung nas drug sde rnams kyis de dag las dad pa blangs so/_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das

[\[255b.3\]]mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas bzhin du gcig la gcig dad pa sbyin par byed de/_dga' bos ni nyes dga' la/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]kyang dga' bo la/_'dun pas ni 'char ka la/_'char kas kyang 'dun pa la/_'gro mgyogs 
[\[255b.4\]]kyis ni nab so la/_nab sos kyang 'gro mgyogs la dad pa byin pa dang /_skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis gcig la gcig dad pa sbyin par mi bya ste/_byin na 'gal tshabs can 
[\[255b.5\]]du 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing gso sbyong gi tshe so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa thon cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde dag mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas shing gso sbyong la 'dun pa dang /_yongs su dag pa 
[\[255b.6\]]'bul lo/_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas gso sbyong la 'dun pa dang /_yongs su dag pa dbul bar mi bya'o/_bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshams kyi phyi rol na 
[\[255b.7\]]gnas pas gso sbyong la 'dun pa dang /_yongs su dag pa dbul bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong gzhan dag gcig mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ngo /_/de dag chas pa dang /_dge 'dun gso sbyong bya bar bzhed nas 'dus pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis de dag las 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]'dun pa dang /_yongs su dag pa blangs so/_/skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba las 'dun pa dang /_yongs su dag pa blang bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[256a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas dad pa dang /_yongs su dag pa dbul bar mi bya/_mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba las dad pa dang /_yongs su dag pa blang bar yang mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde dag mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas bzhin du gcig 
[\[256a.3\]]la gcig dad pa sbyin par byed de/_dga' bos ni nye dga' la/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]kyang dga' bo la/_'dun pas ni 'char ka la/_'char kas kyang 'dun pa la/_'gro mgyogs kyis ni nab so la/_nab sos kyang 'gro mgyogs la dad pa byin pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom

[\[256a.6\]]dbye'i dad pa dang /_yongs su dag pa 'bul ba rgyas par thams cad gso sbyong bzhin no//_//sdom ni/_dge slong bgrang bar bya ba dang /_/tshul shing dag dang gang 'dod dang /_/stan gcig khyim na gnas pa dang /_/dge tshul gsar bu mi 'dug pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[256a.7\]]'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa de bya ba cung zad cig la phyir byung nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_de re zhig 'di na dge slong du zhig gnas dri'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]skyes nas/_des dge slong rnams la dris pa/_'phags pa dag 'di na dge slong du zhig gnas/_de dag gis smras pa/_bram ze ma shes so/_/bram zes smras pa/_yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi khrom gyi ru'i grangs kyang shes na khyed kyis dge slong dag mi shes

[\[256b.3\]]bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis gcig ces bya ba la sogs pas bgrangs ba dang /_phyis brjed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gcig ces bya ba la sogs pas bgrang bar mi bya'o/_dge slong dag gis sor mos 'dzugs shing bgrangs na 'on

[\[256b.6\]]'di snyed do zhes brjod par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul shing brim par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag gis nyi ma'am zla ba'am/_lo gang la brim pa mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dbyar nye bar gtong ba'i tshe tshul shing brim par 
[\[256b.7\]]bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag bgrang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig gnas pa de dus dus su rgyal byed kyi tshal du nye bar 'ongs te/_des de na dge slong dag bsam gtan dang /_'don pa dang /_yid la byed pa'i rnal 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]'byor la brtson pa mthong nas/_de de dag gi spyod lam dang /_spyod pa dang /_sgrub pa des mngon par dad de/_des bsams pa/_re zhig 'di na dge slong ji snyed cig yod pa dris la phyis spyan [(]dras [,]drangs [)]te bshos gsol lo snyam nas/_des dge slong rnams 
[\[257a.2\]]la dris pa/_'phags pa/_dge slong ji snyed cig bzhugs/_dge slong dag gis smras pa/_'di snyed cig go/_/des rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song nas rang gi khyim du phyin te nang mi la smras pa/_song kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol 
[\[257a.3\]]gyis khyed kyis dge slong 'di snyed cig gi bshos sbyor cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_rje'i sras legs te de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes de dag gis hwags dang /_bu ram dang /_sha ka ra la sogs pa sta gon bya bar brtsams so/_/khyim bdag de yang mdza' bo dang /_nye 
[\[257a.4\]]du dang /_phu nu rnams sbran nas bshams zin pa'i dus su de dag dang lhan cig rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/_rgan pa'i mtha' nas rkang pa la phyag byas nas/_dge skos la smras pa/_'phags pa khyim bdag che ge mo zhig sang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 
[\[257a.5\]]'dun sdum par gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren to/_/zhes de skad gsungs shig_/dge skos kyis smras pa dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gnang nas de rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song ngo /_/dge slong gzhan dag cig kyang ljongs rgyu ba rgyu zhing mnyan yod du phyin to/_/de nas khyim 
[\[257a.6\]]bdag de de nyid kyi nub mo bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa sta gon byas nas/_nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams chu ra bzhag nas/_bcom ldan 'das la pho nya las btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par 
[\[257a.7\]]dgongs su gsol zhes gdugs tshod gdas par gsol to/_/dge slong rnams snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te khyim bdag de'i khyim du dong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das ni gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing gdugs tshod der drangs so/_/
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu lngas gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing gdugs tshod 'dren te/_lnga gang zhe na/_nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhed pa yin/_lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa yin/_gnas mal la gzigs par bzhed pa yin/_nad 
[\[257b.2\]]pa la gzigs par bzhed pa yin/_nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa yin no/_/don 'di la ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing der gdugs tshod drangs so/_/
[\[257b.3\]]khyim bdag des dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi tshad bzhin stan bshams/_zan sta gon byas pa las ji tsam na dge slong rab tu mang bar mthong nas des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis khyed kyis dge slong ji snyed yod pa bstan pa de snyed kyi dge slong gi gdan bshams/_
[\[257b.4\]]bshos sta gon byas na dge slong mang du byon to/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_khyim bdag dge slong glo bur pa dag lhags kyis rab tu dga' ba skyed cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa kye ma khyed kyis dge slong gzhan dag kyang 'ongs so zhes bgyis dang /_bdag gis 
[\[257b.5\]]bshos kyang mang du sta gon bgyis/_gdan yang mang du bshams pa zhig_/dge slong dag spobs pa med nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de na kha cig tha ma ma smyungs tsam du gyur te/_de dag la dge slong rnams gshe bzhin du kham zin tsam za bar gyur to/_/skabs de dge 
[\[257b.6\]]slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge skos kyi dge slong glo bur ba 'di snyed cig lhags so zhes dge slong glo bur pa rnams shes par byas nas khyim bdag la sbran par bya'o/_/dge slong gzhan dag 
[\[257b.7\]]gcig zan gyi thad ka kho nar 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag kyang sbran par bya'o/_/dge slong gzhan dag gcig sngar bos pa las gud du song nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag kyang sbran par bya'o/_/gzhan yang ngas 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong gi kun tu spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun blta bar bya zhing /_gal te dge slong ni mang zan ni nyung na/_sbyin bdag la bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zan ni nyung /_dge slong 
[\[258a.2\]]ni mang gis snyoms par rims shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/'on te zan ni mang dge slong ni nyung na des bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zan ni mang gis ci 'byor pa bzhin rims shig ces brjod par bya'o/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong gis kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa 
[\[258a.3\]]rnams yang dag par blangs te mi 'jug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/_/mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la 
[\[258a.4\]]brgyus nas/_btsun mo phreng ldan ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas btsun mo phreng ldan ma la chos bstan par brtsams so/_/des de la chos ston pa na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi na ba'i sman khyer nas glu dang rol mo'i sgra dang /_rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[258a.5\]]du chas pa btsun mo phreng ldan mas thos nas des smras pa/_'phags pa glu dang rol mo'i sgra grags pa'o ni su'i lags/_des smras pa/_btsun mo [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi na ba'i sman khyer nas 'gro ste/_sgra 'o ni de'i yin no/_/des smras pa/_
[\[258a.6\]]'phags pa gal te de lta na btsun mo phreng ldan gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun la na ba'i sman gyis bstabs so zhes bdag gi ming gis dge slong gi dge 'dun la brjod pa'i rigs so/_/des smras pa/_btsun mo legs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang zhig nad pa la 
[\[258a.7\]]rim gro byed pa de ni nga la rim gro byed pa yin no zhes gsungs pas/_khyod kyis ming gis dge slong gi dge 'dun la bstab par bya'o zhes smras nas/_btsun mo phreng ldan ma la nad med par gyur cig ces byas te stan las langs nas song ngo /_/de nas gtsug lag khang 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]du song ste/_rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas smras pa/_btsun mo phreng ldan mas dge slong gi dge 'dun la na ba'i sman gyis bstabs kyis/_gang zhig sman gang 'dod pa de song la slongs shig_/dge skos kyis bsgo ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 
[\[258b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba la nyes dmigs bcu yod do zhes ma gsungs sam/_de ji ltar bdag cag gis sman gyi phyir bslab pa las 'da' bar bya/_de spobs pa med nas cang mi zer bar 'dug ste/_dge slong 'ga' yang phreng ldan ma las sman mi slong ngo /_/ji tsam 
[\[258b.3\]]na tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i der song ba dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyis bdag gi ming gis dge slong gi dge 'dun la na ba'i sman gyis ma bstabs sam/_btsun mo bstabs so/_/'phags pa gal te de lta na ci'i slad du dge slong dag mi byon/_
[\[258b.4\]]btsun mo bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba la nyes dmigs bcu yod do zhes ma gsungs sam/_dge slong dag 'dir ji ltar 'ong /_'phags pa gal te de lta na bdag gis 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_btsun mo tshong dus pa'i tshong pa'i lag tu kAr ShA pa Na dag gtad na/_dge 
[\[258b.5\]]slong gang zhig gang 'dod pa de de las de slong grang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa legs te de ltar bgyi'o zhes tshong 'dus pa'i tshong pa'i lag tu kAr ShA pa Na dag gtad nas smras pa/_'phags pa dag rgyal po'i pho brang du mi 'ong gis dge slong gang zhig gang 'dod pa de la de byin cig_/
[\[258b.6\]]tshong pas rgyal mo'i bkas kAr ShA pa Na dag blangs te bzhag pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis lha mo phreng ldan mas spos 'tshong che ge mo zhig la kAr ShA pa Na dag gtad de/_dge slong gang zhig gang 'dod pa de khyod kyis sbyin par bya'o zhes bsgo ba thos nas song la bslang ngo snyam mo/_/de na dge 
[\[258b.7\]]slong kha cig ni song nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo cag la khur skam dang /_khur ba dang /_sha khu dag byos la byin cig_/kha cig gis smras pa/_kho bo cag la khur ba dang sha skam byin cig_/kha cig gis smras pa/_kho bo cag la sha khu khrol bu dang /_tshog pa byin cig_/de 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]de dag gis gtses pa dang /_smras pa/_'phags pa bdag ni khur mkhan yang ma lags sha g.yos mkhan yang ma lags pas/_dbyig 'di snoms te bzhud la gang zhig gang bzhed pa des de bgyid du stsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[259a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyig ma gnang ngo /_/des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag ni spos 'tshong ste tshong 'dus kyis 'tsho ba lags na/_de lta na bdag gi 'tsho ba 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[259a.3\]]stsal pa/_/sbyin bdag la yid brtan te kAr ShA pa Na dag blangs nas ci 'dod par yongs su spyad par bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/drug sde rnams khyim pa dag dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug pa bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis mthong 
[\[259a.4\]]nas 'phya bar byed cing /_'phags pa khyed rab tu byung ba tshangs par spyod pa yin na/_ji ltar 'dod pa'i longs spyod spyod pa 'di dag dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug ces byas pa dang /_de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[259a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag 'phya ba ni thog tu bab bo/_/de lta bas na dge slong dag gis khyim pa dag dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya ste/_'dug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[259a.6\]]kyis khyim pa dag dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge tshul dag dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug pa dge bsnyen dag gis mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa khyed ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags na/_ji ltar dge tshul dag dang lhan cig stan 
[\[259a.7\]]gcig la bzhugs de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di dag ni khyim pa ma yin te/_'di dag dge sbyong yin na 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/_de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]stsal pa/_bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rgan pa rgan pa dag gsar bu gsar bu dag dang lhan 
[\[259b.2\]]cig stan gcig la 'dug pas gsar bu rnams rgan pa rnams la ma gus par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgan pa dang gsar bu lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par mi bya'i/_'on kyang bar na lo 
[\[259b.3\]]gsum zhugs pa dang lhan cig stan gcig la 'dug par bya ste/_lor ma lon pa dang /_lo gsum lon pa yang lhan cig 'dug par bya zhing /_lo gcig lon pa dang /_lo bzhi lon pa nas de bzhin du lo dgu lon pa dang /_lo bcu gnyis lon pa'i bar yang lhan cig 'dug par bya'o/_/
[\[259b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bar na lo gsum zhugs pa dang lhan cig 'dug par bya ste/_lor ma lon pa dang /_lo gsum lon pa yang lhan cig 'dug par bya zhing /_lo gcig lon pa dang /_lo bzhi lon pa nas de bzhin du lo dgu lon pa dang /_lo bcu gnyis lon pa'i bar yang lhan 
[\[259b.5\]]cig 'dug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bar na lo gsum zhugs pa dang lhan cig 'dug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong dag khyim gyi nang du yang bar na lo gsum zhugs pa dang lhan cig 'dug par mi byed pas des stan dag ma 'byor nas/_
[\[259b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim gyi nang du ni slob dpon dang mkhan po dag dang yang lhan cig 'dug par bya ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o//_//sdom ni/_dge tshul khri'u g.yogs mi sbyin dang /_/dge tshul kha drang mi bya dang /_/mna' dang skugs 'dzugs mi bya dang /_/stag 
[\[259b.7\]]gi god ma mi bza' ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyan pa'i stan bsham par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge tshul dag kyang khri'u g.yogs ma 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]can la 'dug nas chos nyan par byed de/_/de dag gnyid log nas de nyid du bshang gci shor te khri'u g.yogs ma can dag ma rung bar gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[260a.2\]]tshul la khri'u g.yogs ma can sbyin par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul la khri'u g.yogs ma can sbyin par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i dge tshul skul byed ces bya ba de chos nyan du song ba dang /_de la dge slong dag gis khri'u rkyang pa zhig 
[\[260a.3\]]byin pa dang /_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ci'i phyir bdag la khri'u rkyang pa sbyin/_de dag gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul rnams la khri'u g.yogs ma can bkag go/_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ci kho bo yang nyes dmigs de byed dam/_skabs de dge 
[\[260a.4\]]slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge tshul gang dag dran pa nye bar 'jog pa de dag la/_khri'u g.yogs ma can sbyin par bya'i/_gzhan dag la ni ma yin no/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/dge slong zhig la 
[\[260a.5\]]dge tshul zhig yod pa de la des nan tur byas pa dang /_de rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na ngu zhing 'dug go/_/drug sde las gang yang rung ba zhig gis rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stong pa yin pas tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' sgo na 'dug pa des de mthong nas des smras pa/_dge tshul ci'i phyir 
[\[260a.6\]]ngu /_des smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' bdag mkhan pos nan tur byas so/_/bu tshur ngas khyod kyi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_khyod gang dang gang gis phongs pa de dang des mi phongs par bya'o zhes des gnas khang du khrid do/_/
[\[260a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis nan tur byas nas yal bar dor bar mi bya'o/_/'on kyang slar dgug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas/_dge slong des dge sbyong de la dge slong zhig mngags nas des de la smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_kho bo la mkhan po ci dgos/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]kho bo'i 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]yo byad thams cad sbyar bas mi 'gro'o/_/dge slong de 'phya bar byed/_gzhogs phyas byed/_smod par byed de/_bdag gis rab tu phyung ba nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]kha phyung ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[260b.2\]]stsal pa/_dge slong gis gzhan gyis dge tshul kha drang bar mi bya ste kha 'dren na dbyen dang nye ba'i nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/drug sde rnams gang dang gang du dgos par mna' 'dor bar byed de/_sangs rgyas la mna' 'dor/_chos dang dge 
[\[260b.3\]]'dun la mna' 'dor/_slob dpon dang mkhan po la mna' 'dor ba dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa/_slob dpon dag bdag cag khyim pa lags kyang /_ston pa la mna' 'dor bar mi bgyid na/_khyed rab tu byung ba lags na ji ltar ston 
[\[260b.4\]]pa la mna' 'dor 'di ni 'tsham pa ma lags so zhes byas pa dang /_de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can 
[\[260b.5\]]rnams 'phya ba ni thog tu bab po/_/rab tu byung ba ni bden pa'i bsam pa can yin te/_de lta bas na dge slong gis mna' 'dor bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong mna' 'dor na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/drug sde dag gang dang gang du dgos 
[\[260b.6\]]par lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_gzhan yang dge sbyong gi yo byad gang yang rung ba dag skugs su 'dzugs par byed pa bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya bar byed cing 'phags pa khyed ci khyim pa dag 
[\[260b.7\]]bzhin du lhung bzed la sogs pa yo byad skugs su 'dzugs sam/_de ni 'tsham pa ma yin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_sgog skya zos sam/_chang 'thungs sam/_'di la mi 'tsham pa ci zhig yod/_de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni thog tu bab po/_/de lta bas na dge slong gis skugs gzugs par mi bya ste/_dge slong skugs 'dzugs na 'gal 
[\[261a.2\]]tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni nang par sngar langs nas khang thog tu 'dzegs te phyogs bzhir blta zhing de dag gang na du ba 'thul ba'am/_bya rgod lding ba snang ba der myur du gom pa bslang ste 'gro bar byed 
[\[261a.3\]]do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na nye dga' nang par sngar khang thog tu 'dzegs te blta bar brtsams na/_des bya rgod lding ba mthong nas de rings pa rings par song ba dang /_ji tsam na stag gis nags thibs po'i sa phyogs zhig tu god ma zhig sbas pa mthong nas de dga' ste/_de 
[\[261a.4\]]khyer nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_stag dri snom zhing phyi bzhin 'brangs nas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na sgra 'byin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 
[\[261a.5\]]la rmas pa/_stag 'o ni ci ste skad 'byin/_des gsol pa/_btsun pa des god ma sbas pa de btsun pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]'tshal te mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong stag gi god ma za'am/_btsun pa 'tshal lags so/_/
[\[261a.6\]]kun dga' bo [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzang po bzang po dag bsad nas sha bzang po dag zos shing khrag bzang po dag 'thungs nas bor te 'gro'i/_stag ni god ma sbed par byed pas de lta bas na dge slong gis stag gi god ma bza' bar mi bya ste/_za na 'gal tshabs 
[\[261a.7\]]can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang ngas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi kun du spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong gis sha 'drim pa'i tshe 'di ci'i sha stag gi god ma ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par len na 'gal tshabs can 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]du 'gyur ro//_//sdom ni/_tshul shing rnams ni brims pa na/_/spun gnyis dag ni gab pa dang /_/la ba bsgyur bar bya ba dang /_/de lta bu la sogs pa'o/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba 
[\[261b.2\]]na bzhugs so/_ri 'or zhig na gtsug lag khang zhig yod de/_ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dga' bo dang /_nye dga' ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las ri 'or der phyin to/_/de dag der phyin pa na dge 'dun la yang rnyed pa zhig grub na de dag gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa yin pas dge 
[\[261b.3\]]slong gang gis kyang ma bcar ba dang /_nye dga' bos dga' bo la smras pa/_slob dpon lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag khengs pa nga rgyal can dag cig pas gtses tshul spyon/_gab ste bzhugs la 'di dag rnyed pa ji ltar 'ged pa gzigs so/_/des smras pa/_legs te de 
[\[261b.4\]]bzhin bya'o zhes de dag gab ste 'dug pa dang /_dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa de bgos so/_/gang gi tshe rnyed pa bgos zin pa de'i tshe de dag 'ongs nas smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa grub pa bgo'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_khyed ga las da gzod 'dir 'ongs kyi/_
[\[261b.5\]]rnyed pa de 'drim pa'i tshe ma yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_ci khyed bgod rgyu zhig yin nam/_bgos par mi chud kyi bgo nyes te/_ci khyod kyis go bar byas nas bgos sam/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[261b.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun la deng dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'drim na/_dge slong gang yang gang du yang ma 'gro shig ces go bar byas nas rnyed pa brim par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis rnyed pa de slar bsdus so/_/bsdus nas dge 'dun la dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'drim na/_dge 
[\[261b.7\]]slong gang yang gang du yang ma 'gro shig ces bsgo nas/_de dag gis bgo bar brtsams pa dang /_dga' bo dang nye dga' de bzhin du gab ste 'dug go//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po nyi shu gsum pa/_gang gi tshe dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa de bgos 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]zin pa de'i tshe de dag yang 'ongs nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur rnyed pa de bgo'o/_/dge slong dag gis smras pa/_khyed gang nas da gzod 'dir 'ongs kyi rnyed pa de dge 'dun la go bar byas nas 'drim pa'i tshe ni ma yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_gal te 
[\[262a.2\]]khyed kyis go bar byas kyang bgos par mi chud kyi bgo nyes te/_ci khyod kyis go bar byas nas gaN+DI brdungs sam/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_go bar byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dge 
[\[262a.3\]]'dun la rnyed pa de brim par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis yang rnyed pa de slar bsdus so/_/bsdus nas de bzhin du go bar byas te/_gaN+DI brdungs nas bgo bar brtsams pa dang /_de dag de kho na bzhin du gab ste 'dug go/_/gang gi tshe rnyed pa de bgos zin pa de'i tshe yang 
[\[262a.4\]]'ongs te de kho na bzhin du smras pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_dge 'dun la yang go bar byas/_gaN+DI yang brdungs nas khyed ga las da gzod 'dir 'ongs/_de dag gis smras pa/_khyod kyis go bar yang byas/_gaN+DI yang brdungs kyang ci ga khyed kyis 
[\[262a.5\]]tshul shing brims sam/_bgos par mi chud kyi bgo nyes so zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_go bar byas te gaN+DI brdungs nas tshul shing brim par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams 
[\[262a.6\]]kyis yang rnyed pa de bsdus so/_/bsdus nas go bar byas/_gaN+DI brdungs/_tshul shing brims te bgo bar brtsams pa dang /_de dag de kho na bzhin du gab ste 'dug go/_/gang gi tshe rnyed pa de bgos zin pa de'i tshe de dag 'ongs nas de kho na bzhin du smras pa dang /_dge slong 
[\[262a.7\]]rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyed kyis dge 'dun la de ltar co dri'am/_dge 'dun la go bar byas/_gaN+DI brdungs tshul shing brims na khyed ga las da gzod 'dir phyin/_de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag rnyed pa lta phar zhog_/gal te de lta na kho 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]bo cag gis dge 'dun ji ltar co dris pa smros shig_/gal te khyod kyis dge 'dun la go bar byas/_gaN+DI brdungs/_tshul shing brims na de ci khyed kyis kho bo cag gi bgo skal bstan tam/_der zad/_rnyed pa med kyang bla 'gro'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams 
[\[262b.2\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun la go bar byas/_gaN+DI brdungs/_tshul shing brims nas gang zhig mi snang ba de'i bgo skal bstan nas bgo bar bya'o/_/bgos zin te 'ong ba gang yin pa de la ni 
[\[262b.3\]]rnyed pa sbyin par mi bya ste/_gal te de ltar bgos na legs par bgos pa yin pas 'di la 'gyod par mi bgyi'o/_/dge slong gis ched du bsams te de ltar dge 'dun la co dri bar yang mi bya'o/_/dge slong ched du bsams te dge 'dun la co 'dri bar byed na 'gal 
[\[262b.4\]]tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul nas tshon rtsi'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phyi nang bcas te ri mo bris pa de'i tshe mnyan yod 
[\[262b.5\]]na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis ji ltar khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal tshon rtsi'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phyi nang bcas te ri mo bris nas mchog tu phun sum tshogs par byas pa thos te/_de'i tshe srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma 
[\[262b.6\]]rgyal byed kyi tshal blta ba'i phyir nye bar song ngo /_/yang de'i tshe mnyan yod na bram ze zhig gnas pa de la rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_grong mi rnams bram ze 'di mdzes so zhes mngon par dad de des rgyal po'i pho brang nas chen po la 'os pa'i la ba zhig thob bo/_/
[\[262b.7\]]des de bgos nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du ltad mo ltar song ba dang /_de mthong ma thag kho nar dad pa chen po skyes nas des la ba de phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gos kyi rnyed pa byung na tha na me mar gyi snying po'i rgyu tsam du yang mnyam 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]par bgo'o zhes gsungs pas/_dge slong rnams kyis de tshal bu tshal bur byas nas mnyam par bgos so/_/bram ze des bsams pa/_la ba de chen po la 'os pa zhig pas bdag gis 'phags pa rnams la kAr ShA pa Na dag phul la slar blang ngo snyam 
[\[263a.2\]]ste de nang par sngar langs nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na dge slong mang po dag cig 'dug go/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa dag phyag 'tshal lo/_/bram ze chen po nad med cig_/'phags pa la la ba phul ba de khyed kyis cir bgyis/_
[\[263a.3\]]dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_bram ze chen po rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig_/kho bo cag gis mnyam par bgos so/_gcig gis smras pa/_bdag gis ni bgo skal zhwa la glan no/_/gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_bdag gis ni lham yu thung la glan no/_/gzhan 
[\[263a.4\]]zhig gis smras pa/_bdag gis ni stod kor la glan no/_/gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_bdag gis ni lhung bzed phyi bar byas so/_des smras pa/_'phags pa la ba de chen po la 'os pa zhig na kye ma khyed kyis de kAr ShA pa Na dag tu bsgyur la kAr ShA pa Na dag bgo 
[\[263a.5\]]'dad cig ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze de zer ba bden te/_de lta bas na dge 'dun la gos kyi rnyed pa de lta bu grub pa gang yin pa de kAr ShA 
[\[263a.6\]]pa Na dag tu bsgyur la/_kAr ShA pa Na dag bgo bar bya'o//_//sdom ni/_/rung ba ma yin lnga dag gi/_/lham ni dgag pa mdzad pa dang /_/dom lpags kyi ni lham dag dang /_/de yi steng gi rim pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu 
[\[263a.7\]]rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bo bdag cag gis mnyan yod du skye bo mang po thams cad la ma lus par bza' ba'i rim bslangs na/_rgyal po'i glang po che 'dul ba de dag gis 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]bdag cag la cung zad kyang ma byin gyis tshur shog 'dong cung zad cig bslang ngo /_/de na kha cig gis smras pa/_legs te de ltar bya mod kyi/_'on kyang thabs shig bsham par bya'o/_/ci zhig bya/_seng ge'i pags pa las lham byas la de bgos te rdzi kar 'dug 
[\[263b.2\]]nas glang po che rnams bskrog par bya'o/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_re zhig de bzhin du bslangs la gal te ma ster na phyis de ltar bya'o zhes de rnams nang par sngar langs te de dag gi drung du song nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gtum po khyod kyis kho bo cag la zas 
[\[263b.3\]]kyi rin mi sbyin nam/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa khyed la kho bo cag ci rag lus na gang gi phyir kho bo cag gis zas kyi rin sbyin/_drug sde rnams kyis 'jal to zhes byas nas song ngo /_/de dag gis sngar gros byas pa bzhin seng ge'i pags pa las lham byas nas 
[\[263b.4\]]bgos te de dag glang po che rnams rgyu ba'i rdzi kar dong ste 'dug pa dang /_glang po che rnams kyis seng ge'i dri tshor te bred nas gcin rtug stor te 'bros par brtsams so/_/glang po che 'dul ba rnams kyis lcags kyu dag gis zho sha yod med kyis bzung na ma thub pa dang /_drug 
[\[263b.5\]]sde rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ma gtang shig ma gtang shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa mi thub na ji ltar mi gtang /_drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/_kho bo cag gis glan nam/_'phags pa de ltar gnang na sman che'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[263b.6\]]dag gal te bza' ba'i rin ster bar dam 'cha' na glan no/_/'phags pa dbul lo/_/bden grang zhes byas nas de dag rdzi phyogs ma yin par dong ste 'dug pa dang /_seng ge'i dri mi mnam par glang po che rnams sdod do/_/glang po che 'dul ba rnams kyis smras pa/_
[\[263b.7\]]'phags pa ci khyod rig sngags mkhyen tam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo cag gis rig sngags mi shes so/_/'phags pa gal te de lta na khyed kyis ji ltar bzlog_/de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_khyed kyis gnod pa 'di lta bu 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]yang byas pa lta/_gal te rgyal po'i glang po che dam pa yan lag mchog can 'di lta bu dag nags kyi nang du shor bar gyur na/_khyed kyis rgyal po la dgu byas par ma gyur tam/_de dag 'dzum dmul nas cang mi zer bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams 
[\[264a.2\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag seng ge'i pags pa'i lham gyon pa las gyur gyis/_de'i phyir dge slong gis seng ge'i pags pa'i lham bcang bar mi bya'o snyam du 
[\[264a.3\]]dgongs nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis seng ge'i pags pa'i lham bcang bar mi bya ste/_dge slong seng ge'i pags pa'i lham 'chang na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis seng ge'i 
[\[264a.4\]]pags pa'i lham bcang bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis stag lpags kyi lham bcang bar brtsams pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na sen mo 
[\[264a.5\]]dang /_mche ba'i stobs can lnga po glang po cang shes dang /_rta cang shes dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_gung gi pags pa'i lham bcang bar mi bya'o/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sen mo dang mche ba'i stobs can lnga'i pags pa'i lham bcang bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal 
[\[264a.6\]]pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa sen mo dang mche ba'i stobs can gzhan dag kyang mchis na/_ci lags de dag gi pags pa'i lham yang bcang bar mi bgyi lags sam/_nye ba 'khor de dag gi pags pa'i lham yang bcang bar mi 
[\[264a.7\]]bya ste/_'chang na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/mnyan yod na dge slong zhig gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis thebs pa de sman pa'i drung du song nas bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag gzhang 'brum gyis thebs na sman ston cig des smras pa/_'phags pa dom lpags 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]kyi lham mnobs shig dang khyod sos par 'gyur ro/_des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[264b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis thebs pas dom lpags kyi lham bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis thebs pas dom lpags kyi lham bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_rim 
[\[264b.3\]]pa mang po ma rnyed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te rim pa mang por ma rnyed na steng rim cig spun pag tu glan par bya'o//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi las sgo lnga pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//bsdus pa'i sdom ni/_rgyus pa rab snang drag po dang /_/
[\[264b.4\]]bran dang de bzhin btsod ka dang /_/babs pa dang ni tshong dpon dang /_/dge slong lhag ma mi dor ba'o/_/sdom ni/_de yi rgyus pa 'breng bu dang /_de bzhin brang lhan rting lhan dang /_/yu chad dang ni yu thung dang /_/sgro gu can dag mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[264b.5\]]mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sen mo dang mche ba'i stobs can lnga'i pags pa'i lham bcang bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis de dag gi 
[\[264b.6\]]rgyus pas lham btsems te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gi rgyus pas lham btsem par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi rgyus pas lham btsem par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams 
[\[264b.7\]]kyis de dag gi pags pa'i 'breng bus btsems te/_nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gi pags pa'i 'breng bus lham btsem par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi rgyus pa dang pags pa'i 'breng bus lham 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]btsem par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis de dag gi pags pa las brang lhan byas te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gi pags pa las brang lhan mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[265a.2\]]de dag gi pags pa las brang lhan mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis de dag gi pags pa la rting lhan byas te/_nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gi pags pa las rting lhan mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[265a.3\]]kyis de dag gi pags pa las brang lhan dang /_rting lhan mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis de dag gi pags pa las lham yu chad byas te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gi pags pa las lham yu chad 
[\[265a.4\]]mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi pags pa las brang lhan dang /_rting lhan dang /_lham yu chad mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis de dag gi pags pa las lham yu thung byas te/_nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[265a.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gi pags pa las lham yu thung mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi pags pa las lham yu thung mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis de dag gi pags pa las lham sgro gu can byas te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/_
[\[265a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gi pags pa las lham sgro gu can mi bya'o//_//sdom ni/_rab snang 'dod pa thams cad dang /_/dge 'dun bshos dang bzo sbyangs dang /_/mgon med zas sbyin khre'u rnams dang /_/gtsug lag khang dang bzang po'o//_//
[\[265a.7\]]bar sdom ni/_bltam dang rgyal po che dang bdag gi mthu/_/de bzhin mi dkar rab byung rgyal tshab dang /_/sangs rgyas rgyal srid nyid dang yan lag mchog_/de bzhin rmi lam sa 'dzin skyes dang gnas/_/byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na rgyal 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po pad ma chen po zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_chos kyi rgyal po rgyal srid 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'khrug pa dang /_'khrug long 
[\[265b.2\]]rab tu zhi ba/_chom rkun dang /_nad med pa/_sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa/_chos dang mthun pas byed du 'jug go/_/mnyan yod na ni rgyal po tshangs byin ring du 'phur/_'phags rgyal na ni mu khyud mtha' yas/_kau shAm bI na ni dmag brgya 
[\[265b.3\]]pa zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_rgyal srid rgyas pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_chos dang mthun par byed du 'jug go zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na gzigs pa lnga po rigs 
[\[265b.4\]]la gzigs pa dang /_dus la gzigs pa dang /_yul la gzigs pa dang /_rus la gzigs pa dang /_bud med la gzigs pas 'jig rten la gzigs te/_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug kyang lan gsum du sbyang ba mdzad nas glang po cher bstan pas yum gyi 
[\[265b.5\]]lhums su zhugs so/_/de'i tshe sa chen po yang shin tu g.yos par gyur/_/'jig rten 'di thams cad kyang snang ba rgya chen pos sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi kha dog gi mthu yang zil gyis mnan nas khyab par gyur/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten gyi bar gyi 
[\[265b.6\]]mun pa mun gnag thibs po smag tu gyur pa gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba 'di dag gi 'od kyis snang bar ma nus pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur te/_der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag 
[\[265b.7\]]rang gi lag nas bzung yang mi mthong ba de dag kyang 'od des sems can phan tshun mthong nas shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta/_shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhes bya bar shes so/_/gang gi tshe byang chub 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltam pa de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bu yang btsas te/_rgyal po'i khab tu ni rgyal po pad ma chen po'i bu btsas so/_/mnyan yod du ni tshangs byin gyi 'phags rgyal du ni mu khyud mtha' yas kyi/_kau shAm+bIr ni rgyal 
[\[266a.2\]]po dmag brgya pa'i bu btsas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa na sa chen po 'di gser zhun ma lta bur snang bar gyur pa dang /_rgyal po so so nas bsams pa/_bdag gi bu'i mthu'o bdag gi bu'i mthu'o snyam nas de dag so so nas ming 'dogs par byed de/_rgyal po 
[\[266a.3\]]pad ma chen pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga'i bu btsas pa na nyi ma'i gzugs bzhin du 'jig rten snang bar byas pas de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming gzugs can snying po zhes gdags so/_/rgyal po tshangs byin ring du 'phur gyis smras pa/_nga'i bu btsas pa na gzhongs rnams 
[\[266a.4\]]gsal zhing gsal ba lta bur snang bas de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar gdags so/_/rgyal po mu khyud mtha' yas kyis smras pa/_nga'i bu btsas pa na 'jig rten rab tu snang ba kho nas snang bar byas pas de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar 
[\[266a.5\]]gdags so/_/rgyal po dmag brgya pas smras pa/_nga'i bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma shar ba bzhin du snang bar byas pas de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming shar bar gdags so/_/de'i tshe ri ki skin da la drang srong mi dkar ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten 'di'i 'jig pa la mkhas pa/_
[\[266a.6\]]'chags pa la mkhas pa zhig gnas so/_/de'i tsha bo na la da zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de de'i drung du yang dang yang du nye bar 'gro'o/_/des nye bar 'ongs pa de la rtag tu 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i gtam byas te/_de 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i gtam thos nas skyo ste de'i thad 
[\[266a.7\]]du rab tu byung ngo /_/des dus gzhan zhig na drang srong mi dkar ba'i phug snang ba rgya chen pos khyab pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_nyi ma thams cad cig car du/_/'dir ni shar bar gyur tam ci/_/'di ltar ri dang phug bcas par/_/'od zer dag 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]gis 'bar ba bzhin/_/mi dkar ba yis de smras pa/_/nyi ma'i 'od tsha 'od 'di bsil/_/lus 'dir snang ba 'jug pas na/_/'di ni nges par thub pa'i 'od/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od po che/_/gdon mi za bar lhums nas byung /_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' de/_/
[\[266b.2\]]byung ba'i 'od ni dri med pa/_/'jig rten gsum po dag kun ni/_/gser dang 'dra ba bkye ba yin/_/na la das smras pa/_mkhan po gal te de lta na tshur spyon/_byang chub sems dpa' gzigs kyis bzhud do/_/des smras pa/_bu da ltar byang chub sems dpa' lha dbang che bar 
[\[266b.3\]]grags pa/_dbang che bar grags pa rnams kyis bskor cing bzhugs te/_de bdag cag gis mthong bar sla ba ma yin gyis/_gang gi tshe pho brang du gshegs nas mtshan btags te phyir byung ba de'i tshe ltar 'dong ngo /_/gang gi nyin par byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa de 
[\[266b.4\]]nyid kyi nyin mo 'dun pa la sogs pa rim gro pa lnga brgya dang /_'dun ma la sogs pa'i rim gro ma lnga brgya dang /_glang po che mo lnga brgya dang /_rta rgod ma lnga brgya yang btsas shing 'brangs/_gter lnga brgya yang kha bye ste snang ngo /_blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la 
[\[266b.5\]]sbran pa/_lha zhal rjes dgyes pa mdzad du gsol/_gzhon nu bltam pa na don 'di snyed grub ste/_rim gro pa lnga brgya dang /_rim gro ma lnga brgya yang btsas/_glang po che mo lnga brgya dang /_rta rgod ma lnga brgya yang 'brangs/_gter lnga brgya yang kha bye ste bstan lags 
[\[266b.6\]]so/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas yid bde ba skyes te smras pa/_shes ldan dag gzhon nu btsas pa ni nga'i don thams cad dang las kyi mtha' thams cad grub pas de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar gdags so zhes byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan 'di lta ste 
[\[266b.7\]]don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar der btags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin po che sna bzhi'i khyogs la bzhag ste sems can stong phrag du mas bskor nas lha dang mi'i bkur sti chen pos ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer du zhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer du zhugs 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]pa na shAkya nga rgyal can mur cor smra ba/_thug thub can rnams thub pa bzhin du cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_shAkya nga rgyal can mu cor smra ba thug thub can 'di dag gzhon nu grong khyer du zhugs pa dang thub pa bzhin du cang mi smra 
[\[267a.2\]]bar 'dug pas de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming shAkya thub par gdags so zhes de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan gnyis pa 'di lta ste shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba der btags so/_/shAkya rnams la gnod sbyin gnyug mar gnas pa shAkya spel ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_shAkya su'i 
[\[267a.3\]]bu'am/_bu mo btsas kyang rung de dang por gnod sbyin shAkya spel ba'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du khrid nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag deng la gzhon nu gnod sbyin shAkya spel ba'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du chug shig_/blon po rnams kyis de'i 
[\[267a.4\]]mdun du khrid pa dang /_gnod sbyin shAkya spel bas byang chub sems dpa' thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de brtad de rings pa rings par gom pa bslang nas byang chub sems dpa' bsu ste rkang pa la phyag byas pa dang /_rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_shes 
[\[267a.5\]]ldan dag gnod sbyin shAkya spel ba yang gzhon nu'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_de lta bas na 'di ni lha'i yang lha yin pas de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes gdags so zhes des na byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan gsum pa 'di lta ste/_lha'i yang lha zhes bya ba der btags 
[\[267a.6\]]so/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa' bram ze rnams dang /_mtshan mkhan rnams dang /_skar mkhan rnams la bstan nas/_shes ldan dag gzhon nu cig gang dag dang ldan na skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin te/_gal 
[\[267a.7\]]te khyim pa khyim na gnas pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang mthun pa rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /_de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin te/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa blon po rin po che'o/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig dag bgos te dad pas yang dag par khyim nas khyim med par rab tu phyung na 'jig rten na de bzhin 
[\[267b.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan nam/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha de lta lags te/_gzhon nu ni gang dag dang ldan na skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba 
[\[267b.3\]]gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma lags te zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten na sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan lags so/_/na la das smras pa/_mkhan po byang chub sems dpa' ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer du gshegs te/_
[\[267b.4\]]de'i mtshan yang btags lags kyis tshur gshegs gzigs su bzhud do/_/des smras pa/_bu legs te/_de bzhin byas 'dong ngo zhes de gnyis rdzu 'phrul gyis chas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthus de'i rdzu 'phrul nyams te rkang pa kho nas ser skya'i 
[\[267b.5\]]gzhi'i grong khyer du zhugs nas rgyal po zas gtsang gi pho brang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na sdod do/_/de nas drang srong mi dkar bas mi zhig la smras pa/_kye skyes bu khyed tshur shog song la rgyal po zas gtsang la drang srong mi dkar ba lha lta bar 'dod 
[\[267b.6\]]de sgo na 'dug go zhes sbron cig_/de song nas rgyal po zas gtsang la lha drang srong mi dkar ba lha lta bar 'tshal te chab sgo na mchis so zhes sbran pa dang /_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag drang srong mi dkar ba las su 'gog nang du shog shig de nang du zhugs pa dang /_rgyal po zas 
[\[267b.7\]]gtsang gis byon pa legs so zhes bya ba'i kun du spyod pas kun du spyad nas rkang pa la mchod yon phul te seng ge'i khri la 'dug tu bcug go/_/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/_drang srong chen po ci zhig gi slad du byon/_des tshigs 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]su bcad de smras pa/_rgyal chen bdag ni khyod kyi sras/_/blta bar 'tshal nas mchis lags te/_/'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa/_/thub pa de ni blta 'tshal lo/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_drang srong chen po gzhon nu gnyid log go/_/
[\[268a.2\]]des smras pa/_mnal bzhin blta bar bya'o/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_drang srong chen po legs kyis de bzhin du mdzod la gzigs shig_/des song nas byang chub sems dpa' mig mi 'dzums par gzugs rnams la gzigs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong 
[\[268a.3\]]nas kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rigs kyi rta po rnam dag ni/_/nam gyi gung la nyal ba ltar/_/dgos pa don du gnyer rnams kyi/_/mig la yun ring gnyid mi gnas/_/zhes smras nas smras pa/_lha ci gzhon nu bram ze rnams dang /_mtshan mkhan rnams 
[\[268a.4\]]dang /_skar mkhan rnams la bstan tam/_des smras pa/_drang srong chen po bstan to/_/lha de dag gis ci zhig tu lung bstan/_rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o/_/des byang chub sems dpa' la yan man 
[\[268a.5\]]brtag par brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rnams mthong nas/_dus ci tsam gyis bdud rtsi thob par 'gyur zhes bsams pa la zhugs nas des lo nyi shu rtsa dgu lon pa dang khyim nas byung ste lo drug tu dka' ba spyad nas bdud rtsi 
[\[268a.6\]]thob par 'gyur bar mthong ngo /_/de na bdag nyid kyi rgyud bsam pa la zhugs pa dang /_bar skabs su 'chi bar mthong nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sred pa byung nas de mig mchi mas gang bzhin tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_sa bdag rtog ge rnams kyi blo gros 'khrul/_/dus kyi 
[\[268a.7\]]mthar ni 'khor los sgyur mi 'byung /_/bsod nams mchog can 'di ni chos kyi mdzod/_/nyes pa rnams las rgyal te sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/mi yi dbang po mtshan gsal min rnams kyis/_/gling bzhi rnams kyi bdag po'i dbang phyug 'gyur/_/shin tu mtshan 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]gsal thub dbang rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/mi mchog chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur/_/de nas rgyal pos de mig mchi mas gang ba mthong nas bag tsha ste mi dga' nas slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_skyes pa bud med dag ni gang phrad nas/_/ngoms par mi 'gyur dga' ba 
[\[268b.2\]]thob 'gyur ba/_/lus [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dga' byed de ni 'dir gzigs nas/_/ci slad khyod kyi zhal ni mchi mar bcas/_/bdag gi gzhon nu 'ga' las 'jigs pa'am/_/tshe zad nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur grang /_/de slad dge ba 'di myur bdag la gsungs/_/khyod kyi bshums 
[\[268b.3\]]mo byung bas bdag 'dar ro/_/des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/gal te 'di yi steng du mkha' las ni/_/rdo rje'i char drag rab tu bab gyur kyang /_/thub pa chen po'i sku yi spu nyag gcig_/kun tu bskyod par nus pa ma yin no/_/tshan chen rlung gis rab tu bskyod pa yi/_/
[\[268b.4\]]shin tu mi bzad mtshon rnon rnam dag dang /_/sbrul gdug rnams dang shin tu gdug pa'i dug_/gzhon nu'i lus la bab kyang smas mi nus/_/mi dbang bdag ni chos mchog mdzod 'di dang /_/phrad nas don ma grub par 'chi 'gyur te/_/zhi ba mi 'thob rang gi nyes mthong nas/_/
[\[268b.5\]]de yi slad du bdag ni ngu bar bas/_/'jig rten dag ni gang rnams dus su ni/_/smra ba'i dam pa mtshungs med 'di yi chos/_/nyan cing thos nas rab zhi mchog 'gro ba/_/bde skyid bsod nams can de rims nad bral/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems 
[\[268b.6\]]dpas bdud rtsi 'thob par thos nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/log pa'i lta bas nyams pa ni phal chen [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba dang g.yo kun du spyod pa la zhugs pa yin pas drang srong mi dkar bas smras pa/_lha khyod kyi grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di snyam du kye ma drang srong 
[\[268b.7\]]mi dkar ba rkang gis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer du 'ongs kyang ci ma rung snyam du yun ring po nas smon pas bdag skye bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rkang kho nas ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer du 'ongs te rkang kho nas 'byung gis grong khyer mdzes par bgyid du stsol cig_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag drang srong mi dkar ba rkang gis grong khyer nas 'byung gis/_grong khyer dang lam mdzes par byed du chug la dril sgrogs te 'di skad du ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa 
[\[269a.2\]]gzhan gyis kyang drang srong mi dkar ba grong khyer nas 'byung ba su zhig ces sgo shig_/lha de ltar 'tshal lo zhes blon po rnams kyis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par byas/_tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab dri zhim po'i pog phor bzhag_/
