[\[269a.3\]]dar gyi lda ldi mang po bres/_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng /_me tog sna tshogs bkram lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal bas kyang lhag par dga' dga' ltar grong khyer mdzes pa dang /_lam mdzes par byas nas dril bsgrags te/_'di skad ces shes ldan grong 
[\[269a.4\]]khyer na gnas pa rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor ba rnams dang /_yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs nyon cig_/lhas 'di skad ces drang srong mi dkar ba sang rkang gis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer nas 'byung gis de'i phyir khyed thams cad kyis de su zhig ces bka' stsal 
[\[269a.5\]]to/_/ji tsam nam nangs pa dang /_drang srong mi dkar ba mi'i mchog stong phrag du mas bkur sti chen pos bskyal nas rkang gis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer nas byung ngo /_/des ri ki skin dar song nas yang bsam gtan dag kyang bskyed/_rdzu 'phrul yang bsgrubs so/_/de'i tshe 
[\[269a.6\]]rnam par smin pa'i las yongs su zad pas nad kyis thebs te/_rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_me tog dang /_'dab ma dang /_'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis rim gro byas kyang nad de nye bar zhi bar ma gyur to/_/na la das de'i lus kyi gnas skabs shes nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te 
[\[269a.7\]]smras pa/_mkhan po gang cung zad rab tu 'byung ba de thams cad ni bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba bdud rtsi tshol ba lags te/_de'i slad du gal te khyod kyis bdud rtsi brnyes na/_bdag la yang bdud rtsi'i bgo bsha' mdzad du gsol/_des smras pa/_bu nga yang gang cung zad rab tu byung ba 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]de thams cad bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba dang /_bdud rtsi tshol ba yin na ngas bdud rtsi ma rnyed do/_/'on kyang khyod shAkya rnams kyi nang du gzhon nu 'khrungs pa de'i spyan sngar rab tu byung la rigs rlom par ma byed/_rus rlom par ma byed/_bram ze'i bu'i rlom pa ma byed par nga rgyal chog la 
[\[269b.2\]]tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig dang /_des na khyod bdud rtsi thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/_bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing /_/mthon po'i mtha' ni snyil bar 'gyur/_/phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/_/gson pa'i mtha' ni shi ba yin/_/zhes bya bas dus kyi chos dang 
[\[269b.3\]]ldan par gyur to/_/des de'i rus bu la rus bu'i mchod pa byas nas grong khyer bA rA Na sIr song ste drang srong gi nang na 'dug go/_/de na la da dang rus mthun pas de'i ming drang srong na la da zhes bya bar chags so/_/gzhon nu rab snang ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_
[\[269b.4\]]nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar sar dang /_mar dkar dang /_mar gyi snying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par gtso bo dag gis bskyed 
[\[269b.5\]]bsrings pas mtshe'u na 'dug pa'i pad ma bzhin du skyed drag par gyur to/_/de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /_grangs dang /_rtsis dang /_lag rtsis dang /_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/_yul [(]kyi [,]gyi [)]dbang phyug la gnas pa'i mthu thob pa/_sa 
[\[269b.6\]]chen po'i dkyil 'khor rnal du phab ste gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas tha dad pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/_glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang /_rta la zhon pa dang /_shing rta'i thabs dang /_ral gri'i thabs dang /_'phang dpyad dang /_phyir bsnur ba 
[\[269b.7\]]dang /_mdun du bsnur ba dang /_lcags kyus bsgyur thabs dang /_zhags pa gdab pa dang /_mda' bo che 'phen pa dang /_gcad pa dang /_dral ba dang /_'dzin stangs dang /_gom stabs dang /_thor tshugs dang /_rgyang nas phog pa dang /_sgra grag par phog pa dang /_
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]gnad du phog pa dang /_mi 'chor bar phog pa dang /_tshabs chen po de dag la mkhas par gyur te gnas lnga la yang byang bar gyur to/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i rol pa la rol pa'i tshe gzhon nu rab snang yang gzhon nu'i rtse ba 
[\[270a.2\]]la rtse'o/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba de'i tshe gzhon nu rab snang yang rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur to/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgan po dang nad pa dang shi ba gzigs nas skyo ste sa 'tsho ma dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skyes dang /_grags 'dzin ma la sogs 
[\[270a.3\]]pa bud med drug khri spangs nas nam gyi gung la dka' thub kyi nags su gnas te/_gong ma dang 'og ma'i rnam pa las grol ba'i drang srong rnams kyi thad nas 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_rangs byed kyi bu 
[\[270a.4\]]lhag spyod kyi thad nas gzugs med pa'i khams ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar las 'dod chags dang bral bar byas te lung 'bogs pa med pa'i phyir dka' ba spyad pa rung ngo snyam nas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad na khyad par rtogs pa thob par ma gyur te/_dbugs kyang ci bder brngubs shing ci 
[\[270a.5\]]bder phyung /_zhal zas rags pa 'bras can dang zan dron kyang gsol/_mar dkar dang /_til mar gyis kyang sku byugs/_chu grang dro ran pas kyang sku khrus mdzad nas sde grong zhes bya ba'i grong du gshegs nas bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs las 'o thug sbrang rtsi can lan bcu 
[\[270a.6\]]drug tu nying khur byas pa bzhes te gsol nas/_klu'i rgyal po nag pos bstod cing rtswa 'tshong bkra shis las rtswa dag bzhes nas byang chub kyi shing drung ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_nyid kyis rtswa ma 'khrugs ma 'dzings par bting ste bzhugs nas skyil mo krung bcas te sku drang por 
[\[270a.7\]]bsrang dgongs pa mngon sum du bzhag nas ji srid zag pa zad pa ma thob pa de srid kyi bar du skyil mo krung mi gzhig go snyam du thugs bskyed cing tshig tu yang gsungs te/_des ji srid du zag pa zad pa ma brnyes pa/_de srid du skyil mo krung ma bshig go/_/gang gi tshe bcom 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bdud 'byung po dkrigs phrag drug bcu'i 'khor can byams pa'i mtshon gyis pham par mdzad nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes te/_tshangs pas bskul nas yul bA rA Na sIr gshegs te lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang mthun 
[\[270b.2\]]pa bskor ba de'i tshe gzhon nu rab snang yang rgyal po chen por dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/_/de na yul 'phags rgyal na rgyal po rab snang zhes bya ba chos kyi rgyal po rgyal srid 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa skye bo mang po dang /_mis gang ba 'thab 
[\[270b.3\]]pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'khrug pa dang /_'khrug long rab tu zhi ba chom rkun dang /_nad med pa sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa chos dang mthun par byed du 'jug ste/_de'i mthus rtag tu dga' ston gyis rab tu dga'o/_/grong khyer 'phags rgyal 
[\[270b.4\]]de na dbang po lnga dang /_nye dbang lnga yod do/_/rdzing bu lnga brgya las wa nas 'bab pa'i chu lnga brgya rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes pa zhes bya ba de nyid du 'bab bo/_/rgyal po rab snang la yan lag mchog lnga po glang po che 'dam bu'i ri dang /_glang po che mo bzang ldan dang /_rnga mo rgya mtsho'i 
[\[270b.5\]]rkang pa dang /_rta gos mgrin dang /_'phar ma pa khwa zhes bya ba yod de/_de dag las 'dam bu'i ris ni nyin zhag gcig la dpag tshad brgya chod do/_/bzang ldan gyis ni dpag tshad brgyad bcu'o/_/rgya mtsho'i rkang gis ni dpag tshad bdun bcu'o/_/rta gos mgrin gyis 
[\[270b.6\]]ni dpag tshad lnga bcu'o/_/khwas ni dpag tshad nyi shu'o/_/de de ltar 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa de khams ma mnyam pas nad gnyid med pa zhes bya bas thebs so/_/rgyal po de ni mar la sdang zhing chang la dga' ba zhig ste/_de la sman pa rnams kyis rdzas kyi tshogs kyi 
[\[270b.7\]]khyad par sna tshogs dang sbyar ba'i mar blud na de 'thung du mi btub bo/_/de la btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyis mar blud par byas na mar la je khro bar rtsom zhing gang zhig mar gyi ming 'byin pa de'i mgo drungs nas bcad nas 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]sa la 'dor bar byed do/_/de gnyid med pas nam gyi thun dang po la ni btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byed do/_/gnyis pa la ni glang po che dang /_rta dag la blta'o/_/gsum pa la ni 'bangs mel tshe ba rnams la da ltar mel tse 
[\[271a.2\]]su byed ces 'dri zhing /_de gang zhig tshig dang po la ni lan mi glon pa de la yang bzod do/_/gnyis pa la lan mi glon pa de la yang bzod de/_gang zhig gsum pa la lan mi glon pa de'i ni mgo drungs nas bcad nas sa la 'dor bar byed pas de'i ming rgyal po rab snang rgyal po rab snang zhes 
[\[271a.3\]]bya ba gang yin pa de nub nas ming gtum po rab snang gtum po rab snang zhes bya bar chags so/_/des dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo'i 'khor rnams la smras pa/_bud med dag nga ni mel tse byed na khyed ci'i phyir mel tse mi byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha bdag cag kyang zhugs tshe bgyid do/_/
[\[271a.4\]]de dag gis mel tse cung zad cig byas nas smras pa/_lha gal te bdag cag gis rtag tu zhugs tshe bgyi na lha'i thugs bsrung bar bgyi ba'i rngo mi thog gi steng du 'di ni bdag cag gi sug las ma lags so/_/des smras pa/_gal te 'di khyed kyi las ma yin na 'o na 'di su'i las yin/_de 
[\[271a.5\]]dag gis smras pa/_lha gzhon nu rnams kyi lags so/_/des de dag btang nas gzhon nu rnams kyi drung du song ste smras pa/_gzhon nu dag nga yang mel tse byed na khyed ci'i phyir mel tse mi byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha bdag cag kyang zhugs tshe bgyid do/_/de dag gis kyang mel 
[\[271a.6\]]tse cung zad cig byas nas smras pa/_lha gal te bdag cag gis rtag tu zhugs tshe bgyi na/_rgyal po'i bya ba gang dag lags pa zhes bya ba nas/_gnas lnga la zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/_byang bar bgyi ba'i rngo mi thog gi steng du 'di ni bdag cag gi sug las ma 
[\[271a.7\]]lags so/_/des smras pa/_gal te 'di khyed kyi las ma yin na 'o na su'i las yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha blon po rnams kyi lags so/_/des de dag btang nas blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga yang mel tse byed na khyed ci'i phyir mel tse mi byed/_
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]de dag gis smras pa/_lha bdag cag kyang zhugs tshe bgyid do/_/de dag gis kyang mel tse cung zad cig byas nas smras pa/_lha gal te bdag cag gis rtag tu zhugs tshe bgyi na/_chos dang mthun par rgyal srid bgyi ba'i rngo mi thog gi steng du 'di ni bdag cag gi sug 
[\[271b.2\]]las ma lags so/_/des smras pa/_gal te 'di khyed kyi las ma yin na 'o na su'i las yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha khrom gyi ru'i las so/_/des de dag btang nas khrom gyi ru'i drung du song ste smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga yang mel tse byed na khyed ci'i phyir 
[\[271b.3\]]mel tse mi byed/_khrom gyi rus smras pa/_lha bdag cag kyang zhugs tshe bgyid do/_/de dag gis kyang mel tse cung zad cig byas nas smras pa/_lha bdag cag gis rtag tu zhugs tshe bgyi na/_lha la rgol ba dang /_phyir rgol ba rnams dang lhan cig g.yul sprad pa'i rngo mi thog 
[\[271b.4\]]gi steng du 'di ni bdag cag gi sug las ma lags so/_/des smras pa/_'di khyed kyi las ma yin na 'o na su'i las yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha grong mi dang /_yul mi rnams kyi lags so/_/des de dag btang nas grong mi dang /_yul mi rnams kyi drung du song ste 
[\[271b.5\]]smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga yang mel tse byed na khyed ci'i phyir mel tshe mi byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha bdag cag kyang zhugs tshe bgyid do/_/des de dag rtag tu mel tse byed pa bskos nas/_de dag res su bcad de mel tse bya bar brtsams so/_/ji tsam na spos 'tshong 
[\[271b.6\]]gi khye'u zhig la res bab pa dang /_de rgyal po de gtum pas bsad du dogs te yid mi dga' zhing lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang /_de sems khong du chud pa grogs po zhig gis mthong nas smras pa/_grogs po ci ste lag pa 'gram pa 
[\[271b.7\]]la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/des ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang /_de'i khyim drung nas 'dzin pa zhig yod de/_des de la smras pa/_grogs po khyod kyis khyim drung nas 'dzin pa zhig yod na ci'i phyir de la mi 'chol/_des smras pa/_grogs po ji ltar 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]kho bo'i srog phangs pa ltar de'i yang de dang 'dra na/_ci'i phyir kho bo'i bcol ba byed/_des smras pa/_grogs po de la kAr ShA pa Na dag byin dang gdon mi za bar mel tse byed do/_/des de la bcol ba dang /_des smras pa/_kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin cig dang 
[\[272a.2\]]mel tse bya'o/_/des sbyin no zhes dam bcas pa dang /_des smras pa/_re zhig nyis brgya lnga bcu zhig byin cig_/lhag ma ni gal te kho bo gson por slar 'khor na byin cig_/ci ste ma yin na khyod nyid kyi yin gyis ci bder gyis shig_/des smras pa/_legs te de bzhin 
[\[272a.3\]]bya'o zhes des de la kAr ShA pa Na nyis brgya lnga bcu byin pa dang /_des de dag blangs nas srang du song ste/_des der sha dang chang dang khur ba mang du nyos so/_/de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi nang mi thams cad mgron du bos te zan byin/_chang yang ci 'dod pa blud nas/_smras pa/_shes 
[\[272a.4\]]ldan dag kho bo la mel tse'i res bab na rgyal po 'di'i spyod pa ci 'dra ba smros shig_/de dag gis de la ji lta bu yin pa thams cad bsnyad pa dang /_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bos cung zad byas pa dran par gyis shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa da dung khyod kyis zan 
[\[272a.5\]]byin pa dang /_skom blud pa yang ma zhu na ci ste mi dran/_ci bya ba smros shig_/des smras pa/_gal te ma stes te kho bo nyal ba la rgyal pos mel tse ba dag byul na khyed kyis kho bo slong shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_legs te de bzhin bya'o/_/de la bas smad dkris nas mel tse 
[\[272a.6\]]byed pa na thal byung gnyid kyis log go/_/ji tsam na rgyal po de kho na bzhin du thun dang po la btsun mo'i 'khor dag dang lhan cig rtses dga' bar byas/_dga' mgur spyad de/_thun bar ma la glang po che dang /_rta dag la bltas nas thun tha ma la mel tse ba rnams la brtag par brtsams 
[\[272a.7\]]pa na/_de dag gis sa 'dzin pa de la sa 'dzin pa lha gshegs kyis longs shig ces bslang ba dang /_de myur ba myur ba kho nar langs nas de bzhin du la bas smad dkris te 'dug go/_/rgyal pos su mel tse byed ces sgra phyung ba dang /_sa 'dzin pas bsams pa/_gal te tshig 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]dang po kho na'i lan glan te phyis lan ma glan dang /_rgyal po 'dis gdon ma zos par bdag gi mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la 'dor ro snyam du rig nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/lan gnyis kyi bar du rgyal pos su mel tse byed ces sgra phyung na yang de bzhin du cang mi zer bar 'dug 
[\[272b.2\]]go/_/lan gsum du rgyal pos su mel tse byed ces sgra phyung ba dang /_des smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa bdag go/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa ci sems/_de sems ngan la 'jig rten gyi sgrung gtam la yang mkhas pa zhig pas/_des smras pa/_'jig 
[\[272b.3\]]rten gyi bsam pa sems lags so//_//bar sdom ni/_'ug pa khrung khrung mun dza dang /_/nag mo sreg pa bum pa dang /_/lan tshwa phye dang shi ba dang /_/dong thags rdza ma sdig pa'o/_/sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten gyi bsam pa ji lta bu zhig sems/_lha srog chags 
[\[272b.4\]]'ug pa sgro dang bcas pa dang /_sgro ma mchis pa srang la gzhal na mnyam pa kho nar 'gyur te/_de ngo mtshar che lags so/_/sa 'dzin pa ci de ltar 'gyur ram/_lha spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o/_/sa 'dzin pa legs so/_/des phyi de nyin 'ug pa zhig khyer te 'ongs nas/_de 
[\[272b.5\]]rgyal po'i mdun du sgro dang bcas te bcal nas yang sgro btogs te bcal na de kho na dang mnyam mo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/_des smras pa/_lha 'di'i sgro dag gis rlung 'dzin pa'i slad du'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa khyod ni 
[\[272b.6\]]mkhas pa zhig go/_/des lha khyod kyi bka' drin lags so/_/zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/sa 'dzin pa nam ngo ma langs te nangs nas mgo la byugs te rgyal po'i pho brang nas byung ba dang /_spos 'tshong gi khye'u des kAr ShA pa Na nyis brgya lnga bcu 
[\[272b.7\]]po de dag kyang de la byin no/_/yul 'phags rgyal na gang dang gang la res bab pa des kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgyas des glas te gtong bas de rtag tu mel tse kho na byed par gyur to/_/yang rgyal pos de kho na bzhin du su mel tse byed ces smras pa dang /_des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/_lha 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]bdag zhugs tshe bgyid do/_/rgyal pos de kho na bzhin du sa 'dzin pa ci sems zhes smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_lha 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa sems lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten gyi bsam pa ji lta bu zhig sems/_lha 
[\[273a.2\]]khrung khrung zhes bgyi ba'i bya de dag la 'o ma dang chu bsres te stsal na/_de dag 'o ma ni 'tshal/_chab ni 'dor ro/_/sa 'dzin pa ci de de ltar 'gyur ram/_lha spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o/_/sa 'dzin pa legs so/_/des phyi de nyin khrung khrung zhig khyer de 'ongs nas de rgyal po'i drung 
[\[273a.3\]]du 'o ma chu dang bsres te blud pa dang des 'o ma ni 'thungs chu ni bor ro//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/_rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/_des smras pa/_lha 'di'i mchu la skyur mchis te des de 'tshal ba'i 
[\[273a.4\]]'o ma zhor 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa khyod ni mkhas pa zhig go/_/lha khyod kyi bka' drin lags so zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/yang rgyal pos de bzhin du su mel tse byed ces smras pa dang /_des snga ma'i tshul 
[\[273a.5\]]du smras pa/_lha bdag zhugs tshe bgyid do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa ci sems/_des smras pa/_lha 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa sems lags so/_/sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig sems/_lha rtswa mun dza tho bas brdungs pa dang /_
[\[273a.6\]]ma brdungs pa srang la bcal na mnyam pa kho nar 'gyur lags so/_/sa 'dzin pa ci de de ltar 'gyur ram/_lha spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o/_/sa 'dzin pa legs so/_/des phyi de nyin rtswa mun dza khyer te 'ongs nas/_rgyal po'i mdun du ji ltar bstan pa bzhin byas na 
[\[273a.7\]]thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang /_rgyas pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/_/lha tho bas brdungs pas rlung bsdus pa'i slad du'o/_/sa 'dzin pa khyod ni mkhas pa zhig go/_/des lha khyod kyi bka' drin lags so zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po cang mi 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]zer bar 'dug go/_/yang rgyal pos de bzhin du su mel tse byed ces smras pa dang /_des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/_lha sa 'dzin pa bdag go/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa ci sems lha 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa sems lags so/_/sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten 
[\[273b.2\]]pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig sems/_lha shing spra mgo nag mo zhes bgyi ba de'i lus ji tsam pa mjug ma yang de tsam mo/_/sa 'dzin pa ci de de ltar 'gyur ram/_lha spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o/_/sa 'dzin pa legs so/_/des phyi de nyin spra mgo nag mo zhig khyer te 'ongs 
[\[273b.3\]]nas/_rgyal po'i mdun du ji lta ba bzhin du bstan na thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa khyod kyis ji ltar shes/_lha bdag gis so ga'i dus na 'di 'jug pa'i tshe mjug mas mgo slebs pa mthong lags so/_/sa 'dzin pa khyod ni mkhas 
[\[273b.4\]]pa zhig go/_/lha khyod kyi bka' drin lags so zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/yang rgyal pos su mel tse byed ces smras pa dang /_des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/_lha sa 'dzin pa bdag go/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa ci sems/_
[\[273b.5\]]lha 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o/_/sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig_/lha sreg pa'i gshog pa bkra ba yang ji snyed pa mi bkra ba yang de kho na snyed mchis so/_/sa 'dzin pa ci de de ltar 'gyur ram/_lha spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o/_/sa 'dzin pa 
[\[273b.6\]]legs so/_/des phyi de nyin rgyal po'i mngon sum du byas na de thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa khyod kyis ji ltar shes lha sngon bdag gis bgrangs lags so/_/sa 'dzin pa khyod ni mkhas pa zhig go/_/lha'i bka' drin 
[\[273b.7\]]lags so zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/rgyal pos yang de bzhin du su mel tse byed smras pa dang /_des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/_lha sa 'dzin pa bdag go/_/rgyal pos smras pa ci sems/_lha 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o/_/
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig_/lha bye ma bum pa gang gi nang du chab bum pa gang blugs na chab de thams cad de'i nang du shong ngo /_/sa 'dzin pa ci de de ltar 'gyur ram/_lha spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o/_/sa 'dzin pa legs so/_/des phyi 
[\[274a.2\]]de nyin mngon sum du byas na de thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa khyod kyis ji ltar shes/_lha bye ma chu las byung ba'i slad du'o/_/sa 'dzin pa khyod ni mkhas pa zhig go/_/lha khyod kyi bka' drin lags so/_/zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po cang mi 
[\[274a.3\]]zer bar 'dug go/_/yang rgyal pos de bzhin du su mel tse byed ces smras pa dang /_des snga ma'i tshul du lha sa 'dzin pa bdag go/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa ci sems/_lha 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o/_/sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig sems/_
[\[274a.4\]]lha chab phul gang gi nang du lan tshwa phul gang stsal na chab phul gang kho nar 'gyur ro/_/sa 'dzin pa ji de de ltar 'gyur ram/_lha spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o/_/sa 'dzin pa legs so/_/des phyi de nyin mngon sum du byas pa na thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_
[\[274a.5\]]sa 'dzin pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/_lha lan tshwa chab las byung ba'i slad du'o/_/sa 'dzin pa khyod ni mkhas pa zhig go/_/lha khyod kyi bka' drin lags so zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/yang rgyal pos de bzhin du su mel tse byed ces smras pa dang /_des 
[\[274a.6\]]snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/_lha sa 'dzin pa bdag go/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa ci sems/_lha 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o/_/sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig_/lha zhib phul gang gi nang du chab phul gang stsal na sla bar yang mi 'gyur gar bar yang 
[\[274a.7\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/sa 'dzin pa ci de ltar 'gyur ram/_lha spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o/_/sa 'dzin pa legs so/_/des phyi de nyin mngon sum du byas na thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/_lha bdag cag sa 'dzin pa 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]rnams ni phye 'tshal ba lags pas bdag gis lan du ma mthong lags so/_/sa 'dzin pa khyod ni dran pa can zhig go/_/lha khyod kyi bka' drin lags so zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/yang rgyal pos de bzhin du su mel tse byed ces rmas pa dang /_des 
[\[274b.2\]]snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/_lha sa 'dzin pa bdag go/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa ci sems/_lha 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o/_/sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig_/lha gum pa dang /_gson po gnyis srang la bcal na mi mnyam par 
[\[274b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/sa 'dzin pa ci de de ltar 'gyur ram/_lha spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o/_/sa 'dzin pa legs so/_/des phyi de nyin mngon sum du byas na thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/_lha gum pa mi ma lags 
[\[274b.4\]]pas mdangs phrogs pa'i slad du'o/_sa 'dzin pa khyod ni mkhas pa zhig go/_/lha khyod kyi bka' drin lags so zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/yang rgyal pos de bzhin du mel tse su byed ces rmas pa dang /_des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/_lha 
[\[274b.5\]]sa 'dzin pa bdag go/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa ci sems/_lha 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o/_/sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig_/lha dong brkos pa la sa de de nyid du stsal na mnyam par mi 'gyur lags so/_sa 'dzin pa ci de de 
[\[274b.6\]]ltar 'gyur ro/_/lha spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o/_/sa 'dzin pa legs so/_/des phyi de nyin mngon sum du byas na thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/_lha mi ma lags pas mdangs phrogs pa'i slad du'o/_/sa 
[\[274b.7\]]'dzin pa khyod ni mkhas pa zhig go/_/lha khyod kyi bka' drin lags so zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/yang rgyal pos de bzhin du mel tse su byed ces rmas pa dang /_des snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/_lha sa 'dzin pa bdag go/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]sa 'dzin pa ci sems/_lha 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o/_/sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig_/lha tha ga pas nyin mtshan du gos btags na gar mchis pa ma 'tshal to/_/kye sa 'dzin pa gar song mi shes pa yus so/_/lha sar gyur pa lags so/_/kye sa 'dzin pa 
[\[275a.2\]]sar gyur pa lta zhig_/yang rgyal pos de bzhin du mel tse su byed rmas pa dang /_des snga ma'i snga ma'i tshul du smras pa/_lha sa 'dzin pa bdag go/_/sa 'dzin pa ci sems/_lha 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa'o/_/sa 'dzin pa 'jig rten pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhig_/lha rdza mkhan gyis nyin mtshan du 
[\[275a.3\]]snod bgyis na de gar mchis ma 'tshal to/_/kye sa 'dzin pa gar song mi shes pa yus so/_/lha sar gyur to/_/kye sa 'dzin pa sar gyur pa lta zhig_/kye sa 'dzin pa khyod ni mkhas pa zhig ste/_thams cad shes na nga gnyid med pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/_lha mi 'jigs pa stsal na smra bar bgyi'o/_/sa 
[\[275a.4\]]'dzin pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin gyis bag ma tsha bar smros shig_/lha khyod ni sdig pa las skyes so/_/sa 'dzin pa ci khyod nga la mi snyan par zer ram/_lha de skad ma gsung shig_/lha la bdag gis mi snyan pa ji skad du bgyis/_lha mi snyan pa ma bgyis te lha'i mngon sum du bgyi'o/_/sa 'dzin pa 
[\[275a.5\]]legs so/_/des dong brkos ba lang gi lci ba skam pos bkang ste/_de'i steng du mal bcas nas phyi de nyin rgyal po la lha mal 'dir gzims shig ces smras pa dang /_rgyal pos der nyal lo/_/nyal ma thag tu gnyid kyis log par gyur to/_/gang gi tshe sad pa de'i tshe lha khyod kyis gzigs sam zhes smras pa 
[\[275a.6\]]dang /_des bdag gis mngon sum du byas pa shes nas btsun mo'i 'khor du song ste ma la dris pa/_yum bdag su las skyes pa [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ma gsung bar drang por gsung shig_/lha smra bar bgyi'i/_bdag la mi 'jigs pa stsol cig_/yum gsol lo/_/lha khyod kyi yab btsun mo'i 'khor rgya chen 
[\[275a.7\]]po dang ldan pas de ljongs shig tu song ba na bdag zla mtshan dang ldan par gyur te/_de'i tshe bdag zla mtshan gyi khrus bgyid pa na/_sdig pa zhig mthong ba dang /_bdag gis blo skyes pa/_ji ste 'di pho zhig tu gyur na bdag 'di dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i longs spyod dga' mgur spyad par bya'o snyam pa dang /_stes 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]te de pho zhig tu gyur nas de dang bdag lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i longs spyod dga' mgur spyad pa dang /_de las khyod skyes par gyur to/_des bsams pa/_sa 'dzin pa de ni mkhas pa zhig ste/_des bdag shes na de la bdag gis mi 'jigs pa byin pas de gsad du ni mi rung gi gzhan su la yang mi zer bar bya 
[\[275b.2\]]ba'i phyir bya dga' byin la yul dbyung ngo snyam nas/_des de la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin te yul phyung ngo //_//sdom ni/_'tsho byed dang ni gser 'od dang /_/e la'i 'dab dang na la dang /_/rab byung skra can zas dang ni/_/'bru mar snod ni tha ma'o/_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis bsams pa/_bdag gi 
[\[275b.3\]]nad 'di gzhi cher gyur pas sman pa dag bsdus la dpyad bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_des yul na gnas pa'i sman pa thams cad bsdus te smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga'i nad 'di lta bu la dpyad gyis shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_lha bdag cag gis khyod kyi dpyad pa bgyid pa'i rngo mi thog ste/_
[\[275b.4\]]'on kyang rgyal po'i khab na rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i bu sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed ces bgyi ba mchis te/_gal te na des lha'i dpyad bgyid rngo thog go/_/des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la yi ge springs te/_sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed tshur thong shig_/yang na nga'o nir 'ong gis rtswa dang /_
[\[275b.5\]]chas sta gon gyis shig ces byas pa dang /_rgyal po gzugs can snying pos yi ge bklags nas sngangs te lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug ste/_gal te 'tsho byed ma btang na de la ci dang ci dgos pa de 'gugs pas don gyis bdag kyang de'i dpyas par gyur pas ma legs so 
[\[275b.6\]]snyam nas de yid mi bde ba sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis mthong ngo /_/de nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du phyag 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/_des smras pa/_bu khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i bzo bslabs pa des na gnod par gyur to/_/'tsho byed 
[\[275b.7\]]kyis smras pa/_ji ltar gnod par gyur/_des ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang /_lha bka' lung stsal du gsol mchi bar bgyi'o/_/bu rgyal po de gtum po zhig ste/_ci'i phyir yang sems can gsod par byed pas khyod mi gsad grang /_lha bdag srung mi nus pa'i sman pa de ci 'dra ba zhig ste/_thugs 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]mi chung bar bdag gtang du gsol/_des smras pa/_bu gal te de lta na song la ji ltar nga dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang /_yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mya ngan skye bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyod kyis 
[\[276a.2\]]bag yod par gyis shig_/des lha ci'i slad du de ltar gyur/_bdag gis nad pa'i sems bsrung rngo thog go zhes byas pa dang rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/'tsho byed kyis 'phar ma pa'i mi de la dris pa/_kye skyes bu rgyal po de'i spyod pa ni ci 'dra ba zhig nad ni ji lta bu zhig gis thebs/_
[\[276a.3\]]des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par bsnyad do/_/de nas 'tsho byed kyis chang gi kha dog dang /_chang gi dri dang /_chang gi ro bro ba'i mar sbyar nas dge mtshan dang /_bkra shis dang /_bde legs dag byas te grogs po dang /_gnyen dang /_phu nu bo rnams la sbran nas yul 'phags rgyal du song ngo /_/
[\[276a.4\]]de mthar gyi yul ka n+yA kub dzar phyin pa dang /_de na gnas pa'i sman pa'i khye'u zhig yod pa des ji ltar sman pa'i rgyal po'i 'tsho byed 'ongs te 'phags rgyal du 'gro ba thos so/_/des a ru ra gcig khyer te de'i drung du song ste phan tshun yang dag par dga' ba dag byas nas/_'tsho byed kyis 
[\[276a.5\]]smras pa/_kye chos kyi spun rgyal po gtum po rab snang de nad ji lta bu zhig gis thebs/_khyed cag gis de'i dpyad ma byas sam/_des smras pa/_rgyal po de gnyid med pa'i nad kyis thebs te/_de la mar phan na de mar la ni sdang /_chang la ni dga' zhing gtum ste/_gang zhig de'i mdun du mar gyi 
[\[276a.6\]]ming 'byin pa de'i mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la 'dor bas de dag 'jigs nas 'bros na su zhig de'i dpyad byed par nus/_'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_de'i phyir ngas chang gi kha dog dang /_chang gi dri dang /_chang gi ro bro ba'i mar bskol te khyer te 'ongs kyis 'dong /_gang gi tshe ngas khyod la brda byas pa 
[\[276a.7\]]de'i tshe khyod kyis mar 'di tsam gyi tshod cig byin cig_/nga ni de'i mdun nas 'gro yis khyod kyis re zhig tsam zhig de'i rim gro gyis shig dang /_sos nas ngas khyod la rngan pa rab tu mang po sbyin zhing sbyin du yang gzhug go/_/des smras pa/_legs kyis bzhud do zhes de de dang lhan cig dong ngo /_/'tsho 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]byed rim gyis 'phags rgyal dang nye bar phyin pa dang /_rgyal po rab snang gis ji ltar sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'ongs pa thos nas des bsams pa/_de ni rgyal po'i bu yang yin la sman pa'i rgyal po yang yin pas mchod pa dang bkur stis grong khyer du 'ong bar bya'o snyam nas des grong khyer 
[\[276b.2\]]mdzes pa dang /_lam mdzes par byas te/_btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pas bsu nas sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed mi stong phrag du mas bskor te grong khyer du 'ongs so/_/de nas de lam gyis dub pa ngal bso ste cung zhig bsdad nas rgyal 
[\[276b.3\]]po gtum po rab snang gis 'tsho byed la bdag gnyid med pa'i nad dkyel cher gyur na dpyad gyis shig ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_lha bgyi mod kyi 'on kyang 'di la sman 'tshal na de dag kyang yul sna tshogs dang /_gnas sna tshogs na mchis te/_sman kha cig bdag gis ngo 'tshal la gzhan 
[\[276b.4\]]gyis ma 'tshal ba yang mchis/_kha cig gzhan gyis 'tshal la bdag gis ma 'tshal ba yang mchis/_kha cig bdag gis kyang 'tshal la gzhan gyis kyang 'tshal ba yang mchis/_kha cig thag ring po na yang mchis/_kha cig nye ba na yang mchis pas khyod kyis glang po che mo bzang ldan 
[\[276b.5\]]bdag cag la ci bder mdzod cig_/rgyal pos 'tsho byed legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig ces smras nas/_des glang po che 'dul ba rnams la bsgo ba/_'tsho byed glang po che mo bzang ldan ci bder spyod du bcug gis khyed cag gis ma dgag shig_/blon po dang chab sgo ba rnams la yang bsgo 
[\[276b.6\]]ba/_'di nyin par yang rung mtshan mo yang rung glang po che bzang ldan la zhon te 'gro zhing 'ong ba khyed cag gis ma dgag par ji ltar 'dod par dga' mgur 'gro zhing 'ong du chug shig_/blon po dang /_chab sgo ba dang /_glang po che 'dul ba rnams kyis smras pa/_lha ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal 
[\[276b.7\]]lo/_/sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed glang po che mo bzang ldan la zhon te mig slob par rtsom pa na snga dro song zhing res 'ga' phyi dro slar 'ong ngo /_/gung la song zhing res 'ga' phyi dro 'ong ngo /_/phyi dro song zhing res 'ga' nub mo'i thun 'da' zhing 'ong ste/_de de ltar yid ches pa bskyed pa'i rtags kyis 'gro ba 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]dang /_'ong bar byed do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'tsho byed dpyad gyis shig_/des smras pa/_lha re zhig khrus mdzod cig_/des bkrus nas/_yang smras pa/_'tsho byed ngas khrus byas na ci sdod/_des smras pa/_lha re zhig gdugs tshod gsol cig_/des zan bza' 
[\[277a.2\]]bar brtsams pa dang /_'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_lha bdag gis yul ma ga d+hA'i skyems shin tu bda' ba zhig 'tshal te mchis kyis/_gal te lha gsol na cung zad cig gsol lo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'tsho byed legs kyis 'o na cig blta'o/_/des sman pa'i khye'u de la de tsam 
[\[277a.3\]]gyi tshod cig byin cig pa'i brda byas pa dang /_des de tsam gyi tshod cig byin nas rgyal pos 'thungs so/_/'thungs ma thag tu gnyid kyis log pa dang /_'tsho byed glang po che mo bzang ldan la zhon te bros so/_/rgyal po yang nam phyed na sad do/_/ji tsam na de la mar gyi sgregs pa byung ba dang /_
[\[277a.4\]]des mi zhig la bos te kwa'e skyes bu 'tsho byed bos shig_/des nga la mar blud kyis mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la dor ro/_/des kun tu btsal bar brtsams na mi snang nas des de la smras pa/_lha mi gda' ste/_de gdon ma 'tshal bar bros so/_/rgyal po je khros nas smras pa/_kwa'e skyes bu 
[\[277a.5\]]'phar ma pa khwa bos shig ces bsgo ba dang /_des de bos so/_/des kye 'phar ma pa khwa song la myur du glang po che 'dam bu'i ri la zhon te 'tsho byed ske nas thogs la khrid de shog shig_/de'i mgo drungs nas bcad do/_/gal te sgyu mkhan des khyod la cung zad cig byin na khyod kyis blang bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[277a.6\]]lta de ltar 'tshal lo zhes 'phar ma khwas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi ltar mnyan nas myur bar glang po che 'dam bu'i ri la zhon te rjes bzhin du song ngo /_/des de skyu ru ra'i tshal du zhugs pa mthong nas smras pa/_'tsho byed lha gsung gis tshur shog 'dong /_des smras pa/_kye khwa ci [{]rings [,]ring [}]tshur re zhig 
[\[277a.7\]]skyu ru ra zo shig_/des smras pa/_lhas nga la de sgyu mkhan yin pas khyod kyis de las cung zad kyang ma len cig ces bsgo'o/_/'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_kwa'e khwa gal te de lta na khyod kyis phyed zo/_/ngas kyang phyed bza'o/_/des bsams pa/_phyed bza' ste phyed la sgyu ji lta bu zhig byar yod snyam du rig 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]nas smras pa/_'tsho byed bza' yis byin cig_/de skyu ru ra phyed zos te/_sen mo'i bar phye mas bkang ba'i sen mos bcad pa'i phyed byin no/_/des de zos pa dang de mdze can zhig pas yan man gnyi gar 'khrus so/_/des de ri 'or zhig tu bzhag nas ri 'or pa de dag la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag rgyal po 
[\[277b.2\]]gtum po rab snang gi yan lag gi mchog gsum ni glang po 'dam bu'i ri dang /_glang po che mo bzang ldan dang /_'phar ma pa khwa 'di yin na 'di na ste 'di dpyad 'dis rim gro gyis dang sos par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan du na rgyal pos khyed cag nges par phung bar byed do zhes smras nas song ngo /_/de dag gis de'i 
[\[277b.3\]]rim gro byas pa dang sos par gyur nas song ngo /_/rgyal po yang sman pa'i khye'u des ji ltar bstan pa'i dpyad kyis rim gro byas pas de yang sos par gyur to/_/'phar ma pa khwa yang rim gyis rgyal po'i drung du phyin pa dang /_rgyal pos dris pa khwa 'tsho byed de ga re lha bros lags so/_/khwa gal te bros na ma 
[\[277b.4\]]legs pa zhig byas so/_/lha ci ste khugs par gyur na de la lhas ci zhig bgyis par 'gyur/_khwa ngas de'i mgo drungs nas gcad de sa la bor bar 'gyur ro/_/lha sman pa'i rgyal po gang gis lha dang bdag kyang sos par bgyis pa de lta bu dgum pa de ni rigs pa ma lags so/_/khwa gal te de lta na de la ci 
[\[277b.5\]]zhig bya/_lha rngan pa rgya cher stsal mod/_legs kyis de bzhin du bya'o/_/des de la yi ge spring ste/_sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed khyod ci ste bros/_khyod rngan pa sbyin gyis tshur shog rngan pa long shig_/'tsho byed kyis de la spring pa/_lha khyod kyi bka' drin la bdag gi khyim na nor tsam mchis so/_/'on 
[\[277b.6\]]kyang gal te lhas bdag la thugs dpag mdzad na sman pa'i khye'u gang gis lha'i rim gro bgyis pa de la bya dga' stsal ba'i rigs so/_/rgyal pos khye'u de la rngan pa mang du byin no/_/'tsho byed la yang brgya stong ri ba'i ras yug chen gyi gos bskur ba dang /_'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/_gos 'di ni 
[\[277b.7\]]rgyal po la 'os pa yin te/_su la sbyin snyam na des bcom ldan 'das ni chos nyid kyis bdag gi pha yin pas 'di la dbul lo snyam du bsams nas des de bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di chos 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]gos su gyis la nga la phul cig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de blangs nas blangs pa des bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos gsum langs pa bas lhag par mthong nas des drub par brtsams na de las bcom ldan 'das kyi chos gos gsum dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i stod 
[\[278a.2\]]g.yogs su smad g.yogs dang bcas pa dang /_sgra can zin gyi rngul zan yang langs so/_/dga' ldan gyi gnas na sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i dri ba 'di skad du/_bdag po rgyal po gang zhig ni/_/chags na rdul dang ldan pa yin/_/rdul med na ni rdul bral 'gyur/_/gang gis 'dir ni chags 
[\[278a.3\]]zhes brjod/_/blo ngan ji ltar mya ngan byed/_/mkhas pa ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur/_/gang gis ldan pa las bral nas/_/'di na grub dang bde zhes brjod/_/ces bris te/_'dug pa gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe sus kyang gzung bar yang mi nus/_de dag gi don 
[\[278a.4\]]smra bar yang mi nus so/_/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe yang dri ba de dag gzung bar nus kyi de dag gi don smra bar ni mi nus so/_/re zhig cig na gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rnam thos kyi bu bya ba zhig gi phyir dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du song ba dang /_des dri ba dris pa de dag mthong 
[\[278a.5\]]ngo /_/de nas ya mtshan skyes te de bzung na don khong du chud par ma nus te/_des de dag pho brang lcang lo can du khyer nas spang leb la bris te bzhag go/_/de'i tshe rdo 'jog ces bya ba na klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ces bya ba gnas pa de yun ring po nas bdag gis nam zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong zhes 
[\[278a.6\]]de snyam du smon to/_/de'i mdza' bo gnod sbyin gser 'od ces bya ba de bya ba zhig gi phyir gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rnam thos kyi bu'i pho brang lcang lo can du song ba dang /_des dri ba de dag spang leb la bris pa mthong nas des de dag blangs te chub par byas nas dpyad par brtsams na don khong du ma chud nas des rdo 'jog tu khyer 
[\[278a.7\]]te klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab la byin nas smras pa/_grogs po dri ba 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin na/_'di dag ni don sus kyang ma rtogs kyis khyod kyis 'di dag dang gser 'bum khyer la grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du bskor te 'di skad ces gang gis dri ba 'di 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]dag gi don smra nus pa de la ngas gser 'bum sbyin zhing bkur sti chen pos kyang rim gro bya'o zhes smros shig_/gal te 'ga' zhig gis smra bar nus na de la gser 'bum byin cig_/ji ste ma nus na grong khyer dang /_grong rdal ma yin no zhes sgrogs la gzhan du song shig_/des de bzung nas kun chub par 
[\[278b.2\]]byas te/_bdag nyid bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su sprul nas/_gser 'bum khyer te grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu bskor nas bA rA Na sIr phyin to/_/de bA rA Na sI'i lam po che dang /_srong dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dag tu shes ldan bA rA Na sI'i grong na gnas pa dang /_yul 
[\[278b.3\]]so so nas 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag nyon cig_/bdag gis dri ba 'di dag khyer te 'ongs te gang zhig 'di dag gi don smra bar nus pa de la ngas gser 'bum 'di sbyin zhing bkur sti chen pos kyang rim gro bya'o zhes bsgrags pa dang /_kha cig ni mkhas pa snyems/_kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes nas srog 
[\[278b.4\]]chags brgya stong phrag du ma 'dus kyang sus kyang don smra bar ma nus so/_/des grong khyer dang /_grong rdal ma yin no zhes bsgrags par brtsams pa dang /_bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag gis smras pa/_re zhig grong dang /_grong rdal ma yin no zhes ma sgrogs par bdag cag gi skye bos 
[\[278b.5\]]nges par bkur ba'i dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dgon pa'i gnas na 'dug pa gang dag yin pa de dag je 'ong du chug la phyis grong khyer dang /_grong rdal ma yin no zhes sgrogs shig_/des smras pa/_de dag gang zhig yin/_na la da la sogs pa'o/_/des legs kyis de bzhin bya'o zhes smras nas/_de 
[\[278b.6\]]sdod pa dang /_ji tsam zhig na na la da 'ongs so/_/des de'i mdun du 'dug ste smras pa/_drang srong chen po bdag gis dri ba 'di dag khyer te 'ongs te/_gang zhig 'di dag gi don smra bar nus pa de la gser 'bum 'di yang sbyin zhing bkur sti chen pos kyang rim gro bya'o/_/na la das de dag bklags nas smras pa/_
[\[278b.7\]]bram ze'i khye'u legs kyis de bzhin du byas te smra'o/_/yun ji srid cig na lo bcu gnyis 'das nas so/_/drang srong chen po dus de ni [{]rings so[,]ring ngo [}]/_/drug na'o/_/de yang [{]rings so[,]ring ngo [}]/_/gsum na'o/_/gcig na'o/_/zla ba drug na'o/_/zla ba gsum na'o/_/zla ba na'o/_/zla ba phyed na'o/_/zhag bdun 'das na'o/_/
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]e la'i 'dab kyis drang srong chen po legs kyis de ltar byos shig_/de bar du sdod do zhes smras nas de sdod pa dang /_drang srong na la da'i smos 'drin dge slong lnga po yin pas de de dag gi drung du song nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag bram ze'i khye'u zhig gis dri ba 'di dag dang /_gser 'bum khyer 
[\[279a.2\]]nas bdag gi drung du 'ongs te gang zhig dri ba 'di dag gi don smra nus pa de la gser 'bum 'di sbyin zhing bkur sti chen pos kyang ri mor bya'o zhes zer na dri ba 'di dag gi don mang la tshig nyung bas khong du chud par dka' na 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_de dag gis smras pa/_na la da song la sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[279a.3\]]ldan 'das la zhus shig_/shes ldan dag ci sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngam/_byung ngo /_/gang na bzhugs/_drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na'o/_/de dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas myur ba myur bar bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba dang /_na la das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[279a.4\]]sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/_'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od can rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ste/_ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i sems kyis thog ma 
[\[279a.5\]]sangs rgyas mthong ba ltar/_lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems goms par byas pa'am/_bu med pas bu rnyed pa'am/_dbul pos gter mthong ba'am/_rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba ni de ltar nyams bde bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 
[\[279a.6\]]'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs 
[\[279a.7\]]par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad pa dang /_de thos nas drang song na la das 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/des bden pa mthong nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag legs par 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_na la da khyod kyis bram ze'i khye'u de la dri ba'i don smra'o zhes dam bcas pas de'i phyir song la 
[\[279b.2\]]re zhig sngar dam bcas pa de tshar phyung ste phyis rab tu byung shig_/des gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag gis yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob mod kyi 'on kyang dri ba de dag gi don bdag gis smra rngo mi thog na der mchis te ci zhig bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_na la da song la son nas 'di skad du re zhig dri ba 
[\[279b.3\]]de dag smos shig ces gyis shig_/gang gi tshe des 'di skad ces ni/_bdag po rgyal po gang zhig ni/_/chags na rdul dang ldan pa yin/_/rdul med na ni rdul bral 'gyur/_/gang gis 'dir ni chags zhes brjod/_/blo ngan ji ltar mya ngan byed/_/mkhas pa ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur/_/gang gi ldan pa las 
[\[279b.4\]]bral nas/_/'di ni grub dang bde zhes brjod/_/ces smras par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyis 'di skad ces smros shig_/drug pa bdag po rgyal po ni/_/chags na rdul dang ldan pa yin/_/rdul med na ni rdul bral 'gyur/_/chags na byis pa zhes 'dir brjod/_/blo ngan de ltar mya ngan byed/_/mkhas pa de ltar dga' 
[\[279b.5\]]bar 'gyur/_/'di yi ldan pa las bral nas/_/'di ni grub dang bde zhes brjod/_/gal te brda ma phrad do zhes zer na de la/_/legs par gsungs pa shes pa gces pa ste/_/thos dang ting 'dzin shes pa gces pa yin/_/mi gang gya tshom bag med gyur pas ni/_/mi shes de la thos pa don mi che/_/zhes 
[\[279b.6\]]smros shig_/gal te sangs rgyas gsung dag smra mod kyi/_khyod la mtshan ni mi snang ngo /_/'di la bdag gi blo rmongs kyis/_the tshom myur du gcad par gyis zhes zer na/_/de'i mdun du sen mos rtswa chod cig_/gal te ci sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngam zhes zer na byung ngo zhes 
[\[279b.7\]]smros shig_/ji ste gang na bzhugs zhes zer na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na'o zhes gyis shig_/btsun pa de bzhin du 'tshal zhes rigs kyi bu na la das bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te bram ze'i khye'u gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bram ze'i khye'u la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]khye'u de re zhig dri ba de dag smros shig_/des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bdag po rgyal po gang zhig ni/_/chags na rdul dang ldan pa yin/_/rdul med na ni rdul bral 'gyur/_/gang gis 'dir ni chags zhes brjod/_/blo ngan ji ltar mya ngan byed/_/mkhas pa ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur/_/
[\[280a.2\]]gang zhig ldan pa las bral nas/_/'di ni grub dang bde zhes brjod/_/des smras pa/_drug pa bdag po rgyal po ni/_/chags na rdul dang ldan pa yin/_/rdul med na ni rdul bral 'gyur/_/chags na byis pa zhes 'dir brjod/_/blo ngan de ltar mya ngan byed/_/mkhas pa de ltar dga' bar 'gyur/_/'di 
[\[280a.3\]]yi ldan pa las bral nas/_/'di na grub dang bde zhes brjod/_/bram ze'i khye'us smras pa/_/drang srong chen po brda ma phrad do/_/des smras pa/_legs par gsungs pa shes pa gces pa ste/_/thos dang ting 'dzin shes pa gces pa yin/_/mi gang gya tshom bag med gyur pas ni/_/mi shes de la thos pa 
[\[280a.4\]]don mi che/_/bram ze'i khye'us smras pa/_na la da/_sangs rgyas gsung dag smra mod kyi/_/khyod la mtshan ni mi snang ngo /_/'di la bdag gi blo rmongs kyis/_/the tshom myur du gcad par gyis/_/na la das de'i mdun du sen mos rtswa bcad pa dang /_des smras pa/_na la da ci sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[280a.5\]]'das 'jig rten du byung ngam/_des smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u byung ngo /_/gang na bzhugs/_yul bA ra Na sI 'di nyid na'o/_/phyogs gang na/_drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na'o/_/bram ze'i khye'us bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis 'di la rang gi rigs bsnyad na ni 'dis brnyas par 'gyur 
[\[280a.6\]]ro/_/'on te bram ze'i khye'u'i cha lugs kho nas song na ni bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i bram ze rig pa gsum dang ldan pa'am/_kha cig bram ze'i khye'u rigs mthon po las skyes pa dag dge sbyong gau ta ma'i drung du song ngo zhes ma dad par 'gyur ro/_/gal te rang gi cha lugs kyis song na ni bdag dang /_
[\[280a.7\]]klu mang po 'khon yod pas la las bdag la gnod pa byas su 'ong bas ma la bdag gis bdag nyid 'khor los sgyur bar mngon par sprul la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab kyis bdag nyid 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por mngon par sprul te/_
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]rin po che sna bdun gyis ni mdun drangs/_khrom gyi ru bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus ni bskor/_bu stong rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan cing zla ba kham pa lta bur bskor/_mu stegs can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_phongs pa sna tshogs dang /_mi'i mchog 
[\[280b.2\]]stong ni phyi bzhin 'brang /_rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i gdugs ni steng nas 'dzin cing nyi ma 'od stong gi 'od kyis snang bas zla ba rgyu skar dang gza' dang bcas pa'i gzhal med khang gis mdzes pa yang zil gyis gnon pa'i 'od kyang zil gyis mnan nas drang srong smra ba ga la ba der song ngo /_/yang 
[\[280b.3\]]de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to/_/'khor de dag gis klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du gyur te mig bgrad nas rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/_kha cig ni 'di skad du shes ldan dag 
[\[280b.4\]]rgyal po 'di ga las 'ongs pa zhig ces zer ro/_/gzhan dag na re shes ldan dag gang la 'di lta bu'i 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa yod pa 'di rgyal po ma yin gyi sa'i steng gi sa'i dbang phyug gang zhig yin zhes zer ro/_/gzhan dag ni 'di rgyal po ma yin gyi lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 
[\[280b.5\]]'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs so zhes zer ro/_/de na gang dag chags pa'i dbang du song ba de dag gis de mthong nas bdag kyang 'di 'dra bar nam zhig 'gyur zhes chags pa bskyed do/_/de dag de ltar rnam pa du mar rtog pa na klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 
[\[280b.6\]]song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/skyes bu blun po khyod yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[280b.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bslab pa'i mtshams las 'das pas klu'i skye gnas smad par skyes na/_da nga'i 'khor yang bslu bar 'dod dam ci song la sprul pa thong ste rang gi cha lugs kyis shog shig_/des gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag dang /_klu mang po khon mchis pas la las 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]bdag la gnod pa bgyis su mchi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje song la klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab la bsrung bar gyis shig_/btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar 
[\[281a.2\]]mnyan nas klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab bsrung ba lhur len cing phyi bzhin 'brang ngo //_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po nyi shu lnga pa/_de nas klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ste rang gi rang bzhin du mngon par bsgyur nas mjug ma ni 
[\[281a.3\]]rdo 'jog na 'dug_/mgo bdun po ni bA rA Na sI na 'dug ste/_mgo re re la sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa'i shing e la skyes pas kun nas srin bu'i rigs brgya phrag du mas ni gang /_sbrang bu'i tshogs du ma ni lding zhing 'bab/_rnag dang khrag gi dri mnam zhing rab tu mnam 
[\[281a.4\]]pa ni 'dzag go/_/de nas sems can rnams kyis mthong na mig bsgyur ba de lta bur lus bsgyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_'khor de dag gis klu'i rgyal po e 
[\[281a.5\]]la'i 'dab kyi lus mthong na mi 'dod pa shin tu 'jigs su rung ba/_'dod chags dang ma bral ba 'jigs pa dang /_mya ngan dang /_skyo bar byed pa che zhing gas pa/_rtsub pa/_mdangs med pa/_kha dog gi rnam pa dang dbyibs kyi khyad par du ma dang ldan pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang skrag nas 
[\[281a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa shin tu 'jigs su rung ba 'di gang zhig lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha lugs 'chang zhing nga'i drung du 'ongs pa gang 
[\[281a.7\]]la khyed kyis 'khor ba'i sgo'i khyad par 'dod pas chags pa bskyed pa de yin te/_de'i da lta'i lus 'di ni mi 'dod pa'i las kyi nyes pas mngon par grub pa rang bzhin pa yin no/_/snga ma ni sprul pa yin no/_/de dag gis las chud mi za ba thos pas yid mi bde ba skyes te cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]de nas klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag lung bstan du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bdag lung bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_klu'i dbang po mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri par gyur 
[\[281b.2\]]te mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na ston pa byams pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba nas/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/_des khyod la lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[281b.3\]]de nas klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab kyis las ci zhig 
[\[281b.4\]]bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas klu'i skye gnas smad par skyes nas shing e la mgo la skyes pas kun nas srin bu'i rigs brgya phrag du mas ni gang /_sbrang ma'i tshogs du ma ni lding zhing 'bab/_rnag dang khrag gi dri mnam zhing rab tu mnam pa ni 'dzag pa'i sdug bsngal 'di lta 
[\[281b.5\]]bu 'di nyams su myong lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab kyis las byas shing bsags pa/_tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa nges par 'byung ba yin te/_klu'i rgyal po e 
[\[281b.6\]]la'i 'dab kyis las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gi myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la ma yin/_me'i khams la ma yin/_rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/_'on kyang 
[\[281b.7\]]las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang /_/las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/_/
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs 
[\[282a.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_de grong khyer bA rA Na sI'i drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na gnas shing bzhugs so/_/de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum dang ldan pa spong ba par gyur te/_de dben pa'i phyogs shig na shing e la'i drung du 'chag sa bcas te/_
[\[282a.3\]]de de na 'chag pa'i dpral bar shing e la'i 'dab mas phog pa dang /_des de mnags so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor gyis ngal te 'chag pa na de'i dpral ba la de'i 'dab mas phog pa dang /_des de la khros te bcad nas lag pa gnyis kyis dum bu dum 
[\[282a.4\]]bur byas te bor nas 'di skad du srog kyang med/_'tsho ba yang med pa 'di la bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis nyes pa ci zhig gzigs na/_gang gi phyir bslab pa'i gzhir bcas zhes kyang smras so/_/des khros te bslab pa dral bas lus zhig nas klu rnams kyi nang du skyes te mgo la shing 
[\[282a.5\]]e la skyes pas srin bu'i rigs brgya phrag du mas ni gang /_sbrang ma'i tshogs du ma ni lding zhing bab/_rnag dang khrag gi dri mnam zhing rab tu mnam pa ni 'dzag go/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dge slong sde snod gsum pa spong ba pa gang yin pa de ni klu'i 
[\[282a.6\]]rgyal po e la'i 'dab 'di nyid yin te/_gang 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas rab tu khros te bslab pa dral ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas klu rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_mgo la shing e la skyes pas kun nas srin bu'i rigs brgya 
[\[282a.7\]]phrag du mas ni gang /_sbrang bu'i tshogs du ma ni lding zhing bab/_rnag dang khrag gi dri mnam zhing rab tu mnam pa ni 'dzag go/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag_/gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi yang gcig tu dkar/_
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]'dren ma rnams kyi yang 'dren ma'o/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang /_'dren ma dag spangs te las gcig tu dkar ba dag kho na la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[282b.2\]]pa dang /_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/de nas drang srong na la da bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig 
[\[282b.3\]]tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong na la das 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gis sngon dam bcas pa tshar phyung lags te/_btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob na 
[\[282b.4\]]bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dge slong tshur tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces dge slong tshur zhes bya bas bka' stsal pa dang /_de bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ma thag tu skra byi/_snam sbyar 
[\[282b.5\]]gyon/_lag na lhung bzed dang bya ma bum thogs shing skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa lta bu bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam du gnas par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/_skra bregs snam sbyar bgos pa'i lus ldan 
[\[282b.6\]]zhing /_sangs rgyas dgongs pas cha lugs bsgyur nas ni/_mod la dbang po rab zhi kho nar gnas/_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa na la da dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ba de'i tshe de la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis ji skad bod mi shes pa'i skabs de dge 
[\[282b.7\]]slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di'i rus ka t+ya'i bu yin te de bas na 'di la ka t+ya'i bu zhes bos shig_/dge slong dag gis de la ka t+ya'i bu zhes bod par brtsams pa dang /_de'i ming ka t+ya'i bu zhes bya bar chags 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_ka t+ya'i bu 'jig rten 'di ni phal cher yod pa dang med pa gnyis la rten to/_/ka t+ya'i bu 'jig rten 'di ni phal cher phung po dang nye bar len pas rnam par 
[\[283a.2\]]bcings shing yod pa dang med pa gnyis la rten to/_/ka t+ya'i bu sems kyi mngon par zhen pa bag la nyal du 'gyur ba 'di dag la bdag ces bya bar khas mi len/_len par mi byed/_gnas par mi byed/_mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/
[\[283a.3\]]ka t+ya'i bu skye ba na sdug bsngal 'di skye'o/_/'gag pa na sdug bsngal 'di 'gag go/_/ka t+ya'i bu 'di la khyod yid gnyis dang /_the tshom med par gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pa kho na skyes na ka t+ya'i bu 'di tsam gyis na yang dag pa'i lta ba yin te/_'di 
[\[283a.4\]]tsam gyis na de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa'i lta bar 'dogs pa na 'dogs par mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ka t+ya'i bu 'jig rten kun 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis lta ba ni 'jig rten la med pa gang yin pa der 
[\[283a.5\]]mi sems so/_/ka t+ya'i bu 'jig rten 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis lta ba ni 'jig rten la yod pa gang yin pa der mi sems so/_/ka t+ya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtha' gnyis po de dag la mi rten par 'jig 
[\[283a.6\]]rten la dbu ma'i lam gyis chos ston cing 'di ltar 'di yod pas 'di 'byung /_'di skyes pas 'di skye ste/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_
[\[283a.7\]]ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig kun du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung /_'di 'gags 
[\[283b.2\]]pas 'di 'gag ste/_'di lta ste ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye 
[\[283b.3\]]mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 
[\[283b.4\]]'gags pas rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa ni 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bus 
[\[283b.5\]]bden pa mthong ste/_'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rig ste/_'dus byas kyi rnam pa thams cad chos nyid kyis 'jig pa dang /_ltung ba dang /_'gyes pa dang /_'joms par rtogs nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te 
[\[283b.6\]]dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba/_sems gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba/_tsan+dan dang ste 'ur mtshungs pa/_rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i 
[\[283b.7\]]sbubs bcom pa/_mngon par shes pas so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang /_rjed pa dang /_gus par smra bar 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la ka t+ya'i bu zhes bka' stsal cing bos pas de'i ming ka t+ya'i bu chen po zhes bya bar chags so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na 'phags rgyal du khyogs dang khyogs su 'dom pa'i mi ngas shig byung nas rgyal po gtum 
[\[284a.2\]]po rab snang btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas te sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de na kha cig gis smras pa/_lha zhi ba bgyid du stsol cig_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_bram ze rnams 'tshal 
[\[284a.3\]]ma stsol cig_/kha cig gis smras pa/_lha nye 'khor na gnas pa'i dge ba'i ngo bor bkur ba'i dge sbyong dang bram ze gang yang rung ba de dag tshol du stsol cig_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis chab sgo ba rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag dge sbyong ngam 
[\[284a.4\]]bram ze gang su yang rung ba yams kyi nad zhi bar byed par 'gyur ba zhig 'dir 'ongs na de nga la sbron cig_/skabs 'di lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mkhyen pa'am mi gzigs pa'am mi rig pa dang /_rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad 
[\[284a.5\]]kyang mi mnga' ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/_'jig rten la phan 'dogs par zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pa/_gcig tu dpa' ba/_zla med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong la gnas pa/_gdul 
[\[284a.6\]]ba'i dngos po gsum la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zhabs kyi mthil la legs par gnas pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas goms pa/_yan lag lnga spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las shin tu 'das pa/_yan lag 
[\[284a.7\]]drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]phyogs bcur grags pas khyab pa/_brgya phrag bcu la mnga' sgyur bas khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs shing su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs par gyur/_su ni nyam nga bar 
[\[284b.2\]]'gyur/_su ni gnod par gyur/_su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod par gyur/_su ni ngan song la gzhol/_su ni ngan song la 'bab/_su ni ngan song la bab/_su ni ngan song nas drangs te mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhag_/su'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa dag ni bskyed par 
[\[284b.3\]]bya/_su'i bskyed pa dag ni yongs su smin par bya/_su'i smin pa ni rnam par grol bar bya/_su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor dang bral ba las 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par gzhag_/su ni 
[\[284b.4\]]sangs rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya'o zhes ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/smras pa/_rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur srid kyi/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus 
[\[284b.5\]]las yol ba med/_/ji ltar ma ni bu gcig sdug pa la/_/lta bar byed cing de yi srog bsrung ltar/_/de bzhin gdul ba'i skye bo rnams la ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs shing de'i rgyud srung /_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyud la gnas pa yi/_/thugs 
[\[284b.6\]]rje'i ba drus srid pa bgrod dka' bar/_/'khyams par gdul bar bya ba'i sras dag ni/_/ba gshin be'u stor bzhin du skyo med tshol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_rgyal po gtum po rab snang btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_'phags rgyal 
[\[284b.7\]]na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa gang gis gdul bar bya ba yin snyam na dge slong ka t+ya'i bu chen po yin par gzigs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_ka t+ya'i bu 'phags rgyal gyi rgyal po gtum po rab snang btsun 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa la soms shig_/btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/_de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das 
[\[285a.2\]]nas snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs bgos/_/lhung bzed thogs te bA rA Na sIr bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/bA rA Na sIr bsod snyoms spyad nas zas kyi bya ba byas te zas phyis len pa spangs nas/_gnas mal ji ltar spyad pa cham du phab ste/_lhung bzed dang chos 
[\[285a.3\]]gos thogs nas 'khor lnga brgya dang 'phags rgyal gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ngo /_/de'i tshe yul ka n+yA kub dza na tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po'i sngon khyim pa'i mdza' bo bram ze zhig gnas pa de'i bu mo gzugs khyad par can dang ldan pas tshe rabs snga ma'i ming dang mthun 
[\[285a.4\]]par skra can zhes btags so/_/ji tsam na lho phyogs nas gar mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig 'ongs te des de'i skra bzang bar mthong nas bram ze'i drung du 'ongs te des smras pa/_kye bram ze chen po bu mo 'di'i skra rnams bdag la byin cig dang /_kAr ShA pa Na stong sbyin no zhes smras pa 
[\[285a.5\]]dang /_des slob dpon bdag cag ni bram ze yin te/_bdag cag skra 'tshong du mi rung na ji ltar skra btsong zhes smras pa dang /_gar mkhan gyi slob dpon de cang mi zer bar song ngo /_/bram ze de yang phyi de nyin dus las 'das so/_/de'i chung mas ji ltar 'phags pa ka t+ya'i 
[\[285a.6\]]bu chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang de nas thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug ste/_'phags rgyal du 'ong bar 'dod do zhes thos so/_/khyo dang bral bas sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba skyes pa de tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po 'ong ba thos nas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du 
[\[285a.7\]]chud cing 'dug go/_/bu mo skra can mas ma de ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang smras pa/_ma ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/des smras pa/_bu mo 'phags pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po khyod kyi pha'i chung po grogs 'di nas mi ring ba zhig na 'dug 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]ste 'phags rgyal du 'ong 'dod na khyod kyi pha ni dus las 'das/_bdag cag gi khyim gyi gnas skabs ni 'di lta bur gyur pas ring zhig na 'ongs pa de la nyi ma 'ga'i bsod snyoms kyang sbyin mi nus pas so/_/des smras pa/_ma gal te de lta na gar mkhan gyi slob dpon de 
[\[285b.2\]]bdag gi skra kAr ShA pa Na stong gis nyo bas de nyid du tshongs la 'phags pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la bsod snyoms phul cig_/bdag gi skra ni yang skye bar 'gyur gyis mya ngan ma mdzad cig_/des de'i tshig dad pa las byung ba de thos nas/_bu mo legs kyis de ltar bya'o zhes smras te/_
[\[285b.3\]]gar mkhan gyi slob dpon gang na ba der song ste phyin nas smras pa/_slob dpon khyod kyis nga'i bu mo'i skra kAr ShA pa Na stong gis 'jal na de snoms la kAr ShA pa Na stong stsol cig_/des smras pa/_sring mo de'i tshe ni kho bo la de dag dgos kyi da ni de dag mi dgos mod kyi 'on kyang kAr ShA 
[\[285b.4\]]pa Na lnga brgyar 'tshong na blang ngo /_/des smras pa/_slob dpon stsol la 'di dag bzhes shig_/de blangs so/_/ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po yul ka n+yA kub dzar phyin nas de dben pa bla gab med pa zhig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bram ze mo de rtabs por gom pa 
[\[285b.5\]]bslang ste/_tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_des smras pa/_bram ze mo nga'i 'khor skye bo 
[\[285b.6\]]phal po che'o/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa 'khor ji snyed cig mchis/_bram ze mo nga'i 'khor lnga brgya yod do/_/'phags pa legs te de bzhin bgyi yis gnang bar mdzod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos bram ze mo de la cang mi zer bas khas blangs so/_/de nas 
[\[285b.7\]]bram ze mo de tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos cang mi zer bas khas blangs par rig nas rkang pa la phyag byas nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/de nas bram ze mo des de nyid kyi nub mo gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag bshams te nang par sngar langs nas stan bting /_
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]chu ra bzhag nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la spyan 'dren gyis 'phags pa gdugs tshod bshams lags te/_'phags pa da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes dus gdab par byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po snga dro chos gos dang 
[\[286a.2\]]sham thabs bgos lhung bzed thogs nas dge slong mang pos bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te bram ze mo de'i bkad sa gang na ba der song ngo /_/phyin nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/_/de nas bram ze mo des ka t+ya'i 
[\[286a.3\]]bu chen po la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dag rang gi lag dar te yang dag par tshim par byed/_yang dag par stobs par byed do/_/rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' 
[\[286a.4\]]ba dang bca' ba dag rang gis lag dar te yang dag par tshim par byas yang dag par bstabs nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po bshos gsol nas lhung bzed gyu phyag bcabs par rig nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir stan ches dma' 
[\[286a.5\]]ba zhig bting nas 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po bram ze mo de la chos 'chad par 'dod nas bram ze mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i bu mo skra can ga re/_des smras pa/_'phags pa spyod lam nyams lags so/_/dgra bcom pa rnams ni 
[\[286a.6\]]ma bsams par ye shes mthong ba mi 'jug pas des bu mo skra can gyi spyod pa bsams nas smras pa/_bram ze mo dge ba'i bsam pa can gyi bu mo de bos shig_/des bos pa dang /_khang pa nas phyung ste dad pa drag pos tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te phyogs 
[\[286a.7\]]gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bram ze mo des smras pa/_'phags pa skra can ma 'di sdig pa spangs pas khyod kyi sras mo lags te/_de'i slad du ji ltar bgyis kyang bdag cag gis khyod kho na la zhu 'tshal na 'di bdag cag gis su la stsal bar bgyi gsungs shig_/des smras pa/_bram ze mos cha 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]ma yin pa zhig dris te/_de ni rab tu byung ba la 'tsham pa ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang bu mo 'dis gsang ba'i rgyan lnga brgya dang /_phyi rol gyi rgyan lnga brgya dang /_grong gi mchog lnga brgya rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag cag bram ze ni dbul ba lags na bdag 
[\[286b.2\]]cag gis de dag ga las rnyed/_des smras pa/_bram ze mo de skad ma zer cig_/bu mo 'dis zhing bzang po la dad pa drag pos bya ba byas pas bsod nams kyi dbang che bar grags pa yin te/_nges par 'di la thams cad 'byor par 'gyur gyis smre sngags ma 'don cig ces 
[\[286b.3\]]byas pa dang /_de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos bram ze mo de dang bu mo de la chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston/_yang dag par len du 'jug_/yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par dga' bar byed cing rnam pa du mar chos 
[\[286b.4\]]dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par len du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar byas nas stan las langs te song nas rim gyis 'phags rgyal du phyin to/_/de grong khyer du zhugs pa'i tshe mod la yams kyi nad phyed zhi 
[\[286b.5\]]bar 'gyur ba dang /_chab sgo bas rgyal po la sbran pa/_lha sngon ma byung ba'i rtags dang cha lugs 'chang ba'i dge sbyong zhig g.yog lnga brgya dang mchis te/_de mchis pa'i mod la yams kyi nad phyed zhi bar gyur to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_kye skyes bu legs kyis de la bkur sti gyis 
[\[286b.6\]]shig_/bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/_lha bdag cag gis nyin mtshan du zhi ba'i las la brtson par bgyis pas na bdag cag gi mthus yams kyi nad phyed zhi bar gyur te dgung ring po mi thogs par thams cad yong ye zhi bar bgyi'o/_/dge slong dag gis ni rgyal po gtum po rab 
[\[286b.7\]]snang la nad med par gyur cig ces smras nas cang mi zer bar dong ngo /_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag chab sgo ba ni lha sngon ma byung ba'i rtags dang cha lugs 'chang ba'i dge sbyong zhig 'khor lnga brgya dang 'dir mchis te/_de mchis pa'i mod nyid la yams 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]kyi nad [(]phyad [,]phyed [)]zhi bar gyur to zhes zer/_bram ze rnams ni lha bdag cag gis gdugs mtshan du zhi ba'i las la brtson par bgyis pas bdag cag gis mthus yams kyi nad phyed zhi bar gyur to zhes zer te de gang gi mthu yin pa mi shes na/_deng la dge sbyong dang 
[\[287a.2\]]bram ze de dag glang po che'i bres kyi mi gtsang ba'i phyogs shig tu 'bras chan ngan pa dang /_rtsabs dag gi zas byin la zos nas phyir byung ba dang gnyi ga la zan ci 'dra ba zhig dris shig_/lha de ltar 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/_blon po rnams kyis bsgo ba bzhin du glang po che'i [(]bras [,]bres [)]
[\[287a.3\]]kyi mi gtsang ba'i phyogs shig tu stan bting nas dge sbyong dang bram ze dag la zan byin te zos zin nas phyir byung ba dang /_bram ze rnams la sgo bas kye bram ze chen po dag lhas khyed cag ci 'dra ba'i kha zas kyis tshim par byas zhes dris pa dang /_de dag khros te smras pa/_
[\[287a.4\]]byed stangs dang rgyal po thams cad chos ma yin pa la gzhol ba zhig ste/_des bram ze rnams la 'bras chan mi gtsang ba dang /_sran tshod yan lag gnyis pa dang /_rtsab mo byin te tshim par byas mod ces byas pa dang /_de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de dag dong nas dge slong 
[\[287a.5\]]rnams la dris pa/_'phags pa khyed lhas ci 'dra ba'i kha zas kyis tshim par byas/_de dag gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]sbyin pa pos ni byin/_len pa po rnams kyis ni zos te/_'byung ba chen po rnams tshim par byas shing nyin zhag gi rgyags blangs so/_/sgo bas rgyal po 
[\[287a.6\]]la smras pa/_lha bram ze rnams ni 'di skad mchi'o/_/dge slong rnams ni 'di skad mchi'o/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag deng la da ni gnyi ga glang po che'i bres ma yin pa'i gtsang ma'i phyogs shig tu kha zas bsod pa dag byin la de bzhin du dris 
[\[287a.7\]]shig_/de dag gis glang po che'i bres ma yin pa'i gtsang ma'i phyogs shig tu stan bshams te kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas na de bzhin du sgo bas dris pa dang /_bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/_byed stangs dang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba zhig ste zas ci 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]'dod pa byin nas tshim par byas so/_/des bram ze dag rgyal po'i pho brang 'di ni sko sham pa'i kha na las pas res 'ga' ni ngan par gyur/_res 'ga' ni bzang por gyur gyis nga ma 'phya shig ces smras pa dang /_de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de dag dong nas dge slong 
[\[287b.2\]]dag la dris pa dang /_de dag gis snga ma bzhin du smras so/_/sgo bas rgyal po la de bzhin du smras so/_/glang po che'i bres ji lta ba de bzhin du rta'i bres dang /_phyag dar khrod dang /_sa phyogs gtsang mar ngan pa dang bsod pa dag sbyar bar byas so/_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis bsams 
[\[287b.3\]]pa/_dge slong dag sbyin gnas yin gyi bram ze dag ni ma yin no snyam du rig nas dad pa skyes te tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig 
[\[287b.4\]]tu 'dug pa dang rgyal po gtum po rab snang la tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston/_yang dag par len du 'jug yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par dga' bar byed cing rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis 
[\[287b.5\]]yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par len du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po gang na ba de 
[\[287b.6\]]logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la 'di skad ces 'phags pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang zhes smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos rgyal po gtum po rab 
[\[287b.7\]]snang la cang mi zer bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos cang mi smra bas gnang bar rig pas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs nas song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis de nyid 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]kyi nub mo gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag bshams te/_nang par sngar langs nas gdan bting chu ra bzhag ste/_tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la spyan 'dren pas 'phags pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po gdugs tsho de bshams lags te da de'i dus la bab par dgongs 
[\[288a.2\]]su gsol zhes dus tshod gdas par byas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po snga dro chos gos dang sham thams bgos lhung bzed thogs te dge slong gi tshogs kyis bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi bkad sa gang na ba der song ste phyin 
[\[288a.3\]]pa dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug pa dang /_de yang 'dug ste rol mo'i sgra phyung nas bro gar mkhan rnams kyis bro gar rnam pa du ma dag bya bar brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang dge slong dag dbang po bsdams te 'khod do/_/
[\[288a.4\]]glu gar dang rol mo'i sgra de dag zhi nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis 'phags pa ci gar bzang lags sam/_glu snyan lags sam zhes smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos smras pa/_rgyal po chen po gang gis thos pa'am/_mthong ba dag la'o/_/des smras pa/_'phags 
[\[288a.5\]]pa dbang po nang du bsdus pa rnams kyis ma gzigs su ni stsol na ji ltar ma gsan/_des smras pa/_lha khyod la mi gsad pa la thug pa 'ga' yod dam/_'phags pa mchis na de cir 'tshal/_lha skyes bu de'i lag tu snod til mar gyis khong ste bskur la phyi bzhin gshed ma'i mi thong ste de la 
[\[288a.6\]]'di skad ces kyi mi khyod tshur shog_/snod 'bru mar gyis kha da chad du gang ba/_bya rog gis btung du rung ba 'di khyer la ljongs bzang po thams cad skor la 'dir khyer te shog shig_/ji ste til mar thigs pa gcig sa la bo na mi ral gri gdengs pa 'dis khyod kyi mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la 
[\[288a.7\]]'dor du gzhug go zhes bsgo la/_de'i mdun du rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs phyung ste bro gar rnam pa sna tshogs byed du chug shig dang /_de nas khyod yid ches par 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang des ji skad bstan pa thams cad rim gyis byas nas mi de la kye skyes bu ci gar 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]bzang ngam/_glu snyan pa blangs sam/_rol mo'i sgra snyan tam zhes dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_lha gang gis mthong ba'am/_thos pa dag la'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_kwa'e skyes bu dbang po nang du bsdus pa dag gis ma mthong du ni chug na/_ji ltar ma thos/_des lha bdag 'di 
[\[288b.2\]]snyam du gal te bdag gis 'bru mar gyi snod 'di las 'bru mar thigs pa gcig sa la bo na yang gshed ma mi ral gri gdengs pa 'dis bdag gi mgo drungs nas bcad nas sa la bor ro snyam ste bdag 'chi bas 'jigs skrag nas 'bru mar gyi snod la sems rtse gcig tu gtad de 
[\[288b.3\]]lta bas nyam thag ste 'dir mchis na ji ltar mthong ngam thos zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal po spobs pa med nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos smras pa/_lha khyod kyis mthong ngam/_'phags pa mthong lags so/_/lha re zhig mi 'di tshe gcig gi 
[\[288b.4\]]sdug bsngal gyi phyir bdag nyid mi g.yeng ba dang /_bag yod par kun tu srung bar bgyid na/_bdag cag dge slong rol mo'i sgra la lta ba dang /_nyan pa spong ba blangs te/_bslab pa bzung ba dag tshe rabs du ma'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyu gar dang /_glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra la lta ba'am nyan pa 
[\[288b.5\]]lta smos kyang ci dgos te de ni gnas med do/_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang 'bru mar gyi snod mthong bas yid ches te lhag par dad nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pas ka t+ya'i bu la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar
