[\[288b.6\]]bzhugs pa la gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas dar te yang dag par tshim par byed/_yang dag par stobs par byed cing rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas dar te yang dag par tshim par byas/_yang 
[\[288b.7\]]dag par bstabs nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos gdugs tshod gsol nas lhung bzed gyu phyag bcabs par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/_tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po'i mdun du 'dug go/_/'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la 'di skad ces 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]smras so/_/'phags pa ji ltar bdag gis bgyis pa de ltar 'khor lnga brgya la bsod pa'i zhal zas kyis tshim par bgyis pa gzhan 'ga' mchis sam/_des smras pa/_lhas bdag du ma bas khyad zhugs pa khyod kyis bdag 'khor lnga brgya dang bsod pa'i kha zas 
[\[289a.2\]]'di lta bus tshim par byas pa gang yin pa 'di la ngo mtshar ci zhig che/_bdag 'dir 'ongs pa'i tshe ri 'or na gnas pa'i bu mo zhig gis bdag nyid kyi skra btsongs nas 'khor lnga brgya dang kha zas bsod pa 'di lta bus tshim par byas pa ni 'di bas ches khyad zhugs par ngo mtshar 
[\[289a.3\]]che'o/_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis bsams pa/_bu mo gang zhig gis skra kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgyar ldom pa de lta bu'i bud med ni lha dag gi nang na yang ga la yod/_mdor na de btsal bar bya'o snyam na tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po ni bsnyen par dka' ba yin pas des de la bu mo 
[\[289a.4\]]de ri 'or gang na 'dug ces dri bar ma nus te/_des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag ka t+ya'i bu chen po lam gang nas 'ongs pa de nas deng la ri 'or gang na bu mo zhig gis skra btsongs nas 'phags pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa la bshos 
[\[289a.5\]]gsol ba tshol la btsal nas de nga'i don du slongs shig_/lha de ltar 'tshal lo zhes zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi ltar mnyan te rim gyis tshol ba na ka n+yA kub dzar phyin te de dag gis de btsal lo/_/btsal nas lam gyis dub pa ngal bso ste/_bram 
[\[289a.6\]]ze mo de'i khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_sgo khang du 'khod nas smras pa/_bkra shis par gyur cig_/bkra shis par gyur cig_/bram ze mo des smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci 'dod/_de dag gis smras pa/_bu mo skra can ma'o/_/bram ze mos smras pa/_su'i don du slong 
[\[289a.7\]]de dag gis smras pa/_bram ze mo rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi'o/_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag legs mod kyi 'on kyang 'di la gnyod mang du dgos so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_sring mo ji tsam zhig dgos/_des smras pa/_gsang ba'i rgyan lnga brgya dang /_phyi rol gyi 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]rgyan lnga brgya dang /_grong khyer mchog lnga'o/_/de dag gis rgyal po gtum po rab snang la lha bu mo gnyod 'di snyed cig gis khugs so zhes don de spring ba dang /_rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis phyir spring ba/_shes ldan dag bu mo gnyod ji tsam gyis khugs pa nos shig 
[\[289b.2\]]thams cad sbyar ro/_/de dag gis blangs nas rgyal pos nyi ma dang /_tshes grangs dang /_yud tsam dang sbyar te dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs so/_/gang gi nyin par 'phags rgyal du phyin pa de nyid kyi nyin par yul 'phags rgyal du mi ngas thams cad kyi 
[\[289b.3\]]thams cad du nye bar zhi zhing zhi bar gyur nas de'i ming zhi ba zhes bya bar chags so//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po nyi shu drug pa/_sdom ni/_skye dang 'tsho byed ka t+ya'i bu/_/zhi dang tshong dpon g.yul dang ni/_/mdun na 'don dang sgrol ma dang /_/
[\[289b.4\]]pi bang len dang skra bregs dang /_/rus pa'i keng rus gtogs par ni/_/de ni tshoms su yang dag bsdus/_/de'i tshe 'phags rgyal na tshong dpon gyi bu zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur 
[\[289b.5\]]spyod par byed do/_/des dus cung zad cig rtses dga' bar byas/_dga' mgur spyad nas zong khyer te yul gzhan du song ngo /_/de'i chung ma zhim po dang bzang po zos shing gyon pas nyon mongs pas shin tu gzir te/_de nyin gcig bzhin du khang thog tu song nas thams cad 
[\[289b.6\]]du skyes pa la lta'o/_/ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gtum po rab snang glang po che la zhon te de'i khyim dang nye ba zhig tu song ba dang /_des de la me tog gi phreng ba 'phongs pa de rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi phrag pa la phog go/_/des gyen du blta bar brtsams pa 
[\[289b.7\]]dang /_ji tsam na na tshod gzhon nu kha dog dang dbyibs kyi khyad par gyis bdag nyid shin tu mdzes pa rlom pa/_'dod pas thebs pa'i spyod pas zur stegs su mig zur gyis lta ba de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de la sems kyi bsam pa 'chums par gyur te/_
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]des smras pa/_gal te de lta na phyir byung shig_/des smras pa/_lha mchid g.yar tshas 'di nyid du spyon cig_/de yang de la chags pas ldog ma nus te/_de glang po che las babs nas de'i khyim du zhugs te de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad 
[\[290a.2\]]pas sems can zhugs par gyur to/_/bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_skyes pa chags pa shes shing ma chags pa shes pa dang /_dus shes shing zla mtshan dang ldan pa shes pa dang /_mngal du zhugs 
[\[290a.3\]]pa shes pa dang /_gang las mngal du zhugs pa shes pa dang /_khye'ur shes shing bu mor shes pa yin no/_/des rgyal po la lha bdag ni sems can dang ldan par gyur to zhes ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /_rgyal pos de la mu tig gi se mo do zhig byin te smras pa/_gal te 
[\[290a.4\]]khyod las bu khye'u zhig byung na de la mu tig gi se mo do 'di byin la nga'i drung du thong shig_/'on te bu mo na khyod nyid kyi yin no zhes smras te song ngo /_/de la mngal gyi mtshan ma byung bar gyur pa na tshong dpon des yi ge spring ste/_bdag kyang bde bar 'ong gis mi dga' bar 
[\[290a.5\]]ma byed par bag rton cig ces byas pa dang /_des thos nas skrag ste des rgyal po la gsol pa dang /_lha bdag gi khyim thab de nye ba zhig tu mchis na bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_rgyal pos de la spring ba/_khyod mi dga' bar ma byed par bag rton cig 
[\[290a.6\]]dang /_ngas ji ltar de thag ring bar 'gro ba de ltar bya'o zhes spring nas de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/rgyal pos de la nor 'di lta bu zhig nga la dgos kyis de ma rnyed par ma 'ong shig ces spring ba dang /_de dag tshol du lam ring po shig tu song ngo /_/de yang zla ba dgu 
[\[290a.7\]]'das nas khye'u gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa dang blta na sdug pa zhig btsas pa dang /_des mar dang sbrang rtsis kha bkang ste sgrom gyi nang du shing bal bting nas de'i thog tu bzhag ste/_steng nas gos dkar pos g.yogs nas de'i thog tu mu tig gi se mo do bzhag ste kha bcad 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]nas sgrom de la rgya skyegs la rgya btab ste bran mo la bran mo khyod sgrom 'di khyer te song la/_rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor dkyil 'khor gyis la mar me bus te zhog shig_/bzhag nas nam sus blangs kyi bar du phyogs gcig tu 'khod cig ces bsgo ba dang /_des de bzhin du 
[\[290b.2\]]byas so/_/ji tsam zhig na ba lang lam de nas 'gro ba dag gis sgrom de bskor te 'khod do/_/re zhig cig na rgyal po gtum po rab snang btsun mo zhi ba dang lhan cig khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du song ste 'dug pa des de bskor te 'dug pa'i ba lang de dag mthong ste des zho shas 'tsho ba 
[\[290b.3\]]rnams la bka' stsal pa/_shes ldan dag ba lang gis bskor cing 'dug pa de ci yin ltos shig_/de dag gis mthong nas smras pa/_lha sgrom rgya skyegs la rgya btab pa zhig mchis so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyer te shog shig_/btsun mo zhi bas lha sgrom 
[\[290b.4\]]de'i nang na rdzas ci mchis pa de bdag la stsol cig ces gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin du bya'o/_/ji tsam na sgrom de rgyal po'i thad du blangs nas rgyal pos kha phye ste bltas na re zhig na mu tig gi se mo do dang bu zhig mthong ste/_des mu tig gi se 
[\[290b.5\]]mo do ngo shes nas de 'di ni bdag gi bu yin no snyam pa'i sems skyes nas/_des de zhi ba la 'di ni khyod kyi bu'o zhes gtad do/_/des smras pa/_lha khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad du gdags/_des smras pa/_khye'u 'di ba lang dag gis bskyangs pas de'i phyir 'di'i ming ba lang skyong du 
[\[290b.6\]]gdags so zhes de'i ming ba lang skyong zhes bya bar btags so/_/de nas btsun mo zhi bas de bskyed pas na de'i ming yang ba lang skyong gi ma zhes bya bar chags so/_/de'i tshe yul rdo 'jog na rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_'byor pa zhes bya ba 
[\[290b.7\]]nas chos dang mthun pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug go zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/_/de'i yul na dus bzhin du char bab pas shing rnams kyi me tog dang /_'bras bu yang rtag tu chags/_sa la lo yang legs te slong mo bas kyang zas rnyed sla'o/_/ji tsam du dus 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]gzhan zhig na rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]thog tu song ste blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor cing 'dug pa des blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po gzhan gang gi yul na yang 'di ltar char dus bzhin du 'bab cing shing las me tog 
[\[291a.2\]]dang 'bras bu rtag tu 'chags pa dang /_sa la lo legs shing slong mo bas kyang zas rtag tu rnyed sla ba yod dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha mchis te rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi yul 'phags rgyal zhes bgyi ba na char dus bzhin du 'bab cing shing las me tog dang 
[\[291a.3\]]'bras bu yang rtag tu 'chags/_sa la lo legs pas slong mo bas kyang rtag tu zas rnyed sla'o zhes gda'o/_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te de lta na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go skon cig dang de'i yul 'khor gzhom par byas 'dong ngo /_/de dag gis dpung 
[\[291a.4\]]gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang /_yul 'phags rgyal du dong ste rim gyis rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi yul du phyin to/_/des de dag gzhom par brtsams pa na/_yul de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i 
[\[291a.5\]]tshogs kyis rgyal po gtum po rab snang la lha rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can zhes bgyi ba dpung gi tshogs chen po bsdus nas lha'i yul 'joms su mchis so zhes sbran pa thos pa dang /_des kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta'i tshogs dang /_
[\[291a.6\]]shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon te rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir spags so/_/de na rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can gyis rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi glang po che'i tshogs thams cad kyang phrogs/_rta'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i 
[\[291a.7\]]tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs kyang phrogs te rgyal po gtum po rab snang bcom btags byin bsgral pham par byas te/_g.yul bzlog pa na phan tshun kun tu byer ba las blon po dang skye bo'i tshogs gzhan rnams ni 'phags rgyal du zhugs nas ra ba'i khar sbrengs te 'dug go/_/
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]rgyal po ni rkya gcig por ri 'or zhig tu phyin pa dang /_ri 'or de na zhing pa snams byed ces bya ba zhig zhing rmid pa des de mthong nas smras pa/_kye khrom gyi dpa' bo rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can gyis rgyal po gtum po rab snang bcom btags byin bsgral pham par byas te g.yul bzlog 
[\[291b.2\]]ces grag na de bden nam/_kye skyes bu bden no/_/yul na gnas kyang yul gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can gyis bcom btags byin bsgral pham par byas te g.yul bzlog pa rgyal po de'i blon po dang /_/dmag dpon ci 'dra ba zhig_/gal te nga de'i blon por gyur 
[\[291b.3\]]na myur zhing myur bar rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can mgul nas btags te 'phags rgyal du khrid pa zhig_/de de skad du gtam zer zhing 'dug pa na/_de'i chung ma ri khrod ma zhes bya ba zan khyer te 'ongs nas des sa brkos te lo ma bting nas lag pa bkrus te zan bza' bar byas pa 
[\[291b.4\]]na/_rgyal po la bltas te/_kye khrom gyi dpa' bo khyod ngal bas skyo zhing bkres skom pas nyon mongs kyis bdag cag dbang thang chung ngu'i bza' ba dang /_btung ba ci 'dra yang mi bsngo de gsol gyis tshur gshegs zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis 
[\[291b.5\]]bsams pa/_gal te ma zos na ltogs te 'chi bar 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas rta las babs te lag pa dang rkang pa bkrus nas rta las stan phog ste bting nas 'dug go/_/'dug nas des 'tsho ba'i bsam pas bza' bar brtsams so/_de nas phor bu kha chag cig nas chang blud pa 
[\[291b.6\]]dang /_rgyal pos bsams pa/_phor pa ni kha chag mod kyi 'on kyang gang du ma chag pa'i phyogs de nas chang btung ngo snyam mo/_/rgyal po rnams ni shes rab dang ldan pa tshul phun sum tshogs pa yin pas des yang bsams pa/_gal te kha ma chag pa'i phyogs nas bdag gis 
[\[291b.7\]]chang 'thungs na 'dis ni ma chag pa nas 'thungs so zhes 'di khu 'phrig za bar 'gyur zhing 'dis bdag spangs par 'gyur bas 'dis gang nas 'thungs pa de nyid nas 'thungs na bdag la shin tu dga' bar 'gyur ro snyam nas des ngos de nyid nas 'thungs pa dang snams byed kyis bsams pa/_
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]khrom gyi dpa' bo 'di ni cho ga med pa zhig ste/_bdag gis ngos gang nas 'thungs pa'i ngos de nyid nas 'dis kyang 'thungs pas 'di dang 'jig rten gyi lugs yun ring du mi 'chor bar mdza' bo bya'o snyam nas/_des chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo khrom gyi 
[\[292a.2\]]dpa' bo 'di nga'i snying gi grogs po yin gyis 'di khyim du khrid de song la/_dril phyi dang khrus gyis te zan byin la rta yang rtswa dang chas byin cig_/des de khyim du khrid nas dril phyi dang khrus byas te zan byin nas rta yang rtswa dang chas byin no/_/rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can la ri 
[\[292a.3\]]brags pa skya bseng zhes bya ba dag gis bsdos nas de dag ri brags kyi lung pa nas brlugs te rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can gyi yul gzhom par brtsams pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can la lha ri brags pa skya bseng dag gis lha'i yul gzhom par 
[\[292a.4\]]bgyis kyis ji ltar bgyi ba dgongs su gsol zhes yi ge spring ste/_yi ge'i nang du yang tshigs su bcad pa/_gzhan gyis yul ni gzhom pa'i phyir/_/ji ltar nan tan mdzad pa ltar/_/rang gi yul 'khor bsrung ba yang /_/de bzhin lhas kyang mdzad du gsol/_/zhes bris so/_/
[\[292a.5\]]rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can gyis yi ge bklags nas bsam pa/_gal te bdag de bzhin du song na 'jig rten dag rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can pham ste/_de'i phyir log go zhes sems par 'gyur bas yong mjal dum byas te 'gro'o snyam nas des rgyal po gtum po rab snang la 
[\[292a.6\]]spring ba/_grogs po sdug pa gang thal zin pa de thal du zad/_da phyir byung shig dang khyod la cung zad kyang mi byed kyi gzhan du na phan tshun mgul nas 'jus te 'gro bar zad do/_/blon po dag gis spring ba de thos nas bsams pa/_gal te 'di na rgyal po med do zhes spring 
[\[292a.7\]]na glags rnyed par 'gyur gyis ye g.yo zhig bya'o snyam ste de dag gis de la yi ge spring ba/_grogs po sdug pa gal te de lta yin yang kho bo cag rgyal po ni bya rog bzhin du dogs pa dang bcas pa yin pas bdag ni phyir mi 'byung ngo /_/khyod kyi mdza' bo'i bu rgyal po'i gzhon nu ba lang skyong 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]'di 'ong gis de dang brang sprod la bzhud cig ces spring ba dang /_rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can gyis rgyal po gzhon nu ba lang skyong dang brang sprad nas 'phags rgyal bskor ba btang ste rdo 'jog du song ngo /_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can 
[\[292b.2\]]gyis bag phab ste yul rdo 'jog tu song gis da ni lha tshol du 'dong ngo zhes de dag gis pho nya rta pa kun tu btang ngo /_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can gyis 'phags rgyal bskor ba btang nas yul rdo 'jog tu song ngo zhes thos pa dang /_des zhing pa 
[\[292b.3\]]snams byed de la smras pa/_snams byed bdag ni 'jigs pa dang bral bas de'i phyir bdag 'phags rgyal du 'gros/_gal te khyod 'phags rgyal du 'ong na bdag gi khyim du shog shig_/des smras pa/_khrom gyi dpa' bo khyod kyi ming yang kho bos mi shes na ji ltar khyim 
[\[292b.4\]]du 'ong /_/des smras pa/_snams byed nga'i khyim mi shes kyang bla 'on kyang khyod 'phags rgyal du 'ongs pa dang rta [{]mangs kyi [,]mang gi [}]khyim gang yin zhes dris shig ces smras nas song nas rim gyis yul 'phags rgyal du phyin pa dang /_des chab sgo ba la bsgo ba/_kwa'e 
[\[292b.5\]]skyes bu 'ga' zhig rta [{]mangs kyi [,]mang gi [}]khyim gang yin zhes 'dri ba dang /_de nga'i drung du khrid de shog shig ces smras nas khyim du zhugs so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yul 'phags rgyal du dus ston la bab nas/_yul de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag kyang der dong ba 
[\[292b.6\]]dang /_zhing pa'i chung ma ri khrod mas rje'i sras yul 'phags rgyal na dus ston la bab ste skye bo'i tshogs der dong na bdag cag kyang bzhud la/_der dus ston kyang nyams su myong bar bya zhing rta [{]mangs [,]mang [}]de yang gzigs so/_/des smras pa/_bzang mo ci khrom gyi 
[\[292b.7\]]dpa' bos gang smras pa de thams cad bden du re'am/_de ni gnas gsum gyis blta bar bya ste/_bcom pa dang /_bros pa dang /_rgyal srid las nyams pa zhig na'o/_/des smras pa/_rje'i sras gal te de lta na thong /_bzhud la dus ston nyams su 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]myong bar bgyis nas byon to/_/des smras pa/_bzang mo legs kyis de bzhin du byas 'dong ngo zhes de gnyis dong nas rim gyis 'phags rgyal du phyin pa dang /_snams byed kyis sgo ba la kye skyes bu rta [{]mangs [,]mang [}]zhes bya ba'i khyim gang yin zhes dris pa 
[\[293a.2\]]dang /_des de chung ma dang bcas te rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi drung du khrid pa dang /_rgyal pos rgyang ring po nas zhes byas te 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i kun tu spyod pa kun tu spyad nas/_snams byed khyod 'ongs sam/_lha bdag mchis so/_/rgyal po 
[\[293a.3\]]de spyi cer zhig yin pa las/_des cod pan bcings pas des rgyal po ngo ma shes so/_/rgyal pos seng ge'i khri las babs pa dang /_des ngo shes nas des chung ma dang bcas te rkang pa la phyag byas so/_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis kyang rim gro cher byas 
[\[293a.4\]]nas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du khrid de dril phyi dang khrus byas zan byin nas nyal khang yang byin te btsun mo'i 'khor rnams la bsgo ba 'di dag nga'i pha ma yin te/_de'i phyir khyed kyis 'di gnyis la bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_bran 
[\[293a.5\]]pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa'i mi dang /_rim gro pa dang /_yo byad dag gis rim gro gyis shig_/de rgyal pos bkur sti dang mchod pa byas so snyam nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang blon po dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi thams cad kyis 
[\[293a.6\]]rim gro bya bar brtsams so/_/zhing pa snams byed cung zad cig 'dug nas smras pa/_lha mkhyen par mdzod cig_/bdag mchis te slar lha'i zhal lta ba mi dka' lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_snams byed 'di nyid du 'dug shig dang lhan cig rgyal 
[\[293a.7\]]srid gzung ngo /_/des smras pa/_lha zhing pa bdag lta bus rgyal srid gzung ba'i rngo ci zhig thog_/rgyal pos smras pa/_snams byed de'i tshe ni khyod na re gal te bdag rgyal po de'i blon po'am/_dmag dpon du gyur na bdag gis myur zhing myur bar rgyal 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]po pad ma'i snying po can mgul nas btags te 'phags rgyal du khrid pa zhig ces zer/_nga ni mi nus so zhes zer na de ji lta bu zhig ces byas pa dang /_de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang la blon po lnga brgya yod de/_des de dag la de 
[\[293b.2\]]gsor bcug go/_/de dag gis de gsos pa dang /_de'i ming gsos pa gsos pa zhes bya bar chags so/_/dus gzhan zhig na rgyal pos de la dris pa/_gsos pa khyod ji lta zhig 'dug_/lha ji 'dra zhig mchis/_bdag la blon po de rnams brnyas 
[\[293b.3\]]bzhin bgyid mod rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa de lta na de rnams dgos pa byung ba'i gros byed pa'i nang du khyod kyang zhugs shig dang /_su yang khyod la ma gus par mi byed do/_/des smras pa/_lha zhing pa bdag lta bus gros dag gi nang du 'jug pa'i rngo ci zhig 
[\[293b.4\]]thog_/rgyal pos gsos pa de bzhin du gyis shig dang blon po de thams cad gus pa byed par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo ba dang /_de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gtum po rab snang blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor cing 'dug pa dang /_
[\[293b.5\]]des gsos pa smrar gzhug par 'dod pa'i blo sngon du btang ste blon po rnams la shes ldan dag don 'di ji ltar bya zhes rmas pa dang /_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_lha de 'di dang 'di lta bur bgyi/_rgyal pos smras pa/_don 'di ni de ltar mi bya'o/_/gzhan 
[\[293b.6\]]dag cig gis smras pa/_lha don 'di ni 'di dang 'di lta bur bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_don 'di ni de ltar mi bya'o/_/rgyal pos gsos pa la don 'di ji ltar bya zhes rmas pa dang des lha don 'di ni 'di ltar bgyi ste/_de ltar mdzad na legs par 'gyur ro zhes smras 
[\[293b.7\]]pa dang /_rgyal pos de bzhin du byas so/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_rgyal po yang 'di'i gros bzhin mdzad pas de la ma gus par mi bya'o zhes de dag gis de la gus pa bya bar brtsams so/_/yang rgyal pos gsos pa la dris pa/_khyod ji lta zhing 'dug_/
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]des smras pa/_lha ci 'dra zhing mchis/_re zhig dang por bdag la khyim ma mchis so/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag gsos pa la khyim byin cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_lha blon po che ge mo zhig bgyi ba dus las 
[\[294a.2\]]'das pa de'i khyim zhig mchis te/_de'i mchis 'brang yang de na mchis so/_/rgyal pos khyim de chung ma dang nor du bcas par gsos pa la byin cig ces bsgo ba dang /_de dag gis khyim de chung ma dang bcas te gsos pa la byin no/_/yang rgyal pos gsos pa 
[\[294a.3\]]la rmas pa/_gsos pa khyod ji lta zhing 'dug_/des smras pa/_lha mchis 'brang gi 'khor rnams mi 'di zhing pa'o zhes brnyas par bgyid lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gal te de lta na gang gi tshe khyod khrus byed par 'dod pa de'i tshe ngas khyod 
[\[294a.4\]]la 'gugs pa gtang dang khyod kyis de la khrus zin te 'ong ngo zhes byos shig_/gsos pas smras pa/_ji ltar bdag gis lha'i bka' gcag_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa ngas khyod la gnang na 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/_/gang gi tshe khyod zan za bar 'dod pa 
[\[294a.5\]]de'i tshe ngas 'gugs pa gnyis pa gtang gis de la yang khyod kyis zan zos te 'ong ngo zhes gyis shig dang /_de nas nga nyid khyod kyi khyim du 'ongs te/_'ongs nas khyod dang lhan cig tu snod gcig tu zan bza'o/_/des smras pa/_lha bdag ni 'bangs lags/_
[\[294a.6\]]khyod ni rje bo lags pas bdag khyod dang lhan cig gcig tu 'tshal ma mi 'tshal te/_de ni cha ma lags so/_/rgyal pos gsos pa ngas khyod la gnang na 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/_khyod zo shig dang de lta na de dag khyod la gus pa byed par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo 
[\[294a.7\]]ba dang des khas blangs nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal pos de khrus byed pa'i dus su gsos pa dgos pa cung zad cig yod kyis myur du shog shig ces pho nya btang ba dang /_des de'i drung du song ste smras pa/_gsos pa dgos pa cung zad cig 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]yod kyis rings par shog shig ces lhas bka' stsal to/_/des smras pa/_kye nang rje khrus byas te 'ong gis song shig ces byas pa dang /_mi de slar song ngo /_/de'i chung ma'i 'khor dag cig gtam gleng bar brtsams pa phu nu mo 'u bu cag gi khyo zhing pa 'di 'di ltar 
[\[294b.2\]]tshod med de/_lha'i bka' khyad du gsod pa la ltos/_/de na kha cig na re phu nu mo gang dag rigs ngan pa las byung ba de dag ni gyi nas kyang dregs par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/gzhan dag na re phu nu mo ma rings par ltos shig dang /_mthon po'i mtha' ltung 
[\[294b.3\]]bas na gdon mi za bar rgyal pos 'di brlag par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/de khrus byas nas zan bza' bar brtsams pa na rgyal pos de la gsos pa bya ba cung zad cig yod pa mi slebs kyis rings par shog shig ces pho nya gnyis pa btang ba dang /_des der 
[\[294b.4\]]song ste de bzhin du bsgo na/_des smras pa/_kye mi khyod song shig zan zos te 'ong ngo /_/ji tsam na rgyal po nyid 'ongs nas smras pa/_gsos pa ci zan za'am/_des smras pa/_lha 'tshal ma 'tshal lo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa nga la mgron 
[\[294b.5\]]mi bya'am/_des smras pa/_lha mgron bgyi yis bshos gsol cig_/chung ma dag gis bsams pa/_lha 'di dang lhan cig bzhad pa gad mdzad do snyam nas de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te mig tshugs su rtog par brtsams so/_/rgyal pos rkang pa dang 
[\[294b.6\]]lag pa bkrus te de dang lhan cig tu zan bza' bar brtsams pa dang /_chung ma rnams kyis mthong nas sngangs te phan tshun du smras pa/_phu nu mo bdag cag gis 'di la 'di zhing pa'o zhes brnyas pa byas na lha 'di dang lhan cig bshos gsol ba la la ltos/_de na kha cig 
[\[294b.7\]]gis smras pa/_phu nu mo 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_'di la ci zhig bsgrub tu yod/_/gang dang lhan cig rgyal po bshos gsol ba de la bdag cag gis bkur sti ma byas na ji ste rgyal pos mkhyen na bdag cag la gdon 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]mi za bar gnod pa byed par 'gyur bas gang thal de thal du zad/_da ni nam yang de la mi gus pa mi bya'o zhes byas pa dang /_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin du bya'o zhes de dag 'tsher zhing mi dga' bzhin du de'i ngag mi gcog 
[\[295a.2\]]go/_/yang rgyal pos gsos pa la ji lta zhing 'dug ces rmas pa dang /_lha ci 'dra zhing mchis/_khyod kyi zhang po de bdag la shin tu khyad du 'gums lags mod/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa de lta bu bya bar mi nus mod kyi 'on kyang thams cad khyod kho na la 
[\[295a.3\]]rag las kyis khyod nyid shes so/_/des smras pa/_lha gal te de lta na khyod kyis bdag la bka' gyod mi rma bar ci gnang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na gsos pa srang gi nang nas song ba dang /_de na pha 
[\[295a.4\]]ma dang bral ba'i byis pa gnyis shig ci dgar rgyu zhing gnas pa gang yang rung ba nyin par gyi zas bsgrubs nas ngan gong gis rtse zhing 'dug go/_/ji tsam na bran mo zhig chu'i bum pa khyer nas lam de nas 'gro ba dang de na khye'u cig gis grogs po ltos shig ri lu'i 
[\[295a.5\]]bum pa 'di brtol lo zhes smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_gal te khyod kyis ri lu skam pos bu ga phyung na de ni ngo mtshar mi che'o/_/ngas ri lu gsher ba 'dis glan pa gang yin pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o/_/des legs kyis de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas/_des 
[\[295a.6\]]de la ri lu skam pos brtol ba dang /_der gsher bas glan to/_/de nas gsos pas de dag mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar skyes te/_des bsams pa/_de gnyis kyis bstangs na de la sha glan par nus so snyam du rig nas kwa'i byis pa khyed gnyis su'i yin 
[\[295a.7\]]zhes dris pa dang /_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha bdag cag pha ma dang bral nas gang yang rung ba nas nyin par gyi zas tshol ba zhig lags so/_/des smras pa/_gal te de lta na ci nga'i gan du mi 'dug gam/_lha mchis par ni bgyi na/_'on kyang gsol ba zhig 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]mchis te/_bdag cag gis khyod kyi las ci zhig bgyi bar 'tshal/_des smras pa/_cung zad kyang byar med kyi/_ngan gong 'di nyid goms par byed du gzhug cing gzhag go/_/'on kyang khyod kyis nga'i don gcig bya ste/_gang zhig nga dang lhan cig tu thab mo byed pa 
[\[295b.2\]]de'i kha khyed gnyis kyis mi gtsang ba'i nang du bsgres pa'i ri lus khong shig_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ji zhig gi phyir de de dang lhan cig tu thab mo byed par brtsams pa na de gnyis kyis de'i khar 
[\[295b.3\]]mi gtsang ba'i nang du bsgres pa'i ri lus bkang ba dang /_de skyengs nas la gor du phyis te kha btsums nas spobs pa med par gyur to/_/yang rgyal pos gsos pa la gsos pa khyod ji lta zhing 'dug ces rmas pa dang /_des smras pa/_lha ci 'dra zhing mchis/_
[\[295b.4\]]khyod kyi nang mi des zhing pa'i mi yin no zhes bdag la brnyas par bas mod/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gal te de lta na gang gi tshe nga btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ba de'i tshe khyod shog la rgyal po ga la bzhugs zhes dris shig_/gal te btsun mo'i 
[\[295b.5\]]'khor gyi nang na bzhugs so zhes zer na de btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bzhud cing gnas na rgyal po'i bya ba dang rgyal po'i don dag nyams par 'gyur ro zhes smros shig_/gal te yang der nga'i mal lam khri dag mthong na khyod der 'dug shig dang /_ngas khyod kyi 
[\[295b.6\]]rkang pa bkru bar bya'o/_/des smras pa/_lha khyod ni rje lags/_bdag ni 'bangs lags pas de ji ltar rung ste de ni cha ma lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa nga de ltar 'dod na 'di la khyod la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/_/de ltar na de dag khyod la rim 
[\[295b.7\]]gro byed par 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang /_des khas blangs nas thams cad rim gyis byas so/_/rgyal po'i mal stan gang yin pa'i steng du re zhig ngal bso'o zhes byas nas nyal ba dang /_de nyid du gnyid kyis log go/_/rgyal po phyir byung nas 'di su zhig ces 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]rmas pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_gsos pa lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'di sus kyang rkang pa ma bkrus sam/_chu khyer te shog shig rkang pa bkru'o zhes rgyal pos de'i rkang pa bkrus pa dang /_de dag dogs shing mi dga' bzhin de la 
[\[296a.2\]]rim gro bya bar brtsams so/_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang bud med la brkam chags can zhig pas de dus gzhan zhig na blon po'i bu ne'u ldangs dag dang lhan cig khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du song nas de dag dang /_gtam bzang po ma yin pa zer zhing 'dug ste/_shes 
[\[296a.3\]]ldan dag grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor gang na bud med bzang /_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_lha ka n+yA kub dza na bud med bzang lags so/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_lha kam po dzi ka pa'i bud med bzang lags so/_/gzhan dag gis smras 
[\[296a.4\]]pa/_lha sbrul gdug pa dag bzang lags/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_grong khyer gzhan na gnas pa'i bud med dag lta zhog 'phags rgyal 'di nyid na gzugs kyis 'tsho ba bzang mo zhes bgyi ba gang zhig mthong na sum bcu rtsa gsum pas bkur ba'i lha mo 
[\[296a.5\]]gzugs dang /_kha dog dang /_na tshod dang /_dbyibs dang ldan pa yang nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi snang bas lha'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i skar ma rnams kyi 'od kyi snang ba zil gyis gnon pa de lta bu zhig gnas lags so/_/rgyal pos de'i gzugs dang na tshod 
[\[296a.6\]]kyi yon tan brjod pa thos nas lhag par gzhan gyi bud med kyi gan du 'gro 'dod par gyur te cha lugs mi mngon par byas nas de nyid kyi nub mo kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya khyer te de'i khyim du song ba dang /_des de la byon pa legs so zhes bya ba'i kun du spyod pa kun du spyad nas 
[\[296a.7\]]mngag gzhug ma'i bu mo la gtad do/_/bu mo song la rigs kyi bu 'di dril phyi dang khrus gyis shig_/jo mo de ltar 'tshal lo zhes bu mo des gzugs kyis 'tsho ba bzang mo'i ltar mnyan te rgyal po gtum po rab snang la dril phyi bya bar brtsams so/_/de de la 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]dril phyi byed pa na mi gzhan zhig kyang kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya khyer te der 'ongs nas des bzang mo dga' mgur spyad kyis 'dong zhes smras so/_/gzugs kyis 'tsho ba bzang mo de'i kun du spyod pa ni gal te gcig nang du 'ongs la yang gcig 'ongs na snga ma bsad cing phyi 
[\[296b.2\]]ma dang /_lhan cig dga' mgur spyod do/_/bu mo des rgyal po gtum po rab snang de'i gzugs dang na tshod mdzes pa de mthong nas 'di lta bu'i rgyal rigs kyi bu yang sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa 'dis gsad do snyam nas ngus so/_/des ngus pa dang /_mchi 
[\[296b.3\]]ma'i thigs pa rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi lus la phog par gyur to/_/des rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis gyen du bltas na bu mo de ngu nas/_des smras pa/_bu mo ci'i phyir ngu /_des smras pa/_gzhon nu chen po ma lags so/_/rgyal 
[\[296b.4\]]po dogs par gyur nas yang dris pa/_bu mo ci'i phyir ngu ba bag ma tsha bar smros shig ces dris pa dang /_des rgyas par brjod do/_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis smras pa/_bu mo gang gis na nga 'bros pa'i thabs lta 'ga' yod dam/_des 
[\[296b.5\]]smras pa/_'di'i khyim kun nas gshed ma'i mi ral gri thogs pas bskor bas med mod kyi 'on kyang phyogs gcig cig yod na/_de mi gtsang bas de lta zhig smras kyang ci rung /_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu mo gtsang yang rung mi gtsang yang rung smros la srog 
[\[296b.6\]]byin cig_/des smras pa/_phyogs 'di na chab khungs zhig yod de de lcags kyi phur pas btab cing 'dug gis gal te 'byin nus na de phye la bros shig_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bu mo tshur phyogs de gang yin pa ston cig dang /_ngas de dbyung nus so zhes smras 
[\[296b.7\]]pa dang /_des phyogs de de la bstan to/_/smad 'tshong ma de'i khyim dang 'dab chags na bram ze ltas mkhan zhig gi khyim yod de/_re zhig na bram ze de gcin gcir byung na/_de'i chung ma yang chu khyer nas phyi bzhin du 'ongs te/_bram ze des skar ma la bltas pa dang /_
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]mi bzang bar mthong nas des bram ze mo la smras pa/_bram ze mo skar ma mi bzang bas lha ni mi bzad pa dogs pa nyam nga bar gyur to/_/des smras pa/_bram ze de skad ma zer cig de ni rgyal po khro bar 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_bram 
[\[297a.2\]]ze mo bdag cag ni rgyal po'i skyabs na bde bar gnas pa yin pas des na mi dga' ste de skad smra mod/_/de thams cad rgyal pos thos so/_/de nas rgyal pos lcags kyi phur pa de bsgul bar brtsams na ma nus nas stobs dang ldan pa des bsgrims te bsgul 
[\[297a.3\]]nas phyin pa dang /_bshang ba 'bab pa de dang lhan cig byung ste song ngo /_/bram ze des bram ze mo de la smras pa/_bram ze mo lha de'i mi bzad pa dogs pa nyam nga bar gyur pa gang yin pa de dang lha bral te/_rgyal po gson pa bdag cag dbang thang che na/_
[\[297a.4\]]rgyal po ni de ltar sbags bzhin du btsun mo zhi ba'i thad du song ngo /_/des lha de ci zhig ces smras pa dang /_des ji lta bur gyur pa smras so/_/btsun mo zhi ba mig mchi mas gang bzhin du de smig ma'i tshal pas bzhar to/_/smig ma'i tshal pas bzhar nas 
[\[297a.5\]]sa gar gyis dril phyi byas so/_/sa gar gyis dril phyi byas nas spos sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i chus bkrus te mthun pa'i gos dag bskon to/_/de phyi de nyin par don bya ba'i sar 'dug nas blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag ltas mkhan 
[\[297a.6\]]dag bos shig_/de dag gis ltas mkhan dag bos pa dang /_de dag la rgyal pos rmas pa/_shes ldan dag mdang nga'i mtshan mo ji lta bur 'das par gyur/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha ji ltar rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 
[\[297a.7\]]chos bzhin du sa skyong ba ltar lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag phyogs che ge mo zhig na bram ze ltas mkhan zhig gnas pa de bos shig_/de dag gis de'i thog tu rgyal po'i mi dag btang ngo /_/de dag der song nas bram ze de la 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]lha 'bod do zhes bsgo ba dang /_des shes ldan dag lhas ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal gyis song shig gos 'tshal la mchi'o zhes smras so/_/de dag slar song ba dang bram ze mo des smras pa/_bram ze bdag gis sngar khyod la rgyal po gtum po khro bar 
[\[297b.2\]]'gyur ba ma smra shig ces byas na khyod nga'i ngag nyan du ma btub pas da ni de byung ngo /_/des bram ze mo la thams cad legs par 'gyur gyis bag ma tsha zhig ces smras nas des de dbugs phyung ste rgyal po'i drung du song ngo /_/rgyal pos rgyang ring po nas mthong nas 
[\[297b.3\]]byon pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod nas/_mkhan po byon pa legs te phyogs 'dir bzhugs shig ces byas pa dang /_de yid dga' ba skyes nas rgyal po la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba byas nas ji ltar sgo ba'i gnas su 'dug go/_/rgyal pos yud tsam zhig bsdad 
[\[297b.4\]]nas smras pa/_mkhan po khyod ltas mkhyen tam/_des smras pa/_lha mnyes par rngo thog go/_/mkhan po bdag mdang ji lta zhig tu 'das par 'gyur/_lha mi bzad pa dogs pa nyam nga bar gyur pa las khyod bsod nams kyi mthu can zhig ste de'i 
[\[297b.5\]]slad du mi mdza' ba rnams kyi nang nas 'o brgyal te thar bar gyur to zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal pos mgu nas shes ldan dag mkhan pos ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te gzhan du ma yin no zhes smras nas/_mkhan po khyod la dam pa ci zhig dbul ba gsungs shig 
[\[297b.6\]]ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_re zhig nang mi dang mchid gros 'tshal te slad kyis gsol bar 'tshal lo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_mkhan po legs kyis de bzhin gyis shig_/des rings par 'gros bslang nas song ste rang gi khyim du phyin 
[\[297b.7\]]pa dang /_nang mi rnams la bos te smras pa/_nga la lhas dam pa sbyin par chad na/_khyod ci 'dod pa smros shig_/bram ze mos smras pa/_bram ze re zhig khyod nyid la dris khyod ci 'dod/_/des smras pa/_bram ze mo nga ni grong mchog lnga'o/_/des smras pa/_
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]bram ze gal te de lta na bdag ni ba lang brgya'o/_/bus smras pa/_yab bdag ni cang shes kyi shing rta'o/_/bu mos smras pa/_bdag ni nor bu'i rna cha gdub 'khor ro/_/de'i bran mo skyed mas smras pa/_ci ste khyed cag de lta bu 'dod na bdag ni 
[\[298a.2\]]rdo leb bzang po'o/_/bram zes bsams pa/_tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis lha las dam pa gsol gyi phal pa gzhan ltar ni mi bya'o/_/snyam du bsams nas tshigs su bcad pa sems shing rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/_lha bdag cag ci 
[\[298a.3\]]'tshal ba de gsan du gsol/_bdag ni grong khyer lnga zhig 'tshal/_/bram ze mo yang ba lang brgya/_/bu ni cang shes shing rta ste/_/bu mo nor bu'i rna cha 'tshal/_/bdag gi bran mo skyed ma ste/_/de yang rdo leb bzang po 'tshal/_/rgyal po gtum 
[\[298a.4\]]po rab snang gis kyang de la de bzhin du slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khyod la grong mchog lnga sbyin te/_/chung ma la yang ba lang brgya/_/bu la rta yi shing rta brgyan/_/bu mo la yang rna cha dag_/bran mo skyed ma slong ba yi/_/rdo leb bzang po 'dod pa yang /_/
[\[298a.5\]]de yi re ba 'bras yod par/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bskang bar bya/_/de nas rgyal pos de la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dam pa byin nas smras pa/_mkhan po rub ste rgyal srid bgyis/_bdag la gros ston cig_/des lha bdag cag ni bram ze lags pas de ni bdag 
[\[298a.6\]]gi cha ma lags so zhes smras pa dang /_des de nan tan gyis mdun na 'don du bcug go/_/re zhig cig na rgyal po gtum po rab snang la ri khrod pa skya bseng pa zhes bya ba dag log pa dang /_des gsos pa la bka' stsal pa/_song la skya bseng dag rnal du phob 
[\[298a.7\]]shig_/des kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas song ngo /_/des de dag rnal du phab ste/_de nas der gte'u yang bzung /_dpya nar ma 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]dang /_bla skyes kyang 'bul du bcug nas song ngo /_/rgyal pos ji ltar gsos pas skya bseng dag rnal du phab nas gte'u yang bzung /_dpya nar ma dang /_bla skyes kyang 'bul du bcug nas 'ongs pa thos so/_/des thos nas kyang dpung gi tshogs 
[\[298b.2\]]yan lag bzhi pa dang bsur song ngo /_/ji tsam zhig na gte'u pa de'i nang na ri brags kyi bu mo shu ba dang g.yan pas thebs pa zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gsos pa la dris pa/_gsos pa 'di dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod pa'i mi lta 'ga' yod 
[\[298b.3\]]dam/_des smras pa/_lha dga' mgur spyod pa 'ba' zhig tu ma bas/_gang la 'di stsal pa de'i rgyab tu 'di 'tshal na/_rta skad 'byin par bgyid pa de gnas mchis so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa de ci de bzhin du 'gyur ram/_
[\[298b.4\]]des smras pa/_lha spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o/_/gsos pas bu mo de sman pa rnams la gtad nas shes ldan dag kho bos yo byad thams cad sbyar gyis khyed kyis 'di dpyad gyis shig_/de dag gis de la dpyad byas pa dang nad kyang sos par gyur to/_/
[\[298b.5\]]de nas rim gyis yo byad kyi khyad par rnams kyis bskyed pas gzugs bzang mor gyur pa dang /_gsos pas de bu mor bzung ste/_de'i ming skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma zhes bya bar btags so/_/gsos pas bu mo de la bu mo ngas lha 'dir gdugs 
[\[298b.6\]]tshod la spyan drang gis khyod rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs la lha la bdag nyid ston cig ces bsgo ba dang /_de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/gsos pas rgyal po la smras pa/_lhas bdag gi sdum pa yongs su spangs pa lta zhig da mi gzigs sam/_
[\[298b.7\]]des smras pa/_gsos pa khyod kyis ma bos par ji ltar blta bar bya/_des smras pa/_lha gal te de lta na spyan 'dren no/_/legs te phan btags so/_/gsos pas rgyal po la 'os pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba dag sbyar te khyim yang byi dor byas pa dang /_
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]rgyal po de'i khyim du 'ongs so/_/des kyang rgyal po la 'os pa'i dril phyi dag gis phyis nas dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i chus ni bkrus/_byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ni byugs/_gos rnam pa sna tshogs ni bskon te/_rgyal po 
[\[299a.2\]]la 'os pa'i bshos gsol nas gsos pa dang lhan cig tu gtam dag gleng zhing 'dug pa na des kyang yol bas bskor ba'i nang nas pho long 'phangs nas des yol ba bzlog ste yab gcig pho long slar stsol cig ces smras pa dang /_de na tshod gzhon zhing 
[\[299a.3\]]mdzes pa rgyal pos mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu chags par gyur te smras pa/_gsos pa 'di su'i bu mo yin/_lha bdag gi bu mo lags so/_/gsos pa ci 'ga' zhig la byin nam/_lha ma stsal to/_/gsos pa gal te de lta na ci'i 
[\[299a.4\]]phyir nga la mi sbyin/_lha 'bul bar 'tshal lo/_/de rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos chung mar blangs so/_/sar pas rnying pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa 'di ni chos nyid yin pas/_rgyal po yang de la gcig tu 
[\[299a.5\]]blta zhing sems chags pas las gzhan btang ste de kho na lhur len cing 'dug go/_/gsos pas bsams pa/_sngon dam bcas pa bya ba'i dus de ni 'di yin no snyam nas bu mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo khyod kyis rgyal po 'di'i rgyab tu zhon nas 
[\[299a.6\]]rta skad zer du gzhug par nus sam/_des cung zad cig bgad nas smras pa/_yab gcig re zhig gal te rngo thog gam mi thog blta bar bgyi'o//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po nyi shu bdun pa/_bud med rnams ni ma 
[\[299a.7\]]bslabs par mkhas pa yin pas de gos dri ma can bgos nas khri'u dra ba can gyi steng na nyal zhing 'dug pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_lha mo 'di ci'i tha tshig_/des smras pa/_lha lha rnams 'khrugs par gyur to/_/des smras pa/_khyod kyis lha 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]rnams la ci byas/_lha gang gi tshe lhas bdag gi pha ri khrod pa skya bseng 'bebs su btang ba de'i tshe bdag gis de zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du lha rnams la gsol ba btab ste/_gal te bdag gi phas don yang dag par grub nas slar 'khor na gang gis bdag 
[\[299b.2\]]blangs pa de'i rgyab tu bdag zhon la rta skad zer du stsal to zhes bgyis pa las bdag ni lha la phul/_lha'i btsun mo'i 'khor ni rgya ches pas cis kyang bdag gis don 'di mi bgyis par 'gyur bas so/_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags la zhen pa rnams kyis ni mi 
[\[299b.3\]]bya ba ci yang med pa yin pas des smras pa/_lha mo khyod kyis don du nga'i ched du gsol ba byas pa yin pas thams cad bsgrub kyis bde bar 'dug shig_/de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis smras pa/_lha mo khyod ci'i phyir 
[\[299b.4\]]mi smra bar 'dug_/lha mo khyod kyis gsol pa gzhan yang cung zad med grang /_des smras pa/_lha cung zad kyang ma mchis mod kyi 'on kyang de'i dus su bram ze mdun na 'don gyis lha'i shis pa brjod pa brjod par bgyi/_pi bang len pa'i mis 
[\[299b.5\]]kyang pi bang dag blang bar bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_lha mo de yang sla ste bram ze mdun na 'don ni yod na 'on kyang pi bang len pa zhig btsal bar bya'o/_/des smras pa/_lha legs kyis pi bang len pa btsal du gsol/_de'i tshe yul sa 
[\[299b.6\]]'dzin nas sa 'dzin pa zhig zong thogs nas 'phags rgyal du 'ongs so/_/de smad 'tshong ma la ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis zil gyis non pa des zong thams cad btsongs te/_de dang lhan cig zos pa de ltar lhag par chags so/_/de'i gla mi gang 
[\[299b.7\]]dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyis bor nas bros pa dang /_des de la smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag ni zhing pa ma lags tshong pa ma lags/_grong mi zong thogs nas yul gzhan du 'gro ba yang ma lags kyi/_gzhan du na khyed lta bu dag las 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]rnyed pa gang lags pa des 'tsho ba lags pas kAr ShA pa Na dag stsol cig_/yang na skyes bu gzhan gyi skabs phye shig_/des smras pa/_bzang mo kho bo la kAr ShA pa Na dag med mod/_ji ste kAr ShA pa Na dag bdog na khyod las lhag pa gzhan 
[\[300a.2\]]su zhig yod de sbyin ches mod/_/'on kyang khyod bdag la sdug pas 'dir 'dug gis ma bskrad cig_/ci ste bdag gis smras pa gang yin pa de byed na de lta na gdod bdag khyod la sdug par shes so/_/des smras pa/_bzang mo mgo bos bkur 
[\[300a.3\]]ro/_/des bshang ba byas nas de'i steng du rgya shug gi tshig gu bzhag ste smras pa/_ci ste khyod bdag la byams na rgya shug gi tshig gu 'di sos zung shig_/des bzung bar brtsams pa dang /_des rdog pa cig bsnun nas phul te bkren pa ci 'di lta bu dag 
[\[300a.4\]]kyang byed dam btsog pa khyod dang lhan cig mi 'dug gis song shig ces smras nas/_des de khyim nas bskrad do/_/de yang pi bang la mkhas pa zhig ste/_pi bang len pas 'tsho ba tshol bar gyur to/_/rgyal pos gsos pa la smras pa/_khyod kyi bu mos 'di 
[\[300a.5\]]lta 'di ltar lha rnams la gsol ba byas te bram ze mdun na 'don ni nga la yod na pi bang sus blang bar bya/_des smras pa/_lha sa 'dzin pa pi bang len pas 'tsho bar bgyid pa cig mchis kyis de'i mig dar gyis bkab la nang du dgug par bgyi'o/_/
[\[300a.6\]]rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa legs kyis de bzhin du gyis la khug shig_/rgyal po dang mdun na 'don khang pa bdun rtseg gi steng du 'dzegs nas des mdun na 'don la ji ltar gyur pa thams cad bsnyad pa dang /_de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/
[\[300a.7\]]gsos pas kyang sa 'dzin pa'i mig dar gyis bkab nas khang pa bdun rtseg gi steng du bzhag go/_/skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma yang ngo mtshar dang /_bkra shis dang /_bde legs dag byas te/_gos dkar po bgos nas rgyal po'i rgyab tu 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]zhon pa dang bram ze mdun na 'don gyis ni shis par brjod pa brjod par brtsams/_sa 'dzin pa'i mis ni pi bang blangs/_rgyal po gtum po rab snang yang rta'i skad 'byin par zhugs pa dang /_sa 'dzin pa des bsams pa/_khang pa 'di ni bdun 
[\[300b.2\]]rtseg yin pas rtas 'dir ga la thar/_gdon mi za bar 'dir bdag lta bu bud med kyi dbang du gyur pa 'ga' zhig bud med kyis co dris so snyam nas des glu tshig tu blang ba/_rgya shug tshig gus gyur pa ltar/_/rgya shug tshig gus gyur pa ltar/_/don 
[\[300b.3\]]'di'ang phal cher 'dra ba yin/_don 'di'ang phal cher 'dra ba yin/_/zhes zer zhing de pi bang mi len par yang nas yang du rgyun mi 'chad par glu len cing glu tshig de smra'o/_/rgyal pos de la dris pa/_kye skyes bu glu de'i don 'di ci yin/_des ji ltar 
[\[300b.4\]]gyur pa rnams brjod pa dang /_des bsams pa/_'dis bdag shes kyis yul dbyung bar bya'o snyam nas rgyal pos de la kA r+ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin nas yul phyung ngo /_/dus gzhan zhig na mdun na 'don gyis rgyal po la lha khyod kyis mi rigs pa zhig bgyis 
[\[300b.5\]]te/_rgyal po dag ni bud med kyi dbang du 'gyur ba ma lags so zhes smras pa dang /_de snyad med par cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/des phyi de nyin gsos pa la smras pa/_deng bram ze des 'di skad ces smras na/_de rang gi chung mas mgo dbyir gzhug na khyod 
[\[300b.6\]]kyis nus sam/_des lha re zhig bltas te bgyi'o zhes smras nas/_gsos pas khyim du song ste chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo bram ze mdun na 'don gyis lha la 'di dang 'di skad ces smras pa las de kho bo la smra na/_khyod kyis ci nas bram ze de rang 
[\[300b.7\]]gi chung mas mgo dbyir gzhug pa de lta bu'i sbyor ba bya bar nus sam/_des smras pa/_rje'i sras 'di la ci zhig bgyir mchis/_de lta zhig bgyis lags su bas kyis gzigs shig_/des smras pa/_bzang mo gal te de lta na legs so/_/
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]g.yon can gyi chung ma g.yon can nyid du 'gyur bas des bram ze de'i chung ma dang lhan cig mdza' mor bya bar brtsams so/_/gang gi tshe de gnyis phan tshun yid phebs par gyur pa de'i tshe des bram ze mo la smras pa/_grogs mo bdag gi khyim 
[\[301a.2\]]thab ni rab tu byams te/_de bdag gis gang smras pa de byed do/_/des smras pa/_grogs mos kho mo la thub re skan/_ji ltar khyim thab bdag gi dbang du 'gyur ba de ltar khyod kyis ga la 'gyur/_gsos pa'i chung mas smras pa/_grogs mo ci 
[\[301a.3\]]ste khyod kyi khyim thab khyed kyi dbang du 'gyur na blta yis de'i mgo phyi shig_/des de nga rgyal bskyed pas grogs mo dbyis ltos shig ces smras nas/_de gos dri ma can gyon nas khri'u dra ba can gyi steng na nyal te 'dug go/_/mdun na 'don gyis dris pa/_bram 
[\[301a.4\]]ze mo 'di ci'i tha tshig des smras pa/_bram ze lha rnams 'khrugs par gyur to/_/des smras pa/_bram ze mo khyod kyi khyim na mi bdog gam ci khyod kyis lha rnams la khas blangs pa gang yin pa de thams cad gyis shig dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de cang mi 
[\[301a.5\]]zer bar 'dug pa dang /_mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/_bram ze mo khyod kyis lha rnams la ci zhig khas blangs/_des smras pa/_bram ze gang gi tshe khyod bram ze'i tshul du gnas pa na lhas bos pa de'i tshe bdag gis lha rnams la 'di skad ces bdag gi khyim 
[\[301a.6\]]thab bde bar slar 'ongs na/_bdag gis de'i mgo phyi nas de'i skra rnams khyed la dbul lo zhes gsol ba byas pa las de'i rjes la khyod kyang longs spyod skyes par gyur/_bdag gis kyang brjed de da ni lha de rnams 'khrugs par gyur pas mdor na 
[\[301a.7\]]bdag 'gum du bas so/_/des smras pa/_bram ze mo khyod kyis gang lha rnams la gsol ba byas pa de yang nga'i ched yin pas longs shig dang lha gsol te thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/_/des gsos pa'i chung ma de la bdag gi khyim thab ni 'di skad du 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]lha las gsol te thams cad bya'o zhes spring ba dang /_des kyang gsos pa la rje'i sras mdun na 'don gyi chung ma des bdag la 'di skad du bdag gis khyim thab khas len du bcug ste/_lha la gsol nas thams cad bya'o zhes zer ro zhes spring ba mchis so/_/
[\[301b.2\]]gsos pas kyang rgyal po la smras pa/_lha don de grub lags te mdun na 'don de khyod la zhur mchis mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa de nga'i ched yin pas bag ma tsha zhig_/re zhig na mdun na 'don de rgyal po la gsol du 
[\[301b.3\]]'ongs te/_lha bdag lha rnams kyi don cung zad cig bgyid de zla ba drug na lha'i zhal lta zhing mchi bar 'tshal lo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig_/de khyim du song nas mgo phyi'o/_/de mgo phyi nas kyang khyim gyi nang nyid na 
[\[301b.4\]]'dug go/_/de'i chung mas gsos pa'i chung ma la grogs mo kho mo'i khyim thab de ni mgo phyi zin no zhes spring ba dang /_des kyang gsos pa la bsnyad do/_/gsos pas kyang rgyal po gtum po rab snang la smras pa dang de rab tu dga' ste mdun na 'don de 
[\[301b.5\]]khug cig ces bsgo'o/_/gsos pas kyang khye'u gnyis shig glu tshig bslabs pa/_gang na bud med gzugs ldan la/_/rigs dang ldan zhing rigs spel ma/_/de na rta med rta skad zer/_/mdun 'don mgo bo phyi la ltos/_/zhes bslabs so/_/ji tsam 
[\[301b.6\]]na mdun na 'don de zhwa zhig gyon nas rgyal po'i drung du 'ongs pa dang /_khye'u de gnyis kyis glu tshig bya bar brtsams pa/_gang na bud med gzugs ldan la/_/rigs dang ldan zhing rigs spel ma/_/de na rta med rta skad zer/_/zhes byas nas gzhan zhig de'i 
[\[301b.7\]]zhwa phud nas/_mdun na 'don mgo bo phyi la ltos/_/zhes byas pa dang /_de nas gad mo chen po byung ste/_mdun na 'don yid la ngo tsha bar gyur nas kha rog par mgo smad de sma bab nas song ngo /_/gsos pas dgos pa dag byung ba na de dag la gtse bar brtsams 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]nas gang na 'di lta bur bud med kyi dbang du gyur pa de na rgyal po'i don ga la yod ces byas pa dang /_rgyal pos mdun na 'don la smras pa/_mkhan po khyod kyis gsos pa de gtse bar nus sam/_des smras pa/_lha re zhig rngo thog gam mi thog bltas te 
[\[302a.2\]]bgyi'o/_/de'i tsha bo sgyu ma mkhas pa zhig yod pas des de la smras pa tsha bo gsos pa 'dis rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa'i mdun du bdag la tho btsams na de la khyod kyis gtse bar nus na bdag gi sha glan par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_des zhang po re zhig nus sam mi nus bltas 
[\[302a.3\]]te bgyi'o zhes smras nas des mig 'phrul gyis 'gron pa sprul/_phyag dar gyi phung po las khyim du sprul/_rus pa'i rus gong las ded dpon gyi chung ma gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa mdzes pa zhig sprul to/_/rgyal po'i kun tu spyod pa ni gal te 'gron pa 'ongs na de la 
[\[302a.4\]]bdag nyid kyis sho gam gcod pa'am/_yang na gsos pa gtong ngo /_/gsos pas 'gron po de dag las sho gam gcad par brtsams nas des 'gron po rnams la dris pa/_shes ldan dag ded dpon gyi khyim gang yin/_de dag gis khyim 'di lags so 
[\[302a.5\]]zhes bstan to/_/de der zhugs pa dang /_re zhig na ded dpon gyi chung ma gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/_dbang po 'phrog pa/_sems g.yo bar byed pa zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu chags par gyur nas/_des smras pa/_bzang 
[\[302a.6\]]mo khyod dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad na 'gron pa'i sho gam mi gcad par bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_rje'i sras de ltar ni bgyi na 'on kyang mtshan mo dga' mgur spyad do/_/de'i mig 'phrul gyis mtshan mor sprul pa dang /_gsos pa de dang lhan cig dga' 
[\[302a.7\]]mgur spyad nas ji tsam na mgul pa nas 'khyud de gnyid kyis log go/_/mig 'phul mkhan gyis mig 'phrul slar bsdus pa dang /_gsos pa phyag dar khrod na keng rus kyi mgul nas 'khyud de nyal zhing 'dug go/_/mdun na 'don gyis rgyal po la lha gsos 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]pa'i gnas skabs de gzigs shig ces smras pa dang /_rgyal pos blta ba'i phyir srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma bsdus te song nas rgyal pos de se gol gyi sgras bslang nas gsos pa ci bud med gang dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad pa de'i sha yang za'am zhes 
[\[302b.2\]]smras pa dang /_de rab tu skyengs nas langs te bsams pa/_'di ltar rgyal po 'dis bdag co dris na gson te yang ci rung ba dag rang 'chi bar bya'o snyam mo/_/yang bsams pa/_bdag rang gis rang 'chi bar bya ba ni dkas song la 'phags pa ka t+ya'i bu chen 
[\[302b.3\]]po'i gan du rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas de tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal gyis rab tu dbyung du gsol/_/des de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen 
[\[302b.4\]]par rdzogs par byas nas gcig las 'phros pa'i lung klog tu bcug go/_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang de med pa dang mi dga' bar gyur nas de rab tu byung ba las phab ste sngon gyi gnas ji lta ba bzhin bzhag go//_//sdom ni/_ba lang skyong dang rngon pa 
[\[302b.5\]]nyid dang ni/_/bud med rnams dang bad sa'i rgyal po dang /_/nor lhas byin pa dang ni rab snang dang /_/rgyal po rdo 'jog tu ni song ba dang /_/rmi lam rmis par gyur pa tha ma yin/_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang mal chen por 'dug pa rnam par rtog pa 
[\[302b.6\]]'di skyes te ci bdag 'das na gzhon nu ba lang skyong gis rgyal srid bya bar nus sam 'on te mi nus snyam mo/_/yang bsams pa/_re zhig 'di bgam par bya'o snyam nas des de bos te smras pa/_bu re zhig btsun mo'i 'khor du bya ba cung zad cig yod de nga zhag 
[\[302b.7\]]bdun gyi bar du btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug gis de'i bar du khyod kyis rgyal po gyis shig ces bsgo nas de rgyal po byed cing rgyal po gtum po rab snang ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug go/_/gzhon nu ba lang skyong yang rgol ba dang /_phyir rgol ba rnams kyi tha 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]snyad la legs par sbyong ste/_rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis byi ba byed pa dang bud med gang dag bzung ba de dang de dag la so sor kye mi khyod bud med 'di 'dod dam zhes rmed la bud med la yang khyod skyes pa 'di 'dod dam zhes rmed cing gal te de dag phan tshun 
[\[303a.2\]]mngon par 'dod par gyur na de nas blon po rnams la shes ldan dag 'di dag phan tshun mngon par 'dod na nga ci'i phyir mi 'dod/_/'di dag la nga'i chab 'og na 'tsho ba sus kyang cung zad kyang ma smra bar 'di dag ci dgar spyod cing 'dug tu chug shig ces bsgo'o/_/dpya 
[\[303a.3\]]'bul ba rnams la ni nan tan du lta'o/_/zhag bdun lon te rgyal po phyir byung nas gsos pa la rmas pa/_gsos pa ci gzhon nu ba lang skyong nga 'das nas rgyal srid byed nus sam/_des smras pa/_lha rngo ni thog na 'on kyang byi ba bgyid pa rnams ni dar bar 
[\[303a.4\]]'gyur lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa byi ba byed pa dang byi ba mi byed pa zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/_des ji lta bu yin pa brjod pa dang /_rgyal pos bsams pa ci gzhon nu 'di gzhan gyi bud med rnams la phrag dog med pa zhig gam/_'on 
[\[303a.5\]]te rang gi chung ma la yang de bzhin pa de re zhig brtag par bya'o snyam nas des sa 'dzin pa zhig la sa 'dzin pa khyod song la gzhon nu ba lang skyong gi chung ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod cig ces bsgo ba dang /_des rna ba gnyis bkag nas smras pa/_lha sdig 
[\[303a.6\]]pas brlag lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_sa 'dzin pa rgyal po'i don ni de lta bur gnas pa yin gyis song shig_/gal te rim pa bzhin ma byas na rgyal po'i don nyams par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_lha mod la de ltar bgyi ba'i rngo mi thog pas bags 
[\[303a.7\]]kyis bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_de bzhin du ni byed la rag na sa 'dzin pa thabs ji lta bu zhig byed/_lha de'i sdum pa dang nye ba zhig tu zong bkram pa bgyis/_zong stsol cig dang de nas 'dris par bgyis nas bka' ji skad stsal pa bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]rgyal pos de la zong byin pa dang /_des rdzas dag bsags te tshong zong bkram pa dang /_ba lang skyong gi sgyug mo'i bran mo zhig yod pa de zong khyer nas spos kyi phur ma nyor 'ongs so/_/sa 'dzin pas bu mo de la bu mo spos kyi phur ma 'di su 'ir bya zhes dris pa dang /_des smras 
[\[303b.2\]]pa/_gzhon nu ba lang skyong gi sgyug mo'i'o/_/de ming ci zhig_/ming 'di zhes bya'o/_/bu mo nga'i ma de yang ming ni de skad ces bya bas de ni nga'i ma dang 'dra'o zhes smras nas des de la spos kyi phur ma rin bskyungs nas mang du byin no/_/ba lang skyong gi sgyug mos bu mo de la dris 
[\[303b.3\]]pa/_bu mo sngon chad ni rin 'di tsam gyis rdzas nyung ngu khugs la/_da ni shin tu mang du khugs pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/_/des kyang ji ltar gyur pa thams cad brjod do/_/des smras pa/_legs te/_de ni nga'i bu dang 'dra'o/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du byas pa dang /_de de la 
[\[303b.4\]]dga' bar gyur to/_/dus gzhan zhig na sa 'dzin pas smras pa/_bu mo ma la 'di skad du ma'i zhal ltar mchi'o zhes gyis shig_/des de la byas pa dang /_des smras pa/_legs kyis tshur shog shig ces gyis shig_/des de la smras pa dang /_des skyes su dri'i rdzas 
[\[303b.5\]]dag khyer te 'ongs nas des de la brang sprad de ngus pa dang /_des smras pa/_bu ci'i phyir ngu /_des smras pa/_yum ci 'dra ba bdag gi ma'i dbyibs kyang de 'dra bas de'i slad du bdag mchi ma byung ngo /_/des bu nga nyid khyod kyi ma de yin te/_khyod nga'i bu yin gyis ma ngu shig ces 
[\[303b.6\]]smras nas de de la lhag par dga' bar gyur to/_/ji tsam zhig na phyogs shig tu ba lang skyong gi chung ma song ba las des de bos nas bu mo tshur ming po'i zhabs la phyag gyis shig ces byas pa dang /_de 'ongs so/_/ma gcig bu mo 'di'i ming ci lags/_bu ming 'di zhes bya'o/_/
[\[303b.7\]]ma gcig bdag gi mna' ma yang ming yang 'di dang 'dra/_dbyibs kyang 'di dang 'dra bas 'di ni bdag gi mna' ma lags so/_/des bu legs so zhes smras so/_/gang gi tshe de dag phan tshun gcugs par gyur pa de'i tshe des g.yo thabs su na ba ltar bcos nas 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]'dug go/_/bu mo de yang rdzas nyor 'ongs pa dang /_sa 'dzin pa'i khye'u des smras pa/_bu mo nga ni the gi na na ma cig da ltar mi 'ong ngam/_des khyod na bar mi shes so/_/des smras pa/_de la gyis shig des de la byas pa dang /_de yang blta ba'i phyir 
[\[304a.2\]]'ongs te dris pa bu khyod ji ltar na/_des smras pa/_ma gcig bdag gi bro ni ya nga ba zhig lags so/_/des smras pa/_bu sman pa la dris te dpyad dag gyis shig_/des smras pa/_ma gcig 'di ni dpyad kyis 'tsho ba ma lags te/_bdag nad 'di kho nas srog 
[\[304a.3\]]dang 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang lags pa de mchis so/_/des smras pa/_bu ci sems thabs gang gis nad 'di zhi bar 'gyur/_ma gcig zhi bar 'gyur ba'i thabs shig ni mchis na 'on kyang mi 'byor to/_/bu ci mi 'byor smros shig dang thams cad 
[\[304a.4\]]'byor par bya'o/_/des smras pa/_ma gcig ba lang skyong gi btsun mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad na de lta na bro 'di sos par 'gyur lags so zhes smras pa dang de rab tu khros nas smras pa bkren pa khyod da shir zad khyod rgyal po'i btsun mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod 'dod dam 
[\[304a.5\]]zhes des de la spyos te langs te song ngo sa 'dzin pa de g.yon can zhig pas des nor thams cad dkar chag la bris nas dkar chag de la nga shi na rdzas thams cad ba lang skyong gi sgyug mo'i yin no zhes de skad du yang bris so/_/dkar chag de de la bskur ba dang des bklags nas khro 
[\[304a.6\]]ba zhi bar gyur te bsams pa de bdag gis da gzod kho na spyos te 'ongs na de bdag la je byams par gyur gyis de'i phyir bud med rnams kyi rang bzhin ni de lta bu yin pas de shi na mi rung bas de la bsgrub po snyam nas des bu mo de bos te de nas sa 'dzin pa'i bsngags pa rim gyis 
[\[304a.7\]]brjod nas smras pa bu mo khyod kyi skud po de na na de ltar rim gro'am des smras pa ma gcig sman pa ma mchis sam/_ci ste dpyad ma bgyis/_des smras pa/_bu mo de'i nad ni ya nga ba zhig ste de nad de kho nas dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod na 'on 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]kyang de na re gal te mna' ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad na de lta na bdag 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/de khros nas smras pa/_ma gcig bkren pa de da dus byas su pas rgyal po'i btsun mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad 'tshal lam/_des smras pa mo khyod kyi gyos po gang 
[\[304b.2\]]las skyes pa khyod shes sam/_ma gcig ma 'tshal to/_/bu mo de ni sdig pa las skyes te rgyal por gyur nas dpung gi dmag mang ba yin no/_/khyod kyi khyo de yang tshong dpon zhig gi bu yin te yang rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/khyod kyang 'di dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod cig 
[\[304b.3\]]dang /_khyod las bu gang 'byung ba de yang /_rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes de des bslus pa dang /_khas blangs nas des sa 'dzin pa'i khye'u de la spring ba/_bu bu mo 'dis khas ni blangs na khyod la gnod par byed srid kyis dus shes par gyis la shog shig ces byas so/_/
[\[304b.4\]]sa 'dzin pas rgyal po la lha don 'di ni grub na 'on kyang re zhig ba lang skyong mi gtang du gsol zhes spring ngo /_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_bdag 'das nas gzhon nu ba lang skyong rgyal por 'gyur zhing de 'das nas kyang de'i bu rgyal por 'gyur ba yin na/_gal te ba lang 
[\[304b.5\]]skyong gi chung ma las sa 'dzin pa'i bu skyes par gyur na de rgyal por 'gyur bas de'i phyir gang gis na sa 'dzin pa de'i dbang po sa bon du mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sman sbyin par bya'o snyam nas des de'i dbang po sa bon du mi 'gyur ba'i la du dag cig bskur nas/_sa 'dzin pa khyod 
[\[304b.6\]]gang gi tshe gzhon nu ba lang skyong gi chung ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod pa de'i tshe khyod kyis la du 'di dag zo shig ces spring ngo /_/ba lang skyong la yang bu gros su bya ba cung zad cig yod kyis re zhig khyim du ma 'gro shig ces bsgo ba dang de 'dug go/_/sa 'dzin pas kyang dbang 
[\[304b.7\]]po sa bon du mi 'gyur ba'i la du zos nas/_ba lang skyong gi chung ma la dga' mgur spyad nas 'dod pa'i dga' bas dub par gyur te/_de'i mgul nas 'khyud bzhin du gnyid log par gyur to/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_des de la dga' mgur spyad de song grang gis 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]gzhon nu gtang bar bya'o snyam nas des gzhon nu ba lang skyong la smras pa/_bu mna' ma mi dga' bar 'gyur gyis ring po ma 'dug par song shig_/de khyim du song ba dang re zhig na chung ma gzhan gyi skyes bu zhig dang lhan cig tu 'dug cing sa 'dzin pa de'i lag 
[\[305a.2\]]pa 'phyang ba mthong nas/_des de'i lag pa bskums nas 'di dag 'ga' zhig gis mthong bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam nas gos kyis g.yogs so/_/sa 'dzin pa mtshan rangs par nyal nas nam nangs te nyi ma shar ba dang sad nas des bdag mthong ngam ma mthong snyam nas 
[\[305a.3\]]rgyugs te song ngo ba lang skyong la rgyal pos bu mdang sum nga'i rmi lam na khyod kyi chung ma skyes pa gzhan zhig dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod pa mthong ngo zhes smras pa dang /_lha khyod kyis ni rmang lam du gzigs/_bdag gis ni mngon sum kho nar mthong ngo /_/ji lta zhig tu/_des ji 
[\[305a.4\]]ltar gyur pa'i gtam rgyas par brjod do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bu khyod la phrag dog med dam/_lha ma mchis so/_/bu de ci'i phyir/_lha bdag rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dran te/_bdag sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan zhig na ded dpon zhig gi chung mar gyur pa las/_ded dpon de zong 
[\[305a.5\]]'tshal nas yul gzhan du chas pa dang /_de la bdag gis rje'i sras bdag kyang mchi'o/_/zhes smras so/_/des de na khyod kyi rim gro su byed ces smras te/_de bdag mi bkri bar bgyis pa dang ngus so/_/de la zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis smras pa/_ded dpon gyi chung ma ci'i phyir ngu /_
[\[305a.6\]]des de dag la ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang /_de dag gis ded dpon khrid cig dang bdag cag gis rim gro bya'o zhes smras nas des bdag khrid do/_/ji tsam na lam kar mi rgod lnga brgya tsam byung nas de dag gis 'gron pa de rnams kyang bcom/_ded dpon yang bsad nas 
[\[305a.7\]]bdag ni mi rgod lnga brgya po de rnams kyis dga' mgur spyad do/_/de rnams kyis 'gron pa gzhan bsad pa'i bud med gzhan zhig rnyed pa dang /_de bdag gis 'di ni bdag gi chun mar 'gyur ro snyam nas khron pa rnying par bor ba dang de nyid du gum par gyur to/_/lha bdag gi mi rgod 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]lnga brgyas dga' mgur spyad na ngoms par ma gyur pa de lta bu bdag gis 'tshal bzhin du ci bud med rnams la phrag dog skyed lags sam/_lha 'on kyang 'jig rten gang zhig bud med rnams yid brtan par 'jog pa de ni blun pa lags kyi/_bud med rnams kyis skyes pa dag yid brtan 
[\[305b.2\]]par gzhag par bgyi ba 'di ni rigs lags so/_/des smras pa/_bu de de bzhin te/_bud med rnams kyis skyes pa dag yid brtan par gzhag par bya'o/_/'phags rgyal na rngon pa zhig gnas pa de'i chung ma gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig pas de de la shin tu 
[\[305b.3\]]chags te/_des bsams pa/_gal te chung ma bzhag ste dgon pa'i gnas su song na ni 'di skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur/_ci ste ma song na ni bdag rngon pa ste/_gzhan gyi srog gcod cing gzhan gyi srog bcad pas 'tsho bar byed pa yin gyis 
[\[305b.4\]]bdag ni zhing pa ma yin/_tshong pa ma yin/_gzhan gyis 'tsho ba yang ma yin pas gdon mi za bar ltogs te 'chi bar 'gyur bas ma la bdag gis chung ma khrid la 'gro'o snyam nas/_des chung ma khrid de dgon pa'i gnas su song nas phyogs gcig cig tu lo ma'i spyil bu byas te 
[\[305b.5\]]'dug go/_/des der [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mchog bdams shing bsad de sha bzang po btsongs nas 'tsho bar byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gtum po rab snang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du song ba las de rtas kha khyer nas phyogs der phyin pa dang /_rngon pa des de ngo shes par gyur cing ji ltar 
[\[305b.6\]]rtas kha khyer ba yang shes nas des de la byon pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig kun tu spyad pa dang /_de rta las babs te shing drung zhig tu 'dug go/_/rngon pas bsams pa/_bdag gis rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la zhag lon pa'i sha dbul ba gang yin pa ni bdag gi cha ma 
[\[305b.7\]]yin pas ma la bdag gis zhag ma lon pa gzhan zhig khyer te 'ong ngo snyam nas des mda' lcugs bgos mda' gzhu lag na khyer te [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du song ngo /_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis de'i chung ma gzugs dang na tshod dang ldan pa de mthong nas nyon mongs pa drag po'i mthus 'dod 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]pa'i 'dod chags bskyed pas rngon pa de'i chung ma dang lhan cig tu de ma thag tu log par spyad do/_/rngon pa des [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bsad nas slar log pa dang re zhig na chung ma de la log par spyad pa mthong ngo /_/khon rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste bud med rnams kyi phyir khon pa de tha chad yin pas de khros nas 
[\[306a.2\]]bsams pa dus ngan pa'i rgyal po rgyal po'i chos las 'das pa 'di gsad do snyam pa las yang bsams pa/_bud med tsam gyi phyir ci 'di gsad dam/_de de snyam du sems pa na ma stes te seng ge zhig dang gdong thug tu phrad nas des de bsad do/_/des rgyal po gtum po rab snang la byams pa'i 
[\[306a.3\]]sems bskyed pas shi nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_bud med 'di bdag gis longs spyad la 'di'i khyo yang dus las 'das na bdag gis 'di bor ba gang yin pa ni bdag gi cha ma yin no snyam bsams nas/_des de spro bsrings nas de 
[\[306a.4\]]dang lhan cig gtam zer zhing 'dug go/_/ji tsam na blon po dang /_gzhon nu dang /_khrom gyi ru dag yan man du tshol zhing phyogs der phyin pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_lha bud med 'di su'i lags/_des smras pa/_nged ni rgyal po yin pas nga la su zhig bud med mi 'bul/_deng la 'di btsun 
[\[306a.5\]]mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhog shig_/de dag gis de btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bzhag go/_/rgyal po yang dpung dang bzhon pa'i tshogs dang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du song nas 'phags rgyal du phyin par gyur pa na de'i btsun mo'i 'khor dag rgya cher 'phel bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar 
[\[306a.6\]]sems 'di myur du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ni gcig kyang ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo zhes gsungs pas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis btsun mo'i 'khor rgya che ba dag mthong nas bsams pa/_re zhig rngon pa nyon mongs des chung ma gcig cig 'brog dgon par khrid de 
[\[306a.7\]]bzhag na de yang bsrung bar ma nus na bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor shin tu rgya che ba bsrung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam nas/_des 'phags rgyal du dril bsgrags te/_'di skad du shes ldan 'phags rgyal na gnas pa dang /_grong khyer pa dang /_yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]nyon cig_/ngas btsun mo'i 'khor rnams ji ltar 'dod par longs spyad du gtang gis gang gis btsun mo'i 'khor dag yongs su longs spyad pa des ni legs par longs spyad pa yin no zhes bsgrags so/_/btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyang bos nas khyed kyang gzhan gyi skyes pa dang lhan cig 
[\[306b.2\]]dga' mgur spyod du deng la gang zhig rnga brdungs pa'i tshe slar ma 'ongs pa de'i mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la dor bar bya'o zhes kyang bsgo'o/_/bud med thams cad ni skyes pa 'dod pa yin na rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos pas de dag 'phags rgyal na kun tu 'phyan 
[\[306b.3\]]cing gang gis skyes pa gang mthong ba de de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par brtsams so/_/ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba dang /_skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma ni rgyal po gtum po rab snang lhag par byams pas de dag rgyal po'i ngo ma chod de ma song ngo /_/rgyal pos zhi ba la smras pa/_zhi ba khyod kyang 
[\[306b.4\]]song la gzhan gyi skyes pa dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod cig des smras pa/_lha bdag ni lha btang nas skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur mi spyod lags so/_/skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma la khyod song shig ces smras pa dang /_de na tshod kyis gzhon la mi brtan pa'i rang bzhin 
[\[306b.5\]]can zhig yin pas skyes pa gzhan 'dod de des khas blangs nas de srang na mar song ngo /_/de kun tu 'phyan pa na spos 'tshong gi khye'u sdu gu zhig mthong nas des de la smras pa/_dga' mgur spyod kyis tshur/_des smras pa/_re zhig mar me zung shig dang /_ji 'du 'god brtsis la phyis dga' 
[\[306b.6\]]mgur spyad par bgyi'o zhes byas pa dang /_des mar me bzung nas 'dug go/_/spos 'tshong gi khye'u des 'di las ni 'di khugs so/_/'di ni che ge mo zhig la byin pa yin no zhes de rtsis byed cing de la mi sems par 'dug gi bar du ji tsam na nam nangs par gyur te/_rgyal po'i pho brang du rnga 
[\[306b.7\]]brdungs pa dang /_skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol mas mar me sa la bzhag ste song ngo /_/des smras pa/_dga' mgur spyad kyis sdod cig_/des smras pa/_ji ltar dga' mgur spyad/_lhas 'di skad du bud med gang zhig rnga brdungs te ma 'ongs pa de'i mgo bo drungs nas bcad de sa la dor bar bya'o zhes khrims su 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]bcas te bzhag la/_da gzod rnga de yang brdungs zin na ci bdag la mgo gnyis yod dam 'gro'o zhes de dga' mgur ma spyad pa nyid du song ngo /_/rgyal pos dris pa/_sgrol ma khyod kyis dga' mgur spyad dam/_des smras pa/_lha dga' mgur ma spyad do/_/ci'i phyir zhes byas pa dang /_
[\[307a.2\]]des ji ltar gyur pa brjod nas rgyal po cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/yang rgyal pos de bzhin du dril bsgrags pa dang /_kun tu rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis btsun mo'i 'khor ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skyes bu longs spyod du btang ngo zhes sgra grags so/_/kau shAm bI'i rgyal po shar ba'i bus ji 
[\[307a.3\]]ltar rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis btsun mo'i 'khor ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skyes bu longs spyod du btang ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang sbyor ba 'chang la smras pa/_sbyor ba 'chang rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis btsun mo'i 'khor ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skyes bu longs spyod du btang ngo 
[\[307a.4\]]zhes grag gis/_rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod du 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_lha rgyal po gtum po rab snang ni khyod kyi yun ring po nas gsod pa phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba lags pas gal te lha der bzhud de mjal na gnod pa bgyid pa'i 
[\[307a.5\]]gnas gang lags pa de mchis so/_/des smras pa/_sbyor ba 'chang mi rnams kyi nang na mi gzu lums can dag yod mod kyi 'on kyang khyod 'dir 'dug shig nga ni 'gro'o des smras pa/_gal te lha de ltar bzhed na/_lha bag mi mnga' ba lags mod kyi 'on kyang bag mdzad pa'i rigs so/_/rgyal po 
[\[307a.6\]]shar pa'i bu yang shin tu bud med la brkam chags can zhig pas des de'i tshig khyad du bsad nas 'phags rgyal du song ba dang /_skya bseng gi bu mo des de gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa mdzes pa mthong ngo /_/des de mthong nas smras pa/_rgyal rigs tshur spyon skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma 
[\[307a.7\]]dang dga' mgur spyad par bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_legs kyis mal gyis shig_/des smras pa/_khyod mal gyis shig de gnyi ga yang dregs shing nga rgyal gyis khengs pas rgyal po shar pa'i bus kyang mal ma byas/_skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol mas kyang ma byas par de gnyis khyod mal byos shig nga mi 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]byed do zhes smra ba'i bar du nam nangs par gyur te/_rgyal po'i pho brang du rnga brdungs pa dang /_skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma song ngo /_/rgyal po shar pa'i bus smras pa/_sdod cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o/_/skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol mas smras pa/_ji ltar dga' mgur spyad lhas 'di skad du bud med gang zhig rnga brdungs 
[\[307b.2\]]te ma 'ongs pa de'i mgo bo drungs nas bcad de sa la dor ro zhes khrims su bcas pa bzhag la/_da gzod rnga de yang brdungs na ci bdag la mgo gnyis yod dam 'gro zhes de dga' mgur ma spyad par rgyal po shar pa'i bu'i lag nas sor gdub rgya phyung ste song ngo /_/rgyal pos dris pa/_sgrol ma khyod kyis 
[\[307b.3\]]dga' mgur spyad dam/_des smras pa/_lha dga' mgur ma spyad do/_/ci'i phyir khyod kyis dga' mgur ma spyad/_des ji ltar gyur pa brjod nas sor gdub rgya bstan te 'di ni bdag gis de'i sor gdub rgya 'tshal te mchis pa lags so/_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis de'i rgya bklags nas 
[\[307b.4\]]gsos pa la smras pa/_gsos pa rgyal po shar pa'i bu dmag mang po can 'dir 'ongs pa sus kyang ma tshor te/_de yang nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor 'dod na khyod kyis ji ltar yal bar dor des smras pa/_lha ma tshor bar de 'dir mchis mod ci ste da dung 'dir mchi na mi bzod par bgyi'o/_/de nas rgyal po gtum 
[\[307b.5\]]po rab snang gis yang de bzhin du dril bsgrags pa dang /_rgyal po shar pa'i bu des de bzhin du thos nas sbyor ba 'chang la smras pa/_sbyor ba 'chang rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis yang btsun mo'i 'khor ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skyes bu longs spyod du btang ngo zhes grag gis de'i phyir rgyal po gtum po 
[\[307b.6\]]rab snang gi btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad kyis tshur shog 'dong sbyor ba 'chang gis smras pa/_lha de'i tshe ni khyod ma tshor bar bzhud pas de'i slad du bde bar 'dir 'khor gyi/_da ni rgyal po gtum po rab snang sta gon du chas shing mchis pas ma gshegs na legs so/_/des 
[\[307b.7\]]smras pa/_sbyor ba 'chang mi rnams kyi nang na mi gzu lums can dag yod de 'gro'o zhes de song ba dang sbyor ba 'chang yang rgyal po'i bkas song ngo /_/rgyal po shar pa'i bu rim gyis 'phags rgyal du phyin te khyim gang du zhugs pa de gsos pas lag na ral gri thogs pa'i mi dag gis kun tu bskor nas de rnams 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag gal te bud med cig phyi rol du byung na ni thong shig_/ji ste skyes pa zhig na ma gtang zhig_/sbyor ba 'chang gis tshor nas des bsams pa bdag gis rgyal po mi bzad pa dogs pa nyam nga bar gyur pa yal bar dor ba gang yin pa ni bdag gi cha ma yin no snyam nas/_des rgyal po de bud 
[\[308a.2\]]med phal pa'i cha lugs dang rgyan gyis brgyan te/_de nas bum pa bskur nas lcug mas gzhus te spyo zhing lha da cung tshems shing ma gsol na khyod chu khyer te mi 'ong ngam/_zhes byas nas phyir phyung ngo /_/rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis bu mo mngag gzhug ma yin no snyam nas yal bar btang ba dang des bum pa rdzing bu'i 
[\[308a.3\]]'gram du bor nas bros te song ngo /_/gsos pas khyim de bltas pa dang re zhig na bros par gyur nas des sbyor ba 'chang bzung ste rgyal po gtum po rab snang la phul nas lha mi 'dis rgyal po shar pa'i bu btang lags so/_/sbyor ba 'chang gis smras pa/_lha bdag gis de'i zas dang gos dag bdag gir 
[\[308a.4\]]bgyis te bdag gis de btang ba gang lags pa de ni bdag gis rigs pa zhig bgyis kyi/_'dis ni khyod kyi zas dang gos bdag gir bgyis la btang ba na yal bar bor ba gang lags pa de ni rigs pa ma lags so/_/zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal po gsos pa la khros nas smras pa/_gsos pa rgyal po 
[\[308a.5\]]shar pa nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor 'dod pa yal bar btang ba'i rigs sam/_de'i phyir gal te re zhig rgyal po shar pa'i bu khrid de 'ongs na de lta na legs/_ji ste ma 'ongs na chad pas cher gcad do zhes byas pa dang /_de skrag nas de gzung ba'i thabs sems shing 'dug go/_/re zhig na lho phyogs nas 'khrul 'khor gyi 
[\[308a.6\]]sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon zhig 'ongs pa dang /_gsos pas kye skyes bu 'di dang 'di lta bu'i 'khrul 'khor byed nus sam zhes dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_lha bdag gis mnyes par rngo thog go/_/gsos pas glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri zhes bya ba dben pa zhig tu sbas nas 'phags rgyal du glang po che'i 
[\[308a.7\]]gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri bros so zhes sgra btang ba dang de'i tshe sgra de yang phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu grags par gyur to/_/de'i tshe des 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi mkhan po la 'di lta bu'i 'khrul 'khor zhig gyis shig ces smras pa dang des kyang glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri ci 'dra ba de kho na 'dra ba'i 'khrul 'khor 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]zhig byas nas 'khrul 'khor der mi lnga brgya yang bcug_/glang po che'i lci ba dang chu yang mang du bcug ste/_de nas mi de rnams la bsgo ba/_ci nas khyed cag gis ji ltar kau shAm+bI'i nyen 'khor mig lam du 'bab pa de ltar 'khrul 'khor 'di drongs shig_/ji ste rgyal po shar pa'i bu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang byung 
[\[308b.2\]]na ni khyed kyis de'i lag tu ma sbyin cig_/'on te gcig pu 'ongs na ni zung la bzung nas myur du 'dir khrid de shog shig ces byas pa dang /_de dag gis ji ltar 'khrul 'khor de kau shAm+bI'i nyen 'khor bltar rung ba de ltar legs par drangs te 'dug pa dang /_phyugs rdzi dang /_ba lang rdzi dang /_rtswa thun dang /_shing 
[\[308b.3\]]thun dang /_lam gyis 'tsho ba dang /_lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig bgrad nas bskor te blta bar brtsams so/_/de na kha cig na re shes ldan dag 'di ni glang po che'i gtso bo rgod yin no zhes zer ro/_/gzhan dag na re 'di glang po che rgod ma yin gyi 'phags rgyal gyi rgyal po gtum 
[\[308b.4\]]po rab snang gi glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri zhes bya ba bros pa de 'dir 'ongs pa yin no zhes zer ro/_/de nas kha cig gis rgyal po shar pa'i gan du song nas gcam bu gsol pa/_lha 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri bros par gyur pa 
[\[308b.5\]]gang lags pa de ni lha'i bsod nams kyi mthus 'dir mchis te srog chags brgya stong du ma ltar mchis so zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po shar pa'i bus thos nas dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te dga' ba'i rnga ni brdungs/_dung zung kha bstams pa ni bus nas sbyor ba 'chang la bsgo ba/_song 
[\[308b.6\]]la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go skon la grong khyer du yang dril sgrogs te/_'di skad du grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad dang /_yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams la rgyal po glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri 'dzin tu gshegs kyis mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs dang 
[\[308b.7\]]zhags pa thogs te shog shig ces bsgo shig_/sbyor ba 'chang gis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/_grong khyer du yang dril bsgrags nas 'di skad du shes ldan grong khyer na gnas pa rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor na gnas pa rnams dang /_yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]dag nyon cig lhas nga glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri 'dzin du gshegs kyis khyed cag mtshon cha sna tshogs dang zhags pa dag thogs te shog shig ces bka' stsal to/_/zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal po shar pa dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang /_mi'i mchog stong phrag du 
[\[309a.2\]]ma dang /_lhan cig tu glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri 'dzin du dong ba dang /_'khrul 'khor 'phul ba rnams kyis ji ltar glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri ltar bcos pa de 'bros par rtsom pa de ltar 'khrul 'khor de phul ba dang /_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha khyod nyid glang po che'i cho ga la 
[\[309a.3\]]mkhas pa lags pas glang po che 'di 'bros su bgyid kyis khyod nyid kyis thabs mdzad du gsol/_rgyal pos sbyor ba 'chang la bsgo ba/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa khyed cig_/nga nyid thabs kyis 'di'i drung du 'gro'o/_/des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bkyed nas rgyal po bdag 
[\[309a.4\]]nyid pi bang snyan pa len cing nye bar 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /_'khrul 'khor 'phul ba rnams kyis ji ltar 'khrul 'khor rgyal po shar pa'i bu drung du song nas 'dug pa de ltar phul te mi lnga brgya po de dag 'khrul 'khor nas byung ste bzung ngo /_/bzung nas 'khrul 'khor du bcug ste 'khrul 'khor 
[\[309a.5\]]de ji ltar rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs par gyur pa de ltar phul lo/_/rgyal po shar pa'i bu khrid do/_/rgyal po shar pa'i bu khrid do zhes blon po rnams kyis kun tu sbran pa dang /_srog chags brgya stong du ma dang /_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pas bsnyag par brtsams so/_/gang gi tshe sa 
[\[309a.6\]]tshigs 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe sbyor ba 'chang gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po khrid zin te thabs gzhan zhig bsam gyis slar log shig ces byas pa dang de dag thams cad log go/_/rgyal po shar pa'i bu yang 'phags rgyal du khrid nas gsos pas rgyal po gtum po rab snang 
[\[309a.7\]]la phul te/_lha rgyal po shar pa'i bu 'di lags so zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po dga' ba'i rnga ni brdungs/_dung zung kha bstams pa ni bus te/_grong dang grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_srang na gnas pa'i srog chags snying na ba du ma tshogs pa dang /_gsos pa la bsgo ba ngas rgyal po 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]shar pa'i bu yongs su btang gis sod cig_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha rgyal po 'di ni glang po che'i cho ga la mkhas pa zhig ste/_gal te 'di bkum na glang po che'i cho ga nub par 'gyur bas de'i slad du re zhig lhas 'di las glang po che'i cho ga bslab tu gsol/_slad kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa 
[\[309b.2\]]bzhin bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gal te de lta na khyod kyis 'di las glang po che'i cho ga slobs shig_/ngas 'di las glang po che'i cho ga bslabs te nga'i slob dpon du gyur na ji ltar slob dpon bsad par bya/_gsos pas smras pa/_lha bdag la yang nyes dmigs de nyid du 'gyur 
[\[309b.3\]]bas de ni cha ma lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gal te de lta na su zhig 'di la slob tu bcug la de las ngas bslab par bya/_gsos pas smras pa/_lha khyod kyis sras mo nor lhas byin 'di le lo ma mchis pa/_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/_mkhas pa/_grims pa lags pas 'di slob tu 
[\[309b.4\]]stsal te/_'dis lha la bslab par bgyi'o/_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis nor lhas byin la smras pa/_bu mo mi de mtshan ngan pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan na/_'on kyang glang po che'i cho ga la mkhas pa zhig pas khyod kyis de las bar du yol bas bcad de glang po che'i cho ga slobs la phyis nga la 
[\[309b.5\]]slobs shig_/khyod kyis de la blta bar yang mi bya ste/_de mthong na bkra mi shis pas khyod kyis de mthong na khyod 'chi'o zhes byas pa dang /_des yol bas bcad de de las glang po che'i cho ga bslab par brtsams so/_/sbyor ba 'chang gis bsams pa/_gal te lha btsal te gson na ni de 
[\[309b.6\]]thar pa'i thabs shig bsam mo/_/'on te shi ste dus las 'das na ni gzhan zhig rgyal por dbang bskur ro snyam nas/_de'i sring mo gser phreng can zhes bya ba sgyu bsham pa la sbyor ba 'chang ba bas kyang lhag pa zhig yod pa de la des smras pa/_sring mo 'phags rgyal du song la son nas rgyal po 
[\[309b.7\]]kun du tshol te/_gal te gson na de thar pa'i thabs shig bsam par bya'o/_/'on te shi ste dus las 'das na gzhan zhig rgyal por dbang bskur ro zhes byas pa dang des de la cang mi smra bas khas blangs te kun tu rgyu'i cha lugs su bsgyur nas 'phags rgyal du song ngo /_/de rgyal po'i sgor 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]'dug nas rgyal po'i mi dag la dris pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po shar pa'i bu ci gson nam 'on te shi/_rgyal po'i mi dag gis smras pa/_re zhig rab tu byung ba khyod la dris/_des khyod la gnod pa ci zhig byas/_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag des kho mo'i khyo dang bu ni 
[\[310a.2\]]'tsho ba dang phral/_bdag gi nor rdzas thams cad ni phrogs so de dag gis smras pa/_rab tu byung ba de ni dus las ma 'das te/_de rgyal po'i sras mo nor lhas byin pa la glang po che'i cho ga slob po de bzhin du des rgyal po'i sgo bzhir rgyal po'i mi dag la dris pa dang /_de dag gis 
[\[310a.3\]]kyang de bzhin du lan btab po/_/de g.yo thabs de dang des nang du chud pa dang /_de rgyal po shar pa'i bu mthong nas phyogs bzhir bltas te dal bus lha gson nam zhes smras pa dang de yang bag tsha zhing yid mi dga' bzhin du phyogs bzhir bltas nas sring mo gson no zhes smras so/_/
[\[310a.4\]]des de mngon sum byas nas thabs gzhan zhig gis nor lhas byin pa mthong nas smras pa/_bu mo khyod su las glang po che'i cho ga slob des smras pa/_bgres mo mi mtshan ngan pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan pa zhig yod de de la bar yol bas bcad nas slob bo/_/des smras pa/_'di na mi mtshan 
[\[310a.5\]]ngan pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan pa 'ga' yang ga la yod/_gang zhig khyod slob pa de ni rgyal po shar pa'i bu yin te/_gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa mtshan thams cad legs par rdzogs pa yin na/_khyod la su zhig gis de skad du bslus/_ci ste khyod yid mi ches na yol ba phye la ltos shig ces 
[\[310a.6\]]byas pa dang /_des de'i gzugs dang na tshod thos nas dad de yol ba phye ba dang mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu rlung gi stobs kyi shugs kyis bskyod pa bzhin du 'dod pas g.yems nas smras pa/_bgres mo khyod ji skad gsung pa gang lags pa de ni mad na 'on kyang gsol ba zhig mchis te/_bdag 'di 
[\[310a.7\]]dang lhan cig mjal bar khyod kyis spyod dam/_des smras pa/_bu mo bdag gis khyod kyi de kho na bzhin du bsgrub par bya ste/_gar bskor kyang skyes bu 'di lta bu dang phrad pa yang dka' na gang khyod nga la 'di lta bu 'chol ba lta smos kyang ci dgos//_//
